original: Treat the injured man's leg again
context: 再次救治腿上负伤的汉子

original: Decipher
context: 解密

original: The criminal has been found, shall we start the arrest now?
context: 已经找到了要犯，是否现在就开始缉拿呢？

original: 【Fight to the Death】Arrest on Horseback
context: 【死战】马上缉拿

original: Couldn't find the\nwanted target\nwithin the time limit, seems like we have to let it go!
context: 没有能在时效\n内找到\n通缉目标，看来只能放了！

original: This Lin'an City is indeed a metropolis!
context: 这霖安城果然是大都市啊！

original: The city gate is huge!
context: 城门很大！

original: The Government Office is huge!
context: 衙门很大！

original: The bust of the Maiden House girl is also huge!
context: 群芳馆姑娘的胸脯也很大！

original: Oh my!
context: 哎嗨害！

original: The expenses are also huge!
context: 花销也很大啊！

original: Yes, I've recently taken some bounties from Lin'an City to make a living.
context: 是啊，我这不最近接了一些霖安城的悬赏过活么？

original: Hmm? I want to join too, where did you get it? Can you share it with your good brother?
context: 嗯？我也想加入，你在哪里接的？好兄弟分享下吗！

original: Here, can't you see such a big sign?
context: 这里啊，这么大的牌子你看不到吗？

original: But, if you don't have some skills, don't try to show off.
context: 不过啊，没点本事还是不要逞强。

original: The difficulty of the bounties you accept varies. Act according to your own skills.
context: 接受的悬赏难度不一，根据自身能力量力而行哦。

original: That's natural!
context: 这是自然！

original: After all, you only have one life!
context: 毕竟小命儿只有一条吗！

original: Hmm?
context: 嗯？

original: Bounty? Might as well go and take a look!
context: 悬赏？不妨过去看看！

original: Start a fight on the horse<color=#c44b0e>(Directly initiate combat)</color>!
context: 马上动手<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>！

original: Come back later.
context: 稍后再来。

original: The person wanted on the bounty notice is right in front of you, do you want to subdue <color=#c44b0e>{PrisonerName}</color>?
context: 悬赏告示上通缉之人就在眼前，是否将动手将<color=#c44b0e>{PrisonerName}</color>制伏呢？

original: Kid! You killed my disciples and dare to be arrogant in front of me, take this!
context: 小子！你杀我门人，还敢在我面前嚣张，看招！

original: {PlayerSurName} Young hero, go talk to La Tazhang about joining us!
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，入门事宜去和邋遢张聊聊吧！

original: Master, we've been down the mountain for so long without any progress, but you don't seem to be in a hurry?
context: 师叔，咱们下山这么久了，事情一点进展没有，但您好像一点也不着急？

original: Ah, sometimes things have to happen in their own time, you can't force it~
context: 唉，这事还是命中有时终须有，命里无时莫强求~

original: That's not what you said when you left the mountain! You said you observed the stars at night and sensed that we might meet someone destined in Daliang City.
context:
您下山时跟掌教可不是这么说的！
您说您夜观天象，感知这大梁城里可能遇到有缘人。

original: You even solemnly told the headmaster that this destined person is the key to the future of our Taoist Sect, so you specifically came down the mountain to enlighten this person to join the Taoist Sect...
context: 您还信誓旦旦和掌教说这有缘人是我道玄宗继往开来的关键人物，所以特意下山来点化此人加入道玄宗……

original: You blockhead! If I didn't say that, would the headmaster let me down the mountain?
context: 你这个榆木脑袋！本道爷不这么说，师兄会放我下山？

original: Ah! Did you just make it up?
context: 啊！您难道是信口胡说？

original: Watch your words! When have I ever spoken nonsense? Those were just drunken words, just drunken words.
context:
慎言慎言！本道爷什么时候信口胡说过？
那只是醉话而已，醉话而已。

original: However, if we return to the mountain without accomplishing anything, it will be troublesome to find an excuse to come down the mountain in the future...
context: 不过，若是回山无法交差，以后再找借口下山可是个麻烦……

original: I didn't expect to meet the two Taoist priests here, what a pleasant surprise.
context: 想不到在这里又遇到二位道长，真是幸会。

original: La Tazhang Chang Chunzi looks at the protagonist
context: 邋遢张 长春子看向主角

original: La Tazhang looks at the protagonist from all sides
context: 邋遢张 围绕主角前后左右看了一遍

original: It's like finding something without even looking for it!
context: 踏破铁鞋无觅处，得来全不费工夫！

original:
Master, could it be...
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, are you the destined person?
context:
师叔，难不成……
{PlayerSurName}少侠就是那个有缘人？

original: Yes, yes!
context: 不错，不错！

original:
Master, could it be...
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, are you the destined person?
context:
师叔，难不成……
{PlayerSurName}少侠就是那个有缘人？

original: This kid is intelligent, he will definitely carry forward the martial arts of the Taoist Sect!
context: 这小子悟性上佳，定能把道玄宗武学发扬光大！

original: But his character may not be the best choice.
context: 可是此人品性未必是上佳之选啊。

original: Just because he invited me for a drink, his character can't be too bad. If one day he really commits a heinous crime, I will personally take action to eliminate him!
context:
就凭他请本道爷喝酒，品性也不会差到哪去。
有朝一日他若真犯下滔天之罪，本道爷会亲自出手灭了他！

original: {PlayerSurName} Kid, have you heard of our Taoist Sect?
context: {PlayerSurName}小子，你听说过我们道玄宗吗？

original: What a pity, what a pity...
context: 可惜，可惜……

original: Indeed a pity...
context: 的确可惜……

original: What are you two pitying?
context: 二位可惜什么？

original: {PlayerSurName} Kid, I originally thought I would have a relationship with you as fellow disciples. But your character is average, and your intelligence is also average, you really can't enter my eyes.
context:
{PlayerSurName}小子，本道爷原先还以为会和你有一段同门之谊。
怎知你品行一般，悟性也一般，实在入不了本道爷的法眼。

original: Do you have to be so direct?
context: 要说的这么直接吗？

original: {PlayerSurName} Young hero, our Taoist Sect always selects disciples based on both character and intelligence.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，我们道玄宗择徒一向是既看仁义品性也看悟性资质。

original: Although the young hero has helped out a few times, but when it comes to the inheritance of the sect... Even if it's my master, I can't break the rules to accept you.
context:
虽然少侠几次仗义援手，但是事关宗门传承……
即便是师叔，也无法破例收下少侠。

original:
Hehe, luckily I didn't actively seek a master.
If I had sought a master and then been rejected, where would my face be?
context:
嘿嘿，幸好我没主动拜师。
要是拜师了再被拒绝，颜面何存。

original: {PlayerSurName}Kid, we'll have the chance to meet again in the future, let's part ways for today.
context: {PlayerSurName}小子，咱们以后还有见面的机会，今日就此别过了。

original: {PlayerSurName}Young hero, I'll take my leave.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，告辞了。

original: {PlayerSurName} Kid, have you heard of our Taoist Sect?
context: {PlayerSurName}小子，你听说过我们道玄宗吗？

original: I haven't heard of it.
context: 没听说过。

original: I've heard of it.
context: 听说过。

original:
The Taoist Sect was established hundreds of years ago, and is now one of the <color=#c44b0e>three religions</color> in the world.
However, neither my senior brother nor I care much about this fake fame.
context:
道玄宗建派于数百年前，如今更是天下<color=#c44b0e>三教</color>之一。
只不过不论师兄还是本道爷都不怎么在乎这些虚名。

original: After my senior brother became the head of the sect, he has always taken saving the world as his purpose, and the disciples under his command are required to be outstanding in <color=#c44b0e>benevolence and righteousness</color>. If a disciple does something unkind or unjust, they will be punished lightly by facing the wall in meditation, or severely by being expelled from the sect after their martial arts are abolished.
context: 师兄当上掌教之后，就一直把济世救民当做宗旨，门下弟子更是要求<color=#c44b0e>仁、义</color>出众。弟子要是做出不仁不义的事，轻则面壁思过，重则废去一身功力逐出山门。

original: Our sect is good at <color=#c44b0e>fist and sword techniques</color> in external skills, and our internal skills lean towards defense, emphasizing readiness!
context: 本派外功擅长<color=#c44b0e>拳法、剑法</color>，内功偏向防御，讲究以静制动！

original: My senior brother also has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>Taichi Thirteen Forms</color>, which is said to be able to block hundreds of attacks with one, and win with fewer against many.
context: 师兄另有一门<color=#c44b0e>太极十三势</color>的绝招，据说可以以一挡百，以少胜多。

original: I am the junior brother of the head of the sect, Zhong Yangzi...
context: 本道爷乃是掌教重阳子的师弟……

original:
I don't know anything about observing qi and physiognomy, and I've never heard of drawing talismans to exorcise spirits.
As for martial arts, if I learn for a few more years, it won't be a problem for me to become the tenth best martial artist in the world.
context:
本道爷望气看相一概不会，画符驱邪闻所未闻。
至于武功嘛，等本道爷再修炼几年，混成天下第十高手不成问题。

original: Now I'm going to ask you a question, are you willing to join my Taoist Sect?
context: 现在本道爷问你一句话，你可愿拜入我道玄宗门下？

original:
Since you've heard of the Taoist Sect, I'll ask you a question,
Are you willing to join the Taoist Sect and take the eradication of evil and kindness as your own responsibility?
context:
既然你听说过道玄宗，那么本道爷问你一句话，
你可愿拜入道玄宗门下，以除恶扬善为己任？

original: I have already joined another sect...
context: 晚辈已加入其他门派……

original: I am willing to join the Taoist Sect.<color=#0574a8>【Join the Sect】</color>
context: 晚辈愿意加入道玄宗。<color=#0574a8>【拜入门派】</color>

original: I have other ambitions and do not wish to join the Taoist Sect.
context: 晚辈另有志向，不愿加入道玄宗。

original: What a pity, what a pity...
context: 可惜，可惜……

original: Indeed a pity...
context: 的确可惜……

original: What are you two pitying?
context: 二位可惜什么？

original:
{PlayerSurName}Kid, I originally thought I would have a bond of fellowship with you.
But it turns out you already belong to another sect, I was too late.
context:
{PlayerSurName}小子，本来道爷还以为会和你有一段同门之谊。
怎知你已经身有所属，本道爷下手晚了。

original: Senior, do you think I can rush back now to quit my current sect and join the Taoist Sect in time?
context: 前辈，你看我现在赶回去退出门派，改投道玄宗还来得及吗？

original:
{PlayerSurName}Kid, everything is about timing, you can't force it.
And if you abandon your current sect in order to join another, it's a great injustice!
The Taoist Sect will never accept such an unjust person.
context:
{PlayerSurName}小子，凡事讲究机缘，强求不得。
而且你为了另投其他家而背弃现有门派，是为大不义！
道玄宗断不会收留如此不义之人的。

original: I feel like I'm being rejected.
context: 好像有种被嫌弃的感觉。

original: It seems I'll have to find someone else.
context: 看来本道爷只能另寻他人了。

original: {PlayerSurName}Young hero, I'll take my leave.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，告辞了。

original: This trip was not in vain!
context: 此番总算不虚此行！

original:
{PlayerSurName}Kid, today I will take you as a disciple on behalf of my senior brother.
I hope you won't forget the way of benevolence and righteousness, otherwise I will personally punish you!
context:
{PlayerSurName}小子，今日本道爷就作主替师兄收你作弟子。
希望你不要忘记仁义之道，否则本道爷会亲自出手惩戒你！

original: Greetings, uncle master!
context: 拜见师叔！

original: The one next to you, Chang Chunzi, is also my junior brother, and he is of the same generation as you, you can call him senior brother.
context: 旁边这位长春子也是本道爷的师侄，和你是同辈，你管他叫师兄吧。

original: Greetings, senior brother.
context: 拜见师兄。

original:
You can choose one of these two manuals as your initiation gift.
If it doesn't match the direction of your martial arts, don't force it, you can also give it to your partner to learn.
context:
这两本秘籍你任选其一，便作为给你的拜师礼了。
若和你所学武功方向不契合，也不必强求，给你的伙伴修炼也无妨的。

original:
Hmm, I'll also give you some other initiation gifts to save you the trouble.
When you have time, come back to the Taoist Sect to pay respects to the head of the sect, it will definitely benefit you in the end.
context:
嗯，还有一些其他入门礼也一并给你吧，省得麻烦。
有空便回道玄宗拜见掌教，终究少不了你的好处。

original: Almost forgot to tell you, our disciples must attend morning classes at <color=#c44b0e>Star Observatory</color> every day at <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color>. This is the daily homework of a cultivator, and only through daily accumulation can you comprehend the subtleties.
context: 差点忘记嘱咐你了，本门弟子每日<color=#c44b0e>辰时</color>须到<color=#c44b0e>观星台</color>上早课，这是修道人的日常功课，日记月累方能体悟妙处。

original: This old man is going to travel elsewhere first, you take care of yourself in the martial arts world.
context: 本道爷先去其他地方游历了，你自己闯荡江湖好自为之。

original: {PlayerSurName}, take care of yourself.
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，自己多保重。

original:
It seems that we are destined to part ways.
Well, this old man will have to find someone else.
context:
看来是有缘无分啊。
也罢，本道爷只能另找他人了。

original: {PlayerSurName}Young hero, I'll take my leave.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，告辞了。

original: Amitabha, may I ask what brings you here?
context: 阿弥陀佛，请问施主有何贵干？

original: Inquiring about the Shifa Temple.
context: 打听释法寺的情况。

original: <color=#0574a8>Join the Shifa Temple.
context: <color=#0574a8>拜入释法寺。

original: Excuse me, Run away!
context: 告辞离开！

original:
Our temple has a history of hundreds of years, and it is a branch of the Zen sect, advocating Mahayana Buddhism.
We believe in helping all beings to achieve liberation and guiding countless beings to the other shore.
context:
敝寺已有数百年的光景，传承乃是禅宗一脉，信奉大乘佛法。
讲究渡化众生，助众生解脱，将无量众生度送彼岸。

original:
Buddha said, anyone who puts down the butcher's knife can become a Buddha on the spot.
As long as you sincerely convert to Buddhism, Shifa Temple will open the door of convenience for you.
context:
佛曰，放下屠刀皆可立地成佛。
凡是诚心皈依我佛，释法寺便会大开方便之门。

original: Our temple has a slight reputation in the martial arts world. The martial arts we practice are for the purpose of protecting the Dharma and the Tao, and they are not as magical as the rumors in the martial arts world.
context: 敝寺在江湖上略有薄名，所习功法是为护法卫道之用，远没有江湖传言那般神乎其神。

original: Our temple does have a few sets of <color=#c44b0e>punching and stick techniques</color>, which are not considered advanced martial arts, but are just for strengthening the body and exorcising diseases.
context: 敝寺确有几套<color=#c44b0e>拳法、棍法</color>的功夫，算不得什么高明武功，只是强身健体、祛病驱邪罢了。

original: Amitabha, if you want to join the Shifa Temple, you need to leave your current sect first.
context: 阿弥陀佛，施主若要拜入释法寺，还需脱离现有门派。

original: You are still entangled in worldly affairs and are not suitable for practicing in our temple.
context: 施主尘缘未了，俗世羁绊过深，不适宜拜入敝寺修行。

original: Master, your words are too profound, can you be more specific?
context: 大师，您的话太深奥，可否明确告知？

original: Your companions are the worldly ties. Once you become a monk, you should not have too much involvement with the secular world.
context: 施主的伙伴便是俗世的羁绊，既然入寺出家便不该与俗世有太多瓜葛。

original:
Wait a minute!
Master, I'm not becoming a monk, I just want to join the Shifa Temple to learn martial arts.
context:
等等等！
大师，我不是出家，我只是要加入释法寺学武功的。

original: I see, then go find Brother Hua Yan, he is in charge of recruiting secular disciples.
context: 这样啊，那就去找华严师弟吧，他负责招收俗家弟子。

original: You are young and have already seen through the red dust, you really have a deep Buddhist fate.
context: 施主年纪轻轻想不到已经勘破红尘，着实佛缘不浅呐。

original:
Good, good, I will personally shave your head.
Finally, someone will inherit my mantle.
context:
善哉善哉，老衲这便给施主亲自剃度。
老衲的衣钵总算是后继有人了。

original:
Hold on!
Master, I'm not becoming a monk, I just want to join the Shifa Temple to learn martial arts.
context:
慢慢慢！
大师，我不是出家，我只是要加入释法寺学武功的。

original: I see, then go find Brother Hua Yan, he is in charge of recruiting secular disciples.
context: 这样啊，那就去找华严师弟吧，他负责招收俗家弟子。

original: Amitabha
context: 阿弥陀佛

original: What can I do for you?
context: 施主有何贵干？

original: <color=#0574a8>Join the Shifa Temple.
context: <color=#0574a8>拜入释法寺。

original: Excuse me, Run away!
context: 告辞离开！

original: If you want to join the Shifa Temple, you need to leave other martial arts sects first.
context: 施主若要拜入释法寺，需先脱离了其他江湖门派。

original: Since you are the only one who wants to join the Shifa Temple, please ask other unrelated people to Run away.
context: 既然是施主一人要拜入释法寺，那么其他不相干的人物就请离开吧。

original: Master, they are all my friends, it's not too much to practice here together, right?
context: 大师，他们都是我的朋友，就算一起在这里修行也不过分吧。

original: The rules of the temple for hundreds of years are like this. If you want to join the Shifa Temple, whether you are a monk or a secular disciple, you must come alone and not bring your friends and family!
context: 寺里数百年的规矩便是如此，若要拜入释法寺，不管是出家弟子还是俗家弟子，一律只身前来，不准亲朋故交相随！

original: In that case, I'll think about it.
context: 既然如此，我便再考虑考虑。

original: No problem.
context: 无妨。

original: {PlayerName}, from today on, I am your master, and you are a secular disciple of the Shifa Temple.
context: {PlayerName}，今日起老衲便是你的师父，你已是释法寺的俗家弟子了。

original: Is it that simple? Isn't it a bit hasty, shouldn't we have a ceremony or something?
context: 这么简单？是不是草率了些，要不要搞个仪式之类的？

original:
If you were to become a monk, this ceremony would be inevitable.
But since you are joining as a secular person, the ceremony can be avoided.
context:
你若是剃度出家，这仪式自然不可避免。
但念你只是以俗家身份拜入，那么仪式便可免了。

original: Here are two external skill Manuals, you can choose one of them as the basic skill I teach you.
context: 这有两本外功秘籍，你可任选其一，作为老衲传授给你的入门本事。

original: Thank you, master!
context: 弟子谢过师父！

original: Although you are a secular disciple, your words and deeds also represent the Shifa Temple. Don't do anything that damages the reputation of the temple, otherwise I will clean up the sect myself!
context: 你虽是俗家弟子，但一言一行也代表着释法寺，不要做出有损寺院名声的事来，否则老衲会亲自清理门户！

original: I understand, master!
context: 弟子明白！

original: Alright, that's all I have to say, the rest depends on your own practice in the future.
context: 好了，老衲要说的就这么多，余下的就看你自身日后的修行了。

original: Amitabha
context: 阿弥陀佛

original: What brings you to me?
context: 你来找俺，有何贵干？

original: So it's {PlayerSurName}, what brings you to me today?
context: 原来是{PlayerSurName}老弟，今天有什么事要来找老哥帮忙？

original: <color=#0574a8>Join the Blue Wind Camp.</color>
context: <color=#0574a8>入伙青风寨。</color>

original: Excuse me, Run away!
context: 告辞离开！

original: You're being vague, not straightforward at all.
context: 莫名其妙，做事一点也不爽利。

original: {PlayerSurName}, when did you start beating around the bush? Just spit it out.
context: {PlayerSurName}老弟，你什么时候也变得婆婆妈妈，有事不痛快直说了。

original: I don't know where you're from, or if you're a spy for some corrupt official, how can I let you join?
context: 俺又不知道你是哪家来的、是不是哪个狗官的眼线，怎能让你入伙？

original: The leader doesn't need to worry so much!
context: 大当家不必如此担心！

original:
This brother {PlayerSurName} is the one who saved us in the Wild Wolf Valley before.
If brother {PlayerSurName} wants to join, we would be more than happy.
context:
这位{PlayerSurName}兄弟便是之前在野狼谷救下我们的恩人。
{PlayerSurName}兄弟若想入伙，我们兄弟二人求之不得。

original: If the leader is still worried, we two brothers can vouch for him.
context: 大当家要是不放心，我们兄弟二人可以做担保。

original: {PlayerName}, since these two brothers are willing to vouch for you, I'll let you join.
context: {PlayerName}，既然这俩兄弟肯为你作保，那俺便允了你入伙吧。

original:
Welcome, brother {PlayerSurName} to join us!
From today on, we are brothers who drink and eat together!
context:
欢迎{PlayerSurName}老弟入伙！
从今天起，咱们便是有酒一起喝、有肉一起吃的兄弟了！

original: {PlayerName}, meet the leader!
context: {PlayerName}拜见大当家！

original:
You call me the leader, I can't let you down as the leader.
This Manual is my secret skill, I'll give it to you today.
context:
你叫俺一声大当家，俺这大当家也不能亏待了兄弟。
这本秘籍是俺压箱底的功夫，今天便赠予你吧。

original: Thank you, leader.
context: 多谢大当家。

original: It's been a long time since we had a new face in the camp, it's inevitable that people will be unsettled, let's not mention this again.
context: 这山寨里许久没有生面孔了，贸然有新人加入，免不了人心不稳，这事不要再提了。

original: Brother {PlayerSurName} wants to join? That's a joyous occasion!
context: {PlayerSurName}老弟想要入伙？那可是天下的喜事！

original:
The leader of this stronghold officially announces that from today, {PlayerName} is officially a member of the Blue Wind Camp!
{PlayerSurName} is a promising young talent, from now on, he will be your second in command!
context:
本寨主正式宣布，今日起，{PlayerName}正式入伙青风寨！
{PlayerSurName}老弟年少有为，是难得的俊才，从今往后，他就是你们的二当家！

original: {PlayerName}, meet the leader!
context: {PlayerName}拜见大当家！

original: Congratulations, leader!
context: 恭喜大当家！

original: Meet the second leader!
context: 拜见二当家！

original:
{PlayerSurName}, you call me the leader, I can't let you down as the leader.
This Manual is my secret skill, I'll give it to you today.
context:
{PlayerSurName}老弟，你叫俺一声大当家，俺这大当家也不能亏待了兄弟。
这本秘籍是俺压箱底的功夫，今天便赠予你吧。

original: Thank you, leader.
context: 多谢大当家。

original:
A spy reported that you were nearby when my brother was in trouble.
You must have something to do with my brother's death, stay and pay for it!
context:
有探子报，说俺兄弟出事时，你就在附近。
俺兄弟的死想必跟你脱不了干系，你就留下为俺兄弟偿命吧！

original: Watch the knife!
context: 看刀！

original: Blue Wind Camp has already cut ties with you, there's no chance of returning!
context: 青风寨与你早已一刀两断，若想重归山寨绝无可能！

original: Test
context: 考验

original: According to the rules of the stronghold, all newcomers must go through a test before they are qualified to work for the stronghold.
context: 按照山寨的规矩，所有新来的兄弟都要经过一番考验，以后才有资格为山寨做事。

original: If you are ready, come and accept your test.
context: 若是准备好了，就来接受对你的考验吧。

original: How does the test work?
context: 这考验如何进行？

original: Participate in the test.<color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 参加考验。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: The test is for you to face four brothers from the camp alone, if you win, you pass the test.
context: 考验的方式是你独自面对山寨的四位弟兄，你若是打赢了他们，就算通过了考验。

original: After passing the test, you will gain the unique talent of this stronghold - <color=#c44b0e>Burning spirit</color>. From then on, you can take daily stronghold tasks from me.
context: 通过考验后，你会获得本山寨所独有的天赋——<color=#c44b0e>战意凛然</color>，此后可在俺这里接取每日的山寨任务。

original: In short, only by passing this test can you initially gain the recognition of the camp and become a member of the Blue Wind Camp.
context: 总之，你只有通过了这次的考验，才算是初步获得山寨的认可，成为青风寨的一份子。

original: I have high hopes for you, don't let me down.
context: 俺很看好你，可不要叫俺失望。

original: Indeed, you didn't disappoint me, Blue Wind Camp has gained another skilled hand!
context: 果然没让俺失望，青风寨又多了一名好手！

original:
The test of our Blue Wind Camp is not that easy to pass.
I must tell you that without passing the test, you cannot stay neutral in the stronghold.
context:
俺们青风寨的考验可不是那么容易通过的。
俺可告诉你，通不过考验是无法在山寨中立足的。

original: All newcomers to the stronghold must go through a test before they are qualified to work for the stronghold. You look too weak now, why bother to ask for trouble? Let's get your level up to <color=#c44b0e>15</color> first.
context: 所有新进山寨的兄弟都要经过一番考验，以后才有资格为山寨做事。你现在看起来实力太弱，何必自讨苦吃，先把等级升到<color=#c44b0e>15级</color>再说吧。

original: That <color=#c44b0e>Ding Yuanwai</color> in Chuxiang City is detestable, even daring to embezzle the relief funds for the refugees, he's a beast without conscience!
context: 楚襄城里那<color=#c44b0e>丁员外</color>真是可恶，朝廷救济流民的钱他也敢吞，简直是丧了良心的畜生！

original: {PlayerName}, you have passed the stronghold's test, and now there is a very important task for you to do.
context: {PlayerName}，你已通过了山寨的考验，现在有一件十分要紧的差事要你去做。

original: The first task of joining the stronghold is a heavy responsibility, I will not let the leader down.
context: 加入山寨的第一个任务就被委以重任，我一定不会让大当家失望的。

original: Please leader, tell me more about this task.
context: 请大当家详细介绍下这差事的内容。

original: I'll take on this task.
context: 这差事我接下了。

original: I have some matters to attend to, we'll talk later.
context: 我还有些事要处理，之后再说。

original: That Ding Yuanwai is a stingy man, but he has a precious daughter. For his daughter, he would be willing to part with any amount of money.
context: 那丁员外是只铁公鸡，一毛不拔！但他也有个掌上明珠——丁小姐。为了他女儿，再多的钱他也舍得出。

original:
First, go to Chuxiang City and kidnap his daughter, then I will ask for a ransom from Master Ding.
The ransom is naturally the amount of relief money he has swallowed, and he will have to spit it out.
context:
你先去楚襄城把他女儿绑来，俺再向丁员外索要赎金。
这赎金自然是他吞进去多少救济钱，便让他吐出来多少。

original: Once the ransom is in hand, you will distribute it to the refugees.
context: 等赎金到手，你便去交到流民手里。

original: After the task is completed, I will teach you my secret technique, <color=#c44b0e>Marvelous Blade</color>.
context: 事成之后，俺便把俺的绝招<color=#c44b0e>一刀绝尘</color>传授给你。

original: Good! Whether the refugees outside the city can see better days depends on you.
context: 好！这城外的流民今后苦日子能否有所改善，可就看你了。

original: Why are you blocking me?
context: 你拦着我干什么？

original: What are you doing in my boudoir!
context: 你在我闺房里做什么！

original: (How should I kidnap Miss Ding?)
context: （该用什么方式把丁小姐劫走呢？）

original: Speak the truth and ask Miss Ding to cooperate. <color=#097a76>(Benevolence reaches 79)</color>
context: 实话实说，请丁小姐配合。<color=#097a76>（仁德达到79）</color>

original: Speak the truth and ask Miss Ding to cooperate. <color=#097a76>(Relations reaches 59)</color>
context: 实话实说，请丁小姐配合。<color=#097a76>（关系达到59）</color>

original: Knock her out. <color=#0574a8>(Will cause Chuxiang City Relations to deteriorate)</color>
context: 出手击晕她。<color=#0574a8>（会导致楚襄城关系恶化）</color>

original: You don't seem like a bad person, I believe what you said, I'll go with you to the stronghold and help you get the ransom from my father.
context: 看你不像坏人，我相信你说的事情，我跟你去山寨，帮你向爹爹要到赎金。

original: We've known each other for a while, I trust your character and what you said. I'll go with you to the stronghold and help you get the ransom from my father.
context: 我们不是第一天认识了，我相信你的为人，也相信你说的事情。我跟你去山寨，帮你向爹爹要到赎金。

original: I'm sorry.
context: 对不住了。

original: After knocking Miss Ding unconscious, you carry her on your shoulder.
context: 你把丁小姐击晕后，扛在肩头。

original: You are too conspicuous at this moment, if seen by others, it will definitely cause a lot of trouble.
context: 此时的你过于显眼，如果被人看到一定会招惹不少麻烦。

original:
Stop right there!
Kidnapping my daughter in broad daylight, do you have no respect for the law!
context:
你给我站住！
光天化日强抢我女儿，你眼里还有王法吗！

original:
For your daughter's safety, it's best you stay away from me and keep quiet!
As long as you behave, I guarantee your daughter will be fine.
context:
为了你女儿的安全，你最好离我远点，也安静点！
只要你老老实实听话，我保证你女儿不会有问题。

original: Alright, don't do anything rash, I'll follow your arrangements, just don't hurt her...
context: 好好，你别乱来，我听你的安排，只求你别伤害她……

original: Where are you taking Miss Ding?!
context: 你、你要带小姐去哪？！

original: Don't meddle in things you shouldn't, or your life won't last long!
context: 不该管的事情不要管，否则命长不了！

original: Wow, that's scary!
context: 哇，好可怕！

original: You thief, what are you doing to Miss Ding!
context: 小贼，你对小姐做什么！

original: Now that I'm at your stronghold, where do you plan to put me?
context: 我现在已经到你们山寨了，你打算把我安置在哪呢？

original: Choose Storehouse.
context: 选择仓库。

original: Choose Prison.
context: 选择牢房。

original: Choose the room of the gang members.
context: 选择帮众房间。

original: {yell}{PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to be this kind of person! Truly, you can't judge a book by its cover!
context: {yell}{PlayerName}，想不到你是这样的人！果然是知人知面不知心！

original: You'll regret doing this!
context: 你这样做会后悔的！

original: The environment here is simple, I'm afraid it's a bit rough for Miss Ding.
context: 这里环境简陋，委屈丁小姐了。

original:
If the situation of the refugees outside the city is as you say, this place is probably much better.
What does it matter if I suffer a little...
context:
真如你所说城外流民的境况，这里恐怕是要好的多了。
我受这点委屈又算得了什么……

original: You let me stay here, and the door isn't even locked. Aren't you afraid I'll run away?
context: 你让我呆在这里，屋门又没上锁，难道不怕我跑了？

original: I think Miss Ding is a smart person, it's much safer here than outside.
context: 我觉得丁小姐应该是聪明人，这里要比外面安全得多。

original: Hmph, my father will definitely send someone to rescue me.
context: 哼，我爹爹一定会派人来救我的。

original: {yell}{PlayerName}!!! What are you up to, how could you treat me like this!
context: {yell}{PlayerName}！！！你到底安得什么心，你怎么能这样对我！

original:
What's wrong with this place?
Would you be satisfied if I let you live in a leaky Storehouse?
context:
这里怎么了？
难道要让你住进四面漏风的仓库里你才满意？

original: This, this is a place where men live!
context: 这里，这里都是男人住的地方！

original:
Miss, don't be so picky.
No one is going to harm you, we still need your father's help to aid the refugees.
context:
大小姐，你就别那么挑剔了。
没人把你怎么样的，我们还要指望你老爹救济流民呢。

original: I must be blind to believe your lies!
context: 算我瞎了眼，相信你的鬼话！

original:
{yell} Let me out!
I don't want to stay here!
context:
{yell}你放我出去！
我不要呆在这里！

original:
What's wrong with this place?
Would you be satisfied if I locked you in a Prison?
context:
这里怎么了？
难道把你关到牢笼里你才满意？

original:
I'd rather you lock me in a Prison!
This is a place where men live, how could you...
context:
我宁愿让你关进牢笼里！
这里都是男人住的地方，你怎么能……

original:
Miss, don't be so particular.
No one is interested in you, as soon as the ransom arrives, even if you want to stay a few more days, you'll be driven away.
context:
大小姐，你就别那么讲究了。
没人对你感兴趣的，只要赎金一到手你就算想多住几日也会被赶走的。

original: {yell} Shameless! Despicable!
context: {yell}无耻！卑鄙！

original: It's you! What are you doing here?
context: 是你！你来做什么？

original:
Miss Ding is our guest now, she asked me to tell you:
She is fine and safe, you don't need to worry about her.
context:
丁小姐现在我们那里做客，她托我转告您一句话：
她现在很好，很安全，不需要您担心她。

original: You, you are simply lawless!
context: 你们，你们简直无法无天！

original: You eat Wild herb seafood, wear silk and satin, have you ever thought about the suffering of the displaced people?
context: 你吃的山珍海味，穿的绫罗绸缎，有没有想过那些流离失所的苦难人？

original:
I earn a lot, I can afford to spend, what does it have to do with others?
Why should I care if others are suffering or not?
context:
我赚得多，花得起，干别人什么事？
我又为什么想别人苦不苦，难不难？

original:
Hmph, earn a lot?
The money for the relief of the refugees, indeed, just this one sum is quite a lot!
context:
哼，赚得多？
抚恤流民的钱款么，确实光这一笔就赚得挺多的！

original: What are you talking about, I don't understand?
context: 你说什么，我怎么听不明白？

original:
Don't pretend to be confused.
The amount of money you swallowed is the amount you have to spit out, that's your daughter's ransom!
context:
别想装糊涂。
你吞进多少钱就要吐出多少钱，这就是你女儿的赎金！

original:
That money was not much to begin with, it was skimmed off along the way, I only got a small portion.
What use is it for you to scrape off this little money?
context:
那些钱本就不多，一路上被层层盘剥，我拿的只是小份。
就这点小钱你们刮走又有什么用？

original:
I advise you not to test my patience any longer.
I warn you, I can get the money from you in other ways!
context:
奉劝你别再挑战我的耐心了。
警告你，用别的方式我一样可以得到你身上的钱！

original: Fine, I'll give you the ransom, but you can't harm my daughter!
context: 好，我把赎金给你，你可不能为难我女儿！

original: Are you the boss of this Refugee Camp?
context: 你是这流民营里的老大吗？

original: Yes, what's the matter?
context: 是啊，有什么事吗？

original: I am {PlayerName} from the Blue Wind Camp, on the orders of the leader, to provide relief for you...
context: 我是青风寨的{PlayerName}，奉大当家之命，为各位提供救济……

original: (I don't have enough money on me, this is a bit embarrassing.)
context: （身上的钱竟然不够了，真是有点尴尬。）

original: Oh, what a coincidence. I left my Money bag at home in a hurry, I'll be right back.
context: 哎呀，真不凑巧。出门匆忙，钱袋落在家里了，我去去就回。

original: Although this money is insignificant, it should be enough to buy some food for emergencies.
context: 这些钱虽然微不足道，但是买些粮食应急应该还是足够的。

original: You are really a timely rain, this is enough for us to get through the difficulties.
context: 你们真是及时雨，这些足够我们这些人挨过难关了。

original: Leader, your subordinate has successfully completed the task.
context: 大当家，属下幸不辱命，事情已经办妥了。

original: Hmm, very good, you really lived up to my expectations!
context: 嗯，很不错，果然没有辜负俺对你的期待！

original: As a reward, I will teach you the <color=#c44b0e>Marvelous Blade</color> technique!
context: 作为奖励，我便把<color=#c44b0e>一刀绝尘</color>这门绝技传授给你！

original: Thank you, leader!
context: 多谢大当家！

original: Miss Ding is still in the camp, what do you plan to do?
context: 丁小姐还在寨里，你打算怎么办？

original: Everything is settled, let's take her home.
context: 事情都搞定了，送她回家吧。

original: Let's keep her in the stronghold to serve as a maid for the leader.
context: 把她留在山寨给大当家当婢女吧。

original: Alright, I'll arrange for the brothers to escort her home!
context: 好，俺就安排兄弟们护送她回家！

original:
Well, I do need a maid, let's keep her in the Main chamber to work.
She will inevitably get involved with her unscrupulous father.
context:
嗯，俺也确实缺个婢女，那就留她在议事厅做事吧。
跟着她那个缺德的老爹早晚受到牵连。

original: {PlayerSurName} Young hero, what brings you here today?
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，今天怎么有空来我这里了？

original: I am here on the leader's orders to provide relief...
context: 我奉大当家之命，为各位提供救济……

original: Rich but not benevolent
context: 为富不仁

original: Mission
context: 任务

original: Go to Chuxiang City to kidnap Miss Ding.
context: 前往楚襄城劫持丁小姐。

original: First, return to the stronghold and settle Miss Ding.
context: 先回到山寨把丁小姐安顿好。

original: Demand a ransom from Ding, the official of Chuxiang City.
context: 向楚襄城的丁员外索要赎金。

original: Give 5 guan to the leader of the Refugee Camp.
context: 把5贯钱交给流民营的流民老大。

original: Return to the stronghold and report the result to Kong Yidao.
context: 回山寨向孔一刀告知结果。

original: Sworn Brothers
context: 结拜

original: Listen up, you thieves of Blue Wind Camp!
context: 青风寨一干贼人听着！

original: You harm the people and are full of evil! Today, I am here on the orders of the pacification commissioner to flatten your stronghold!
context: 你们为害百姓，恶贯满盈！今天本将奉安抚使之命，踏平你们这山寨！

original: Go back and tell your master that if he wants to exchange the lives of my brothers in Blue Wind Camp for his own bright future, I absolutely refuse!
context: 回去告诉你家主子，想拿俺青风寨兄弟们的性命去换他自己的锦绣前程，老子一百一千一万个不答应！

original: Leader, rest assured, we swear to live and die with Blue Wind Camp!
context: 大当家放心，我们誓死与青风寨共存亡！

original: Good brother, I've had enough in this life!
context: 好兄弟，老子这辈子够本了！

original: {yell}<size=170%>Cut the grass and root out, leave none!</size>
context: {yell}<size=170%>斩草除根一个不留！</size>

original:
Brother Kong...
I'm useless, I didn't protect you well.
context:
孔大哥……
我真没用，没有护好你的周全。

original: Brother Kong was the pillar of Blue Wind Camp, but now he is unfortunately dead, and the brothers of the stronghold have suffered heavy casualties. The current Blue Wind Camp can be said to be in name only.
context: 孔大哥是青风寨的顶天梁，如今不幸身死，山寨兄弟死伤惨重，如今的青风寨以及算是名存实亡了。

original: I can only seek another way and find a new place to settle down.
context: 我只能另谋出路，重新再找栖身之所了。

original: Cough... cough...
{PlayerSurName} Brother, I was planning to have a drink with you after this fight...
context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，俺本打算打完这场架，能够与你把酒言欢……

original: Big brother, you can go in peace, I will take care of myself.
context: 大哥，你安心的去吧，我会保重好自己的。

original:
You're talking nonsense, I haven't had enough of life yet!
Can you let me finish my words?
context:
你放屁，俺还没活够呢！
让俺把话说完行不行。

original: You're coughing like you're going to cough up your lungs, are you sure you're okay?
context: 看你咳得像是要把肺都咳出来了，真得没事吗？

original: Cough... cough... Let me rest for a while, I'll be as strong as a dragon and tiger.
context: 咳……咳……让俺休息片刻，照样生龙活虎。

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻后……

original:
Finally recovered.
That was close, I almost lost my life, thanks to {PlayerSurName} brother's efforts.
context:
终于缓过来了。
好悬把命丢了，多亏{PlayerSurName}兄弟力挽狂澜了。

original: You seemed to have something else to say just now...
context: 刚才你好像还有什么话没有说完……

original: Brother, you are a capable person, this small Blue Wind Camp probably can't keep you.
context: 兄弟你是有大本事的人，这小小的青风寨恐怕留不住你。

original:
If one day you insist on leaving, I will not force you to stay.
I just hope you can remember some of the kindness.
context:
有朝一日你执意离去，俺绝不强留。
只希望你能顾念几分香火之情。

original: If you need me in the future, I will lend you a hand!
context: 今后若有用着俺的地方，俺会助你一臂之力！

original: With the promise of the big brother, I will feel more secure in doing things in the future.
context: 有大哥这句承诺，兄弟以后办起事来就踏实多了。

original:
Whether to go up the mountain or down the mountain, it's just a thought.
There must be an end to affection.
You have also yearned for such a life in your heart.
In your fleeting thoughts, it disappears in a flash.
You don't know what the future holds for you,
nor do you know whether what you are doing is right or wrong.
But at least at this moment,
you have no regrets,
you have made a choice,
whether to go up the mountain or down the mountain,
who cares about that much.
After today, a force that vowed to act for heaven no longer exists...
context:
上山或者下山，不过一念之间。
情义终要有个归宿。
你心中也向往过这样的生活。
在你杂念之中，转瞬即逝。
你不知道你面对的未来会怎样，
也不知道自己做的是对是错。
但至少此时此刻，
你没有后悔，
做出了选择，
至于上山或是下山，
哪管得了那么多呢。
今日之后，一支扬言替天行道的势力不复存在……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Blue Wind Camp, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>青风寨，覆灭！</color></size>

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, with your skills and means, it's really a waste to be in this Blue Wind Camp. If you don't mind, I, old Kong, want to become inseparable brothers with you. What do you think?
context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，以你的能力和手段在这青风寨里实在委屈你了。若不嫌弃，俺老孔想要与你八拜相交，结为生死兄弟，你意下如何?

哈哈，不要紧，是俺老孔太唐突了。
俺说过的话随时有效，你啥时候想认俺老孔当大哥了，随时找俺便可。

context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，结拜的事情考虑如何了？

context: 哈哈哈，择日不如撞日，咱们今天就在这聚义厅众位兄弟见证下，结拜生死兄弟如何？

original: {PlayerName}。

context: 又是姓吕的那家伙搞事情，竟然搅俺跟{PlayerSurName}兄弟的好事，简直活不耐烦了！

Want to join my Tiger Escort, daydreaming!
No matter how much Fame you have, how capable you are, our escort agency can't accommodate you!
context:
想加入我虎威镖局,痴人说梦！

My Tiger Escort is also a force to be reckoned with in the martial arts world.

The world is in chaos, and every order of the escort agency is a risk of nine deaths.

Dare to compete with my escort?

敢不敢跟我的镖师比试一番？

Dare to compete with my escort?
If you can win, joining the escort agency is naturally no problem.

敢不敢跟我的镖师比试一番？
若能胜出，加入镖局自然不成问题。

Okay, really courageous!

You are really hiding your power!

The brave man next to me is named {PlayerName}.

context: 心意已决！

original: Think about it again...
context: 再考虑下……

original: We, the Tiger Escort, have always won people over with our martial arts!
context: 我虎威镖局从来都是以武服人！

original: Let's settle this matter through martial arts.
context: 此事便以武解决。

original: Enough talk, see you at the martial arts field!
context: 废话少说，我们比武场见！

original: If you are not as skilled, you may leave!
context: 技不如人！你走便是！

original: In that case, {PlayerName}you should reconsider!
context: 既然如此，{PlayerName}你便再考虑下吧！

original: Hmph!
context: 哼！

original: Don't make such jokes in the future.
context: 以后可不要再开这种玩笑了。

original: This is a test event, irrelevant personnel can choose to cancel the test event!
context: 该事件为测试事件，无关人员选择取消测试事件即可！

original: Continue testing
context: 继续测试

original: Cancel testing
context: 取消测试

original: Bro, how much is this melon per pound?
context: 哥们儿，这瓜多少钱一斤呐？

original: 20 wen per pound.
context: 20文一斤。

original: Is the melon skin made of gold, or are the melon seeds made of gold?
context: 这瓜皮子是金子做的，还是瓜粒子是金子做的？

original: Where can you find melons now? These are melons transported from the vicinity of Chuxiang City, if you think it's expensive, I think it's expensive too.
context: 你瞧瞧这现在哪有瓜呀？这都是楚襄城附近的运过来的瓜，你嫌贵我还嫌贵呢。

original: Pick one for me.
context: 给我挑一个。

original: Alright, how about this one?
context: 行，这个怎么样？

original: Is this melon ripe?
context: 这瓜保熟吗？

original: I'm a fruit vendor, would I sell you unripe melons?
context: 我开水果摊儿的，能卖给你生瓜蛋子啊？

original: Is this melon ripe?
context: 这瓜保熟吗？

original: Are you deliberately picking a fight? Do you want it or not?
context: 你是故意找岔儿，是不是？你要不要吧！

original: What if it's not ripe?
context: 那它要是不熟怎么办？

original: Ah, if it's not ripe, I'll eat it myself, are you satisfied now?
context: 哎，要是不熟，我自己吃了它，满意了吧？

original: 15 pounds, 300 wen.
This is not even 15 pounds!
context: 你这哪够15斤哪？

original: Are you deliberately picking a fight?
context: 你故意找茬儿是不是？

original: Do you want it or not? Do you want it or not?
context: 你要不要吧？你要不要？

original: (What should I do?)
context: （我该怎么办？）

original: Swallow your anger and pay the money.<color=#097a76>(300 wen)</color>
context: 忍气吞声付钱。<color=#097a76>（300文）</color>

original: Punish him with force!
context: 用武力惩罚他！

original: You're chopping my melon, huh?
context: 你劈我瓜是吧？

original: Murder! Murder!
context: 杀人了！杀人了！

original: Hmm! Good that you know your place!
context: 嗯！算你识相！

original: Master Feng who was ambushed
context: 被偷袭的冯大师

original: Find the two ruffians at the end of the road and avenge Master Feng.
context: 去路的尽头找到两泼皮为冯大师报仇。

original: Go back and find Master Feng.
context: 回去找冯大师。

original: Old man, what happened to you?
context: 老人家，你这是怎么了？

original: Ah! Don't mention it, I, a master of a generation, was just ambushed by two young men.
context: 哎呀！别提了，我一代大师刚刚被两个年轻人偷袭了。

original: One weighs over ninety kilograms, the other over eighty kilograms.
context: 一个体重，九十多公斤，一个体重八十多公斤。

original: Hey, I told the kid, you can't break my finger with both hands.
context: 诶，我说小朋友，你两个手来折我一个手指头，他折不动。

original: He insisted on trying, I said okay. As soon as I finished speaking, he stood up with a pop, very fast.
context: 他非要和我试试，我说可以。我一说完他啪就站起来了，很快啊。

original: These two young men have no martial ethics, they cheat! They ambush!
context: 这两个年轻人不讲武德，来骗！来偷袭！

original: Then they came up with a left straight kick, a right whip leg and a left jab, I blocked all of them!
context: 然后上来就是一个左正蹬，吭，一个右鞭腿一个左刺拳，我全部防出去了啊！

original: I advise! This young man should reflect on himself, and not make such clever moves in the future. The martial arts world should value harmony and martial ethics, and not engage in internal strife.
context: 我劝！这位年轻人好自为之，好好反思，以后不要再犯这样的聪明，武林要以和为贵，要讲武德，不要搞窝里斗。

original: (This person seems off, what should I do?)
context: （这人看着不对劲，我该怎么办？）

original: Just watch the excitement and leave.
context: 看完热闹就走。

original: Help Master Feng get justice!
context: 帮助冯大师讨回公道！

original: These young people nowadays, they just leave after listening, there's really no basic trust between people anymore.
context: 现在这些年轻人，听完就走了，真的是人和人的基本信任都没有了。

original: Where are they? I'll help you get justice!
context: 他们人在哪里？我帮你讨回公道去！

original: After they beat me, they ran away, they ran in the direction I was facing, I don't know exactly where they went.
context: 打完我就跑了，顺着我面朝的方向跑了，具体去了哪里也不知道。

original: Forgot the location?
context: 忘记位置了吗？

original: They ran in the direction I was facing, I don't know exactly where they went.
context: 顺着我面朝的方向跑了，具体去了哪里也不知道。

original: These two don't look like good news.
context: 这俩人看着就不是什么好货。

original: Go ask them!
context: 去问问他们去！

original: You two seem quite impressive, did you just teach a lesson to the self-righteous Master Feng?
context: 两位看上去便气度不凡，刚才是否出手教训了一位自以为是的冯大师？

original: Huh? You mean that old ghost? Humph!
context: 嗯？你说那个老鬼？哼！

original: He's always bragging about how powerful his Five Thunderbolts are, I've been sick of him for a long time, that's all!
context: 天天吹捧自己闪电五连击多么多么厉害，早就看不惯他了，不过如此！

original: Even so, you can't just beat up an old man, let me teach you a lesson!
context: 虽说如此，但也不能动手殴打老人家啊，就让我来让你们长长眼！

original: There's always someone better, you two ruffians should stop bullying the weak and disabled!
context: 所谓人外有人，天外有天，你们两个泼皮以后不要欺辱老弱病残了！

original: What are you still thinking about? Disappear now!
context: 还在想什么？还不快点消失？

original: Dare to meddle in other people's business without any ability?
context: 没什么本事也敢学人家多管闲事？

original: Do I have to send you to the medical hall? Get lost now!
context: 难道还让我送你去医馆？还不快滚？

original: Good lad!
context: 好小子！

original: I didn't expect you to be so powerful at such a young age!
context: 没想到你年纪轻轻竟如此厉害！

original: I don't have much to offer as an old man, but I'll pass on my famous skill, Five Thunderbolts, to you!
context: 我老人家也没什么好的东西，这成名绝技闪电五连击就交给你吧！

original: Receive... Transform...
<size=250%>Release</size>
context: <size=250%>发</size>

original: I'll be going first then, old man! So I won't get beaten up again!
context: 那我老人家就先走了！免得再被打！

original: It seems you're no match for those two ruffians either.
context: 看来你也不敌那俩泼皮。

original: Let's just let this matter go.
context: 这事情就这样算了吧。

original: I still have 200 Wen, consider it compensation for your injury!
context: 我还有200文钱，算是对你受伤的补偿了！

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original: What do you mean by this? Do you think my Blue Wind Camp is made of paper?
context: 你这是什么意思？当俺这青风寨是纸糊的不成？

original: Exterminate Blue Wind Camp.<color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 清剿青风寨。<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original:
You can't joke about such things!
If you keep talking nonsense, be careful I'll cut you down to sacrifice to my flag!
context:
这种事岂能随便开玩笑！
再要胡说八道，当心俺砍了你祭旗！

original: Are you challenging my patience?
context: 你是在挑战俺对你的容忍底线吗？

original:
It seems you've got the guts.
Today I'll let you see the power of Blue Wind Camp!
context:
看来你是吃了熊心豹子胆。
今天老子就让你见识见识青风寨的实力！

original: As expected, a bunch of weaklings!
context: 果然是不堪一击的一群废物！

original: Too strong! The best plan is to run!
context: 太强了！三十六计走为上策!

original: Join
context: 入伙

original: I am {PlayerName}, I came here in admiration, hoping to join Nest of Swallow.
context: 在下{PlayerName}，慕名而来，希望可以加入燕子窝。

original:
Cut it out, how much can you understand about Nest of Swallow at your young age.
If you really want to join, it's better to understand clearly, so you won't regret it later.
context:
切，小小年纪又能对我燕子窝了解多少。
你若真想加入，还是了解清楚的好，免得将来后悔。

original: What I said just now was just a formality, please don't mind.
context: 刚才那不过是场面话，请您不要介意。

original: Although Nest of Swallow can't be considered a famous sect, it has its own unique way of survival over the past hundred years.
context: 我们燕子窝虽算不上名门大派，但是百十年来自有独特的生存之道。

original: Nest of Swallow has always adhered to the belief of <color=#c44b0e>robbing the rich to help the poor</color>.
context: 燕子窝一直奉行的是<color=#c44b0e>损有余补不足</color>的信念，也就是常说的劫富济贫。

original: Tell me, what do you want to know?
context: 说说看吧，你都想了解些什么？

original: <color=#0574a8>Join Nest of Swallow</color>.<color=#097a76>(Benevolence less than -39, Propriety less than -39)</color>
context: <color=#0574a8>加入燕子窝</color>。<color=#097a76>（仁德低于-39、礼节低于-39）</color>

original: Inquire about the origin of Nest of Swallow.
context: 询问燕子窝的来历。

original: Ask what can be learned from Nest of Swallow.
context: 询问燕子窝能学到什么。

original: Don't want to join for now.
context: 暂时不想加入。

original: The founder of Nest of Swallow is the legendary Li Yanzi, who is known for his excellent Qinggong. Because his lightness skill is as agile as a swallow, he was given this nickname.
context: 燕子窝祖师是传说中轻功绝顶的燕子李，因为其身法轻灵如同飞燕，所以大家送了这个外号。

original: All the disciples under the founder are excellent in Qinggong. At first, outsiders jokingly said "this group of people gathering together is like swallows returning to their nest"...
context: 祖师门下弟子无一不是轻功卓越之辈，最初由外人戏称“这群人聚在一处如同燕子回窝一般”……

original: So the founder simply named this place Nest of Swallow.
context: 于是祖师索性就把此处命名为燕子窝。

original: Everyone thought that Nest of Swallow is still known for its Qinggong, but our real skill is the <color=#c44b0e>Art of Stealing</color> passed down from our ancestors.
context: 大家本以为燕子窝至今仍是以轻功擅长，实则我们真正的本事是从祖师手上传承下来的<color=#c44b0e>暗取之术</color>。

original: The so-called Stealing is naturally different from the upright and straightforward taking, it is about completing Pickpocketing unnoticed.
context: 所谓暗取，自然有别于光明正大的随意取拿，而是要在别人不经意之间完成探囊取物。

original: Our robbing the rich to help the poor is not just about brute force, it's about skill and technique. As long as the technique is sophisticated, even mountains of gold and silver can be effectively brought home.
context: 我们劫富济贫可不是一味蛮干，是很讲究技巧和手段的，只要手段高明，就是金山银山也能搬运回家。

original: I suppose you're still unaware of my identity, I am the boss of Nest of Swallow, Bu Juechen!
context: 想必你还不清楚我的身份，我是这燕子窝的老大步绝尘！

original:
{PlayerName}, from this moment on, you are a disciple of Nest of Swallow!
I hope that one day you will carry forward the skills of Nest of Swallow.
context:
{PlayerName}，从此刻起，你便是燕子窝的弟子了！
希望你有朝一日把燕子窝的本事发扬光大。

original: Subordinates obey!
context: 属下遵命！

original: Come find me when you've thought it through.
context: 等你考虑清楚了再来找我吧。

original: Don't ever hope to return to Nest of Swallow in your life.
context: 你这种人这辈子都不要再指望重回燕子窝了。

original: Is there anything else you want to know?
context: 你还有什么想了解的？

original: I see!
context: 原来如此！

original: {PlayerName} has been brought here, whether he stays or leaves is entirely up to the boss.
context: {PlayerName}已经带到，至于他是去是留，全凭老大定夺。

original: Good!
context: 好！

original: I am {PlayerName}, may I know who you are?
context: 在下{PlayerName}，不知道阁下是哪位？

original: I am the boss of Nest of Swallow, Bu Juechen!
context: 我是这燕子窝的老大步绝尘！

original: You have been kind to my disciples, since you want to join Nest of Swallow, I will exceptionally accept you.
context: 你对我门下弟子有恩，既然想加入燕子窝，我便破格收下你。

original:
{PlayerName}, from this moment on, you are a disciple of Nest of Swallow!
I hope that one day you will carry forward the skills of Nest of Swallow!
context:
{PlayerName}，从此刻起，你便是燕子窝的弟子了！
希望你有朝一日把燕子窝的本事发扬光大！

original: Subordinates obey!
context: 属下遵命！

original: Learn Nest of Swallow Skill
context: 学习燕子窝能力

original: Skill
context: 能力

original: {PlayerName}, don't be too greedy when you first join us, do more for our sect first, and you will naturally benefit in the future.
context: {PlayerName}，你初入本门不要太贪心，先多为本门做些事情，以后自然有你的好处。

original: You can accept daily tasks from our sect here. Completing tasks can improve our sect's Relations. When our sect's Relations reach <color=#c44b0e>10</color>, I will teach you the skill of <color=#c44b0e>Steal</color>.
context: 在我这里可以接到本门每日任务，完成任务可提升本门的关系，当本门关系达到<color=#c44b0e>10</color>，我将传授你<color=#c44b0e>暗取</color>的本事。

original:
Today, I will pass on the skill of <color=#c44b0e>Stealing</color> of our sect to you.
This <color=#c44b0e>Claw blade</color> is the token of our sect's disciples, equipping it can greatly reduce the difficulty of Stealing.
context:
今日我将本门<color=#c44b0e>暗取</color>的本事传授给你。
这柄<color=#c44b0e>爪甲挟刀</color>是本门弟子的信物，装备后可大幅降低暗取难度。

original: You follow the method I taught you, and take the <color=#c44b0e>Tri-dagger</color> from this Machinery man in front of you.
context: 你按照我教你的法子，从面前这机关人身上把<color=#c44b0e>三棱锥</color>取出来。

original: First, keep a distance from the target, then enter the <color=#c44b0e>Stealth</color> state...
context: 先距离目标远一些，然后进入<color=#c44b0e>潜行</color>状态……

original: Then go behind the target and choose <color=#c44b0e>Steal</color>...
context: 再走到目标身后选择<color=#c44b0e>暗取</color>……

original: Take action at the right moment, and it will be as easy as pie.
context: 看准时机即刻出手，这样便能手到擒来了。

original: Good, you are a promising seedling, much more skilled than I expected.
context: 不错，真是个好苗子，比我预估要熟练得多。

original: {PlayerName}, I solemnly remind you, this skill can only be used for the righteous cause of robbing the rich to help the poor, don't fill your own pockets, otherwise if you offend everyone, I can't protect you!
context: {PlayerName}，我郑重提醒你，这个本事只能用在劫富济贫的正途上，切莫中饱私囊，否则犯了众怒我可保不了你！

original: Yes, I will definitely remember the boss's teachings!
context: 是，属下定当不忘老大教诲！

original: Obtain the Tri-dagger from the Machinery man using the <color=#c44b0e>Stealing</color> method.
context: 用<color=#c44b0e>暗取</color>的方式从机关人身上取得三棱锥。

original: Talk to <color=#c44b0e>Bu Juechen</color>.
context: 与<color=#c44b0e>步绝尘</color>交谈。

original: I've completed the task, it's time for me to leave, right?
context: 完成了目标，该让我出去了吧。

original: This time, our Nest of Swallow really picked up a treasure. I didn't expect you to be so proficient in the way of stealing. The future growth of Nest of Swallow depends on you!
context: 这次我燕子窝真是捡到宝了，想不到你如此精擅暗取之道，今后燕子窝的壮大可就靠你了！

original: Already decided! <color=#097a76>(50000 Wen)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#097a76>（50000文）</color>

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original: Leaving <color=#c44b0e>Nest of Swallow</color> is not a difficult task, but I advise you to think it over before you come to me.
context: <color=#c44b0e>退出燕子窝</color>并不是什么难事，不过我劝你还是考虑清楚再来找我。

original: As long as you can hand over <color=#c44b0e>50 Guan money</color>, I will allow you to run away from Nest of Swallow.
context: 只要你能交出<color=#c44b0e>50贯钱</color>，我便准许你离开燕子窝。

original: It seems that you have learned a lot from Nest of Swallow, this 50 Guan money is nothing to you.
context: 看来你已从燕子窝学到了不少本事，这50贯钱对你来说已经不算什么了。

original: Since you insist on this, let's follow the rules.
context: 既然你执意如此，那便按照规矩来办吧。

original: I keep my word, from now on you are no longer a member of Nest of Swallow. Whether you are rich or poor in the future has nothing to do with Nest of Swallow.
context:
我也说话算数，从今往后你便不再是燕子窝的人。
无论以后你是贵是贱都与燕子窝再无关系。

original: You understand the rules, but you have done a great favor to Nest of Swallow. If you really want to leave, the previous 50 Guan money can be waived!
context: 规矩你是懂得，不过你帮了燕子窝很大的忙,如果真的要退出，以往的50贯钱可免！

original: Already decided!
context: 心意已决！

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original: See you in the martial arts world!
context: 我们江湖再见！

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original: Do you really think you can capture all of us in Nest of Swallow with these few people?
context: 你凭这点人手就妄想把我们燕子窝一网打尽吗？

original: Clear out Nest of Swallow! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 清剿燕子窝！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: Of course I know you are talking nonsense, otherwise you would be dead by now.
context: 我当然知道你在信口胡说，否则你的小命已经没了。

original: But here's a piece of advice for you: don't do it again!
context: 不过给你个忠告：下不为例！

original: Sorry, I've taken it seriously. I'd like to see how many times you can provoke me based on our relations.
context:
不好意思，我已经当真了。
我倒想看看凭咱俩的关系，你还能激怒我几次。

original: Nest of Swallow has been troubled by people for more than a day or two. Today, let's see who is stronger, the righteous or the evil!
context: 燕子窝被人找麻烦也不是一日两日了，今天就让你们看看究竟是道高一尺还是魔高一丈！

original: {PlayerName}, since you are an enemy of Nest of Swallow, our past friendship ends today!
context: {PlayerName}，既然你与燕子窝为敌，往日情谊今天一刀两断！

original: I suppose this counts as robbing the rich to help the poor! Let's quickly find the ill-gotten wealth hidden by these guys, I'm almost broke.
context:
我这也应当算是劫富济贫了！
赶紧找找这些家伙藏匿的不义之财，我快要穷死了。

original: Too strong! The best plan is to run!
context: 太强了！三十六计走为上策!

original: Skill Test
context: 能力考验

original: Test
context: 考验

original: {PlayerName}, I will test the new disciples of Nest of Swallow in the near future to distinguish the good from the bad and find potential talents.
context: {PlayerName}，近日我将对你们这些新入燕子窝的弟子进行一番考验，用来甄别优劣，从中发现可造之才。

original: If you are ready, come to me.
context: 你若是准备好了，就过来找我吧。

original: Ask about the test.
context: 询问考验相关情况。

original: Participate in the test.
context: 参加考验。

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: I have ordered three disciples to disguise themselves and infiltrate Daliang City. Each of them carries a note, and I order you to bring the three notes to me.
context:
我已命三名弟子乔装混进大梁城。
三人身上各带一张字条，我命你把三张字条取来给我。

original: You must use the <color=#c44b0e>Steal technique</color> I taught you, otherwise you will absolutely not be able to get anything from them, unless...
context: 必须用上我教的<color=#c44b0e>暗取之术</color>，否则你是绝对无法从他们身上取得任何东西，除非……

original: They will wander between <color=#c44b0e>the inn, the restaurant, and the market</color>. It is indeed difficult to distinguish these people in the crowd, but I can tell you their appearances or behavioral characteristics, which may help you identify them quickly.
context: 他们会游走于<color=#c44b0e>客栈、酒楼、市集</color>之间，这几人混在人群当中确实难以分辨，不过我可以告知他们几人的样貌或行为特征，这样可有助于你快速甄别。

original: The first one is a scholar in white, he carries a note with the word <color=#c44b0e>"Yan"</color>.
context: 其一，是位白衣书生，他身上放有写着<color=#c44b0e>“燕”字的纸条</color>。

original: The second one is a wanderer with a bamboo hat, he carries a note with the word <color=#c44b0e>"Zi"</color>.
context: 其二，是位头戴斗笠的江湖人，他身上放有写着<color=#c44b0e>“子”字的纸条</color>。

original: Thirdly, there is a young man who always says "So boring..." and carries a note with the word <color=#c44b0e>"Nest"</color> on it.
context: 其三，是位口头禅总爱说“真无聊阿……”的年轻人，他身上放有写着<color=#c44b0e>“窝”字的纸条</color>。

original: These three are all skilled in martial arts. If they discover you, there will inevitably be a fight. Just don't hurt any innocent bystanders.
context: 这三人功夫都不弱，若被他们发现了，难免动些拳脚，只要别伤了无辜路人就行。

original: After you successfully complete the test, I will teach you our sect's exclusive talent <color=#c44b0e>Sleight of hand</color>.
context: 等你成功完成考验后，我会教你本门专属天赋<color=#c44b0e>妙手空空</color>。

original:
Good, don't let me down!
You can go to Daliang City now, I have already arranged everything.
context:
好，你可别让我失望！
你现在就前往大梁城吧，这些人我已经安排妥当了。

original: Mission accomplished, all three notes have been obtained.
context: 幸不辱命，三张字条都已取到。

original: Good! You didn't let me down!
context: 好！果然没叫我失望！

original:
I will now teach you the talent of our sect <color=#c44b0e>Sleight of hand</color>.
In the future, I can confidently assign you more difficult tasks.
context:
我这就把本门天赋<color=#c44b0e>妙手空空</color>传授给你。
今后我也可以放心委派给你更有难度的任务了。

original: Come find me when you're ready.
context: 等你准备好了再来找我吧。

original: Are you ready to take the test?
context: 你已经准备要参加考验了吗？

original: Find the <color=#c44b0e>scholar in white</color>, <color=#c44b0e>man in a bamboo hat</color>, and <color=#c44b0e>bored man</color> in Daliang City and steal three notes from them.
context: 到大梁城里找到<color=#c44b0e>白衣书生</color>、<color=#c44b0e>戴斗笠人</color>、<color=#c44b0e>无聊人</color>，从三人身上暗取到三张字条。

original: Talk to <color=#c44b0e>Bu Juechen</color>.
context: 与<color=#c44b0e>步绝尘</color>交谈。

original: You new disciples who have just joined the Nest of Swallow are still too weak and haven't shown any outstanding character. Come find me when you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 15</color>.
context: 你们这些新加入燕子窝的弟子实力还是太弱，还没发现有什么出众的角色，等你达到<color=#c44b0e>15级</color>时再来找我吧。

original: During this time, you can go to the <color=#c44b0e>practice disciples</color> of our sect to learn and improve your strength as soon as possible.
context: 这段时间你可以去找本门的<color=#c44b0e>练功弟子</color>切磋较量，尽快提升自己的实力。

original: Lunar stone
context: 夜明珠

original: Steal Treasure
context: 盗宝

original: {PlayerName}, how good are your stealing skills?
context: {PlayerName}，你暗取的本事练到什么程度了？

original: We, the disciples of the Nest of Swallow, all rely on our stealing skills to survive. You must practice whenever you have the chance, otherwise, you might slip up at a crucial moment and put yourself in danger.
context: 咱们燕子窝的弟子可是各个靠暗取的本事吃饭，平日里找机会得多加练习，否则关键时候漏出马脚，就让自己身处险地了。

original: I have a task for you now, but it requires high stealing skills. Come find me when you're ready.
context: 现在我这里就有一件任务要交待你去做，不过对暗取能力的要求比较高，你准备好了便来找我吧。

original: Inquire about the task.
context: 询问任务相关情况。

original: Accept the task.
context: 接受任务。

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: There is a priceless <color=#c44b0e>Lunar stone</color> hidden on Ding Yuanwai of Chuxiang City. Go and bring it to me.
context: 楚襄城的丁员外身上藏有一颗价值连城的<color=#c44b0e>夜明珠</color>，你去把它取来交给我。

original: After you successfully obtain it, I will teach you our sect's ultimate skill <color=#c44b0e>Quicklime Rain</color>.
context: 等你成功得手后，我会把本门的绝招<color=#c44b0e>石灰漫天</color>传授给你。

original: Since you have accepted this task, let me give you a piece of advice...
context: 既然你已接下这个任务，我便多嘱咐你一句……

original: Before you act, you must carefully study Ding Yuanwai's daily routine and find the right opportunity. In our line of work, you must never act hastily. Make sure to seize the right moment for a sure hit.
context: 下手之前你须得仔细研究丁员外每日的作息规律，寻找恰当时机才能下手，做咱们这行千万不要仓促行事，务必看准时机以求一击必中。

original: Get a <color=#c44b0e>Lunar stone</color> from Ding Yuanwai of Chuxiang City and give it to Bu Juechen.
context: 从楚襄城丁员外身上取到一颗<color=#c44b0e>夜明珠</color>，然后交给步绝尘。

original: Practice Steal Skill to level 2 with Kong Kong in Nest of Swallow.
context: 在燕子窝找空空儿锻炼暗取能力到2级。

original:
Haven't you got it yet?
Perhaps your stealing skills are not good enough. You might want to practice more before you act.
context:
还没有得手吗？
想必是你暗取的水平还不够，不妨练得熟练一些再行动。

original: How is it, have you got the Lunar stone?
context: 怎么样，夜明珠到手了吗？

original: I've got it. <color=#097a76>(Lunar stone x1)</color>
context: 已经到手了。<color=#097a76>（夜明珠1颗）</color>

original: I haven't got it yet.
context: 还没有到手。

original: You didn't let me down, it seems that the future prosperity of our sect will depend on you.
context: 果然没有辜负我的期望，看来本门将来的兴旺就要寄托在你的身上了。

original: I will now teach you our sect's ultimate skill <color=#c44b0e>Quicklime Rain</color>. Pay close attention...
context: 我这就把本门绝招<color=#c44b0e>石灰漫天</color>传授给你，你可要看好了……

original: Half a shichen later...
context: 半个时辰后……

original:
Haven't you got it yet?
Perhaps your stealing skills are not good enough. You might want to practice more before you act.
context:
还没有得手吗？
想必是你暗取的水平还不够，不妨练得熟练一些再行动。

original: Your stealing skills are not yet proficient. Go to the sleeping area inside and practice your stealing skills with <color=#c44b0e>Kong Kong</color>. Come find me when your Steal Skill is upgraded to level 2.
context: 你暗取的本事还不到家，去里面睡觉的地方找<color=#c44b0e>空空儿</color>锻炼下暗取的本事，把暗取能力升到2级再来找我。

original:
There is always a vague sense of unease in my heart. Is it my illusion? 
Should I continue to go inside, or run away now...
context:
心中总有一种隐隐不安的感觉，是我的错觉么？
是否还要继续往里走，或者现在尽快离开……

original: Continue forward (intense combat)
context: 继续前行（高强度战斗）

original: Temporarily run away from Nest of Swallow
context: 暂时离开燕子窝

original: {PlayerName}, I didn't expect to meet you here!
context: {PlayerName}，想不到咱们在这里见面了！

original: Since you've joined the Nest of Swallow, you're also responsible for its sins.
context: 既然你已加入了燕子窝，那么燕子窝的罪孽便有你一份。

original: Today, by the imperial decree: The Nest of Swallow has been causing trouble, so the Crime Investigation Bureau has been ordered to eliminate it to prevent future problems.
context: 今日奉朝廷旨意：燕子窝贼寇为患一方，特令神捕门前往清剿，以绝后患。

original: All of you from the Nest of Swallow present here, none of you are allowed to escape, all must be arrested and brought to justice!
context: 在场燕子窝一干人等，不许走脱一个，全部缉拿归案！

original: Bu Juechen, I've finally found your hideout! You "swallows" are about to be stewed in one pot.
context:
步绝尘，终于找到你们老巢了！
你们这群“燕子”马上要被一锅炖了。

original: Today, by the imperial decree: The Nest of Swallow has been causing trouble, so we have been ordered to eliminate it to prevent future problems.
context: 今日奉朝廷旨意：燕子窝贼寇为患一方，特令我等前往清剿，以绝后患。

original: All of you from the Nest of Swallow present here, none of you are allowed to escape, all must be arrested and brought to justice!
context: 在场燕子窝一干人等，不许走脱一个，全部缉拿归案！

original: Hahaha, the court? Which court?
context: 哈哈哈，朝廷？哪个朝廷？

original: The emperor has been kidnapped, several princes are fighting for power, what is the surname of your so-called "court"?
context: 皇帝都让人劫走了，几个藩王还各自为政内斗不止，你们所谓的“朝廷”到底是姓什么的？

original: You guys, being manipulated like chess pieces without knowing it, it's really sad.
context: 你们呀，成了任人摆布的棋子尚不自知，真是可悲呀。

original: How dare you! The affairs of the court are not something you can comment on!
context: 大胆！朝廷的事岂是你这等人可以妄言评判的！

original: Guards, arrest them all and take them back for trial!
context: 来人，把他们都抓起来，带回去审问定罪！

original: How dare you! The affairs of the court are not something you can comment on!
context: 大胆！朝廷的事岂是你这等人可以妄言评判的！

original: Guards, arrest them all and take them back for trial!
context: 来人，把他们都抓起来，带回去审问定罪！

original: Do you think we can only be thieves? Today, let you see the power of the Nest of Swallow.
context: 当我们只会做贼吗？今天叫你们见识下燕子窝的厉害。

original:
{PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to accompany me on this last journey of HP...
Well, it's not bad...
context:
{PlayerName}，想不到是你陪我走完这生命最后一段路……
算了，也不赖……

original: No boss of the Nest of Swallow has ever... ended well, I have no regrets..., the merits and demerits will be judged by future generations...
context: 燕子窝历代老大没有一个……落得善终，我不后悔……，功过自有后人……评说……

original: You're still young... there are many things you need to do..., after my death... you should fly away and no longer consider yourself a disciple of the Nest of Swallow...
context: 你还年轻……还有很多事情要去做……，待我死后……你就远走高飞，不要再以燕子窝弟子自居了……

original: Finally... I'll tell you a secret... there's something inside the stone wall behind my seat...
context: 最后……告诉你一个秘密……在我座位后的石壁内有一个……

original: I didn't expect to survive by luck, I thought I was really going to be arrested and put in jail.
context: 想不到竟然侥幸活下来了，还以为真要被抓去坐牢了。

original: Our line of work is bound to be hated, and the disciples under the door are mixed, and it is hard to guarantee that one or two scum will not ruin the Fame.
context: 咱们这一行本就遭人恨，而门下弟子又是鱼龙混杂，难保不出一两个败类坏了名声。

original:
{PlayerName}, after this battle, you and I are Sharing hardships.
If you encounter difficulties in the future, you can come to me, and I will do my best to help you.
context:
{PlayerName}，经此一战，你我算是患难与共。
今后闯荡江湖若有难处，可来找我，我会全力助你。

original: If you encounter difficulties in the future, feel free to come back to me, and I will do my best to help you.
context: 闯荡江湖若有难处，尽管回来找我，定当全力以赴相助于你。

original: The court will not wrong a good person, nor will it miss a bad person.
context: 朝廷不会冤枉一个好人，也不会错过一个恶人。

original: {PlayerName}, you are inherently good but have fallen in with the wrong crowd, and have not yet made a big mistake. Today I will let you go.
context: {PlayerName}，你本性良善不过是误交匪类，尚未铸成大错，今天我就网开一面，放你离去。

original: How do you want to deal with the others?
context: 其他人你们要怎么处置？

original: Convict and sentence them one by one, this is their deserved retribution.
context: 挨个定罪判刑，这是他们应有的报应。

original:
You watch as your former fellow disciples are shackled one by one...
The small sect that has been passed down for nearly a hundred years has been destroyed in just a few shichen.
context:
你眼睁睁看着昔日同门一个个被被套上枷锁……
传承近百年的小门派，短短几个时辰已然灰飞烟灭

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nest of Swallow, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>燕子窝，覆灭！</color></size>

original: You escaped from the Nest of Swallow through the underground waterway...
context: 你通过地下水道逃出了燕子窝……

original: You hide in the dark, watching as your former fellow disciples are shackled one by one...
context: 你躲在暗处，眼睁睁看着昔日同门一个个被被套上枷锁……

original: The small sect that has been passed down for nearly a hundred years has been destroyed in just a few shichen.
context: 传承近百年的小门派，短短几个时辰已然灰飞烟灭

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nest of Swallow, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>燕子窝，覆灭！</color></size>

original: Boss Bu died unfortunately in the chaos. If he dies, Nest of Swallow probably won't last long. Should I take this opportunity to leave Nest of Swallow?
context: 步老大在乱战中不幸身亡，他若一死燕子窝估计就撑不了多久了。我是否要趁此机会脱离燕子窝呢？

original: Leave Nest of Swallow
context: 脱离燕子窝

original: Coexist and die with Nest of Swallow
context: 与燕子窝共存亡

original:
At this time, you choose to Run away from Nest of Swallow!
Coward, waste! I don't want to see you again!
context:
这种时候你竟然选择离开燕子窝！
孬种、废物！我再也不想看到你！

original: {PlayerName}, it's good that you can stay, I knew I didn't misjudge you.
context: {PlayerName}，你能留下来很好，我果然没有看错你。

original: I hope you can continue to be yourself in the future, don't let me down.
context: 希望你以后也能从一而终，不要辜负我对你的期望。

original:
After this battle, I didn't expect that I was the only one who survived in Nest of Swallow.
Now, Nest of Swallow is in name only...
context:
经此一战，想不到燕子窝里只有我活了下来。
现在的燕子窝已经名存实亡了……

original:
After this battle, I didn't expect that only Hua Qingqing and I survived in Nest of Swallow.
Now, Nest of Swallow is in name only...
context:
经此一战，想不到燕子窝里只有我和华青青活了下来。
现在的燕子窝已经名存实亡了……

original:
{PlayerName}, you can go, Nest of Swallow has nothing to do with you anymore.
I grew up in Nest of Swallow, this is my home, I won't go with you.
context:
{PlayerName}你走吧，燕子窝已经跟你没有关系了。
我从小在燕子窝长大，这里就是我的家，我不会跟你走的。

original: You guys can't handle Nest of Swallow with this few people, the head catcher ordered me to help you!
context: 你们这点人还奈何不了燕子窝，总捕头命我来给你们助阵！

original: The wall behind this painting is a bit strange, it seems to be a stone door, I don't know what is hidden inside.
context: 这画卷后的墙壁有些古怪，好像一道石门，不知道里面藏着什么。

original: Now my machinery skills have been <color=#0574a8>mastered</color>, it can come in handy.
context: 如今我机关术的能力已经<color=#0574a8>登峰造极</color>，正好可以派上用场。

original: The wall slowly rises, revealing a deep passage.
context: 墙壁缓缓升起，露出一条幽深的通道。

original: This <color=#0574a8>Nest of Swallow secret chamber key</color> on me can come in handy.
context: 我身上这枚<color=#0574a8>燕子窝密室钥匙</color>，正好可以派上用场。

original: The wall slowly rises, revealing a deep passage.
context: 墙壁缓缓升起，露出一条幽深的通道。

original: I can't see anything now, maybe I need a key or practice my machinery skills, and come back to study it later.
context: 现在还看不出什么名堂，也许有钥匙或者练习下我的机关术，回头再来研究下。

original: Spar
context: 切磋

original: Your skills have far exceeded mine, and there will be no progress if you compete with me many more times.
context: 你的本事已经远超于我，和我比试再多次也不会有长进了。

context: 正好我闲的无聊，你想要我用几成功力跟你切磋呀？

咱们下次再比过，定会叫你输的心服口服！

context: 竟然能挡住我十成功力的攻击，看来你的本事已经远超于我，你应该去找老大切磋才会更多获益。

original: You are really vulnerable, next time I will reduce some strength to compete with you.
context: 真是不堪一击，下次我还是收敛些功力再跟你比试吧。

context: <size=200%>站住！</size>

context: 这是我们睡觉的地方，你一个外人乱闯什么！

context: <size=200%>站住！</size>

original: There is nothing to see where we sleep, if you are not a disciple of this sect, don't wander around!
context: 睡觉的地方没什么可看的，你不是本门的弟子没事不要乱闯！

original: Join
context: 加入

original: I have heard of the Crime Investigation Bureau for a long time, and I came to visit today.
context: 久闻神捕门大名，今日特来拜会。

original: {yell} How dare a nobody like you step into the Crime Investigation Bureau. Get out!
context: {yell}哪里来的宵小之辈也敢进我神捕门的大门。滚出去！

original: Such a violent temper, really not giving people any face.
context: 好暴躁的脾气，真是不给人留半点颜面。

original: {PlayerSurName} Young hero, what brings you here?
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，你来此有何贵干呐？

original: Ask about the history of the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 询问神捕门的来历。

original: Ask what can be learned from the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 询问神捕门能学到什么。

original: <color=#0574a8>Join the Crime Investigation Bureau</color>.<color=#097a76>(Benevolence reaches 40)</color>
context: <color=#0574a8>加入神捕门</color>。<color=#097a76>（仁德达到40）</color>

original: Don't want to join for now.
context: 暂时不想加入。

original: The Crime Investigation Bureau was established decades ago by a predecessor known as the "world's number one divine detective".
context: 神捕门乃是数十年前一位被称作“天下第一神捕”的前辈所建立。

original: It oversees all theft investigations across the world, and all the local county government's constables are from our Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 总管天下所有捕盗稽查之事，各地州县府衙的捕头，无一不是出自我神捕门。

original: Royal prestige: Has the right to question all cases in the world, possessing the supreme Executioner's power.
context: 皇权特许：有权过问天下所有案件，拥有至高无上的先斩后奏之权。

original: In recent years, not only difficult cases from various local governments, but also some bloody and strange cases in the martial arts world are handled by our Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 最近几年，不但各地州府的疑难案件，就连江湖上的一些血案、奇案也由我们神捕门负责侦办。

original: Although the Crime Investigation Bureau is a martial arts sect, it always acts impartially and does not favor personal feelings, so joining this sect inevitably offends various martial arts forces.
context: 神捕门虽是江湖门派，但是一向秉公办事，不徇私情，因此加入本门避免不了得罪各方江湖势力。

original: You might want to think it over before making a decision.
context: 你不妨考虑清楚再做决定。

original: I will personally teach you a <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> skill, which is not a martial arts but a special skill I developed from various finger techniques, specifically used to restrict the target's actions.
context: 我会亲自传授一门<color=#c44b0e>点穴</color>的本事，这不是武功而是我借鉴各种指法研究出来的一种特殊能力，专用来限制目标人物行动的。

original: My <color=#c44b0e>Flirting Star Sword</color> and Brother Qiu's <color=#c44b0e>Empty Blade</color> are the two great sword techniques of the Crime Investigation Bureau, with great power. If you want to learn these two skills, you can only join the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 我的<color=#c44b0e>贪狼剑法</color>和裘老弟的<color=#c44b0e>盘空刀法</color>是神捕门的刀剑二绝，威力奇大，若想学这两样功夫就只能加入神捕门。

original: The Crime Investigation Bureau also has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>, which can send a message to nearby constables during a fight, and someone will come to assist immediately.
context: 神捕门另有一门<color=#c44b0e>天罗地网</color>的绝招，可以在战斗中传讯给附近的捕快，立刻便会有人赶来支援助战。

original: Learning these martial arts tricks in the Crime Investigation Bureau is secondary, the most important thing is to learn to be fair and selfless!
context: 在神捕门学这些武功伎俩都还在其次，最主要是要学会心怀天下，为人公正无私！

original:
From today, {PlayerName} you are a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau!
I hope you won't tarnish the fame of the Crime Investigation Bureau and live up to my expectations of you.
context:
今日起，{PlayerName}你便是神捕门的人了！
希望你不要堕了神捕门的名声，莫要辜负了我对你的期望。

original: I will definitely not let down the Chief Constable's expectations!
context: 属下定当不会辜负总捕头期望！

original: Come find me when you've thought it through.
context: 等你考虑清楚了再来找我吧。

original: Is there anything else you want to know?
context: 你还有什么想了解的？

original: Since you decided to leave the Crime Investigation Bureau that day, there is no chance for you to return to the Crime Investigation Bureau in this life.
context: 既然当日你已决意退出神捕门，此生你再无重回神捕门的可能。

original: I see!
context: 原来如此！

original: {PlayerName} has been brought here.
context: {PlayerName}已经带到。

original: Good!
context: 好!

original: I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name?
context: 在下{PlayerName}，不知阁下如何称呼？

original: Thanks to your help, otherwise Qianxue would have completely lost face for the Crime Investigation Bureau this time.
context: 多亏你出手相助，否则千雪这次可就把神捕门的脸丢尽了。

original: I know my mistake and will accept the punishment!
context: 属下知错，会自行领罚!

original:
{PlayerName}, I am Luo Tianxiong, the Chief Constable of the Crime Investigation Bureau!
You have been kind to the Crime Investigation Bureau, and since you want to join the Crime Investigation Bureau, I will make an exception to accept you.
context:
{PlayerName}，本人是神捕门总捕头洛天雄！
你对神捕门有恩，既然想加入神捕门，我便破格收下你。

original:
From today, {PlayerName} you are a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau!
I hope you won't tarnish the fame of the Crime Investigation Bureau and live up to my expectations of you.
context:
今日起，{PlayerName}你便是神捕门的人了！
希望你不要堕了神捕门的名声，莫要辜负我对你的期望。

original: I will definitely not let down the Chief Constable's expectations!
context: 属下定当不会辜负总捕头期望！

original: Learn Crime Investigation Bureau Skills
context: 学习神捕门能力

original: Skill
context: 能力

original: Use <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> to fix the Machinery person in place.
context: 用<color=#c44b0e>点穴</color>的方式把机关人定在原地。

original: Talk to <color=#c44b0e>Luo Tianxiong</color>.
context: 与<color=#c44b0e>洛天雄</color>交谈。

original: {PlayerName}, don't be too greedy as a newcomer to our sect. You need to gain more experience in the Crime Investigation Bureau to earn my approval.
context: {PlayerName}，你初入本门不要太贪心，须得在神捕门多历练一番才能获得我的认可。

original: When your Relations with our sect reach <color=#c44b0e>10</color>, I will teach you the skill of <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color>.
context: 当你与本门关系达到<color=#c44b0e>10</color>，我将传授你<color=#c44b0e>点穴</color>的本事。

original: Today, I will teach you the skill of <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> of our sect.
context: 今日我将本门<color=#c44b0e>点穴</color>的本事传授给你。

original: Follow my instructions and use the method of <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> to immobilize the Machinery man in front of you.
context: 你按照我教你的法子，<color=#c44b0e>点穴</color>的方式把面前的机关人定住吧。

original: First, keep a distance from the target, then enter the <color=#c44b0e>Stealth</color> state...
context: 先距离目标远一些，然后进入<color=#c44b0e>潜行</color>状态……

original: Then go behind the target and choose <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color>...
context: 再走到目标身后选择<color=#c44b0e>点穴</color>……

original: As long as the timing is right, once successful, it will be immobilized for a short time.
context: 只要时机把握得当，一旦得手，短时间内它就动弹不得了。

original: It seems you are really good at criminal investigation!
context: 看来你真是刑侦探案的一把好手！

original: {PlayerName}, I solemnly remind you, although this skill is not highly regarded, as long as it is used for the right cause, you can be at peace with yourself.
context: {PlayerName}，我郑重提醒你，这个本事虽然难登大雅之堂，但只要用在正途上，自己问心无愧即可。

original: If one day I find out that you are doing evil and damaging the Fame of the Crime Investigation Bureau, I will personally kill you!
context: 若有一天我发现你为非作歹，坏了神捕门的名声，我将亲自出手将你击毙！

original: Yes, I will always remember your teachings!
context: 是，属下定当不忘总捕头教诲！

original: I've completed the task, it's time for me to leave, right?
context: 完成了目标，该让我出去了吧。

original: I didn't expect that Qianxue has recruited a master who is good at Immobilize for the Crime Investigation Bureau this time. It really proves that appearances can be deceiving. With your help, the Crime Investigation Bureau will surely be more efficient in handling cases in the future.
context: 想不到千雪这次为神捕门拉拢到一位擅长点穴的高手，果然是人不可貌相。有你助力，今后神捕门办案一定会事半功倍。

original: Our Crime Investigation Bureau has always been free to come and go, but there are a few things I need to make clear to you...
context: 咱们神捕门一向是来去自由，不过有几件事需要给你交代清楚……

original: Once you leave the Crime Investigation Bureau, you will have nothing to do with the Crime Investigation Bureau. Not only will the <color=#c44b0e>Crime Investigation token</color> be taken back, but also the talent <color=#c44b0e>Discerning eyes</color> will be erased. You need to think carefully.
context: 只要退出神捕门，从此你与神捕门上下再无半点瓜葛，不但<color=#c44b0e>神捕腰牌</color>会收回，就连天赋<color=#c44b0e>明察秋毫</color>也会一并抹去，你可要三思而行。

original: Already decided.<color=#097a76>(Return the Crime Investigation token)</color>
context: 心意已决。<color=#097a76>（交还神捕腰牌）</color>

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original: Since you are determined, from now on, you are no longer a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau. Let's forget about the past!
context:
既然你执意如此，从今往后你便不再是神捕门的人。
往日旧情一笔勾销！

original: I hope you don't commit any crimes in the future. If you fall into our hands, no one will show you any mercy because of the past.
context: 此后希望你莫要弄出作奸犯科的事情，否则落在我们手里，不会有任何人对你念及旧情网开一面。

original: I can't repay you for your contribution to our sect. I knew this day would come. Your world is in a bigger place.
context: 你对本门的贡献我无以为报，我知道迟早会有这一天，你的江湖在更大的地方。

original: But we can't break the rules of our sect. The <color=#c44b0e>Crime Investigation token</color> still needs to be taken back!
context: 不过本门不能坏了规矩，<color=#c44b0e>神捕腰牌</color>还是要收回的！

original: Then let's say goodbye!
context: 那么我们就此别过！

original: The Crime Investigation Bureau has always been strict. If you cannot return the <color=#c44b0e>Crime Investigation token</color> and insist on leaving, you will break with the Crime Investigation Bureau and become enemies in the future.
context: 神捕门历来规矩森严，你若无法交还<color=#c44b0e>神捕腰牌</color>，而且执意退出，那么将会与神捕门撕破脸面，今后见面是敌非友。

original: Your Relations with our sect will decrease!
context: 你与我门关系将会降低！

original: Already decided!<color=#097a76>(Relations with Crime Investigation Bureau drop to -20)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#097a76>（与神捕门关系降至-20）</color>

original: Think about it again
context: 再考虑下

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original: Do you have the courage to repeat what you want to do?
context: 你有胆量把你要做的事情再说一遍吗？

original: Destroy the Crime Investigation Bureau!<color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 剿灭神捕门！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: Words can't be spoken casually. If you say the wrong thing, there will be no chance to correct it.
context: 有的话是不能随便说的，说错了就再没有机会改正了。

original: This is your last chance to be presumptuous in front of me, don't blame me for being rude if you continue to talk nonsense!
context: 这是你在我面前放肆的最后一次机会，再要胡言乱语休怪我不客气！

original: Very well...
context: 很好……

original: The Crime Investigation Bureau hasn't been this lively for a long time, and it's been a long time since blood has been shed here.
context: 神捕门很久没有这么热闹了，这里也已经很久没有染血了。

original:
{PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to be this kind of person!
From this day on, we are irreconcilable!
context:
{PlayerName}，想不到你是这样的人！
今时今日起，我与你势不两立！

original: {PlayerName}, you harbor evil intentions, you deserve to be punished!
context: {PlayerName}，包藏祸心，其罪当诛！

original:
You seem to have heard the opponent's last breath...
The battle is over.
This place once judged the good and evil of the martial arts world,
Whether it's impartial or a lackey of the court.
Good and evil are just people's wishful thinking.
And for you, all of this has become unimportant.
Let the people of the martial arts world say what they want to say...
context:
你似乎听到了对方最后一次的呼吸……
战斗结束了。
这里曾经评判着江湖的善恶，
铁面无私也好，朝廷鹰犬也罢。
善与恶也不过是人们一厢情愿的说法。
而对于你自己，这一切也变得不再重要。
江湖人的说法，交给江湖人去说吧……

original:
The Crime Investigation Bureau, they are all a bunch of nobodies!
