With this level of strength, they want to maintain the order of the martial arts world, it's simply a dream!
context:
神捕门，都是一群土鸡瓦狗！
凭这点实力也要维持江湖秩序，简直痴人说梦！

original:
So strong, worthy of the Crime Investigation Bureau!
The best plan is to retreat!
context:
太强了，不愧是神捕门！
三十六计走为上策!

original: Assessment
context: 考核

original: {PlayerName}, you have been with the Crime Investigation Bureau for some time now, and today we have prepared an entry-level assessment to test your strength.
context: {PlayerName}，你加入神捕门已经有些时日了，今天要为你准备一项关于检验实力的入门考核

original: If you are ready for the assessment, let's start on the horse.
context: 你若是准备好参加考核了，咱们这就马上开始。

original: Ask about the assessment rules.
context: 询问考核相关规则。

original: Participate in the assessment. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 参加考核。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: The assessment is for you to face the four constables of our bureau alone. If you can beat them by yourself, you will have passed the entry-level assessment.
context: 考核的方式是你独自面对本门的四名捕快，你若凭一己之力能够打赢他们，就算通过了入门考核。

original: After passing the assessment, you will gain the unique talent of the Crime Investigation Bureau - <color=#c44b0e>Discerning eyes</color>!
context: 通过考核后，你会获得神捕门所独有的天赋——<color=#c44b0e>明察秋毫</color>！

original: Only by passing this assessment can you initially gain my approval and truly become a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 你只有通过了这次的考核，才算是初步获得我对你的认可，真正成为神捕门的一份子。

original: Let me see how far your skills have come.
context: 让我看看你的本事现在到什么地步了。

original: As expected, you didn't disappoint me, the Crime Investigation Bureau finally has another good hand!
context: 果然没让我失望，神捕门终于又多了一名好手！

original:
What are you waiting for? Either continue with the assessment or go practice!
If you can't even pass this simple entry-level assessment, you don't need to stay in the Crime Investigation Bureau anymore.
context:
还愣着作什么，现在要么继续参加考核，要么就去练功！
你若连这区区的入门考核都通过不了，这神捕门你也不必再待下去了。

original: Your current strength is too weak, there is no possibility of passing the entry-level assessment that is about to be conducted on you. Come back to me when you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 20</color>.
context: 你现在的实力还是太弱，根本没有可能通过对你即将进行的入门考核。等你达到<color=#c44b0e>20级</color>时再来找我吧。

original: During this time, you can spar with the <color=#c44b0e>practice constable</color> of our bureau to quickly improve your own strength.
context: 这段时间你可以找本门的<color=#c44b0e>练功捕头</color>切磋较量，尽快提升自身实力。

original: A small test of skill
context: 小试牛刀

original: Mission
context: 任务

original: Eliminate any of the <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Chief Stronghold, Blue Wind Camp, or Sea Jiao Gang</color>
context: 剿灭<color=#c44b0e>大王寨、青风寨、海蛟帮</color>任何一家

original: Report back to Chief Constable Luo Tianxiong.
context: 向总捕头·洛天雄复命。

original: {PlayerName}, I have an important task here that I hope you can complete, but this task is quite risky, you can first understand the task situation, and then decide whether to accept it.
context: {PlayerName}，我这里有一件重要任务希望你去完成，但是这项任务风险比较高，你可以先了解下任务情况，再决定是否要接受。

original: Understand the task related situation.
context: 了解任务相关情况。

original: Accept the task.
context: 接受任务。

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: There are three notorious forces in the martial arts world, which have become increasingly restless recently.
context: 江湖上有三个臭名昭著的势力，近些时日越发不安分起来。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Sea Jiao Gang</color>, involved in human trafficking, murder and robbery. It is reported that their traces have been found at the Ferry in the Nameless Region.
context: <color=#c44b0e>海蛟帮</color>，拐卖人口、杀人掠货无恶不作。据悉，在无名地区的渡口发现过他们的踪迹。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Chief Stronghold</color>, a group of lawless bandits gathered together, often looting villages and passers-by in the Nameless Region.
context: <color=#c44b0e>大王寨</color>，一群无法无天的土匪聚在一起，经常劫掠无名地区的村庄及过往行人。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Blue Wind Camp</color>, under the guise of robbing the rich to help the poor, they defy the laws of the court and openly kidnap and extort in Chuxiang City, they are truly lawless!
context: <color=#c44b0e>青风寨</color>，打着劫富济贫的名义，无视朝廷法度，公然进楚襄城绑架勒索，实在无法无天！

original: These three forces have already aroused public outrage. The court is putting pressure on the Crime Investigation Bureau, ordering us to eradicate them as soon as possible to vent the public's anger.
context: 此三家势力已经引起公愤，朝廷给神捕门施加压力，命我等尽快将其尽快铲除，以泄民愤。

original: Now the Crime Investigation Bureau is short of hands, after much thought, I fear you are the most suitable candidate at present.
context: 如今神捕门人手不足，我思来想去恐怕只有你才是如今最为适合的人选。

original: As long as you eliminate any one of these forces, I will teach you the ultimate move of the Crime Investigation Bureau, <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>.
context: 你只要剿灭任一家势力，我便将神捕门的绝招<color=#c44b0e>天罗地网</color>传授给你。

original: Remember, you can return to report after eliminating any of the <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Chief Stronghold, Blue Wind Camp, or Sea Jiao Gang</color>!
context: 记住了，剿灭<color=#c44b0e>大王寨、青风寨、海蛟帮</color>任何一家便可回来复命！

original:
Indeed, heroes come from the youth!
I have always been accurate in judging people. With such achievements at a young age, your future is bound to be limitless.
context:
果然英雄出少年！
我的眼光看人一向很准，年纪轻轻有此番作为，将来一定前途不可限量。

original: I will now teach you our sect's ultimate move, <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>.
context: 我这便把本门绝招<color=#c44b0e>天罗地网</color>传授给你。

original: The beauty of this move is that if we are outnumbered, it can call for fellow sect members to Assist and turn the tide; if the situation is unfavorable, fellow sect members will rush to hold off the enemy, buying you a chance to survive.
context: 此招的妙处在于若是敌众我寡，可呼唤同门前来援助，扭转战局；若是战局不利，则同门会赶来拖住对手，为你争取一线生机。

original: Thank you, Chief Catcher!
context: 多谢总捕头！

original: {yell} You actually wiped out the Bandit Chief Stronghold, Blue Wind Camp, and Sea Jiao Gang!!!
context: {yell}你竟然把大王寨、青风寨、海蛟帮全部剿灭了！！！

original: This news is too shocking, it's hard to believe!
context: 这个消息太震惊了，简直令人不敢相信！

original: We have been investigating these three forces for many years, with countless brothers killed and injured, but we could never touch them. This time you have wiped them all out, truly venting our anger for the Crime Investigation Bureau!
context: 我们对这三方势力追查多年，门下兄弟死伤无数，却始终奈何不得他们，这次被你一网打尽，真是帮咱们神捕门出了一口恶气！

original: Your merit this time is too great, I must reward you heavily!
context: 你这次功劳实在太大，我这次一定要重重奖赏你！

original: I will now teach you our sect's ultimate move, <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>.
context: 我这就把本门绝招<color=#c44b0e>天罗地网</color>传授给你。

original: The beauty of this move is that if we are outnumbered, it can call for fellow sect members to Assist and turn the tide; if the situation is unfavorable, fellow sect members will rush to hold off the enemy, buying you a chance to survive.
context: 此招的妙处在于若是敌众我寡，可呼唤同门前来援助，扭转战局；若是战局不利，则同门会赶来拖住对手，为你争取一线生机。

original: Your merit this time is too great, in addition to the sect's ultimate move, I must reward you heavily!
context: 你这次功劳实在太大，除了本门绝招之外，我还要重重奖赏你！

original: Qianxue, step forward!
context: 千雪，出列！

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Qianxue, how do you feel about these days of experience with {PlayerName}?
context: 千雪，你随{PlayerName}外出历练的这些日子感受如何？

original: Although {PlayerSurName} is a junior disciple, his experience and martial arts cultivation are above me. These days of experience have benefited me greatly.
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟虽然入门尚浅，但是江湖阅历、武功修为均在我之上，这些时日的历练使我<color=#c44b0e>获益匪浅</color>。

original: I hope you two can work together sincerely. Whether the Crime Investigation Bureau can flourish in the martial arts world depends on you young people.
context: 希望你们二人精诚合作，神捕门能否在江湖上发扬光大，就看你们这些年轻人了。

original: Subordinates obey!
context: 属下遵命！

original: This task requires a high level of strength, it's best if you can find some reliable friends in the martial arts world to help you complete this task.
context: 此事对实力要求极高，最好你能多找些实力可靠的江湖朋友，帮你一起完成这项任务。

original: Come find me when you've thought it through.
context: 等你考虑清楚了再来找我吧。

original: What happened?
context: 发生了什么事？

original: Luo Tianxiong, I heard that a few small sects have caused heavy casualties to you, and now only a few cats are left. I really don't know what the need for the Crime Investigation Bureau is.
context: 洛天雄，听说几个蝼蚁一样的小门派就耍的你们伤亡惨重，如今只剩大猫小猫两三只，真不知道这神捕门还有什么存在的必要。

original: Have you heard? A few days ago, a young hero wiped out three notorious thief dens, the Bandit Chief Stronghold, Blue Wind Camp, and Sea Jiao Gang, all by himself.
context: 不知道你听说了吗，前几日有位少年英雄凭一人之力便剿灭大王寨、青风寨、海蛟帮三个臭名昭著的贼窝。

original: Our family has Recognized, but what does this have to do with you?
context: 咱家倒是有所耳闻，不过这跟你们有什么关系？

original: That young hero is from our Crime Investigation Bureau!
context: 那位少年英雄正是出自我神捕门！

original: {PlayerName}, step forward and let Tong Daofu of the Imperial City Department see!
context: {PlayerName}，上前让皇城司的佟道辅佟大人见识下！

original: {PlayerName}, pay respects to the Chief Catcher!
context: {PlayerName}拜见总捕头！

original: {PlayerName}, pay respects to Lord Tong!
context: {PlayerName}拜见佟大人！

original: Our family thought it was some three-headed six-armed immortal descending to the earth, but it turns out to be a mortal of flesh and blood.
context: 咱家还以为是哪个三头六臂的神仙下凡，原来也是血肉凡胎。

original: Although my Crime Investigation Bureau is not what it used to be, we can still find some promising talents. With proper cultivation, we will soon restore the former glory of the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 我这神捕门虽然今时不同往日，但是也能找收到一些不错的苗子，只要善加培养，不久后定能恢复我神捕门往日荣光。

original: As for Lord Tong's Imperial City Division, it's like a tree without roots, a river without a source. I wonder if there will be any need for its existence in a few years, when Lord Tong can no longer move?
context: 倒是佟大人的皇城司，才真是无根之木、无源之水，不知道再过几年，等佟大人走不动了，这皇城司还有什么存在的必要吗？

original: You, you...
context: 你，你……

original: {PlayerName}, step forward and let Tong Daofu of the Imperial City Department see!
context: {PlayerName}，上前让皇城司的佟道辅佟大人见识下！

original: {PlayerName}, pay respects to the Chief Catcher!
context: {PlayerName}拜见总捕头！

original: {PlayerName}, pay respects to Lord Tong!
context: {PlayerName}拜见佟大人！

original: Kid, since the Chief Catcher values you so much, I will have to keep an eye on you in the future.
context: 小子，既然总捕头对你如此看重，今后咱家也要对你多多留意咯。

original: Lord Tong, you didn't come to the Crime Investigation Bureau today just to show off, did you?
context: 佟大人，今天你到神捕门该不会只是来示威的吧！

original: Chief Luo, I know you are always impartial and do not favor personal relationships...
context: 洛捕头，咱家知道你一向铁面无私，不徇私情……

original: However, now that you have offended both Duke Qi and Duke Kang, they jointly issued an edict to the Imperial City Division to eliminate the Crime Investigation Bureau. I can only do my duty.
context: 只不过如今你把齐王、康王两家王爷都给得罪了，现在两位王爷联名下诏要皇城司铲除神捕门，咱家也只能奉公办事了。

original: Just by you? That seems a bit presumptuous.
context: 就凭你？怕是有些大言不惭了吧。

original: Come out and see for yourself.
context: 你跟咱家出来瞧瞧呀。

original: Lord Tong, it seems that these few people can't swallow the Crime Investigation Bureau, can they?
context: 佟大人，就这么点人似乎吞不下神捕门吧？

original:
How can these ants swallow an elephant?
But, if the elephant is weak, do these ants have a chance?
context:
这点蝼蚁怎么能吞的下大象呢。
不过，要是大象虚弱的时候，这些蝼蚁有没有机会呢？

original: Despicable, you poisoned!
context: 卑鄙，你下毒！

original: It's not surprising that a cunning eunuch like him would do something without a bottom line. It's my fault for being careless.
context: 似他这般狡诈的阉人做出什么没下限的事情都不意外，是我大意了。

original: Luo Tianxiong, and that kid surnamed {PlayerSurName}...
context: 洛天雄，还有那个姓{PlayerSurName}的小崽子……

original: {yell}<size=150%>You all go to hell!!!</size>
context: {yell}<size=150%>你们都给咱家去死吧！！！</size>

original: Who would have thought... the Crime Investigation Bureau and the Imperial City Division... founded on the same day and destroyed on the same day... it's fate...
context: 想不到……神捕门和皇城司……同一天创立又在同一天……灭亡，天意啊……

original: Chief Catcher, the Crime Investigation Bureau is not dead yet, we are still alive, cheer up!
context: 总捕头，神捕门还没有亡，我们还活着，你振作些！

original: {PlayerName}, the Crime Investigation Bureau is now in ruins and can no longer shelter you...
context: {PlayerName}，神捕门如今已是破屋残垣，再不能为你遮风挡雨了……

original: From today on... you are no longer a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau...
context: 从今天起……你不再是神捕门的人……

original: If... you have a chance, please send my... and the Crime Investigation Bureau brothers'... regards to Duke Qi and Duke Kang...
context: 如果……有机会，帮我……和神捕门一干兄弟……问候齐王和康王两位殿下安康……

original: Cough, cough...
context: 咳，咳……

original: You dare to resist, you dare to resist!!
context: 你们竟敢反抗，你们竟敢反抗！！

original: You are all traitors, traitors!!!
context: 通通都是乱臣贼子，乱臣贼子！！！

original: This is what happens when you're too clever for your own good, and it costs you your life.
context: 这就是机关算尽太聪明，反误了卿卿性命。

original: You! You!! You...

Ever since the Emperor was captured, the Crime Investigation Bureau has been marginalized and walking on thin ice every day. If we want to restore the former glory of the Crime Investigation Bureau, we need to find the Emperor as soon as possible and welcome him back to the palace, otherwise the next disaster for the Crime Investigation Bureau is unpredictable.
context: 自从圣上被俘后，这神捕门便处处受到排挤，整日如履薄冰。若要重振神捕门往日风采，还需要尽快找到圣上下落，迎接圣上回宫，否则神捕门下次劫难不知何时发生。

original: {PlayerName}, as a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau, it is your duty to find the Emperor. I will help you when the time comes!
context: {PlayerName}，你身为神捕门一员，找寻圣上下落之事责无旁贷，届时我会助你一臂之力！

original:
Chief Catcher, I'm sorry.
I can't die yet, I will avenge you!
context:
总捕头，对不住了。
我还不能死，我会为你们报仇的！

original:
You fled the Crime Investigation Bureau in panic, but you could still faintly hear the screams of your fellow disciples behind you.
Those who used to practice with you, laugh with you, one by one, lost their lives.
You are powerless to do anything about it, because you have to survive, only by surviving do you have a chance.
The once mighty Crime Investigation Bureau has now become a victim of power struggles and will no longer exist...
context:
你仓惶逃离了神捕门，但是身后仍然隐约能听见同门弟子的惨呼声。
那些昔日陪你练功、与你一同嬉笑的同门，一个个断绝了生机。
对此，你无能为力，因为你要活下去，活下去才有机会。
堂堂神捕门，如今成了政权争夺的牺牲品，此后将不复存在……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Crime Investigation Bureau, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>神捕门，覆灭！</color></size>

original: The Chief Catcher unfortunately passed away, and no one can support the Crime Investigation Bureau anymore. It will soon face retaliation from all sides. Should I take this opportunity to leave the Crime Investigation Bureau?
context: 总捕头不幸身亡，已经没人能够支撑神捕门，很快就要遭到各方面的报复。我是否要趁此机会脱离神捕门呢？

original: Leave the Crime Investigation Bureau
context: 脱离神捕门

original: Stay with the Crime Investigation Bureau
context: 与神捕门共存亡

original:
Since you chose to run away from the Crime Investigation Bureau, there's no need for me to stay with you. 
From now on, we'll go our separate ways. Take care.
context:
既然你选择离开神捕门，我也没必要跟你在一起了。
以后咱们山高路远，各自珍重吧。

original:
{PlayerName}, thank you for choosing to stay with me in the Crime Investigation Bureau. 
This is my home, and now it's yours too. You are my family.
context:
{PlayerName}，谢谢你还会陪我一直留在神捕门。
这里是我的家，今后也是你的家，你就是我的家人。

original: How could this happen! Why did this happen!!!
context: 怎么会这样！为什么会这样！！！

original: The Chief Catcher, Sister Qianxue, Brother Qiu... I couldn't save any of them...
context: 总捕头、千雪妹子、裘大哥……一个也没有救下来……

original: Is the Crime Investigation Bureau really gone...
context: 神捕门就这么没了吗……

original: How could this happen! Why did this happen!!!
context: 怎么会这样！为什么会这样！！！

original: The Chief Catcher couldn't be saved...
context: 总捕头没有救下来……

original: Is the Crime Investigation Bureau really gone...
context: 神捕门就这么没了吗……

original:
There's no feast that doesn't end, {PlayerName}, let's part ways here. 
I can't abandon the Crime Investigation Bureau and save myself, this is my fate, not yours.
context:
天下无不散的宴席，{PlayerName}咱们就此分别吧。
我不能抛下神捕门自己偷生，这是我的宿命不是你的。

original:
There's no feast that doesn't end, {PlayerName}, let's part ways here. 
I can't abandon the Crime Investigation Bureau and save myself, this is my fate, not yours.
context:
天下无不散的宴席，{PlayerName}咱们就此分别吧。
我不能抛下神捕门自己偷生，这是我的宿命不是你的。

original: Crisis
context: 危机

original: Dark scene, Luo Tianxiong stands in the middle of the table, Qiu Zhimo and Luo Qianxue on either side
context: 黑幕，放置 洛天雄站在正中桌前，裘之墨、洛千雪分站两侧

original: What happened?
context: 发生了什么事？

original: Luo Tianxiong, I heard that a few small sects have caused heavy casualties to you, and now only a few cats are left. I really don't know what the need for the Crime Investigation Bureau is.
context: 洛天雄，听说几个蝼蚁一样的小门派就耍的你们伤亡惨重，如今只剩大猫小猫两三只，真不知道这神捕门还有什么存在的必要。

original:
Hmph, so it's the Deputy of the Imperial City Bureau, Tong Daofu's lapdog! 
When did you start showing off your power as a deputy?
context:
哼，原来是皇城司副使，佟道辅的狗腿子！
你这个副使什么时候也开始耀武扬威了？

original:
Luo Tianxiong, you'd better be polite to our guests. 
The current Imperial City Bureau is not something your small Crime Investigation Bureau can provoke.
context:
洛天雄，你最好对咱家客气些。
如今的皇城司可不是你这小小的神捕门能招惹起的。

original: {PlayerName}, step forward and show the Deputy Commander of the Imperial City Bureau what you've got!
context: {PlayerName}，上前让皇城司的副指挥使大人见识下！

original: {PlayerName}, pay respects to the Chief Catcher!
context: {PlayerName}拜见总捕头！

original: {PlayerName}, pays respects to the Deputy Commander!
context: {PlayerName}拜见副指挥使大人！

original: So it's a greenhorn, the people of the Crime Investigation Bureau are indeed getting worse with each generation.
context: 原来是个乳臭未干的黄口小儿，神捕门的人果然一代不如一代。

original: Deputy Commander, you didn't come to the Crime Investigation Bureau today just to show off your eloquence, did you?
context: 副指挥使大人，今天你到神捕门该不会只是来逞口舌之快的吧！

original: Chief Luo, I have no grudge against you, and I admire a man like you...
context: 洛捕头，咱家与你无冤无仇，也钦佩你这样的汉子……

original: But, since Mr. Tong is temporarily away from the Imperial City Bureau, I'm afraid I won't be able to convince the public, so I have to use your Crime Investigation Bureau to establish my authority.
context: 但是，佟大人有事暂离皇城司，咱家代掌皇城司，唯恐难以服众，所以只能借你的神捕门来立威了。

original: Just by you? That seems a bit presumptuous.
context: 就凭你？怕是有些大言不惭了吧。

original: Come out and see for yourself.
context: 你跟咱家出来瞧瞧呀。

original: Deputy Commander, with so few people, it seems you can't swallow the Crime Investigation Bureau, can you?
context: 副指挥使大人，就这么点人似乎吞不下神捕门吧？

original:
How can these ants swallow an elephant?
But, if the elephant is weak, do these ants have a chance?
context:
这点蝼蚁怎么能吞的下大象呢。
不过，要是大象虚弱的时候，这些蝼蚁有没有机会呢？

original: Despicable, you poisoned!
context: 卑鄙，你下毒！

original: It's not surprising that a cunning eunuch like him would do something without a bottom line. It's my fault for being careless.
context: 似他这般狡诈的阉人做出什么没下限的事情都不意外，是我大意了。

original: Luo Tianxiong, and that kid surnamed {PlayerSurName}...
context: 洛天雄，还有那个姓{PlayerSurName}的小崽子……

original: {yell}<size=150%>You all go to hell!!!</size>
context: {yell}<size=150%>你们都给咱家去死吧！！！</size>

original: Cough, cough...
context: 咳，咳……

original: You dare to resist, you dare to resist!!
context: 你们竟敢反抗，你们竟敢反抗！！

original: You are all traitors, traitors!!!
context: 通通都是乱臣贼子，乱臣贼子！！！

original: This is what happens when you're too clever for your own good, and it costs you your life.
context: 这就是机关算尽太聪明，反误了卿卿性命。

original: You! You!! You...
If it weren't for you stepping in today, I'm afraid the entire Crime Investigation Bureau would have been wiped out.
context: 今天若非你出手退敌，怕是神捕门上下都要全军覆灭了。

original: If there's anything you need in the future, I'll be there for you, no matter what!
context: 今后若有用到老兄的地方，绝对两肋插刀义不容辞！

original: Although the Emperor has been saved, the court is still controlled by treacherous villains. The Crime Investigation Bureau is still being marginalized, living on thin ice every day.
context: 圣上虽然已经救回，但依然是奸佞小人把持朝堂，这神捕门照旧处处受到排挤，整日如履薄冰。

original: {PlayerName}, the hope of revitalizing the Crime Investigation Bureau lies with your generation. I hope that one day you can eliminate the villains and bring clarity to the world. As the Chief Catcher, I will lend you a hand when the time comes.
context: {PlayerName}，将来振兴神捕门的希望就寄托在你们这一代身上了，希望你有朝一日铲奸除佞，还世道一片清明。我虽为总捕头，届时也会助你一臂之力。

original: {PlayerName}, we are now facing a crisis that could lead to the destruction of the Crime Investigation Bureau at any time, and I want to know your attitude at this moment.
context: {PlayerName}，咱们现在面临一场可能随时导致神捕门覆灭的危机，我想要知道你此刻的态度。

original:
A crisis that could lead to the destruction of the Crime Investigation Bureau at any time...
My attitude...
context:
随时导致神捕门覆灭的危机……
我的态度嘛……

original: Stand or fall with the Crime Investigation Bureau! (High-intensity battle)
context: 与神捕门共存亡！（高强度战斗）

original: Let me think about it
context: 容我考虑考虑

original:
Good, I knew I didn't misjudge you!
Next, let's welcome our distinguished guest together.
context:
好，果然没有看错你！
接下来随我一同迎接贵客吧。

original: This is where our disciples rest and stay, please stop!
context: 这里是本门弟子休息住宿之处，请留步！

original: <size=200%>Stop!</size>
context: <size=200%>站住！</size>

original: This is a forbidden area of the Crime Investigation Bureau, non-disciples are not allowed to enter!
context: 这里是神捕门禁地，非神捕门弟子不得擅入！

original: Go to jail
context: 入狱

original: Wait patiently for the results of the Crime Investigation Bureau's investigation.
context: 耐心等待神捕门的调查结果。

original: How do you like the taste of prison?
context: 这牢房的滋味还不错吧？

original: When are you planning to release me, let me out now!
context: 你们打算把我关到什么时候，快放我出去！

original: That's not possible, we need to investigate your background. If you're innocent, we'll let you go; if you're a criminal, you'll only have one way to go - death!
context: 那可不行，我们需要调查下你的来历，若是身世清白定会放你离去；若是不赦之徒，只有死路一条！

original: There's nothing to eat or drink here, by the time you finish your investigation, I'll starve to death.
context: 这里没吃没喝的，等你调查完事，我早就饿死了。

original: Who told you to get involved with thieves? If you starve to death, it's your own fault!
context: 谁叫你跟贼人搅和在一起，真要饿死了也是活该！

original: Here are some steamed buns. If you're hungry, make do with them; if you're bored, go sleep on the straw mat for a few shichen, someone will wake you up when it's time.
context: 这里有几个馒头，你若是饿了就凑合吃吧；若是感觉无聊，就去草席上睡上几个时辰，到时候自然有人唤你起来。

original: You're finally here, can you let me go now?
context: 你总算来了，是不是可以放我走了？

original: After investigation, you indeed made unwise friendships, but you yourself have no bad records, so you can run away from here now.
context: 经过调查，你确实交友不慎，自身并有何劣迹，因此你现在便可离开这里了。

original: You locked me up for no reason for a day, and just dismissed me like this, shouldn't there be some compensation?
context: 平白关我一天，就这么把我打发了，难道不该给点补偿吗？

original: How about compensating you with a month's worth of prison meals?
context: 补偿你一个月的牢饭如何？

original: Forget it, I don't want to stay a moment longer.
context: 算了吧，我一刻也不想多呆了。

original: Take care, no need to see you out!
context: 慢走，不送！

original: You're finally here, can you let me go now?
context: 你总算来了，是不是可以放我走了？

original: Unfortunately, I'm afraid you won't be able to leave...
context: 很遗憾，你恐怕走不了了……

original: What does it mean?
context: 什么意思？

original:
You have a heavy aura of malevolence, I'm afraid you've done something against Benevolence.
We've known each other for a while, and I came here specifically to see you off.
context:
你身上戾气太重，怕是做了什么有损仁德的事情。
你我相识一场，此番前来是专程给你送行的。

original: Don't do evil in your next life, or the net of heaven has wide meshes but lets nothing through!
context: 下辈子莫再作恶事，否则天网恢恢疏而不漏！

original: I, the younger generation {PlayerName}, have long admired the reputation of Langya Sword Pavilion, and hope to join and become a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 晚辈{PlayerName}，久仰琅琊剑阁盛名，希望可以投身门下，成为琅琊剑阁弟子。

original: Every disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion has some understanding of the path of the sword. Let me first see if you are qualified...
context: 琅琊剑阁的弟子无一不是在剑道一途有所领悟之人，且先让老夫看看你够不够格……

original: At least a <color=#c44b0e>Sword level of 50 or above</color> is required to be a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion. You have not yet met the basic requirements for entry.
context: 琅琊剑阁的弟子至少要求<color=#c44b0e>御剑达到50以上</color>，你尚未达到入门的基本要求。

original: Although I am temporarily unable to join the Langya Sword Pavilion, could you reveal some information about the Langya Sword Pavilion to me?
context: 虽然晚辈暂时无缘拜入琅琊剑阁，但是这琅琊剑阁的情况可否跟晚辈透露一二呢？

original: Since it's not meant to be, why force it? More words are useless.
context: 既然无缘，何必强求，多说无益。

original: {PlayerSurName} young hero, your fate with Langya Sword Pavilion has not yet arrived. Don't waste your time here with me, please go back.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，你与琅琊剑阁缘分未到，莫要在老夫这里蹉跎岁月，请回吧。

original: I, the younger generation {PlayerName}, have long admired the reputation of Langya Sword Pavilion, and hope to join and become a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 晚辈{PlayerName}，久仰琅琊剑阁盛名，希望可以投身门下，成为琅琊剑阁弟子。

original: Those who wish to become disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion are all people who have some understanding of the way of the sword. Let me see if you are qualified...
context: 想成为琅琊剑阁的弟子无一不是在剑道一途有所领悟之人，且先让老夫看看你够不够格……

original: Hmm, {PlayerSurName} young hero, you are young and have a quite impressive understanding of the way of the sword. Under my personal guidance, you will surely become a great person in the future!
context: 嗯，{PlayerSurName}少侠你年纪轻轻，竟能对剑道有颇为不俗的领悟，在老夫亲手雕琢之下，将来必成大器！

original: May I ask how to address the old predecessor?
context: 不知老前辈如何称呼？

original:
I am the master of Langya Sword Pavilion - Jian Chi!
If a talent like you is buried, it would be my blindness!
context:
老夫便是琅琊剑阁的阁主——剑痴！
你这样的良才若是被埋没，那便是老夫有眼无珠！

original: (Jian Chi seems a bit too excited, I'd better ask clearly before making a decision.)
context: （剑痴前辈未免有些激动过头，我还是先询问清楚再做决定吧。）

original: Inquire about the history of Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 询问琅琊剑阁的来历。

original: Ask what can be learned from Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 询问琅琊剑阁能学到什么。

original: <color=#0574a8>Join Langya Sword Pavilion.</color>
context: <color=#0574a8>加入琅琊剑阁。</color>

original: Don't want to join for now.
context: 暂时不想加入。

original: Langya Sword Pavilion was founded by me thirty years ago. It was originally a place to store my collection of divine weapons, Sharp. Now, its reputation in the martial arts world is only slightly inferior to the "Three Teachings" of Confucianism, Buddhism, and Taoism.
context: 琅琊剑阁乃是老夫三十年前所创，本是存放老夫收藏的神兵利器之处。如今在江湖上的名头，也只比“儒释道”三教稍逊一筹。

original: Nowadays, three or four out of ten divine weapons, Sharp, that appear in the martial arts world are from the Sword Pavilion. Therefore, as long as the disciples of the Sword Pavilion do not make Nemesis when they go out into the martial arts world, other sects will mostly give some face to the disciples of the Sword Pavilion.
context: 如今江湖上现世的神兵利器，十有三四皆是出自剑阁。因此凡是剑阁弟子外出行走江湖，只要不是结下死仇，其他门派大多会给剑阁弟子几分面子。

original: I accept disciples widely, not only teaching swordsmanship, but also the method of forging divine weapons, Sharp. The mine in the back mountain of our sect is rich in resources, inexhaustible and inexhaustible, which is convenient for our disciples to practice forging.
context: 老夫广纳门徒，不但传授剑术，更传授打造神兵利器的手段。本门后山之中矿产丰富，取之不竭用之不穷，正可方便我门下弟子练习打造之术。

original: The two main disciples under my sect are both rare swordsmanship geniuses, but they have different styles. One is ethereal and elegant, and the other is simple and thick. All disciples of the Sword Pavilion can Request swordsmanship from them.
context: 老夫门下两大弟子，都是难得一见的剑道天才，只是两人风格不同，一个空灵飘逸，一个浑厚朴实，凡剑阁弟子都可向他二人请教剑术。

original: There is also a unique skill in the Langya Sword Pavilion, known as <color=#c44b0e>Ten Thousand Swords</color>! It is a killing move that I realized in my old age, using Qi to control the sword. Once this move is used, it can kill both gods and Buddhas.
context: 这琅琊剑阁中还有一门镇派的绝招，名为<color=#c44b0e>万剑归宗</color>！乃是老夫花甲之年悟到的一门以气御剑的杀招，此招一出便是神挡杀神佛挡杀佛。

original: From today, {PlayerName} is a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion!
context: 今日起，{PlayerName}便是琅琊剑阁门下弟子了！

original: Looking at your outstanding talent, your future achievements may far exceed those of my disciples. The rise and fall, honor and disgrace of the Langya Sword Pavilion in the future will all depend on you, the second generation disciples.
context: 以你出色资质来看，将来成就恐怕远高于老夫那几名弟子。琅琊剑阁日后的兴衰荣辱就全依赖你们这些二代弟子了。

original: I will definitely not let down the expectations of the Pavilion Master!
context: 弟子定当不会辜负阁主的期望！

original: Come find me when you've thought it through.
context: 等你考虑清楚了再来找我吧。

original: Is there anything else you want to know?
context: 你还有什么想了解的？

original: Your fate with the Sword Pavilion has come to an end in this life, there is no need to do useless work.
context: 此生你与剑阁缘分已尽，何必再做无用之功。

original: Eager to find talents
context: 求贤若渴

original: Invite Wang Dachui to the team and go to Langya Sword Pavilion with Ouye Heng.
context: 将王大锤邀请到队伍中，随欧冶恒前往琅琊剑阁。

original: Please ask the blacksmith to forge some good weapons, the materials and wages are all here...
context: 请铁匠师傅打造几件上好的兵器，材料和工钱都在这里……

original: You've got the wrong person, I'm just an ordinary blacksmith, usually making farming tools for the villagers.
context: 你找错人了，我就是个普通打铁的，平时给乡亲们打打农具而已。

original: If you want to forge some good weapons, I don't have the ability, please find someone else.
context: 你要打造几件上好的兵器，我可没这个本事，请另找高明吧。

original: Hammering like rain...
context: 一锤天雨栗……

original: Hammering like a ghost crying at night...
context: 再锤鬼夜哭……

original: Who are you!
context: 你是什么人！

original: I am Ouye Heng from Langya Sword Pavilion, I pay my respects to Mr. Wang Dachui!
context: 在下琅琊剑阁欧冶恒，拜见王大锤先生！

original: Langya Sword Pavilion...
context: 琅琊剑阁……

original: Master... is he still well?
context: 师……他老人家现在可还好吗？

original: The master is in good health, but he has been melancholy for many years because of a worldly matter...
context: 师父老人家身体康泰，唯有一件俗事萦怀，长年郁郁寡欢……

original: Alas, you go. I have nothing to do with Langya Sword Pavilion anymore, if there is nothing else, I will not accompany you.
context:
唉，你走吧。
我与琅琊剑阁已经再无瓜葛，若无其他事情，恕不奉陪了。

original: May I ask what happened?
context: 请问发生何事？

original: I am Ouye Heng, a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion, and I am here to invite Brother Dachui back to the sect on the orders of my master.
context: 在下是琅琊剑阁弟子欧冶恒，奉师父之命请大锤师兄重返师门。

original: He doesn't seem to be very enthusiastic about you, and he doesn't seem to want to go back with you.
context: 看他样子好像对你不太热情啊，也没有要跟你回去的意思。

original: Brother Dachui was extraordinarily talented in his youth and was quite famous in the martial arts world. He was known as "Jade-faced Ganjiang" Wang Dachui!
context: 大锤师兄当年天赋异禀，在江湖上颇有盛名，人称“玉面干将”王大锤！

original: Jade, jade-faced? Are you sure you didn't get it wrong?!
context: 玉，玉面？你确定没有说错？！

original: I heard it from my master by chance, but unfortunately I didn't see Brother Dachui's youthful demeanor with my own eyes.
context: 我也是听家师偶然说起，可惜没有亲眼见到大锤师兄年轻时的风采。

original: Well, that's not important.
context: 好吧，这不重要。

original: Brother Dachui was young and energetic, and he believed that he had learned all the teachings of the master, so...
context: 大锤师兄毕竟年轻气盛，自认为已经尽得家师亲传，于是……

original: Hey, you two, enough is enough! If you want to chat, go outside, don't disturb my work.
context:
喂，你们两个有完没完！
要说闲话到外面去，不要影响我做工。

original: My master once promised that if anyone could forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword, he would be the next master of the Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 家师当年曾许诺，有人若能打造出轩辕神剑，便是琅琊剑阁的下任阁主。

original: Brother Dachui believed that the time was ripe, so he proposed to the master to forge the <color=#c44b0e>Xuanyuan Divine Sword</color>.
context: 大锤师兄自认为时机成熟，便向家师提出要打造<color=#c44b0e>轩辕神剑</color>的请求。

original: Little did he know that the requirements for forging the Xuanyuan Divine Sword were extremely strict in terms of wealth, love, law, and land. Brother Dachui naturally couldn't handle it, so the master refused his request.
context: 殊不知打造轩辕神剑对财、侣、法、地四项无一不是极其苛刻的要求，以大锤师兄的实力自然无法胜任，于是家师拒绝了他的请求。

original: Brother Dachui thought that the master was deliberately making things difficult for him, so he secretly opened a furnace to forge the sword on the back mountain without the master's knowledge. In the end, the furnace exploded and he was injured, losing a lot of precious materials. The master was so angry that he punished him to reflect on the back mountain and forbade him to forge swords for ten years.
context: 大锤师兄认为是家师有意刁难，于是瞒着家师，自己孤身一人在后山开炉炼剑。最后炉炸人伤，损失不少天材地宝，家师一怒之下罚他在后山思过，十年内不许铸剑。

original: Brother Dachui harbored resentment and left the Langya Sword Pavilion, wandering the martial arts world.
context: 大锤师兄心生怨念，自此退出琅琊剑阁，沦落江湖。

original: Now that the ten-year period has passed, the master has ordered me to find Brother Dachui and persuade him to return to the sect.
context: 如今十年之期已过，家师命我找寻大锤师兄，并劝其重返师门。

original: How confident are you in persuading him to return to the Langya Sword Pavilion?
context: 你觉得劝他返回琅琊剑阁的把握有多大？

original: Before leaving, my master once said that Big Hammer Senior Brother is proud and arrogant. Even if he admits his mistake in his heart, he won't admit it verbally. He has already announced his withdrawal from Langya Sword Pavilion, so he probably won't go back easily now.
context: 临行前家师曾说，大锤师兄心高气傲，即便心里认错，嘴上却不肯让人半步。他对外既已言明退出琅琊剑阁，此时想必不会轻易回去。

original: What if I can persuade him to wander the rivers and lakes with me, and then visit your sect in the name of accompanying me, can this indirectly achieve the goal?
context: 如果我能劝服他跟我一同闯荡江湖，然后以陪同我拜访的名义前往你的师门，这样是否可以间接达到目的？

original: Good idea, I'll leave this matter to you.
context: 妙计，此事就拜托在兄台身上了。

original: However, there's no benefit for me if this matter is successful, I think I'd better forget it.
context: 不过，此事做成对我也没什么好处，我看还是算了吧。

original: If you can make this happen, I will recommend you to join Langya Sword Pavilion in front of my master, how about that?
context: 你若促成此事，我在家师面前保举你加入琅琊剑阁如何？

original: Cut it out, if I want to join any sect, do I need someone else's recommendation? Besides, what's so good about joining Langya Sword Pavilion, why should I join you?
context:
切，我要是想入什么门派还用得到别人保举？
何况，加入琅琊剑阁有什么好，我为什么要加入你们？

original: Nowadays, three or four out of ten divine weapons, Sharp, that appear in the martial arts world are from the Sword Pavilion. Therefore, as long as the disciples of the Sword Pavilion do not make Nemesis when they go out into the martial arts world, other sects will mostly give some face to the disciples of the Sword Pavilion.
context: 如今江湖上现世的神兵利器，十有三四皆是出自剑阁。因此凡是剑阁弟子外出行走江湖，只要不是结下死仇，其他门派大多会给剑阁弟子几分面子。

original: Langya Sword Pavilion recruits disciples widely, not only teaching swordsmanship, but also teaching the method of forging divine weapons Sharp. The mine in the back mountain of our sect is rich in resources, inexhaustible and inexhaustible, which is convenient for the disciples to practice forging.
context: 琅琊剑阁广纳门徒，不但传授剑术，更传授打造神兵利器的手段。本门后山之中矿产丰富，取之不竭用之不穷，正可方便门下弟子练习打造之术。

original: My master also has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>Ten Thousand Swords</color>, the so-called ten thousand swords come out, all evils are easy to avoid! This unique skill is never passed on to outsiders, only to outstanding disciples of our sect.
context: 家师还有有一门名为<color=#c44b0e>万剑归宗</color>的绝招，所谓万剑既出群邪辟易！此绝招从不外传，只会传给本门杰出弟子。

original: Having a face when going out, being a survival expert, and being invincible in fights! Isn't this the sect I've been dreaming of!
context:
外出有面、谋生有道、打架无敌！
——这不正是我梦寐以求的门派吗！

original: Senior Brother, please accept my salute!
context: 师兄在上，请受师弟一拜！

original: First help me invite Big Hammer Senior Brother. I can only <color=#c44b0e>stay here for two days</color>, you have to hurry up.
context:
先帮我邀请到大锤师兄再说吧。
我在此只能<color=#c44b0e>逗留两天</color>，你可要抓紧时间。

original: I didn't expect you to really invite Big Hammer Senior Brother!
context: 想不到你真把大锤师兄邀请到了！

original: If you are ready, I will take you to <color=#c44b0e>Langya Sword Pavilion</color>.
context: 你若准备好了，我就带你们一同动身前往<color=#c44b0e>琅琊剑阁</color>。

original: Why haven't you succeeded yet? You need to hurry up!
context:
怎么还没有成功吗？
你要尽快啊！

original: I'm ready! <color=#c44b0e>【Join the Sect】</color>
context: 准备好了！<color=#c44b0e>【拜入门派】</color>

original: Wait a moment.
context: 稍等片刻。

original: You set off for Langya Sword Pavilion...
context: 你们一行人动身前往琅琊剑阁……

original: I didn't expect to come back here in my lifetime...
context: 想不到我有生之年还能再回到这里……

original: Weren't you unwilling to come back?
context: 你不是不愿意回来吗？

original: Don't talk to me, I want to catch up with these old friends.
context: 别跟我说话，我要跟这些老朋友叙叙旧。

original: Let's go, I'll take you to see the master.
context: 走吧，我带你去见家师。

original: Master, I have fulfilled my mission and finally invited Big Hammer Senior Brother back.
context: 禀报师父，幸不辱命，终于把大锤师兄请回来了。

original: It's good to be back, it's good to be back. I thought I would never see him again in my lifetime.
context:
回来就好，回来就好。
老夫还以为这辈子再也见不到他了。

original: Thanks to the young hero {PlayerSurName} for helping Big Hammer Senior Brother return to the sect.
context: 大锤师兄能够重返师门，多亏了{PlayerSurName}少侠一旁协助。

original: I think the young hero {PlayerSurName} is a promising talent. As the Sword Pavilion needs people, I beg the master to accept the young hero {PlayerSurName} into the sect.
context: 弟子认为{PlayerSurName}少侠是可塑之才，适逢剑阁用人之际，恳请师父将{PlayerSurName}少侠收录门墙。

original: Junior {PlayerName}, meet the senior.
context: 晚辈{PlayerName}，见过前辈。

original: Well, I am Jian Chi, the master of Langya Sword Pavilion. Since Heng'er vouches for you, I will make an exception and accept you as a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
context:
唔，老夫便是这琅琊剑阁的阁主——剑痴。
既然恒儿为你作保，老夫便破例收你为琅琊剑阁的弟子。

original: Disciple {PlayerName}, meet the master!
context: 弟子{PlayerName}，拜见阁主！

original: Good, very good!
context: 好，甚好！

original: From today, {PlayerName} is a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion!
context: 今日起，{PlayerName}便是琅琊剑阁门下弟子了！

original: Looking at your outstanding talent, you are no less than my few direct disciples. The rise and fall of Langya Sword Pavilion in the future will all depend on you young people.
context:
以你出色资质来看，丝毫不逊色老夫那几名亲传弟子。
琅琊剑阁日后的兴衰荣辱就全依赖你们这些年轻人了。

original: I will definitely not let down the expectations of the Pavilion Master!
context: 弟子定当不会辜负阁主的期望！

original: I don't have much time left here. Once the time comes, I must run away immediately. Don't blame me for leaving without saying goodbye.
context: 我留在此地的时间不多了，一到时间我须得即刻离开，到时可别怪我不辞而别。

original: Senior brother, our sect's ability to <color=#c44b0e>forge weapons</color> is legendary in the martial arts world. When will I be able to learn it?
context: 师兄，咱们门派<color=#c44b0e>打造兵器</color>的本事在江湖上传的神乎其技，不知我何时才能学到？

original: What's so difficult about that? I'll teach you.
context: 这有何难，我教你便是。

original: Ouye Heng taught you the unique forging method of Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 欧冶恒把琅琊剑阁独特的打造之法传授给你。

original:
I can only teach you to this extent. Here are some blueprints for you to study carefully.
The rest depends on your daily practice and continuous honing of your skills.
context:
我只能教你到这种程度了，给你这几份图纸仔细参详吧。
余下只能靠你平日勤加练习，从中不断磨练自身技艺了。

original: As the saying goes, practice makes perfect. Any skill can be turned from decay to magic when practiced to the extreme.
context: 所谓熟能生巧，任何技艺练到极致都能化腐朽为神奇。

original: A journey of a hundred miles is half over at ninety. If you leave the pavilion now, all your hard work will be in vain.
context: 行百里者半于九十，你此番退出本阁，多时辛苦可就功亏一篑了。

original: If you leave Langya Sword Pavilion, you will have nothing to do with the pavilion. Not only will the sect token <color=#c44b0e>Black iron token</color> be taken back, but also the sect talent <color=#c44b0e>Weapon expert</color> and Sect contribution will be erased. Think twice before you act.
context: 退出琅琊剑阁，从此剑阁上下与你将再无半点瓜葛，不但门派信物<color=#c44b0e>玄铁令牌</color>会收回，就连本门天赋<color=#c44b0e>兵器亲和</color>以及门派贡献也会一并抹去，你可要三思而行。

original: I've already decided! <color=#097a76>(Return the Black iron token)</color>
context: 我心意已决！<color=#097a76>（交还玄铁令牌）</color>

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original:
Since you are so determined, from now on, you are no longer a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
All past feelings are written off!
context:
既然你执意如此，从今往后你便不再是琅琊剑阁的弟子。
往日旧情一笔勾销！

original: Alas! Since you give up the identity of the young master of the pavilion, I will not stop you.
context: 唉！既然你放弃少阁主的身份，老夫便不再阻拦。

original: However, the <color=#c44b0e>Black iron token</color> needs to be taken back!
context: 不过<color=#c44b0e>玄铁令牌</color>需要收回！

original: In that case, you can go!
context: 既然如此，你走吧！

original: The Sword Pavilion never forces anyone to stay, but you can't return the <color=#c44b0e>Black iron token</color>.
context: 剑阁从不强留任何人，但你无法交还<color=#c44b0e>玄铁令牌</color>。

original: Your relationship with Langya Sword Pavilion will decrease!
context: 你与琅琊剑阁关系将会降低！

original: Already decided! <color=#097a76>(Relationship with Langya Sword Pavilion drops to -20)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#097a76>（与琅琊剑阁关系降至-20）</color>

original: Think about it again
context: 再考虑下

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original: I haven't seen such a courageous young man in a long time. Dare you say it again?
context: 老夫很久没有见识到如此有胆识的年轻人了，你敢再说一遍吗？

original: Destroy Langya Sword Pavilion! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 消灭琅琊剑阁！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: I've heard a lot of arrogant words in my life, but most people don't get a chance to say them a second time.
context: 老夫这一生不知听过多少狂言妄语，不过大多数人说过之后便不再有机会说第二遍了。

original: Young man, the more you talk, the more mistakes you make. Your life is just a thought away from me.
context: 年轻人，言多必失，你的性命只在你我一念之间。

original: Arrogant fool!
context: 狂妄之辈！

original: Let me see what makes you dare to destroy my Langya Sword Pavilion!
context: 就让老夫见识下，你这小辈究竟有什么底气敢来灭老夫的琅琊剑阁！

original:
The only way out now is to kill...
I will make you bandits accompany Langya Sword Pavilion in death!
context:
如今之计，唯有以杀止杀……
老夫要叫你们这帮狂徒为琅琊剑阁陪葬！

original: Ten thousand swords return...
<size=300%><color=#E3170D>Sect!!!</color></size>
context: <size=300%><color=#E3170D>宗！！！</color></size>

original:
The sword intent engulfs you in an instant, your vision goes blank, and your hands keep swinging.
The surroundings are silent, and your connection with the world seems to be severed.
After a while, you realize that your consciousness is still there, you take a long breath, you are still alive.
The ultimate skill that Jian Chi burned to the last HP did not cause you a Finishing Strike.
Generations have changed, and the glorious era of Jian Chi has come to an end in your hands.
context:
剑意瞬间将你吞没，你的眼前一片空白，双手不住地挥动。
周围一片寂静，你与世界的链接似乎都被斩断。
片刻之后你才察觉自己的意识尚在，长舒一口气，你还活着。
剑痴燃尽最后生命绽放的毕生绝学最终没有对你造成致命一击。
世代更替，属于剑痴的辉煌时代在你的手中宣告终结。

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Langya Sword Pavilion, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>琅琊剑阁，覆灭！</color></size>

original:
{PlayerName}, is this the path you chose?
Sorry, I can't agree!
context:
{PlayerName}，这就是你选择的道路吗？
抱歉，我无法认同！

original: Today, with my sword, I salute you, a person I once admired.
context: 今天用我的剑，敬你这位曾经让我钦佩的故人。

original: Too strong! The best plan is to run!
context: 太强了！三十六计走为上策!

original: Test
context: 考验

original: {PlayerName}, you have been in my sword pavilion for some time, today I will give you a special test.
context: {PlayerName}，你加入老夫剑阁已经有些时日了，今天对你进行一项特别的考验。

original: If you are ready, come to me to take the test.
context: 若是准备好了，就来找老夫参加考验吧。

original: Ask about the test.
context: 询问考验相关情况。

original: Participate in the test.<color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 参加考验。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: The way of the test is for you to face the four disciples of this sect alone. If you can beat them by yourself, you will pass the test.
context: 考验的方式是你独自面对本门的四名弟子，你若凭一己之力打赢他们，就算通过了考验。

original: Only by passing this test will you become a true disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion!
context: 你只有通过了这次考验，才会成为琅琊剑阁的真正弟子！

original: As a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion, you will comprehend the unique talent of our sect, <color=#c44b0e>Weapon expert</color>!
context: 成为琅琊剑阁弟子，你将会领悟本门独有天赋<color=#c44b0e>兵器亲和</color>！

original: Don't let me down!
context: 莫要叫老夫失望！

original:
Indeed extraordinary!
It seems that Langya Sword Pavilion has a successor.
context:
果然不凡！
看来琅琊剑阁的传承后继有人了。

original: Don't be arrogant if you win, don't be discouraged if you lose. Since you lost, go down and practice hard, and then come to compete.
context: 胜不骄败不馁，既然输了，下去用心磨练一番，再来比试吧。

original: The Langya Sword Pavilion has a rule that new disciples must pass the test arranged by the old man to truly become a disciple of the Sword Pavilion. Your current strength is too weak, wait until you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 25</color> to talk.
context: 琅琊剑阁有一条规矩，新入剑阁的弟子需得通过老夫安排的考验才能真正成为剑阁弟子。你如今实力太弱，等你升到<color=#c44b0e>25级</color>再说吧。

original: During this time, you can spar with the <color=#c44b0e>practice disciple</color> of our pavilion to quickly improve your own level.
context: 这段时间你可以去找本门的<color=#c44b0e>练功弟子</color>切磋较量，尽快提升自己的等级。

original: Suspicious person
context: 可疑之人

original: Suspicious
context: 可疑

original: Find all suspicious people in Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 在琅琊剑阁找出全部形迹可疑之人。

original: Inform the pavilion master, Jian Chi, of the progress of the matter.
context: 将事情进展告知阁主·剑痴。

original: Come back to Jian Chi for a task when you reach level 35.
context: 等级达到35级再来找剑痴领取任务。

original: You can now go to Jian Chi to accept the task of investigating suspicious people.
context: 现在可以去找剑痴接受调查可疑之人的任务了。

original: {PlayerName}, there have been suspicious people lurking among the disciples of our pavilion recently. The old man orders you to find them all within <color=#c44b0e>two shichen</color> to prevent the Sword Pavilion from suffering unexpected events. Remember, don't miss any corner, including the back mountain.
context: {PlayerName}，本阁近来时有形迹可疑之人混迹众弟子之中，老夫命你<color=#c44b0e>两个时辰内</color>将他们全部找出，以免使剑阁遭受不测。记住，任何角落都不要错过，包括后山。

original: Master, are there any clues about these people? Where should I start to find them?
context: 阁主，请问这些人有什么线索吗？我该从那里入手将他们找出来？

original: Since these people have a plot, their walking routes in the sect must be abnormal. Pay close attention and you will find clues.
context: 这些人既然有所图谋，在门派内的行走路线一定有悖常理，仔细留意定可发现端倪。

original: Also, listen to the disciples' self-talk, and you may find Vulnerable from it.
context: 另外，聆听弟子们的自言自语，从中或许也可发现破绽。

original: This Weapon Pavilion is hard to get into...|This old guy Jian Chi is really old and dim-sighted.|What to do... what to do...|I haven't got it yet... how can I explain this...|Take a little more is a little more.|I look left and right, up and down.|These rubbish disciples are all idiots.|Not being discovered... very good.
context: 这藏兵阁不好进啊……|剑痴这老家伙真是老眼昏花。|怎么办……怎么办……|还没有得手……这可如何交代……|多拿一点是一点。|我左看右看上看下看。|这些垃圾弟子全是蠢货。|没有被发现……很好。

original: (Is this person confirmed to be the suspicious person who sneaked into Langya Sword Pavilion?)
context: （是否确认此人便是混进琅琊剑阁的可疑之人？）

original: Confirm! <color=#097a76>(Protagonist solo)</color>
context: 确定！<color=#097a76>（主角单挑）</color>

original: Not sure.
context: 不确定。

original: Stop pretending, I have discovered your true identity!
context: 别装了，我已经发现你的真实身份了！

original: Junior brother, what are you looking for me for?
context: 师弟，你找我做什么？

original: If I don't give you some hardship, I'm afraid you won't admit it.
context: 不给你吃点苦头，恐怕是不会承认了。

original: Fighting with fellow disciples will be expelled from the sect, have you forgotten!
context: 同门相残是要逐出师门的，你忘了吗！

original: It seems to be a mistake...
context: 好像搞错了……

original: Hehe, junior brother, I'm just joking with you, please don't mind.
context: 嘿嘿，师弟这是跟你开玩笑呢，请别介意。

original: Hmph!
context: 哼！

original: This move, how is it our sect's martial arts...
context: 这招式，怎么是本门的功夫……

original: Fighting with fellow disciples will be expelled from the sect, have you forgotten!
context: 同门相残是要逐出师门的，你忘了吗！

original: Don't blame me for being rude if you continue to act recklessly.
context: 你再要胡来，可别怪我对你不客气。

original: How did you discover my disguise?
context: 我伪装的这么好，你是怎么发现我的？

original: I guessed right, it wasn't a waste of time after all.
context: 果然猜对了，总算没有浪费时间。

original: You just guessed...
context: 你竟然是猜的……

original: Surrender now!
context: 束手就擒吧！

original: I'm done playing with you!
context: 老子不跟你玩了！

original: Run, he ran away...
context: 跑，跑了……

original: I'm done playing with you!
context: 老子不跟你玩了！

original: Run, he ran away...
context: 跑，跑了……

original: Could these three be all the suspicious people who infiltrated the Sword Pavilion?
context: 难道这三个家伙就是潜入剑阁的所有可疑之人？

original: I should inform the Pavilion Master about this.
context: 我把此事先告诉阁主吧。

original: Senior Jian Chi, your disciples have been lured away by us, do you really think you can handle us alone?
context: 剑痴前辈，你的弟子都已经被我们调虎离山了，你真以为凭你一人之力能对付我们几个？

original: You few are not worthy of my action.
context: 凭你们几个，还不配叫老夫出手。

original: Such arrogance!
context: 大言不惭！

original: The arrogant one is you.
context: 大言不惭的是你。

original: So it's you!
context: 原来是你！

original:
What a pity, you were so close to ruining our plan.
It seems that the heavens are no longer watching over your Langya Sword Pavilion.
context:
可惜啊，差一点就让你破坏我们计划了。
看来老天爷也不庇佑你们琅琊剑阁了。

original:
So it's you guys who infiltrated the Sword Pavilion, as expected, you're no good.
Since you're all gathered here, it saves me the trouble of finding you one by one.
context:
原来是你们几个潜入剑阁，果然不是什么好东西。
既然你们难得聚在一起，正好省的我费力挨个找你们了。

original: {PlayerName}, these are people from <color=#c44b0e>Dragonfly City</color>, don't let any of them escape.
context: {PlayerName}，这些是<color=#c44b0e>蚍蜉城</color>的人，一个也不要放走。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Speak, what is your purpose for infiltrating the Sword Pavilion?
context: 说，你们潜入剑阁有什么图谋？

original: Victors and losers, don't expect to get a word out of me!
context: 成王败寇，休想从我嘴里问出一个字！

original: Uh...

I didn't expect him to commit suicide by poison.
These people from Dragonfly City are so decisive, they are not to be underestimated.
context:
想不到服毒自尽了。
这些蚍蜉城之人做事如此果决，实在是不容小觑。

original: Master, rest assured, no matter how many of these characters come, we will eliminate them all.
context: 阁主请放心，这种角色自然是来多少弟子就灭多少。

original: {PlayerName}, I didn't expect your skills to improve so much, it's time to learn this technique.
context: {PlayerName}，想不到你的功力精进如斯，是时候修炼这门功法了。

original: This is the top internal skill that I relied on to make my name. If you can master our sect's unique skill in the future, the two will complement each other, and there will be few opponents in the world.
context: 这是老夫赖以成名的顶级内功心法，将来你若学成本门的镇派绝招，两者相得益彰，普天之下恐怕再没几人是你的敌手了。

original: Thank you for your kindness, Master!
context: 多谢阁主厚爱！

original: We can't stay here for long, retreat first!
context: 此地已不可久留，先行撤退！

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Want to leave? Stay!
context: 想走？留下吧！

original: Aerial Sword Qi, is just so-so!
context: 凌空剑气，也不过如此！

original: What is your intention for infiltrating the Sword Pavilion?
context: 你们潜入剑阁究竟有什么企图？

original: A defeated general, don't expect to get a word out of me!
context: 手下败将，休想从我嘴里问出一个字！

original: Uh...

I didn't expect him to commit suicide by poison.
These people from Dragonfly City are so decisive, they are not to be underestimated.
context:
想不到服毒自尽了。
这些蚍蜉城之人做事如此果决，实在是不容小觑。

original: {PlayerName}, there are many dangers in the martial arts world. If you don't have strong personal strength, it's hard to stand for long. You must strive for strength in the future.
context: {PlayerName}，江湖多风波，若非自身实力强悍，难以长久立足，往后你可要奋发图强了。

original: I will follow the Master's teachings.
context: 谨遵阁主教诲。

original: Today's matter is over, go rest.
context: 今日之事已了，下去休息吧。

original: The time agreed by the Master has passed, I should go and report the progress to him.
context: 阁主约定的时间已过，我先去把事情进展告知阁主吧。

original: They are using a trick to lure the tiger away from the mountain, to get our disciples far away, so they can act conveniently. I will use their plan against them, let the disciples go and investigate, leaving me here alone, just to bait them.
context: 他们这是调虎离山的花招，要把本门弟子都远远调开，方便他们行事。老夫便将计就计，叫弟子们主动前去追查，使老夫这里形成空门，专钓鱼儿上钩。

original: Isn't the Master putting himself in danger by doing this?
context: 阁主这样做岂不是将自己置身险地？

original: Just a few thieves from Dragonfly City, I don't take them seriously. But what they are trying to do this time, I'm afraid it's hard to figure out.
context: 几个蚍蜉城的毛贼而已，老夫还未放在眼里。只是他们此番究竟意欲何为，怕是无法得知了。

original: {PlayerName}, you've worked hard too, go rest, you don't need to worry about this anymore.
context: {PlayerName}，你也辛苦了，回去休息吧，此事不必再管了。

original: Yes.
context: 是。

original: Recently, there have been suspicious individuals lurking around this pavilion. I originally planned to assign you to investigate this matter. However, your skills are too weak to undertake this task. Let's wait until your strength improves further.
context: 本阁近来时有形迹可疑之人混迹其中，老夫原本打算安排你去调查此事。怎奈你功力浅薄无法担当此任，还是等你实力更进一步再说吧。

original: Forge Sword
context: 铸剑

original: Forge Sword
context: 铸剑

original: Train your Craft Weapon Skill to <color=#c44b0e>Master</color>.
context: 把打造武器能力练到<color=#c44b0e>登峰造极</color>。

original: Ask Jian Chi what he wants to tell.
context: 找剑痴询问要交代何事。

original: Forge a <color=#c44b0e>Xuanyuan</color> sword.
context: 打造出<color=#c44b0e>轩辕</color>。

original: Inform Jian Chi of the result.
context: 找剑痴告知结果。

original: Our sect's weapon forging technique is unparalleled in the world, yet you have made no progress in this area. As my disciple, isn't it a shame for other sects to laugh at my teaching?
context: 本门打造兵器的手段天下无双，你在这上面却毫无建树，作为老夫的传人岂非让其他门派耻笑老夫教徒无方。

original: When you have mastered the skill of forging weapons to the level of <color=#c44b0e>Master</color>, I have an important task to entrust to you.
context: 待你把打造兵器的本事练到<color=#c44b0e>登峰造极</color>，老夫有一件要事需交待给你。

original: Don't disturb me again until you reach Master.
context: 未达到登峰造极之前不要再来打扰老夫了。

original: Sect leader, I have finally mastered the art of forging to the level of Master.
context: 阁主，弟子幸不辱命，终于把打造练至登峰造极了。

original: Good, good, good!
context: 好，好，好！

original: I once promised that if any disciple could forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword, he would be the successor of the Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 老夫昔日曾经允诺，门下弟子中若有人能打造出轩辕神剑，将是琅琊剑阁日后继任者。

original: Now that your weapon forging skills have reached perfection, you can try to forge this Xuanyuan Divine Sword.
context: 如今你打造兵器的水平已经臻之大成，已经可以试试能否造出这柄轩辕神剑了。

original: {PlayerName}, go and forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword, don't keep me waiting too long.
context: {PlayerName}，去把轩辕神剑打造出来，不要让老夫等得太久。

original: The materials needed to forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword are not cheap, you need to solve it yourself, I can't help.
context: 打造轩辕神剑所需材料不菲，你需得自己设法解决，老夫也是爱莫能助了。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Xuanyuan</color> is here, please take a look, sect leader!
context: <color=#c44b0e>轩辕</color>在此，请阁主一览！

original: What, you actually forged Xuanyuan?
context: 什么，你竟然真打造出轩辕了？

original: It is indeed the Xuanyuan Divine Sword!
context: 果然是轩辕神剑！

original: Today is a great joy for the Langya Sword Pavilion, it's a great joy in decades!
context: 今天真是琅琊剑阁的大喜事，简直是几十年来天大的喜事！

original: {PlayerName}, I keep my word, I plan to make you the next leader of the Langya Sword Pavilion, what do you think?
context: {PlayerName}，老夫言而有信，打算让你成为琅琊剑阁下一任的阁主，你意下如何？

original: (Once you become the next leader, you will be bound to the Langya Sword Pavilion for life, do you agree?)
context: （一旦成为下任阁主，这辈子就和琅琊剑阁绑定了，是否同意呢？）

original: <color=#0574a8>Agree to become the next leader!</color>
context: <color=#0574a8>同意成为下一任阁主！</color>

original: I don't want to be the next leader
context: 不愿意成为下一任阁主

original: You refuse something that everyone wants?!!
context: 众人求之不得的事情，你竟然拒绝？！！

original: I'm sorry, I can't accept the sect leader's love.
context: 承蒙阁主错爱，弟子实难从命。

original: I aspire to travel and gain knowledge, I'm afraid I can't shoulder the heavy responsibility of the sect leader.
context: 弟子志在四方，今后恐怕要去四处游历增长见闻，实在难以肩负阁主的重任。

original: Well, alright... I won't force you.
context:
唉，好吧……
老夫不会让你为难的。

original: Even though you refuse to accept the position of the next sect leader, you should still accept the reward you deserve.
context: 你虽然不肯接受下任阁主职位，但是应当给你的奖励你还是要收下的。

original: {PlayerName}, today I will pass on the sect's ultimate technique - Ten Thousand Swords to you, remember it!
context: {PlayerName}，老夫今日便把镇派绝招——万剑归宗传授给你，你可要记住了！

original: Thank you for your teaching, sect leader!
context: 多谢阁主授艺！

original: Send a message, summon all disciples to gather in the main hall, I have something to announce!
context: 传令，召众弟子齐聚大殿，老夫有事宣布！

original: Today, I want to announce a matter concerning the hundred-year heritage of the Langya Sword Pavilion in front of all disciples...
context: 今天老夫要当着所有弟子的面，宣布一件事关琅琊剑阁百年传承的大事……

original: Your junior brother, {PlayerName}, although he joined the sect last, he has worked hard and has a unique talent, he has far surpassed you in forging weapons.
context: 你们的小师弟，{PlayerName}，虽然入门最晚，但是勤能补拙，再加上天赋异禀，他已在打造兵器一途上远超各位。

original: I once said that whoever can forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword by hand will be the successor of the Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 老夫曾经说过，谁能亲手打造出轩辕神剑，便是琅琊剑阁的继任者。

original: Now, Xuanyuan has appeared, and it was {PlayerName} who did it alone!
context: 如今，轩辕已经现世，是{PlayerName}独自亲力而为！

original: This can't be true
context: 这不是真的吧

original: How is it possible
context: 怎么可能

original: Has he reached Master level?
context: 他已经登峰造极了吗？

original: Did someone help him?
context: 莫非有人帮他？

original: Among you, there may be those who question, those who are unconvinced, those who feel...
context: 你们这些人中可能会有人质疑，有人不服，有人感概……

original: But what can that change? The fact is so, seeing is believing!
context: 那又能改变什么呢？事实如此，眼见为实！

original: Today, I hereby announce {PlayerName} as the next Pavilion Master of Langya Sword Pavilion. After my hundred years, he can officially take over. All disciples must not defy my command!
context: 老夫今日，便宣布{PlayerName}为琅琊剑阁下任阁主，待老夫百年之后，便可正式接任。所有弟子不得违逆吾命！

original: {PlayerName}, today I will pass on the sect's ultimate technique - Ten Thousand Swords to you, remember it!
context: {PlayerName}，老夫今日便把镇派绝招——万剑归宗传授给你，你可要记住了！

original: Thank you for your teaching, sect leader!
context: 多谢阁主授艺！

original: Congratulations, junior brother!
context: 恭喜师弟！

original: Congratulations, young Pavilion Master!
context: 恭喜少阁主！

original: {PlayerName}, as the next Pavilion Master, you have a superior status in the pavilion, and there is actually another privilege...
context: {PlayerName}，你身为下任阁主，在阁内地位超然，其实还有一项特权……

original: Our pavilion's forbidden area - the Weapon Pavilion, you can enter and exit at will, and most of the weapons inside are at your disposal.
context: 本阁禁地——藏兵阁，你可随意出入，里面大部分武器你都有权支配。

original: Who's there?
context: 来者何人？

original: I am {PlayerName}, a new disciple who has recently joined the Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 在下{PlayerName}，是新近加入琅琊剑阁的弟子。

original: So it's the junior brother, what brings you to the Weapon Pavilion today?
context: 原来是小师弟，今天怎么有兴致来藏兵阁了？

original: Request identity of the other party.
context: 请教对方身份。

original: Ask the senior brother for martial arts training. <color=#097a76>(Stamina 20, specific battle)</color>
context: 向师兄讨教武功。<color=#097a76>（体力20，特定战斗）</color>

original: Request information about the Weapon Pavilion.
context: 请教有关藏兵阁的讯息。

original: Excuse me, Run away.
context: 告辞离开。

original: What does the junior brother want to do in the Weapon Pavilion today?
context: 小师弟今天想来藏兵阁做什么？

original: I am Dugu Jianyi, the current chief disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 我乃琅琊剑阁现任首席大弟子——独孤剑一是也。

original: Now I am ordered to guard the Weapon Pavilion, and at the same time bear the heavy responsibility of testing the martial arts level of the junior brothers.
context: 如今奉命看守藏兵阁，同时肩负检验诸位师弟武功水平的重责。

original: Junior brother, if you have nothing to do, you can come and compete with me.
context: 小师弟，你若闲来无事，可找师兄比试一番。

original: When the master was young, he was rarely defeated. The weapons stored here are the ones that the master confiscated after defeating his opponents, which made them famous.
context: 师父年轻时罕逢敌手，此处存放的便是师父击败对手后，收缴的对方赖以成名的兵器。

original: The real divine weapons in this Weapon Pavilion are actually the three swords treasured in the pavilion. These three swords are ancient divine weapons, and it took the master a lot of effort to bring them back to the world.
context: 这藏兵阁里真正意义上的神兵利器，其实是阁内珍藏的三柄剑。这三柄剑乃是上古神兵，师父可是费老大力气才使其重见天日。

original: These weapons are just left here to gather dust, isn't it a waste?
context: 这些兵器就一直放在这里蒙尘，岂不是暴敛天物吗？

original: These are the memories and peak power evidence of the master when he was young, they are of extraordinary significance...
context: 这是师父老人家年轻时的回忆和巅峰战力的见证，意义非凡……

original: However, there are exceptions. The next successor of Langya Sword Pavilion has the right to dispose of these weapons at will. However, it is extremely difficult to get into the master's eyes!
context: 不过事有例外，琅琊剑阁的下代继任者，他有权随意支配这些兵器。不过，想入师父的法眼，实在难上加难！

original: The junior brother is the most understanding, knowing that I am bored here, and specially came to accompany me.
context: 还是小师弟最善解人意，知道我在此呆着无聊，特意来陪我解闷。

original: So refreshing!
context: 好痛快！

original:
But with so many people rushing up, my exquisite moves can't be used.
Junior brother, let's have a one-on-one competition again.
context:
不过这么多人一拥而上，师兄的精妙招式派不上用场。
小师弟，咱们单对单再来较量一番。

original: It's so cool, I haven't had such a hearty fight for a long time!
context: 太爽了，好久没这么酣畅淋漓的打一架了！

original: Hehe, junior brother, go and practice your swordsmanship for a few more years before coming to compete with me.
context: 嘿嘿，小师弟，再去练几年剑法再来找师兄比试吧。

original: Junior brother, your foreplay is too short, I haven't enjoyed it yet!
context: 小师弟，你这前戏太短了，我可还没尽兴呢！

original: I am {PlayerName}, I have long admired the Weapon Pavilion, and I came to visit today.
context: 在下{PlayerName}，对藏兵阁向往已久，今日特来观摩一番。

original:
I am Dugu Jianyi, ordered to guard this place.
The Weapon Pavilion is a forbidden place in our sect, and no one is allowed to enter without the Pavilion Master's permission!
context:
我是独孤剑一，奉命看守此地。
藏兵阁是本门禁地，非阁主许可不得擅入！

original: Force your way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
context: 硬闯！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Excuse me, Run away.
context: 告辞离开。

original: It seems that you are determined to be an enemy of Langya Sword Pavilion!
context: 看来你是执意要与琅琊剑阁为敌了！

original: Now the divine weapons in this Weapon Pavilion are going to change their surname to {PlayerSurName}!
context: 现在这藏兵阁里的神兵利器都要改姓{PlayerSurName}了！

original:
What are you doing here again?
The Weapon Pavilion is a forbidden place in our sect, and no one is allowed to enter without the Pavilion Master's permission!
context:
你又来做什么？
藏兵阁是本门禁地，非阁主许可不得擅入！

original: This is not a place where you can come and go at will, please Run away.
context: 这里不是你能随意乱进的地方，还请离开。

original: Stop!
context: 站住！

original: This is a forbidden place in the Sword Pavilion, and non-sect disciples are not allowed to enter!
context: 此处乃是剑阁禁地，非本门弟子不得擅入！

original:
Rats, dare to harm the disciples of our pavilion and trespass into our pavilion's forbidden area!
This is really unforgivable!
context:
鼠辈，竟敢戗害本阁弟子，擅入本阁禁地！
实在罪不可赦！

original:
Old man, your era is over!
Langya Sword Pavilion no longer has any reason to exist.
context:
老家伙，你的时代已经结束了！
琅琊剑阁已经没有什么存在的必要了。

original: The best strategy is to retreat!
context: 三十六计走为上策！

original: The sect has been destroyed, and now I have become a <color=#c44b0e>clanless</color> person.
context: 门派已经覆灭，如今我又成了<color=#c44b0e>无门无派</color>之人。

original: Wow! It smells so good!
context: 哇！好香！

original: It seems like there are footsteps over there!
context: 好像那边有脚步声！

original: Oh no, someone is coming!
context: 不好有人来了！

original: Please don't let it be the leader...
context: 千万别是大当家的……

original: Shut up, you jinx!
context: 乌鸦嘴少说话！

original: {yell}Who goes there!
context: {yell}来者何人！

original: Hmm? It's you two!
context: 嗯？居然是你们两个！

original: So it's Brother {PlayerSurName}!
context: 原来是{PlayerSurName}兄！

original: It's our benefactor!
context: 是恩公啊！

original: You scared us, we thought it was the leader!
context: 吓死我们了，以为是当家的来了！

original: You guys are slacking off instead of guarding the gate...
context: 你们不好好看门在这里偷懒……

original: It seems like the smell is coming from the forest over here!
context: 好像是这边的林子里散发的味道！

original:
How is that possible, aren't we hungry?
How can we protect the stronghold without a full stomach!
context:
怎么可能，我们这不是饿了吗，
不吃饱了肚子如何保护山寨的安危！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: Brother {PlayerSurName}, would you like to join us for a bite?
context: {PlayerSurName}兄要不要一起吃一点？

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: {yell} Damn it! Are you sick again? You're always agreeing!
context: {yell}奶奶的！你又犯病了是不是！天天就是就是个屁！

original: Let me go in and take a look!
context: 待我进去瞧上一瞧！

original: Haha, big brother, you found a good place!
context: 哈哈，大哥你找到个好地方啊！

original: Humph! Keep it down!
context: 哼！小点声！

original: Can't even shut your mouth with food, can you?
context: 吃也堵不上你的嘴是嘛？

original: Yes, yes, yes!
context: 能能能！

original: Big...big...big brother!
context: 大……大……大哥！

original: What now? Didn't I tell you to keep quiet?
context: 又怎么了？不是告诉你别多话吗？

original: Then I won't be polite!
context: 那我就不客气了！

original: Thank you for your hospitality, it feels so good to be full!
context: 谢谢你们的招待，吃饱的感觉真好啊！

original: Not at all.
context: 哪里哪里。

original: We eat here at this time every day.
context: 我们每天这个点儿都会在这吃东西。

original: If the young hero doesn't mind, you can join us for meals and drinks anytime.
context: 少侠若是不嫌弃，有时间都可以来一起吃饭喝酒。

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: We're going back to guard the gate, please make yourself at home.
context: 我们回去看大门了，少侠请自便吧

original: I'm really sorry!
context: 真是不好意思！

original: I have some things to take care of!
context: 在下手头儿还有点事儿要忙！

original: I appreciate your kindness!
context: 你们的好意我心领了！

original: In that case, there's only one way up the mountain.
context: 既然如此，上山的路只有一条。

original: I assume the young hero came here to deal with something at Blue Wind Camp.
context: 想必少侠来此处应该是到我青风寨有事处理。

original: We'll go and clear the way for you!
context: 我们兄弟俩这就去为少侠开路！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: Thank you very much!
context: 那就有劳了！

original: Hmm? Who are you two?
context: 嗯？你们两个是谁？

original: Breaking into Blue Wind Camp in the middle of the night, I think you're tired of living!
context: 半夜擅闯青风寨，我看你你是活腻歪了！

original: This guy is really weak!
context: 这家伙还真是差劲！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: He fell down after a few hits.
context: 没打几下就趴下了。

original: Let's go!
context: 我们走！

original: Well...we'll take advantage of your kindness, but you have to consider our situation!
context: 这……我们就客气下，恩人你也得看看我们的情况啊！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: We can't handle eating with you 5 times in a row!
context: 连着吃我们5次我们也遭不住啊！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: Let's call it a day, benefactor! We're going to guard the gate!
context: 恩人今天就算了吧！我们去看门了！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: Stop! This road is closed!
context: 站住！此路不通！

original: (What should I do if I want to get in?)
context: （我要想进去该怎么办呢？）

original: Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
context: 硬闯！<color=#c44b0e>（立即开战）</color>

original: I am {PlayerName}, here to visit the leader. <color=#097a76>(Fame reached level 2 Well-known)</color>
context: 在下{PlayerName}，前来拜访大当家。<color=#097a76>（名声达到2级小有名气）</color>

original: I have a Blue Wind token, can I enter? <color=#097a76>(Show Blue Wind token)</color>
context: 我有青风令牌，可以进吗？<color=#097a76>（出示青风令牌）</color>

original: Turn around and run away
context: 转身离开

original: Looking for death!
context: 找死！

original: A bunch of thieves dare to block my way, really overestimating yourselves.
context: 一伙毛贼也敢挡我的路，真是自不量力。

original:
{PlayerName}...never heard of it, definitely not a big shot.
Get out, don't think you can fool me!
context:
{PlayerName}……没听说过，一定不是什么大人物。
滚出去，别想从我这蒙混过去！

original: What an ignorant fellow.
context: 真是孤陋寡闻的家伙。

original:
{PlayerName}! You are actually {PlayerName}!!!
I've heard about your deeds long ago, and I admire you very much. I didn't expect to see you in person today!
context:
{PlayerName}！你竟然就是{PlayerName}！！！
我早就听说过您的事迹，对您十分仰慕，想不到今天见到活人了！

original: Can I enter the Blue Wind Camp now?
context: 我现在能不能进青风寨呢？

original: Of course, I wouldn't dare to stop you even if I had ten times the courage.
context: 必须能啊，借我十个胆子我也不敢挡您的驾呀。

original:
{PlayerName}! You are actually {PlayerName}!!!
I've heard about your deeds long ago, and I admire you very much. I didn't expect to see you in person today!
context:
{PlayerName}！你竟然就是{PlayerName}！！！
我早就听说过您的事迹，对您十分仰慕，想不到今天见到活人了！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: Can I enter the Blue Wind Camp now?
context: 我现在能不能进青风寨呢？

original: Of course, I wouldn't dare to stop you even if I had ten times the courage.
context: 必须能啊，借我十个胆子我也不敢挡您的驾呀。

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: Are you itching for a fight again?
context: 你又皮痒了是不是？

original: Yes, yes...
context: 就是就……

original: Brother, I was wrong.
context: 大哥我错了。

original: I don't know where you got this thing from, but even with it, I can't let outsiders come and go freely.
context: 不晓得你是从哪里拿到这玩意的，但就算有这东西，我也不能让寨外的人随意进出。

original: You should go back, don't be an eyesore here.
context: 你回去吧，不要在这里碍眼。

original: What an unreasonable fellow.
context: 真是不讲道理的家伙。

original:
You actually have this Blue Wind token!
Although you are not a brother of the camp, having this token naturally makes you our friend!
context:
你竟然有这青风令牌！
虽然你不是寨里的弟兄，但有这令牌自然也是我们的朋友！

original: Can I enter the Blue Wind Camp now?
context: 我现在能不能进青风寨呢？

original:
Brother, you really have a sense of humor.
Since we're friends, how could I stop you?
context:
兄弟，你真会说笑。
既然是朋友，怎么会阻拦你呀。

original: I don't know where you got this thing from, but even with it, I can't let outsiders come and go freely.
context: 不晓得你是从哪里拿到这玩意的，但就算有这东西，我也不能让寨外的人随意进出。

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: I'm not an outsider, this is a token given to me personally by the leader.
context: 我不是外人，这是大当家亲自给我的令牌。

original: If the token was given by the leader himself, then he is really not an outsider...
context: 要是大当家亲自给的令牌，那他就真不是外人……

original: What kind of bullshit look is that, this is clearly a fake to deceive us.
context: 什么狗屁眼神，这分明就是假货来蒙骗咱们的。

original: Yes, yes...
context: 就是就……

original: Brother, this is real... even the anti-counterfeit mark left by the leader himself is there.
context: 大哥，这可是真的……连大当家亲自留下的防伪标记都有。

original: Damn, it seems to be real!
context: 我去，看来是真的！

original:
Hehe, it seems we made a mistake.
It seems that you are one of us, please forgive us for our previous misunderstanding.
context:

context: 小子，你找死！
