context: 我真的不喜欢打打杀杀，实在是形势所迫。

original:
Are you {PlayerName}? You're quite famous now.
Our water stronghold is currently short of manpower. If a brave man like you could join us, you would certainly be highly valued by the stronghold leader.
context:
你就是{PlayerName}？你现在的名气可不小啊。
我们水寨如今正缺人手，像你这样的好汉若能加入水寨，定会得到寨主重用。

original: If you have something to discuss with the camp leader, just go straight in.
context: 你若找寨主有事商议径直进去便是。

original:
Where are your eyes?
Do you pierce my existence?
context:
你们眼睛都长哪里去了？
无视我的存在吗！

original:
So it's the young lady!
Please forgive us, young lady. We didn't know this person was your friend. We will let him pass now.
context:
原来是大小姐！
请大小姐恕罪，我们不知道这位是您的朋友，这就放行。

original:
It's a case of the water flooding the Dragon King's Temple - it's our own brother visiting!
Welcome, welcome, please come in.
context:
大水冲了龙王庙，原来是自家兄弟造访！
欢迎欢迎，请里面进吧。

施主请留步！
施主戾气深重，不宜入寺礼佛，还请离开！
（我要想进去该怎么办呢？）
硬闯！<color=#c44b0e>（立即开战）</color>
大师您且听我说……（口才达到融会贯通）
交由癞头癫出面。<color=#097a76>（癞头癫随行）</color>
这东西能证明我的身份吗？<color=#097a76>（出示菩提佛珠）</color>
转身离开。
阿弥陀佛，施主妄动无名之火，小僧只好护法降魔！
我若一心成魔，就算请下漫天神佛也保佑不了你们！
所谓“放下屠刀立地成佛……
一刻之后……

阿弥陀佛，施主点醒小僧。
小僧着相了，既然施主有向善之心，就请入内吧。

你这小家伙怎么如此呆板！
人心善恶岂是光看表面就能下定论的？
这位{PlayerSurName}施主是好是歹，难道我反倒不如你分得清？
师叔教训的是，小僧着相了。
阿弥陀佛，请施主入内吧。

原来你是从释法寺走出的败类！
今天小僧要与众位师兄清理门户！
本以为会看在曾经同门情分上让我进去，没想到竟然如此不顾情面，这就休怪我出手无情了。
此处是佛门清净地，女施主不宜入内，请施主留步。
规矩是给普通人定的，对我完全不适用。
所谓“色即是空 空即是色”……
一刻之后……

阿弥陀佛，施主点醒小僧。
小僧着相了，请施主们入内吧。

你这小家伙怎么如此呆板！
色相即皮囊，一切为空，你这是只看表面不究根本！

施主哪分男女，只有你心中的男女之别！
你的修行不够，罚你多抄几份《多心经》仔细感悟佛法。
师叔教训的是，小僧着相了。
阿弥陀佛，请施主们入内吧。

既然施主跟释法寺有如此渊源，想必此行必有缘故。
小僧不便再做阻拦，请各位施主入内吧。
阿弥陀佛，施主妄动无名之火，小僧只好护法降魔！

original: Halt, ordinary people are not allowed to enter, please state your name!
context: 来人止步，寻常人不得擅入，请报上名来！

original: What's so special about this place that ordinary people can't enter? Is there any particular rule to enter here?
context: 这里是什么稀罕地方，寻常人不能入内，莫非进这里还有什么讲究吗？

original: The so-called "talk and laugh with great scholars, no commoners come and go", this is the Confucius Temple, the people who come and go are either great scholars or famous people. If commoners mingle among them, wouldn't it spoil the scenery?
context: 所谓“谈笑有鸿儒，往来无白丁”，此处乃是儒圣馆，来往之人不是大儒便是名士，若是庸人俗人混迹其中，岂非大煞风景。

original: I suspect you're mocking me for being an uneducated nobody, not worthy to enter your Confucius Temple!
context: 我怀疑你在讥讽我是个没啥学识的无名小卒，不配进你们这儒圣馆！

original: Why humiliate yourself by pointing out the obvious?
context: 看破不说破，何必要自取其辱呢。

original: (The gatekeepers of this Confucius Temple are so arrogant, I'm really curious about what's so special about this Confucius Temple that makes them so condescending!)
context: （这儒圣馆看门的都这么嚣张，真好奇这儒圣馆到底有什么底蕴，能让他们如此目中无人！）

original: Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
context: 硬闯！<color=#c44b0e>（立即开战）</color>

original: I am {PlayerName}, here to visit you by reputation.<color=#097a76>(Fame reached level 5 Famous)</color>
context: 在下{PlayerName}，慕名前来拜访。<color=#097a76>（名声达到5级闻名遐迩）</color>

original: Let Cai Youzhi handle it. <color=#097a76>(Cai Youzhi accompanies)</color>
context: 交由蔡攸之出面。<color=#097a76>（蔡攸之随行）</color>

original: Can this prove my identity? <color=#097a76>(Show Gentleman gem)</color>
context: 这东西能证明我的身份吗？<color=#097a76>（出示君子玉）</color>

original: Turn around and run away.
context: 转身离开。

original: I am the newly promoted scholar {PlayerName}, I came to visit out of admiration.
context: 在下新晋举人{PlayerName}，慕名前来拜访。

original: Present the recommendation letter from Duke Qi.
context: 出示齐王引荐信。

original: Today, let's open your eyes, not only does the Confucius Temple monopolize literary talent, but it also tops the three teachings in martial arts!
context: 今天就让你这家伙开开眼界，儒圣馆不但独占文采鳌头，武学一道也是三教之冠！

original: The Confucius Temple's overconfidence is indeed second to none, I've learned a lot today.
context: 儒圣馆的不自量力倒是首屈一指，今日算是领教了。

original:
So it's Master {PlayerSurName}, I apologize for my ignorance.
Welcome to Master {PlayerSurName}, please come in.
context:
原来是{PlayerSurName}公子，敝人有眼无珠还请恕罪。
{PlayerSurName}公子造访，欢迎之至，快请入内吧。

original: {PlayerSurName} is my friend, he came here to learn from my father, there's no need to stop him.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄是我朋友，来这里跟家父请教学问，可不必拦阻。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original:
I didn't expect you to have such a deep connection with the Confucius Temple!
Since you have the Confucius Temple token, please come in.
context:
想不到公子和儒圣馆有如此的渊源！
既然有儒圣馆信物，那么就请公子入内吧。

original:
So you're the newly promoted scholar that the master often mentions!
The master specifically instructed that if you come, there's no need to stop you. Please come in.
context:
原来您就是馆主时常提起的新晋举人！
馆主特意吩咐，若是你来，不必阻拦，公子请入内吧。

original: The master instructed that recently there have been many imposters, so all scholars who enter the temple for the first time need to match three pairs of couplets to distinguish the real from the fake, and then they can enter.
context: 馆主吩咐过，近来多有冒充之人，因此凡是首次入馆的举人都需要对上三副对子，以辨真伪，然后方可入内。

original:
Just three pairs of couplets, it's nothing to me!
Please give me the question.
context:
三副对子而已，对我来说不在话下！
请你出题吧。

original: Okay, listen carefully, young hero.
context: 好，少侠请听好了。

original: The young master is truly knowledgeable and has passed the test, please proceed into the hall.
context: 公子学识货真价实，已通过考验，请公子移步入馆吧。

original: You, Graduate, have doubts and cannot enter without passing the test.
context: 阁下举人身份存疑，未通过考验不得入内。

original:
This is not a place for people like you.
Please don't lose your dignity and embarrass yourself!
context:
这里不是你这种人能来的地方。
请不要失了体面，自找难堪！

original: So you are the one recommended by Duke Qi, then you are a distinguished guest of Confucius Temple, please come in.
context: 原来是齐王殿下引荐之人，那便是儒圣馆的贵客，请您入内吧。

original:
I, the younger generation {PlayerName}, have long admired the Taoist Sect, and I am here today to pay a visit.
I sincerely ask the master to accept me as a disciple, I will not disgrace the reputation of the Taoist Sect.
context:
晚辈{PlayerName}，久仰道玄宗大名，今日特来拜会。
恳请真人将晚辈收录门下，晚辈定不会辱没道玄宗的威名。

original:
Every disciple of the Taoist Sect is virtuous and all-around.
Let the old Taoist see what your character is like...
context:
凡道玄宗弟子无一不是德行兼备、义薄云天之辈。
且让老道看看你的品行如何……

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: What a pity, what a pity.
context: 可惜，可惜。

original: Although your aptitude is good, your character does not meet the requirements of the old Taoist, so you are temporarily not destined for the Taoist Sect.
context: 你虽然资质尚佳，然而品行未能达到老道要求，故而你与道玄宗暂时无缘。

original: May I ask the master, where exactly do I not meet the requirements, and how much is the difference?
context: 请问真人，晚辈究竟哪里不达要求，相差又有多少呢？

original: It can only be understood and not explained, you should try to understand it yourself.
context: 只可意会不可言传，你且用心体会吧。

original: Good, good.
context: 不错，不错。

original: Your character and aptitude are very satisfactory to the old Taoist, and you have passed the basic test of the old Taoist.
context: 你的品行、资质，老道非常满意，算是通过老道的基础考验了。

original: So, do I have a chance to join the Taoist Sect?
context: 这么说，我有机会能加入道玄宗了？

original: Haven't asked the master how to address him?
context: 还没请教真人如何称呼？

original: I am Zhong Yangzi, currently the head of the Taoist Sect.
context: 老夫重阳子，现居道玄宗掌教之职。

original:
Young people are impulsive and easy to get agitated.
Just be patient, listen to the old Taoist's introduction first, and then make a decision.
context:
年轻人火气急，易冲动。
且稍安勿躁，先听老道给你介绍一番，再做定夺不迟。

original: Tell me, what do you want to know?
context: 说说吧，你想要了解什么？

original: <color=#0574a8>Join the Taoist Sect.
context: <color=#0574a8>加入道玄宗。

original: Ask about the history of the Taoist Sect.
context: 询问道玄宗的来历。

original: Ask what can be learned from the Taoist Sect.
context: 询问道玄宗能学到什么。

original: <color=#0574a8>I don't want to join for now.</color>
context: <color=#0574a8>暂时不想加入。</color>

original: The Taoist Sect has been established for hundreds of years and is one of the <color=#c44b0e>three religions</color> in the world.
context: 道玄宗已然立派数百年，为天下<color=#c44b0e>三教</color>之一。

original:
Every disciple of the Taoist Sect must pay attention to their own <color=#c44b0e>benevolence and righteousness</color>.
If you do something against benevolence and righteousness, you will face the wall in light punishment, and in severe cases, your power will be abolished and you will be expelled from the Taoist Sect.
context:
凡道玄宗弟子，最要注重自身<color=#c44b0e>仁德、义气</color>的品性。
若是做出有违仁义之事，轻者面壁思过，重者废去功力驱逐出道玄宗。

original: Our sect is good at <color=#c44b0e>fist and sword techniques</color> in external skills, and our internal skills lean towards defense, emphasizing readiness!
context: 本派外功擅长<color=#c44b0e>拳法、剑法</color>，内功偏向防御，讲究以静制动！

original: The old Taoist has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>Taichi Thirteen Forms</color>, which will be taught to the best disciples.
context: 老道有一门<color=#c44b0e>太极十三势</color>的绝招，会从诸位弟子中择优传授。

original: There are also methods of refining medicine and pills, which are rare skills in the world.
context: 另有炼药、炼丹的法门，也算是江湖上难得一见的技艺。

original:
{PlayerName}, from this moment on, you are a disciple of the Taoist Sect!
I hope you will not forget the way of benevolence and righteousness, and do not disgrace the Taoist Sect.
context:
{PlayerName}，从此刻起，你便是道玄宗弟子！
希望你不要忘记仁义之道，勿要使道玄宗蒙羞。

original: Every day at <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color>, disciples of our sect must attend morning classes at the <color=#c44b0e>Star Observatory</color>. Do not be late.
context: 本门弟子每日<color=#c44b0e>辰时</color>须到<color=#c44b0e>观星台</color>上早课，切勿迟到。

original:
Disciple {PlayerName}, I pay my respects to the headmaster.
I will definitely not forget the teachings of the headmaster today.
context:
弟子{PlayerName}，拜见掌教真人。
定当不会忘记掌教今日教诲。

original:
Choose one of these two manuals as the martial arts gift from the old Taoist.
If it doesn't match the direction of your martial arts, don't force it, you can also give it to your partner to learn.
context:
这两本秘籍你任选其一，便作为老道赠予你的入门武功。
若和你所学武功方向不契合，也不必强求，给你的伙伴修炼也无妨的。

original: Choose the sword technique "Seven Stars Sword"
context: 选择剑法《七星剑法》

original: Choose the boxing technique "Five Elements Fist"
context: 选择拳法《五行拳》

original: Thank you for teaching me martial arts.
context: 多谢掌教传授武功。

original: Come find the old Taoist when you have made up your mind.
context: 等你考虑清楚了再来找老道吧。

original: Is there anything else you want to know?
context: 你还有什么想了解的？

original: What's done is done, your fate with the Taoist Sect in this life is over, don't force it.
context: 所谓覆水难收，你与道玄宗此生缘分已尽，不必强求。

original: Who is the uncle between us?
context: 咱俩谁是师叔？

original: ...Of course it's you.
context: ……自然是你。

original:
You little brat, you still recognize me as your uncle!
Since I'm your uncle, shouldn't you listen to me in everything?
context:
臭小子你还认得我是师叔！
既然我是师叔，那是不是凡事都要听我的？

original: Uncle, everything else is fine, but this...
context: 师叔，别的事都可以，但是这……

original:
Young man over there, can you help me settle this dispute?
I, as an elder, told this brat to respect his elders and love the young, that's not wrong, right?
context:
旁边这位小哥，你给评评理！
本道爷叫这臭小子尊老爱幼没错吧？

original: Respecting the old and loving the young is a virtue of our generation, of course it's not wrong!
context: 尊老爱幼乃我辈美德，自然是没错！

original: I am his uncle, he is my nephew, he should listen to me, right?
context: 我是他师叔，他是我师侄，他也理当该听我的话吧？

original: In principle, there should be order between the old and the young, the nephew should listen to the uncle, of course that's not wrong!
context: 按理说长幼有序，师侄应当听师叔的话，那当然也没错！

original:
Now that I, as an uncle, am short of money,
asking my nephew to get some drinks, that's not too much, right?
context:
师叔如今囊中羞涩，
让师侄去弄几坛杯中物来，自然也不过分吧？

original:
Of course it's too much!
Uncle, you want to pawn our master's personal sword for drinks!
context:
当然过分！
师叔你可是想把师父的亲传佩剑典当了去换那杯中物！

original: I can't comply with this matter, no matter what!
context: 这件事，无论如何都请恕我不能从命！

original:
Look at this stubborn kid, he's even more troublesome than his master.
Young man, we're destined to meet, can you help me out?
context:
你看看，这个臭小子犯起倔来，比他师父还让人头疼。
小哥，咱们相见便是有缘，你帮本道爷想个办法吧？

original: Is this bottle of wine to your taste?<color=#097a76>(Jiannan wine1 pot)</color>
context: 这瓶酒不知是否对您的口味？<color=#097a76>（剑南烧春1壶）</color>

original: It's better to meet by chance than to invite. Today, I'll treat you two! <color=#097a76>(1000 wen, one shichen)</color>
context: 相请不如偶遇，今日我请二位吧！<color=#097a76>（1000文、一个时辰）</color>

original: It's hard for a clean official to settle domestic disputes, I can't interfere in your affairs.
context: 清官难断家务事，你们的事我可管不了。

original:
Is this really for me?
You're not planning anything, are you?
context:
这真是要送给本道爷的？
你小子该不会有什么企图吧。

original: If you don't trust me, I'll take it back, as if I never came.
context: 要是信不过我，我拿走好了，就当我没来过。

original: Just a joke, why so serious?
context: 开句玩笑嘛，何必这么当真。

original:
Oh dear, just a joke, why so serious?
If you don't know me, you must be a newbie in the martial arts world, no wonder you look so naive.
context:
哎呀呀，开句玩笑嘛，何必这么当真。
不识得本道爷，那你一定是个刚出江湖的雏鸟，难怪看着呆呆傻傻的。

original:
Listen up, kid!
In the drunkenness, Heaven and Earth are vast, and the sun and moon are long in the pot - I am <color=#c44b0e>La Tazhang of the Taoist Sect</color>.
context:
听好了小子！
醉里乾坤大，壶中日月长——本道爷便是<color=#c44b0e>道玄宗的邋遢张</color>是也。

original: Taoist Sect? One of the three major sects in the martial arts world, the Taoist Sect??
context: 道玄宗？江湖三大派之一的道玄宗？？

original:
Junior {PlayerName} pays respect to Elder Zhang.
I didn't recognize Mount Tai, and unexpectedly met a senior from the Taoist Sect here.
context:
晚辈{PlayerName}见过张前辈。
晚辈有眼不识泰山，竟然在此遇到道玄宗的前辈。

original:
Go away, what junior and senior, I hate these formalities the most!
I'm going to taste the good wine. Kid, we'll meet again if we're destined!
context:
去去去，什么晚辈前辈的，本道爷最烦这些客套！
本道爷要去品尝佳酿了。小子，咱们有缘再会！

original: I am Chang Chunzi, thank you for your help. My uncle and I have to go to <color=#c44b0e>Lin'an City</color> for business, so we can't accompany you. See you later.
context: 贫道长春子，多谢少侠解围。我和师叔还要前往<color=#c44b0e>霖安城</color>办事，恕不奉陪，后会有期。

original: Hey, this is...
context: 哎，这是……

original:
It seems to be the understanding of this boxing technique? It must have been left by that senior.
Consider it his return gift for this bottle of wine, I'll just take it without being polite!
context:
好像是本拳法心得？应当是那位前辈遗落的吧。
就当是他对这瓶酒的回礼吧，我就不客气的收下啦！

original: This is great, someone is treating, and the worms in my stomach can be happy again.
context: 这敢情好，有人做东，本道爷肚里的馋虫又能快活一番了。

original:
Good wine, good food, good kid!
There are such delicacies in the world, my trip is not in vain!
context:
好酒好菜好小子！
人间有如此美味，本道爷不虚此行啊！

original: Kid, you treated me to this meal, if you still don't know my name, wouldn't it be a loss?
context: 小子，你请本道爷吃了这顿酒菜，若还不知本道爷名讳岂不是做了亏本买卖。

original: Let me tell you, remember, I am La Tazhang of the Taoist Sect.
context: 告诉你，记住了，本道爷便是道玄宗的邋遢张。

original: Taoist Sect? One of the three major sects in the martial arts world, the Taoist Sect??
context: 道玄宗？江湖三大派之一的道玄宗？？

original:
Junior {PlayerName} pays respect to Elder Zhang.
I didn't recognize Mount Tai, and unexpectedly met a senior from the Taoist Sect here.
context:
晚辈{PlayerName}见过张前辈。
晚辈有眼不识泰山，竟然在此遇到道玄宗的前辈。

original: Go away, what junior and senior, I hate these formalities the most!
context: 去去去，什么晚辈前辈的，本道爷最烦这些客套！

original: I'm full today, we'll meet again if we're destined!
context: 本道爷今天吃饱了，日后有缘我们再相见吧！

original: In the drunkenness, Heaven and Earth are vast~
context: 醉里乾坤大~

original: And the sun and moon are long in the pot~
context: 壶中日月长~

original: I am Chang Chunzi, thank you for your hospitality. My uncle and I have to go to <color=#c44b0e>Lin'an City</color> for business, so we can't accompany you. See you later.
context: 贫道长春子，多谢少侠款待。我和师叔还要前往<color=#c44b0e>霖安城</color>办事，恕不奉陪，后会有期。

original: Huh? This Pill is...
context: 哎？这丹药是……

original: Search for people in Lin'an
context: 霖安寻人

original: Search for people
context: 寻人

original: Get <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> to attract La Tazhang, or search every corner of Lin'an City.
context: 弄到<color=#c44b0e>猴儿酒</color>吸引邋遢张现身，否则就找遍霖安城的每一个角落吧。

original: Walk around the remote areas of Lin'an City with Monkey wine, you might discover something.
context: 带着猴儿酒到霖安城偏僻的地方走一走，或许能有发现。

original: Go to the bridge in the city and inform Chang Chunzi.
context: 去城里的桥上向长春子告知情况吧。

original: Talk with Chang Chunzi.
context: 与长春子交谈。

original:
Where can I find Monkey wine in Lin'an City...
Can you help me figure it out?
context:
这霖安城到哪去找猴儿酒啊……
少侠能否帮忙想想办法？

original: I'll help you find your uncle.
context: 我帮你想办法找到你师叔。

original: I'm really helpless.
context: 我实在是无能为力。

original: {PlayerSurName} young hero, can you help me find my uncle now?
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，现在可以帮我找师叔了吗？

original: I'll help you find your uncle.
context: 我帮你想办法找到你师叔。

original: I still have no clue.
context: 暂时还没有头绪。

original: What do you want to do?
context: 你想干什么？

original: I'll exchange a pot of good wine with you.<color=#097a76>(Luofu spring wine1 pot)</color>
context: 我用一坛好酒跟你交换。<color=#097a76>（罗浮春1壶）</color>

original: Is this money enough to buy your Monkey wine? <color=#097a76>(2000 Wen)</color>
context: 这些钱买你的猴儿酒，够吗？<color=#097a76>（2000文）</color>

original: Or would you like me to teach you some advanced Beast Taming techniques? <color=#097a76>(Beast Taming reaches Advance)</color>
context: 不然我教你几招更厉害的驯兽技巧？<color=#097a76>（驯兽达到融会贯通）</color>

original: If you don't drink the toast, you have to drink the penalty, I'm going to rob it by force! <color=#c44b0e>(Trigger battle)</color>
context: 敬酒不吃吃罚酒，我要动手硬抢！<color=#c44b0e>（触发战斗）</color>

original: Honorable people don't snatch what others like, let's find another way.
context: 君子不夺人所好，另想别的办法吧。

original: However, if you're willing to spar with me, I won't bother with that kid.
context: 不过，你若肯陪本道爷耍几招，本道爷就不跟那小子一般见识了。

original: I'll accompany you till the end, but please show mercy. <color=#097a76>(Main character duels)</color>
context: 奉陪到底，你可要手下留情。<color=#097a76>（主角单挑）</color>

original: I can't afford to hurt you by accident.
context: 万一把你打伤了我可担待不起。

original: Come on, spar with me for a few more rounds!
context: 来来来，再陪本道爷过两招！

original: I'll accompany you till the end, but please show mercy. <color=#097a76>(Main character duels)</color>
context: 奉陪到底，你可要手下留情。<color=#097a76>（主角单挑）</color>

original: I can't afford to hurt you by accident.
context: 万一把你打伤了我可担待不起。

original: Young hero, we meet again, what a coincidence.
context: 少侠，又见面了，真是有缘啊。

original: Why are you in such a hurry, Taoist? Did you run into any trouble?
context: 道长如此慌张，遇到什么麻烦了？

original:
Ah, my uncle master, who finds me too talkative, has now run off somewhere to find peace.
Given his temperament, if no one looks after him, I don't know how much trouble he'll cause.
context:
唉，贫道的师叔，嫌贫道唠叨，现在不知跑去哪躲清静了。
以师叔的性子，若没人看顾，不知要闹出多少乱子。

original: But I'm not familiar with Lin'an City at all, so I'm worried about where to find him.
context: 可是贫道对霖安城一点也不熟悉，所以正犯愁去哪寻他。

original:
Given his temperament, this kind of situation probably isn't the first or second time.
How did you usually find him?
context:
以他的性子，出现这种情况恐怕不止一两次了。
往常你们怎么找到他的？

original:
Uncle master loves the taste of <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> the most,
If he's in the mountains, I can find him based on this.
context:
师叔最贪爱<color=#c44b0e>猴儿酒</color>的味道，
若是在山上，贫道据此就能找到师叔。

original: Monkey wine? How can this help find him?
context: 猴儿酒？这怎么能找到他啊？

original:
Whenever uncle master hides because of his temper, as long as I bring Monkey wine and walk around the mountain,
Uncle master will show up when he smells it.
context:
每当师叔耍性子躲起来时，只要带上猴儿酒在山上转一圈，
师叔闻到气味自然就现身了。

original:
(He can show up by smelling it, this La Tazhang's nose is even better than a dog's...)
Don't you have a method?
context:
（闻到气味就能现身，这邋遢张鼻子比狗还好使啊……）
你们这不是挺有办法的吗？

original:
Where can I find Monkey wine in Lin'an City...
Can you help me figure it out?
context:
这霖安城到哪去找猴儿酒啊……
少侠能否帮忙想想办法？

original:
What a fragrant Monkey wine!
It must be that stinky kid teasing my appetite again.
context:
好香的猴儿酒！
一定又是那个臭小子在吊我胃口了。

original:
Why is it you? I thought it was that stinky kid Chang Chunzi.
But knowing this method to lure me out, it must be him who told you.
context:
怎么是你？我还以为是长春子那臭小子。
不过懂得这个法子引我出来，想必是他告诉你的吧。

original:
Well, this Monkey wine is mine!
I, the Taoist master, won't bother with a child.
context:
也罢，这猴儿酒就归我了！
本道爷不跟小孩子一般计较。

original: Why are you hiding here, you really made me look for you!
context: 你怎么躲在这里，真叫我一顿好找！

original:
So what if you found me, I, the Taoist master, won't go back with you to see that stinky kid.
He's always nagging, I knew it would be like this, I might as well hide in the mountains for peace.
context:
找到又如何，本道爷才不会跟你回去见那个臭小子。
天天唠唠叨叨，早知道这样，还不如在山上躲清静。

original: However, if you're willing to spar with me, I won't bother with that kid.
context: 不过，你若肯陪本道爷耍几招，本道爷就不跟那小子一般见识了。

original: Don't worry, I, the Taoist master, know how to control my strength.
context: 放心好了，本道爷下手有分寸。

original:
I was careless, I was afraid of hurting the kid, I, the Taoist master, even held back, I didn't expect...
Forget it, I accept the bet and lose, I'll go find that kid Chang Chunzi.
context:
大意了，怕伤到小子，本道爷还收了手，没想到……
罢了，认赌服输，我这就去找长春子那小子。

original:
No, no, it's not fun at all!
It's boring, I, the Taoist master, won't play with you anymore!
context:
不行不行，一点都不过瘾！
没意思没意思，本道爷不陪你们玩了！

original:
Young hero, why are you here?
Did you find uncle master?
context:
少侠，你怎么在这里？
找到师叔了吗？

original: I found him... it's just that he insisted on fighting with me, and I couldn't beat him...
context: 找是找到了……就是他非要我和他打一架，我又打不过……

original: I'm afraid uncle master got bored and left...
context: 那恐怕师叔嫌无聊，先走了……

original:
Anyway, thank you for your help, young hero.
I still have to go and find uncle master, we'll meet again.
context:
不管怎样，多谢少侠帮忙了。
贫道还要去追寻师叔下落，后会有期。

original: Coward, you won't amount to much in the future.
context: 没胆的家伙，以后成不了什么气候。

original: Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, for helping me find uncle master.
context: 感谢{PlayerSurName}少侠帮了大忙，请回了师叔。

original:
{PlayerSurName} kid, don't always help this stinky kid.
If he doesn't experience hardships now, how can he stand on his own in the future!
context:
{PlayerSurName}小子，下次别总帮着这臭小子。
现在不让他历练历练，以后怎么能够独当一面！

original: I, the Taoist master, have to go to <color=#c44b0e>Daliang City</color> for serious business, we'll meet again if we're destined~
context: 本道爷还要去<color=#c44b0e>大梁城</color>办正经事，咱们有缘再会吧~

original: Uncle master, wait for me!
context: 师叔等等我！

original: This La Tazhang really is elusive.
context: 这邋遢张还真是神龙见首不见尾啊。

original: Young hero {PlayerSurName}, have you not chosen uncle master yet?
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠还未选到师叔吗？

original:
Come on, have a few moves with me!
I, the Taoist master, will go back after the match!
context:
来来来，陪本道爷过两招！
本道爷进行了就回去！

original:
If you really can't find <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color>,
you'll have to search every inch of Lin'an City, you'll always be able to find uncle master.
context:
如果实在找不到<color=#c44b0e>猴儿酒</color>，
就只能把霖安城每一寸地方都找遍了，总能找到师叔的。

original: I'll search with the young hero.
context: 我与少侠分头寻找。

original:
Monkey wine...Monkey wine...I wonder if it has any relations with monkeys.
Why not ask this monkey performer if he's heard of it.
context:
猴儿酒…猴儿酒…不知道和猴子有没有关系。
不如问问这耍猴人是否听说过吧。

original: Excuse me, brother, have you heard of Monkey wine?
context: 请问大哥，你听说过猴儿酒吗？

original:
Are you here to snatch my <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> too?
I only have one pot left, and no one is going to get their hands on it!
context:
你也要来抢俺的<color=#c44b0e>猴儿酒</color>吗？
俺就剩这么一壶了，谁也别想打它的注意！

original: What a coincidence, I came for it.
context: 太不凑巧了，我就是冲它来的。

original: What do you want to do?
context: 你想干什么？

original: Drinking Monkey wine every day does get a bit boring, it's nice to change the taste!
context: 天天喝猴儿酒也确实有些腻了，换个口味也不错！

original:
I didn't expect this Monkey wine to be so valuable, if I had known, I would have brought more pots.
Once the money and goods are settled, you can't back out.
context:
想不到这猴儿酒这么值钱，早知道多带几壶出来了。
钱物两讫，你可不要反悔。

original: If you can make my monkey listen to you, I'll believe you have this ability.
context: 你若能叫俺这只猴崽子听你的话，俺就信你有这本事。

original: Squeak-squeak-squeak
context: 吱-吱-吱

original:
Wow! I've never seen a monkey so happy, did you really make it understand human language?!
This ability is really amazing, you must teach me quickly.
context:
哇！俺从没见过猴崽子如此开心，你真让它听懂人话了？！
这本事可真是绝了，你赶紧教俺吧。

original:
It seems very powerful, I need to practice more.
If I can reach your level, this monkey can help me do more things.
context:
感觉很厉害的样子，俺还得多练练。
若能做到你这种程度，这猴崽子就能帮俺做更多事情了。

original: Here is the <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> I promised you, please accept it.
context: 这是答应你的<color=#c44b0e>猴儿酒</color>，请收下吧。

original:
You think I'm easy to bully?
Let you know how powerful my monkey is!
context:
你当俺好欺负呢？
叫你知道知道俺这猴崽子的厉害！

original: You are powerful, here is the Monkey wine, don't bother me again.
context: 算你厉害，猴儿酒给你了，不要再来找俺麻烦了。

original: Want to snatch my things, it's simply wishful thinking! Get out of here now!
context: 想抢俺的东西，简直痴心妄想！赶紧给我滚开！

original: The Way of Alchemy
context: 炼药之道

original: Prescription
context: 药方

original: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Illness removal pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
context: 炼制出<color=#c44b0e>祛病丸</color>交给道玄宗·药师。

original: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Revitalization pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
context: 炼制出<color=#c44b0e>回春丹</color>交给道玄宗·药师。

original: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Seven stars pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
context: 炼制出<color=#c44b0e>七星丹</color>交给道玄宗·药师。

original: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Blue wave powder</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
context: 炼制出<color=#c44b0e>凌波散</color>交给道玄宗·药师。

original: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
context: 炼制出<color=#c44b0e>开悟丹</color>交给道玄宗·药师。

original: Are you the new disciple who just joined recently?
context: 你就是最近新入门的弟子吗？

original: My name is {PlayerName}, please give me some guidance, senior brother.
context: 我叫{PlayerName}，请师兄多指教。

original: All of us in the Taoist Sect, in addition to being skilled in martial arts, are experts in alchemy. Now I will guide you in this skill.
context: 凡是咱们道玄宗的弟子，除了武功精湛之外，无一不是炼药炼丹的行家。如今这项本事由我来引导各位师弟进行研习。

original: I'll give you a prescription, try to make an <color=#c44b0e>Illness removal pill</color> and give it to me.
context: 我给你一份药方，你尝试把<color=#c44b0e>祛病丸</color>炼制出来交给我。

original:
Don't disturb me before the pill is made.
You can buy ordinary herbs from me, high-quality herbs you need to find a way yourself.
context:
丹药炼制出来之前，不要来打扰我。
普通药材可在我这里购买，高品质药材需要你自己想办法。

original: What are you here for? Have you already made the pill I asked for?
context: 你来做什么？莫非已经炼制出我所要求的丹药了？

original: Hand over an Illness removal pill.<color=#097a76>（Illness removal pill1）</color>
context: 交出一颗祛病丸。<color=#097a76>（祛病丸1颗）</color>

original: It's not successful yet.
context: 还没有炼制成功。

original: Hand over a Revitalization pill.<color=#097a76>（Revitalization pill1）</color>
context: 交出一颗回春丹。<color=#097a76>（回春丹1颗）</color>

original: Hand over a Seven stars pill.<color=#097a76>（Seven stars pill1）</color>
context: 交出一颗七星丹。<color=#097a76>（七星丹1颗）</color>

original: Hand over a Blue wave powder.<color=#097a76>（Blue wave powder1）</color>
context: 交出一份凌波散。<color=#097a76>（凌波散1份）</color>

original: Hand over an Enlighten pill.<color=#097a76>（Enlighten pill1）</color>
context: 交出一颗开悟丹。<color=#097a76>（开悟丹1颗）</color>

original:
Hmm, the quality is quite good.
Next, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Revitalization pill</color> and give it to me.
context:
嗯，品相还算不错。
接下来你准备把<color=#c44b0e>回春丹</color>炼制出来交给我。

original:
Hmm, the quality is quite good.
Next, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Seven stars pill</color> and give it to me.
context:
嗯，品相还算不错。
接下来你准备把<color=#c44b0e>七星丹</color>炼制出来交给我。

original:
Hmm, the quality is quite good.
Next, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Blue wave powder</color> and give it to me.
context:
嗯，品相还算不错。
接下来你准备把<color=#c44b0e>凌波散</color>炼制出来交给我。

original:
Hmm, the quality is quite good.
Next, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten pill</color> and give it to me.
context:
嗯，品相还算不错。
接下来你准备把<color=#c44b0e>开悟丹</color>炼制出来交给我。

original: Your alchemy skills have improved significantly, and you are now outstanding among your peers. I have nothing more to teach you.
context: 你如今炼药制丹的能力已经今非昔比，在同门之中也算是出类拔萃了，我现在也没什么可教你的了。

original: Now I will pass on to you the pill formula of our Taoist Sect. With your talent, you will definitely be able to refine this pill in your lifetime.
context: 现在我把咱们道玄宗镇派的丹方传授给你吧，凭你的天资，有生之年必定能够将这枚丹药炼制出来。

original:
If you run away from the Taoist Sect, there will be no chance of returning in the future.
Upon leaving, the sect token <color=#c44b0e>Taichi jade ornament</color> will be taken back, the sect talent <color=#c44b0e>Authentic sect</color> will be removed, and the sect contribution will be wiped out. Think carefully before you act.
context:
若是离开道玄宗，以后再无重返门派的可能。
此番离去会收回门派信物<color=#c44b0e>太极玉佩</color>，清除本门天赋<color=#c44b0e>玄门正宗</color>，门派贡献也会一并抹去，你可要三思而行。

original: Already decided！<color=#097a76>(Return the Taichi jade ornament)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#097a76>（交还太极玉佩）</color>

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original:
Since you are determined, from now on you are no longer a disciple of the Taoist Sect.
As long as you are committed to doing good, the disciples of the Taoist Sect will always be your support and provide convenience for you.
context:
既然你执意如此，从今往后你便不再是道玄宗弟子。
只要你一心为善，道玄宗诸弟子永远是你的后盾，为你提供方便。

original: Junior {PlayerName} bids farewell to the sect leader.
context: 晚辈{PlayerName}拜别掌教真人。

original: {PlayerName} You have learned a lot in our sect.
context: {PlayerName}你在本宗已经学有所成。

original: The matter of the demon has come to an end, and it's time for you to go down the mountain for practice and pursue higher martial arts.
context: 且那魔头的事情已经告一段落，你也是时候下山历练，追求更高的武学了。

original: {PlayerName} Now that you are no longer a disciple of the Taoist Sect, this <color=#097a76>(Return the Taichi jade ornament)</color> will be returned to the sect.
context: {PlayerName}如今你已不再是道玄宗的弟子了，这<color=#097a76>（归还太极玉佩）</color>便交还本门。

original: Although you have run away from the sect, you must adhere to the teachings of the sect.
context: 虽然你离开了宗门，但一定要谨遵宗门的教导。

original: Eliminate evil and kindness, maintain the righteous path of the world!
context: 除恶扬善，维系世间正道！

original: Junior {PlayerName} will follow the teachings!
context: 晚辈{PlayerName}谨遵教诲！

original: Although our sect allows freedom of movement, the rules are strict. If you can't return the <color=#097a76>Taichi jade ornament</color>, it's okay.
context: 本门虽说来去自如，但门规森严，你若无法交还<color=#097a76>太极玉佩</color>也可。

original: Your relations with our sect will decrease!
context: 你与我宗关系将会降低！

original: Already decided！<color=#097a76>(Relations with Taoist Sect drop to -20)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#097a76>（与道玄宗关系降至-20）</color>

original: Think about it again
context: 再考虑下

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original:
The Taoist Sect has been established for hundreds of years, and has faced countless disasters and difficulties.
You are not the first one to speak wildly, and you will not be the last!
context:
道玄宗开宗立派数百载，所逢大灾小难不计其数。
你不是第一个口出狂言之辈，也绝不是最后一个！

original: Destroy the Taoist Sect！<color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 剿灭道玄宗！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original:
Since it's a thoughtless remark, I won't pursue it.
Young man, you need to take care of yourself.
context:
既是无心之言，老道不予追究。
少年人，你要好自为之。

original: Today, I am going to open my eyes and see what kind of ability you have to dare to talk about destroying my Taoist Sect!
context: 老道今日要大开眼界，尔等究竟有何本事，竟敢妄言剿灭我道玄宗！

original:
{PlayerName}, I cannot agree with your actions.
Today, if you are an enemy of the Taoist Sect, you are an enemy of mine!
context:
{PlayerName}，我无法认同你的做法。
今日，你与道玄宗为敌便是与我为敌！

original:
Kid, I really didn't expect you to be this kind of person.
Since you've come this far, I can only be at odds with you!
context:
小子，本道爷还真瞧不出你竟然是这种人。
既然你走到现在这一步，本道爷只能与你势不两立了！

original:
This place used to be a thriving place of incense,
A place for practicing wonderful methods,
A martial arts holy land that countless people respect and yearn for,
A undefeated myth that has stood for hundreds of years.
At this moment, your blood is gradually boiling,
This time, you overturned the world's perception and shattered the undefeated myth!
A wisp of blue smoke slowly rises into the sky,
The existence that represents the Taoist Sect has become a thing of the past.
Today's battle achievements will be passed down from generation to generation...
context:
这里曾经是香火旺盛之地，
是妙法修行之所，
是无数人敬重而向往的武林圣地，
是立派数百年的不败神话。
此刻你浑身的血液逐渐躁动起来，
这一次，你颠覆了江湖的认知，击溃了不败神话！
一道青烟袅袅飘上云霄，
代表道玄宗的存在已经成为过往。
今日的战绩，必将一代代传承下去……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Taoist Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>道玄宗，覆灭！</color></size>

original: Too strong, the best plan is to retreat!
context: 太强了，三十六计走为上策！

original: This is where our disciples rest, please stop!
context: 这里是本门弟子休息之处，请留步！

original: Please stop!
context: 请留步！

original: This is the forbidden area of the Taoist Sect, non-disciples are not allowed to enter!
context: 这里是道玄宗禁地，非本门弟子不得擅入！

original: Junior brother, stop!
context: 师弟留步！

original: Without the permission of the head, no disciple is allowed to enter the Star Chaser Pavilion.
context: 未得掌教许可，任何弟子不得擅入摘星阁。

original: {PlayerName}, now your benevolence is deficient, you have committed many wrongs, and you need to be punished according to the sect rules!
context: {PlayerName}，如今你仁德有亏，多行不义，需按门规治罪！

original: According to the sect rules, you need to be punished by being locked in the Cave of Infinity for <color=#c44b0e>three days</color>. Do you plead guilty?
context: 依照门规，需罚你入无极洞<color=#c44b0e>禁闭三天</color>，你可认罪？

original: Plead guilty, accept punishment.<color=#0574a8>(Imprisonment)</color>
context: 认罪，接受惩罚。<color=#0574a8>（禁闭）</color>

original: Refuse to plead guilty!<color=#097a76>(Start a fight directly)</color>
context: 拒不认罪！<color=#097a76>（直接开战）</color>

original: Plead guilty, accept punishment.<color=#0574a8>(Expel from the sect)</color>
context: 认罪，接受惩罚。<color=#0574a8>（逐出师门）</color>

original: Good, I'll take you to the Cave of Infinity.
context: 好，我带你去无极洞。

original: According to the sect rules, if a disciple makes a mistake and refuses to accept punishment, <color=#c44b0e>his MP will be abolished and he will be expelled from the Taoist Sect</color>!
context: 依照门规，门下弟子犯错拒不接受惩罚，<color=#c44b0e>将其废除内力，并逐出道玄宗</color>！

original: There is no place for me in the Taoist Sect anymore, I should find another place.
context: 这道玄宗已经没有我的容身之地了，还是另投他处吧。

original: {PlayerName}, now that your MP is abolished, you are no longer a disciple of the Taoist Sect, the Taoist Sect has nothing to do with you, take care of yourself in the future.
context: {PlayerName}，如今你内力已废，已不是道玄宗弟子，道玄宗与你再无瓜葛，今后好自为之吧。

original: There is no place for me in the Taoist Sect anymore, I should find another place.
context: 这道玄宗已经没有我的容身之地了，还是另投他处吧。

original: According to the sect rules, you need to be punished by being locked in the Cave of Infinity for <color=#c44b0e>five days</color>. Do you plead guilty?
context: 依照门规，需罚你入无极洞<color=#c44b0e>禁闭五天</color>，你可认罪？

original: According to the sect rules, you need to be punished by being locked in the Cave of Infinity for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color>. Do you plead guilty?
context: 依照门规，需罚你入无极洞<color=#c44b0e>禁闭十天</color>，你可认罪？

original: {PlayerName}, according to the sect rules, <color=#c44b0e>your MP needs to be abolished and you will be expelled from the Taoist Sect</color>. Do you plead guilty?
context: {PlayerName}，依照门规<color=#c44b0e>需废除内力，并将你逐出道玄宗</color>，你可认罪？

original: What's the difference between pleading guilty or not, the outcome is the same!
context: 认不认罪有什么分别，下场还不是一样！

original: If you refuse to plead guilty, you will be the nemesis of the Taoist Sect, and all disciples of the Taoist Sect can kill you!
context: 你若拒不认罪，便是与我道玄宗结下死仇，凡我道玄宗弟子人人得而诛之！

original: A wise man submits to circumstances...
context: 识时务者为俊杰……

original: {PlayerName}, now that your MP is abolished, you are no longer a disciple of the Taoist Sect, the Taoist Sect has nothing to do with you, take care of yourself in the future.
context: {PlayerName}，如今你内力已废，已不是道玄宗弟子，道玄宗与你再无瓜葛，今后好自为之吧。

original: Stubborn!
context: 冥顽不灵！

original:
{PlayerName}, you should reflect on your actions here.
<color=#c44b0e>Three days later</color> I will take you to run away.
context:
{PlayerName}，你就在这里静心思过。
<color=#c44b0e>三天后</color>我会带你离开。

original:
{PlayerName}, you shall reflect here in peace.
I will take you to run away <color=#c44b0e>five days later</color>.
context:
{PlayerName}，你就在这里静心思过。
<color=#c44b0e>五天后</color>我会带你离开。

original:
{PlayerName}, you shall reflect here in peace.
I will take you to run away <color=#c44b0e>ten days later</color>.
context:
{PlayerName}，你就在这里静心思过。
<color=#c44b0e>十天后</color>我会带你离开。

original: {PlayerName}, your confinement time is up, follow me out.
context: {PlayerName}，你的禁闭时间已到，随我出去吧。

original: Reflect in the Cave of Infinity, you can only run away after the confinement time is over.
context: 在无极洞思过，关禁闭的时间结束才能离开此处。

original: Reflect on the wall
context: 面壁思过

original: Idle, would you like to read the Tao Te Ching?
context: 闲来无事，是否读一读道德经呢？

original: Read the Tao Te Ching in peace. <color=#097a76>(1 shichen)</color>
context: 静心读道德经。<color=#097a76>（1个时辰）</color>

original: Not in the mood to read.
context: 没心思读书。

original:
The Tao that can be spoken is not the eternal Tao.
The name that can be named is not the eternal name.
The nameless is the beginning of heaven and earth.
The named is the mother of all things.
Therefore, always desireless, you see the mystery.
Ever desiring, you see the manifestations.
These two are the same, yet they are different.
This is called the mystery, the mystery within the mystery, the doorway to all understanding.
context:
道可道也，非恒道也。
名可名也，非恒名也。
无名万物之始也，有名万物之母也。
故：恒无欲也，以观其眇；恒有欲也，以观其所徼。
两者同出，异名同谓。
玄之又玄，众妙之门。

original:
Do not exalt the worthy, so that people will not compete.
Do not value rare treasures, so that people will not steal.
Do not display desirable things, so that people's hearts will not be disturbed.
Therefore, the sage governs by emptying their hearts, filling their bellies, weakening their ambitions, and strengthening their bones.
Always keep the people ignorant and desireless.
The sage who knows does not dare to act, and then there is nothing that cannot be governed.|Cruel World, treats all things as straw dogs.
The sage is not benevolent, treats the people as straw dogs.
The Valley Spirit is invincible, this is called the mysterious female.
The gate of the mysterious female, this is called the root of heaven and earth.
Endlessly it seems to exist, its use is never exhausted.|Heaven and earth last forever.
The reason why heaven and earth can last forever is that they do not live for themselves, hence they can live forever.
Therefore, the sage puts his body last and yet it comes first, puts it outside and yet it remains.
Is it not because he has no personal interests, so he can fulfill his personal interests?
The highest good is like water. Water benefits all things and does not compete. It stays in places that people dislike. Therefore, it is close to the Tao.
Dwell with the land, be deep in the heart, be generous in giving, speak with integrity, govern with justice, serve with ability, act with opportunity.
Only by not competing, can we live without blame.|Favor and disgrace bring one to fear. The great trouble lies in the body.
What does it mean that favor and disgrace bring fear?
Favor is degrading, fear comes when one gets it, and fear comes when one loses it.
This is what is meant by saying that favor and disgrace bring fear.
What does it mean that the great trouble lies in the body?
I have great trouble because I have a body.
When I no longer have a body, what trouble could I have?
Therefore, he who values the world as his body can be entrusted with the world.
He who loves the world as his body can be entrusted with the world.|To the utmost extent, keep to tranquility.
All things are at work, I watch their return.
Everything flourishes, each returns to its root.
Returning to the root is called tranquility, tranquility is called returning to one's destiny.
Returning to one's destiny is the eternal law. To know the eternal law is enlightenment.
Not knowing the eternal law leads to disaster.
Knowing the eternal law, one can be tolerant.
Being tolerant, one can be impartial.
Being impartial, one can be kingly.
Being kingly, one can be in tune with nature.
Being in tune with nature, one can be in accord with the Tao.
Being in accord with the Tao, one can last forever, even after the body decays.|The capacity of virtue is only from the Tao.
The things of the Tao, only elusive and vague.
Vague and elusive, yet within it there is image.
Elusive and vague, yet within it there is substance.
Dim and dark, yet within it there is essence.
This essence is very real, within it there is faith.
From ancient times till now, its name never departs, to observe the source of all things.
How do I know the nature of the source?|Bend to be complete, twist to be straight.
Hollow to be full, wear out to be new.
Have little to gain, have much to be confused.
Therefore, the sage holds on to the one and becomes the shepherd of the world.
He does not show himself, thus he is prominent.
He does not assert himself, thus he shines.
He does not boast of himself, thus he has merit.
He does not glorify himself, thus he excels.
He only strives to contend, so no one can contend against him.
The ancients who said that to bend is to be complete, were they not right?
Indeed, they return to wholeness.|There is something mixed and born before heaven and earth.
Silent and void, it stands alone and does not change.
It can be the mother of heaven and earth.
I do not know its name, so I call it Tao.
I am forced to name it as great.
Great means passing, passing means going far, going far means returning.
Tao is great, heaven is great, earth is great, and the king is also great.
In the country, there are four greats, and the king is one of them.
Man follows the earth, earth follows heaven, heaven follows Tao, Tao follows nature.|With Tao, the lord assists people, not with force in the world, his affairs are good to return.
Where the army is, thorns and briars grow.
The good man is the fruit and that's all, do not take it by force.
Fruit but do not boast, fruit but do not show off, fruit but do not brag, fruit but do not dwell, this is called fruit but not force.
Things grow old when they are strong, this is called not Tao, not Tao, soon already.
Hold the great image, the world goes, goes and does not harm, safe and peaceful, happy with bait, passers-by stop.
Therefore, the words of Tao are: bland, its tasteless, look at it, not enough to see, listen to it, not enough to hear, use it, can not be exhausted.|If you want to shrink it, you must first stretch it.
If you want to weaken it, you must first strengthen it.
If you want to remove it, you must first raise it.
If you want to take it, you must first give it.
This is called subtle clarity: soft and weak overcome strong, fish do not leave the deep, the state's sharp can not be shown to people.
Tao is always nameless, if the princes and kings can keep it, all things will transform themselves.
Transform and want to act, I will calm it with the nameless simplicity.
Calm it with the nameless simplicity, then they will not desire.
Without desire and quiet, heaven and earth will correct themselves.
context:
不上贤，使民不争。
不贵难得之货，使民不为盗。
不见可欲，使民不乱。
是以圣人之治也，
虚其心，实其腹，弱其志，强其骨，恒使民无知无欲也。使夫知不敢弗为而已，则无不治矣。|天地不仁，以万物为刍狗。
圣人不仁，以百姓为刍狗。
谷神不死，是谓玄牝。
玄牝之门，是谓天地之根。
绵绵兮若存，用之不勤。|天长地久。
天地之所以能长且久者，以其不自生也，故能长生。
是以圣人退其身而身先，外其身而身存，不以其无私與，故能成其私。
上善似水，水善利万物而有静，居众人之所恶，故几于道矣。
居善地，心善渊，予善天，言善信，政善治，事善能，动善时。
夫唯不争，故无尤。|宠辱若惊，贵大患若身。
何谓宠辱若惊？
宠之为下也，得之若惊，失之若惊，是谓宠辱若惊。
何谓贵大患若身？
吾所以有大患者。
为吾有身也，及吾无身。
有何患？
故：贵为身於为天下，若可以托天下矣；
爱以身为天下，汝可以寄天下。|至虚极也，守静督也，万物並作，吾以观其複也。
夫物芸芸，各复归于其根，归根曰静，静是谓复命。
复命常也，知常明也。不知常，妄，妄作，凶。
知常容，容乃公，公乃王，王乃天，天乃道，道乃久，没身不殆。 |孔德之容，唯道是从。
道之物，唯恍唯惚，惚兮恍兮，中有象兮，望兮惚兮，中有物兮，幽兮冥兮，其中有情兮。
其情甚真，其中有信。
自古及今，其名不去，以顺众父。
吾何以知众父之然？|曲则全，枉则正。
洼则盈，敝则新。
少则得，多则惑。
是以圣人执一，以为天下牧。
不自视故彰，不自见故明，不自伐故有功，弗矜故能长，夫唯不争，故莫能与之争。
古之所谓曲全者，几语哉，诚全归之。|有物混成，先天地生，寂兮寥兮，独立而不改，可以为天地母。
吾未知其名，字之曰道，吾强为之名曰大。
大曰逝，逝曰远，远曰反。
道大，天大，地大，王亦大。
国中有四大，而王居一焉。
人法地，地法天，天法道，道法自然。|以道佐人主，不以兵强于天下，其事好还。
师之所居，荆棘生之，善者果而已矣，毋以取强焉。
果而勿骄，果而勿矜，果而勿伐，果而毋得已居，是谓果而不强。
物壮而老，是谓之不道，不道早已。
执大象，天下往，往而不害，安平泰，乐与饵，过客止。
故道之出言也，曰：啖兮其无味也，视之不足见也，听之不足闻也，用之不可既也。|将欲歙之，必固张之。将欲弱之，必固强之。
将欲去之，必固举之。将欲夺之，必固与之。
是谓微明：柔弱胜强，鱼不脱于渊，邦利器不可以示人。
道恒无名，侯王若能守之，万物将自化。
化而欲作，吾将鎮之以无名之朴。
鎮之以无名之朴，夫将不欲。
不欲以静，天地将自正。
