original:
There is an inexplicable fear in my heart, this sect's array is not to be underestimated in terms of power.
Should I challenge the Star Array today?
context:
心中感到莫名惶恐，这镇派大阵恐怕威力不容小觑。
今天是否要挑战星宿大阵呢？

original: Challenge the Star Array! <color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 挑战星宿大阵！<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Turn around and run away.
context: 转身离开。

original: As the twenty-eight Taoists fell one by one, the illusion also dissipated, and you returned to reality...
context: 随着二十八名道人一个个倒下，幻象也随之解除，你重新回到现实中……

original:
The Star Array has been broken, you are indeed the disciple that the sect leader values!
{PlayerName}, this is the reward that the sect leader prepared for you back then, now it belongs to you.
context:
星宿大阵已破，不愧是掌教看重的弟子！
{PlayerName}，这是当年掌教特意备下的奖励，现在属于你了。

original: Thank you, Sect Leader!
context: 多谢掌教真人！

original:
Despite your best efforts, you were still outnumbered.
Fortunately, your fellow disciples stopped in time, saving your life.
A day later, you gradually woke up...
context:
虽然你竭尽全力，仍然寡不敌众。
幸好众位师兄及时收手，保住了你这条性命。
一天之后，你渐渐苏醒过来……

original: <size=200%><color=#00FFFF>Azure Dragon!</color></size>
context: <size=200%><color=#00FFFF>青龙！</color></size>

original: <size=200%><color=#F0E68C>White Tiger!</color></size>
context: <size=200%><color=#F0E68C>白虎！</color></size>

original: <size=200%><color=#FF0000>Vermilion Bird!</color></size>
context: <size=200%><color=#FF0000>朱雀！</color></size>

original: <size=200%><color=#00FF00>Black Tortoise!</color></size>
context: <size=200%><color=#00FF00>玄武！</color></size>

original: Test
context: 考验

original: {PlayerName}, our sect has a formation called Zhenwu Sword Formation, which is specifically used for testing the disciples within the sect.
context: {PlayerName}，咱们门派有一门阵法，叫做真武剑阵，专用于对门内弟子考核之用。

original: Now it's your turn to experience it, you just need to pass through the sword formation with <color=#c44b0e>30% power</color>.
context: 如今你也该去体验一番，只需通过<color=#c44b0e>三成威力的剑阵</color>即可。

original:
The secret to cracking the Zhenwu Sword Formation lies in breaking the formation's eye first!
And the formation's eye is all on Chang Chunzi, it can be said that if one prospers, all prosper; if one suffers, all suffer.
context:
破解真武剑阵的奥秘在于率先击溃阵眼！
而阵眼全系于长春子一人身上，可谓一荣俱荣一损俱损。

original: Having passed the test of the 30% power sword formation, you are now qualified to become a formal disciple of the Taoist Sect. Now I will pass on to you the unique talent of the Taoist Sect.
context: 通过三成威力剑阵的考核，你已有资格成为道玄宗的正式弟子了。现在我把道玄宗独门天赋传授给你。

original: Thank you, Sect Leader!
context: 多谢掌教真人！

original: Pilgrim
context: 香客

original: Help the old lady to offer incense at Taoist Sect·Zhenwu Hall.
context: 帮老婆婆到道玄宗·真武殿上香。

original: Go to see Zhong Yangzi for further information.
context: 去见重阳子了解后续情况。

original: Old lady, what are you doing here?
context: 老婆婆，您在这里做什么？

original: They say the incense of the Taoist Sect is spiritually effective, but the stone steps of the mountain gate are too high, the old woman walked step by step, now I really have no strength.
context: 都说道玄宗的香灵验，但这山门石阶太高，老婆子一步一步走来，现在实在没力气了。

original: Young man, can you do a small favor for the old woman?
context: 少年人，可否帮老婆子一个小忙呢？

original: Please tell me, old lady.
context: 老婆婆请说。

original:
The old woman came here specially to burn incense for blessings.
Praying that my weak and sick child can live a few more years, the old woman is still counting on him to support me in my old age.
context:
老婆子此番前来特意烧香求保佑的。
祈祷我家那体弱多病的孩子能多活几年，老婆子还指望他给我养老送终呢。

original:
But my legs and feet are not cooperating, I really can't walk anymore.
Could you help me to offer incense in the main hall, the old woman will pray here.
context:
可是我这腿脚不争气，实在走不动了。
麻烦你，帮我到大殿里上柱香，老婆子就在这里祈祷了。

original: This is the sandalwood that the old woman spent several days and nights making by hand, hoping that all the gods can feel the sincerity of the old woman.
context: 这是老婆子花费了几个昼夜亲手做的檀香，希望各路神明能感受到老婆子的诚意。

original: Okay, I'll help you.
context: 好，我来帮你。

original: Young man, haven't you helped the old woman offer incense yet?
context: 少年人，还没有帮老婆子上香吗？

original: {PlayerName}, what are you holding in your hand?
context: {PlayerName}，你手里拿的是什么呀？

original: Reply to the sect leader, an old woman with inconvenient legs and feet asked me to help her offer a stick of incense, she is praying outside for the safety of her child at home.
context: 回禀掌教，有位老婆婆腿脚不便，委托我帮她上一柱香，她在外面为家里孩子祈祷平安。

original:
It is our duty to be kind to others, you should help this old woman.
You go and offer the incense.
context:
与人为善是咱们的本份，你帮这位婆婆确实应该。
你去上香吧。

original: Strange, it seems to smell an unusual scent.
context: 奇怪，似乎闻到一股不寻常的气味。

original: {yell}{PlayerName}, hold your breath!
context: {yell}{PlayerName}，闭气！

original: There's poison in this incense...
context: 这香里有毒……

original: Good child, you really listened to granny's words.
context: 好孩子，果然听婆婆的话。

original: This voice sounds so familiar...
context: 这声音听得好耳熟……

original: Old witch, you dare to disguise and deceive me!
context: 老妖婆，你竟敢易容骗我！

original:
It's not very polite to call an old lady like that!
You've done something for granny, granny should thank you.
context:
这么称呼老人家可不太礼貌！
你帮婆婆做了事，婆婆还得多谢谢你呢。

original: Master, how does the Heart eater taste?
context: 掌教真人，这蚀心穿肠的滋味不好受吧？

original: May I ask your name, sir?
context: 请教阁下怎么称呼？

original: The old woman has long forgotten her name, people in the martial arts world call me Du Yapo, although I don't like it, you can use this name when you complain to the King of Hell.
context: 老婆子早忘记自己叫什么了，江湖里的人管我叫毒伢婆，我虽然不喜欢，但你们到阎王爷那里告状，还是可以用这个名字。

original: I've heard that a wicked old woman has recently appeared in the martial arts world, who confuses people's minds with poison and traffics women and children. It must be you.
context: 早就听说最近江湖上冒出一位靠下毒迷人心智，拐卖女子孩童的恶婆子，想必就是你了。

original:
That's right, it doesn't matter if I tell you.
You can't even protect yourselves, do you still want to stand up for them?
context:
不错，告诉你也无妨。
你们自身都难保了，莫非还想替他们做主吗？

original: (Lighting the special sandalwood made by the old woman and placing it in the incense burner)
context: （把老婆婆特制的檀香点燃后插在香炉中）

original: Granny, what is this?
context: 婆婆，你这是？

original: Hahahaha
context: 哈哈哈哈

original: {PlayerName}, what is the noble purpose of the Taoist Sect?
context: {PlayerName}，道玄宗的立派宗旨是什么？

original: Eliminate evil and kindness, maintain the righteous path of the world!
context: 除恶扬善，维系世间正道！

original: Forget about everything, cut off all troubles!
context: 太上忘情，斩断一切烦恼！

original: Educate all people, benevolence influences the world!
context: 教化万民，仁德感化世人！

original: Now that the villain is right in front of you, what should you do?
context: 如今恶徒便在眼前，你该当如何？

original: Eliminate evil completely!
context: 除恶务尽！

original: Persuade her to repent and be good.
context: 劝其改过向善。

original: Give her a way out.
context: 放她一条生路。

original:
Young man, the old woman admires your courage, but also worries about your brain.
Do you really not see the situation? Do you think you've been poisoned normally?
context:
少年人，老婆子钦佩你的胆量，但是也担忧你的脑子。
你当真看不清这形式吗？你们以为中的只是普通的毒吗？

original: Zhong Yangzi, I know you've been poisoned too, why are you still so pretentious at this time, is the righteous path just a shiny surface for outsiders to see?
context: 重阳子，我知道你也中了毒，此时何必还如此道貌岸然呢，你们正道难道只剩下一层光鲜表皮强撑给外人看吗？

original: Hehe, what is evil, what is good?
context: 嘿嘿，什么是过，什么是善？

original: You self-proclaimed righteous and honorable people like to define right and wrong, the old woman doesn't care about your set.
context: 你们这帮自诩为正道的伪君子，就喜欢自以为是的定义是非对错，老婆子可不稀罕你们这一套。

original: Today, the old woman is going to shake your martial arts myths!
context: 今天，老婆子偏要动一动你们这些武林神话！

original: Hahaha, young man, are you stupid?
context: 哈哈哈，少年人，你傻了吗？

original: You can't even protect yourselves, and you're still talking about giving the old woman a way out...
context: 你们自身都要难保，还扬言要放老婆子生路……

original: At this point, can you still kill the old woman?
context: 事到如今，你们莫非还能致老婆子于死地吗？

original:
Enough, old witch!
Today I will make you pay a heavy price even if I have to risk my life!
context:
够了，老妖婆！
今天我拼了这条命不要也定会叫你付出惨痛代价！

original: This is impossible, why didn't the poison work on you!
context: 这不可能，毒药怎么对你没起作用！

original: Your poison incense did work, it's just that my determination to eliminate evil suppressed the pain caused by the poison, although this will bring some risks, but it's worth it to bring you, the old witch, to justice!
context: 你这毒香并非没起作用，是我除恶的决心强压下了毒患引起的疼痛，虽然这样做会带来不少隐患，但是能把你这老妖婆就地正法，也算值了！

original: You're a madman, you're so young and you don't want to live!
context: 真是个疯子，你年纪轻轻不要命了！

original: Rather than sitting and waiting for death, it's better to take a risk and fight, it's best to kill you, the old witch, even if I can't, I'll make you look down on my Taoist Sect!
context: 与其坐以待毙，不如铤而走险搏一搏，能干掉你这老妖婆最好，就算干不掉，也叫你不敢小瞧我道玄宗！

original: What a bunch of madmen! The old woman doesn't plan to exchange life with you.
context: 真是一群疯子！老婆子可不打算跟你以命换命。

original: Where are you running, old witch!
context: 老妖婆哪里跑！

original: Uh--

Your vision goes black, your body can't exert any strength, you fall straight to the ground, unconscious.
You finally woke up after a whole day and night...
context:
你眼前一黑，身体再也使不出一丝力气，直直栽倒在地，失去了意识。
整整过了一天一夜，你才终于醒转……

original: {PlayerName}, you're awake. How are your injuries?
context: {PlayerName}，你醒了。伤势如何了？

original: Reporting to the Sect Leader, it's no longer a problem.
context: 回禀掌教，已经不碍事了。

original: The poison you were poisoned with, I have used MP to force it out of your body, no hidden dangers will be left.
context: 你所中之毒我已用内力帮你逼出体外，半点隐患也不会留下。

original: Thank you, Sect Leader!
context: 多谢掌教！

original: {PlayerName}, the old Taoist sees his younger self in you - passionate, impulsive, and upright. You've done well, and the old Taoist is pleased.
context: {PlayerName}，在你身上老道看到了自己年轻时候的影子，热血、冲动、正直。你做的很好，老道很欣慰。

original: As a reward for your outstanding performance, the old Taoist will pass on to you a secret technique that he has been meditating on for many years!
context: 作为你这次出色表现的奖励，老道把闭关多年领悟的绝招传授给你！

original: Thank you for teaching me the secret technique, Master!
context: 多谢掌教传授绝招！

original: You have made significant contributions to the Taoist Sect, and the old Taoist has specially allowed you to enter the Star Chaser Pavilion!
context: 如今你为道玄宗贡献不小，老道特准许你进入摘星阁！

original: I was so close, I could have...
context: 就差一点，我就能……

original: Uh--
Boy, the old woman will send you on your way first, then that old thing!
context: 小子，老婆子先送你一程，然后再送那个老东西！

original: Hmph, you really have no idea about the situation in front of you.
context: 哼，你还真是对面前的处境一无所知啊。

original: What? How come you're not poisoned!
context: 怎么？你怎么，你没中毒！

original: Leave the antidote, or die!
context: 留下解药，或者，死！

original: You were seriously injured and unconscious, slumbering for a whole day and night...
context: 你重伤昏迷，昏睡了整整一天一夜……

original: {PlayerName}, you're awake. How are your injuries?
context: {PlayerName}，你醒了。伤势如何了？

original: Reporting to the Sect Leader, it's no longer a problem.
context: 回禀掌教，已经不碍事了。

original: The poison you were poisoned with, I have used MP to force it out of your body, no hidden dangers will be left.
context: 你所中之毒我已用内力帮你逼出体外，半点隐患也不会留下。

original: Thank you, Sect Leader!
context: 多谢掌教！

original: The old Taoist can't protect you for a lifetime. In the future, your generation will need to shield the Taoist Sect from wind and rain. So, {PlayerName}, you need to work hard.
context: 老道无法护你们一生一世，今后还需要你们这一辈为道玄宗遮风挡雨，所以，{PlayerName}你还需努力啊。

original: Strange, it seems to smell an unusual scent.
context: 奇怪，似乎闻到一股不寻常的气味。

original: {yell}{PlayerName}, hold your breath!
context: {yell}{PlayerName}，闭气！

original: There's poison in this incense...
context: 这香里有毒……

original: Kid, no matter how cunning you are, you can't escape my calculations.
context: 小崽子，任你精明似鬼，也难逃婆婆我的算计。

original: This voice sounds so familiar...
context: 这声音听得好耳熟……

original: It's you! Weren't you already...
context: 是你！你不是已经……

original: Hehe!
context: 嘿嘿！

original: Disguise, faking death... You guys really have deep plans.
context: 易容、假死……你们还真是布局机深啊。

original: What can you do now that you know?
context: 你现在就算知道了那又如何呢？

original: The Successor of the Three Sects
context: 三教传人

original: Successor
context: 传人

original: Invite Lai Toudian and Cai Youzhi to the Buddha Temple to challenge the demon.
context: 邀请癞头癫、蔡攸之前往浮屠寺挑战魔头。

original: Go back and report the situation to Zhong Yangzi.
context: 回去向重阳子禀报情况。

original: {PlayerName}, have you ever heard of the story of the Successor of the Three Sects?
context: {PlayerName}，你可听说过三教传人的典故？

original: I haven't heard of it.
context: 没有听说过。

original: There is a hidden story in it, and it's time for you to know.
context: 这其中本是有一段隐情，如今也是时候叫你知道了。

original: Decades ago, the masters of the three sects came out in full force and jointly attacked a demon. For some reasons, they couldn't kill him and could only trap him.
context: 数十年前，三教高手尽出，曾合力围攻一名魔头，因为某些原因不能将其杀死，只能将他困住无法脱身。

original: In the end, the three sects and the demon made a bet, which made him give up resistance and willingly be imprisoned.
context: 最后三教与这位魔头签订赌约，这才使他放弃抵抗自愿被囚禁起来。

original: What kind of bet could make the demon willingly be captured?
context: 是什么赌约能让魔头甘心被俘？

original: The three sects had to select the most outstanding disciples of the past decade to represent the Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, and Confucius Temple, as the successors of the three sects, to challenge the demon together.
context: 三教中要选出近十年来最杰出的弟子，分别代表道玄宗、释法寺、儒圣馆，作为三教传人，联手向那魔头发起挑战。

original: If they can defeat the demon with half of his strength, the demon promises to willingly be imprisoned for another ten years. If they fail, he will break out of prison and reappear in the martial arts world!
context: 若能打赢魔头五成功力，那魔头则承诺甘愿再被囚禁十年，如果失败，则会破牢而出，重现江湖！

original: At that time, the demon was already invincible in the world. If he reappears in the martial arts world, he will inevitably stir up a bloody storm again, and no one will be able to compete with him.
context: 当年这魔头已经功堪造化天下无敌，如果重出江湖，势必再度掀起腥风血雨，届时再没有人能够与之抗衡。

original: {PlayerName}, you are extraordinary and talented. You can represent the Taoist Sect and join the other two sects to complete this great task of suppressing the demon!
context: {PlayerName}，你身居异相，天资不俗，可作为道玄宗传人联合另外两大门派，完成这次戡魔大任！

original: Who are the successors of the Shifa Temple and Confucius Temple? And where can we find this demon?
context:
释法寺、儒圣馆的传人是哪两位？
我们又到那里去寻找这魔头呢？

original: The successor of the Shifa Temple is <color=#c44b0e>Lai Toudian</color>, and the successor of the Confucius Temple is <color=#c44b0e>Cai Youzhi</color>.
context: 释法寺的<color=#c44b0e>癞头癫</color>，儒圣馆的<color=#c44b0e>蔡攸之</color>是释、儒两家传人。

original: The demon is now trapped in the <color=#c44b0e>Tongtian Tower in the Buddha Temple</color>. Don't provoke him unless you are absolutely sure.
context: 那魔头如今被困在<color=#c44b0e>浮屠寺内的通天塔</color>中，若没有十足把握千万莫去招惹他。

original: {PlayerName}, this matter concerns the lives of all people in the world, so don't act rashly.
context: {PlayerName}，此事关系天下苍生，切莫鲁莽行事。

original: I will follow the Master's teachings!
context: 谨遵掌教教诲！

original: Master, the great demon Chu Kuangsheng was accidentally killed in the chaos. I can't escape the blame, please punish me.
context:
启禀掌教，大魔头楚狂生在混战中被失手打死。
弟子难逃其咎，请掌教责罚。

original: How is that possible... Did he say anything before he died?
context:
怎么可能……
他临死前有没有说过什么？

original: No, he didn't leave any words.
context: 没有，他什么话也没留下。

original: Alas, it's fate.
context: 唉，天意啊。

original: {PlayerName}, you have made contributions in suppressing the demon. Here are your rewards.
context: {PlayerName}，本次戡魔有功，这些是对你的奖励。

original: This great demon is powerful, do not engage him without full confidence, lest he escapes in the midst of chaos.
context: 这大魔头功力深厚，没有十足把握切莫与他交手，以免功亏一篑，让他脱身逃去。

original: The martial world can be peaceful for another ten years...
context: 江湖又可平静十年了……

original: {PlayerName}, you have made a great contribution to this demon suppression, I am quite pleased, these are your rewards.
context: {PlayerName}，本次戡魔有功，为师颇为欣慰，这些是对你的奖励。

original:
Ah! This, this, this is bad...
The martial world may be plunged into chaos again...
context:
啊！这，这，这下糟了……
今后江湖恐怕要再掀起腥风血雨了……

original: {PlayerName}, have you ever heard of the story of the Successor of the Three Sects?
context: {PlayerName}，你可听说过三教传人的典故？

original: I haven't heard of it.
context: 没有听说过。

original: There is a hidden story in it, and it's time for you to know.
context: 这其中本是有一段隐情，如今也是时候叫你知道了。

original: Decades ago, the masters of the three sects came out in full force and jointly attacked a demon. For some reasons, they couldn't kill him and could only trap him.
context: 数十年前，三教高手尽出，曾合力围攻一名魔头，因为某些原因不能将其杀死，只能将他困住无法脱身。

original: In the end, the three sects and the demon made a bet, which made him give up resistance and willingly be imprisoned.
context: 最后三教与这位魔头签订赌约，这才使他放弃抵抗自愿被囚禁起来。

original: What kind of bet could make the demon willingly be captured?
context: 是什么赌约能让魔头甘心被俘？

original: The three sects had to select the most outstanding disciples of the past decade to represent the Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, and Confucius Temple, as the successors of the three sects, to challenge the demon together.
context: 三教中要选出近十年来最杰出的弟子，分别代表道玄宗、释法寺、儒圣馆，作为三教传人，联手向那魔头发起挑战。

original: If they can defeat the demon with half of his strength, the demon promises to willingly be imprisoned for another ten years. If they fail, he will break out of prison and reappear in the martial arts world!
context: 若能打赢魔头五成功力，那魔头则承诺甘愿再被囚禁十年，如果失败，则会破牢而出，重现江湖！

original: At that time, the demon was already invincible in the world. If he reappears in the martial arts world, he will inevitably stir up a bloody storm again, and no one will be able to compete with him.
context: 当年这魔头已经功堪造化天下无敌，如果重出江湖，势必再度掀起腥风血雨，届时再没有人能够与之抗衡。

original: {PlayerName}, you are extraordinary and talented. You can represent the Taoist Sect and join the other two sects to complete this great task of suppressing the demon!
context: {PlayerName}，你身居异相，天资不俗，可作为道玄宗传人联合另外两大门派，完成这次戡魔大任！

original: The head of the sect need not worry.
context: 掌教不必担忧。

original: Some time ago, when I was traveling down the mountain, I happened to repel a strange man who called himself "Chu Kuangsheng".
context: 早些时日弟子下山游历途中，正好击退了自称“楚狂生”的怪人。

original:
How is that possible...
Did he say anything before he left?
context:
怎么可能……
他临走前有没有说过什么？

original: No, he didn't leave any words.
context: 没有，他什么话也没留下。

original: Alas, it's fate.
context: 唉，天意啊。

original: {PlayerName}, your unintentional act has saved the entire martial world from a great disaster, these are your rewards.
context: {PlayerName}，你的无意之举帮整个江湖逃过了大劫，这些是对你的奖励。
哈哈哈，是人！老夫好久没看到活人了！
你是什么人？怎么会在这塔顶？
外面刀光剑影的日子过腻了，老夫在这里躲几年清净。
听前辈口气应该是很厉害的角色，晚辈{PlayerName}，不知道前辈怎么称呼？
老夫便是数十年前杀人不眨眼、动辄灭人满门、大闹三教的楚狂生。
小娃娃，看你脸色一脸茫然，莫非你从没听说过老夫？

闻所未闻。
如果你真有你说的那么厉害，应该到处都有你的传闻才是。
哼，那些家伙为了自己的颜面，想必是三缄其口，把关于老夫的事情全都抹除了。
唉，这也是意料之中的事情，他们一贯如此。
前辈有什么事情需要晚辈效劳的吗？
小娃娃你要真想陪老夫解闷，就每天过来陪老夫打一架活动活动筋骨。
晚辈怎么有本事跟前辈较量，岂不是太自不量力了。
放心，你不是三教的人，老夫不会对你出全力的！
小子，做好准备跟老夫过招了吗？
前辈在牢笼中，晚辈在牢笼外则如何过招？
唉，真是婆婆妈妈。
什么情况，前辈你怎么从牢笼里出来了？
老夫不喜欢这么多废话的人，到底打不打？
恭敬不如从命。<color=#097a76>（主角单挑）</color>
还没准备好……
有点意思，让老夫看看如今的江湖新秀有多大出息！

嗯，不错。
你叫{PlayerName}是吧，是个人物，将来必定大有出息。
现在的江湖似乎有点意思了，老夫也静极思动，该外出活动活动了。
小娃娃，咱们后会有期。
今天就到这里吧，等你练出名堂再来找老夫吧。
准备要跟老夫比试了吗？
准备好了。<color=#097a76>（主角单挑）</color>
还没准备好……
有点意思，让老夫看看如今的江湖新秀有多大出息！
唉，等你练出名堂再来找老夫吧。
小娃娃， 你身上有三教的气息，莫非又到了三教传人陪老夫解闷的时候吗？
你就是那个大魔头？

大魔头？
哈哈哈，当年老夫仅凭一人之力就颠覆整个三教，这大魔头的称呼倒也恰如其分。
你被关在这里这么多年，看起来没有丝毫悔改的意思，真不知道当初为何要留下你这个祸患。

小娃娃， 看来你对当初的事情一无所知啊。
恐怕就连老夫的名字——楚狂生，他们也不曾告诉你吧。
难道当年的事情还有隐情？

算啦，那是我们上一辈的恩怨，与你无关。
你只是为了完成师门任务而已，其他事知道越少越好。

你们三教传人来齐了吗？
老夫已经等了十年，已经快没有耐心了。
准备好了！<color=#097a76>（仅限{PlayerName}、癞头癫、蔡攸之出战）</color>
准备好了！<color=#097a76>（仅限{PlayerName}、癞头癫、邋遢张出战）</color>
准备好了！<color=#097a76>（仅限{PlayerName}、蔡攸之、邋遢张出战）</color>
我不代表三教，今天特为杀你而来！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>
还没准备好。
有点意思，让老夫看看如今的江湖新秀有多大出息！

有趣有趣，这次的三教传人比上次要出息！
老夫遵守约定，便在这里再呆上十年。

哼，三教传人果然一代不如一代！
既然你们输了，那么老夫不必再遵守约定……

{yell}道玄宗、释法寺、儒圣馆！
老子来找你们晦气了！

这下糟了，叫他给跑了！
我得赶紧告知师门，也好早做准备。

好小子，够狂！老夫喜欢！
看你有多大本事能取老夫性命！
这魔头实力虽强，不过毕竟年老体衰，怎么会是我的对手？

嗯，不错。
你叫{PlayerName}是吧，是个人物，将来必定大有出息。
姓{PlayerSurName}的小子，老夫从你眼中看到了无边的杀意和戾气，有点意思。

老夫有一门武功很适合你这种人，送你了！
老夫很期待你这种人物，将来会在江湖上掀起多大风浪。
现在的江湖似乎有点意思了，老夫也静极思动，该外出活动活动了。
小娃娃，咱们后会有期。

original: Finally, a fish has taken the bait, it's worth waiting here for so long...
context: 终于有鱼儿上钩了，不枉费咱家在这里等候这么久……

original: Why are they all small fish and shrimps? It really disappoints me.
context: 怎么净是一些小鱼小虾？真是败坏咱家的心请。

original: Tong, who are you calling small fish and shrimp!
context: 姓佟的，你说谁是小鱼小虾！

original:
Oh, I thought it was someone else? You little guy is still alive?
Today is just right, I can settle this matter.
context:
哎哟，咱家还以为是谁呢？你这个小家伙原来还没死呢？
今天正好，咱家可以结了这桩心事。

original: Who is the small fish and shrimp is still unknown, perhaps you are not even as good as a fish worm!
context: 谁是小鱼小虾还不知道呢，兴许你连鱼虫都不如！

original:
You don't even recognize me, you are indeed a newborn calf who is not afraid of tigers.
Let me tell you, so you won't be a confused ghost in the underworld, I am Tong Daofu from the Imperial City Division!
context:
竟然不识得咱家，果然是初生牛犊不怕虎。
就告诉你吧，省的去了地府做个糊涂鬼，咱家是皇城司的佟道辅！

original:
Oh, isn't this the famous hero {PlayerSurName}?
I didn't expect that I would catch you while fishing, what a pleasant surprise.
context:
呦，这不是大名鼎鼎的{PlayerSurName}大侠吗？
没想到，咱家钓鱼竟然把你给钓上来了，真是意外之喜呀。

original: Tong, so it was you who set up the trap, trying to catch all the martial artists who came for the treasure with your so-called treasure?
context: 姓佟的，原来是你背后设局，是想用所谓的宝贝把来夺宝的江湖人一网打尽吗？

original:
Oh, I don't have such a big appetite as you said.
It's just that catching you, this big fat fish, is a blessing from heaven.
context:
哎哟哟，咱家哪像你说的有那么大的胃口啊？
只不过钓到你这条大肥鱼，也算是上天眷顾咱家。

original:
Who are you?
Are you the one setting up the trap, planning to catch all the martial artists who come for the treasure with your so-called treasure?
context:
你是什么人？
莫非是你在背后设局，打算用所谓的宝贝把来夺宝的江湖人一网打尽吗？

original:
I am Tong Daofu from the Imperial City Division.
I don't have such a big appetite, having you, this big fat fish, is enough for me.
context:
咱家是皇城司的佟道辅。
咱家胃口没有那么大，有你这条大肥鱼，就够咱家果腹了。

original: Why so much nonsense, if you want to fight, just do it.
context: 废话那么多干嘛，要打就动手吧。

original:
Oh, don't get so angry, you're young and you're not afraid of ruining your health.
Do you think I'm easy to bully because I'm alone?
context:
哎呦，别动那么大火气，年纪轻轻也不怕气坏了身子。
你是不是觉得咱家孤身一人，好欺负得很？

original: You set up the trap on purpose, naturally you won't take risks easily, I suppose you have already surrounded this place.
context: 你主动布局，自然不会轻易涉险，想必这里已经被包围了吧。

original: Hehehe, it's a rare blessing for a smart little guy like you to die in my hands.
context: 呵呵呵，你这么聪明的小家伙能死在咱家手里也算是难得的福气了。

original: Now, who is the butcher and who is the meat?
context: 现在你我的状况，谁是刀俎谁是鱼肉？

original: Hehehehe——
context: 嘿嘿嘿嘿——

original:
Kid, you're still too green.
I am the commander of the Imperial City Division, how could I have only this trick.
context:
小子，你到底还是太嫩了。
咱家可是堂堂皇城司的指挥使，怎么可能就这点手段。

original: Do you have any other tricks?
context: 莫非你还有后手？

original: {yell}, all of you go to hell!
context: {yell}都给咱家去死吧！

original: That was close, I didn't expect this guy to have such strength left.
context: 好险啊，想不到这家伙还有这般余力。

original: With one less schemer like this in the martial world, there will be more peace.
context: 江湖上少一些这样的阴谋家，便会多一分太平。

original: You all, in front of my Hatori Hyoe, are nothing but ants!
context: 尔等，在吾服部兵卫面前，不过蝼蚁！

original: What is this guy doing here again?
context: 这个家伙又来这里搞什么事情？

original: The barbarians of the small island, trying to get their hands on the treasures of the Central Plains, are simply overestimating themselves.
context: 弹丸小岛的蛮夷之辈，妄图染指中原宝物，简直自不量力。

original: Although the martial arts of the Central Plains are not united, it's not your turn to stir up trouble.
context: 中原武林虽然不合，但是还轮不到你这外人浑水摸鱼。

original: You rats of Dragonfly City, my Langya Sword Pavilion is at odds with you!
context: 蚍蜉城的鼠辈，我琅琊剑阁与你们势不两立！

original:
Hahaha, hypocrite!
If you have the guts, join forces and bring me down first.
context:
哈哈哈哈，虚伪！
你们有本事，就先合力让吾倒下吧。

original: (Do you want to intervene?)
context: （是否出手干预？）

original: Join the siege of Hatori Hyoe. <color=#c44b0e>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 参与围攻服部兵卫。<color=#c44b0e>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Just watch the changes.
context: 静观其变。

original: The rats of Dragonfly City are nothing more than that!
context: 蚍蜉城的鼠辈也不过如此！

original: Has the Central Plains martial arts opened your eyes?
context: 中原武林可否让你开了眼界？

original: Don't be arrogant, wait for me to come back another day!
context: 尔等莫要嚣张，待我他日卷土重来！

original: You, are you not afraid of death?
context: 汝，不怕死么！

original: You're just a defeated general, what right do you have to be so arrogant.
context: 手下败将而已，你有什么资格如此狂妄。

original: You know nothing about me!
context: 汝对吾一无所知！

original: You can remain unscathed even when besieged by disciples of several major sects, I'm not sure I can handle you.
context: 几大派弟子围攻，你都能安然无恙，我并没有把握对付你。

original: You're frank enough, but I don't plan to let you live to run away.
context: 汝够坦率，不过吾不打算让汝活着离开。

original: In that case, shut up and make your move!
context: 既然如此，收起你的废话，出招吧！

original: I wonder if this battle counts as eliminating a major hidden danger for the future.
context: 不知道我这一战算不算为将来除去了一大隐患。

original: If all the martial arts in the Central Plains are as cowardly as you, I don't need to worry!
context: 中原武林若都像你这般懦夫行径，吾反倒不必过虑！

original: Hmph! You're not worthy to fight with me!
context: 哼！汝不配与我一战！

original: Mediation
context: 调解

original: Do you need Linlang Temple to mediate for you, young friend?
context: 小友可是需要琳琅馆为你出面调解？

original: Need mediation.
context: 需要调解。

original: Not for now.
context: 暂时不需要。

original: It's better to resolve disputes than to create them, young friend, you should be forgiving when you can.
context: 冤家宜解不宜结，小友行走江湖得饶人处且饶人。

original: This chess game is broken, there's nothing to see.
context: 这棋局已破，没什么可看的了。

original: The layout of this chess game seems a bit peculiar, do you want to play a game?
context: 这棋局布局似乎有些奇特，是否手谈一局？

original: Touch the chessboard and chess pieces. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 触动棋盘棋子。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Do nothing.
context: 不做任何动作。

original:
It turns out that cracking this chess game will reward a manual, this is unexpected.
I'd better keep it safe, so as not to benefit others.
context:
原来这棋局破解后会奖励一本秘籍，这真是出乎意料。
我可得收好了，免得便宜别人。

original: With my current strength, I can't crack this chess game yet, I'll come back later.
context: 凭我如今实力还破解不了这棋局，等以后再来吧。

original: This chess game is so profound?
context: 这棋局如此深奥？

original: I feel dizzy!
context: 头好晕！

original: Wolf Trouble in Xiangfan Region
context: 襄樊狼患

original: Help the bailiff of Chuxiang City collect 10 Wolf fangs.
context: 帮楚襄城的差役收集10枚狼牙。

original: Go to the notice board to find the bailiff of Chuxiang City.
context: 去布告栏前寻找楚襄城差役。

original: Young hero, wait a moment!
context: 少侠且慢！

original:
I see that you are brave and extraordinary, you must be a martial artist.
Did you just make a move to take on this task from the notice board?
context:
我看少侠英武不凡，想必是有武艺在身之人。
少侠方才举动似是要接下这布告栏上的委托任务吗？

original: I'll check the difficulty of the task first, then decide whether to take it.
context: 我先看看任务难度，再决定是否会接。

original: Please do me a favor, young hero, there will be a reward upon completion.
context: 拜托少侠做一件事情，事成必有谢礼。

original: What do you want me to do for you?
context: 你想让我帮你做什么事？

original:
There is a valley outside Chuxiang City, called Wild Wolf Valley!
It's full of wolves, and all the people who come and go avoid it.
context:
在这楚襄城外有一处山谷，名为野狼谷！
里面群狼聚集，来往百姓无不敬而远之。

original: I would like to ask you to go to Wild Wolf Valley to clear out these wild wolves and bring back <color=#c44b0e>10 Wolf fangs</color> as proof.
context: 我想请少侠前往野狼谷清除这些野狼，并取回<color=#c44b0e>10枚狼牙</color>作为证明。

original: Such a dangerous place, you don't go yourself but ask me to go to die, what's your intention?
context: 那么危险的地方，你自己不去倒叫我去送死，有什么居心呢？

original: Under heavy reward, there must be a brave man. If you can help me with this, I will give you a <color=#c44b0e>treasure that generates money every day</color>!
context: 重赏之下必有勇夫，少侠若能帮我做成此事，我便送少侠一件<color=#c44b0e>每日生钱的宝物</color>！

original: I've got 10 Wolf fangs, I wonder if the bailiff in the city is still waiting for me.
context: 10枚狼牙到手了，不知道城里那名差役是否还在原地等侯。

original: There are many wild wolves in Wild Wolf Valley, don't go too deep, be careful not to get flanked and can't get out.
context: 野狼谷里野狼不少，可千万不要深入其中，当心腹背受敌逃不出来。

original: How's the collection of 10 Wolf fangs going?
context: 10枚狼牙收集的如何了？

original: I've collected them all. <color=#097a76>(10 Wolf fangs)</color>
context: 已经收集齐。<color=#097a76>（狼牙10个）</color>

original: Not yet, you wait a little longer.
context: 还没有，你再等等。

original:
Young hero, you are indeed reliable. I didn't wait for you in vain.
Here is the treasure I promised you. Keep it safe.
context:
少侠办事果然叫人放心，不枉我等你多时。
这是承诺给你的宝贝，你可要收好了。

original: Why would you want to exchange this treasure for a few Wolf fangs with me?
context: 你既然有这宝贝为何要跟我换几枚狼牙？

original: This Three-legged golden toad may seem like a treasure, but it's actually quite useless. It's better to exchange it for some practical benefits. These Wolf fangs are my achievements and proof of my bravery in killing wolves. They will be useful for my promotion in the future!
context: 这三足金蟾看似宝贝，其实非常鸡肋，与其留在身边不如将它换些实惠的好处。这狼牙可是我的业绩，也是我英勇杀狼的证明，以后升职用得上！

original: I need to hand in these Wolf fangs as soon as possible, so no one else can get to them first.
context: 我要赶紧把这几枚狼牙交上去，免得又被人抢了先。

original: Brother, do you know why I brought you to Lin'an City?
context: 兄弟，你可知我为何要带你来着霖安城？

original: Isn't it to show me the prosperity of Lin'an City?
context: 仁兄不是让我见识这霖安城的锦绣繁华吗？

original:
No, no!
I've heard rumors from my brothers in the martial arts world that there's a rare treasure hidden in Lin'an City!
context:
非也，非也！
最近听道上兄弟传闻，这霖安城里藏着一件稀世珍宝！

original: Are you here to hunt for treasure?
context: 仁兄莫不是来寻宝的？

original: Since it's a treasure, many people must be coveting it. Let's just watch the excitement.
context: 既然是宝贝，想必不少人觊觎，咱们瞧个热闹就行了。

original: Being able to see a rare treasure with my own eyes is indeed worth the trip.
context: 能亲眼见到稀世珍宝，的确也不虚此行了。

original: It is said that the treasure is hidden at the top of the <color=#097a76>Enlightment Tower</color>. Let's go and see the excitement.
context: 据说那宝贝就藏在<color=#097a76>开化塔顶层</color>，咱们这便动身去瞧热闹吧。

original: It's really a bad year. We've been robbed by bandits time and time again. This Government Office is just like a decoration.
context: 真是流年不利，屡次三番遭到强盗打劫，这衙门跟摆设一样。

original: Could it be the thieves from the Horse King Cave outside the city?
context: 莫非又是城外马王洞那伙贼人？

original: Who else could it be!
context: 不是他们还能是谁！

original: The government's reward notice has been posted for many years. Many heroes have gone and never returned, and they have become even more rampant!
context: 官府的悬赏告示张贴多年，多少好汉有去无回，他们更是越发猖狂！

original: I hope there will be a highly skilled hero who can eliminate this trouble for us.
context: 希望能有一位本领高强的侠士，为咱们除掉这一祸患吧。

original: Alas, I hope so...
context: 唉，但愿如此吧……

original: Jianghu Master
context: 武林盟主

original: Head to the Ritual Platform to prepare to take over as Jianghu Master.
context: 前往封禅台，准备接任武林盟主。

original: Head to Ritual Platform, prepare to be re-elected as Jianghu Master.
context: 前往封禅台，准备连任武林盟主。

original: "The Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Fotress, and Crime Investigation Bureau jointly recommend {PlayerName} to take over the position of Jianghu Master that has been vacant for many years..."
context: “道玄宗、释法寺、儒圣馆、琅琊剑阁、九江水寨、神捕门联名举荐由{PlayerName}接任空缺多年的武林盟主之职……”

original: "The <#c44b0e>Ritual Platform</color> is where the various sects of the martial arts world elect the Jianghu Master. Please go to the Ritual Platform to participate in the Jianghu Master succession ceremony!"
context: “<#c44b0e>封禅台</color>乃江湖各派选举武林盟主之处，请阁下前往封禅台，参加武林盟主接任大典！”

original:
Choosing to hold the Jianghu Master succession ceremony here is really ambitious!
I need to be fully prepared to participate in this succession ceremony, so as not to fail their test and be laughed at.
context:
选在此处举行武林盟主接任大典，真是好大气魄！
我需得准备万全才能参加这接任大典，免得接不下他们的考验，被人耻笑。

original: Join the Jianghu Master ceremony! (Companion leaves the team)
context: 参加武林盟主大典！（伙伴离队）

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还未准备好。

original: The foreign enemy Yan Kingdom's Agile invasion, the various forces of the court each holding their own territory, the constant strife among the martial arts sects...
context: 外敌燕国伺机入侵、朝廷诸多势力各自割据、江湖门派争斗不止……

original: In such a chaotic time, we need a person who is the hope of everyone, to turn the tide and support the collapsing building.
context: 时逢如此乱世，我们需要一位众望所归之人，挽狂澜于既倒，扶大厦之将倾

original: {PlayerName}, you are a rare young hero in recent decades, and now you are highly respected by all major sects. You are the person everyone is hoping for!
context: {PlayerName}，你是近数十年间罕见的少年英雄，如今颇得各大门派推崇，你便是这众望所归之人！

original: According to the rules of the past, anyone who is elected as Jianghu Master must defeat all the sect leaders present one by one to gain final recognition.
context: 按照历代的规矩，凡是推选成为武林盟主之人，需得一一击败在场各位掌门，才能获得最终认可。

original: In that case, I ask the sect leaders to teach me!
context: 既然如此，就请各位掌门赐教吧！

original: Which sect leader will teach me first?
context: 哪位掌门谁先赐教？

original: {PlayerName}, I, Luo Tianxiong from the Crime Investigation Bureau, will learn from you!
context: {PlayerName}，我神捕门·洛天雄向你讨教！

original: Master Luo, please!
context: 洛总捕头，请！

original: I admit defeat, as I am not as skilled as you.
context: 在下技不如人，我认输。

original:
I will compete with you in this round.
Jiujiang Fotress·Ding Fengbo, please teach me!
context:
这一场我来跟你比试。
九江水寨·定风波，请赐教！

original: Master Ding, please!
context: 定寨主，请！

original: Young hero, you are superior in skills. I admire you!
context: 少侠技高一筹，定某佩服！

original:
I will accompany you in this battle.
Confucius Temple·Cai Yuanchang, please make your move, young hero.
context:
这一战由老夫奉陪吧。
儒圣馆·蔡元常，请少侠出招吧。

original: Master Cai, please!
context: 蔡馆主，请！

original: Indeed, the student surpasses the master.
context: 果然青出于蓝而胜于蓝。

original: Langya Sword Pavilion·Jian Chi, please make your move, young hero!
context: 琅琊剑阁·剑痴，请少侠出手吧！

original: Senior, please enlighten me!
context: 前辈，请赐教！

original: A hero in his youth, this old man can't keep up anymore.
context: 英雄出少年，老夫不服老不行了。

original:
Amitabha, let this old monk make the move in this round. 
Shifa Temple·Hui Yuan, please make your move, benefactor.
context:
阿弥陀佛，这一场就由老衲出手吧。
释法寺·慧元，请施主出招吧。

original: Master Hui Yuan, please!
context: 慧元大师，请！

original: Well, well.
context: 善哉，善哉。

original: This is the final battle. If you can defeat the long sword in the hands of the old Taoist, you will truly be a Jianghu Master.
context: 此一战为最后一战，若能胜过老道手中长剑，你便是名副其实的武林盟主了。

original: Taoist Sect·Zhong Yangzi, please make your move, young hero!
context: 道玄宗·重阳子，请少侠出招！

original: Head of the sect, please!
context: 掌教真人，请！

original: Boundless Heavenly Lord!
context: 无量天尊！

original: {PlayerName} is universally acknowledged, and his martial arts skills are unparalleled. The old Taoist announces: {PlayerName} is the new Jianghu Master!
context: {PlayerName}众望所归，武功修为更是独步江湖，老道宣布：{PlayerName}，便是当今天下新一任的武林盟主！

original: Congratulations to the leader {PlayerSurName}!
context: 恭贺{PlayerSurName}盟主！

original: Now I have become the universally honored Jianghu Master, what should I do next?
context: 如今我已成为人人敬仰的武林盟主，接下来该如何打算呢？

original: End of the martial arts career.
context: 结束江湖生涯。

original: Continue to travel in Jianghu.
context: 继续游历江湖。

original:
I am honored to be elevated to the position of Jianghu Master by all the seniors.
From now on, I, {PlayerName}, will live up to everyone's trust, and will do my utmost to settle the chaos in Jianghu and resist the invasion of evil cults in the Central Plains Jianghu.
context:
在下受各位前辈抬举，忝居武林盟主之位。
从今往后，我{PlayerName}，必将不负众位所托，定会穷尽必生之力平定江湖乱局，抵御邪教侵扰中原江湖。

original:
This grand event is a rare opportunity, don't take it lightly! 
We will temporarily run away from the team, and you can find us at the old place after the event.
context:
这场盛会是千载难逢的机会，你千万不要掉以轻心！
我们暂且离开队伍，等事成之后，再到老地方找我们。

original: "Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Fotress, Crime Investigation Bureau jointly recommend {PlayerName} for re-election as Jianghu Master..."
context: “道玄宗、释法寺、儒圣馆、琅琊剑阁、九江水寨、神捕门联名举荐由{PlayerName}连任武林盟主之职……”

original: "<#c44b0e>Ritual Platform</color> is the place where various sects of Jianghu elect the Jianghu Master. Please go to the Ritual Platform and participate in the succession ceremony of the Jianghu Master!"
context: “<#c44b0e>封禅台</color>乃江湖各派选举武林盟主之处，请阁下前往封禅台，参加武林盟主接任大典！”

original:
Revisit the old place, full of emotions.
I need to be fully prepared to participate in this re-election ceremony, so as not to fail their test and be laughed at.
context:
重游旧地，好生感慨。
我需得准备万全才能参加这连任大典，免得接不下他们的考验，被人耻笑。

original: {PlayerName}, you were the last Jianghu Master, you should be clear about the rules, the old Taoist will not say more.
context: {PlayerName}，你是上一任武林盟主，这规矩想必你也清楚，老道便不再多费唇舌了。

original: The leaders of each faction, please come forward and teach.
context: 各位掌门上前赐教吧

original:
I am honored to be re-elected as Jianghu Master by the elders.
From now on, I, {PlayerName}, will continue to do my best to stabilize the chaos in Jianghu and resist the invasion of evil cults in Central Plains Jianghu.
context:
在下受各位前辈抬举，连任武林盟主之位。
从今往后，我{PlayerName}，将一如既往，穷尽必生之力平定江湖乱局，抵御邪教侵扰中原江湖。

original: You, {PlayerName}, become the new Jianghu Master decades later.
context: 你，{PlayerName}，成为数十年后的新任武林盟主。

original: At this moment, you are full of spirit, and when you call from a high place, responders gather.
context: 此刻的你，意气风发，登高一呼应者云集。

original: Behind the glory, you will bear more responsibilities.
context: 风光的背后，你将承担更多的责任。

original: From now on, you will lead the heroes to rectify the chaotic world.
context: 从此，你领袖群侠将这动荡不安的世道，拨乱反正。

original: Hmm?
context: 嗯？

original: That was quick!
context: 来的好快！

original: When I, the Crime Investigation Bureau, handle cases, there is never a time when I fail!
context: 我神捕门办案，还没有失手的时候！

original: Huh?
context: 呵？

original: The famous head of the Crime Investigation Bureau is nothing more than a paper tiger after all!
context: 大名鼎鼎的神捕门捕头，到底不过是纸老虎罢了！

original: Washing Silk!
context: 浣纱！

original: Wandering Dragon!
context: 游龙！

original: Wind Stab!
context: 疾风刺！

original: Wind Breaker!
context: 破空梭！

original: That was close!
context: 好险！

original: Eh!? Just at this time...
context: 额！？偏偏这个时候……

original: Hmm? An opportunity!
context: 嗯？机会！

original: I need to be faster!
context: 得再快点！

original: There's no way out!
context: 没路了！

original: Please return, our sect is not currently accepting disciples from the secular world.
context: 施主请回吧，本门暂时不接受俗家弟子。

original: Our school is not currently looking to take on new disciples.
context: 本馆暂时还不想新增弟子。

original: Our stronghold is not currently looking to take on new disciples.
context: 本寨暂时还不想新增弟子。

original: Our sect is not currently looking to take on new disciples.
context: 本门暂时还不想新增弟子。

original: The escort agency is not currently short of hands.
context: 镖局目前不缺人手。

original: Providing timely help
context: 雪中送炭

original: The Refugee Camp outside the city is short of food, and people have died from hunger. All disciples of our mountain stronghold must quickly enter the city to purchase food and deliver it to the Refugee Camp to solve the urgent need.
context: 城外流民营食物短缺，已有人因饥饿而死。凡我山寨弟子需尽快进城采购粮食，交付流民营以解燃眉之急。

original: Food
context: 粮食

original: Go into the city and purchase 5 portions of Rice and 5 portions of Wheat flour.
context: 进城采购稻米5份、面粉5份。

original: Deliver the food to the Refugee Camp.
context: 把粮食送往流民营。

original: Have delivered food to the Refugee Camp for the Blue Wind Camp {TagNum:清风寨送粮} times.
context: 已替青风寨为流民营送粮{TagNum:清风寨送粮}次。

original: I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
context: 不知今天青风寨的孔大当家是否有新的安排。

original: These supplies should be just enough for the Refugee Camp to get by for now, I should hurry and deliver them.
context: 这些东西应该勉强够流民营应急了，我赶紧给他们送去吧。

original: I heard that you are in urgent need of food, we from the Blue Wind Camp have brought you these supplies, we hope they can help.
context: 听说你们这里急缺粮食，我们青风寨给你们带来这些粮食，希望可以帮到你们。

original: Please convey my thanks to the leader, the kindness of the Blue Wind Camp will never be forgotten by everyone at the Refugee Camp.
context: 替我感谢大当家，青风寨的恩情，流民营上下没齿难忘。

original:
I can't accept your generous gift.
You should hurry and take care of the refugees, I hope no more people will starve to death.
context:
我可受不起你的大礼。
你还是赶紧去安顿流民吧，希望不要再有人饿死才好。

original: Although the food is still insufficient, at least there is a glimmer of hope, it should be able to last a few more days.
context: 虽然粮食依然不足，起码有了些许转机，应该能多撑几天。

original: The food in the camp has all been eaten, and it has reached the point of eating grass roots and tree bark. I don't know how long the people here can live.
context: 营地里的食物都吃完了，已经到了吃草根树皮的地步，不知道这里的人还能活多久。

original: Sigh...

You left the food on your body at the Refugee Camp,
Although the quantity is not much, it may bring a glimmer of hope to the people who are still alive.
context:
你把身上的粮食留在了流民营，
虽然数量不多，或许能够给还活着的人带来一丝希望吧。

original: I have already delivered food to the Refugee Camp today. I'll deliver more tomorrow.
context: 今日已经给流民营送过粮食了，明日再送吧。

original: The Refugee Camp outside the city is short of food. We need to arrange for people to go into the city to buy food and deliver it to the people of the Refugee Camp to alleviate their urgent needs.
context: 城外流民营食物短缺，需安排人手进城采购粮食，交付流民营百姓以解燃眉之急。

original: Robbing the rich to help the poor
context: 劫富取财

original: Rob the rich
context: 劫富

original: A caravan passed by nearby, and the bodyguards hired by the caravan were weak and vulnerable. Interested brothers can go and check it out.
context: 有一伙商队从附近经过，商队雇佣的保镖本领低微不堪一击。感兴趣的兄弟可去一探究竟。

original: Go and investigate the situation near the mountain stronghold.
context: 前往探查山寨附近的情况。

original: Have intercepted merchant teams near the Blue Wind Camp {TagNum:清风寨劫富} times.
context: 已在青风寨附近拦截富商队伍{TagNum:清风寨劫富}次。

original: I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
context: 不知今天青风寨的孔大当家是否有新的安排。

original: Which hero are you, why are you stopping us here?
context: 阁下是哪路的好汉，为何在此阻拦我等？

original: I opened this mountain and planted this tree. If you want to pass, leave the road money!
context: 此山是我开，此树是我栽，要想从此过，留下买路财!

original:
Where are the bandits in this peaceful and prosperous age, don't scare people here.
I won't give you a penny!
context:
太平盛世哪里来的山贼流寇，少在这里唬人。
我一文钱也不会给你！

original: Then I'm sorry.
context: 那就对不住了。

original:
No wonder they are so stingy, there is indeed not much oil and water on these people.
Anyway, this task is considered complete.
context:
难怪如此吝啬，这些人身上确实没什么油水。
不管怎么说，这次任务也算是完成了。

original: We can't do this kind of business too often. We need to take it slow, otherwise who would dare to pass by here in the future.
context: 这种买卖不能常干，得细水长流，否则今后谁还敢从附近经过。

original: A wealthy man who is unkind to the poor is passing by with money he has swindled. It is said that the bodyguards he hired are weak and easy to defeat. Interested brothers can go and check it out.
context: 有一名为富不仁的财主卷了骗来的钱财从附近经过，据说雇佣的保镖本领低微不堪一击。感兴趣的兄弟可去一探究竟。

original: This time the information is accurate. The wealthy man who escaped by luck before has appeared nearby again. It is said that the bodyguards he hired are highly skilled and numerous. Brothers who are confident in their own abilities can go and check it out.
context: 此次消息确凿，之前侥幸逃脱的财主再次在附近出现，据说雇佣的保镖本领高强且人数众多。对自身本领自信的兄弟可前往一探虚实。

original: Robbing the rich to help the poor
context: 劫富取财

original: A caravan passed by nearby, and the bodyguards hired by the caravan were highly skilled and numerous. Brothers who are confident in their own skills can go and check it out.
context: 有一伙商队从附近经过，商队雇佣的保镖本领高强且人数众多。对自身本领自信的兄弟可前往一探虚实。

original: Go to investigate the caravan near the mountain stronghold.
context: 前往探查山寨附近的商队。

original: Which hero are you, why are you stopping us here?
context: 阁下是哪路的好汉，为何在此阻拦我等？

original: I opened this mountain and planted this tree. If you want to pass, leave the road money!
context: 此山是我开，此树是我栽，要想从此过，留下买路财!

original:
Where are the bandits in this peaceful and prosperous age, don't scare people here.
I won't give you a penny!
context:
太平盛世哪里来的山贼流寇，少在这里唬人。
我一文钱也不会给你！

original: Then I'm sorry.
context: 那就对不住了。

original:
No wonder they hired so many powerful bodyguards, this rich businessman is really oily.
Anyway, this task is considered complete.
context:
难怪雇佣这么多厉害的保镖，这富商身上油水真是不少啊。
不管怎么说，这次任务也算是完成了。

original: Acting for the heavens
context: 替天行道

original: Eliminate evil
context: 除恶

original: A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
context: 有一名十恶不赦的贪官途经附近，据消息探知有数名差役随行。请各位兄弟趁此良机尽快将其除去，替天行道！

original: Intercept the corrupt officials passing by the mountain stronghold.
context: 拦截途径山寨附近的贪官。

original: Have cleared {TagNum:清风寨杀官} corrupt officials near the Blue Wind Camp.
context: 已在青风寨附近清除贪官{TagNum:清风寨杀官}名。

original: I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
context: 不知今天青风寨的孔大当家是否有新的安排。

original: When the adults are out, all idlers get out of the way!
context: 大人出行，闲杂人等都给我滚开!

original: I'm not an idler, I'm here for Suo Ming.
context: 我可不是闲杂人等，是专程索命来的。

original:
You lowly people dare to intimidate the official!
Come here, kill him, and take his head as the official's achievement in protecting the territory and the people.
context:
尔等贱民胆敢恐吓本官！
来人哪，将他打杀了，取下头颅当作本官保境安民的政绩。

original: Sure enough, it's a brutal and shameless dog official, come and get your life!
context: 果然是残暴无耻的狗官，拿命来吧！

original:
The life of this dog official should not be worth the many lives he has persecuted.
It's too cheap for him to die so happily.
context:
这狗官的一条命应该抵不过被他迫害过的多条性命。
让他死得这么痛快，简直是太便宜他了。

original: Today's task has been completed. Dealing with these corrupt officials is not an overnight job, there's no need to rush.
context: 今天任务已经完成了，解决这些贪官并非一朝一夕之功，不必操之过急。

original: A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
context: 有一名十恶不赦的贪官途经附近，据消息探知有数名差役随行。请各位兄弟趁此良机尽快将其除去，替天行道！

original: A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several martial arts superb officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
context: 有一名十恶不赦的贪官途经附近，据消息探知有数名武艺超群的差役随行。请各位兄弟趁此良机尽快将其除去，替天行道！

original: Acting for the heavens
context: 替天行道

original: A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several martial arts superb officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
context: 有一名十恶不赦的贪官途经附近，据消息探知有数名武艺超群的差役随行。请各位兄弟趁此良机尽快将其除去，替天行道！

original: Kill the corrupt official passing by near the mountain stronghold.
context: 截杀途径山寨附近的贪官。

original: When the adults are out, all idlers get out of the way quickly!
context: 大人出行，闲杂人等速速回避!

original: I am here for Suo Ming, who was wronged and died in the hands of this dog official!
context: 我可是专程替那些枉死在这狗官手中无辜百姓索命来的！

original:
Huh, there are hundreds of lowly people like you who have died in the hands of the official.
The official was originally worried about being blamed by the superior for not being strong enough to suppress the bandits, and it just so happened to make up the number with you.
context:
哼，你这样的贱民，死在本官手中没有一千也有八百。
本官本来还要担心被上官责罚剿匪不力，正好拿你凑数了。

original: Sure enough, it's a brutal and shameless dog official, come and get your life!
context: 果然是残暴无耻的狗官，拿命来吧！

original:
The life of this dog official should not be worth the many lives he has persecuted.
It's too cheap for him to die so happily.
context:
这狗官的一条命应该抵不过被他迫害过的多条性命。
让他死得这么痛快，简直是太便宜他了。

original: Rescue from the prison
context: 监牢救人

original: Rescue
context: 救人

original: A brother from the mountain stronghold was accidentally captured by the Official and is now detained in the Chuxiang City Government Office Prison. Brothers, hurry up and rescue!
context: 有位山寨兄弟不慎被官差擒住，现关押在楚襄城衙门牢房。各位兄弟速速前往救援！

original: Go to Chuxiang City Government Office Prison to rescue the brother from the mountain stronghold.
context: 前往楚襄城衙门牢房救山寨兄弟。

original: Have rescued {TagNum:清风寨救人} henchmen of the Blue Wind Camp from the Chuxiang City Prison.
context: 已从楚襄城牢房救出青风寨喽啰{TagNum:清风寨救人}名。

original: Failed to rescue the henchmen of the Blue Wind Camp from the Chuxiang City Prison {TagNum:清风寨救人失败} times.
context: 未能从楚襄城牢房救出青风寨喽啰{TagNum:清风寨救人失败}次。

original: I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
context: 不知今天青风寨的孔大当家是否有新的安排。

original: Brother, you have suffered, I will rescue you.
context: 兄弟，你受苦了，我来救你出去。

original:
It's too dangerous here, {PlayerSurName} brother, why are you here?
You go quickly, don't worry about me, we can't all fall here!
context:
这里太危险了，{PlayerSurName}兄弟你怎么来了？
你快走，别管我，咱们不能都折在这里！

original: This place can't stay for long, let me take you back to the mountain stronghold.
context: 此地不可久留，我带你一起回山寨吧。

original:
Thank you {PlayerSurName} brother for risking your life to save me.
I have a family heirloom here, and I will give it to my brother today.
context:
多谢{PlayerSurName}兄弟舍命相救。
我这有一件祖传之物，今天就赠与兄弟吧。

original: Sure enough, there are accomplices! Capture them all, and then these two thieves will be beheaded together.
context: 果然有同党！一并擒下，稍后将这两个贼人一同问斩。

original: It's a pity that I couldn't save this brother, this mission is considered a failure.
context: 真可惜，没能救下这位兄弟，这次任务算是失败了。

original:
That was too dangerous just now, I almost lost my life.
Alas, I failed to rescue the brother from the prison, this mission is considered a failure.
context:
刚才太凶险了，差一点就把小命交代了。
唉，没能救出牢里的这位兄弟，这次任务算是失败了。

original:
There are no brothers who need to be rescued for the time being.
I hope our brothers won't get into trouble and get caught by the government in the future.
context:
暂时没有需要解救的兄弟了。
但愿今后兄弟们不要再犯事被官府抓住。

original: This matter is against the government and has a significant impact. I don't want to involve more people, so you should not participate in this for now.
context: 此事与官府作对，影响非同小可，俺可不想牵连更多人，这件事你就先不要参与了。

original: It seems that the leader still treats me as an outsider.
context: 看来大当家还是拿我当外人啊。

original: A brother from the mountain stronghold was caught by the officials and is now imprisoned in the Chuxiang City Government Office Prison. If we don't rush to rescue him, I'm afraid this brother will be in great danger.
context: 有位山寨兄弟不慎被官差擒住，现关押在楚襄城衙门牢房。若不赶快前往救援，恐怕这位兄弟就要凶多吉少了。

original: There are still jailers in the Prison. If caught again, it would be a capital crime. I don't want to take that risk.
context: 牢房内还有狱卒看守，若再被逮到可就是罪加一等，那可是杀头的罪名，我可不想冒这个风险。

original: Great, you're here to cover my retreat. I'll go first to avoid being caught by those bailiffs again.
context: 太好了，你来帮我殿后，我先走一步，免得再被那些差役捉到。

original: Old illness
context: 陈年旧疾

original: The leader suffered multiple internal injuries from fights in his early years and has not yet healed. Brothers, please pay attention to doctors who are skilled in medicine, and invite them to the stronghold to heal the leader, there will be great rewards!
context: 大当家早年与人拼斗，身患多处内伤至今未愈。诸多兄弟多多留心医术高明的大夫，请其来山寨给大当家疗伤，必有重谢！

original: Find a highly skilled doctor in Medical to Heal Kong Yidao's chronic illness. At least a Medical level of 100 is needed for effective treatment.
context: 寻找医术高明的大夫给孔一刀治疗旧疾。至少医术达到100才能有所疗效。

original: Heal
context: 疗伤

original: I consider myself somewhat skilled in Medical, so I came to treat the boss's injuries.
context: 我自认为在医术上有些手段，特来给大当家疗伤。

original:
You?
I've never heard that you have this medical skill.
context:
你？
俺咋没听过你还有这治病的手段？

original: You will know if I have such skills after a try, leader.
context: 大当家一试便知我有没有这样的手段。

original: Alright, just do it, it can't be worse than it is now.
context: 好，你尽管动手吧，反正也不会比现在的情况更糟糕了。

original: After one shichen...
context: 经过一个时辰后……

original:
{PlayerSurName}, you are not simple!
You are the most skilled doctor I have ever seen, you really cured my internal injuries!
context:
{PlayerSurName}兄弟，你不简单啊！
你是俺见过所有大夫中医术最高明的，俺身上内伤真叫你治好了！。

original: Congratulations to the leader for getting rid of the disease and improving your strength.
context: 恭喜大当家解除病患，实力更进一步。

original: There happens to be a highly skilled doctor in Medical in my team, here to treat the boss's injuries.
context: 我队伍里刚好有一名医术高超的大夫，特来给大当家疗伤。

original:
{PlayerSurName} Brother, you are kind.
However, I've been treated by countless doctors, all of whom were helpless. I've long since given up hope.
context:
{PlayerSurName}兄弟，你有心了。
不过俺让不计其数的大夫诊治过，各个束手无策，早已不抱太多希望了。

original: Hmph, does the leader not believe in my medical skills?
context: 哼，大当家这是不相信我的医术吗？

original: My friend's medical skills are almost miraculous, leader, why not give it a try.
context: 我这位朋友的医术几乎达到了起死回生的手段，大当家不妨一试。

original: Alright, just do it, it can't be worse than it is now.
context: 好，你尽管动手吧，反正也不会比现在的情况更糟糕了。

original: After one shichen...
context: 经过一个时辰后……

original:
It's really amazing, a miraculous regeneration!
The chronic disease of many years has really been cured, I feel full of strength!
context:
果然是神乎其技，妙手回春啊！
多年隐疾竟然真的痊愈了，俺感觉浑身充满了力量！

original: Don't compliment me, I did this for {PlayerName}.
context: 恭维的话不必跟我说，我这可是看在{PlayerName}的面子上给你疗伤。

original: Hahaha, {PlayerSurName}, you helped me solve a big problem.
context: 哈哈哈，{PlayerSurName}兄弟你可是帮俺解决了一个大麻烦。

original: Congratulations to the leader for getting rid of the disease and improving your strength.
context: 恭喜大当家解除病患，实力更进一步。

original: (Looking very ill)
context: （面色十分难看）

original: (Seemingly in great pain)
context: （仿佛在承受极大痛苦）

original: (Sweat beads continuously dripping from his forehead)
context: （额头沁满的汗珠不断滴落）

original: Brother Kong, what's wrong with you? You look very uncomfortable.
context: 孔大哥，你这是怎么了，看起来很难受的样子。

original: Boss, what's wrong with you? You look very uncomfortable.
context: 大当家，你这是怎么了，看起来很难受的样子。

original: Alas, it's embarrassing to say...
context: 唉，说来惭愧……

original: I used to live on the edge every day, often licking blood off the blade. External injuries are not a big deal, but multiple Internal Injuries have not healed to this day, causing occasional bouts of pain.
context: 俺当年天天出生入死，经常过着刀头舔血的日子，外伤倒还好说，身上多处内伤至今未愈，时不时就闹一阵疼痛。

original: Ordinary doctors are helpless with this. I'm afraid only a highly skilled national doctor in Medical can cure my Old illness.
context: 一般的大夫对此束手无策，恐怕只有请到医术高超的大国手才能未俺解除这陈年旧疾了。

original: Leave it to me. I'll find those highly skilled doctors in Medical to treat your injuries.
context: 这事包在我身上，我来找到那些医术高明的大夫为你疗伤。

original: Have you found a doctor who can Heal my Old illness?
context: 可是为俺找到治疗陈年旧疾的大夫了？

original: There's no progress yet, but I'll do my best.
context: 事情暂时还没有头绪，我会尽力而为的。

original: Spar
context: 比武切磋

The person to spar with this time is Luo Qianxue from the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为神捕门的洛千雪。

context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为燕子窝的华青青。

It's {PlayerName} from Langya Sword Pavilion.
If you want to spar with me, I won't be merciful, you better be prepared.

是琅琊剑阁的{PlayerName}呀。
竟然要跟我比试，我可不会手下留情，你可要做好准备咯。

original: As expected, you are not a match, you should go and practice more.

You still want to fight? I'm really impressed by you.

你还要打？真是服了你。
既然你还要继续，我就奉陪到底。

context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为青风寨的孔一刀。

What a disappointment, it's not satisfying at all.
You don't seem to have learned the exquisite swordsmanship of the Langya Sword Pavilion, there's really no challenge.

真扫兴，真不过瘾。
你似乎并未学到琅琊剑阁的精妙剑术，实在没有挑战性。

Good boy, you're persistent!
I'll accompany you to the end today, I want to see how long you can hold on.

好小子，够执着！
俺今天跟你奉陪到底，倒要看看你能坚持多久。

original: Spar
context: 比武切磋

context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为虎威镖局的韩红玉。

original: I've heard a lot about the exquisite swordsmanship of the Langya Sword Pavilion, today is a good opportunity to learn.
context: 久闻琅琊剑阁剑术精妙无双，今日正好可以领教领教。

original: I appreciate your kindness, Elite Escort.
context: 总镖头承让了。

original: Today I really opened my eyes, the disciples trained by the Langya Sword Pavilion are indeed well-deserved.
context: 今天确实让我大开眼界，琅琊剑阁调教出来的弟子果然名不虚传。

original: Are you really a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion? How can you be so incompetent?
context: 你当真是琅琊剑阁的弟子吗，怎么如此草包？

original: If you have confidence to defeat me, then come on, don't let me look down on the Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 如果你有信心击败我那便来吧，不要让我小看了琅琊剑阁。

original: Spar

The person to compete with this time is Jiang Nanguai from Chuxiang CityDirty Street.
context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为楚襄城脏街的江南怪。

original:
So you're here to compete in martial arts, you really think highly of the old monster.
The old monster is itching for a fight today, why not accompany you to play a few moves to warm up.
context:
竟然是来比试武功的，还真是看得起老怪呐。
老怪今日技痒，不妨陪你耍几招活动下筋骨。

original: I appreciate your kindness, senior.
context: 前辈承让了。

original: It's really hard to resist aging, the future belongs to you young people.
context: 不服老真是不行啊，今后是你们年轻人的天下了。

original: Kid, you seem a bit weak, you need to go back and replenish your strength.
context: 小家伙，你的身子骨可有点虚啊，得回去多补补才行。

original:
Your unyielding character really reminds me of the old monster when he was young.
Since you insist so much, the old monster will reluctantly accompany you to play for a while.
context:
你这不服输的性格倒真是有几分老怪年轻时的神韵。
既然你如此坚持，老怪就勉为其难再陪你耍会吧。

original: Spar
context: 比武切磋

original: According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is Cai Youzhi from the Confucius Temple.
context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为儒圣馆的蔡攸之。

original:
I've always been curious about what makes the martial arts of the Langya Sword Pavilion dominate the rivers and lakes.
Today is a good opportunity to open my eyes!
context:
在下一直好奇琅琊剑阁的武功到底凭借什么能够称雄江湖。
今日正好可以一开眼界！

original: The martial arts of the Langya Sword Pavilion are indeed exquisite, I am convinced.

original: Is the rumor wrong? The disciples of the Langya Sword Pavilion should not be so vulnerable.
context: 传言难道有误，琅琊剑阁的弟子本不该如此不堪一击。

original:
Good, not arrogant in victory or discouraged in defeat.
With your perseverance, you are worthy of being a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion's Jian Chi.
context:
好，胜不骄败不馁.
就凭你这样毅力，不愧是琅琊剑阁剑痴前辈门下弟子。

original: Spar
context: 比武切磋

original: According to the tradition of the Sword Pavilion over the years, disciples who have learned well must go down the mountain for experience, compete with the people of the rivers and lakes, and hone their martial arts. The person to compete with this time is La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect.
context: 根据剑阁历年传统，凡剑阁弟子学艺有成之后需得下山历练，与江湖人士比试切磋，磨练自身武艺。本次切磋人物为道玄宗的邋遢张。

original: Find La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect to compete in martial arts, finding him is not an easy task.
context: 找道玄宗的邋遢张切磋武艺，找他可不是一件容易的事情。

original: Kid, I don't care who you are a disciple of, don't expect me to show mercy.
context: 小子，本道爷可不管你是谁家的门人弟子，别指望本道爷会手下留情。

original:
I didn't expect you to be so capable.
The martial arts of Langya Sword Pavilion are so powerful, it's really eye-opening.
context:
看不出来，你小子倒真有些本事。
这琅琊剑阁的武功竟然如此厉害，真是叫人大开眼界。

original: What a disappointment, I thought the disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion would be more capable.
context: 真是扫兴，还以为琅琊剑阁的弟子会有多大的本事。

original: I'll give you another chance to compete with me, considering your stubbornness!
context: 本道爷看在你这股倔劲的份上，再跟你比试一场！

original: Surrender Hei Yuan
context: 降伏黑猿

original: Hei Yuan at the end of the back mountain of the Sword Pavilion is hindering our disciples from mining, we need to solve this problem as soon as possible, our reserves are already running low.
context: 剑阁后山尽头黑猿妨碍本门弟子开采矿产，本门弟子需尽快解决此麻烦，本门储备已然不多了。

original: Solve the problem caused by Hei Yuan on the back mountain of the Sword Pavilion.
context: 解决剑阁后山上黑猿造成的麻烦。

original: {yell} Roar! Roar!!!
context: {yell}吼！吼！！！

original: This guy is really not friendly at all, no wonder many senior brothers have suffered from him.
context: 这家伙果然一点也不友善，难怪很多师兄深受其害。

original: This big guy is a living creature after all, how should we deal with it?
context: 这个大块头好歹也是一条活生生的性命，要用什么方式对待它呢？

context: 用兽语跟它沟通。<color=#097a76>（驯兽4级炉火纯青）</color>

context: 众人合力把它消灭。<color=#c44b0e>（立即开战）</color>

original: Run away for now.
context: 暂时离开。

context: 大块头，按照咱们的约定：你要是打输了，以后不许伤人，遇到琅琊剑阁其他弟子就远远避开；你若是赢了，我这次就放过你。

original: Hmm...
context: 嗯嗯……

context: 咱们依照约定，你以后就要老老实实的，不许胡乱伤人！

original: What a powerful guy, but I won't give up, I will subdue you one day!
context: 好厉害的家伙，不过我不会放弃，总有一天要把你制服！

original: I don't believe I can't solve this Hei Yuan this time!
context: 我就不相信这次还解决不了这只黑猿！

original: {yell} Roar! Roar!!!
context: {yell}吼！吼！！！

original: The trouble here is finally solved, there should be no one to hinder the senior brothers from mining.
context: 这里的麻烦总算解除了，应该不会再有人来妨碍师兄们开采矿脉了。

original: Oh~ Oh~
context: 哦~哦~

context: 多么乖巧温顺的大家伙，师兄们应该是被他彪悍的外表吓到了，怎么看也不像有什么攻击性。

context: 这里的麻烦应该算是解除了，不会再有人来妨碍师兄们开采矿脉了。

context: 这里哪有什么黑猿，一定是师兄们偷懒不想到后山采矿，所以才编个故事来唬人。

context: 既然没发现什么特殊状况，不管此事是真是假，现在都应该已是不存在了。

original: Rescue from the prison
context: 监牢救人

original: Rescue

original: Our brothers were accidentally captured by the officials and are now being held in Daliang City Government Office Prison. Brothers, hurry to the rescue!
context: 本门兄弟不慎被官差擒住，现关押在大梁城衙门牢房。各位兄弟速速前往救援！

original: I wonder if the boss of Nest of Swallow has any new arrangements today.
context: 不知今天燕子窝的步老大是否有新的安排。

context: 果然有同党！一并擒下，稍后将这两个贼人一同问斩。

original: Brother, you have suffered, I will rescue you.
context: 兄弟，你受苦了，我来救你出去。

original:
It's so dangerous here, why did you come?
You should Run away quickly, don't worry about me, we can't all fall here!
context:
这里如此危险，你怎么来了？
你快些离开，别管我，咱们不能都折在这里！

original: Stop talking nonsense, hurry up and Run away with me!
context: 别说废话了，赶紧跟我一起离开这里！

original: Neither of you will get away today!
context: 你们两个今天谁也走不了！

original: I thought I could catch a big fish from Nest of Swallow, but it turned out to be a small shrimp.
context: 本以为能钓到燕子窝里的大鱼，没想到只是小虾米。

original: But with your reckless actions, we will eventually find the Nest of Swallow's lair and capture you all! Today, let's start with you little shrimps!
context: 不过以你们做事肆无忌惮的程度，我们早晚能顺腾摸瓜找到燕子窝的老巢将你们一网打尽！今天就先拿你们几只小虾米打打牙祭！

original: It's a pity that we couldn't save this brother, this mission is considered a failure.
context: 真可惜，没能救下这位兄弟，这次的任务算是失败了。

original: The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?

original:
That was too dangerous just now, I almost lost my life.

original: Crime Investigation Bureau is handling the case, come with me!

I won't let you catch me that easily!

老子可不会这么容易让你捉到！
兄弟们，今天好好招待一下神捕门的小兄弟。

original: I'd rather die than go to the Crime Investigation Bureau with you!

original: What is the identity of these people, they would rather commit suicide than go to the Crime Investigation Bureau for trial.

original: The Crime Investigation Bureau are all useless, good-for-nothings.|Those guys at the Government Office are also freeloading.|Brothers, we've done so many jobs and nothing happened.|This Daliang City is really rich.|After finishing this job today, I must go and have some fun.|Brothers, let me go ahead and scout the road.

context: 还没准备好。<color=#097a76>（放弃救援）</color>

original: Hehe, don't be shy, girl, let me go first, the brothers are waiting!
context: 嘿嘿，小娘子不要害羞嘛，让我先来，兄弟们还等着呢！

original: No! Save me...
context: 不要啊！救救我……

original: Sigh... That woman must have been harmed, it's all my fault for not having the courage.
context: 唉……那女子必然遭了祸害，都怪我没有勇气。

original:
{yell}Crime Investigation Bureau{PlayerName} is here!
You audacious scoundrels, surrender now!
context:
{yell}神捕门{PlayerName}在此！
色胆包天的鼠辈还不束手就擒！

original: Thank you, young hero, for saving my life.
context: 奴家拜谢少侠救命大恩。

original: This is the duty of our Crime Investigation Bureau disciples, no need to thank.
context: 这是我们神捕门弟子分内之事，不必言谢。

original: Although the bandits were eliminated, the young woman could not be saved, I feel guilty.
context: 虽然消灭了恶匪，但是没能把少妇救下来，心中有愧阿。

original: The evil bandits should be quiet for now. If they stubbornly continue their wrongdoings, we will have to be ruthless!
context: 作恶的盗匪现在应该消停些了，若是冥顽不灵仍然为非作歹，就只能辣手无情了！

original: There are many villains in Zhongzhou Region, kidnapping young and beautiful women everywhere. The Crime Investigation Bureau is gathering forces to eliminate these thieves and restore peace to the people.
context: 中州地区多有恶匪出没，到处劫掠年轻貌美女子，神捕门正召集人手赶去消灭这伙贼人，还百姓安宁。

original: Eliminate Evil
context: 除恶务尽

original: There are many bandits and villains in Zhongzhou Region, who harm the people. Disciples of the Crime Investigation Bureau, go and eliminate these thieves, and bring peace to the people.
context: 中州地区多有流寇恶匪出没，作恶多端残害百姓，神捕门弟子速去前往消灭这伙贼人，还百姓安宁。

original: Go to Zhongzhou Region to eliminate the lawless!
context: 前往中州地区消灭不法之徒！

original:
What are you going to do!
I have a bodyguard, don't seek your own death!
context:
你们要干什么！
我可是有保镖的，你们不要自寻死路！

original: A few trash with blades, and you think you can protect her? What a joke.
context: 几个拿着刀片的废柴，就以为能保住你了？真是笑话。

original: The last person who underestimated us, his grave is already covered with grass!
context: 上一个轻视我们的人，如今坟头已经长草了！

original: Looking for death!
context: 找死！

original: Take action to save people! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
context: 出手救人！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Not ready yet. <color=#097a76>(Give up the rescue)</color>
context: 还没准备好。<color=#097a76>（放弃救援）</color>

original: It's all my fault for not being decisive, this mission is a failure!
context: 都怪我没能下定决心，这次任务算是失败了！

original:
{yell}Crime Investigation Bureau{PlayerName} is here!
You dog thief, surrender now, or when!
context:
{yell}神捕门{PlayerName}在此！
狗贼还不束手就擒，更待何时！

original: Hero, come and save me!
context: 好汉快来救我！

original:
Thank you, hero, for saving my life.
This reward is a thank you for saving my life, I hope you won't despise it.
context:
多谢好汉救命之恩。
这些报酬就作为救我一命的谢礼，还望不要嫌弃。

original: I just did what a disciple of the Crime Investigation Bureau should do, no need to be so polite.
context: 我只不过是做了神捕门弟子分内之事，不必如此客气。

original: We merchants value fairness, you saved me, you should accept the reward, otherwise it would be looking down on me.
context: 我们商人最讲究公平，你救了我，理当收下谢礼，否则便是看不起我。

original: Alright, then I'll accept it respectfully.
context: 好吧，那就恭敬不如从命了。

original: Although the bandits were eliminated, the merchant could not be saved, I feel guilty.
context: 虽然消灭了山贼，但是没能把这商人救下来，心中有愧阿。

original: Eliminate Evil
context: 除恶务尽

original: There are many bandits and villains in Xiangfan Region, who commit many evils and harm the people. Taoist Sect disciples, go and eliminate these thieves and bring peace to the people.
context: 襄樊地区多有流寇恶匪出没，作恶多端残害百姓，道玄宗弟子速去前往消灭这伙贼人，还百姓安宁。

original: Go to Xiangfan Region and eliminate the outlaws!
context: 前往襄樊地区消灭不法之徒！

original: Good sirs, please spare me.
context: 各位好汉爷，请高抬贵手放过俺吧。

original: Either leave your money or your life, choose one.
context: 要么留下钱，要么留下命，你选一条吧。

original: This money is for my mother's life-saving medicine, I can't give it to you.
context: 这钱是给俺娘买药的救命钱，不能给你们。

original: Stop talking nonsense, hand over the money!
context: 废话真多，给老子把钱交出来！

original: Take action to save people! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
context: 出手救人！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Not ready yet. <color=#097a76>(Give up the rescue)</color>
context: 还没准备好。<color=#097a76>（放弃救援）</color>

original: Fool! If you don't drink the toast, you'll have to drink the forfeit!
context: 蠢东西！敬酒不吃吃罚酒！

original: Die!
context: 死吧！

original: It's all my fault for not being decisive, this mission is a failure!
context: 都怪我没能下定决心，这次任务算是失败了！

original:
{yell}Taoist Sect{PlayerName} is here!
You audacious thief, surrender now!
context:
{yell}道玄宗{PlayerName}在此！
大胆贼人还不束手就擒！

original: Hero, save me!
context: 大侠救救我！

original: Yo! This kid is quite agile, he ran over there! Brothers, blitz attack, I have to go home after this.
context: 呦呵！这小子还挺麻利，跑到那边了！兄弟们，速战速决，干完这票我还得回家。

original: The girl I robbed yesterday is still waiting for me at home.
context: 昨天抢的小娘子还在家等我呢。

original: Seamless Combat  Middle-aged man defaults to our side
context: 无缝战斗  中年人默认为己方

original: Thanks to the hero of the Taoist Sect for stepping in, my mother's life-saving money is finally safe.
context: 多谢道玄宗的大侠出手解围，俺娘的救命钱终于保住了。

original:
You go and treat your mother.
As long as our Taoist Sect exists, we will not tolerate these guys doing evil!
context:
你快去救治你娘吧。
只要我们道玄宗存在一天，就不会容忍这些家伙为非作歹！

original: Although the bandits were eliminated, the middle-aged man could not be saved, I feel guilty.
context: 虽然消灭了流寇，但是没能把中年人救下来，心中愧疚阿。

original: Eliminate Evil
context: 除恶务尽

original: There are many bandits and villains in Xiangfan Region, who commit many evils and harm the people. Taoist Sect disciples, go and eliminate these thieves and bring peace to the people.
context: 襄樊地区多有流寇恶匪出没，作恶多端残害百姓，道玄宗弟子速去前往消灭这伙贼人，还百姓安宁。

original: Go to Xiangfan Region and eliminate the outlaws!
context: 前往襄樊地区消灭不法之徒！

original: What are you going to do? Why are you stopping me?
context: 你们要做什么？为什么要拦着奴家。

original: It's rare to meet such a beautiful girl, just right to take back as the village wife.
context: 难得遇到这么标致的小娘子，正好带回去做个压寨夫人。

original:
Don't come over, don't come over!
If you come any closer, I'll scream!
context:
你们不要过来，不要过来！
再过来奴家就要喊人了！

original:
Stop screaming, you won't be that lucky.
Girl, just accept us.
context:
别喊了，你不会那么好运气的。
小娘子，你就从了我们吧。

original: Take action to save people! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
context: 出手救人！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Not ready yet. <color=#097a76>(Give up the rescue)</color>
context: 还没准备好。<color=#097a76>（放弃救援）</color>

original: Hehe, don't be shy, girl, let me go first, the brothers are waiting!
context: 嘿嘿，小娘子不要害羞嘛，让我先来，兄弟们还等着呢！

original: No! Save me...
context: 不要啊！救救我……

original: Sigh... That woman must have been harmed, it's all my fault for not having the courage.
context: 唉……那女子必然遭了祸害，都怪我没有勇气。

original:
{yell}Taoist Sect{PlayerName} is here!
You audacious scoundrels, surrender now!
context:
{yell}道玄宗{PlayerName}在此！
色胆包天的鼠辈还不束手就擒！

original: Thank you, young hero, for saving my life.
context: 奴家拜谢少侠救命大恩。

original: This is what we, the disciples of Taoist Sect, should do. There's no need for thanks.
context: 这是我们道玄宗弟子分内之事，不必言谢。

original: Although the bandits were eliminated, the young woman could not be saved, I feel guilty.
context: 虽然消灭了恶匪，但是没能把少妇救下来，心中有愧阿。

original: Eliminate Evil
context: 除恶务尽

original: There are many bandits and villains in Xiangfan Region, who commit many evils and harm the people. Taoist Sect disciples, go and eliminate these thieves and bring peace to the people.
context: 襄樊地区多有流寇恶匪出没，作恶多端残害百姓，道玄宗弟子速去前往消灭这伙贼人，还百姓安宁。

original: Go to Xiangfan Region and eliminate the outlaws!
context: 前往襄樊地区消灭不法之徒！

original:
What are you going to do!
I have a bodyguard, don't seek your own death!
context:
你们要干什么！
我可是有保镖的，你们不要自寻死路！

original: A few trash with blades, and you think you can protect her? What a joke.
context: 几个拿着刀片的废柴，就以为能保住你了？真是笑话。

original: The last person who underestimated us, his grave is already covered with grass!
context: 上一个轻视我们的人，如今坟头已经长草了！

original: Looking for death!
context: 找死！

original: Take action to save people! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
context: 出手救人！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Not ready yet. <color=#097a76>(Give up the rescue)</color>
context: 还没准备好。<color=#097a76>（放弃救援）</color>

original: It's all my fault for not being decisive, this mission is a failure!
context: 都怪我没能下定决心，这次任务算是失败了！

original:
{yell}Taoist Sect{PlayerName} is here!
Surrender now, villain! What are you waiting for?
context:
{yell}道玄宗{PlayerName}在此！
狗贼还不束手就擒，更待何时！

original: Hero, come and save me!
context: 好汉快来救我！

original:
Thank you, hero, for saving my life.
This reward is a thank you for saving my life, I hope you won't despise it.
context:
多谢好汉救命之恩。
这些报酬就作为救我一命的谢礼，还望不要嫌弃。

original: I just did what a disciple of Taoist Sect should do. There's no need to be so polite.
context: 我只不过是做了道玄宗弟子分内之事，不必如此客气。

original: We merchants value fairness, you saved me, you should accept the reward, otherwise it would be looking down on me.
context: 我们商人最讲究公平，你救了我，理当收下谢礼，否则便是看不起我。

original: Alright, then I'll accept it respectfully.
context: 好吧，那就恭敬不如从命了。

original: Although the bandits were eliminated, the merchant could not be saved, I feel guilty.
context: 虽然消灭了山贼，但是没能把这商人救下来，心中有愧阿。

original: Such a strange feeling.
context: 好奇怪的感觉

original: Oh, this is a bit embarrassing.
context: 哎呀，真是让人有些害羞呀

original: For some reason, this woman ran away as if she could fly.
context: 不知什么情况，这名女子飞也似地走远了。

original: This woman showed no signs of abnormality and ran away as if nothing happened.
context: 这名女子没有任何异常，若无其事地离开了。

original: Oh, how annoying.
context: 哎呀，讨厌死啦

original: For some reason, this woman ran away as if she could fly.
context: 不知什么情况，这名女子飞也似地走远了。

original: My lord, I didn't expect us to meet again.
context: 郎君，想不到咱们又相会了。

original:
What the heck!!!
(I was too focused on my work before, this is the first time I've seen such a noble appearance.)
context:
我去！！！
（之前太专注做事了，竟然第一次见到如此尊容。）

original: Ever since our first encounter, I've been restless, thinking about you day and night, hoping to meet again.
context: 自从第一次擦肩而过，奴家便辗转夜不能寐，日夜思念郎君，期望再次重逢。

original: My lord, you often sneak peeks at me, but it's inconvenient for a man and a woman to be alone. If others see us and gossip, I would be too embarrassed to face anyone.
context: 郎君经常悄悄偷瞄奴家，但是孤男寡女毕竟多有不便，若被旁人见了去，说些闲言碎语真叫奴家没法见人了。

original: There's no better day than today. I want a formal status, so you don't have to sneak around anymore.
context: 择日不如撞日，今天良辰美景，奴家要个正式的名分，今后郎君也不必偷偷摸摸的了。

original: Now is a critical moment for Inseparable's survival. We must make a careful choice. Never, never make a mistake!
context: 现在是生死存亡的关键时刻，一定要慎重做出选择，千万，千万，不要选错了！

original: Now is a critical moment for Inseparable's survival. We must make a careful choice. Never, never make a mistake!
context: 现在是生死存亡的关键时刻，一定要慎重做出选择，千万，千万，不要选错了！

original: Refuse!
context: 拒绝！

original: Definitely refuse!!!
context: 一定拒绝！！！

original: Refuse even if it kills me!!!!
context: 死也要拒绝！！！！

original:
You heartless man, thief of hearts!
You tarnished my innocence and want to escape responsibility, shameless!
context:
你个负心汉，偷心贼！
污了奴家清白就想不负责任，好不要脸！

original: Don't talk nonsense, who tarnished your innocence!
context: 不要乱说话，谁污你清白了！

original: You've taken advantage of me several times, each time taking away my scented ornaments. There's no innocence left between us.
context: 你几次三番动手轻薄奴家，每次都还取走带有奴家体香的饰品，奴家与郎君之间哪还有清白呀。

original: Sob——sob——
There was some misunderstanding before, please be generous and don't take it to heart.
context: 之前有些误会，请姑娘宽宏大量，不要放在心上。

original:
Bah, you heartless man, flirting with girls and then running away!
Wait till I break your legs, let's see where you can run.
context:
呸，你个负心汉撩完妹子就想跑！
等我把你腿打断，看你能跑到哪去。

original: Hey, wait, don't be hasty!
context: 喂，等等，且慢动手！

original:
You abandoned me after seducing me, and even dare to hit a woman, you're a beast in human clothing!
I'm going to expose you, ruin your reputation, and make you infamous forever!
context:
始乱终弃，还竟敢打女人，简直衣冠禽兽！
老娘要找人谴责你，让你身败名裂，让你遗臭万年！

original: The woman strides away from you, probably to expose your misdeeds...
context: 这名女子迈开大步，远离你而去，估计是找人曝光你的丑行了……

original: This girl is too fierce, I'm completely no match for her. What should I do?
context: 这位姑娘太生猛了，我竟然完全不是对手，这可怎么办啊。

original:
Hmph, let's see where you can run to!
Don't think you can shake me off, wherever you go, I'll follow!
context:
哼，看你这个小白脸还能逃到哪去！
别想把老娘甩开，以后你走到哪，老娘就跟你到哪！

original: This is not a place to wander around, run away quickly, or you'll be asking for trouble.
context: 这里不是随便乱逛的地方，赶紧离开，免得自讨没趣。

original:
We are from the Crime Investigation Bureau!
Someone reported that you are hiding kidnapped children here, let the children out now!
context:
我们是神捕门的人！
有人告发你们把拐来的孩童藏匿此处，快把孩子放出来！

original:
Bah, who the hell said we're trafficking children?
Without us, these children would have frozen or starved to death. Now you so-called righteous people are accusing us, how absurd!
context:
呸，哪个王八蛋说我们拐卖孩童？
若没有我们，这些孩子早就冻死饿死了，现在你们这些正道人士倒指责我们了，真是荒谬！

original: I'd like to see what you people can do besides being stubborn!
context: 我倒想看看你们这些人除了嘴硬，不知道还有没有别的本事！

original: Set up your weapon, the protagonist is ready for battle.
context: 设置所持武器，主角战斗准备

original: Looking for death!!!
context: 找死！！！

original: A bunch of nobodies dare to block my way!
context: 一群土鸡瓦狗也敢拦我的路！

original: What are you yelling about! Are you trying to drive me away too?
context: 鬼叫什么！你们是要把我也撵出去吗?

original:
Haha, misunderstanding, misunderstanding.
Since you're one of us, please come in.
context:
哈哈，误会误会。
既然是自己人，那么二位就请进去吧。

original: (What should I do in this situation?)
context: （这种情形我该怎么办呢？）

original: I insist on going in, let's see who dares to stop me! <color=#c44b0e>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 我偏要进去，看你们谁敢拦我！<color=#c44b0e>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Barge in! <color=#c44b0e>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 硬闯进去！<color=#c44b0e>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Let Hua Qingqing handle it.
context: 让华青青出面解决。

original: Turn around and run away.
context: 转身离开。

original: Looking for death!!!
context: 找死！！！

original: Why is there no one here? The information from the chief catcher should not be wrong.
context: 这里怎么一个人都没有？按理说总捕头的情报不会有误呀。

original: I have already taken care of the villains here in advance, I don't know where the children have gone now.
context: 我已经早来一步把这里的恶人解决了，这里的那些孩子现在不知都跑到哪去了。

original:
Alright, thank you for your hard work, junior brother.
Since things have come to this, let's go back and report.
context:
好吧，辛苦师弟了。
事情既然已经如此，咱们就回去复命吧。

original: Could it be that this place has also been discovered by the government? It seems that the senior brothers have already transferred the children.
context: 难道这里也被官府发现了？看来师兄们已经把孩子转移走了。

original: Alas, I originally wanted you to teach those children some skills, but now there's no chance.
context: 唉，本来想让你教那帮孩子本事的，这下没机会了。

original: You guys have worked hard.
context: 你们辛苦啦。

original: We are not tired at all, it's fun to teach these little devils to practice every day.
context: 我们才不辛苦，天天教这些小鬼们练功，有趣的很呢。

original: Sister Qingqing, you should teach us the skill of Steal, this stupid brother hasn't even learned it himself, how can he teach us?
context: 青青姐，还是你来教我们暗取的本事吧，这个笨蛋哥哥自己都还没学会，怎么可能教我们嘛。

original:
You little devil, have you learned to tattle?
No dinner for you tonight, hmph!
context:
你这个小鬼，学会告状了是吧？
晚上不给你饭吃，哼！

original:
Oh, what a big temper!
If you dare to starve these little guys, I'll skin you alive!
context:
呦，好大的威风呀！
你要是敢饿这些小家伙，看我不把你扒皮抽筋！
