original: Hehe, how could I? I'm just playing with these little devils.
context: 嘿嘿，哪能呀，跟这些小鬼闹着玩呢。

original: {PlayerName}, it's your turn to show off!
context: {PlayerName}，轮到你表现了！

original: Show off? Show off what?
context: 表现？表现什么？

original: Teach these little guys some skills, your Steal skill is outstanding among your peers, if you don't teach, who is qualified to teach?
context: 教这些小家伙本事呀，暗取的本事你在同门中算是出类拔萃的，你不教谁有资格教？

original: (If I teach these children the skill of Steal, if they commit crimes in the future, wouldn't I be the instigator? Should I teach them or not?)
context: （教会这些小孩暗取的本事，以后他们若是为非作歹，我岂不成了始作俑者？到底要不要教他们呢？）

original: Teach these children the skill of Steal!
context: 教这些小孩暗取的本事！

original: Refuse to teach these children the skill of Steal.
context: 拒绝教这些小孩暗取的本事。

original: These children are still young and have no concept of right and wrong. If they learn the skill of Steal and commit crimes, what should we do?
context: 这些孩子年纪尚小，没有是非观念，若是学了暗取的本事，为非作歹怎么办？

original: You have learned the skill of Steal and have not committed any crimes, why are you worried that these children will do bad things?
context: 你学会了暗取的本事都没有为非作歹，为什么反而担心这些小孩子会做坏事？

original: This, this is not the same, right?
context: 这，这不一样吧。

original:
I don't care!
Whether to teach them or not depends on your word.
context:
我不管！
教不教他们就看你一句话。

original: Now is not the time to teach them, so I won't teach them now.
context: 现在不是教他们的时候，所以我现在不会教他们。

original: Hmph, if you won't teach, I will!
context: 哼，你不教我来教！

original: Everyone come over, our "Master Thief" {PlayerName}, brother {PlayerSurName} is going to show off his unique skills to everyone!
context: 大家快过来，咱们的“妙手盗圣”{PlayerName}，{PlayerSurName}哥哥要给大家表演他的绝活啦！

original: Kids, keep your eyes wide open~
context: 小朋友们，眼睛可要睁大噢~

original: Is that it? It's nothing special
context: 这就完了？不过如此嘛

original: Can you show everyone what's written on your back?
context: 你让大家看看你背后写的什么？

original: You—
Are—
A—
Big—
Fool—
Hahaha...
context: 哈哈哈……

original: Brother {PlayerSurName} is so cool!
context: {PlayerSurName}哥哥好厉害！

original: I want to learn this skill too!
context: 我也要学这样的本事！

original: Teach me, teach me, teach me quickly!
context: 教我，教我，快教我!

original: I want to take brother {PlayerName} as my master
context: 我要拜{PlayerName}哥哥为师

original: {PlayerGivenName}, you are my idol!
context: {PlayerGivenName}你是我偶像！

original: It's rare to see these little guys so happy
context: 难得看到这些小家伙开心的样子

original: It's a piece of cake, if you guys behave well, you will be as good as me in the future.
context: 小菜一碟，你们要是乖乖听话，以后你们也会想我一样厉害。

original: We will definitely behave!
context: 我们一定听话！

original: I'm the best baby.
context: 我是最乖的宝宝。

original: I only listen to brother {PlayerName}.
context: 我只听{PlayerName}哥哥的话。

original: I'm the best behaved!
context: 我最乖了！

original: Big brother, you have to keep your word
context: 大哥哥，你要说话算数哦

original: It seems to be very lively here.
context: 这里看来很热闹的样子呀。

original:
You bunch of Nest of Swallow thieves, you've got some nerve!
A gathering of big and small thieves, it's a good opportunity to catch them all, quite a merit.
context:
你们这群燕子窝的小贼，胆子不小啊！
大贼小贼齐聚一堂，正好一网打尽，功劳不小啊。

original: Catch them all, quite a big talk.
context: 一网打尽，口气不小啊。

original: Hmph, no more talking about Inseparable, let's get started!
context: 哼，生死勿论，动手！

original: This place is no longer safe, hurry up and find a new place for these children.
context: 这里已经不安全了，赶紧换个地方安置这些孩子吧。

original: Sister will take you to a new home, more comfortable and warmer than here!
context: 姐姐带你们换个新家，比这里还要舒服，还要暖和！

original: Long live sister!
context: 姐姐万岁！

original: I love Sister Qingqing the most.
context: 我最爱青青姐了。

original: Time to move~
context: 搬家咯~

original: Is there a better place than here?
context: 还有比这里更好的地方吗？

original: Is big brother coming with us?
context: 大哥哥跟我们一起吗？

original: Hua Qingqing relocated these children to a Ruined shrine, and the original Mountain cave was completely abandoned.
context: 华青青把这些小孩子安置到了一所破庙里，原来的山洞就彻底废弃了。

original: {PlayerName}, these little ones are so happy today, thanks to you.
context: {PlayerName}，这些小家伙今天难得这么开心，多亏了你。

original: It's nothing, seeing these children so happy, I feel pretty good too.
context: 这没什么，看到这些小孩子这么开心，我心里也是蛮爽的。

original: Thank you...
context: 谢谢你……

original:
I can't believe you really abducted so many children, you're utterly heartless!
You bunch of villains, surrender now!
context:
想不到你们真的拐来这么多孩子，真是丧尽天良！
你们这帮恶贼，束手就擒吧！

original: People from the Crime Investigation Bureau? Mind your own business!
context: 神捕门的人嘛？多管闲事！

original: Children, you scatter quickly, watch uncle teach you how to beat the bad guys!
context: 孩子们，你们快散开，看叔叔教你们怎么打坏人！

original: Big brother, we'll help you!
context: 大哥哥，我们帮你！

original: You are big bad guys! You can't bully big brother!
context: 你们是大坏蛋！不许你欺负大哥哥！

original: Get away!
context: 快走开！

original: How can you treat big brother like this!
context: 怎么这样对待大哥哥！

original: You guys are so mean!
context: 你们好坏！

original: What... what's going on here?
context: 这，这是怎么一回事？

original: Our parents are dead. It was the big brother and sister who took us in, gave us a place to live, and food to eat.
context: 我们父母都死了，是大哥哥、大姐姐收留我们，给我们住的地方，还有吃的东西。

original:
They are all good people, very good people!
You bully big brother, so you are all bad guys!
context:
他们都是好人，大大的好人！
你们欺负大哥哥，所以你们都是坏人！

original: Don't... don't hurt these children, they are innocent.
context: 别，别对这些孩子动手，他们是无辜的。

original: {PlayerSurName} Junior brother, what should we do now? Give me some advice.
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，现在该怎么办，帮我拿个主意吧。

original: Follow the order, eliminate everyone in this Nest of Swallow!
context: 服从命令，除掉这里燕子窝所有人！

original: Give them a chance to live.
context: 放他们一条生路。

original: Are we really going to do this?
context: 真的要这么做吗？

original: Don't forget your identity. As long as you are a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau, obedience is your duty.
context: 别忘了你的身份，只要你一天是神捕门的人，就要以服从为天职。

original: I understand. I am a head catcher of the Crime Investigation Bureau. None of these Nest of Swallow thieves can be spared.
context: 我知道了，我是神捕门捕头，这些燕子窝贼人一个都不能放过。

original:
You and Luo Qianxue have eliminated all the Nest of Swallow disciples in the cave,
The children in the Mountain cave were terrified by your actions and scattered in all directions, soon disappearing from sight.
context:
你和洛千雪联手消灭了洞里所有的燕子窝弟子，
山洞里的孩子被你们的举动吓坏了，四下逃散，很快就不见踪影。

original: {PlayerSurName} Junior brother, do you think what we did was right?
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，你觉得咱们这样做对吗？

original: As long as you still consider yourself a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau, there is no problem with doing this. Don't think too much, the chief catcher is still waiting for us to report back.
context: 只要你还把自己还当作神捕门的人，这样做就一点问题也没有。别多想了，总捕头还等着咱们回去复命呢。

original:
You and Luo Qianxue have eliminated all the Nest of Swallow disciples in the cave,
The children in the Mountain cave were terrified by your actions and scattered in all directions, soon disappearing from sight.
context:
你和洛千雪联手消灭了洞里所有的燕子窝弟子，
山洞里的孩子被你们的举动吓坏了，四下逃散，很快就不见踪影。

original: Are we really going to do this? Aren't you afraid of the chief catcher's punishment?
context: 真要这么做吗？你不怕总捕头的责罚吗？

original: Compared to the lives of these children, what does this little punishment count for?
context: 相比这些孩子的性命，这点责罚又算得了什么。

original: The chief catcher only ordered us to eliminate these bad guys, not including these children!
context: 总捕头只是命令咱们把这些坏人除去，不包括这些孩子！

original:
After we deal with these Nest of Swallow people, who will take care of these children?
If no one takes care of them, they are so young, how many days can they survive?
context:
咱们处置了燕子窝这些人，那么这些孩子谁来照顾？
没人照顾的话，他们那么小，又能挨过几天？

original: Even if we deal with these Nest of Swallow people, it's not urgent. We can't exchange the lives of these children for the chief catcher's appreciation.
context: 即便处置燕子窝这些人也不急于一时，不能为了换取总捕头的赏识，就要以这些孩子的性命做为代价。

original: So, we let them go today!
context: 所以，我们今天放过他们！

original: Alright, I'll listen to you!
context: 好，就听你的！

original: People of Nest of Swallow, listen up: We're not making things difficult for you today because we don't want these children to witness a brutal scene, nor do we want them to be left homeless in the future.
context: 燕子窝的人，你们听好了：今天我们不为难你们，是因为不想让这些孩子看到残忍的一幕，更不想让他们今后漂泊无依。

original: However, we are still enemies. Even if we let you go, others will come after you. I advise you to run away from here as fast as you can and never come back!
context: 不过我们之间仍然是敌人，即便是我们放过了你们，也会有别的人找上门来的，劝你们速度离开此地，不要再回来了！

original: Let's go back and report.
context: 咱们回去复命吧。

original: People of Nest of Swallow, listen up: We're not making things difficult for you today because we don't want these children to witness a brutal scene, nor do we want them to be left homeless in the future.
context: 燕子窝的人，你们听好了：今天我们不为难你们，是因为不想让这些孩子看到残忍的一幕，更不想让他们今后漂泊无依。

original: However, we are still enemies. Even if we let you go, others will come after you. I advise you to run away from here as fast as you can and never come back!
context: 不过我们之间仍然是敌人，即便是我们放过了你们，也会有别的人找上门来的，劝你们速度离开此地，不要再回来了！

original: {PlayerSurName}, junior brother, are you really not afraid of the Chief Catcher's punishment?
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，你真的不怕总捕头责罚吗？

original: Oh dear, I'm so scared~
context: 哎呀，我好害怕呀~

original: Your annoying demeanor really makes it hard for people to hate you.
context: 你这副贱像，真是让人讨厌不起来。

original: I'm quite curious about what kind of punishment the Chief Catcher will impose on us. Chief Catcher, please don't disappoint me.
context:
我倒是很好奇总捕头究竟会对咱们做出什么样的惩罚。
总捕头，你可千万别叫我失望啊。

original: {PlayerName}, what are you planning to do?
context: {PlayerName}，你打算作什么？

original: {PlayerSurName}, don't forget what we're here for.
context: {PlayerSurName}你别忘了咱们是来做什么的。

original: (No matter what I choose, I will offend the other side. It's such a tough decision.)
context: （无论选择什么都会得罪另外一边，好难抉择啊）

original: Stand with Luo Qianxue.<color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 站在洛千雪一方。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Stand with Hua Qingqing.<color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 站在华青青一方。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: {PlayerName}, today is between me and Luo Qianxue, don't interfere!
context: {PlayerName}，今天是我跟洛千雪的事情，你不要插手！

original: Luo Qianxue, I've been displeased with you for a long time. If you win today, you can handle things here as you wish, I won't interfere; if you lose, get on your horse and scram!
context: 洛千雪，我早看你不顺眼了，今天你若打赢我，这里的事情随你们处置，我决不干预；你们要是输了，就立马滚蛋！

original: Fine, I accept your challenge!
context: 好，我答应你！

original: Hmph, {PlayerName}, from today on, we're even!
context: 哼，{PlayerName}，今天开始，咱们恩怨一笔勾销！

original:
You and Luo Qianxue have eliminated all the Nest of Swallow disciples in the cave,
The children in the Mountain cave were terrified by your actions and scattered in all directions, soon disappearing from sight.
context:
你和洛千雪联手消灭了洞里所有的燕子窝弟子，
山洞里的孩子被你们的举动吓坏了，四下逃散，很快就不见踪影。

original:
You and Luo Qianxue have eliminated all the Nest of Swallow disciples in the cave,
The children in the Mountain cave were terrified by your actions and scattered in all directions, soon disappearing from sight.
context:
你和洛千雪联手消灭了洞里所有的燕子窝弟子，
山洞里的孩子被你们的举动吓坏了，四下逃散，很快就不见踪影。

original: {PlayerSurName} Junior brother, do you think what we did was right?
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，你觉得咱们这样做对吗？

original: As long as you still consider yourself a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau, there is no problem with doing this. Don't think too much, the chief catcher is still waiting for us to report back.
context: 只要你还把自己还当作神捕门的人，这样做就一点问题也没有。别多想了，总捕头还等着咱们回去复命呢。

original: You two, please leave. You're not welcome here!
context: 你们俩请吧，这里不欢迎你们！

original: {PlayerSurName}, you won't blame me for intentionally losing just now, will you?
context: {PlayerSurName}，你不会怪我刚才有意放水吧。

original: You were fighting so fiercely just now, I didn't notice any vulnerability. You intentionally lost to Hua Qingqing, didn't you? You didn't want those children to be left without care in the future.
context:
刚才你们打得这么激烈，我还真没看出破绽。
你故意输给华青青，是不想让那些孩子将来没人照顾吧。

original: Children are innocent. If we kill these people from Nest of Swallow, these children will soon lose their support and won't survive for long. So, even if it means disobeying the Chief Catcher's orders, I insist on doing this.
context: 孩子是无辜的，我们若是杀死燕子窝这些人，这些孩子很快也就没了依靠，活不了多久了。所以，这次就算是违抗总捕头命令，我也要坚持这么做。

original: No matter what you do, I will firmly support you!
context: 无论你做什么，我都坚决支持你！

original: {PlayerSurName}, junior brother, you won't blame me for intentionally losing just now, will you?
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，你不会怪我刚才有意放水吧。

original: You were fighting so fiercely just now, I didn't notice any vulnerability. You intentionally lost to Hua Qingqing, didn't you? You didn't want those children to be left without care in the future.
context:
刚才你们打得这么激烈，我还真没看出破绽。
你故意输给华青青，是不想让那些孩子将来没人照顾吧。

original: Children are innocent. If we kill these people from Nest of Swallow, these children will soon lose their support and won't survive for long. So, even if it means disobeying the Chief Catcher's orders, I insist on doing this.
context: 孩子是无辜的，我们若是杀死燕子窝这些人，这些孩子很快也就没了依靠，活不了多久了。所以，这次就算是违抗总捕头命令，我也要坚持这么做。

original: No matter what you do, I will firmly support you!
context: 无论你做什么，我都坚决支持你！

original: {PlayerName}, today is between me and Hua Qingqing, don't interfere!
context: {PlayerName}，今天是我跟华青青的事情，你不要插手！

original: Hua Qingqing, I know this is your Nest of Swallow's territory. The saying goes, a dragon can't suppress a snake in its own haunt, but as a head catcher of the Crime Investigation Bureau, I'm going to suppress you, the local snake, today!
context: 华青青，我知道这里是你们燕子窝的地盘。俗话说强龙不压地头蛇，但是身为神捕门捕头，我今天偏要压一压你这条地头蛇！

original: Hmph, I'll accompany you to the end!
context: 哼，奉陪到底！

original: I lost, I won't interfere with you anymore, do as you please.
context: 我输了，我不会干涉你们了，你们随意吧。

original:
You and Luo Qianxue have eliminated all the Nest of Swallow disciples in the cave,
The children in the Mountain cave were terrified by your actions and scattered in all directions, soon disappearing from sight.
context:
你和洛千雪联手消灭了洞里所有的燕子窝弟子，
山洞里的孩子被你们的举动吓坏了，四下逃散，很快就不见踪影。

original: {PlayerSurName} Junior brother, do you think what we did was right?
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，你觉得咱们这样做对吗？

original: As long as you still consider yourself a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau, there is no problem with doing this. Don't think too much, the chief catcher is still waiting for us to report back.
context: 只要你还把自己还当作神捕门的人，这样做就一点问题也没有。别多想了，总捕头还等着咱们回去复命呢。

original:
I lost, I won't lay a hand on these people.
{PlayerName}, let's run away from here.
context:
我输了，我不会对这些人动手了。
{PlayerName}，咱们离开这里吧。

original: But I still advise you to evacuate as soon as possible, this place has been exposed.
context: 不过还是劝你们赶快撤离，这里已经暴露了。

original: Hmph! I know that without you telling me.
context: 哼！不用你说我也知道。

original: I will have them evacuate as soon as possible.
context: 我会让他们尽快离开的。

original: {PlayerSurName}, junior brother, you won't blame me for intentionally losing just now, will you?
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟，你不会怪我刚才有意放水吧。

original: You were fighting so fiercely just now, I didn't notice any vulnerability. You intentionally lost to Hua Qingqing, didn't you? You didn't want those children to be left without care in the future.
context:
刚才你们打得这么激烈，我还真没看出破绽。
你故意输给华青青，是不想让那些孩子将来没人照顾吧。

original: Children are innocent. If we kill these people from Nest of Swallow, these children will soon lose their support and won't survive for long. So, even if it means disobeying the Chief Catcher's orders, I insist on doing this.
context: 孩子是无辜的，我们若是杀死燕子窝这些人，这些孩子很快也就没了依靠，活不了多久了。所以，这次就算是违抗总捕头命令，我也要坚持这么做。

original: No matter what you do, I will firmly support you!
context: 无论你做什么，我都坚决支持你！

original: Hmph, you chose to stand with Hua Qingqing just now, there was no sign of support for me.
context: 哼，你刚才可是选择站在华青青一边，可没有半分支持我的意思。

original: Why are there so many children here? Where did you get them from?
context: 这里怎么会有这么多孩子，你们从哪弄来的？

original: This matter has nothing to do with you, and you're not welcome here, please run away.
context: 这件事跟你没有关系，而且这里也不欢迎你，请你离开。

original: Although you are a fellow disciple of the Nest of Swallow, this matter has nothing to do with you. If you want to know, go ask Sister Qingqing.
context: 虽然你是燕子窝的同门，但是这件事情跟你无关，你如果想知道就去问青青姐吧。

original: A familiar female voice
context: 熟悉的女声

original: Stop, thief, don't run!
context: 小贼，站住，不要跑！

original: Strange, how come he disappeared when I chased here?
context: 奇怪，怎么追到这里不见了？

original:
Isn't this Miss Ye?
I wonder what trouble she has encountered, I'll go ask.
context:
这不是叶姑娘吗？
不知道遇上什么麻烦事，我过去问问。

original: Miss Ye, didn't expect to meet you in Lin'an City?
context: 叶姑娘，想不到咱们在霖安城见面了？

original: Ah, how did you come to Lin'an City?
context: 呀，你怎么来霖安城了！

original: Did you just see a man in black running past here?
context: 你刚才有没有见到一个黑衣人从这里跑过去？

original: That guy went to the broken house.
context: 那家伙往破屋那边去了。

original:
That thief stole my Money bag, all my money is in it.
But that thief is very slippery, I can't catch him, will you come with me to catch him?
context:
那小贼偷了我的钱袋，我身上的钱可都在里面了。
不过那小贼油滑的很，我抓不到他，你随我一起去捉人吧？

original: Agree to accompany Ye Yinping to catch the thief.<color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 答应陪叶银瓶捉贼。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Politely decline.
context: 婉言谢绝。

original: Alright, it's better to rely on oneself than on others, I'll go catch this thief myself.
context: 好吧，求人不如求己，我自己去捉这个小贼。

original: It seems there is no way to go here...
context: 好像这里无路可走了……

original: This is called catching a turtle in a jar!
context: 这就叫瓮中捉鳖！

original: Also called beating a dog in a closed room!
context: 又叫关门打狗！

original: I really don't know where you two get your confidence from.
context: 真不知道你俩哪里来的自信。

original: Damn, it's an ambush!
context: 糟了，有埋伏！

original:
I'll give you back the Money bag, I really messed up this time.
I have old people and children to take care of, please let me go.
context:
钱袋还你吧，这次真是栽了。
我上有老下有小，请两位高抬贵手放了我吧。

original: (Checked the Money bag carefully and nothing is missing)
context: （仔细检查了钱袋分文不少）

original: You can go, if you steal again and bump into me, be careful I'll break your hand!
context: 你走吧，下次再偷鸡摸狗撞上本姑娘，当心打断你的手！

original: I dare not... I dare not anymore
context: 不敢了...再也不敢了

original:
I'm really lucky to meet you here!
Thank you for helping me get my Money bag back.
context:
我真是好运气，多亏在这能遇到你！
多谢你帮我把钱袋找回了。

original: Haven't you returned to the Ye Family Battalion camp yet? Aren't you afraid of your father's punishment?
context: 你还没有回叶家军军营吗？难道不怕你父帅责罚？

original: It's not easy to have a chance to come out, I have to have fun before I go back.
context: 好不容易有出来的机会，可不得玩尽兴了才回去。

original:
But, I've had enough fun, it's time to go back.
Remember to come to the Ye Family Battalion to play when you are free~
context:
不过，我已经玩的差不多了，是时候回去了。
你有空了记得来叶家军找我玩啊~

original: I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
context: 我还要到其他城里游玩一番，说不定咱们还会再见面的。

original: {PlayerName}, see you later.
context: {PlayerName}，后会有期啦。

original:
Two naive kids, really asking for trouble.
I'll take the money in this Money bag, consider it as a gift to me.
context:
两个天真的小家伙，真是自讨苦吃。
这钱袋里的钱我就收下了，就当给我的孝敬了。

original: {yell} You damn thief, give me back my Money bag!
context: {yell}可恶的小贼，把钱袋还我！

original: Miss Ye, didn't expect to meet you here again.
context: 叶姑娘，想不到在这又遇到你了。

original: Shh, there's a show to watch.
context: 嘘，有热闹看了。

original: Why are you two suing each other?
context: 你们二人为何要打官司？

original: Liu Dazhuang bit my nose, please sir do justice for me.
context: 刘大壮咬伤了我的鼻子，请老爷为草民做主。

original: Liu Dazhuang, why did you bite his nose?
context: 刘大壮，你为何咬他鼻子？

original: Sir, I didn't bite, he bit himself.
context: 老爷，我没有咬，是他自己咬的。

original: Wang Ergou, you bit yourself, why are you framing others?
context: 王二狗，你自己咬的，怎么诬告他人？

original: Sir, I can't reach my own nose if I bite it myself!
context: 老爷，我自己咬自己鼻子够不着啊！

original:
Right, right, right! You can't reach your own nose.
Liu Dazhuang, Wang Ergou can't reach his own nose, it's clear that you bit it!
context:
对，对，对！你是够不着自己的鼻子。
刘大壮，王二狗够不到自己的鼻子，分明是你咬的！

original: Sir, he was standing on a stool and bit it.
context: 老爷，他是站在板凳上咬的。

original: Yes! He couldn't reach it at first, but standing on a stool, he can reach it.
context: 对啊！本来是够不着，但是站在凳子上，这不就够着了吗。

original:
Bold Wang Ergou, you bit your own nose while standing on a stool, and you want to frame a good person!
Come on, give him thirty heavy beatings!
context:
大胆王二狗，站在凳子上咬破自己鼻子，还要诬陷好人！
来人啊，给我重打三十大板！

original: What a confused official!
context: 真是个糊涂官！

original: Who dares to disrespect this official in the court!
context: 堂下何人藐视本官！

original: Ye Yinping of the Ye family.
context: 叶家叶银瓶。

original: So it's the daughter of Marshal Ye, what advice do you have?
context: 原来是叶元帅的千金，不知道有何指教呀？

original: You, the confused official, are judging a confused case, today I really opened my eyes.
context: 你这糊涂官乱判糊涂案，今天我也是开眼界了。

original: This, this, too many cases, yes, too many indeed. I'm afraid I've made a fool of myself in front of Miss Ye.
context:
这个，这个，案子太多，对，太多了。
确实无法思虑周全，让叶姑娘见笑了。

original: Too many cases? How many do you have? I, the young lady, will help you solve them!
context: 案子太多？你还有多少案子，本小姐断给你看！

original: This, this... Thank you, Miss Ye.
context:
这个，这个……
有劳叶姑娘了。

original: {PlayerName}, you've had enough fun, come help me judge a case~
context: {PlayerName}，热闹看够了，来帮忙审个案子呗~

original: I'd be happy to help~
context: 乐意效劳~

original: Today, I, the young lady, will judge on your behalf. If you have any grievances, I will stand up for you.
context: 今日本姑娘代为审案，你们有何冤屈，本姑娘为你们做主。

original: The old lady's Inventory was stolen by one of these two men, please help the old lady find out who stole the Inventory.
context: 老婆子的包裹不知是他们两人中哪一位抢走的，请姑娘帮老婆子找出抢包裹之人。

original: ({PlayerName}, I've never judged a case before, what should I do next?)
context: （{PlayerName}，我从来没有审过案子，接下来该如何呀？）

original: At least let the old lady describe the incident in detail first.
context: 起码应该先让老婆婆详细描述事情经过。

original: Old lady, please tell me in detail what happened.
context: 老婆婆，请你跟本姑娘详细说下事发的经过吧。

original: The old lady was walking at night with her Inventory, when a man took advantage of the darkness to steal the Inventory and run away. Fortunately, a kind passerby happened to pass by and helped the old lady chase after him.
context: 老婆子带着包裹走夜路，这时有个汉子趁着夜色抢了包裹就跑，恰巧有好心路人经过，帮老婆子追了上去。

original: When the old lady caught up, she found two people fighting, both claiming that the other was the one who stole the Inventory.
context: 等老婆子赶到时，发现有两人正扭打在一起，都说对方是抢包裹的人。

original: The old lady didn't get a good look at the thief's face when the Inventory was stolen, so she couldn't tell which one of them stole her Inventory. That's why she came to the government to judge the case.
context: 包裹被抢时，老婆子并未看清那人长相，无法判断究竟是哪位抢了老婆子包裹，因此来官府断案。

original: ({PlayerName}, what should I do next? I have no clue about this case.)
context:
（{PlayerName}，接下来怎么办？
这案子本姑娘完全没有头绪呀。）

original: Let the two of them have a race to see who runs faster.
context: 让两人比赛跑步，看两人谁跑的快。

original: Punish <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color>!
context: 对<color=#c44b0e>赵旺财</color>用刑！

original: Punish <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color>!
context: 对<color=#c44b0e>李毛蛋</color>用刑！

original: Determine that <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color> is the one who stole the Inventory!
context: 判定<color=#c44b0e>赵旺财</color>是抢包裹之人！

original: Determine that <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color> is the one who stole the Inventory!
context: 判定<color=#c44b0e>李毛蛋</color>是抢包裹之人！

original: Ye Yinping had the two of them race, and it was clear that <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color> was a bit faster than <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color>.
context: 叶银瓶让两人比试跑步，比试结果明显是<color=#c44b0e>赵旺财</color>比<color=#c44b0e>李毛蛋</color>快上几分。

original: Intimidate <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color>.
context: 威吓<color=#c44b0e>赵旺财</color>。

original: Give <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color> three strokes of the cane.
context: 杖责<color=#c44b0e>赵旺财</color>三大板。

original: Give <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color> five strokes of the cane.
context: 杖责<color=#c44b0e>赵旺财</color>五大板。

original: No punishment for now.
context: 暂不用刑。

original: You audacious commoner Zhao Wangcai, you obviously stole the old lady's Inventory, confess quickly to avoid further punishment!
context: 大胆刁民赵旺财，分明是你偷了婆婆的包裹，还不速速招认，免受皮肉之苦！

original: Uh...
What?! He was scared to death.
context: 什么？！竟然把他活活吓死了。

original: Miss Ye, you have such a great official power, you actually scared someone to death! If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, I would have punished you for killing!
context:
叶姑娘，你好大的官威哪，竟然把人活活逼死了！
若非看在叶元帅份上，本府就要治你草菅人命之罪了！

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original: Spare me, sir, I confess, I did steal the old lady's Inventory.
context: 大人饶命啊，小人招供，确实是小人抢了这位婆婆的包裹。

original: Hmm, I didn't think you looked like a good person, and I was right.
context: 嗯，本姑娘看你也不像好人，果然被本姑娘料中了。

original: Miss, is the case closed like this?
context: 姑娘，这案子就这么结了？

original: Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
context: 对啊，这种事情再简单不过了，您看他这不是招供了吗。

original: Hmph, beaten into confession, huh?
context: 哼，屈打成招么

original: Miss Ye, if Marshal Ye knew about your reckless judgement, he would surely punish you according to your family rules.
context: 叶姑娘，叶元帅若是知道你如此胡乱判案，想必会对你家法处置吧。

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original: I'm innocent, please don't wrong a good person, Miss.
context: 小人冤枉，请姑娘不要冤枉好人呐。

original:
Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, yet there's still no result after all this time.
If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for disrupting the court!
context:
叶姑娘，你好大的官威哪，审到现在也没个结果出来。
若非看在叶元帅份上，本府就要治你们搅乱公堂之罪了！

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original: Impudent commoner Zhao Wangcai, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with three heavy planks first!
context: 大胆刁民赵旺财，既然你不肯招供，那就先打你三大板子！

original: I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
context: 小人冤枉呐|啊……|不是我|打错人了！|哇……

original: Ouch...
context: 呕噗——

original: What?! You actually beat him to death.
context: 什么？！竟然把他活活打死了。

original:
Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, you actually beat a man to death!
If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for taking a life!
context:
叶姑娘，你好大的官威哪，竟然把人活活打死了！
若非看在叶元帅份上，本府就要治你草菅人命之罪了！

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original: I'm innocent, please don't wrong a good person, Miss.
context: 小人冤枉，请姑娘不要冤枉好人呐。

original:
Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, are you planning to beat a confession out of him?
If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for disrupting the court!
context:
叶姑娘，你好大的官威哪，你是打算屈打成招吗？
若非看在叶元帅份上，本府就要治你们搅乱公堂之罪了！

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original: Impudent commoner Zhao Wangcai, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with five heavy planks first!
context: 大胆刁民赵旺财，既然你不肯招供，那就先打你五大板子！

original: I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
context: 小人冤枉呐|啊……|不是我|打错人了！|哇……

original: Intimidate <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color>.
context: 威吓<color=#c44b0e>李毛蛋</color>。

original: Punish <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color> with three heavy planks.
context: 杖责<color=#c44b0e>李毛蛋</color>三大板。

original: Punish <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color> with five heavy planks.
context: 杖责<color=#c44b0e>李毛蛋</color>五大板。

original: No punishment for now.
context: 暂不用刑。

original: Impudent commoner Li Maodan, it's clear that you stole the old lady's Inventory, confess quickly to avoid further pain!
context: 大胆刁民李毛蛋，分明是你偷了婆婆的包裹，还不速速招认，免受皮肉之苦！

original: Uh...
What?! He was scared to death.
context: 什么？！竟然把他活活吓死了。

original: Miss Ye, you have such a great official power, you actually scared someone to death! If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, I would have punished you for killing!
context:
叶姑娘，你好大的官威哪，竟然把人活活逼死了！
若非看在叶元帅份上，本府就要治你草菅人命之罪了！

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original:
I confess, it was indeed me who stole this old lady's Inventory.
Later, Zhao Wangcai chased after me, he wouldn't let me go, so we started fighting.
context:
小人招供，确实是小人抢了这位婆婆的包裹。
后来被赵旺财从后面追来，他不肯放我走，所以我们相互动起手来。

original: You're honest, from the result of your race just now, I can tell that Zhao Wangcai runs faster than you, so he's not the one who stole the Inventory, otherwise, how could you catch up with him with your speed.
context: 算你老实，本姑娘从你们二人刚才赛跑的结果就能看出，赵旺财跑的比你快，自然不是抢包裹之人，否则以你的速度怎么能追的上他。

original: Miss, you indeed have discerning eyes, a true justice in this world.
context: 姑娘果然明察秋毫，再世青天啊。

original: Hmm, that makes sense.
context: 嗯，果然有几分道理。

original: Spare me, sir, I confess, I did steal the old lady's Inventory.
context: 大人饶命啊，小人招供，确实是小人抢了这位婆婆的包裹。

original: Hmm, I didn't think you looked like a good person, and I was right.
context: 嗯，本姑娘看你也不像好人，果然被本姑娘料中了。

original: Miss, is the case closed like this?
context: 姑娘，这案子就这么结了？

original: Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
context: 对啊，这种事情再简单不过了，您看他这不是招供了吗。

original: Hmph, that's all.
context: 哼，不过如此

original: Without any evidence, you're wronging me, I won't accept this!
context: 无凭无据，您这样冤枉小人，小人不服！

original: Impudent commoner Li Maodan, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with three heavy planks first!
context: 大胆刁民李毛蛋，既然你不肯招供，那就先打你三大板子！

original: I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
context: 小人冤枉呐|啊……|不是我|打错人了！|哇……

original: Ouch...
context: 呕噗——

original: Zhao Wangcai fades out.
context: 赵旺财淡出

original: What?! You actually beat him to death.
context: 什么？！竟然把他活活打死了。

original:
Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, you actually beat a man to death!
If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for taking a life!
context:
叶姑娘，你好大的官威哪，竟然把人活活打死了！
若非看在叶元帅份上，本府就要治你草菅人命之罪了！

original: Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
context: 你们两位请离开公堂，本府现在不想见到你们！

original: Without any evidence, you're wronging me, I won't accept this!
context: 无凭无据，您这样冤枉小人，小人不服！

original: Impudent commoner Li Maodan, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with five heavy planks first!
context: 大胆刁民李毛蛋，既然你不肯招供，那就先打你五大板子！

original: I won't accept this! I won't accept this!|I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
context: 小人不服！小人不服！|小人冤枉呐|啊……|不是我|打错人了！|哇……

original: Zhao Wangcai, when you two were competing just now, you revealed your Horse's foot, you move lightly and swiftly, clearly sharing the same characteristics with those flying thieves.
context: 赵旺财，刚才你二人比试时你已露出马脚，你步履轻快，行动迅捷，分明与那些飞贼的特征同出一辙。

original: Therefore, I conclude that you are the thief who stole the Inventory!
context: 因此，本姑娘断定你便是那抢夺包裹的贼人！

original: I'm innocent, you can't judge the case so recklessly!
context: 小人冤枉啊，您可不能这么胡乱判案啊！

original: The case is closed, take Zhao Wangcai into custody!
context: 本案已结，来人，把赵旺财收监！

original: Miss, is the case closed like this?
context: 姑娘，这案子就这么结了？

original: Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
context: 对啊，这种事情再简单不过了，您看他这不是招供了吗。

original: Hmph, that's nonsense.
context: 哼，狗屁不通

original: Miss Ye, this office does not agree with your judgement, it's completely one-sided and baseless, not convincing at all.
context: 叶姑娘，你这判罚本府并不认同，完全是你一面之词毫无根据，无法让人信服。

original: There's no need for Miss Ye to judge the case anymore, both of you can leave.
context: 不必劳烦叶姑娘审案了，两位请回吧。

original: Li Maodan, from the result of your race just now, I can tell that Zhao Wangcai runs faster than you, so he's not the one who stole the Inventory, otherwise, how could you catch up with him with your speed.
context: 李毛蛋，本姑娘从你们二人刚才赛跑的结果就能看出，赵旺财跑的比你快，自然不是抢包裹之人，否则以你的速度怎么能追的上他。

original: So, the truth is that you stole the old lady's Inventory and ran away, Zhao Wangcai chased after you from behind, because he's faster than you, that's why he caught up with you.
context: 所以，事情的真相是你抢了婆婆的包裹后夺路而逃，赵旺财从后赶来，因为速度快过你，所以这才把你追上。

original: Alas, there's nothing I can say now.
context: 唉，事到如今，我无话可说。

original: Miss, you indeed have discerning eyes, a true justice in this world.
context: 姑娘果然明察秋毫，再世青天啊。

original: Hmm, that makes sense.
context: 嗯，果然有几分道理。

original: Li Maodan, although this lady has not witnessed the event with her own eyes, the heart reflects the face. I see that your face is not good, you must not be a good person.
context: 李毛蛋，本姑娘虽未亲眼见证事情经过，但是相由心生，本姑娘看你面相不善，想必不是良善之辈。

original: Therefore, I conclude that you are the thief who stole the Inventory!
context: 因此，本姑娘断定你便是那抢夺包裹的贼人！

original: This is simply nonsense, I have never seen such a random judgment.
context: 简直一派胡言，从未见过如此胡乱断案的。

original: The case is closed, come on, take Li Maodan into custody!
context: 本案已结，来人，把李毛蛋收监！

original: Miss, is the case closed like this?
context: 姑娘，这案子就这么结了？

original: Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
context: 对啊，这种事情再简单不过了，您看他这不是招供了吗。

original: Hmph, that's nonsense.
context: 哼，狗屁不通

original: Miss Ye, this office does not agree with your judgement, it's completely one-sided and baseless, not convincing at all.
context: 叶姑娘，你这判罚本府并不认同，完全是你一面之词毫无根据，无法让人信服。

original: There's no need for Miss Ye to judge the case anymore, both of you can leave.
context: 不必劳烦叶姑娘审案了，两位请回吧。

original: I'm sorry I couldn't help you with the case.
context: 没能帮你审好案子，万分抱歉。

original: I was too reckless, I thought it was easy to judge a case, but I didn't expect it to be so complicated.
context: 是我太鲁莽了，本以为审案没什么难的，没想到这么复杂。

original: Sitting in that position, easily deciding others' Inseparable, is this power...
context: 坐在那样的位置，轻易决定他人的生死，这便是权力吗……

original: A city's prefect controls the Inseparable of the people in the city, and those powerful and noble people play with the Inseparable of the people in the world...
context: 一城知府便掌握一城百姓生死，那些权臣显贵则把天下人的生死玩弄股掌之上……

original: My father refused to collude with those powerful officials, so he kept himself clean, formed the Ye Family Battalion, and devoted himself to defending the territory, never interfering in politics.
context: 我爹爹就是不肯跟那些权臣同流合污，这才独善其身，组建了叶家军，一心一意只为守卫疆土，从不过问政事。

original: We messed up the case today, your father won't blame you, will he?
context: 咱们今天把案子审砸了，你爹爹若是知道了不会责怪你吧。

original: Even if my father knows, by the time I get home, his anger will have mostly subsided.
context: 即便爹爹知道了，等我回去的时候，气也早消得差不多了。

original: However, I've been out for quite a while, it's time to go back.
context: 不过，我出来已经够久了，是时候该回去了。

original: Remember to come to Ye Family Battalion when you have time, if my father is still angry, you can help me plead~
context: 有空了记得来叶家军找我啊，若是爹爹还没消气，你正好可以帮我求求情~

original: I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
context: 我还要到其他城里游玩一番，说不定咱们还会再见面的。

original: {PlayerName}, see you later.
context: {PlayerName}，后会有期啦。

original: Indeed, a tiger father has no dog daughter, today this mansion has really opened my eyes.
context: 果然虎父无犬女，今天本府可算大开眼界。

original: However, Miss Ye doesn't need to worry about the next case, this mansion will handle it impartially and will not be biased.
context: 不过，接下来的案件就不劳叶姑娘费心了，本府定当秉公处置，绝不徇私。

original: Thanks to you today, I was reckless and boasted, fortunately, we cooperated perfectly and did not lose face for my father.
context: 今天可多亏你了，当时我一时鲁莽就夸下海口，所幸咱俩配合完美，没有丢父帅的脸面。

original: This is also my first time participating in a trial, fortunately, I did not wrong a good person.
context: 我也是第一次参与审案，万幸没有冤枉好人。

original: We judged the case so beautifully today, will your father praise you when he knows?
context: 咱们今天把案子审得这么漂亮，你爹爹知道后会不会夸奖你？

original: My father is very strict, if he knows that I interfere in local affairs, he will definitely spank me.
context: 爹爹古板的很，他若知道我干涉地方政务，非打板子不可。

original: However, I've been out for quite a while, it's time to go back.
context: 不过，我出来已经够久了，是时候该回去了。

original: Remember to come to Ye Family Battalion when you have time, if my father is still angry, you can help me plead~
context: 有空了记得来叶家军找我啊，若是爹爹还没消气，你正好可以帮我求求情~

original: I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
context: 我还要到其他城里游玩一番，说不定咱们还会再见面的。

original: {PlayerName}, see you later.
context: {PlayerName}，后会有期啦。

original: {PlayerName}, I heard that you are now the champion of the Hero Association?
context: {PlayerName}，听说你现在是英雄会的冠军了？

original: It turns out to be Miss Ye, I didn't expect you to be so well-informed.
context: 原来是叶姑娘，想不到你的消息这么灵通。

original: I was planning to participate in the Hero Association, but I was delayed on the way. When I arrived, I found that the registration had ended and the competition was nearing its end.
context: 本来我也打算参加英雄会的，路上有事情耽搁了，等我赶到时发现报名已经截止，而且比试也接近尾声了。

original: It's a pity that I didn't have a chance to compete with Miss Ye.
context: 没能跟叶姑娘切磋一次，真是太可惜了。

original:
So you think so too, that's great!
Let's have a competition here today, let me see the skill of the champion of the Hero Association!
context:
原来你也这么想的，这可太好了！
择日不如撞日，咱们就在这里比试一番吧，让我也领教下英雄会冠军的本事！

original: I was just being polite, don't take it seriously.
context: 我那只是客套话，你别当真啊。

original: Stop talking nonsense, make your move!
context: 别废话啦，快出招吧！

original: It seems that your title of champion of the Hero Association is indeed well-deserved, I'm afraid there are not many people in the younger generation who can beat you.
context: 看来你这英雄会冠军的头衔果然货真价实，看来年轻一辈里能胜过你的恐怕不多了。

original: I wonder how Marshal Ye's spear technique is, I really want to have a chance to learn.
context: 不知道叶元帅的枪法如何，我倒真想有机会领教领教。

original: You are a bit overconfident, you even dare to challenge my father, you really don't know the height of the sky.
context: 你这信心有些过度膨胀了吧，竟然妄想挑战我爹爹，可真是不知天高地厚。

original: It would be good to get some advice from Marshal Ye, it would definitely save a lot of detours.
context: 能让叶元帅点拨一二也是好的，肯定能少走许多弯路。

original: Okay, when I return to the camp, you come to find me, I will introduce you to my father.
context: 那好，等我回到军营时，你来找我，我会向爹爹引见你的。

original: When are you going back to Ye Family Battalion, I can't wait.
context: 你什么时候回叶家军呢，我有些迫不及待了。

original: Let me think...
context: 让我想一想……

original:
It seems that I have been out for a long time, it's time to go back.
Remember to come to Ye Family Battalion to find me, let me see what it's like for you to compete with my father.
context:
好像已经出来很久了，是时候该回去了。
你可要记得来叶家军找我，让我见识下你跟爹爹比武是何等的场面。

original: I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
context: 我还要到其他城里游玩一番，说不定咱们还会再见面的。

original: {PlayerName}, see you later.
context: {PlayerName}，后会有期啦。

original: Alas, I was happy for nothing, I thought I could meet a decent opponent.
context: 唉，白高兴一场，还以为能遇到像样的对手。

original: How boring, I should go elsewhere to find a formidable opponent.
context: 真是无趣，还是去别处找找厉害的对手吧。

original: I heard you are the champion of the Heroes' Assembly?
context: 听说你就是英雄会的冠军？

original: Indeed, I am. May I ask if the lady has any advice?
context: 正是在下，请问姑娘有何指教？

original: My name is Ye Yinping. I originally planned to participate in the Heroes' Assembly, but I was delayed on the road. When I arrived, I found that the registration had already closed and the competition was nearing its end.
context: 我叫叶银瓶，本来我也打算参加英雄会的，路上有事情耽搁了，等我赶到时发现报名已经截止，而且比试也接近尾声了。

original: I am {PlayerName}, it's a pity that I didn't get a chance to spar with Miss Ye.
context: 在下{PlayerName}，没能跟叶姑娘切磋一次，真是太可惜了。

original:
So you think so too, that's great!
Let's have a competition here today, let me see the skill of the champion of the Hero Association!
context:
原来你也这么想的，这可太好了！
择日不如撞日，咱们就在这里比试一番吧，让我也领教下英雄会冠军的本事！

original: I was just being polite, don't take it seriously.
context: 我那只是客套话，你别当真啊。

original: Stop talking nonsense, make your move!
context: 别废话啦，快出招吧！

original: {PlayerName}, I have some unfortunate news for you. My father thinks I've caused too much trouble this time, so he has grounded me. I can't go on adventures anymore.
context: {PlayerName}，告诉你个不幸的消息，爹爹嫌我这次出去惹事不少，所以把我禁足了，以后再也不能四处逍遥了。

original: My father is very angry right now, you better not provoke him.
context: 爹爹可正在气头上，你可别去触他的霉头。

original: {PlayerName}, I pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
context: {PlayerName}拜见叶元帅。

original: Oh, it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}. What can I do for you?
context: 哦，原来是{PlayerSurName}少侠，请问有什么事吗？

original: About Miss Ye being grounded...
context: 关于叶姑娘被禁足之事……

original: What are you trying to say?
context: 你想说什么？

original: Miss Ye just wanted to prove herself. Although she was wrong, she had good intentions.
context: 叶姑娘只是想为了证明自己，虽然有错，但是情有可原。

original: My daughter, the daughter of Ye Pengju, was robbed in broad daylight and lost her money bag, along with the Ye Family Battalion's token, which has not been recovered yet. Is this excusable?
context: 堂堂叶鹏举的女儿光天化日之下被宵小偷了钱袋，连同叶家军信物也一并丢失，至今仍为找回。这是情有可原？

original: She interfered with local government affairs, mocked the imperial officials, took it upon herself to judge cases, made arbitrary sentences, and disregarded the law. Is this excusable?
context: 干预当地政务，嘲笑朝廷命官，妄自审案，胡乱判罚，藐视公堂法度。这是情有可原？

original: She completely disregarded the Ye family's reputation, forced people in the martial arts world to spar with her everywhere. If she won by luck, people would say that the Ye family bullied others with their power; if she lost, people would say that the Ye Family Spear was nothing special. Is this excusable?
context: 全然不顾叶家脸面，四处强迫江湖人士切磋比武，若是侥幸胜出，旁人会说叶家仗势欺人；若是败了，旁人又说叶家枪法不过如此。这是情有可原？

original: Well, that...
context: 这个，这个……

original: Ye Yinping is not a soldier of the Ye Family Battalion, nor does she hold any military position. If it weren't for this, I would have dealt with her according to military law long ago.
context: 叶银瓶并非叶家军的兵士，也未担任军中职务。若非如此，本帅早将她军法处置了。

original: Grounding her is just me enforcing family rules, this is a very light punishment. There's no need for you to plead for her anymore.
context: 对她禁足只是本帅执行家法，这已是极轻的惩罚，此事不必再为她求情了。

original: You are indeed trustworthy. Weren't you planning to spar with my father? Are you ready now?
context: 你果然守信用，你不是打算跟我爹爹切磋武功吗，现在你做好准备了吗？

original: Stop dawdling, are you ready or not?
context: 不要婆婆妈妈，你现在准备好了没有？

original: Hehe, this is going to be interesting!
context: 嘻嘻，这下有好戏看了！

original: Reporting to the Marshal, the champion of the Heroes' Assembly in Chuxiang City, {PlayerName}, is here to pay his respects.
context: 启禀元帅，楚襄城英雄大会夺魁者{PlayerName}拜见。

original: I, a humble commoner {PlayerName}, pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
context: 草民{PlayerName}拜见叶元帅。

original:
Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, there's no need for formalities.
Bottle has already informed me about your situation, I understand why you are here.
context:
{PlayerSurName}少侠不必多礼。
瓶儿已把少侠的事情告知本帅，少侠此行来意我已知晓。

original: Considering that you have helped Bottle to maintain the Ye family's reputation on many occasions, I agree to give you some guidance.
context: 看在你帮助瓶儿多番维护叶家脸面份上，本帅答应为你指点一二。

original: Bottle, don't think about slacking off and watching the fun. You are involved in this matter, you can't escape responsibility.
context: 瓶儿，你不要想着偷懒看热闹，此事因你而起，你逃不开干系。

original: Well, I can't watch the fun now.
context: 好嘛，这下看不成热闹了。

original:
Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, Bottle!
You two do your best to attack me, I will only use thirty percent of my strength. How much you can comprehend from this will depend on your own understanding.
context:
{PlayerSurName}少侠、瓶儿！
你们两人尽全力攻击本帅，本帅仅会施展三成功力，接下来你们能领悟多少，就看你们各自造化了。

original: It's a pity that we are still too far behind Marshal Ye's level, and we couldn't comprehend much.
context: 可惜，终究是和叶元帅境界相差太远，并不能领悟到多少东西。

original: Ferocious Dragon Charge!
context: 直捣黄龙！

original: Ferocious Dragon Charge!!!
context: 直捣黄龙！！！

original: This move is indeed stunning. I didn't expect Miss Ye to comprehend Marshal Ye's ultimate move so quickly.
context: 这一招果然惊艳绝伦，想不到叶姑娘这么快就把叶元帅的绝招参悟了。

original: What just happened? It seems that Miss Ye has performed some extraordinary technique.
context: 刚才发生了什么，好像叶姑娘施展出了什么了不得的招式。

original: Thank you, Marshal Ye, for your guidance.
context: 多谢叶元帅赐教。

original: Hehe, thank you, Daddy, you're the best!
context: 嘻嘻，多谢爹爹，爹爹最棒了！

original: Huh?!
Yes, thank you, Father Marshal, for your wisdom!
context: 是，多谢父帅，父帅英明！

original: Thanks to you for the trip to various cities some days ago, Daddy said I handled it well, so he won't restrict me from going out to the Jianghu anymore.
context: 前些日子在各城游历的事情还要多谢你呢，爹爹称我处理得当，以后不再限制我外出闯荡江湖啦。

original: My father has heard about you and he can't stop praising you.
context: 爹爹听我说起你的事情，对你也是赞不绝口呢。

original: {PlayerName}, I pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
context: {PlayerName}拜见叶元帅。

original: So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, no need for formalities.
context: 原来是{PlayerSurName}少侠，无须多礼。

original: Marshal, I know that you've been taking care of Silver Vase during her training and didn't cause any big trouble. You've worked hard.
context: 银瓶那丫头此番外出历练没惹出大乱子，本帅知道是你在背后多番照料，真是辛苦你了。

original: Marshal, you're too kind. It's just a small effort, not worth mentioning.
context: 元帅言重了，举手之劳不足挂齿。

original: Considering your help in maintaining the face of the Ye family for Vase, I agree to give you some guidance. Are you ready now?
context: 看在你帮助瓶儿多番维护叶家脸面份上，本帅答应为你指点一二。你现在可准备好了吗？

original: I'm ready!
context: 做好准备了！

original: Hold on a moment.
context: 稍等一下。

original: I still have a lot of things to do that don't require help from others, so let's go our separate ways.
context: 我还有很多事情尚未完成，这些事情不需要他人援手，所以咱们还是各走各的路吧。

original: Without my father's permission, I dare not run around freely. His family law is ruthless, I don't want to be beaten and unable to get out of bed for days.
context:
没有爹爹的许可，我可不敢再随便跑出去。
爹爹的家法可是六亲不认的，我可不想被打的几天下不了床。

original: {PlayerName}, don't try to make connections with me. We're not familiar with each other, don't try to win me over.
context: {PlayerName},你别乱攀交情，我跟你可不熟，别想拉拢我。

original: Finally, I can venture into the martial world again, I've been stifled these past few days.
context: 终于又可以闯荡江湖咯，这几天可要把我憋坏了。

original: Your team doesn't have a single vacancy. Inviting me to join is quite insincere, don't you think?
context: 你的队伍一个空位也没有，邀请我入伙，这也太没有诚意了吧。

original:
Ye Family Battalion and Yan Army are incompatible, you better give up!
If you don't leave quickly, I'll stab a few holes in you!
context:
叶家军与燕军势不两立，你还是死了这条心吧！
若不快滚，本姑娘在你身上捅出几个透明窟窿！

original: The emperor values royal dignity the most. If he doesn't agree, no one can take me away from Duke Kang's manor.
context: 皇兄最注重皇家颜面，他若是不同意，任何人都无法把我从康王府带走的。

original: I finally got out to enjoy a few days of freedom, I don't want to follow others' ideas and go to places I'm not interested in.
context: 好不容易溜出来自由自在玩几天，我可不想听从别人的想法，去我不感兴趣的地方。

original: With our current Relations, I don't want to have any more involvement with you.
context: 咱们如今这样的关系，我可不想再跟你有什么瓜葛。

original: Sir, why did you only come to pick me up now?
context: 官人，你怎么才来接我呀。

original: I'm so happy, I can finally go out and play again.
context: 太开心了，终于又可以外出游玩咯。

original: So many people gathered together, although it's lively and I like it, there's no place for me to join.
context: 这么多人都聚在一起，虽然是很热闹我也很喜欢，但是没有我可以加入的位置呀。

original: Benevolence
context: 仁心

original: Miss Forgetful's Medical skills are exquisite, it's a waste to be hidden here all the time.
context: 忘忧姑娘医术精湛，一直在这里隐居太埋没一身本事了。

original:
The world is unpredictable, it's quieter here.
Less disturbance, I can study medical books and cultivate medicinal herbs, so that the Medical of my sect won't be lost in my hands.
context:
世道人心难测，还是在这里清静些。
少人打扰，正可以研读医书、培育药草，不至于本门的医术在我手中断了传承。

original: They say reading ten thousand books is not as good as traveling ten thousand miles, why not go out with me to save the world? Not only will it broaden your horizons, but also promote your sect.
context: 所谓读万卷书不如行万里路，不如跟我一起出去济世救民，不但开阔眼界，还可把你门派发扬光大。

original: Saving the world...
context: 济世救民……

original: This grand goal is too far away for me. If you are willing, when you reach the realm of benevolence and boundless love, I can pass some Medical knowledge to you.
context: 这个宏远对我来说太遥远了，你若是有心，等你达到了仁心为怀大爱无疆的境界，我倒是可以传些医术给你。

original: Miss Forgetful, it's a pity if your Medical skills are buried here. As a doctor, don't you think about the responsibility of saving the world?
context: 忘忧姑娘，你的医术若是埋没在这里，实在可惜的很。做为一名医者，你难道没有想过济世救民的责任吗？

original:
The appearance reflects the mind, I have sensed your temperament through your face.
With your temperament, you are more suitable than me to save the world, and also more suitable to inherit the medical path of the Herbology Sect.
context:
相由心生，通过你的面相我已感受到了你的心性。
以你的心性，比我更加适合济世救民，也更加适合传承本草门的医道。

original: Special Medicine Guide
context: 特殊药引

original:
·Looking for a person with excellent swordsmanship
·Looking for a person with strong Strength
·Looking for a person with abundant MP
·Looking for a person with excellent Toxicology
·Looking for Thunderstruck wood
context:
·寻找剑术高明之人
·寻找臂力强悍之人
·寻找内力充沛之人
·寻找毒术高明之人
·寻找雷击木

original: Who are these people in the yard, they seem to be suffering?
context: 院子里这些人是什么来头，好像他们很难受的样子？

original: These are my patients.
context: 这些是我的病人。

original: Why doesn't Miss Qu treat them?
context: 曲姑娘为什么不救治他们呢？

original: It's not that I refuse to treat them, but their strange diseases have specific remedies, yet the medicinal ingredients are hard to find, and any slight deviation could cause the patient to die on the spot.
context: 并非我不肯救治，而是他们的怪症虽然有对症的方子，但是药引难寻，稍有偏差便会使患者命丧当场。

original: Moreover, they are not ordinary patients, each of them has profound skills, but for some reason, they all suddenly developed strange diseases on the same day. It's suspicious, so I'm still hesitating...
context: 而且他们并非普通的病人，每个人都功力深厚，却不知何故却在同一天突发怪症。事有蹊跷，因此我还在犹豫……

original:
Life is of paramount importance, Miss Qu, you don't need to hesitate anymore.
You can tell me what medicinal ingredients are needed to treat these people, and I will help you find them.
context:
人命关天，曲姑娘不必在犹豫了。
你可以告诉我救治这些人所需药引，我去帮你找来。

original: One person <color=#c44b0e>has more than ten gu worms burrowing inside his body, moving under the surface of his skin. It requires someone with extremely high sword skills to quickly pierce the skin and remove the gu worms when they are moving.</color>
context: 有一人<color=#c44b0e>体内钻入十余条蛊虫，在全身皮肤表层之下游走。需要剑术极高之人，趁蛊虫游走之际迅速挑破皮肤，取出蛊虫。</color>

original: One person <color=#c44b0e>has more than ten twisted bones in his body, the patient has already lost his sanity and is extremely strong. It requires someone with great Strength to restrain him and help him reset his bones one by one.</color>
context: 有一人<color=#c44b0e>身躯骨骼十余处扭曲，患者已经神智失常，且力大无穷。需要臂力强悍之人将其制住，并且帮其将骨骼一一复位。</color>

original: One person <color=#c44b0e>has chaotic internal energy in his body, as if several incompatible internal energies are repelling each other. It requires someone with abundant MP to help him infuse MP and guide the chaotic internal energy.</color>
context: 有一人<color=#c44b0e>体内真气杂乱不堪，似乎有数道不相统属的真气相互排斥。需要有内力极为充沛之人，帮其灌输内力疏导混乱的真气。</color>

original: One person <color=#c44b0e>has been poisoned by a strange poison, and there is currently no antidote. It requires someone who is proficient in using poison to use the method of fighting poison with poison, applying another poison to his body to neutralize the two poisons and make them disappear.</color>
context: 有一人<color=#c44b0e>身中奇毒，暂时无药可解。需要有一位精于用毒之人，用以毒攻毒的法门，在其身上另施异毒，使两者毒性中和，化于无形。</color>

original: The last person <color=#c44b0e>has been poisoned by a profound cold poison, his body is overflowing with cold air, and his body is gradually stiffening. It requires something of pure yang to cure him, such as the rare Thunderstruck wood!</color>
context: 最后一人<color=#c44b0e>身中玄寒之毒，浑身寒气四溢，身躯逐渐僵化。需纯刚至阳之物方可救治，比如世所罕见的雷击木！</color>

original: I need to keep making Soup medicine here to alleviate their pain, so the task of finding the medicinal ingredients can only be entrusted to {PlayerSurName}.
context: 我在这里需要一直为他们熬制减缓病痛的汤药，所以寻找药引之事只能有劳{PlayerSurName}少侠了。

original: Also, after {PlayerSurName} finds the medicinal ingredients, you can choose the appropriate medicinal ingredients for these patients yourself. You must not make any mistakes in the process, otherwise unpredictable consequences may occur.
context: 另外，{PlayerSurName}少侠寻到药引之后，可自行为这些病患对症选择药引，中途千万不能出错，否则会出现难以预料的后果。

original: Could Miss Qu please tell me again what medicinal ingredients these people need?
context: 劳烦曲姑娘再次告知一遍这些人所需的药引是什么？

original: Miss Qu, I have successfully treated all these people's diseases.
context: 曲姑娘，在下幸不辱命，这几人的病症已经全部救治好了。

original: {PlayerSurName}, you've worked hard.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠辛苦了。

original: Qu Wangyou, I didn't expect you to cure such difficult diseases, are you trying to cut off our source of income?
context: 曲忘忧，想不到这么棘手的病症你都给治好了，你这是要铁了心断我们的财路吗？

original: Evil doctor, these strange diseases on these people were caused by you, weren't they?
context: 邪郎中，这些人身上的奇怪病症都是出自你的手笔吧？

original: Yes, over the years I have secretly created many strange diseases that are difficult to cure. I didn't expect you to neutralize them so easily, are you deliberately opposing me?
context: 不错，这几年我暗中弄出不少难以治愈的古怪病症，想不到都让你这小丫头随手化解了，你这是存心要跟我作对啊。

original: Evil doctor! You were once a disciple of the Herbology Sect, is this how you use the medical skills taught by the Herbology Sect to act recklessly?
context: 邪郎中！枉你也曾是本草门的弟子，本草门教你的医术你就如此用来胡作非为吗！

original:
The world has changed, the old ways of the Herbology Sect can no longer stand in the world.
Are you planning to take those secret ancient prescriptions that you refuse to pass on into the coffin?
context:
世道已经变了，本草门原先那一套已经无法立足于世了。
你们守着那一堆不传之秘的古方难道打算带进棺材吗？

original: Qu Wangyou, the Herbology Sect is declining day by day, as the current sect leader, don't you feel ashamed? The Herbology Sect is destined to perish in your hands!
context: 曲忘忧，如今本草门日渐凋零，你身为当代门主，难道不觉得有愧吗？本草门注定要在你手中灭亡了！

original: I would rather see the Herbology Sect gradually decline, and the people under the sky no longer suffer from illness; unlike you, who tamper with prescriptions to reduce their efficacy, brew diseases to poison the people...
context: 我宁可本草门日渐凋零，普天之下百姓再无病患之苦；我不像你，篡改药方削减疗效、酿造病症荼毒百姓……

original: You are not only unfit to practice medicine, but also unfit to be a human!
context: 你不但不配行医，简直不配为人！

original: You don't know how grateful they are to me when I treat those ignorant people.
context: 你不知道当我救治那些愚民时，他们对我有多么感恩戴德。

original: In your eyes, I am a demon, a disgrace to the Plant Sect; but in their eyes, I am like their biological parents, with kindness as great as life itself!
context: 在你眼里我是恶魔，是本草门之耻；而在他们眼中，我简直如同生身父母，恩同再造！

original: These people all cherish their lives, I don't even have to think of excuses to defraud them, they will give me silver desperately, and if they don't spend the money, they will worry that I won't try my best to save them.
context: 这些人各个惜命，我甚至都不必想借口讹诈他们，他们都会拼了命给我塞银子，而且不把钱花出去他们还会担心我不会尽全力救治。

original: Hahaha, as the head of the Herbology Sect, how do you feel?
context: 哈哈哈，身为本草门门主的你，感受如何？

original: Now that I have blocked your source of wealth, it shows that most people are still sober and will not be deceived by your ghostly tricks.
context: 我如今挡了你的财路，说明多数人还是清醒的，不会被你的鬼魅伎俩所蒙蔽。

original: Therefore, the Herbology Sect is destined to be trampled under my feet. After today, there will be no more name of the Herbology Sect in the martial arts world. Those people you watched over will eventually have to come to me for treatment!
context: 所以，本草门注定要被我践踏在脚下，今日之后，江湖上不再有本草门的名号，被你庇佑的那些人，最终还得乖乖来找我看病！

original: Want to destroy the Herbology Sect?
context: 想灭了本草门？

original: With you, a beast that is inferior to pigs and dogs?
context: 凭你这条猪狗不如的畜生？

original: Or the five guys who repay kindness with ingratitude that I just saved?
context: 还是刚救治活命的五个恩将仇报的家伙？

original: Or the group of rotten fish and shrimps you brought with you, showing their teeth and claws?
context: 抑或是你带来的这群张牙舞爪的臭鱼烂虾？

original: Since you guys don't want to be human, then I'll send you to reincarnate. In your next life, you'll surely get what you wish for!
context: 你们这群家伙既然不想做人，那么我就送你们去投胎吧，下辈子保准如愿以偿！

original:
Junior sister, spare me, I know I was wrong.
Our Herbology Sect is already declining, we can't fight each other anymore.
context:
师妹，放过我，我知道错了。
咱们本草门本就凋零，可不能再同室操戈了。

original:
Now you remember that you are a member of the Herbology Sect?
Now you remember that we can't fight each other?
context:
你现在想起自己是本草门的人了？
现在又想起不能同室操戈了？

original: Junior sister, I have worked so hard to make the Herbology Sect famous!
context: 师妹，我如此苦心经营，也是为了给本草门扬名啊！

original: You are using the name of the Herbology Sect to make money, you are tarnishing the Herbology Sect, and the reputation you are spreading is a bad one!
context: 是你假借本草门之名借机敛财吧，你这是抹黑本草门，扬的也是恶名！

original: What are you, this is a family matter of the Herbology Sect, you are an outsider, why are you interfering!
context: 你算什么东西，这是本草门家务事，你一个外人插什么嘴！

original: {PlayerSurName} young hero is my friend, and also a friend of the Herbology Sect, what he said is also what I think.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠是我的朋友，也是本草门的朋友，他说的话也是我心中所想。

original: Junior sister, with my brain and your medical skills, we can definitely make the Herbology Sect shine again. Only in this way can we live up to the master's lifelong efforts.
context: 师妹，凭我的头脑加上你的医术，绝对可以使本草门重现往日辉煌，这样方才不会辜负师父一生的心血。

original: "Whether the Herbology Sect is declining or thriving, I have no regrets in my heart" - these were the words the master said to me before he died, and now I give them to you.
context: “本草门凋零也好，兴盛也罢，我无愧于心”——这是当年师父临终前对我说的话，如今我转赠给你。

original: Senior brother, the master once told us to help each other and not to kill each other. I won't hurt you, you run away, the Herbology Sect has nothing to do with you from now on.
context: 师兄，师父曾经叮嘱过，让我们务必守望相助，不得同门相残。我不会对你动手的，你离开吧，本草门与你从此再无瓜葛。

original: Humph, since junior sister doesn't want to make the Herbology Sect prosperous, then we have different paths and I won't accompany you.
context: 哼，既然师妹不想兴盛本草门，那么道不同不相为谋，恕不奉陪了。

original: Stop~
context: 站住~

original: Kid, we'll settle our accounts later, you better take care of your life.
context: 小子，咱俩的帐以后再算，你可要保重你的小命。

original: Kill the evil man here.
context: 在此击毙邪郎中。

original: Let the evil man go.
context: 放任邪郎中离去。

original:
I don't have the habit of giving my enemies a chance to breathe after making them my enemies.
I don't want to be a fool who lets the tiger return to the mountain, so let's settle our grudges today.
context:
我可没有给自己树敌之后，还给敌人喘息的习惯。
我也不想当纵虎归山的傻子，所以咱俩的恩怨还是今日了结吧。

original: Junior sister! This kid wants to take my life, are you going to do something?
context: 师妹！这小子要取我的性命，你管不管？

original: You are no longer a member of the Herbology Sect, this is a dispute between you and {PlayerSurName} young hero, I have no right to interfere.
context: 你已不是本草门的人，这是你与{PlayerSurName}少侠的纠葛，我无权干涉。

original: Fine, if you don't let me live, you won't have a good time either!
context: 好，不让我活，你们也别想好过！

original: Junior sister, junior sister, save, save me...
context: 师妹，师妹，救，救我……

original: Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName} for helping me clean up my sect.
context: 多谢{PlayerSurName}少侠帮我清理门户。

original: Don't you blame me for killing your former senior brother?
context: 你不怪我杀了你曾经的师兄？

original:
He was not only my senior brother, but also the youngest son whom my mentor loved the most...
I couldn't bring myself to do it, so it was only fitting for you to do it.
context:
他不止是我的师兄，还是恩师最疼爱的小儿子……
我没法亲自对他出手，所以由你代劳再合适不过。

original: You're right, the Herbology Sect taught me all my medical skills, which should be used for the benefit of the people, especially in these troubled times, we healers should step forward.
context: 你说得对，本草门教我这一身医术，本就应该造福于民，何况时逢乱世，我们医者更当挺身而出。

original: I agree to run away with you, young hero {PlayerSurName}. There should be more people outside who need my help. I can't claim to be a world savior, but at least I can truly be at peace with myself, worthy of being a successor of the Herbology Sect.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠我同意随你离开，外面应该有更多人需要我去救治。不敢说是济世救民，起码做到真正无愧于心，无愧于本草门的传人。

original: Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, for helping me through this crisis.
context: 多谢{PlayerSurName}少侠帮我度过这次难关。

original: I just let the evil doctor go, will it cause you trouble in the future?
context: 我刚才放走了邪郎中，会不会给你以后惹来麻烦？

original:
He was not only my senior brother, but also the youngest son whom my mentor loved the most...
If he still insists on having the Herbology Sect, I will give it to him, as a repayment for my mentor's kindness.
context:
他不止是我的师兄，还是恩师最疼爱的小儿子……
他若仍是执意要这本草门，我给他便是，就当偿还当年师父的恩情。

original: After this incident, I feel the need to go out, there should be more people outside who need my help. I can't claim to be a world savior, but at least I can truly be at peace with myself, worthy of being a successor of the Herbology Sect.
context: 经此一事，我觉得有必要走到外面去，外面应该有更多人需要我去救治。不敢说是济世救民，起码做到真正无愧于心，无愧于本草门的传人。

original: I agree to run away with you, young hero {PlayerSurName}. Come find me when you're ready.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠我同意随你离开，等你准备好了便来找我吧。

original: Also, I have to tell you, the Herbology Sect will eventually belong to the Nine Factions Sect, I have pledged my loyalty to the leader of the Nine Factions Sect, your gift today will be returned a hundredfold in the future!
context: 另外，还要告诉你们一声，这本草门早晚是九流门囊中之物，我已效忠九流门主，你们今日馈赠，他日必定百倍奉还！

original: Qu Wangyou, even your Herbology Sect can kill people with your treatments!
context: 曲忘忧，你这本草门竟然治病也会治死人了！

original: Qu Wangyou, aren't you proud of your medical skills?
context: 曲忘忧，你不是自诩医术神乎其技吗？

original: How come you can't solve such a simple disease, and even killed a person in the Herbology Sect, it's really embarrassing.
context: 怎么这么简单的病症都解决不了，竟然还在本草门医死了人，真是够丢人的。

original: It was my oversight, I didn't follow Miss Qu's method to treat the patient, it's not her fault.
context: 是我一时不慎，没有按照曲姑娘的法子救治，这怨不得曲姑娘。

original: I feel like there are hundreds of bugs crawling all over me, please save me, I'm about to be eaten by them...
context: 我身上仿佛有千百只虫子在爬来爬去，快救救我，我快要被它们吃掉了……

original: What method should I use to save him?
context: 用什么法子救治他呢？

original: Use excellent swordsmanship.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's Sword reaches 50)</color>
context: 用高明的剑术。<color=#097a76>（队伍任意成员御剑达到50）</color>

original: Use domineering strength.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's Strength reaches 8)</color>
context: 用霸道的臂力。<color=#097a76>（队伍任意成员臂力达到8）</color>

original: Use profound MP.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's MP reaches 800)</color>
context: 用高深的内力。<color=#097a76>（队伍任意成员内力达到800）</color>

original: Use exquisite toxicology.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's Toxicology reaches 50)</color>
context: 用精妙的毒术。<color=#097a76>（队伍任意成员毒术达到50）</color>

original: Use Thunderstruck wood.<color=#097a76>(1 Thunderstruck wood)</color>
context: 使用雷击木。<color=#097a76>（雷击木1根）</color>

original: Do not save for now.
context: 暂不救治。

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Finally survived...
context: 总算活过来了……

original: Damn it, you took so long, making me suffer so much!
context: 娘老子的，磨磨蹭蹭的，害老子多受这么许多罪！

original: Ah--
I feel so uncomfortable, it's like every joint is twisted and deformed, it's so painful!!!!
context: 我好难受啊，每处关节好像都扭曲变形，好痛苦啊！！！！

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Phew, I got my life back...
context: 呼，捡回一条命……

original: Don't expect me to thank you, this is what you should do!
context: 别指望我会谢你，这是你们应该做的!

original: Ah--
It feels like there are several chaotic energies rampaging inside me, as if my meridians are about to burst, please save me.
context: 好像有几股混乱的真气，在我体内横冲直撞，好像经脉都要被撑爆了，请你救我一救啊。

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Phew, finally feel better.
context: 呼，总算舒坦了。

original: In consideration of your rescue, here's a piece of advice for you: this place is full of disputes, better run away as soon as possible.
context: 看在你救我的份上，给你句忠告：这里是是非之地，还是早些离开吧。

original: Ah--
I'm beyond saving, still don't know what poison I've been afflicted with, I'm not willing to die like this!!!
context: 我没救了，没救了，到现在也不知道中了什么毒，就这么死去我好不甘心啊！！！

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: I'm actually cured! It's miraculous!
context: 竟然痊愈了！真是神奇！

original: Thank you, young man.
context: 多谢小兄弟了。

original: Ah--
Hehehe... I'm so cold, so cold...
context: 咯咯咯……我好冷啊，好冷啊……

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: I'm not cold anymore, I'm cured!!!
context: 竟然不冷了，我病好了！！！

original: Unexpectedly, you managed to get your hands on the rare Thunderstruck wood. It's a waste to use it for healing.
context: 想不到罕见的雷击木竟然被你搞到手了，用来治病太浪费了。

original: Ah--
You little brat, I've been waiting here for a long time!
context: 臭小子，我可在此等候多时了！

original: I let you run away back then, don't you regret it?
context: 当初放你离开，你难道还不知悔改吗？

original: Regret? I didn't do anything wrong, what is there to regret?
context: 悔改？我又没做错，悔改什么？

original:
One day, I will make a comeback and reclaim the Herbology Sect!
The Herbology Sect is mine, I am the master of the Herbology Sect!
context:
总有一天我会卷土重来，夺回本草门！
本草门是我的，我才是本草门门主！

original: Ah, I didn't expect your obsession to be so deep. You still don't understand why the master let me take charge of the Herbology Sect.
context: 唉，真没想到你执念如此之深，到现在你还不明白当初师父为何让我执掌本草门。

original: Qu Wangyou! You said you wouldn't run away from the Herbology Sect, how could you break your vow?
context: 曲忘忧！你不是不会离开本草门吗，你怎么破戒了？

original: I was just unwilling to go with the flow, unwilling to deal with those mundane matters. It doesn't mean I won't travel outside for the rest of my life.
context: 我之前只是不愿随波逐流，不愿意应付那些俗人俗事，并不代表我一辈子不会外出行走。

original: Damn it, there can't be two tigers on one mountain. Your medical skills are superior to mine. What's the point of my existence then? You, you...
context: 可恶，一山不容二虎，你的医术比我高明，到时候哪还有我存在的必要，你，你……

original: Go to hell!!!
context: 你去死吧！！！

original: Miss Qu, be careful!
context: 曲姑娘小心！

original: Junior sister, junior sister, save, save me...
context: 师妹，师妹，救，救我……

original: Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName} for helping me clean up my sect.
context: 多谢{PlayerSurName}少侠帮我清理门户。

original: Don't you blame me for killing your former senior brother?
context: 你不怪我杀了你曾经的师兄？

original:
He was not only my senior brother, but also the youngest son whom my mentor loved the most...
I couldn't bring myself to do it, so it was only fitting for you to do it.
context:
他不止是我的师兄，还是恩师最疼爱的小儿子……
我没法亲自对他出手，所以由你代劳再合适不过。

original: What right do you, a beast blinded by greed, have to be the master of the Herbology Sect!
context: 你这种利欲熏心的畜生有什么资格成为本草门门主！

original: Hehehe, I'll let you see my true power and tell you why I'm qualified to be the master of the Herbology Sect!
context: 嘿嘿嘿，我就让你见识见识我的真正实力，告诉你为什么我才有资格成为本草门的主人！

original: Junior sister, junior sister, save, save me...
context: 师妹，师妹，救，救我……

original: Still hoping that Miss Qu will soften her heart and save him when he's on the brink of death, he's really hopeless.
context: 死到临头还妄想曲姑娘能够心软救他，真是不可救药。

original: Mission
context: 任务

original: {PlayerName}, Luo Qianxue!
context: {PlayerName}、洛千雪！

original: I'm here!
context: 属下在！

original: Recently, we received news that there have been sightings of men in black taking children in and out of a mountain cave in Zhongzhou Region. We suspect it's a base for child trafficking.
context: 最近得到消息，中州地区的一处山洞处经常见到有黑衣人带着小孩子进进出出，怀疑是拐卖孩童的据点。

original: I order you to capture these men in black and rescue the children.
context: 我命你们务必将这些黑衣人一网打尽，解救这些孩童。

original: Should we bring these men in black back for trial?
context: 请问这次是将这些黑衣人都抓回来明正典刑吗？

original: These heinous criminals should be killed on the spot, no need to bring them back to the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 这种丧尽天良的恶贼就地格杀，不必再费力抓回神捕门了。

original: Understood!
context: 属下领命！

original: How is the mission going?
context: 任务办得怎么样？

original: (Tell the chief about the results.)
context: （把事情的处理结果告诉总捕头吧。）

original: All the men in black in the mountain cave have been killed.
context: 已经把山洞中所有黑衣人杀死。

original: All the men in black in the mountain cave have been released.
context: 已放走山洞中所有黑衣人。

original: The mission is not yet complete.
context: 任务还没完成。

original: Time is of the essence. The sooner we eliminate these criminals, the sooner the kidnapped children can be rescued.
context: 时间紧迫，早一刻消灭那些恶贼，那些被拐的孩童就能早一刻得救。

original:
Well done, you did the right thing!
Have all the children been returned to their parents? Don't keep them waiting.
context:
很好，你们这次做的很对！
那些孩童都送回父母身边了吗？可别让他们父母等着急了。

original: Qianxue, you look pale. Are you sick?
context: 千雪，你的脸色很差，是生病了吗？

original: Those children... they don't have parents...
context: 那些孩童本就没有父母……

original:
Nonsense! Every child has...
Wait, are you saying they are all orphans?
context:
胡说！哪有孩子没有……
等等，你的意思是说他们都是孤儿？

original: Hmph, these scoundrels are still guilty for trafficking orphans!
context: 哼，这些败类拐卖孤儿同样有罪！

original: That's not the case... they, they...
context: 事情不是这样的……他们，他们……

original: A chief of the Crime Investigation Bureau, crying like this, what a disgrace!
context: 堂堂神捕门捕头，哭哭啼啼成什么体统！

original: Chief, those children were homeless orphans. They were taken to the mountain cave by those people, provided with food and clothes, allowing them to barely survive.
context: 启禀总捕头，那些孩童本是流离失所的孤儿，被那些人领到山洞里，给他们提供食物、衣服，让这些孤儿勉强生存下来。

original: So, those people were actually kind-hearted?
context: 这么说，那些人倒是好心了？

original: These black-clad men are disciples of Nest of Swallow. They do take in orphans, but they also teach them the art of Steal, under the guise of self-reliance, they are actually raising a group of little thieves.
context: 这些黑衣人是燕子窝的弟子，他们收留孤儿不假，但是也在教授他们暗取的本事，美其名曰自力更生，其实就是养了一群小贼。

original: {yell} What! Nest of Swallow is really bold!
context: {yell}什么！燕子窝真是好大胆子！

original: How are those little thieves, oh no, those children now?
context: 那些小贼，哦不，那些孩童现在怎样了？

original: Without the protection of those disciples from Nest of Swallow, these children are likely to die of starvation, or be devoured by beasts, or die in the chaos of war...
context: 因为少了那些燕子窝弟子的庇护，这些孩子恐怕要么死于冻饿，要么死于兽口，要么死于战乱……

original:
Qianxue, I understand why you were crying just now.
There's no way around it, for the justice that the Crime Investigation Bureau defends, sometimes it's impossible to have the best of both worlds.
context:
千雪，我理解你刚才为何哭泣了。
没法子，为了神捕门所坚守的正义，有时无法两全其美。

original:
You guys did nothing wrong in this matter, don't dwell on it.
You guys go ahead, don't let trivial matters shake your faith.
context:
这件事你们没有错，不必耿耿于怀。
你们下去吧，不要为微不足道的事情动摇你们的信念。

original: {yell} Nonsense! How dare you make decisions on your own!
context: {yell}胡闹！你们怎敢擅作主张！

original: Brother, those...
context: 哥哥，那些……

original: Call me the Chief Catcher!
context: 叫我总捕头！

original: Reporting to the Chief Catcher, those children are orphans taken in by the disciples of Nest of Swallow. Some of the children might have starved to death if they hadn't been rescued in time.
context: 启禀总捕头，那些孩童是燕子窝弟子收养的孤儿，有些孩童若非他们及时救治，可能就会冻饿而死了。

original:
What! Those black-clad men are actually thieves from Nest of Swallow!
Their adoption of these orphans is a sham, the real purpose is to train the next generation of thieves!
context:
什么！那伙黑衣人竟然是燕子窝的贼人！
他们收养这些孤儿是假，培养下一代的小贼才是真！

original:
You guys actually let them go!
Do you know the serious consequences of doing so!
context:
你们竟敢私放了他们！
你们可知这样做会酿下多大恶果！

original: Whether they can become thieves is still too early to say, but if we punish those people from Nest of Swallow, these children will not be able to survive on their own, and will die soon.
context: 他们能否做贼还言之过早，但是如果我们惩治了那些燕子窝的人，这些孩童无法自立，用不了多久都会死去了。

original: You two remember, as members of the Crime Investigation Bureau, don't let personal feelings influence your likes and dislikes. Our existence is to uphold justice, not to condone evil!
context: 你们两人给我记住，身为神捕门的人，不要被个人情感左右你的好恶，我们存在的意义是维护正义，不是姑息养奸！

original:
You have disappointed me, half of your contributions to the Bureau will be deducted as punishment!
You don't need to worry about this matter anymore, I will arrange for others to handle it.
context:
你们让我很失望，扣你们身上一半本门贡献，做为惩罚！
此事你们不必再管了，我会安排其他人前去解决。

original: {PlayerName}……
context: {PlayerName}……

original: Hmm?
context: 嗯？

original: We did nothing wrong this time. Although we were punished by the Chief Catcher, we feel incredibly relieved. The long-standing frustration in our hearts has finally disappeared.
context: 这次的事情我们没有做错，虽然受到了总捕头的惩罚，但是心里却无比的轻松，长年淤积心口的烦闷终于不见了。

original: {PlayerName}, thank you.
context: {PlayerName}，谢谢你。

original: Don't bother me, my Steal skill is not yet perfected, I don't want to hold everyone back.
context: 别来烦我，我的暗取本事还没练到家，我可不想拖大家后腿。

original: Get lost——!!!
Hey, you're not a member of Nest of Swallow anymore, why are you still bothering me?
context: 喂，你已经不是我们燕子窝的人了，还来缠着我干嘛？

original: Even if you've run away from Nest of Swallow, I'm still yours, I don't mind being entangled with you.
context: 就算你离开了燕子窝，我也是你的人，我不在乎跟你纠缠在一起。

original: It's a pity that your team is already full, I can't accompany you to wander the martial arts world for now.
context: 可惜了，你的队伍已经没有空位，暂时不能陪你出去闯荡江湖了。

original: Don't forget to teach me the Steal skills you've learned. If you can't teach me, I'll make you regret it!
context: 别忘了把你学到的暗取技巧教给我，要是教不会，我会让你吃不了兜着走！

original: It's a pity that your team is already full, I can't accompany you to wander the martial arts world for now.
context: 可惜了，你的队伍已经没有空位，暂时不能陪你出去闯荡江湖了。

original: Where have you been fooling around again? Now you remember me? Humph!
context: 你这个家伙又去哪里风流了？现在想起我了？哼！

original: Why are you looking for me when you don't even have a place for me in your team? Humph!
context: 你这个家伙不留我的位置还来找我作甚？哼！

original:
Luo Qianxue, you jerk!
Why are you in {PlayerName}'s team?
context:
洛千雪，你这个贱人！
为什么你会在{PlayerName}的队伍里？

original: Can't I? If even you, a thief, can join the team, why can't I, a dignified catcher of the Crime Investigation Bureau?
context: 不可以吗？既然都能让你这个小偷加入队伍，我堂堂神捕门捕头为何不可？

original:
Humph, don't be too proud!
If I don't like you one day, we'll have another fight!
context:
哼，别得意太早了！
哪天要是看你不爽，咱们再来打一架！

original: This hero statue has been standing for decades, and people still worship it to this day.
context: 这个英雄雕像听说已经立了几十年，至今仍有人膜拜它。

original: {PlayerName}, have you kowtowed yet? I heard it's quite effective.
context: {PlayerName}，你去磕过头了吗？据说挺灵验的。

original: {PlayerName}, why do I feel this new statue bears some resemblance to you?
context: {PlayerName}，为什么我觉得这新的雕像跟你有几分相似呢？

original: This General Lü Wenhuan really knows how to enjoy life...
context: 这个吕文桓将军还真是会享受啊……

original: I seem to smell the presence of a fellow practitioner here.
context: 我在这里好像嗅到了同行的气息。

original: I didn't expect to find a few genuine items in such a small shop. Although there are a few bodyguards, they are like nothing in my eyes.
context: 想不到这种小店里竟也有几件真货，虽然有几名保镖，但在本姑娘眼里行同虚设。

original: {PlayerName}, there are quite a few good things in this room. Do you dare to get them?
context: {PlayerName}，这屋里有不少好东西，你敢不敢把它们搞到手？

original: If one day all the children could have books to read and schools to attend, what a wonderful thing that would be.
context: 如果有一天所有的小孩子都能有书读、有学上，这该是件多么美妙的事情啊。

original: Hey, do you still remember how scared you were? When I asked you to hunt some wild game in the forest, you were terrified.
context: 喂，你还记得当初你的怂样吗？让你去树林打点野味，你简直怕得要死。

original:
Hey, {PlayerName}, did you eat the heart of a bear and the gall of a leopard? 
Bringing me to the Crime Investigation Bureau? If you want to die, don't drag me down with you.
context:
喂，{PlayerName}，你吃了熊心豹子胆吗？
带我来神捕门这种地方？你想找死可别拉着我陪葬。

original:
It seems that the refugees here have been receiving aid all along, otherwise they wouldn't have survived.
The Nest of Swallow has also provided aid to many such Refugee Camps, but it's simply not enough.
context:
这里的流民好像一直有人在救济他们，否则早撑不下去了。
燕子窝也救济过很多这样的流民营，但是根本救不过来。

original: {PlayerName}, we in the Nest of Swallow only take the treasures above ground; the underground treasures belong to the Tomb Raider Sect. Don't break the rules.
context: {PlayerName}，我们燕子窝只取地上的财物；地下的财物可是归属摸金门的，可不要坏了规矩。

original: {PlayerName}, if it weren't for you accompanying me, I might never have had the chance to meet so many people and experience so many things. After all these experiences, I feel like I've grown subtly.
context: {PlayerName}，要不是你陪着我，可能我一辈子都接触不到这么多人和事。经历这些之后，我似乎感到自己有了一些潜移默化的成长。

original: What makes you think you can invite me? Aren't you afraid I'll poison you?
context: 你有什么本事敢来邀请我？不怕我在你身上下毒吗？

original: No matter how powerful you are, I will not join your team.
context: 即便你再如何厉害，我也是不会加入你的队伍。

original: It took you so long to remember me. Indeed, men are always unsatisfied.
context: 过了这么久你才想起我来，果然男人都是得陇望蜀的德行。

original: With a master like you to protect us along the way, we will surely be much safer.
context: 有你这样的高手随行保护，一路之上必定会安全许多。

original: Your team is overcrowded, there's no place for me now.
context: 你的队伍人满为患，现在可没有我的立足之地。

original: Jiang Ziyan, let's see where you can run!
context: 绛紫烟，看你还能逃到哪里去！

original: You guys are really persistent, are you here to die again?
context: 你们这群家伙可真是阴魂不散，又赶来送死吗？

original: Our patience is limited, don't think that finding this pretty boy to back you up means you can rest easy.
context: 我们的耐心是有限的，别以为找了这小白脸做你的靠山，你就高枕无忧了。

original: Hey, can you be more considerate when you speak, think about the feelings of the person involved.
context: 喂，你说话时能不能注意点，照顾下当事人的感受。

original: {PlayerName}, our Jiuli tribe has noted your name, we advise you not to meddle in our affairs, or else, your death will be miserable...
context: {PlayerName}，我们九黎部落已经记下你的名字了，奉劝你不要再多管闲事，否则，你死的会很惨……

original: (It's time for a tough decision again, this guy is threatening me, as if they will resort to any means to deal with me if I make a choice they don't like, what should I do at this moment?)
context: （又到了艰难抉择的时候，这家伙在恐吓我，仿佛我若做出他们不满意的选择，马上就要不择手段对付我了，此时此刻我该怎么办呢？）

original: Hand over Jiang Ziyan, stay out of this.
context: 交出绛紫烟，不插手此事。

original: Protect Jiang Ziyan, kill any god or Buddha in the way.<color=#c44b0e>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 袒护绛紫烟，神挡杀神佛挡杀佛。<color=#c44b0e>（特定战斗）</color>

original: I thought your abilities were enough to protect me, I didn't expect...
context: 我本以为凭你的本事足够可以庇护我，想不到啊……

original: {PlayerName}, I don't blame you, after all, the Jiuli tribe is a formidable force for you. This is between me and them, I won't drag others into it, take care.
context: {PlayerName}，我不怪你，毕竟九黎部落对于你来说简直算是庞然大物。这是我跟他们之间的事情，就不拖累旁人了，你一路珍重。

original: What are you looking at! Go, what else can you expect?
context: 看什么看！快走，你还能指望什么？

original: Jiang Ziyan has repeatedly angered the Jiuli tribe, if he falls into their hands, there's no way out.
context: 绛紫烟几次三番触怒九黎部落，落在他们手中，已再无生路。

original: Jiang Ziyan, do you trust me?
context: 绛紫烟，你相信我吗？

original: I wouldn't normally trust anyone, but given the circumstances, I have no choice but to trust you now!
context: 本来我不会相信任何人，不过看情形，我现在只能选择相信你！

original:
Since you're willing to trust me, I won't let you down!
I, {PlayerName}, will never let my friends down!
context:
既然你肯相信我，我就不会让你失望！
我{PlayerName}从不会让我的朋友失望！

original: The Jiuli Tribe, no matter how arrogant and domineering you are, you're no different from a pack of mad dogs in my eyes.
context: 九黎部落，无论你们再如何嚣张跋扈，在我眼里跟一群疯狗没什么区别。

original: I'd like to see how capable you are of taking my friend away from me!
context: 我倒要看看，你们有多大本事能从我面前带走我的朋友！

original: I've set up a No Escape here, I'd like to see how you few can escape!
context: 这里已经布下天罗地网，就凭你们几个人，倒要看看如何逃出生天！
