original: Is this your No Escape? It's not even enough to fill the gaps between my teeth!
context: 这就是你们的天罗地网？完全不够塞牙缝呀！

original: Don't rush, that was just an appetizer, let's see how big your appetite is.
context: 别着急，刚才只是开胃菜，接下来就看你胃口究竟有多大了。

original:
Interesting, but it's nothing.
Is an ambush by a bunch of small fries a bit childish?
context:
有点意思，不过这也没什么嘛。
一群杂鱼凑出来的一场伏击是否有些儿戏了？

original: Hehe, do you think the Jiuli Tribe only has this much ability?
context: 嘿嘿，你以为九黎部落只有这点本事吗？

original: What, what have you done to me!
context: 你，你对我做了什么！

original: Enfeeble pill!
context: 软筋散！

original: You guys even managed to concoct such a strange poison!
context: 你们竟然连这种奇毒都炼制出来了！

original: Jiang Ziyan, this Enfeeble pill was originally prepared for you, but it seems that it's put to better use on {PlayerName}.
context: 绛紫烟，本来这软筋散是为你准备的，现在看来用在{PlayerName}身上才算是物尽其用。

original: It's just an Enfeeble pill, if you have any other tricks, use them all!
context: 不过是软筋散而已，你们还有什么手段一起使出来吧！

original: Kid, it seems you have no idea how powerful the Enfeeble pill is.
context: 小子，看来你对软筋散的厉害是一无所知啊。

original: Once poisoned by the Enfeeble pill, even if you have great abilities, you won't be able to use your internal energy. Now that you can't use your internal energy, I'd like to see how you digest the upcoming feast!
context: 中了软筋散之毒，任你有通天的本事，半分内功也会运转不得。如今你无法运转内功，接下来的大餐，我看你如何消化！

original: Is this all the people you have?
context: 你们，你们只有这点人了吗？

original: {PlayerName}, I admit you're very powerful, even poisoned by the Enfeeble pill, you're still brave. However, you've underestimated the Jiuli Tribe.
context: {PlayerName}，我承认你很厉害，即便中了软筋散也依然神勇。不过，你还是太低估了九黎部落。

original: I didn't expect you to have so many people ambushed here, the Jiuli Tribe from the far southwest has infiltrated so many people, I suppose there must be your insiders in the Central Plains.
context: 想不到你们安排了这么多人埋伏在这里，远居西南的九黎部落竟然渗透这么多人，想必中原有你们的内应吧。

original: There's no need to know so much when you're about to die.
context: 死到临头就没必要知道那么多了。

original: Who's about to die is still unknown.
context: 究竟是谁死到临头还不知道呢。

original: What do you mean?
context: 你，你什么意思？

original:
I have to thank you for your Enfeeble pill, it gave me a lot of inspiration.
It's impolite not to reciprocate, now you can experience my return gift.
context:
我得感谢你们的软筋散，给了我不少灵感。
来而不往非礼也，你们也体验下我的回礼吧。

original: Muscle Relaxant Incense——
context: 酥筋化骨香——

original:
What! What kind of Toxicology is this?
My body is gradually becoming numb, I can hardly exert any strength, such a terrifying poison!
context:
什么！这是什么毒术？
身体渐渐麻木，快要使不出半分力气，好恐怖的剧毒！

original: Retreat, retreat quickly!!!
context: 撤，快撤！！！

original: Did these people just retreat? What just happened?
context: 这些人就这么撤走了？刚才发生了什么事？

original: Don't worry about the details, the people of the Jiuli Tribe should not dare to mess with me again.
context: 不必在意那些细节，九黎部落的人从此应该不敢再随便打我的主意了。

original: So you're saying you don't need my protection anymore, planning to Run away?
context: 这么说你已经不需要我保护，打算要离开了吗？

original: I have to admit, I did have that plan at first, because I don't trust anyone, it's all about using and being used in Relations.
context: 不得不承认，最初我是有这样的打算，因为我不相信任何人，无非都是利用和被利用的关系。

original:
However, I've changed my mind, you're someone I can Trust.
In times of crisis, even when you were surrounded, you didn't hand me over, you're a partner I can entrust my life to.
context:
不过，我改变主意了，你是个值得我信赖的人。
危机时刻，你即便身陷重围也没有把我交出去，是个值得托付性命的伙伴。

original: If one day you do something that disappoints me, I will make sure you experience the taste of wanting to live but not being able to die before I Run away.
context: 假如哪天你做出了让我失望的事情，我会在离开你之前，一定会让你体会求生不得求死不能的滋味。

original: Yes... (Kong Yidao just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, because there are no extra spots in the team.)
context: 是……（孔一刀只是麻木的应承，并无实际反应，原来是队伍没有多余空位所致。）

original: Yes, master...
context: 是，主人……

original: The team has no extra space, unable to invite him to join the team.
context: 队伍没有多余空位，无法邀请他加入队伍。

original: I'm the leader of the Blue Wind Camp after all, your request is a pipe dream.
context: 好歹俺也是青风寨的大当家，你这种要求真是痴人说梦。

original: (How should I Invite Kong Yidao to join my team?)
context: （该用什么方式邀请孔一刀加入我的队伍呢？）

original: Have him take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color><color=#097a76>(Heart Broken pill x1)</color>
context: 让他服下<color=#c44b0e>失心腐志丹</color><color=#097a76>（失心腐志丹1颗）</color>

original: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color><color=#097a76>(Jianghu Master token x1)</color>
context: 使用<color=#c44b0e>盟主金令</color><color=#097a76>（盟主金令1枚）</color>

original: Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.
context: 放弃邀请，告辞离开。

original: It's thoughtful of you, but I won't eat something of unknown origin.
context: 难得你有心了，不过这种来历不明的东西俺是不会吃的。

original: Since you're so cautious, I'll have to take matters into my own hands and make you submit.
context: 既然你这么谨慎，本人只好亲自动手，让你乖乖就范了。

original: You forced Kong Yidao to take the Heart Broken pill. After a while, Kong Yidao's eyes became hazy, and he seemed confused.
context: 你强迫孔一刀服下了失心腐志丹，片刻之后，孔一刀眼神迷离，神智彷徨。

original: Kong Yidao, I want you to be a sharp knife by my side, killing gods and Buddhas who stand in our way.
context: 孔一刀，我要你成为我身边一柄锋利的刀子，神挡杀神佛挡杀佛。

original: Okay... I am the master's blade... Kill gods if they block the way, kill Buddhas if they block the way...
context: 好……我是主人的一柄刀子……神挡杀神佛挡杀佛……

original: The Heart Broken pill doesn't work on me anymore!
context: 失心腐志丹对老子已经没用了！

original: {PlayerName}, I'm going to take out all the anger I've been feeling these past few days on you!
context: {PlayerName}，老子这几天受的气统统要在你身上找回来！

original: Kong Yidao, I've treated you well on this journey, and you're trying to kill me!
context: 孔一刀，这一路上我待你不薄，你竟然要取我性命！

original: Bullshit! You've been treating me like a puppet, I won't forget this humiliation! From now on, we're Invincible enemies!
context:
狗屁！你把老子当傀儡一样摆布，这份耻辱老子记下了！
从今往后，老子跟你是不死不休！

original: Seeing that he couldn't kill you, Kong Yidao had to dodge and leave, returning to Blue Wind Camp.
context: 孔一刀眼见无法将你除去，只得闪身离去，返回青风寨。

original: The Jianghu Master's golden order is here! Kong Yidao of Blue Wind Camp, am I qualified now?
context:
武林盟主金令在此！
青风寨孔一刀，现在我有资格了吗？

original: A single golden order can Invite any sect leader to serve you. Although it only lasts for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color>, it's enough for you to do a lot.
context: 一枚金令便可邀请任意门派掌门为你效命，虽然只有<color=#c44b0e>十日期限</color>，却也足够你做很多事了。

original: You're willing to waste a Jianghu Master token for me!
context: 你竟然肯为了我浪费掉一枚盟主金令！

original: Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.

original: Donor, your face is full of evil spirits, this pill is not a good thing, right.
context: 施主面带戾气，这枚丹药恐非善物吧。

original: Since you have seen it, I have to do it myself, please master to surrender.
context: 既然被你看出来了，本人只好亲自动手，请大师乖乖就范了。

context: 你强迫慧元服下了失心腐志丹，片刻之后，慧元眼神迷离，神智彷徨。

original:
Master Hui Yuan, let go of your obsession.
From now on, I {PlayerName} will be your new faith, worship at my feet.
context:
慧元大师，放下你的执着吧。
从今往后我{PlayerName}就是你新的信仰，膜拜在我的脚下吧。

original: Amitabha...
context: 阿弥……陀佛……

original: Donor, the Heart Broken pill you gave me has now been detoxified.
context: 施主，你给老衲吃下的失心腐志丹，如今毒性已解。

original: What?
context: 什么？

original: Donor, you have committed heavy sins, let me enlighten you.
context: 施主，你已罪孽深重，老衲便来度化你吧。

original: Master Hui Yuan, I have treated you well along the way, and you want to kill me!
context: 慧元大师，这一路上我待你不薄，你竟然要取我性命！

original:
Amitabha, The Devil should be punished by everyone.
Donor, you have now entered the evil path, and from now on, Shifa Temple will be incompatible with you!
context:
阿弥陀佛，邪魔外道人人得而诛之。
施主，如今你已入邪道，此后释法寺与你势不两立！

original: Seeing that he could not get rid of you, Hui Yuan had to dodge and return to Shifa Temple.
context: 慧元眼见无法将你除去，只得闪身离去，返回释法寺。

original:
Jianghu Master's gold order is here!
Master Hui Yuan, am I qualified now?
context:
武林盟主金令在此！
慧元大师，现在我有资格了吗？

original: A single golden order can Invite any sect leader to serve you. Although it only lasts for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color>, it's enough for you to do a lot.
context: 一枚金令便可邀请任意门派掌门为你效命，虽然只有<color=#c44b0e>十日期限</color>，却也足够你做很多事了。

original: So, do you accept my Invite?
context: 那么，你接受我的邀请吗？

original: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
context: 老衲谨遵武林盟主号令！

original: I didn't expect you to use a Jianghu Master token to invite me back into the world.
context: 想不到你为了邀请老衲再涉红尘，竟然舍得用掉一枚盟主金令。

original: So, do you accept my Invite?
context: 那么，你接受我的邀请吗？

original: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
context: 老衲谨遵武林盟主号令！

original: The ten-day limit of the Jianghu Master token has arrived, I will return to Shifa Temple, {PlayerSurName} donor, see you later.
context: 盟主金令的十日期限已到，老衲这便返回释法寺了，{PlayerSurName}施主后会有期。

original: Although the ten-day agreement has not arrived, but this time you let me run away, then our agreement is terminated.
context: 虽然十日之约并未到达，但此番你主动让我离开，那我们的约定就此终止。

original: Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} donor, I'm sorry I can't accompany you.
context: 阿弥陀佛，{PlayerSurName}施主，请恕老衲无法与你同行。

original: Amitabha...
context: 阿弥陀佛……

original: The donor's team does not have a place for the old monk, good and good.
context: 施主队伍并未有老衲的一席之地，善哉善哉。

original: Yes... (Cai Yuanchang just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, because there are no extra spots in the team.)
context: 是……（蔡元常只是麻木的应承，并无实际反应，原来是队伍没有多余空位所致。）

original: Yes, master...
context: 是，主人……

original: The team has no extra space, unable to invite him to join the team.
context: 队伍没有多余空位，无法邀请他加入队伍。

original: I am the master of Confucius Temple, you are like a dragonfly in front of me, what qualifications do you have to let me stand up for you?
context: 老夫乃是儒圣馆馆主，你在老夫前面如同蚍蜉，有何资格让老夫为你出头？

original: (How should I invite Cai Yuanchang to join my team?)
context: （该用什么方式邀请蔡元常加入我的队伍呢？）

original: Have him take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color><color=#097a76>(Heart Broken pill x1)</color>
context: 让他服下<color=#c44b0e>失心腐志丹</color><color=#097a76>（失心腐志丹1颗）</color>

original: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color><color=#097a76>(Jianghu Master token x1)</color>
context: 使用<color=#c44b0e>盟主金令</color><color=#097a76>（盟主金令1枚）</color>

original: Show <color=#c44b0e>Imperial token</color><color=#097a76>(1 Imperial token)</color>
context: 出示<color=#c44b0e>金牌令箭</color><color=#097a76>（金牌令箭1枚）</color>

original: Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.
context: 放弃邀请，告辞离开。

original:
It's Heart Broken pill!
Do you want to use this poison on me?
context:
竟然是失心腐志丹！
莫非你要把这毒药使在老夫身上吗？

original: Since you have seen it, I have to do it myself and serve the master medicine.
context: 既然被你看出来了，本人只好亲自动手，侍候馆主服药了。

original: You forced Cai Yuanchang to take the Heart Broken pill, and after a while, Cai Yuanchang's eyes were blurred, and his mind was confused.
context: 你强迫蔡元常服下了失心腐志丹，片刻之后，蔡元常眼神迷离，神智彷徨。

original: The master of Confucius Temple is nothing more than that, and he still bows his head in front of me.
context: 堂堂儒圣馆主也不过如此，不照样在我面前低头。

original: Cai Yuanchang, from now on I will be your master, you must listen to me!
context: 蔡元常，从今以后我就是你的主人，你须得一切听我吩咐！

original: Yes... master...
context: 是……主人……

original: The Heart Broken pill has worn off...
context: 失心腐志丹失效了……

original: What?
context: 什么？

original:
{PlayerName}, how dare you let me recognize you as the master!
Thief, looking for death!!!
context:
{PlayerName}，竟敢让老夫认你为主！
小贼，找死！！！

original: Cai Yuanchang, I have treated you well along the way, and you want to kill me!
context: 蔡元常，这一路上我待你不薄，你竟然要取我性命！

original: Thief, you are lucky today, I want to see how long you can be arrogant!
context: 小贼，今日算你命大，老夫倒要看你能嚣张几时！

original: Seeing that he could not get rid of you, Cai Yuanchang had to dodge and return to Confucius Temple.
context: 蔡元常眼见无法将你除去，只得闪身离去，返回儒圣馆。

original:
Jianghu Master's gold order is here!
Master Cai Yuanchang of Confucius Temple, am I qualified now?
context:
武林盟主金令在此！
儒圣馆馆主蔡元常，现在我有资格了吗？

original: A single golden order can Invite any sect leader to serve you. Although it only lasts for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color>, it's enough for you to do a lot.
context: 一枚金令便可邀请任意门派掌门为你效命，虽然只有<color=#c44b0e>十日期限</color>，却也足够你做很多事了。

original: So, do you accept my Invite?
context: 那么，你接受我的邀请吗？

original: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
context: 老夫谨遵武林盟主号令！

original: Since you have the Jianghu Master token in your hand, you naturally have this qualification.
context: 既然你有盟主金令在手，自然有这个资格。

original: So, do you accept my Invite?
context: 那么，你接受我的邀请吗？

original: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
context: 老夫谨遵武林盟主号令！

original: The ten-day limit of the Jianghu Master token has arrived, I have fulfilled my promise and can't accompany you.
context: 盟主金令的十日期限已到，老夫已完成承诺，不便奉陪了。

original: Although the ten-day agreement has not arrived, but this time you let me run away, then our agreement is terminated.
context: 虽然十日之约并未到达，但此番你主动让我离开，那我们的约定就此终止。

original:
Imperial token is here, as if the emperor is here!
Master Cai Yuanchang of Confucius Temple, am I qualified now?
context:
金牌令箭在此，如圣上亲临！
儒圣馆馆主蔡元常，现在我有资格了吗？

original: I, Cai Yuanchang, will follow the imperial edict!
context: 老臣蔡元常谨遵圣命！

original: I don't welcome you here, please feel free.
context: 老夫这里不欢迎你，请自便吧。

original: If those people in the rivers and lakes know that I am back in the rivers and lakes, I don't know what they will think.
context: 若是让那些江湖人知道老夫重出江湖，不知会做何感想。

original: Your team has no vacancies, I can't help.
context: 你的队伍没有空位，老夫实在爱莫能助。

original: Bronze man
context: 铜人

original:
Since I was grounded by that fat man Hui Yuan, I have never had the chance to taste delicious food.
I really miss the days when I used to steal food from the imperial kitchen.
context:
自从被慧元那胖子禁足之后，再也没机会尝到美味佳肴了。
真怀念当年到皇宫御膳房偷食的日子啊。

original: Why was the master grounded by the abbot?
context: 师叔因为何事被主持禁足？

original: Why was the master grounded by the abbot?
context: 大师因为何事被主持禁足？

original: It was nothing serious. This poor monk just occasionally went down the mountain for a meal, but the chicken leg hidden in my clothes was discovered by that fat man, so he punished me with confinement.
context: 本来也没什么大不了的，贫僧只是偶尔下山打打牙祭，结果藏在衣服里的鸡腿被那胖子发现了，于是就罚贫僧禁足。

original: It turns out that the confinement was to prevent you from continuing to go down the mountain to steal food, not because you ate meat.
context: 原来禁足只是为了防止您继续下山偷吃，而不是因为吃荤才惩罚。

original: As long as this poor monk can break through this golden body bronze man formation, the punishment of confinement will be lifted.
context: 只要贫僧能闯过这金身铜人阵，这禁足的惩罚也就解除了。

original: So you haven't broken through this bronze man formation yet?
context: 这么说您还没有闯过这铜人阵？

original: The higher the Benevolence of the person who breaks the formation, the smaller the Power of the bronze man; however, this poor monk has repeatedly broken the precepts, so this bronze man formation is almost like a hell for me.
context: 闯阵之人仁德越高，铜人威力越小；然而贫僧屡次破戒，所以这铜人阵对贫僧而言几乎如同无间炼狱一般。

original: (Do you want to help Lai Toudian break through the bronze man formation?)
context: （是否帮癞头癫闯铜人阵？）

original: Help break the formation. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
context: 帮忙闯阵。<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: Stand by and watch.
context: 袖手旁观。

original: Alas, when can this confinement end?
context: 唉，这禁足的日子何时能够结束啊。

original: This poor monk has been waiting for you, a great benefactor of ten lifetimes. Let's strive for First blood and break through this bronze man formation in one fell swoop!
context: 贫僧可算等到你这十世修行的大好人了，咱们争取一鼓作气一举闯过这铜人阵！

original: You help me break the formation? This is not impossible, it depends on our fate.
context: 你帮我闯阵？这倒也并非不可以，就看咱俩造化如何了。

original: Don't harm me, you have a face full of evil spirits, let's not be blown into slag as soon as we enter the bronze man formation.
context: 你可别害我，你这满脸戾气，咱们可别刚进铜人阵就被轰成渣滓。

original: It seems that this poor monk has to continue to be confined.
context: 看来贫僧还是得继续禁足了。

original: The formation is broken! The formation is broken! Finally, the confinement can be lifted!!!
context: 破阵了！破阵了！终于可以解除禁足了！！！

original: The hard days of hunger have finally come to an end, this poor monk is going down the mountain~
context: 忍饥挨饿的苦日子终于熬到头了，贫僧下山去咯~

original: Did the master bring help to break the formation today?
context: 师叔今天带了帮手一同来破阵吗？

original: Hey, as long as we can win, it doesn't matter if I bring help or not!
context: 嘿，反正能打过就行，你管我带不带帮手！

original: In that case, let's get started.
context: 既然如此，那便开始吧。

original: Donor is not a disciple of Shifa Temple, you can't stay here for long, please leave quickly.
context: 施主并非释法寺弟子，此处不可久留，请施主速速离去。

original: You go to Arhat Hall first, I'll be there soon.
context: 你先去罗汉堂吧，我随后就到。

original: This poor monk is in confinement and can't go anywhere.
context: 贫僧正在禁足中，哪也去不了。

original: Alas, when will these hard days end?
context: 唉，这样的苦日子什么时候结束呀。

original: (Smack... Smack... Smack...)
context: （吧唧……吧唧……吧唧……）

original: Completely pierced.
context: 完全被无视了。

original: Stomach, stomach, this time you have to enjoy the blessing with this poor monk~
context: 肚子啊，肚子，这次你可要跟着贫僧享福咯~

original: {PlayerName}, is this little guy next to you the Ingredient prepared for this poor monk?
context: {PlayerName}，你身边这个小家伙是为贫僧准备的食材吗？

original: Save a place for this poor monk quickly, I can't wait to go down the mountain~
context: 快给贫僧留个位置，贫僧已经迫不及待要下山了~

original:
Want to Invite me Shen Wuqi?
It's simple, either become a regular customer of Night Auction Market, or we become Intimate.
context:
想邀请我沈无欺吗？
简单的很，要么成为夜摩坊的老主顾，要么咱们结为知己。

original: Given our current Relations, I won't do anything for you anymore!
context: 鉴于你我如今的关系，我不会再为你做任何事！

original: I'd be happy to serve you.
context: 十分乐意为您效劳。

original: Your team is full, I'm sorry I can't help.
context: 你的队伍没有空位了，请恕我无能为力。

original: Why is a woman running the show here?
context: 这里怎么是女人做庄？

original:
Are you looking down on me?
The entire Zhangyue Casino is my property, can't I run it myself?
context:
你是看不起我吗？
整个长乐柜坊都是我的产业，我亲自坐庄不可以吗？

original:
So you're the boss of Zhangyue Casino, I'm sorry for my rudeness.
What's your name, boss?
context:
原来是长乐柜坊的掌柜，失敬失敬。
不知掌柜如何称呼？

original: People gave me a nickname called <color=#c44b0e>Yi Zhihua</color>, some also call me Sister Hua, anyway, call me whatever you like, I don't care.
context: 别人给我起个诨号叫<color=#c44b0e>一枝花</color>，也有叫花姐的，总之随便你们爱叫什么就叫什么，我无所谓。

original: Why are you talking so much nonsense, come and play with me!
context: 说那么多废话干嘛，赶紧过来陪我玩两把！

original: Dice
context: 骰子

original: Go away, you're not welcome here!
context: 去去去，这里不欢迎你！

original:
Sir, you look unfamiliar, is this your first time here?
Would you like to hear me explain the rules of the dice?
context:
客官看这眼生，莫非是第一次来这里吧。
可否听敝人为客官讲解这骰子的规则？

original: Listen to his introduction of the dice rules
context: 听他介绍骰子规则

original: Don't want to listen to the introduction
context: 不想听介绍

original: It seems that the guest is an expert, then I wish the guest a good time.
context: 看来客官是个熟手，那么祝客官玩的尽兴。

original: Pop up the dice guide picture.
context: 弹出骰子引导图

original: Apologies, sir, this table is temporarily closed. Please play at another table.
context: 抱歉客官，这桌暂时封盘，请您去其他桌玩吧。

original: The minimum bet is 500 wen each time. Do you plan to join the game, sir?
context: 每次入局至少500文，客官是否打算入局呢？

original: Place a bet of 500 wen to join the game! <color=#097a76>(500 wen)</color>
context: 押上500文入局！<color=#097a76>（500文）</color>

original: Let me think about it.
context: 再考虑考虑。

original: It's really disappointing. I really can't touch this thing again in the future.
context: 真是乘兴而来败兴而归，以后真不能再碰这玩意。

original: Take your time, sir. We'll keep your seat for you. Remember to come often.
context: 客官您慢走，这给您留着位置，记得常来呀。

original: There are few people with self-control like me. I won't be foolish enough to lose everything here.
context: 像我这样有自制力的人太少了，我才不会傻到在这里赔的倾家荡产。

original: Don't rush to leave, sir. Are you going to give up the opportunity to make a fortune?
context: 客官别着急离场啊，眼见要发财的机会不要了吗？

original: Apologies, sir, this table is temporarily closed. Please play at another table.
context: 抱歉客官，这桌暂时封盘，请您去其他桌玩吧。

original: The minimum bet is 1000 wen each time. Do you plan to join the game, sir?
context: 每次入局至少1000文，客官是否打算入局呢？

original: Place a bet of 1000 wen to join the game! <color=#097a76>(1000 wen)</color>
context: 押上1000文入局！<color=#097a76>（1000文）</color>

original: Please hold on, sir. Let's play another round. If you win all the money in my hand, I will give you a <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color>. What do you think?
context: 客官留步，敝人再跟您玩一把，您若是赢光敝人手里钱，敝人可送您一枚<color=#c44b0e>忘忧丹</color>，您意下如何？

original: (If you win all his money, you can get an extra <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color>. Do you want to play another round?)
context: （只要赢光他手里的钱就能额外得到一枚<color=#c44b0e>忘忧丹</color>，要不要再玩一局呢？）

original: Let's play another round!
context: 再来一局！

original: Quit while you're ahead.
context: 见好就收。

original: What a loss! You've just lost the money you've earned. It's a real loss!
context: 真是手欠，把刚赚来的钱又给赔进去了，真是血亏！

original: Take care, sir. We look forward to your return to conquer the world again!
context: 客官您慢走，还等着您下次再来大杀四方!

original: You should quit while you're ahead. Don't play anymore, or you might risk losing everything.
context: 见好就收吧，不能在玩下去了，当心赔个倾家荡产。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color> is a rare item, it's a pity that you missed it.
context: <color=#c44b0e>忘忧丹</color>可是稀罕物件，跟阁下失之交臂，真是太遗憾了。

original:
I'm really unlucky today, I lost again.
I admit defeat, this <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color> is yours now.
context:
今天运气真背，竟然又输了。
敝人认赌服输，这枚<color=#c44b0e>忘忧丹</color>归你了。

original: This table is temporarily closed, please go to another table to play.
context: 这桌暂时封盘，请您去其他桌玩吧。

original: Kid, you want to just walk away after winning money?
context: 小子，你赢了钱就想一走了之吗？

original: If you allow them to open a shop, you should allow others to win money. It's all about skills.
context: 许你们开店，就许别人赢钱，各凭本事而已。

original: I'll play a round with you. If you win, you can leave; if you lose, you can also leave.
context: 我来陪你玩一局，你若赢了我尽管离去；若是输了也可自行离去。

original: (What should I do now?)
context: （现在该如何选择？）

original: Let's play another round!
context: 再来一局！

original: I don't want to accompany you! <color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
context: 不想奉陪！<color=#097a76>（特定战斗）</color>

original: I don't have 1000 Wen on me anymore, are you sure you still want to play this round with me?
context: 我身上可不够1000文了，你确定还要跟我玩这一局吗？

original: What's the problem? I'll cover your 1000 Wen!
context: 这有何妨，你这1000文我给你出！

original: Are you satisfied now? Can I go?
context: 这下你满意了吧，我可以走了吧。

original: Of course, you can go wherever you want, we won't stop you anymore.
context: 当然，您随意想去哪便去哪，我们不再拦阻。

original: Either win all my money, or lose all your money, otherwise you can't run away.
context: 要么赢光我手里钱，要么输光你手里钱，否则你别想离开。

original: Kid, you are the first person to beat me with real strength, the younger generation is indeed to be feared.
context: 小子，你是凭真正实力胜过我的第一个人，果然后生可畏。

original: Can I go now?
context: 这下我可以走了吧。

original: Of course, but before you leave, I want to give you something. Consider it a reward for beating me!
context: 当然，不过在你临走前我要送你件东西，这就当做你胜过我的奖励！

original: You've got guts. In that case, I'll have to teach you a lesson first.
context: 够胆识，既然这样只能先给你点教训了。

original: Kid, you've made an enemy of the Relic House today, you're no longer welcome here!
context: 小子，今日你跟聚财坊的梁子结下了，以后这里不再欢迎你！

original: You've beaten me up like this, can you let me go now?
context: 把我打成这样，可以放我走了吧。

original: No way! Either win all my money, or lose all your money, otherwise you can't run away.
context: 不行！要么赢光我手里钱，要么输光你手里钱，否则你别想离开。

original: Kid, why aren't you gambling anymore?
context: 小子，怎么不赌了？

original: You think you can bully our Relic House, huh?
context: 真当我们聚财坊好欺负是吧。

original: Keep gambling!
context: 继续赌博！

original: Go all out! (Trigger fight)
context: 拼死一搏！（触发战斗）

original: Good lad, you've got guts!
context: 好小子，真有胆！

original: Humph, seeing how desperate you are, I'll let you go today.
context: 哼，看你这么拼，今天放过你了。

original: Leave half of your money and get lost!
context: 留下一半钱，滚吧！

original: The minimum bet is 1000 wen each time. Do you plan to join the game, sir?
context: 每次入局至少1000文，客官是否打算入局呢？

original: Place a bet of 1000 wen to join the game! <color=#097a76>(1000 wen)</color>
context: 押上1000文入局！<color=#097a76>（1000文）</color>

original: Let me think about it.
context: 再考虑考虑。

original: You're not welcome here, get lost for me!
context: 这里不欢迎你，给老娘滚开！

original:
You're not a chick who doesn't know the rules, are you?
Would you like me to explain the rules of the dice to you?
context:
你该不会还是个不懂规矩的雏儿吧！
要不要听我给你介绍这骰子的规则？

original: Listen to her explain the rules of the dice
context: 听她介绍骰子规则

original: Don't want to listen to the introduction
context: 不想听介绍

original: You've got character, but don't cry if you lose your pants later.
context: 好有个性，不过一会输掉底裤可别哭鼻子呦。

original: The game is closed here, I can rest for a few days, you go play elsewhere.
context: 这里封盘了，我刚好可以休息几天，你到别处玩吧。

original: Each game here requires at least 5000 Wen to join, do you plan to join?
context: 我这里每次入局至少5000文，不知你是否打算入局呢？

original: Bet 5000 Wen to join! <color=#097a76>(5000 Wen)</color>
context: 押上5000文入局！<color=#097a76>（5000文）</color>

original: Let me think about it.
context: 再考虑考虑。

original: It's really disappointing. I really can't touch this thing again in the future.
context: 真是乘兴而来败兴而归，以后真不能再碰这玩意。

original: You're a loser, aren't you going to pick yourself up where you fall?
context: 没出息的家伙，你不打算从哪跌倒在哪爬起吗。

original: There are few people with self-control like me. I won't be foolish enough to lose everything here.
context: 像我这样有自制力的人太少了，我才不会傻到在这里赔的倾家荡产。

original: What I despise most are those timid and cowardly men, what can they achieve by being cautious?
context: 我最看不上的就是那些胆小懦弱的男人，畏手畏脚能成什么气候。

original: The game is closed here, I can rest for a few days, you go play elsewhere.
context: 这里封盘了，我刚好可以休息几天，你到别处玩吧。

original: People outside are unpredictable, I'd rather stay in the Herbology Sect for the rest of my life.
context: 外面人心难测，我还是宁可呆在本草门了此一生。

original: Please respect yourself, I have nothing to do with you!
context: 请阁下自重，我与你素无瓜葛！

original: My lord, where are we going this time?
context: 郎君，这次咱们要到哪里去呀？

original: {PlayerSurName} young hero, where are we going this time?
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠，不知此次咱们要前往何处？

original: The team is full, I'll accompany you next time.
context: 人已满员，我还是下次再随你出行吧。

original: You suddenly smell some mysterious fragrance.
context: 你突然闻到了一些神秘的香味儿。

original: (Do you want to go deeper into the roadside for Info)
context: （是否要到路边深处进行查看）

original: Go to Info
context: 前往查看

original: Continue on your way
context: 继续赶路

original:
You go deeper and indeed find an exceptionally beautiful flower.
You get close and take a deep sniff.
context:
你往里继续深入，果然发现了一株异常漂亮的花朵。
你靠近后深深的嗅了嗅。

original: This fragrance is strange, it actually has a weak toxicity, what a bad luck.
context: 这幽香好生奇怪，居然有微弱的毒性，真是倒霉。

original: After smelling it, you feel refreshed and your Mood is pleasant.
context: 你闻到后，顿感神清气爽，心情愉悦。

original: You find a Near-death middle-aged man lying on the roadside.
context: 你发现一个奄奄一息的中年男人躺在路边。

original: (Do you want to go to the roadside for Info)
context: （是否要到路边进行查看）

original: Go to Info
context: 前往查看

original: Continue on your way
context: 继续赶路

original: You slowly approach the man and find that his leg has been bitten off by a wild beast.
context: 你慢慢的靠近男人，发现他被野兽咬断了腿。

original: Unfortunately, your Medical level is limited, you can only simply treat the Open wound and let it heal itself.
context: 无奈你的医术水平有限，只能简单处理一下伤口任其自生自灭了。

original:
You use your Medical to bandage and Heal him, the middle-aged man slowly wakes up and is very grateful to you.
Your Mood is very good, and you continue on your way to your destination.
context:
你用你的医术对其进行包扎治疗，中年男人缓缓转醒，对你十分感激。
你的心情非常不错，边继续前往目的地了。

original:
Your Horse carriage is bumping along the rugged mountain road, you steady your body while carefully watching the road.
Suddenly, you notice a monkey waving at the roadside ahead, as if it wants to communicate with you.
context:
你的马车在崎岖的山路上颠簸行驶，一边稳住身子，一边小心地看着路面。
忽然，你注意到前方有一只猴子在路边招手示意，好像想要跟你们交流一下。

original: (Do you want to stop the carriage and communicate with the monkey)
context: （是否要停车与猴子交流）

original: Stop the carriage and communicate with the monkey (Beast Taming>=3)
context: 停车与猴子交流（驯兽>=3）

original: Keep going
context: 继续前行

original:
You stop the Horse carriage, go to the roadside and greet the monkey,
The monkey seems very interested in your arrival, making constant noises, as if it wants to say something.
You try to communicate with it, and soon find out that it wants you to follow it for a while.
It leads you through a small mountain, and you surprisingly find some scattered Coins in an open space.
context:
你停下马车，走到路边和猴子打招呼,
猴子好像对你们的到来很感兴趣，不停地发出咿咿呀呀的声音，似乎在想说些什么。
你尝试和它沟通，很快就发现它想让你们跟它走一段路。
它领着你们穿过了一座小山，居然在一处空地发现一些散落的铜钱。

original:
You stop your Horse cart and greet the monkey by the roadside,
The monkey seems very interested in your arrival, making constant chattering noises, as if it wants to say something.
You try to communicate with it and quickly realize that it wants you to follow it for a while.
It leads you through a small hill.
Suddenly, a monkey flashes from the side, snatches your Money bag, and disappears into the deep forest.
Helplessly, you can only return to the Horse cart and continue on your way.
context:
你停下马车，走到路边和猴子打招呼,
猴子好像对你们的到来很感兴趣，不停地发出咿咿呀呀的声音，似乎在想说些什么。
你尝试和它沟通，很快就发现它想让你们跟它走一段路。
它领着你们穿过了一座小山。
此事突然从侧边闪出一个猴子，顺手抓走了你的钱袋，转身边消失在了树林深处。
无奈你只能返回马车继续赶路。

original: You arrive in a dense forest, with a small stream ahead.
context: 你来到了一片茂密的森林中，前方是一条小溪。

original: (Do you want to rest by the stream)
context: （是否要在小溪边停下休息）

original: Rest by the stream
context: 在小溪边停下休息

original: Keep going
context: 继续前行

original:
You find a gentle rock to sit on, stretch your limbs, and eat some of your own dry food.
Just as you are about to get up and continue on your way, you suddenly notice a pack of wolves approaching you.
context:
你找了个平缓的石头坐下，伸展了一下筋骨，吃了点自带的干粮。
正当你准备起身继续前行时，突然发现一群野狼向你靠近。

original: After defeating the wolves, you rest for a while and then continue on your way.
context: 打败了野狼后，你休息了一会，便继续上路了。

original: As you travel along the road, you suddenly see an ancient land temple ahead.
context: 你在路上行进，忽然看到前方出现了一座古老的土地庙。

original: (Do you want to enter the land temple)
context: （是否要进入土地庙）

original: Enter the land temple Info
context: 进入土地庙查看

original: Continue on your way
context: 继续赶路

original:
You walk into the land temple, where the light is very dim.
You look around and suddenly hear a dull noise.
context:
你走进土地庙，里面的光线十分阴暗。
你环顾四周，突然听到一声沉闷的响声。

original:
You narrowly avoid the Machinery hidden arrow and feel very dangerous, so you quickly retreat.
When you come out, you are lucky to find 2 pieces of Scrap silver at the door.
context:
你险之又险的避过了机关暗箭，觉得此处十分危险便速速退了出来。
出来的时候在门口幸运的捡到了2块儿碎银子。

original:
Despite your best efforts to dodge, you are still grazed by the incoming arrow.
You feel it's not a good place to stay, so you quickly Run away.
context:
尽管你十分努力的躲闪，还是被射来的箭矢擦伤了肩膀。
你觉得此处不宜久留，便速速离开了。

original:
You rush to a highway pass, where several Officials are checking pedestrians.
Coincidentally, the Officials found a fugitive on the run, who is quite skilled.
context:
你赶到了一个官道要隘，这里有几名官差正在检查行人。
好巧不巧，官差们发现了在逃的逃犯，这逃犯身手颇为了得。

original: (Do you want to help)
context: （是否要出手相助）

original: Help
context: 出手相助

original: Run away in the chaos
context: 趁乱离开

original:
You successfully help the Officials catch the fugitive.
As a thank you, they give you some Scrap silver.
context:
你顺利的帮助官差拿下了逃犯。
作为感谢，他们赠予了一些碎银给你。

original:
Unexpectedly, your martial arts are not as good as theirs, and you are defeated first.
The Officials can only let the fugitive go helplessly.
context:
不料你武功不敌，竟先行败下阵来。
官差们只能无奈放走逃犯。

original: There is a strange Herb growing on the cliff by the road.
context: 路边的峭壁上长着生长的一株奇异的药材。

original: (Do you want to pick it)
context: （是否前去采摘）

original: Go pick it (Strength>=8)
context: 前去采摘（臂力>=8）

original: Continue on your way
context: 继续赶路

original:
You climb the cliff barehanded and pick the Herb.
Although it's a bit thrilling when you climb down the cliff,
you still safely reach the ground.
context:
你徒手爬上了峭壁，摘得了药材。
在爬下峭壁时虽然有些惊险，
不过你还是安全抵达了地面。

original:
You climb the cliff barehanded and pick the Herb.
When you climb down the cliff, a stepping stone loosens,
and you accidentally fall down.
context:
你徒手爬上了峭壁，摘得了药材。
在爬下峭壁时一处落脚处的石头松动，
你不小心跌了下来。

original: Kid, you're wanted! Either surrender or we'll make you surrender!
context: 小子，你被通缉了！要么束手就擒，要么我们让你束手就擒！

original: (Oh no, these people have found me outside the city! What should I do?)
context: （不好，这些人居然在城外就发现我了！该如何是好？）

original: Fight back (Fight)
context: 奋起反抗（发生战斗）

original: Surrender
context: 束手就擒

original: Good boy, if you don't drink the toast, you'll have to drink the punishment. What are you waiting for? Do it!
context: 好小子，敬酒不吃吃罚酒，小的们！还犹豫什么？动手！

original: Humph! A bunch of nobodies dare to make trouble?
context: 哼！一群土鸡瓦狗也敢来造次？

original: Kid, this time you're in even more trouble, wait for the prefect to sentence you
context: 小子，这回你算是罪加一等了，等着知府大人定你的罪吧

original: You're sensible! Let's go, take him to the Government Office!
context: 算你识相！兄弟们走，带他去衙门！

original: {PlayerName}? Humph, it must be you!
context: {PlayerName}？哼，一定是你！

original: (Oh no, these people have found me outside the city! What should I do?)
context: （不好，这些人居然在城外就发现我了！该如何是好？）

original: Fight back (Fight)
context: 奋起反抗（发生战斗）

original: Surrender
context: 束手就擒

original: Start a fight on your own? It must be the wanted criminal {PlayerName}, take him down!
context: 居然主动开战？果然是通缉犯{PlayerName}，拿下！

original: The patrol officers of Daliang City are really bad!
context: 大梁城的巡逻差役还真是差劲！

original: Wanted criminal {PlayerName}, finally caught you! Let's go, take him to the Government Office!
context: 通缉犯{PlayerName}，总算抓到你了！走，带到衙门！

original: Wanted criminal {PlayerName}, it would be better if you surrender voluntarily.
context: 通缉犯{PlayerName}，你主动自首也好，

original: Hmm? This person seems to be a wanted criminal?
context: 嗯？这人好像是通缉犯？

original: (Oh no, these people have found me outside the city! What should I do?)
context: （不好，这些人居然在城外就发现我了！该如何是好？）

original: Fight back (Fight)
context: 奋起反抗（发生战斗）

original: Surrender
context: 束手就擒

original: He's about to attack! Brothers, don't worry about whether he is or not, take him down!
context: 他要动手！兄弟们先不要管是不是，拿下！

original: Hmph! The constables of Lin'an City are really incompetent!
context: 哼！霖安城的差役果然不行！

original: Retreat first, this person is confirmed to be the wanted criminal {PlayerName}!
context: 先行撤退，此人确认为通缉犯{PlayerName}！

original: You really are the wanted criminal {PlayerName}, take him down!
context: 你果真是通缉犯{PlayerName}，拿下！

original: While passing through Nameless village, <color=#c44b0e>Xiao Hua</color> by the roadside gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过无名小村时，路边的<color=#c44b0e>小花</color>送给了你一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Nameless village, <color=#c44b0e>Xiao Bao</color> by the roadside gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过无名小村时，路边的<color=#c44b0e>小宝</color>送给了你一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Nameless village, <color=#c44b0e>Xiao Ya</color> by the roadside gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过无名小村时，路边的<color=#c44b0e>小丫</color>送给了你一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Nameless village, the <color=#c44b0e>villager</color> in the field gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过无名小村时，下田的<color=#c44b0e>村民</color>送给了你一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Nameless village, <color=#c44b0e>Da Hei</color> brought you a piece of meat.
context: 经过无名小村时，<color=#c44b0e>大黑</color>叼来了一块肉。

original: While passing through Nameless village, the <color=#c44b0e>doctor</color> gave you some medicine.
context: 经过无名小村时，<color=#c44b0e>郎中</color>给了你一些药。

original: While passing through Nest of Swallow, a disciple of Nest of Swallow gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过燕子窝时，燕子窝弟子送你了一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Nest of Swallow, <color=#c44b0e>Bu Juechen</color> taught you some Steal EXP.
context: 经过燕子窝时，<color=#c44b0e>步绝尘</color>传授了你一些暗取经验。

original: While passing through Nest of Swallow, <color=#c44b0e>Hua Qingqing</color> gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过燕子窝时，<color=#c44b0e>华青青</color>送给了你一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Crime Investigation Bureau, a disciple of Crime Investigation Bureau gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过神捕门时，神捕门弟子送你了一些小礼物。

original: While passing through Crime Investigation Bureau, <color=#c44b0e>Luo Tianxiong</color> taught you some Immobilize EXP.
context: 经过神捕门时，<color=#c44b0e>洛天雄</color>传授了你一些点穴经验。

original: While passing through Crime Investigation Bureau, <color=#c44b0e>Luo Qianxue</color> gave you some small gifts.
context: 经过神捕门时，<color=#c44b0e>洛千雪</color>送给了你一些小礼物。

original: The Ice Prison where the demon head is imprisoned must be under this stone tower, do you want to enter the Ice Prison?
context: 这石塔下面想必就是关押魔头的冰牢，是否进入冰牢？

original: Enter the Ice Prison!
context: 进入冰牢！

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: Hehehe, it's been a long time since I've seen a fresh face...
context: 嘿嘿嘿，好久没见到新鲜的小娃儿了……

original: Is it the time of the year again? The coming days won't be so boring.
context: 难道又到一年之期了吗，接下来的日子终于不会那么无聊了。

original: What's this noise, what did you do?
context: 这是什么动静，你做了什么？

original: This is the sound of the Ice Prison door closing, it will only automatically open after <color=#097a76>five days</color>, during this time you can only be trapped here like me.
context: 这是冰牢大门关闭的声音，<color=#097a76>五天</color>之后才会自动开启，这段时间你就只能跟老夫一样困在这里了。

original: Little guy, let me see, which sect's disciple are you...
context: 小家伙，让老夫来看一看，你是哪家的弟子……

original: Take a sniff~
context: 嗅一嗅~

original: Touch~
context: 摸一摸~

original: Taste~
context: 尝一尝~

original: Pah, pah, pah, it's indeed the disciples and grand-disciples of those old Invincibles from the three sects!
context: 呸呸呸，果然又是三教那几个老不死的徒子徒孙！

original: Get away from me, there's not a single good person among you three sects, don't provoke me, or I'll break your neck!
context: 你给老夫滚到一边去，你们三教中人没一个好东西，不要把老夫惹急了眼，扭断你的脖子！

original: Finally, I see a little guy from outside the three sects, my mood is slightly better.
context: 总算是见到三教之外的小娃娃了，老夫我总算心情舒畅了少许。

original: Little guy, we need to get close in these few days, maybe if I'm happy, I'll teach you some skills, and you'll rise to the top in one step.
context: 小家伙，这几天咱们可要亲近亲近，说不定老夫一高兴就传你些功法，让你一步登天。

original: There's no such thing as Lao Motou here. I'm not going to be stuck here for several days on my own, am I?
context: 这里哪有什么老魔头，该不会我自己一个人要在这里呆上好几天吧。

original: <color=#097a76>The first day</color> has passed, and there are still four days to run away from here, I hope nothing unexpected will happen.
context: <color=#097a76>第一天</color>过去了，还有四天才能离开这里，但愿不会出什么意外。

original: It's really boring here. It's only <color=#097a76>the second day</color>. How am I going to get through the following days?
context: 在这里真是无聊，现在才<color=#097a76>第二天</color>，接下来的日子怎么熬啊。

original: Unconsciously, it's already <color=#097a76>the second day</color>, should I do something?
context: 不知不觉已经<color=#097a76>第二天</color>了，我是不是应该做些什么。

original: It seems not bad to stay like this. It's only <color=#097a76>the third day</color>. It's hard to find such a quiet place.
context: 就这么呆下去似乎也不错，不过<color=#097a76>第三天</color>而已，难得如此清净的地方还真不好找。

original: Finally, it's <color=#097a76>the third day</color>. This kind of life is simply unbearable for normal people.
context: 终于熬到<color=#097a76>第三天</color>，这种日子简直不是正常人能接受的。

original: <color=#097a76>The third day</color>... I can't help but feel a bit irritable. If this continues, I'm afraid I'll lose my sanity.
context: <color=#097a76>第三天</color>……，我已经忍不住有些烦躁了，再这样下去恐怕会丧失理智的。

original: I didn't expect it's already <color=#097a76>the fourth day</color>. I've gained a lot in these few days. It's worth the trip.
context: 想不到已经<color=#097a76>第四天</color>了，这几天收获不少，总算没白来一趟。

original: It's already <color=#097a76>the fourth day</color>. Just hold on a little longer, and I won't have to suffer anymore.
context: 已经<color=#097a76>第四天</color>了，再坚持一下，就不必再受这罪了。

original: After suffering in this hellish place for <color=#097a76>four days</color>, I really want to die.
context: 在这种鬼地方连续煎熬<color=#097a76>四天</color>，真是想死的心都有了。

original: Spar
context: 切磋

original: Kid, my fists are itching. Come and play a few moves with me to relieve my boredom, or I can't help but twist your neck!
context: 小家伙，老夫拳头如今痒得很，你快来陪老夫耍几招解解闷，否则老夫可要忍不住扭断你的脖子！

original: I'm very measured in my actions. If I kill you, there will be no fun. So you can rest assured.
context: 老夫下手很有分寸，把你弄死可就没得玩了，所以你大可放心。

original: Duel with Lao Motou (Stamina10)
context: 与老魔头单挑（体力10）

original: Gang up and attack Lao Motou (Stamina10)
context: 一拥而上围攻老魔头（体力10）

original: Think about it again
context: 再考虑下

original: You are seriously injured and unconscious for six shichen...
context: 你受伤不轻，昏迷了六个时辰……

original: I'm afraid I'll kill you with one punch. I've tried my best to restrain my power. It's not fun to fight.
context: 老夫生怕一拳打死你，已经极力压制自身功力，打起来真是不痛快。

original: All of you were knocked down by Lao Motou and unconscious for six shichen...
context: 你们几人被老魔头悉数打倒，昏迷了六个时辰……

original: It's so enjoyable! I won't be bored in the next few days.
context: 过瘾，过瘾！接下来几天老夫可不会无聊了。

original: Kid, it seems that you are more eager to fight than me. You didn't disappoint me.
context: 小家伙，看来你比老夫更加手痒难耐，总算没让老夫失望。

original: Chat
context: 闲聊

original: I used to be able to fight a million soldiers with one punch. The worldly armies were nothing but ants in my eyes.|Let me tell you a truth about life. The cruel world treats everything as dogs. Life is short, if you live for others, you will end up with nothing.|When I was your age, I was already a Passive master who dominated the east, west, south, and north. Unfortunately, I still couldn't overcome the wickedness of human nature. It shows that there is no such thing as true invincibility in the world.|Those bastards from the three religions, in order to suppress me, not only used this icy dungeon to restrain my pure yang MP, and shackled my hands and feet with black iron chains; they also used the unique method of Confucius Temple to obstruct my meridians...|I really want to know, if one day you are betrayed by your closest and trusted partner, how would you feel?|No matter how suave and compassionate you are... If you were locked up in a sunless dungeon for over a decade, you would also become something not human, not ghost.|If it weren't for my Horse roaming the martial world back then, defeating the top masters of several major sects, there would be no chance for the so-called Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple to emerge. Humph, those who borrow the name of the three religions to fish for fame!
context: 老夫曾经可是一拳可当百万兵，世俗的千军万马在老夫眼中不过蝼蚁罢了。|老夫告诉你个为人处事的道理，天地不仁以万物为刍狗，人生百年不过白驹过隙，自己若为他人而活，到头来不过一切成空。|老夫当年在你这般年纪，早已是叱咤东西纵横南北的武道宗师，可惜最后仍胜不过人心险恶，可见世间没有所谓的真正无敌。|三教那帮狗杂碎，为了镇压老夫，不但用这寒冰地牢压制老夫纯阳内力，玄铁锁链禁锢老夫手脚；还用儒圣馆特有手法阻滞老夫筋脉……|老夫很想知道，若有一日你被最为亲近信赖的伙伴背叛，你会作何感想？|任你如何风流倜傥，任你如何慈悲心肠……若在不见天日的地牢关押十数年，照样也会一样变得人不人、鬼不鬼。|若非老夫当年的马踏江湖，把当时几大门派打得高手凋零，哪轮得到如今的所谓道玄宗、儒圣馆之流冒头。哼，假借三教之名的沽名钓誉之辈！

original: That old baldy from the Yunlin Temple keeps reciting nonsense scriptures, giving me headaches and making my mind a mess, I wonder why it suddenly became quiet recently.
context: 那云林寺的老秃驴有事没事就念诵狗屁经文，让老夫头昏脑胀心乱如麻，不知最近为何突然清净了。

original: That old baldy from the Yunlin Temple keeps reciting nonsense scriptures, giving me headaches and making my mind a mess. When I escape, I will personally send him to the afterlife!
context: 那云林寺的老秃驴有事没事就念诵狗屁经文，让老夫头昏脑胀心乱如麻。等老夫脱困之日，亲自去给老秃驴超度！

original: If the arrangement in this Xuanbing Dungeon is not specifically against me, it is actually an excellent place for training. Kid, it's fate that you came here, why not try the method of absorbing the cold into your body, maybe you can gain some insights.
context: 这玄冰地牢中布置若非刻意针对老夫，其实是绝佳的练功之地。小家伙，你能来到这里也算缘份，不妨去试试吸纳寒气入体的法门，或许能使你有所领悟。

original: Kid, you and I have Known each other, I will give you this knife manual as a memento.
context: 小家伙，你跟老夫相识一场，老夫这本刀谱送给你留个念想吧。

original:
Heavens, Archdemon Blade! Legendary swordsmanship!!!
Just give it to me so easily? Shouldn't there be a frustrating test?
context:
天，天魔刀法！甲级刀法！！！
就这么轻易送给我了？难道不该设个叫人抓狂的考验吗？

original:
Humph, I don't care for such mediocre martial arts!
The peculiarity of this martial art is that the higher the Benevolence, the lower the damage, and vice versa, the Power is quite considerable.
context:
切，这种鸡肋的武功老夫才看不上眼！
这门武功奇特地方在于，仁德越高伤害越低，反之则威力颇为可观。

original: I am quite looking forward to seeing how you will choose after getting this knife manual, whether to put it on a high shelf and continue to play the good guy, or to become a demon who brings disaster to the country and the people, and forge an invincible path!
context: 老夫倒很期待，你得了这本刀谱之后会如何选择，是束之高阁继续当善人装清高，还是成为祸国殃民一代魔头，铸就无敌之路！

original: Back then, I was quite lenient with that old turtle Hui Yuan, otherwise how could those disciples in the Shifa Temple withstand my punches and kicks, they would have been removed from the martial world long ago.
context: 老夫当年可对慧元那只老乌龟留了不少情面，否则释法寺里那些徒子徒孙怎么能经得起老夫一拳一脚，早从江湖上除名了。

original: It's strange, I clearly remember that I won that fight, how come I talked myself into losing...
context: 真奇怪，老夫分明记得那场架打赢了呀，怎么说着说着就把自己说输了……

original:
What about the indestructible golden body? What about the Golden Man Formation?
In front of me, it's just a matter of a few more punches and kicks.
context:
金身不坏如何？金身铜人阵又如何？
在老夫面前不过多费几拳几脚的事情。

original: I smell the scent of those baldies on you, let me see if Hui Yuan's disciples and grandchildren have made any progress!
context: 老夫在你身上嗅到了那帮秃驴的气息，让老夫看看慧元如今的徒子徒孙到底有没有长进！

original:
Still the same after all these years, what a disappointment!
Without me stirring up trouble outside, these martial sects are really too comfortable.
context:
这么多年还是老样子，真叫老夫失望！
果然没了老夫在外面兴风作浪，这些江湖门派当真安逸的很。

original:
Barely decent, this is the strength that a disciple of the three religions should have.
The Manual that I borrowed from the Shifa Temple back then, I now return it to you, so as not to waste the hard work of those past monks.
context:
勉强像点样子，这才是三教弟子该有的实力。
当年从释法寺借走的镇派秘籍如今交还你手里，也不算埋没了那些历代高僧的心血。

original: Kid, don't look at how the Taoist Sect is now, back then they couldn't make it in the martial world, it was my soft heart that didn't let them be completely wiped out.
context: 小家伙，你可别看道玄宗现在如何如何，当年在江湖上可排不上号，老夫也是一时心慈手软才没让他们彻底断根。

original: It's strange, I clearly remember that I won that fight, how come I talked myself into losing...
context: 真奇怪，老夫分明记得那场架打赢了呀，怎么说着说着就把自己说输了……

original: What the hell is Zhong Yangzi, what invincible Reflect skill, what world-leading Zhenwu Sword Formation, didn't they all lose to me back then.
context: 重阳子算什么狗屁，什么反伤无敌的神功，什么冠绝天下真武剑阵，当年还不是败在老夫手中。

original: I smell the scent of those old Taoists on you, let me see if Zhong Yangzi's disciples and grandchildren have made any progress!
context: 老夫在你身上嗅到了那帮牛鼻子老道的味道，让老夫看看重阳子如今的徒子徒孙到底有没有长进！

original:
Still the same after all these years, what a disappointment!
Without me stirring up trouble outside, these martial sects are really too comfortable.
context:
这么多年还是老样子，真叫老夫失望！
果然没了老夫在外面兴风作浪，这些江湖门派当真安逸的很。

original:
Barely decent, this is the strength that a disciple of the three religions should have.
The Manual that I borrowed from the Taoist Sect back then, I now return it to you, so as not to waste the hard work of those masters and real people.
context:
勉强像点样子，这才是三教弟子该有的实力。
当年从道玄宗借走的镇派秘籍如今交还你手里，也不算埋没了那些大师真人的心血。

original: That old man surnamed Cai, spends his days either scheming or trying out various peculiar Pills. If it weren't for the beating I gave him back then, he probably wouldn't have had the chance to sit in the position of Confucius Temple.
context: 姓蔡的老家伙，整天不是算计别人就是尝试各种稀奇古怪的丹药。当年若不是被老夫狠狠揍一顿开了窍，恐怕儒圣馆的位置还轮不到他来坐。

original: It's strange, I clearly remember that I won that fight, how come I talked myself into losing...
context: 真奇怪，老夫分明记得那场架打赢了呀，怎么说着说着就把自己说输了……

original: I must admit, his methods of winning people over are quite impressive. The Four arts that follow him around, each of them has exceptional talent, comparable to the leaders of the average sects in the martial arts world.
context: 不得不说这老家伙收买人心的手段很是不错，他身边那琴棋书画四个跟班，资质各个不俗，放到江湖上不逊色一般门派宗主、掌门。

original: I smell the scent of those pedantic scholars from Confucius Temple on you. Let me see what's so special about the Confucius Temple under Cai Yuanchang's leadership, which values literature over martial arts!
context: 老夫在你身上嗅到了儒圣馆那帮酸儒书生的味道，让老夫看看所谓重文轻武的儒圣馆在蔡元常领导下有何出奇之处！

original:
Still the same after all these years, what a disappointment!
Without me stirring up trouble outside, these martial sects are really too comfortable.
context:
这么多年还是老样子，真叫老夫失望！
果然没了老夫在外面兴风作浪，这些江湖门派当真安逸的很。

original: Barely passable, this is the strength a disciple of the three religions should have. The Manual that I borrowed from Confucius Temple back then, I now return it to you, so as not to waste the efforts of those ancient sages.
context:
勉强像点样子，这才是三教弟子该有的实力。
当年从儒圣馆借走的镇派秘籍如今交还你手里，也不算埋没了那些古圣先贤的心血。

original: Old senior, since you are an old man in the martial arts world, have you ever heard of "Chu Kuangsheng"?
context: 老前辈，既然你是老一辈的江湖中人，不知道是否听过“楚狂生”这个人物？

original: Chu Kuangsheng... It's been a long time since I heard this name.
context: 楚狂生……好久没听人提起这个名字了。

original: Could it be that you know him, senior?
context: 莫非前辈认识他？

original: More than just knowing him, I'm very familiar with him, I know his every move.
context: 岂止认识，简直熟得很，他的一举一动我都了如指掌。

original: Could it be...
context: 莫非……

original: I am Chu Kuangsheng, the one that all three teachings avoid!
context: 老夫就是楚狂生，就是那个三教避之唯恐不及的楚狂生！

original: So you are Chu Kuangsheng! Do you know Fu Yaoqin?
context: 原来前辈就是楚狂生！你可否认识付瑶琴？

original: That hot-tempered Xiao Ya, she should be married by now.
context: 那个脾气火爆的小丫头啊，现在应该早已嫁为人妇了吧。

original: She went to the southwest and founded Melody House, and specifically asked me to find you.
context: 她远赴西南，开创了妙音坊，特地委托我来找您。

original: This girl hasn't given up yet, tell her not to waste her efforts. I'm old enough to be her father, and my future is uncertain. Why is she so obsessed with me?
context: 这丫头还没死心呢，告诉她不要白费心思，老夫年纪都能做她爹了，而且老夫将来吉凶难测，何苦执着在老夫身上。

original: Do you know Fu Yaoqin, elder?
context: 老前辈可否认识付瑶琴？

original: That hot-tempered Xiao Ya, she should be married by now.
context: 那个脾气火爆的小丫头啊，现在应该早已嫁为人妇了吧。

original: She went to the southwest and founded Melody House, and specifically asked me to find you.
context: 她远赴西南，开创了妙音坊，特地委托我来找您。

original: This girl hasn't given up yet, tell her not to waste her efforts. I'm old enough to be her father, and my future is uncertain. Why is she so obsessed with me?
context: 这丫头还没死心呢，告诉她不要白费心思，老夫年纪都能做她爹了，而且老夫将来吉凶难测，何苦执着在老夫身上。

original: Little one, you're not from the three religions, why did you come into this Ice Prison? Tell me your purpose.
context: 小家伙，你并非三教中人，为何会进到这冰牢之中，给老夫讲讲你的来意吧。

original: I came with my master to save a man named Chu Kuangsheng. Could it be that you are...
context: 晚辈是跟师父来救一个叫楚狂生的人，莫非前辈就是……

original: I am Chu Kuangsheng, the one that all three teachings avoid!
context: 老夫就是楚狂生，就是那个三教避之唯恐不及的楚狂生！

original: I'm not lucky with relationships, logically there shouldn't be anyone who wants to save me. Who is your master?
context: 老夫人缘可不好，按理说这世上不会有人想来解救老夫，你的师父是哪一位？

original: My master's name is Yan Gexing.
context: 师父名讳燕歌行。

original: I didn't expect him to finally take a disciple... Is your master still in good health?
context: 想不到他终于收徒了……你师父身体可还硬朗？

original: My master was once ambushed, and his Meridian was severely damaged...
context: 师父曾遭人偷袭，经脉受损严重……

original: Who hurt {yell}! Who was it!
context: {yell}是什么人伤了他！是什么人！

original: My master didn't say, I don't know either.
context: 师父没说，晚辈也不清楚。

original: He must have been implicated by me...
context: 他到底是受了老夫的连累啊……

original: Where is your master now?
context: 你师父如今现在何处？

original: My master is outside distracting the enemies so I could sneak into the Ice Prison. I'm not sure about the situation outside.
context: 师父在外帮我引开敌人，晚辈才能脱身进入冰牢，现在外面情况晚辈也不清楚如何。

original: Ah, third junior brother, you must hold on.
context: 唉，三师弟你可要撑住啊。

original: Rock Paper Scissors
context: 猜拳

original: Let me teach you a fun game. If you learn it, you can keep me company in my spare time.
context: 老夫教你个好玩的东西，你若学会了，余下时间正好可以陪老夫解闷。

original: The two of us will simultaneously make a gesture in each round, either "rock", "scissors", or "paper". Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, paper beats rock.
context: 咱们两人每局同时出一手势，手势为“锤”、“剪”、“布”其中一项，锤胜剪、剪胜布、布胜锤。

original: Kid, what's with that look on your face? I see a mix of disdain and boredom.
context: 小家伙，你这什么表情，老夫怎么看出有三分不屑以及七分无聊呢？

original: Playing such a childish game with you, it feels a bit surreal.
context: 跟您玩这种幼稚游戏，总觉得有些不可思议。

original: Childish? I was the master of this game back in the day, unbeatable. If you can beat me ten or eight rounds in a row, then you can talk big!
context: 幼稚？老夫当年可是玩这个的祖宗，打遍天下无敌手，你有本事连胜过老夫十局八局再说大话！

original: Let's try a round first!
context: 先玩一局试试！

original: I don't feel like playing right now.
context: 暂时不想玩。

original: What will you choose for this round?
context: 这一局选择出什么？

original: Rock!
context: 锤！

original: Scissors!
context: 剪！

original: Paper!
context: 布！

original: Kid, are you going to play or not? Don't dilly-dally.
context: 小家伙，到底要不要玩？别婆婆妈妈的。

original: <size=250%>Rock!</size>
context: <size=250%>锤！</size>

original: <size=250%>Scissors!</size>
context: <size=250%>剪！</size>

original: <size=250%>Paper!</size>
context: <size=250%>布！</size>

original: It's a draw, let's go again!
context: 竟然是平局，再来再来！

original: Just a fluke, I don't believe you can keep winning!
context: 狗屎运而已，老夫就不信你能连续赢下去！

original: I'm not playing anymore, I used to be unbeatable, but today I lost to a greenhorn like you.
context: 不玩了不玩了，老夫当年号称天下无敌手，今天竟然连续输给你这乳臭未干的小子。

original: Maybe you're more suited to learn this strange boxing technique than I am. Take it and study it, you might surpass me. Don't come to me for Rock Paper Scissors anymore, I'll settle for being second best.
context: 或许你比老夫更适合修炼这门古怪拳法，拿去研究吧，说不定可以青出于蓝。以后别再找老夫猜拳了，老夫甘认天下第二总行了吧。

original: Kid, tell me the truth, were you pinching your nose and playing this boring game with me while cursing me in various ways?
context: 小家伙，你给老夫说实话，刚才猜拳时有没有一边捏着鼻子跟老夫玩这无聊游戏，一边变着花样咒骂老夫？

original: Hmph, I can't be bothered to argue with a kid like you who takes advantage and then acts innocent.
context: 哼，老夫才懒得跟你这种得了便宜卖乖的小家伙一般见识。

original: Kid, you've seen how powerful I am, haven't you!
context: 小家伙，见识到老夫的厉害了吧！

original: (I'm bored anyway, should I keep playing?)
context: （闲着也是无聊，是否要再继续玩下去呢？）

original: Keep playing.
context: 继续玩下去。

original: Stop playing.
context: 不玩了。

original: Giving up just when you're getting into it, kids these days really lack spirit.
context: 刚玩出点兴致就轻言放弃，现在的小家伙真是一点血性都没有。

original: This flat, giant stone in front of me isn't made of ice, but it's even colder. I heard that there's a kind of cold jade found in the sea. Some martial artists mine it and practice their MP on it, which is twice the result with half the effort. Could this be it?
context: 眼前这方扁平巨石虽然不是冰块制成，但是寒意更甚。听说海底产有一种寒玉，有武林人士将之采出，可在上面修习内力，事半功倍，莫非就是此物？

original: What do you plan to do?
context: 打算做些什么呢？

original: Sleep for a shichen.
context: 睡一个时辰。

original: Absorb the cold air and practice!
context: 吸纳寒气练功！

original: Nothing to do.
context: 无事可做。

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Before I could learn the majestic MP, I was already in paradise...
context: 还没等修炼出雄浑内力，我就已经早登极乐了……

original: Six shichen later...
context: 六个时辰后……

original: I see!
context: 原来如此！

original: Using this unique method to learn, it seems that the efficiency of condensing MP has only slightly improved, I wonder if there are other effects.
context: 用这种特异法门进行修炼，似乎凝聚内力的效率只是略有增强，不知是否还有其他效果。

original: The internal energy has become colder...
context: 体内真气变得更加寒冷了……

original: Uh...
Uh... Uh...
This {Lao Motou}'s eyes are red, as if he's about to lose his mind, and he's constantly charging, I don't know what he's up to.
context: 这老魔头双目赤红，好像快要失去神智，而且在不断积蓄力量，不知在弄什么玄虚。

original: Could it be that he intends to break the chains on his hands and feet to escape?
context: 莫非他打算扯断手足上的锁链，准备脱困吗？

original: Stop {Lao Motou}!
context: 阻止老魔头！

original: Just watch the changes.
context: 静观其变。

original: <size=200%>Break it for me!!!</size>
context: <size=200%>给我破！！！</size>

original: <size=200%>Roar!!!!!!</size>
He actually broke the chains!!!
context: 锁链竟然被他挣断了！！！

original: This demon has completely lost his mind, his eyes are full of infinite killing intent when he looks at me!
context: 这魔头已经完全丧失理智，看向我的眼神已经充满了无限杀意！

original: The demon's breath gradually calmed down, he must have regained his sanity.
context: 这魔头的气息逐渐平稳下来，想必是恢复了神智。

original: Hahahaha!
context: 哈哈哈哈！

original: I finally escaped! I finally escaped!!!
context: 老夫终于脱困了！老夫终于脱困了！！！

original:
Kid, you've had a fight with me, I won't treat you badly!
We'll meet again, next time we meet, have a good fight with me!
context:
小家伙，你与老夫相识一场，老夫不会亏待你！
咱们以后还有见面的时候，下次见面要跟老夫打个痛快！

original: Kid, in consideration of your company these days, I won't make things difficult for you.
context: 小家伙，看在这几日陪老夫的份上，老夫就不为难你了。

original: Humph, kid, take care of yourself!
context: 哼，小家伙自求多福吧！

original: Uh...
A day and a night later...
context: 一天一夜后……

original: Old man, you're really ruthless!
context: 老家伙，下手真狠呐！

original: Can't let him succeed, strike first!
context: 不能让他得逞，先下手为强！

original: This demon is really hard to kill, he's invincible no matter how much he's hit!
context: 这魔头真是命硬，这么打都不死！

original: I didn't expect... my supreme divine power would, would die in your hands...
context: 想不到……老夫神功盖世竟然，竟然死在你这娃娃手上……

original: Three Sects Demon Suppression
context: 三教镇魔

original: Demon Suppression
context: 镇魔

original: Go to {Shifa Temple}, {Confucius Temple}, find {Hui Yuan} and {Cai Yuanchang}, invite the heirs of the two sects to gather at {Taoist Sect}.
context: 前往释法寺、儒圣馆，分别找慧元和蔡元常，邀请两家派传人来道玄宗相聚。

original: {Shifa Temple}, {Confucius Temple} have agreed to the invitation, now return to {Taoist Sect} to report to {Zhong Yangzi}.
context: 释法寺、儒圣馆都同意赴约，现在返回道玄宗回禀重阳子。

original: More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.
context: 十数年前，江湖上出现一位神秘人物，不知师承何处，只知身兼数门顶级武学，一身本领臻至化境。

original: This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
context: 此人不但只身挑起江湖上无数争端，甚至凭一喜之好，数次以强大武力干预燕赵两国战场局势，无论江湖还是庙堂，都已沦为他的掌中玩物。

original: The heads of the three sects joined forces, laid out several plans, went through many twists and turns, and paid a heavy price to capture him severely injured.
context: 三教掌门联手，数次布局，几经波折，付出惨痛代价这才把他重伤生擒。

original: Not only is this person outstanding in martial arts, but he also hides the internal strength Archives of the three sects. He is the only one in the world who knows their whereabouts. In order not to cut off the unique skills of the three sects, he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, and his life cannot be taken.
context: 此人不但武功卓绝，还藏匿了三教各自镇派内功典籍，当世只有他一人知道下落，为了三教绝学不致断绝，因此只能将其关押拷问，不能取其性命。

original: Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.
context: 寻常牢房已无法困住这位大魔头，因此三教再次联合，设计出一处困魔局，这才把魔头镇压下去。

original: There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
context: 每年有几天特定时日，是困魔局最为薄弱之时，为防止魔头脱困，三教传人经过相互比试之后，由战力最强之人在那几天负责坐镇局中看管魔头。

original: Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.
context: 看管魔头听起来是件苦差事，为什么还要比试之后，选出最厉害的人才有看管魔头的资格。

original: During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
context: 看管魔头这几日，若有机缘获得魔头指点一二，甚至从魔头口中探出镇派秘籍的只言片语，不但有益于门派，对自身修行更是大有裨益。

original: Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?
context: 三教派人一起去看管魔头不是更保险，大家也不用争来争去，若是打探出什么消息，大家一同收益不是更好？

original: Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
context: 先不说三教表面同气连枝，私下其实相互较劲；单是那魔头的古怪脾气和暴虐性子，岂容一堆人堂而皇之的看守他？说不定发起狠来，把这几人全都打杀了。

original: Risks and opportunities coexist...
context: 风险与机遇并存……

original: {PlayerName}, the old Taoist wants you to represent the Taoist Sect, to invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition, to determine who will be the guardian this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your personal fate.
context: {PlayerName}，老道要你代表道玄宗，出面邀约另外两教传人进行比试，定出今年看守之人，能否抓住这次机缘，就看你个人造化了。

original: Yes, I will definitely bring honor to the Taoist Sect and let the world know that the Taoist Sect always stands at the top of the three sects!
context: 遵命，弟子一定为道玄宗争光，让世人知道道玄宗永远站立三教鳌头！

original: I already know why you are here, but in the past, the Taoist Sect always sent La Tazhang, but today you are sent here. How capable can you, a young boy, be to take on this task?
context: 你的来意我已知晓，不过往年道玄宗都是邋遢张出面，今天却把你派来，你这毛头小子能有多大本事堪当此任？

original: If you can take this move from the old man, the Confucius Temple will naturally send someone to the Taoist Sect; otherwise, please ask the Taoist Sect to choose another successor, and don't treat the demon suppression as a child's play!
context: 你若能接下老夫这一招，儒圣馆自然派人前往道玄宗；否则就请道玄宗另选传人，不要把镇魔大事当作儿戏！

original: You, as a senior leader of a sect, taking action against a junior, isn't that demeaning yourself?
context: 您贵为一派之长的前辈，对晚辈出手，不是自贬身份吗！

original: This is not a child's play, how can such a weak person guard the demon head, go back and tell the head of Chongyang to change someone else.
context: 此等大事不是儿戏，如此羸弱不堪怎能看守魔头，回去告诉重阳掌教，叫他另换他人。

original: Young man, do you really want to be so stubborn? The old man wants to see how many times you will fall before you give up!
context: 年轻人真要如此倔强吗？老夫倒要看你倒下几次才肯罢手！

original: You barely have some skills, since you have passed the old man's test, the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment.
context: 勉强算是有几分本事，既然通过老夫考验，儒圣馆会安排传人赴约的。

original: I didn't expect that the head of Chongyang would send you to participate in the competition of the successors of the three sects this time. It must be that he is fully confident. In consideration of the past, the old man will not make things difficult for you. Go back and tell the head of Chongyang that the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment on time.
context: 想不到重阳掌教这次派你出面参与三教传人的比试，想必是已有十足的把握。看在往日情面上，老夫也不为难你，回去告诉重阳掌教，儒圣馆会安排传人准时赴约。

original: Please tell the head of the sect that the Shifa Temple will send the successor to attend the appointment on time.
context: 请施主告知掌教真人，释法寺会派遣传人准时赴约。

original:
So easy? It's a bit unexpected.
Don't you want to test whether I am qualified to represent the Taoist Sect?
context:
这么容易？有点出乎预料。
您不出个难题检验下我是否有资格代表道玄宗吗？

original: The old monk believes that the head of the sect will not treat the demon suppression as a child's play. If you are sent here, there must be his reason, and the old monk does not need to worry about it.
context: 镇魔大事老衲相信掌教真人不会儿戏，派你前来定然有他的道理，老衲不必为此忧虑。

original: {PlayerGivenName} junior brother, I have been waiting here on behalf of the Confucius Temple.
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟，在下代表儒圣馆前来，在此久候了。

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, I have been waiting here for a long time.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄，蔡某在此久候了。

original: I am Cai Youzhi, representing the Confucius Temple, and I have been waiting here for a long time.
context: 在下蔡攸之，代表儒圣馆前来，在此久候了。

original: {PlayerSurName} senior brother, the little monk is here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄，小僧代表释法寺前来赴约。

original: You are really slow, poor monk has been waiting for you for half a day.
context: 施主脚程真慢，贫僧可是等你半天了。

original: You are polite, poor monk Lai Toudian, here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
context: 施主有礼了，贫僧癞头癫，代表释法寺前来赴约。

original:
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin.
{PlayerName} You are new to the sect and don't understand the rules, let the old Taoist explain it to you.
context:
如今三教传人已经到齐，比试即将开始。
{PlayerName}入门尚浅，不了解规则，老道先为你讲解一番。

original: {PlayerName} You represent the Taoist Sect in the battle, you are the host of this time, you need to go through three competitions, the first one is you and the successor of the Shifa Temple against the Confucius Temple; the second one is you and the Confucius Temple against the Shifa Temple; the third one is you alone against the two sects.
context: {PlayerName}你代表道玄宗出战，是本次的东道主，需要经历三场比试，第一场你与释法寺传人对抗儒圣馆；第二次你与儒圣馆对抗释法寺；第三场独自应对两家联手。

original: If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon head this year; if you lose any round in the middle, this matter will have nothing to do with our Taoist Sect, do you understand?
context: 三场全部胜出，今年就由你担负看守魔头的重任；中途只要输掉一场，此事便与我道玄宗无缘，你可听明白了？

original: I understand.
context: 听明白了。

original: I don't understand.
context: 没听明白。

original: In that case, let's start now!
context: 既然如此，现在便开始吧！

original: Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
context: 可不要小瞧了儒圣馆的本事！

original: The little monk is here to learn from the two senior brothers.
context: 小僧来领教两位师兄高招。

original: {PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄当心了。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟请赐教！

original: The disciples of the Taoist Sect are indeed as good as their reputation. This year, we will rely on {PlayerGivenName} to guard the demon.
context: 道玄宗弟子果然名不虚传，今年就劳烦{PlayerGivenName}师弟看守魔头了。

original: Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
context: 可不要小瞧了儒圣馆的本事！

original: Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
context: 你们来尝尝贫僧的十全大补丸滋味如何。

original: I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
context: 贫僧皮痒了，快给贫僧挠挠。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟请赐教！

original: I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
context: 贫僧早就看腻了那魔头，这次换人正好，贫僧正好闲下来找乐子去咯。

original: The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
context: 儒圣馆傲立三教的依仗乃是文采风流，并非武功出众。

original: Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
context: 你们来尝尝贫僧的十全大补丸滋味如何。

original: I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
context: 贫僧皮痒了，快给贫僧挠挠。

original: Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
context: 拳脚无眼，你要留神了！

original: I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
context: 贫僧早就看腻了那魔头，这次换人正好，贫僧正好闲下来找乐子去咯。

original: There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
context: 技不如人无话可说……

original: The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
context: 儒圣馆傲立三教的依仗乃是文采风流，并非武功出众。

original: The little monk is here to learn from the two senior brothers.
context: 小僧来领教两位师兄高招。

original: {PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄当心了。

original: Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
context: 拳脚无眼，你要留神了！

original: There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
context: 技不如人无话可说……

original: You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
context: 你伤势不轻，昏迷了几个时辰渐渐醒了过来。

original: Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
context: 唉，你已尽力了，此乃天意不必耿耿于怀。

original: {PlayerName}, you have indeed lived up to my expectations. Now you have to shoulder the responsibility of guarding that demon!
context: {PlayerName}，你果然没有辜负老道对你的期望，如今你便要肩负起看守那魔头的重任了！

original: The demon is now imprisoned under the stone tower in the Ice Prison of Lin'an City Yunlin Temple. I will tell you how to enter the Ice Prison...
context: 那魔头现在关押在<color=#c44b0e>霖安城云林寺里石塔下的冰牢中</color>，老道这就告诉你进入冰牢的法门……

original: You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
context: 你获知了进入冰牢的办法。

original: Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
context: 开启冰牢后，一旦进入冰牢，入口会自动关闭；<color=#c44b0e>直到五天之后才会重新开启</color>，若没有十足把握，千万不要仓促进入。

original: Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
context: 千万不要让那魔头逃脱，否则后果难以预料，切记切记。

original: I will definitely remember the teachings of the master.
context: 弟子一定牢记掌教教诲。
