context: 索取岁币

original: Embark on a mission.
context: 出使

original: Go to Daliang City, negotiate this year's annual tribute situation with Duke Qi at Duke Qi's Manor.
context: 前往大梁城，到齐王府与<color=#c44b0e>齐王</color>交涉今年岁币情况。

original: Inform Wanyan Wuzhu of the results of the annual tribute negotiation.
context: 把商谈岁币的结果告知完颜乌珠。

original: The marshal has agreed to the negotiation results, you can now go to Duke Qi to fulfill his promise.
context: 元帅已同意商谈结果，可以找齐王兑现承诺了。

original: Previously, Wanyan Liang went to the Zhao Kingdom to negotiate this year's annual tribute with Duke Qi, but the results were not satisfactory to me. I appoint you as the special envoy of Yan Kingdom to negotiate with Duke Qi, and you must give me a satisfactory answer!
context: 之前完颜亮出使赵国，与齐王交涉今年岁币的结果并不能令本元帅满意。本元帅委派你做为燕国特使，前去与齐王交涉，务必要给本元帅一个满意的答复！

original: Yes, sir!
context: 遵命！

original: Traitor {PlayerName}, you betray your country for glory, how dare you come here!
context: 叛徒{PlayerName}，你卖国求荣，怎么还敢来此！

original: Today I am a special envoy of Yan Kingdom, here to discuss important matters with Duke Qi, it's best not to spoil the atmosphere.
context: 我今天是燕国特使，前来与齐王商讨要事，最好不要伤了和气。

original: Seeing you, the traitor, makes me angry. If you want to go in, beat us first!
context: 看你这个叛徒就来气，想要进去先打过我们再说！

original: The traitor is so arrogant, let's see how Duke Qi deals with you!
context: 叛徒竟然如此嚣张，看齐王殿下如何收拾你！

original: You should know who you're dealing with before you strike a dog. I won't take your life today, now get lost!
context: 打狗还得看主人，今天不要你的命，给老子滚进去吧！

original: What brings you to my palace now that you've changed your allegiance?
context: 你如今已更换门庭，还来本王这里作甚！

original: What is your purpose for coming to my palace?
context: 你到本王这里，究竟意欲何为？

original: Today, I am here as a special envoy from the Yan Kingdom, specifically for the matter of the annual tribute.
context: 我今天的身份是燕国特使，专为岁币一事而来。

original:
Marshal Wan Yan is being a bit excessive, isn't he?
Just a few days ago, an envoy was sent to negotiate this year's tribute. Why send someone again?
context:
完颜元帅有些过分了吧！
前些日子刚派使者谈妥今年岁币，为何又派人来？

original: The Marshal said he was not satisfied with the results of your negotiations.
context: 元帅说你们商谈的结果他不满意。

original:
Do you take the agreement between the two countries as a joke?
Changing orders from day to day, how can anyone trust you!
context:
你们把两国的协议当作儿戏吗？
朝令夕改，教人如何信服！

original: My purpose for this trip is to negotiate a satisfactory answer with Duke Qi. Otherwise, I won't give up. As for the rest, you can vent your dissatisfaction to the Marshal, it has nothing to do with me.
context: 我此行目的就是跟齐王谈出一个满意的答复，否则我不会罢休。至于其他，您大可去找元帅发泄不满，与我无关。

original: Talk? You'll have to survive first before you can negotiate with me.
context: 谈？你有命活下来再跟本王谈吧。

original: {yell} Guards, seize this madman for me!
context: {yell}来人，将此狂徒给本王拿下！

original: Your Highness Duke Qi, can we now have a calm and peaceful discussion?
context: 齐王殿下，现在咱们可以心平气和谈上一谈了吗？

original: Fine, you're tough, you call the shots.
context: 好，你拳头硬，你说了算。

original: I don't have much experience with matters like the annual tribute. I only know that the Marshal was not satisfied with the results of your previous negotiations, so you need to show some sincerity.
context: 岁币这类事情我没啥经验，只知道之前你们谈妥的结果元帅不满意，所以还需要殿下主动拿出些诚意来。

original: According to Marshal Wan Yan's initial demand for eight hundred thousand annual tributes, now the princes of various places are not willing to give a penny, and they are not willing to pay any taxes. I really can't afford such a huge annual tribute expense.
context: 按照完颜元帅最初的要求索要八十万岁币，如今各地诸侯王爷一毛不拔，半点赋税也不肯上缴，本王实在无法负担如此庞大的岁币开销。

original: How much did you agree with Wanyan Liang last time?
context: 你跟完颜亮上次商定的金额是多少？

original: Half, four hundred thousand...
context: 折半，四十万……

original: You're really good at bargaining, no wonder the Marshal is unhappy. This is like slapping him in the face.
context: 你也太会砍价了吧，难怪元帅不乐意，这是骑在头上打脸的节奏啊。

original: This, this was requested by Wanyan Liang. He promised that as long as I give him a unique martial arts book from my collection, he will guarantee to persuade Marshal Wan Yan to agree to this amount.
context: 这，这是完颜亮主动要求的，承诺只要本王把府中珍藏的一本绝世武功给他，他就保证说服完颜元帅同意这个数量。

original: (So there's such a trick in it, how much annual tribute should I ask Duke Qi for?)
context: （原来这里面有这样的猫腻，我该向齐王索要多少岁币合适呢？）

original: Eight hundred thousand annual tributes, not a penny less!
context: 八十万岁币，一分也不能少！

original: Seven hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
context: 七十万岁币，外加一本绝世武功。

original: Six hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
context: 六十万岁币，外加一本绝世武功。

original: Five hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
context: 五十万岁币，外加一本绝世武功。

original: Since you are so pressing, let's see if you can get out of the palace alive!
context: 你既然如此逼迫本王，那么就看你有没有本事活着走出王府了！

original: Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
context: 哼，想不到年纪轻轻竟然功力如此深厚……

original: Eight hundred thousand annual tributes, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
context: 八十万岁币，殿下还有什么问题吗？

original: Not only do I agree to these eight hundred thousand annual tributes, but I will also give you the unique martial arts book.
context: 本王不但答应这八十万岁币，那本绝世武功也会一并给你。

original: How can a talent like you be willing to serve under Wanyan Wuzhu? I would be very happy to see the day when you overthrow him.
context: 你这样的奇才怎肯甘心寄身于完颜乌珠手下，本王十分乐意看到你们以下克上的那一天。

original: Since you are so pressing, let's see if you can get out of the palace alive!
context: 你既然如此逼迫本王，那么就看你有没有本事活着走出王府了！

original: Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
context: 哼，想不到年纪轻轻竟然功力如此深厚……

original: Seven hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
context: 七十万岁币以及一本绝世武功，殿下还有什么问题吗？

original: As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
context: 只要你家元帅没有问题，本王也就勉强答应了。

original: You are even more greedy than the previous person, wanting to have both the fish and the bear's paw. Let's see if you have the ability!
context: 你比之前那人还要贪得无厌，想要鱼和熊掌兼得，就看自己有没有本事吧！

original: Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
context: 哼，想不到年纪轻轻竟然功力如此深厚……

original: Six hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
context: 六十万岁币以及一本绝世武功，殿下还有什么问题吗？

original: As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
context: 只要你家元帅没有问题，本王也就勉强答应了。

original: Although it's not much different from the previous negotiation results, why do you think you can get your hands on the manual of that unique martial arts?
context: 虽然和之前商谈结果区别不大，但是你又凭什么妄想染指那本绝世武功的秘籍呢？

original: Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
context: 哼，想不到年纪轻轻竟然功力如此深厚……

original: Five hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
context: 五十万岁币以及一本绝世武功，殿下还有什么问题吗？

original: As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
context: 只要你家元帅没有问题，本王也就勉强答应了。

original: You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
context: 不愧是{PlayerName}，这事办的漂亮，果然让本元帅十分满意！

original: You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
context: 不愧是{PlayerName}，这事办的漂亮，果然让本元帅十分满意！

original: Prince Duke Qi, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
context: 齐王殿下，我家元帅已经同意咱们商谈的结果，现在你可以把那本绝世武功的秘籍交给我了吧。

original: This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
context: 本王言而有信，不会像你们这些蛮夷出尔反尔！

original:
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Duke Qi?
If it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
context:
{PlayerName}，你是不是私下受了齐王的好处？
若不是本王对你有所防范派人盯梢，这次又要被你糊弄了！

original: You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
context: 你叫本王着实寒心，看来本王还得重新考验你的忠诚才行。

original: You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
context: 不愧是{PlayerName}，这事办的漂亮，果然让本元帅十分满意！

original: Prince Duke Qi, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
context: 齐王殿下，我家元帅已经同意咱们商谈的结果，现在你可以把那本绝世武功的秘籍交给我了吧。

original: This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
context: 本王言而有信，不会像你们这些蛮夷出尔反尔！

original:
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Duke Qi?
If it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
context:
{PlayerName}，你是不是私下受了齐王的好处？
若不是本王对你有所防范派人盯梢，这次又要被你糊弄了！

original: You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
context: 你叫本王着实寒心，看来本王还得重新考验你的忠诚才行。

original: You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
context: 不愧是{PlayerName}，这事办的漂亮，果然让本元帅十分满意！

original: Prince Duke Qi, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
context: 齐王殿下，我家元帅已经同意咱们商谈的结果，现在你可以把那本绝世武功的秘籍交给我了吧。

original: This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
context: 本王言而有信，不会像你们这些蛮夷出尔反尔！

original:
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Duke Qi?
If it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
context:
{PlayerName}，你是不是私下受了齐王的好处？
若不是本王对你有所防范派人盯梢，这次又要被你糊弄了！

original: You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
context: 你叫本王着实寒心，看来本王还得重新考验你的忠诚才行。

original:
Monks are not allowed to leave the temple without the abbot's permission.
Please go back, junior brother!
context:
出家弟子未经住持许可，不许出寺。
师弟请回！

original: Inquire
context: 询问

original: Here comes another one, another one!
context: 又来一位，又来一位！

original: We are all people who have fallen into the world, it's fate that we meet today.
context: 同是天涯沦落人，今日相会总算有缘。

original:
Humph, how boring!
How could I, the young master, be so foolish as to mingle with you guys.
context:
哼，真是无聊！
本公子怎么会鬼使神差跟你们几个搅在一起。

original: What's going on?
context: 这是什么情况？

original: Looking at you, you're probably planning to join the Shifa Temple too, why not go together, so we can look out for each other in the future.
context: 看你这样子，多半也是打算拜入释法寺的，不如结伴一起，将来也好相互有个照应。

original: Are all of you planning to join the Shifa Temple and become monks?
context: 你们几个难道都是要拜入释法寺当和尚的？

original: The Scripture Tower in Shifa Temple collects top-notch Manuals from all over the world, and the monks in the temple are all top-notch masters. I came here specifically to learn from them.
context: 这释法寺中藏经楼收罗天下顶尖秘籍，寺中僧人各个是绝顶高手，我正是慕名而来，专程拜师学艺的。

original: The flowers fall with intent, but the water flows heartlessly. My sincere heart has been shattered by the beauty, so I see through the world and come to Shifa Temple to become a monk.
context: 落花有意流水无情，小生的一片赤诚早已被那红粉佳人伤得支离破碎，因此看破红尘，特来释法寺剃度出家的。

original: A bunch of worldly people!
context: 一帮俗人！

original: I am not like you, I am here to become a monk just for show, to become a nominal disciple of a master in the temple, to pray for my father for a hundred days, and then to return to the secular world to continue my adventurous life.
context: 本公子可跟你们不是一路人，本公子来这里出家只不过是走个过场，成为寺里某位大师的记名弟子，在寺中为家父祈福百日，然后就还俗继续过逍遥快活的日子。

original: Young man, why don't you tell us why you want to become a monk?
context: 小兄弟，你倒说说看，你是因为什么缘故要出家的？

original:
Who said I want to become a monk?
I just happened to pass by, I didn't think about becoming a monk.
context:
谁说我要出家的？
我是碰巧路过，可没想着要出家当和尚。

original: I don't have time to listen to your idle talk, excuse me!
context: 本公子可没闲工夫听你们闲聊，恕不奉陪了！

original: Pah, what a waste of time.
context: 呸，真是瞎耽误功夫。

original: Young master, wait for me.
context: 公子慢走，等等老哥。

original: Before parting, I advise you, all beauties are skeletons, don't let the love of children and women wear away your heroism.
context: 临别奉劝阁下，一切红粉皆是骷髅，莫要让儿女情长消磨了你的英雄气。

original: These guys are really weird.
context: 这几个家伙真是莫名其妙。

original: May I ask what you need from this old monk?
context: 请问施主找老衲所为何事呐？

original: Request information about Shifa Temple.
context: 请教释法寺情况。

original: Inquire about Shifa Temple's Martial Arts.
context: 询问释法寺武学。

original: Please enlighten me, master.
context: 请大师醍醐灌顶。

original: <color=#0574a8>Join Shifa Temple for cultivation.
context: <color=#0574a8>拜入释法寺修行。

original: Excuse me, Run away.
context: 告辞离开。

original: Shifa Temple has been established for hundreds of years, it was founded by a high monk from the east. Our temple has been passed down for more than thirty generations, during which many high monks have emerged, saving countless people, it is not an exaggeration to say that we have infinite merits.
context: 释法寺立寺已有数百年，乃是一位外域东来的高僧所创。敝寺传承至今已有三十余代，期间高僧辈出，普渡世人无数，说是有着无量功德也不为过。

original: The Martial Arts of our temple are vast and varied, and are rumored by the world to be magical. In the eyes of this old monk, Martial Arts are just a means for the Buddha's Vajra to protect the Dharma, to truly save all beings, we need the subtle Dharma and compassion.
context: 敝寺武学宏大驳杂，被世人讹传神乎其技。在老衲眼中，武学只是佛门金刚护法卫道的手段，真正普渡众生尚需精妙佛法以及仁心慈悲。

original: Our Scripture Tower collects hundreds of thousands of archives of classics, history, and collections. As the saying goes, reading is beneficial. There was a peerless high monk in our temple who studied in the Scripture Tower for more than ten years, and finally stepped out of the tower, achieving the Buddha's golden body in one step!
context: 敝寺藏经楼收藏经史子集各类典籍数十万卷，所谓开卷有益，敝寺曾有一位绝代高僧在藏经楼观经十数载，最后一步踏出经楼，一步成就佛陀金身！

original: Buddhism and Passives should not be lightly passed on, nor lightly taken. Only by becoming a disciple of Shifa Temple and gaining recognition can one have the chance to comprehend the subtle Dharma and receive profound Martial Arts.
context: 佛法、武道不可轻传，亦不可轻取，只有成为释法寺弟子，获得认可之后，方才有缘领悟精妙佛法、收受高深武学。

original: Is there anything else you want to know, donor?
context: 请问施主还有什么想要知道的吗？

original: Our temple's martial arts are numerous and not worth mentioning, only the Vairocana Godly Palm is said to be directly passed down from the Buddha. If used by a person with a compassionate heart, every move carries the majesty of the Buddha himself!
context: 敝寺掌法繁多不值一提，唯有如来神掌相传为佛祖亲传，若是心怀慈悲之人施展开来，举手投足皆有佛陀亲临世间的威严！

original: Although the Dharma Stick Technique, which is on par with the Vairocana Godly Palm, is named after our ancestors by later generations, it does not disgrace the achievements and reputation of our predecessors in the Passive. It can at least rank in the top three among all stick techniques in the world.
context: 与如来神掌齐名的达摩棍法虽为后辈附会先人之名，但是半点不会辱没前辈高僧在武道上的成就威名，在天下诸般棍法中至少也能名列前三甲。

original: The internal skills of our temple mainly focus on refining the mind and training the Constitution, all of which are Pure Yang Skills. They are not sufficient for attacking enemies, but more than enough for self-defense.
context: 敝寺内功心法以磨练心性、锻炼体魄为主，俱是纯阳功法，伤敌不足，自保有余。

original: Is there anything else you want to know, donor?
context: 请问施主还有什么想要知道的吗？

original: Benefactor, you have a compassionate and benevolent heart. I am willing to lend you a helping hand.
context: 施主慈悲心怀，仁心仁德，老衲愿助施主一臂之力。

original: Half a shichen later...
context: 半个时辰后……

original: Buddha saves those who are destined. As long as you have good intentions, you can become a disciple of the Buddhist sect...
context: 佛度有缘人，只要心存善念，都可成为释门弟子……

original: Benefactor, as you are currently a disciple of another sect, I cannot accept you on my own accord. Please forgive me.
context: 施主如今身为其他门派弟子，老衲无法自作主张接受施主，还请施主见谅。

original: Do you have any other matters, benefactor?
context: 请问施主还有其他事情吗？

original: Your Benevolence is lacking, benefactor. You need to do more good deeds to accumulate Benevolence before you can hope to be accepted by the Shifa Temple.
context: 施主仁德有亏，还需多行善事积累仁德，才能有望被释法寺接纳。

original: Do you have any other matters, benefactor?
context: 请问施主还有其他事情吗？

original: There are two ways to practice in Shifa Temple: <color=#c44b0e>becoming a monk</color> and <color=#c44b0e>lay practice</color>. Which one do you choose?
context: 拜入释法寺修行有<color=#c44b0e>出家</color>、<color=#c44b0e>俗家</color>两种，你可愿选哪一种？

original: Request<color=#097a76>the difference</color> between <color=#097a76>becoming a monk</color> and <color=#097a76>lay practice</color>.
context: 请教<color=#097a76>出家</color>和<color=#097a76>俗家</color>的区别。

original: Choose<color=#097a76>to become a monk</color>!
context: 选择<color=#097a76>出家</color>！

original: Choose<color=#097a76>lay practice</color>!
context: 选择<color=#097a76>俗家</color>！

original: I haven't decided yet.
context: 还没考虑好。

original: Amitabha, practicing in the temple is not a child's play, you should indeed think it over carefully.
context: 阿弥陀佛，入寺修行非同儿戏，确实要深思熟虑才行。

original: Becoming a monk means officially taking the vows and becoming a true monk of Shifa Temple. You need to abide by the rules and precepts, the most important of which is <color=#c44b0e>to cut off worldly attachments, practice alone in the temple, and not leave the temple without permission</color>.
context: 所谓出家修行，就是正式剃度，成为释法寺名符其实的僧人，需要遵守清规戒律，其中最为重要的是<color=#c44b0e>断绝世俗之情独身入寺修行、未经许可不得随意出寺</color>。

original: Lay practice also requires you to uphold kindness and do good deeds, but you don't need to take the vows or abandon worldly life, and you are free to come and go without restrictions.
context: 俗家修行同样要秉承善心多做善事，只是无需剃度，无需抛弃世俗生活，更是来去自由无所限制。

original: Monks of Shifa Temple can directly enter the Scripture Tower to comprehend the Dharma; lay practitioners need to pass a test to enter.
context: 出家修行的释法寺弟子，可以直接进入藏经楼参悟佛法；俗家弟子需要经过考验方能入内。

original: Although monks are strictly bound by the precepts, as long as they abide by them, they will benefit immensely. Lay practitioners are relatively free, but the conditions for obtaining profound Dharma and Martial Arts will be more stringent.
context: 出家弟子虽然受到戒律的严格约束，但是只要遵守戒律便会受益无穷。俗家弟子相对自由，但是获取高深佛法、武学的条件会更加苛刻。

original: Have you decided how you want to practice in the temple, benefactor?
context: 施主可想好以何种方式入寺修行了吗？

original: {PlayerSurName} Benefactor, can you abstain from alcohol for the rest of your life?
context: {PlayerSurName}施主，尽形寿，不饮酒，汝今能持否？

original: I can!
context: 能持！

original: I can't.
context: 不能持。

original: Can you abstain from stealing for the rest of your life?
context: 尽形寿，不偷盗，汝今能持否？

original: Can you abstain from lust for the rest of your life?
context: 尽形寿，不淫欲，汝今能持否？

original: Can you abstain from killing for the rest of your life?
context: 尽形寿，不杀生，汝今能持否？

original: If someone tries to harm me, should I defend myself? Unintentional injuries or deaths may occur in a fight, does this count as breaking the precepts?
context:
倘若有强人图谋害命，弟子是否要出手自保？
拳脚无眼难免会造成死伤，这种算不算破戒？

original: Enough talk, just answer yes or no!
context: 休要多言，只回答能与不能！

original: {PlayerSurName} Benefactor, your six senses are not yet pure, it is indeed not suitable for you to become a monk now.
context: {PlayerSurName}施主六根未净，如今确实不宜出家。

original: Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} benefactor, you should go and deal with worldly matters first, there's no rush to become a monk.
context: 阿弥陀佛，{PlayerSurName}施主且去处理俗事吧，出家之事不急于一时。

original: {PlayerName}, if you insist on becoming a monk, I will choose to run away, as if you never existed, and our friendship will be severed from then on!
context: {PlayerName}，你如果执意出家，我会选择离开，只当你这个人从未存在过，从此你我情谊一刀两断！

original: Still insist on becoming a monk!
context: 仍然坚持出家！

original: Give up becoming a monk.
context: 放弃出家。

original: {PlayerSurName} Benefactor, your six senses are not yet pure, it is indeed not suitable for you to become a monk now.
context: {PlayerSurName}施主六根未净，如今确实不宜出家。

original: Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} benefactor, you should go and deal with worldly matters first, there's no rush to become a monk.
context: 阿弥陀佛，{PlayerSurName}施主且去处理俗事吧，出家之事不急于一时。

original:
Good, good.
{PlayerSurName}, you and I are destined, I will personally shave your head!
context:
善哉，善哉。
{PlayerSurName}施主，你与老衲有缘，老衲便为你亲自剃度！

original: Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
context: 多谢大师成全。

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original:
{PlayerName}, the worldly affairs are now irrelevant to you.
According to the order of Pu, Hui, Hua, and Shi, you are now in the Shi generation, and I give you the Dharma name <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color>, which means to give up your original name.
context:
{PlayerName}，红尘往事如今以与你无关。
按照普、慧、华、释的辈分排列，如今你排在释字辈，赐你法号<color=#c44b0e>释名</color>，意为放弃原本名讳。

original: You can go to the Training field to request martial arts from your second senior brother Shi Yu; go to the Scripture Tower guarded by your master Hua Yan to read the Archive.
context: 平时你可去练功场找你二师兄释愚请教武学；去你师伯华严看守的藏经楼阅读典籍。

original: You must not leave the temple at will, if you want to leave the temple, you must pass my test.
context: 平时不得随意离寺，如要出寺需得通过老衲考验方能外出。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Every day at Chen Shi, you must attend the morning class at the Hall of Great Strength, remember not to interrupt!</color>
context: <color=#c44b0e>每日辰时需到大雄宝殿上早课，切记不可间断！</color>

original: As a disciple of Shifa Temple, you must not do anything against benevolence, otherwise, if discovered by the law enforcement disciples, you will be severely punished according to the temple rules!
context: 身为释法寺弟子，不得做出任何有违仁德之事，否则被执法弟子发现，将按依照寺规严惩！

original: Disciple will remember the abbot's teachings.
context: 弟子谨记住持教诲。

original: {PlayerName}, according to the order of Pu, Hui, Hua, and Shi, you are now in the Shi generation, and I give you the Dharma name <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color>, which means to give up your original name. From now on, all the same generation disciples in Shifa Temple are your senior brothers, and you must not lose your manners.
context: {PlayerName}，按照普、慧、华、释的辈分排列，如今你排在释字辈，赐你法号<color=#c44b0e>释名</color>，意为放弃原本名讳，此后在释法寺内看到的释字辈同门都是你的师兄，切不可失了礼数。

original: You can go to the Training field to request martial arts from your second senior brother Shi Yu; go to the Scripture Tower guarded by your master Hua Yan to read the Archive, but you need to pass his test.
context: 平时你可去练功场找你二师兄释愚请教武学；去你师伯华严看守的藏经楼阅读典籍，前提是需要通过他的考验。

original: You can choose whether to attend the morning class at the Hall of Great Strength every day, there is no requirement for secular disciples.
context: 每日在大雄宝殿的早课可上可不上，对俗家弟子没有要求。

original: Although secular disciples do not have to be bound by too many precepts, it is the duty of Buddhist disciples to do good deeds, so do not do anything against heaven and reason, otherwise, you will be severely punished!
context: 身为俗家弟子虽不必受过多戒律约束，但是行善积德是佛门弟子的本分，切勿做出伤天害理之事，否则一样严惩不贷！

original: Disciple will remember the abbot's teachings.
context: 弟子谨记住持教诲。

original: Thank you, master, for your blessing.
context: 多谢大师赐福。

original: Is there anything else you need, donor?
context: 请问施主还有什么事情吗？

original: Amitabha!
context: 阿弥陀佛！

original: As the saying goes, every cause has an effect! {PlayerSurName}, since you chose to run away from Buddhism, why bother trying again?
context: 所谓有因必有果！{PlayerSurName}施主既然选择了离开佛门，又何苦再次尝试呢？

original: (She casually plucks the strings of the zither, the cold tune seems to tell you that if you insist on becoming a monk, she will run away from you, and your friendship with her will be severed.)
context: （随手拨弄琴弦，凄冷的音调仿佛在告诉你，若你执意出家，她便会离开你，你和她的情谊也将一刀两断。）

original: If you can't let go of worldly thoughts, it's better not to become a monk to avoid the trouble of returning to secular life later.
context: 你若是无法摒弃俗念，洒家劝你还是不要出家的好，免得将来还要还俗，更麻烦。

original: Kid, if you choose to become a monk, it will be like being in prison for a long time. You will have no connection with the outside world. Think it over!
context: 小子，你只要选择出家，很长一段时间将与坐牢无异，外面的花花世界再也与你无缘，你可要想清楚！

original:
Please stop, donor.
This is where the monks of our temple rest, it is not convenient for outsiders to enter, please understand.
context:
请施主止步。
此处是本寺僧众休息之处，不便外人入内，还请见谅。

original: Amitabha!
context: 阿弥陀佛！

original: Donor, please stop!
context: 施主，请留步！

original: This is a key area of our temple, non-disciples are not allowed to enter without permission!
context: 此处乃敝寺重地，非本寺弟子不得擅入！

original: Secular disciples of our sect are not allowed to enter the Scripture Tower without permission!
context: 本门俗家弟子未经许可，不得擅入藏经楼！

original: Entering the Scripture Tower as a secular disciple requires a deduction of 100 Sect contributions.
context: 俗家弟子进入藏经楼需要扣除100门派贡献。

original: Enter (100 Sect contributions)
context: 进入（100门派贡献）

original: Wait a bit longer
context: 再等等

original: Amitabha!
context: 阿弥陀佛！

original: Amitabha!
context: 阿弥陀佛！

original: Scripture Tower
context: 藏经楼

original: Enter the tower
context: 进楼

original: Secular disciples who want to enter the Scripture Tower need to read the "Temple Rules" and reach a Trust relationship with Shifa Temple.
context: 俗家弟子想要进入藏经楼，需要研读完《释门戒律》，并且与释法寺关系达到信赖。

original: Master Hua Yan, I want to request a way to enter the Scripture Tower.
context: 华严师伯，师侄想向您请教进入藏经楼的办法。

original: When you <color=#c44b0e>finish reading the "Temple Rules" and reach a Trust relationship with our temple</color>, I will allow you to enter the Scripture Tower.
context: 等你<color=#c44b0e>研读完《释门戒律》，并且与本寺关系达到信赖</color>，老衲便允许你进入藏经楼。

original: Lay disciples need to <color=#c44b0e>consume 100 points of Sect contribution</color> each time they enter the Scripture Tower. Therefore, if you want to visit the Scripture Tower frequently, you need to work diligently.
context: 俗家弟子进入藏经楼每次需要<color=#c44b0e>消耗100点门派贡献</color>，因此若想常来藏经楼，还需勤勉做事才行。

original: Thank you for the information, master.
context: 多谢师伯告知。

original: You now meet the conditions to enter the Scripture Tower. You can enter the tower to read scriptures as long as you prepare the corresponding contributions each time.
context: 你如今已符合进入藏经楼的条件，每次进楼前准备好相应贡献即可入楼观经了。

original: After you <color=#c44b0e>have studied the "Temple rules" and your Relations with this temple reach Trust</color>, I will allow you to enter the Scripture Tower.
context: 等你<color=#c44b0e>研读完《释门戒律》，并且与本寺关系达到信赖</color>，老衲才会允许你进入藏经楼。

original: It seems that you can directly leap into the second or third floor of the Scripture Tower by using Qinggong from here!
context: 从这里施展轻功似乎可以直接跃进藏经楼二层、三层！

original: Should I enter the Scripture Tower in this way? If the disciples in the tower find out, it won't be a joke.
context: 我是否要用这种方式进入藏经楼呢，被楼内弟子发现可不是闹着玩的。

original: Leap into the second floor of the Scripture Tower. <color=#097a76>Requires Qinggong 180</color>
context: 跃进藏经楼二层。<color=#097a76>需轻功180</color>

original: Leap into the third floor of the Scripture Tower. <color=#097a76>Requires Qinggong 300</color>
context: 跃进藏经楼三层。<color=#097a76>需轻功300</color>

original: I don't plan to try.
context: 不打算尝试。

original: Oh no...
context: 哎呀……

original: My skills are still not good enough.
context: 功夫还是不到家啊

original: Return to secular life
context: 还俗

original: As a Buddhist disciple, how dare you talk about returning to secular life lightly?
context: 你身为释门出家弟子，怎敢轻言还俗？

original: If you return to secular life, it is equivalent to completely ruining the opportunity to seek truth and prove the fruit. The past merits will be lost in one day. Don't do foolish things!
context: 你若还俗，无异于彻底断送了求真证果的机缘，往日功果一朝尽丧，你不要做糊涂事！

original: Moreover, for a monk to return to secular life, he needs to go to the <color=#c44b0e>Arhat Hall</color> alone to break through the golden body bronze man array. This is a temple rule set a hundred years ago and cannot be compromised.
context: 况且出家弟子还俗需要独自前往<color=#c44b0e>罗汉堂</color>闯过金身铜人阵，这是百年前定下的寺规，无可通融。

original: Amitabha, you have indeed broken through the bronze man array. It seems that your determination to return to secular life is quite firm. There is no need for me to retain you.
context: 阿弥陀佛，你果然闯过了铜人阵，看来还俗的信念已颇为坚定，老衲也没有再做挽留的必要了。

original: I am unable to focus on my Buddhist practices due to unresolved mundane matters, I hope the master can understand.
context: 晚辈俗事未了实在无法静心礼佛，还请大师见谅。

original: Amitabha, you are after all a person of the martial world, and the affairs of the martial world are the most difficult to resolve. I understand your predicament.
context: 阿弥陀佛，施主毕竟是江湖中人，江湖事最难了，老衲明白施主难处。

original: Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
context: 多谢大师成全。

original: {PlayerSurName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple, you can recover your original appearance.
context: {PlayerSurName}施主，今日起你不再是释法寺弟子，可以恢复本来面目了。

original: Your hair has not yet fully grown back since you returned to secular life, and your appearance is slightly unseemly. I have a <color=#c44b0e>hair headgear</color> here, you can wear it to make up for it.
context: 施主还俗头发还未长成，形象稍有不雅，老衲这里有一件<color=#c44b0e>带发头套</color>，你带在头上稍作弥补。

original: The master is always thoughtful.
context: 还是大师想的周到。

original: Disciples of this temple who wish to return to secular life must pass through the Golden Body Bronze Man formation alone. If you are ready, you can challenge the formation at any time.
context: 本寺出家弟子还俗需要独自闯过金身铜人阵，你若准备好了，随时可来闯阵。

original: Challenge the formation!
context: 闯阵！

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original: Wait until you have the skill to pass through the Bronze Man formation, then consider returning to secular life.
context: 等你有能力闯过铜人阵，再考虑还俗事情吧。

original: You have passed the test of the Bronze Man Formation, now you can go to Abbot Hui Yuan to apply for secularization.
context: 你已通过铜人阵的考验，现在可以找慧元住持申请还俗了。

original: Those who practice should never give up halfway. Although you are a secular disciple, I can't bear to see your past achievements lost overnight.
context: 修行之人最忌半途而废，你虽是俗家弟子，老衲也不忍心见你往日功果一朝尽丧。

original: Already decided! <color=#c44b0e>(Buddha prayer beads×1)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#c44b0e>（菩提佛珠×1）</color>

original: I'll think about it.
context: 再考虑下。

original: To realize one's mistakes and correct them, there is no greater virtue.
context: 迷途知返，善莫大焉。

original:
Since you insist on this, it's not appropriate for this old monk to force you.
Everyone has their own fate, all the events today are the result of karma.
context:
既然你执意如此，老衲也不便强人所难。
各人有各人缘法，今日种种皆是因果造化。

original: {PlayerSurName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple.
context: {PlayerSurName}施主，今日起你就不再是释法寺弟子了。

original: Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
context: 多谢大师成全。

original: {PlayerName}, as a lay disciple of Shifa Temple, although you are not bound by the Defender's rules and precepts, you will still be punished for your wrongdoings!
context: {PlayerName}，你身为释法寺俗家弟子，虽然不必坚守清规戒律，但是为非作歹，一样要受到惩罚！

original: May I ask, senior brother, what mistake have I made to deserve punishment?
context: 请问师兄，我犯了什么过错，要接受什么惩罚？

original: Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
context: 你德行不佳、品行有亏……

original: Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
context: 你行为不检，多行不仁之事……

original: You are now full of malice, with no compassion in your eyes...
context: 你如今满身戾气，眼中毫无慈悲之心……

original: You are at odds with your fellow disciples, causing many disputes...
context: 与同门不睦，多生嫌隙……

original: You harm your fellow disciples, showing no restraint...
context: 同门相伤，下手毫无分寸……

original: You harm your fellow disciples, showing no regard for the bond between you!
context: 戕害同门，丝毫不念同门之谊！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>five times</color> as punishment!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在悔过静室禁足，抄写<color=#c44b0e>五份</color>释门戒律！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>fifteen times</color> as punishment!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在悔过静室禁足，抄写<color=#c44b0e>十五份</color>释门戒律！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>thirty times</color> as punishment!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在悔过静室禁足，抄写<color=#c44b0e>三十份</color>释门戒律！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>fifty times</color> as punishment!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在悔过静室禁足，抄写<color=#c44b0e>五十份</color>释门戒律！

original: Accept the punishment.
context: 接受惩罚。

original: Refuse to accept the punishment! <color=#097a76>(Start a fight directly)</color>
context: 拒不认罚！<color=#097a76>（直接开战）</color>

original: Amitabha, junior brother, please follow me.
context: 阿弥陀佛，师弟请随我来。

original: {PlayerName}, you will stay here to copy the precepts. You can only run away when you finish.
context: {PlayerName}，你就在这里抄写戒律，何时完成，何时才能离开。

original: For violating the temple rules and resisting punishment, the secular disciple will be caned fifty times and expelled from the temple!
context: 触犯寺规，抗拒惩戒，俗家弟子杖责五十逐出本寺！

original: {PlayerName}, are you really determined to sever ties with Shifa Temple so completely?
context: {PlayerName}，你非要与释法寺决裂的如此彻底吗？

original: The world is so vast, I refuse to believe there's no place for me. I don't even take a mere Shifa Temple seriously.
context: 江湖那么大，我就不信没有我容身之地，区区一个释法寺我还不看在眼里。

original: {PlayerName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a secular disciple of Shifa Temple. Don't blame the temple for not reminiscing about the past with you. Take care of yourself!
context: {PlayerName}，从今日起你已不是释法寺俗家弟子，莫怪本寺上下与你不念旧情，望你好自为之！

original:
You are no longer worthy of being a disciple of this temple, your secular disciple status is revoked from today!
From now on, Shifa Temple will sever all ties with you, and there will be no more entanglements!
context:
你已不配再做本寺弟子，即日起取消你的俗家弟子身份！
释法寺与你从今往后一刀两断，再无任何瓜葛！

original: Hey, as a disciple of Shifa Temple, you must strictly observe the rules and precepts. Now that you have broken the precepts, you can't escape punishment!
context: 呔，你身为释法寺出家弟子，需严守清规戒律，如今背律破戒，罪罚难逃！

original: May I ask, senior brother, what mistake have I made to deserve punishment?
context: 请问师兄，我犯了什么过错，要接受什么惩罚？

original: Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
context: 你德行不佳、品行有亏……

original: Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
context: 你行为不检，多行不仁之事……

original: You are now full of malice, with no compassion in your eyes...
context: 你如今满身戾气，眼中毫无慈悲之心……

original: You are at odds with your fellow disciples, causing many disputes...
context: 与同门不睦，多生嫌隙……

original: You harm your fellow disciples, showing no restraint...
context: 同门相伤，下手毫无分寸……

original: You harm your fellow disciples, showing no regard for the bond between you!
context: 戕害同门，丝毫不念同门之谊！

original: Leaving the temple without permission!
context: 未经许可，擅自离寺！

original: As a monk, you are traveling with a woman, what a disgrace!
context: 身为出家人，竟然与女眷一路同行，成何体统！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>five times</color> as punishment!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在悔过静室禁足，抄写<color=#c44b0e>五份</color>释门戒律！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>fifteen times</color> as punishment!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在悔过静室禁足，抄写<color=#c44b0e>十五份</color>释门戒律！

original: Amitabha, junior brother, please follow me.
context: 阿弥陀佛，师弟请随我来。

original: {PlayerName}, you will stay here to copy the precepts. You can only run away when you finish.
context: {PlayerName}，你就在这里抄写戒律，何时完成，何时才能离开。

original: Violating the temple rules, resisting punishment, the monk will be punished with a hundred sticks and expelled from the temple!
context: 触犯寺规，抗拒惩戒，出家弟子杖责一百逐出本寺！

original: {PlayerName}, are you really determined to sever ties with Shifa Temple so completely?
context: {PlayerName}，你非要与释法寺决裂的如此彻底吗？

original: The world is so vast, I refuse to believe there's no place for me. I don't even take a mere Shifa Temple seriously.
context: 江湖那么大，我就不信没有我容身之地，区区一个释法寺我还不看在眼里。

original: {PlayerName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple. Don't blame the temple for not reminiscing about the past with you. Take care of yourself!

original: Wait a bit longer
context: 再等一等

original:
The punishment is over, you can run away now.
Although writing the precepts can help you get rid of your anger and calm your mind, I don't want to bring you here for punishment again!
context:
本次惩罚已毕，你可以离开了。
罚写戒律虽然可以助你消磨戾气、平和心境，但是我不希望再带你来这里受罚！

original: You have been studying Buddhist scriptures for many years, and your understanding of Buddhism is increasing day by day.
context: 你长年累月研读佛门经典，对佛法感悟与日俱增。

original: No one knows how far your Buddhist cultivation has reached.
context: 已经没人知道你的佛法修为究竟到了何种地步。

original: At this moment, you are dignified and solemn,
context: 此时此刻的你，宝相庄严，神情肃穆，

original: There seems to be a faint glow flowing around you, like pearls and gems, naturally shining.
context: 周身上下隐隐似有宝光流动，便如明珠宝玉，自然生辉。

original: Please stop, benefactor!
context: 施主留步！

original: This place is not open to the public, please go back, benefactor.
context: 此处不对外开放，施主请回。

original: Junior brother, stop!
context: 师弟留步！

original: Junior brother, you are not allowed to enter the Arhat Hall without permission.
context: 师弟尚未获得允许，不得擅入罗汉堂。

original: Junior brother, to enter the Arhat Hall, you need to find the second senior brother to pass the Arhat formation and get permission to enter.
context: 师弟要进罗汉堂，需要找二师兄闯过罗汉阵，获得允许方可入内。

original: Junior brother, don't be careless when you first enter the Arhat Hall, the power of the Bronze Man formation is far superior to the Arhat formation.
context: 师弟初进罗汉堂切莫托大，铜人阵威力远胜罗汉阵。

original: Thank you for your advice, senior brother. I appreciate your kindness.
context: 多谢师兄告知，好意心领了。

original: Please stop, benefactor!
context: 施主留步！

original: This place is not open to the public, please go back, benefactor.
context: 此处不对外开放，施主请回。

original: Gatekeeper, {PlayerSurName} is here to help me break through the formation, if you obstruct him, you know the consequences.
context: 守门的，{PlayerSurName}施主是帮我闯阵而来，你们若是横加拦阻，后果会怎样不用我多说吧。

original: Please come in...
context: 施主请进……

original: Junior brother, stop!
context: 师弟留步！

original: Junior brother, you are not allowed to enter the Arhat Hall without permission.
context: 师弟尚未获得允许，不得擅入罗汉堂。

original: Gatekeeper, this junior brother is here to help me break through the formation, if you obstruct him, you know the consequences.
context: 守门的，你们这位小师弟可是帮我闯阵而来，你们若是横加拦阻，后果会怎样不用我多说吧。

original: Junior brother, please come in...
context: 师弟请进……

original: Read other Scriptures.
context: 阅读其他经书。

original: Get up and run away.
context: 起身离开。

original: Well, well.
context: 善哉，善哉。

original: Now that you have realized the superior Buddhism, I will give you a brocade robe to help you save all beings and achieve enlightenment as soon as possible.
context: 如今你既已悟到上乘佛法，老衲赠你锦襕袈裟，助你普渡世人，早日修成正果。

original: This is, this is...
context: 这是，这是……

original: Lipo Lipo Di, Qiuhe Qiuhe Di, Tuoluoni Di, Nihe Luo Di, Pilini Di, Maha Jia Di, Zhen Ling Qian Di, Sopo He...
context: 离婆离婆帝，求诃求诃帝，陀罗尼帝，尼诃啰帝，毗黎你帝，摩诃伽帝，真陵乾帝，娑婆诃……

original: {yell}Seven Buddha Punishment Word!
context: {yell}七佛灭罪真言！

original: I didn't expect that the real words of the Buddhist legend were hidden in a few Buddhist scriptures.
context: 想不到传说中的释门真言竟然隐藏在几本佛经当中。

original: You really make me worry, don't expect me to bring you food and drink if you get locked up in such a broken place again.
context: 你小子可真不叫人省心，下次再被关到这种破地方，可别指望贫僧再送吃送喝。

original: I secretly roasted a chicken here when I was a monk. Can you still smell the lingering scent?
context: 贫僧当年可是在这里偷偷做过烤鸡的，你闻闻还能嗅到当年的余香吗？

original: I know you don't have a habit of drinking, so I asked you to accompany me for a few drinks. So you won't be lonely, and I can have a quiet place to drink.
context: 贫僧知道你没有喝酒的癖好，索性找你来陪贫僧喝几杯。一来你不会寂寞，二来贫僧可以有个清净地方安心饮酒。

original:
It's okay to make small mistakes, who hasn't been a regular here after staying in the temple for more than a decade?
I picked a few radishes on the way here to change your taste.
context:
犯点小错不打紧，在寺里呆上十几年谁还不是这里常客？
来这的路上顺手拔了几根萝卜，带过来给你换换口味。

original:
If you can't copy it yourself, why don't you think of asking for help!
You're so stupid, you might as well kill yourself with this piece of Tofu.
context:
自己抄不过来，不会想着找人帮忙吗！
像你笨成这样，不如用这块豆腐撞死自己吧。

original:
Today is a rare leisure day, I came to see how embarrassed you are when you are punished to copy books.
Alas, it's disappointing, you're still so lively, this medicine is taken for nothing.
context:
今天难得清闲，特意看看师弟你被罚抄书的糗样子。
唉，真扫兴，还是这么活蹦乱跳的，这伤药算是白拿了。

original:
Why were you punished this time, tell your senior brother, let me be happy.
Don't be so stingy, at worst I'll give you a Novel to relieve your boredom, even though you can't read it.
context:
你这次是为何被罚，快跟师兄说说，让师兄高兴高兴。
别那么小气嘛，大不了送你本小说解闷，虽然你也看不进去。

original: An old lady pitied me for being too young and kindly gave me a few Chicken eggs. I brought a few, you can try to hatch them into chicks.
context: 有位老婆婆施主可怜我年龄太小，发善心布施给我几枚鸡蛋，我带来几枚，你可以试试能否孵化出来小鸡仔。

original: Considering the hard work of your senior brother, if one day I'm unlucky and get grounded, you have to bring things to see me, these are just stored here in advance.
context: 看在师兄不辞辛苦的份上，要是哪天师兄倒霉被禁了足，你可要带着东西来看我呀，这些就当是先寄存在你这的。

original:
Junior brother, you look a little pale, haven't you been resting well these days?
I'm a prophet, I specially brought you a sleep aid, count it hundreds of times every day, I don't believe you won't be sleepy.
context:
师弟，你脸色怎么不太好，这几天没有好好休息吗？
师兄我可是料事如神，特意给你带了助眠神物，每天数上成百上千遍，不信你不犯困。

original: Eat it if you're hungry.
context: 要是饿了就吃了它。

original: You are being punished here, but your martial arts must not be neglected.
context: 你在这里受罚，武艺不可荒废。

original: If you dare to violate the temple rules again, I won't be soft on you!
context: 以后再敢触犯寺规，我不会对你手软！

original: Only this time, it won't happen again!
context: 仅此一次，下不为例！

original: If you can't remember the precepts, read them a few more times!
context: 要是记不住戒律，就再多读几遍！

original: You are not yet allowed to view this Scripture, please leave quickly!
context: 你尚未获得允许浏览此处经书，请速速离去！

original: {yell}Which thief dares to steal the scripture here!
context: {yell}何方贼人胆敢来此盗经！

original: If you dare to act like a rat in the scripture repository again, be careful of my fists and feet, they might hurt your life!
context: 再敢来藏经阁行鼠辈之事，当心拳脚无眼，伤你性命！

original: I dare not, I will never dare again.
context: 不敢了，再也不敢了。

original: Without the annoying guy, let me look carefully for any unique martial arts Manual.
context: 少了碍事的家伙，让我仔细找找有没有绝世武功秘籍之类的。

original: Thanks to my fast running, otherwise I would have died here.
context: 多亏跑得快，要不然就交代在这里了。

original: Huff... Huff...
(The Scriptures in this cabinet are in a mess, I don't know if there are any good things, do you want to search for them?)
context: （这柜中经书杂乱无章，不知道有没有好东西，是否要翻看寻找呢？）

original: Search the bookcase. <color=#097a76>(Consume 4 Ke)</color>
context: 翻看书柜。<color=#097a76>（消耗4刻）</color>

original: Not interested.
context: 没有兴趣。

original: Half a shichen later...
context: 半个时辰后……

original: This, this is the Prajna Palm Manual!!!
context: 这，这是般若掌秘籍！！！

original: This, this is the Evil Destroyer Diamond Staff Manual!!!
context: 这，这是金刚降魔杵秘籍！！！

original:
"Little guy, there's good stuff hidden in this cabinet, you need to work hard~"
"......Lai Toudian was here"
context:
“小家伙，这柜子里藏着好东西，你要努力呦~”
“……癞头癫 到此一游”

original: "Greedy little one, everything here has been taken, if you don't mind wasting time, feel free to continue"
context: “贪心的小家伙，这里的东西已经被掏空了，要是不嫌浪费时间，就尽管继续吧”

original: Wasted time for nothing, didn't find anything useful.
context: 白白花费了时间，竟然没找到什么有用的东西。

original:
Could it be this Manual that the junior brother is looking for?
I've been engrossed in it these past few days and forgot to put it back in the bookcase, please forgive me.
context:
师弟在找的莫不是这本秘籍？
这几日我沉迷其中，忘记放回书柜，还望见谅。

original:
Could it be this Manual that the junior brother is looking for?
I've been engrossed in it these past few days and forgot to put it back in the bookcase, please forgive me.
context:
师弟在找的莫不是这本秘籍？
这几日我沉迷其中，忘记放回书柜，还望见谅。

original: Teaching
context: 授艺

original: You can choose one of these two basic external skill Manuals to learn on your own.
context: 这两本入门外功秘籍可任选一门，拿去自行修炼。

original: Choose <color=#c44b0e>Arhat Fist Manual</color>.
context: 选择 <color=#c44b0e>罗汉拳秘籍</color>。

original: Choose <color=#c44b0e>Veda Staff Manual</color>.
context: 选择 <color=#c44b0e>韦陀杖法秘籍</color>。

original: To learn the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Palm</color>, you must practice Arhat Fist to the eighth level at least!
context: 学习进阶武功 <color=#c44b0e>菩提掌</color>，至少修习罗汉拳至第八重！

original: This is the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Palm</color> Manual, cultivation depends on the individual, do not neglect your martial arts.
context: 这是进阶武功 <color=#c44b0e>菩提掌</color>秘籍，修行全在个人，不要荒废武功。

original: To learn the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten Staff</color>, you must practice Veda Staff to the eighth level at least!
context: 学习进阶武功 <color=#c44b0e>普渡杖法</color>，至少修习韦陀杖法至第八重！

original: This is the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten Staff</color> Manual, cultivation depends on the individual, do not neglect your martial arts.
context: 这是进阶武功 <color=#c44b0e>普渡杖法</color>秘籍，修行全在个人，不要荒废武功。

original: Teaching
context: 授艺

original:
Shifa Temple's internal strength is known for its defense, which can offset some damage in battle.
This is the basic internal strength Manual of our temple, whether to learn or not depends on your personal Passive choice.
context:
释法寺内功以防御见长，可在战斗中抵消部分伤害。
这是本寺的基础内功秘籍，至于修炼与否全看你个人武道的选择了。

original: I have a second-class internal strength Manual called "Forging Golden Body", when your <color=#c44b0e>Buddhist comprehension reaches 70</color>, I will teach it to you.
context: 老衲有一本名为《横练金身》的乙品内功秘籍，等你 <color=#c44b0e>佛法感悟达到70</color>，便会传授给你。

original: Your current Buddhist comprehension is only <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, which does not meet my requirements.
context: 如今你的佛法感悟仅为<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，还未达到老衲的要求。

original: Your Buddhist comprehension has now met my requirements, this "Forging Golden Body" internal strength Manual is now yours.
context: 如今你的佛法感悟已达到老衲要求，这本《横练金身》的内功秘籍现在是你的了。

original: What a big bell hammer! But it's better not to touch it...
context: 好大的钟锤！不过还是不要乱动为好……

original: Morning Bell
context: 晨钟

original: Morning Bell
context: 晨钟

original:
Responsible for ringing the Big bell at Mao Shi every day in Shifa Temple.
Has rung the bell for {TagNum:释法寺敲钟} days.
context:
负责释法寺每天卯时敲响梵钟。
已敲钟 {TagNum:释法寺敲钟} 天。

original: Inform the eldest senior brother that the morning bell has been rung ten times.
context: 告知大师兄完成十次晨钟。

original: Junior brother, according to the rules of our temple, newcomers must ring the morning bell ten times to truly become a part of Shifa Temple.
context: 小师弟，按照咱们寺里的规矩，寺里的新人都要完成十次清晨敲钟才算是真正成为释法寺一份子。

original: Starting from tomorrow, you will be responsible for the <color=#c44b0e>Mao Shi bell ringing</color> for the next few days.
context: 从明天开始，你就负责接下来几天的<color=#c44b0e>卯时敲钟</color>吧。

original: Just ring the bell at Mao Shi every day, once a day, ring it for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color> to complete the task.
context: 只需要每天卯时敲钟即可，每天敲一次，敲上<color=#c44b0e>十天</color>就完成任务了。

original: It's not Mao Shi yet, you can't ring the bell at will.
context: 现在还不是卯时，不能随便敲钟。

original: Do you want to start ringing the bell now? According to custom, it needs 108 times, which is a very exhausting task.
context: 现在是否开始敲钟？按照习俗需要108下，是件很耗费力气的事情。

original: Start ringing the bell. (<color=#c44b0e>Consume 25 Stamina, 1 shichen</color>)
context: 开始敲钟。（<color=#c44b0e>消耗25体力、1个时辰</color>）

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: The bell rings 108 times, the sound gradually fades...
context: 钟声敲响一百零八下，钟声渐止……

original: Finally completed the ten bell strikes, now I should be considered a true member of Shifa Temple.
context: 终于完成十次敲钟，现在应该算是释法寺真正一份子了吧。

original:
Good job, good job. You've been ringing the bell for your senior brother for ten days, he should reward you well.
Here's a copy of the "Heart Sutra" for you. As they say, reading is always beneficial. It's always good to read more scriptures in the temple.
context:
不错，不错，你帮师兄敲了十天钟，师兄要好好奖励你。
这本《多心经》赠送给你，所谓开卷有益，在寺里多读经书总没坏处。

original: Didn't you say that newcomers have to ring the bell ten times to officially join the Shifa Temple? Why do you say it's to help you ring the bell?
context: 你不是说新人都要完成十次敲钟才能算是正式加入释法寺吗，怎么说帮你敲钟？

original: Would you be willing to help me ring the bell if I didn't say that? Who can get up so early in the morning? Anyway, there are so many junior brothers, if they take turns to help me ring it, we can get through the year.
context: 不这样说你会心甘情愿帮我敲钟吗？大早上谁起得来，反正那么多师弟，轮流帮我敲一遍，这一年也就对付过去了。

original: Remember, you can only ring the bell at Mao Shi every day. It takes exactly one hundred and eight rings, which is very tiring. It's best to go after you've eaten.
context: 千万记住，只能每天卯时才能敲钟，敲钟需要不多不少正好一百零八下，很费力气，最好吃饱了再去。

original: Senior brother, I've finally finished ringing the bell ten times. I've done what I promised you...
context: 大师兄，这十次晨钟终于敲完了，我答应你的事情做到了……

original: I want to spar with the second senior brother. I hope you won't hesitate to teach me.
context: 我想要跟二师兄切磋一番，请师兄不吝赐教。

original: This time I'll spar with you using thirty percent of my strength. Be careful!
context: 我这次先用三成功力跟你过招，留神了！

original: Go ahead! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10, protagonist duels alone</color>)
context: 尽管出手吧！（<color=#c44b0e>需体力10，主角单挑</color>）

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: Normal, next time I'll use more strength in our match.
context: 差强人意，下次比试我会多用几分力气。

original: If you're lazy in your regular training, you won't have enough lives to lose when you really fight someone.
context: 平时练功偷懒，真到与人对决，你有十条命也不够丢的。

original: This time I'll spar with you using fifty percent of my strength. Be careful!
context: 我这次用五成功力跟你过招，留神了！

original: This time I'll spar with you using seventy percent of my strength. Be careful!
context: 我这次用七成功力跟你过招，留神了！

original: Your skills are now on par with mine. This time I'll respond with all my strength!
context: 你现在的本事与我已经不相上下，这次我会以全力应对！

original: Let's stop here. You've already surpassed me. I don't have much to teach you anymore.
context: 到此为止吧，你已经青出于蓝，师兄没什么可指点你的了。

original: Let's stop here. You've already surpassed me. I don't have much to teach you anymore. With your talent, if you can comprehend the martial arts in this manual, you will surely become even stronger, with unlimited potential.
context: 到此为止吧，你已经青出于蓝，师兄没什么可指点你的了。以你的资质若能参悟这本秘籍上面的武功，定会如虎添翼，成就不可限量。

original: Senior brother, you're talking a lot today. Aren't you usually very reserved?
context: 师兄你今天突然说话好多，平常不是惜言如金吗？

original: You're progressing rapidly in martial arts, and I'm far behind. I won't have many opportunities to guide you in your training in the future, and even fewer chances to talk to you. So I might as well say a few more words today.
context: 你学武进境神速，师兄已经远远不及，以后没什么机会再指导你练功了，跟你说话机会就更少了，不如今天借机多说几句。

original: Hehe, if senior brother feels lonely, junior brother is always willing to keep you company.
context: 嘿嘿，师兄寂寞的话，师弟随时乐意奉陪。

original: Go away, stop making noise. Who needs your company!
context: 去去去，少在这聒噪，谁稀罕你奉陪！

original: Practice
context: 练功

original: Don't rush when practicing. Now build a solid foundation on the wooden dummy, so you won't be restrained when you're in a real fight.
context: 练功不宜急于求成，现在木人桩身上打好基础，以后临阵实战才不会束手束脚。

original: How many wooden dummies are you planning to challenge this time?
context: 这次你打算挑战几个木人桩？

original: Challenge 1! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
context: 挑战1个！（<color=#c44b0e>需体力10</color>）

original: Challenge 3! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
context: 挑战3个！（<color=#c44b0e>需体力10</color>）

original: Challenge 5! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
context: 挑战5个！（<color=#c44b0e>需体力10</color>）

original: Challenge 10! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
context: 挑战10个！（<color=#c44b0e>需体力10</color>）

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original: Defeating one ordinary wooden dummy is nothing to brag about.
context: 打赢1个普通木人桩算不得什么本事。

original: If you can't even defeat a wooden dummy, will you still be alive when you meet a real person!
context: 连木人桩都打不赢，以后遇到真人你还有命吗！

original: Defeating a few ordinary wooden dummies is nothing to brag about.
context: 打赢几个普通木人桩算不得什么本事。

original: Defeating a few wooden dummies is nothing to brag about.
context: 打赢几个木人桩算不得什么本事。

original: These wooden dummies really need to be repaired. They can't even defeat a novice junior brother.
context: 这几个木人桩真该去修修了，连新入门的小师弟都打不赢。

original: Break through the formation
context: 闯阵

original: You must break through my Arhat formation alone to qualify to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Golden Body Bronze Man formation!
context: 孤身闯过我的罗汉阵，才能有资格进罗汉堂闯金身铜人阵！

original: Are you planning to challenge the Arhat Formation?
context: 是否打算闯罗汉阵了？

original: Prepare to challenge the Arhat Formation! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 20</color>)
context: 准备闯罗汉阵！（<color=#c44b0e>需体力20</color>）

original: Not ready yet.
context: 还没准备好。

original:
Breaking the formation is expected, there's nothing to be proud of.
The Golden Body Bronze Man Formation of Shifa Temple is the foundation of the temple, its Power is extraordinary, don't be complacent.
context:
破阵是预料之中，没什么值得骄傲的。
释法寺金身铜人阵是立寺根本，威力非同一般，切不可麻痹大意。

original: Hmph, you're not qualified to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Golden Body Bronze Man Formation yet!
context: 哼，现在的你还没资格进罗汉堂闯金身铜人阵！

original: Kitchen Helper
context: 帮厨

original:
Many new disciples have recently joined the temple, and the Kitchen is a bit overwhelmed.
I wonder if there's any kind-hearted junior brother willing to lend a hand.
context:
最近寺里来了很多新弟子，伙房有些忙不过来了。
不知道有哪位好心的师弟愿意来搭把手。

original: The Kitchen is running out of firewood. Could you please get me <color=#c44b0e>10 Branches</color> for cooking?
context: 伙房木柴不够了，劳烦师弟帮我弄来<color=#c44b0e>10根树枝</color>，用来烧火做饭。

original: There are plenty of trees to cut down in the forest behind the temple, they will Recovery over time, so don't worry if you can't find Branches for a while.
context: 寺后面树林里有不少可砍伐的树木，每隔一段时间便会恢复，一时找不起树枝不必着急。

original: Help Third Brother with his tasks.
context: 帮三师兄做事。

original: Maybe another day.
context: 改天再说吧。

original: Third Brother, here are the Branches you asked for.
context: 三师兄，你要的树枝都在这了。

original: Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
context: 多亏了师弟帮忙，今天已经没什么事情需师弟做了。

original: Did you forget what you were supposed to do?
context: 师弟忘了做什么吗？

original: I want to do something different.
context: 想换一件事情做。

original: I don't want to help today.
context: 今天不想帮忙了。

original: Understood.
context: 知道了。

original: Let me see what else needs to be done...
context: 那我来看看还有什么事情做……

original: Alright, I'll do it myself today.
context: 好吧，那今天我就自己来干吧。

original: We're running out of Mushrooms and Fungus for the vegetarian dishes, could you help me gather <color=#c44b0e>5 Fungus and 5 Mushrooms</color>?
context: 做素斋的香菇和木耳不够了，劳烦师弟帮我采来<color=#c44b0e>5份木耳、5份香菇</color>。

original: There are plenty of Mushrooms around the Pond and Forest Tower, and Fungus often grows on tree trunks. These two items will grow back over time, so don't worry about running out.
context: 池塘和塔林周围有不少香菇，木耳多长在树干上，这两样东西每隔一段时间就会自己长出来，所以不怕断了来源。

original: Third Brother, here are the Mushrooms and Fungus you asked for.
context: 三师兄，你要的香菇和木耳都在这了。

original: Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
context: 多亏了师弟帮忙，今天已经没什么事情需师弟做了。

original: Today we need to make hundreds of Steamed Buns, which will take a lot of effort and time,
context: 今天要赶工上百个馒头，需要花费不少力气和时间，

original: Help Third Brother with his tasks. (<color=#c44b0e>Consumes 1 shichen, requires Stamina 25</color>)
context: 帮三师兄做事。（<color=#c44b0e>消耗1个时辰、需体力25</color>）

original: Help Third Brother with his tasks. (<color=#c44b0e>Consumes 2 shichen, requires Stamina 50</color>)
context: 帮三师兄做事。（<color=#c44b0e>消耗2个时辰、需体力50</color>）

original: Maybe another day.
context: 改天再说吧。

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: I didn't expect your cooking skills to be so good, with your help we finished making the Steamed Buns in half the time.
context: 想不到你的厨艺还不赖，有你帮忙只用了一半的时间就把馒头都做好了。

original: Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
context: 多亏了师弟帮忙，今天已经没什么事情需师弟做了。

original: Two shichen later...
context: 两个时辰后……

original: Phew, finally done...
context: 呼，总算忙完了……

original: Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
context: 多亏了师弟帮忙，今天已经没什么事情需师弟做了。

original: It would be great if you could help in the kitchen tomorrow as well.
context: 明天师弟若是也能来帮厨那是最好不过。

original: Today I'll teach you some cooking skills, so you won't starve when you're out in the world.
context: 今天传授你些烹饪的技巧，将来行走江湖总不至于饿死。

original: Hehe, helping you in the kitchen will be easier in the future.
context: 嘿嘿，以后给师兄帮厨也会更省力些。

original: I should give you something in return. This cookbook is my masterpiece from when I was young, I'll give it to you today.
context:
礼尚往来，我这个师兄不能不没有表示。
这本菜谱是我年轻时的成名作，今天赠送给你。

original: Why don't you make me a dish to taste instead?
context: 师兄倒不如给我做一份现成的尝尝。

original: There are dozens of people who have booked ahead of you, and I can only make one dish a day at most, so wait if you can.
context: 排在你前面预约的有几十位，反正师兄的本事一天最多做一份，你要等得起就慢慢等吧。

original: I could make it myself in this time, who cares about your cooking.
context: 有这时间我自己都做出来了，谁还稀罕你做的。

original:
Little junior brother, no matter what happens in the future, we've Known each other, and that's fate.
This cookbook of mine is as famous as the Vairocana Godly Palm of our temple in the martial arts world, I'll give it to you today as a keepsake.
context:
小师弟，不管今后如何，你我相识一场便是有缘。
师兄这本绝世菜谱不亚于本寺镇派如来神掌在江湖上的名声，今天便赠送给你留个念想。

original:
Are you planning to settle your affairs?
I'll gladly accept any other good things you have.
context:
师兄这是打算交代身后事吗？
还有多少好东西我一并不客气笑纳了。

original: Being too familiar with you is not good, you're taking advantage of me, it's really funny.
context: 跟你小子太熟了不好，得寸进尺，真叫人哭笑不得。

original: Remember to be good to your senior brother, maybe one day he will need your help, don't forget to show some kindness.
context: 记得师兄对你好，说不定以后师兄有求到你的地方，你别不讲情面就行。

original: Your senior brother's business is my business, no doubt about it!
context: 师兄的事就是我的事，绝无二话！

original: Remember your promise, it's worth our brotherhood.
context: 记住你的承诺，不枉咱们师兄弟一场。
