original: Three Sects Demon Suppression
context: 三教镇魔

original: Demon Suppression
context: 镇魔

original: Go to Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple, find Zhong Yangzi and Cai Yuanchang respectively, invite the successors of the two sects to meet at Shifa Temple.
context: 前往道玄宗、儒圣馆，分别找重阳子和蔡元常，邀请两家派传人来释法寺相聚。

original: Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple have agreed to the appointment, now return to Shifa Temple and report to Hui Yuan.
context: 道玄宗、儒圣馆都同意赴约，现在返回释法寺回禀慧元住持。

original: More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.
context: 十数年前，江湖上出现一位神秘人物，不知师承何处，只知身兼数门顶级武学，一身本领臻至化境。

original: This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
context: 此人不但只身挑起江湖上无数争端，甚至凭一喜之好，数次以强大武力干预燕赵两国战场局势，无论江湖还是庙堂，都已沦为他的掌中玩物。

original: The heads of the three sects joined forces, set up several times, after many twists and turns, paid a heavy price to capture him seriously injured.
context: 三教掌门联手，数次布局集，几经波折，付出惨痛代价这才把他重伤生擒。

original: Not only is this person outstanding in martial arts, but he also hides the internal strength Archives of the three sects. He is the only one in the world who knows their whereabouts. In order not to cut off the unique skills of the three sects, he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, and his life cannot be taken.
context: 此人不但武功卓绝，还藏匿了三教各自镇派内功典籍，当世只有他一人知道下落，为了三教绝学不致断绝，因此只能将其关押拷问，不能取其性命。

original: Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.
context: 寻常牢房已无法困住这位大魔头，因此三教再次联合，设计出一处困魔局，这才把魔头镇压下去。

original: There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
context: 每年有几天特定时日，是困魔局最为薄弱之时，为防止魔头脱困，三教传人经过相互比试之后，由战力最强之人在那几天负责坐镇局中看管魔头。

original: Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.
context: 看管魔头听起来是件苦差事，为什么还要比试之后，选出最厉害的人才有看管魔头的资格。

original: During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
context: 看管魔头这几日，若有机缘获得魔头指点一二，甚至从魔头口中探出镇派秘籍的只言片语，不但有益于门派，对自身修行更是大有裨益。

original: Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?
context: 三教派人一起去看管魔头不是更保险，大家也不用争来争去，若是打探出什么消息，大家一同收益不是更好？

original: Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
context: 先不说三教表面同气连枝，私下其实相互较劲；单是那魔头的古怪脾气和暴虐性子，岂容一堆人堂而皇之的看守他？说不定发起狠来，把这几人全都打杀了。

original: Risks and opportunities coexist...
context: 风险与机遇并存……

original: Shiming, I want you to represent Shifa Temple, invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition, to decide who will guard this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your own fortune.
context: 释名，老衲要你代表释法寺，出面邀约另外两教传人进行比试，定出今年看守之人，能否抓住这次机缘，就看你个人造化了。

original: Yes, I will definitely bring honor to Shifa Temple and let the world know that Shifa Temple always stands at the top of the three sects!
context: 遵命，弟子一定为释法寺争光，让世人知道释法寺永远站立三教鳌头！

original: I already know why you're here, but in the past, it was always Lai Toudian from Shifa Temple who came. Today, they sent you, a young boy, how capable can you be to take on this task?
context: 你的来意我已知晓，不过往年释法寺都是癞头癫出面，今天却把你派来，你这毛头小子能有多大本事堪当此任？

original: If you can take my move, Confucius Temple will naturally send someone to Shifa Temple; otherwise, please ask Shifa Temple to choose another successor, don't treat this important task as a child's play!
context: 你若能接下老夫这一招，儒圣馆自然派人前往释法寺；否则就请释法寺另选传人，不要把镇魔大事当作儿戏！

original: You, as a senior leader of a sect, taking action against a junior, isn't that demeaning yourself?
context: 您贵为一派之长的前辈，对晚辈出手，不是自贬身份吗！

original: This is not a child's play, how can such a weak person guard the demon, go back and tell Hui Yuan, ask him to choose someone else.
context: 此等大事不是儿戏，如此羸弱不堪怎能看守魔头，回去告诉慧元住持，叫他另选旁人。

original: Young man, do you really want to be so stubborn? The old man wants to see how many times you will fall before you give up!
context: 年轻人真要如此倔强吗？老夫倒要看你倒下几次才肯罢手！

original: You barely have some skills, since you have passed the old man's test, the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment.
context: 勉强算是有几分本事，既然通过老夫考验，儒圣馆会安排传人赴约的。

original: I didn't expect Hui Yuan to send you to participate in the competition of the successors of the three sects this time, he must be very confident. Considering our past relationship, I won't make things difficult for you, go back and tell Hui Yuan, Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend on time.
context: 想不到慧元住持这次派你出面参与三教传人的比试，想必是已有十足的把握。看在往日情面上，老夫也不为难你，回去告诉慧元住持，儒圣馆会安排传人准时赴约。

original: Please tell Hui Yuan that Taoist Sect will send the successor to attend on time.
context: 请少侠告知慧元住持，道玄宗会派遣传人准时赴约。

original:
That was easy? A bit unexpected.
Aren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Shifa Temple?
context:
这么容易？有点出乎预料。
您不出个难题检验下我是否有资格代表释法寺吗？

original: I believe Hui Yuan wouldn't treat this important task lightly, he must have his reasons for sending you here, I don't need to worry about it.
context: 镇魔大事老道相信慧元住持不会儿戏，派你前来定然有他的道理，老道不必为此忧虑。

original: {PlayerGivenName} junior brother, I have been waiting here on behalf of the Confucius Temple.
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟，在下代表儒圣馆前来，在此久候了。

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, I have been waiting here for a long time.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄，蔡某在此久候了。

original: I am Cai Youzhi, representing the Confucius Temple, and I have been waiting here for a long time.
context: 在下蔡攸之，代表儒圣馆前来，在此久候了。

original: {PlayerSurName} senior brother, I'm here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄，小道代表道玄宗前来赴约。

original: You're slower than a turtle, if I had known, I would have taken a nap first.
context: 你可真是比乌龟爬还要慢，早知如此，本道爷先去睡上一觉了。

original: I'm La Tazhang, here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
context: 本道爷邋遢张，代表道玄宗前来赴约。

original:
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin.
{PlayerName} You're new here, you don't understand the rules, let me explain them to you.
context:
如今三教传人已经到齐，比试即将开始。
{PlayerName}入门尚浅，不了解规则，老衲先为你讲解一番。

original: {PlayerName} You represent Shifa Temple, as the host, you need to go through three rounds of competition, the first round you and Taoist Sect against Confucius Temple; the second round you and Confucius Temple against Taoist Sect; the third round you alone against the two sects.
context: {PlayerName}你代表释法寺出战，是本次的东道主，需要经历三场比试，第一场你与道玄宗传人对抗儒圣馆；第二次你与儒圣馆对抗道玄宗；第三场独自应对两家联手。

original: If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon this year; if you lose any round, this matter will have nothing to do with Shifa Temple, do you understand?
context: 三场全部胜出，今年就由你担负看守魔头的重任；中途只要输掉一场，此事便与我释法寺无缘，你可听明白了？

original: I understand.
context: 听明白了。

original: I don't understand.
context: 没听明白。

original: In that case, let's start now!
context: 既然如此，现在便开始吧！

original: Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
context: 可不要小瞧了儒圣馆的本事！

original: I'm here to learn from the two senior brothers.
context: 小道来领教两位师兄高招。

original: {PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄当心了。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟请赐教！

original: The disciples of Shifa Temple are indeed well-deserved, this year we will have to trouble {PlayerGivenName} junior brother to guard the demon.
context: 释法寺弟子果然名不虚传，今年就劳烦{PlayerGivenName}师弟看守魔头了。

original: Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
context: 可不要小瞧了儒圣馆的本事！

original: Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
context: 打完没有，趁早打完，本道爷还要去逍遥快活呢。

original: Stop dawdling, let's get started.
context: 真是磨叽，快点开始吧。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟请赐教！

original: Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
context: 谁爱去谁去，本道爷也不想再去陪那个魔头了。

original: The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
context: 儒圣馆傲立三教的依仗乃是文采风流，并非武功出众。

original: Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
context: 打完没有，趁早打完，本道爷还要去逍遥快活呢。

original: Stop dawdling, let's get started.
context: 真是磨叽，快点开始吧。

original: Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
context: 拳脚无眼，你要留神了！

original: Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
context: 谁爱去谁去，本道爷也不想再去陪那个魔头了。

original: There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
context: 技不如人无话可说……

original: The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
context: 儒圣馆傲立三教的依仗乃是文采风流，并非武功出众。

original: I'm here to learn from the two senior brothers.
context: 小道来领教两位师兄高招。

original: {PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄当心了。

original: Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
context: 拳脚无眼，你要留神了！

original: There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
context: 技不如人无话可说……

original: You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
context: 你伤势不轻，昏迷了几个时辰渐渐醒了过来。

original: Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
context: 唉，你已尽力了，此乃天意不必耿耿于怀。

original: {PlayerName}, you really didn't let me down, now you have to take on the responsibility of guarding that demon!
context: {PlayerName}，你果然没有辜负老衲对你的期望，如今你便要肩负起看守那魔头的重任了！

original: The demon is currently imprisoned in the <color=#c44b0e>Ice Prison under the stone tower of Lin'an CityYunlin Temple</color>. I will tell you the method to enter the Ice Prison...
context: 那魔头现在关押在<color=#c44b0e>霖安城云林寺里石塔下的冰牢中</color>，老衲这就告诉你进入冰牢的法门……

original: You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
context: 你获知了进入冰牢的办法。

original: Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
context: 开启冰牢后，一旦进入冰牢，入口会自动关闭；<color=#c44b0e>直到五天之后才会重新开启</color>，若没有十足把握，千万不要仓促进入。

original: Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
context: 千万不要让那魔头逃脱，否则后果难以预料，切记切记。

original: I will definitely remember your teachings.
context: 弟子一定牢记住持教诲。

original: I will definitely remember your teachings.
context: 弟子一定牢记住持教诲。

original: Break through the formation
context: 闯阵

original: You can bring a maximum of one companion to break through the Bronze Man Formation of any level.
context: 你要闯哪个级别的铜人阵，最多可带一名伙伴共同闯阵。

original: Yellow Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
context: 黄字号铜人阵（<color=#097a76>消耗25点体力、1个时辰</color>）

original: Mysterious Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
context: 玄字号铜人阵（<color=#097a76>消耗25点体力、1个时辰</color>）

original: Earth Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
context: 地字号铜人阵（<color=#097a76>消耗25点体力、1个时辰</color>）

original: Heaven Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
context: 天字号铜人阵（<color=#097a76>消耗25点体力、1个时辰</color>）

original: Not ready yet
context: 还未准备好

original: I can't believe I broke through the Bronze Man Formation in one go, I didn't know I was so powerful!
context: 堂堂铜人阵竟然被我一举击破，想不到我这么厉害！

original: This is just the simplest level, there are four levels in total: Heaven, Earth, Mysterious Yellow. The Heaven Character is the famous Eighteen Golden Body Bronze Man Formation!
context: 这只是最简单级别，总共有天地玄黄四个级别，其中天字号才是闻名于世的十八金身铜人阵！

original: You have broken through the Mysterious Character Bronze Man Formation, you can now ascend to the 3rd floor of the Scripture Tower.
context: 你已闯过玄字号铜人阵，可以登上藏经楼3层了。

original: Hehe, what about the Mysterious Character Bronze Man Formation, it still became my sparring tool.
context: 嘿嘿，玄字号铜人阵又如何，不照样成为我陪练的工具。

original: For the first time, you have passed the Earth Character Bronze Man Formation, the test set by the abbot for the monks. As long as your understanding of Buddhism is not bad, the abbot should allow you to leave the temple for practice.
context: 首次闯过地字号铜人阵，你已经通过住持为出家弟子预设的考验，只要你佛法感悟不俗，住持应当会允许你出寺历练。

original: It's a bit boring to practice with these guys pretending to be bronze men every day, I should have a chance to learn from real masters.
context: 天天与这些假装铜人的家伙对练，真是有些无趣，有机会应该去跟真正高手切磋切磋。

original: You defeated these eighteen golden body bronze men, and a hint of enlightenment arose in your heart.
context: 你击败这十八金身铜人，心中泛起一丝明悟

original: Congratulations on receiving the blessing of the Arhat golden body, in the past hundred years, only you have received this honor!
context: 恭喜师弟获得金身罗汉加持，近百年来，获此殊荣唯师弟一人！

original: Is there no reward for defeating the eighteen bronze men?
context: 打败十八铜人没什么奖励吗？

original: Congratulations on becoming the youngest secular disciple to break through the Eighteen Bronze Man Formation in nearly a hundred years. With this record, you can look down upon all heroes in the world.
context: 恭喜师弟成为近百年来闯过十八铜人阵的最年轻俗家弟子，凭此战绩，在江湖上足够傲视群雄了。

original: The eighteen bronze men are nothing more than that, it seems that I have achieved great success and can go to fight for the first place in the world.
context: 十八铜人不过如此，看来我已经神功大成可以去争那天下第一了。

original: It seems that your skill is not enough.
context: 看来师弟的功力火候还不足。

original: Leave the Temple
context: 出寺

original: Since you have broken through the Earth Character Bronze Man Formation, and your understanding of Buddhism has reached a high level, I will allow you to leave the temple for practice. You don't have to insist on morning classes in the future.
context: 你既然已经闯过地字号铜人阵，如今佛法感悟已经登堂入室，那么老衲便准许你出寺游历。以后早课便不必强求了。

original: Thank you for your permission, Abbot!
context: 多谢住持成全！

original: Although you have broken through the Earth Character Bronze Man Formation, your understanding of Buddhism is not deep, and you cannot resist the various temptations of the secular world. When your understanding of Buddhism reaches 130, I will allow you to leave the temple. Now your understanding of Buddhism is only <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, it's still too early.
context: 虽然你已闯过地字号铜人阵，但是佛法感悟不深，无法抵御世俗红尘的种种诱惑。等你佛法感悟达到130，老衲便会允许出寺，如今你的佛法感悟才 <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，为时尚早。

original: I recognize all the characters on this stone tablet when I look at them separately, but I can't understand what they mean when they are put together.
context: 这块石碑上的文字拆看来看我全都认识，合在一起竟然完全看不懂什么意思。

original: I can actually read the text on this stone tablet, it seems that the high monks of the past have incorporated their understanding of Buddhism into the Passive...
context: 这石碑上的文字我竟然能读的懂，似乎是历代高僧把佛法感悟融入武道当中……

original: I seem to get a hint of inspiration from these predecessors, but it's elusive and indescribable.
context: 从这些前辈身上似乎感受到一丝启发，但是虚无缥缈，无法言明。

original: Even a trace of remnant thought is so powerful, the strength of the high monks of the past is really not to be underestimated.
context: 即便是一丝残念都如此强大，前辈高僧的实力当真不容小觑。

original: It seems that there is a scripture engraved on this stone tablet, but my understanding of Buddhism is insufficient, so I can't understand what it means.
context: 这石碑上好像是篆刻某段经文，但是我佛法感悟不足，无法看懂这上面写的什么意思。

original: With my current understanding of Buddhism, the content on this tablet is not difficult for me.
context: 以我如今的佛法感悟来体悟碑文，这上面的内容还难不到我。

original: The text on the stone tablet is becoming more and more difficult to understand, it doesn't seem like ordinary text.
context: 石碑上的文字越来越费解，看起来好像不像普通文字。

original: The text on this stone tablet seems to be recognized not by the naked eye, but by the heart. If I hadn't studied Buddhism for so long, I might not be able to understand the content.
context: 这石碑上的文字似乎不是用肉眼识别，而是用心感悟。若非精研佛法这么久，恐怕还真无法了解上面所载内容。

original: This is just like a ghost drawing, I really don't know what these stone tablets are for.
context: 这简直跟鬼画符一样，真不知道这几个石碑立在这里有什么用意。

original: Why does the inscription on this stone tablet seem to come alive, could it be that I'm hallucinating...
context: 这石碑上的碑文怎么好像活过来一般，莫非我出现幻觉了……

original: By cross-referencing the content on these four stone tablets, it seems...
context: 把这四块石碑上的内容相互印证，似乎……

original: I see!!!
context: 原来如此！！！

original: I have already pondered the content on this stone tablet...
context: 这块儿石碑上的内容我已经参悟过了……

original: Commission
context: 委托

original: Junior brother, wait, I have a task for you!
context: 师弟留步，有事要你做！

original: Help me clean up the Forest Tower, 1000 wen each time, will you do it?
context: 帮师兄去清理塔林，一次1000文，做不做？

original: Help me clean up the Forest Tower (<color=#c44b0e>consume 2 shichen, require Stamina35</color>).
context: 帮师兄清理塔林（<color=#c44b0e>消耗2个时辰、需体力35</color>）。

original: I'm busy now.
context: 现在没空。

original: Hmph, asking you for help is a favor to you, you really don't appreciate it.
context: 哼，让你帮忙是看得你起，真是不识抬举。

original: Go and do your job, don't keep me waiting.
context: 快去做事吧，别让我等久了。

original: Sigh, I owe you, consider it a contribution to the temple.
context: 唉，拿人手短，就当为寺里做贡献了。

original: You spent 2 shichen and finally cleaned up the Forest Tower.
context: 你花费了2个时辰，终于把这片塔林清理干净了。

original: I'm exhausted, I'm going to find Shi Man for my wages.
context: 累死个人，这就去找释慢拿工钱去。

original: What are you waiting for, go clean up the Forest Tower!
context: 还愣着干什么，还不快去清理塔林！

original: Here is the wage I promised you, don't forget to come and work tomorrow, I don't want to do such low-end physical work.
context: 这是答应你的工钱，明天别忘了继续来做事，本公子可不愿做那种低端的力气活。

original: Here is the wage I promised you, don't come to me tomorrow, I'm out of money.
context: 这是答应你的工钱，明天别再来找我了，本公子手里已经没钱了。

original: There's nothing for you to do today, don't hang around in front of me, it affects my mood.
context: 今天没你事了，别在本公子面前闲逛，免得影响本公子心情。

original: I'm out of <color=#c44b0e>Stamina</color>, I can't help Shi Man anymore.
context: 没<color=#c44b0e>体力</color>了，没有办法帮释慢干活了。

original: I'd better rest and eat something first.
context: 最好先去休息一下吃点东西。

original: Senior brother, wait, I have a task for you!
context: 师兄留步，有事要你做！

original: I'm short of money recently, as long as there is money to be made, I'll do anything.
context: 最近钱紧，只要有钱挣，叫本公子作什么都行。

original: Do you have a copy of the Temple rules?
context: 你手里有释门戒律手抄本吗？

original: I still have some left from the last punishment.
context: 上次被罚倒是还有些剩余。

original: When you're free, copy the Temple rules, 50 wen per copy, I'll come often!
context: 以后你闲来无事时候就抄释门戒律，一本50文，我会常来光顾的！

original: This... okay...
context: 这……好吧……

original: I'm short of money recently, isn't this the Temple rules you asked me to copy last time, do you still want it?
context: 最近钱紧，这不是上次你让我抄写释门戒律吗，你现在还要吗？

original: How many copies of the Temple rules do you want to buy?
context: 要买几份释门戒律呢？

original: Buy 1 copy of the Temple rules (<color=#c44b0e>50 wen</color>).
context: 买1份释门戒律（<color=#c44b0e>50文</color>）。

original: Buy 3 copies of the Temple rules (<color=#c44b0e>150 wen</color>).
context: 买3份释门戒律（<color=#c44b0e>150文</color>）。

original: Buy 5 copies of the Temple rules (<color=#c44b0e>require 250 wen</color>).
context: 买5份释门戒律（<color=#c44b0e>需250文</color>）。

original: I haven't decided yet.
context: 暂时还没想好。

original: My dear junior brother, if you have a chance to make money, think of your senior brother.
context: 我的亲师弟，你要是有挣钱的事情一定要想着师兄阿。

original: My dear junior brother, you should patronize my business more.
context: 我的亲师弟，你要多多光顾我的生意啊。

original: I recognize all the characters on this stone tablet when I look at them separately, but I can't understand what they mean when they are put together.
context: 这块石碑上的文字拆看来看我全都认识，合在一起竟然完全看不懂什么意思。

original: Buddhism
context: 佛法

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, just reaching the initial stage of understanding Buddhism.
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，刚刚达到初步体悟佛法的阶段。

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, you are no longer just staying on the surface, but starting to practice through the contemplation of truth, gradually understanding the meaning of Buddhism, this is very good.
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，现在已不再只是停留在表面感受，开始通过对真理的观照，进行实践，渐渐悟得佛法的意义，这样很好。

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, through cultivation, you can now make your mind peaceful, able to quietly face various emotions in your heart, this will be a sign of your realm improvement.
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，通过修行，你已可以使自己心境平和，能够安静地面对内心的各种情绪，这将是你境界提升的征兆。

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>. You have seen your own emptiness and realized the hypocrisy and transition of self-consciousness. You have begun to transcend yourself. It's not easy to reach this point.
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，你看清了自己的空洞无物，体悟到自我意识的虚伪和过渡，已经开始超越自我，能达到如此地步殊为不易。

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, your understanding of truth has become clearer and more accurate, able to correctly distinguish right from wrong, good from evil, you are not far from attaining Buddha.
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，你对真理的认知变得更加清晰和准确，能够正确地分辨是非善恶，距离证道菩提已经不远了。

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>. Now, by understanding emptiness and consciousness-only, you have freed yourself from killing and uncompassionate mindset. You are only one step away from achieving the ultimate fruit.
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，现在通过领悟空性和唯识，已经让自己从杀戮和不慈悲心境中解放出来，距离修成正果仅一步之遥了。

original: Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, you have far surpassed the old monk, in terms of the realm of Buddhism, you are undoubtedly the best in Shifa Temple for nearly a hundred years!
context: 你如今的佛法感悟是<color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>，已经远超老衲，若论佛法境界你已是释法寺近百年来当之无愧的首屈一指！

original:
Master, something terrible has happened!
I'm incompetent, Lao Motou has broken free and escaped.
context:
掌教大事不好了！
弟子无能，老魔头挣脱束缚逃跑了。

original: Alas, sending you to guard this demon is to do your best and leave the rest to fate, since this is the will of heaven, it is beyond human control.
context: 唉，派你看守这魔头本就是尽人事听天命，既然天意如此，已非人力能够左右。

original: Zhong Yangzi, among the three teachings, only you know to follow the will of heaven, unlike those fools, each of them wants to go against the heavens.
context: 重阳子，三教里面也就只有你知天顺命，不像那些蠢蛋，各个都想逆天行事。

original: Chu Kuangsheng, are you here today to settle the old scores?
context: 楚狂生，你今日来此，是要了结当年的恩怨吗？

original: If it weren't for your expert Tai Chi shifting skills back then, making me hurt the enemy a thousand and self-damage eight hundred, even if I was ambushed and confused, I wouldn't have been subdued by you guys.
context: 当年你若不是依仗一身炉火纯青的太极挪移功夫，使老夫伤敌一千自损八百，即便老夫遭暗算后神志不清，也不至于被你们几个家伙制住。

original: Today, let me see your skills again, to see if there is any difference from more than ten years ago.
context: 今日老夫再来领教领教你这身本事，看看跟十数年前究竟有何不同。

original: (This person is not well-intentioned, should I step forward to stop him?)
context: （此人来者不善，我是否要站出来拦阻他？）

original: Step forward!<color=#c44b0e>Main character solo</color>
context: 挺身而出！<color=#c44b0e>主角单挑</color>

original: Remain silent.
context: 默不作声。

original: If you want to run wild in Taoist Sect, you have to pass me first!
context: 在道玄宗撒野，先过我这一关！

original: Kid, I spared your life before, since you don't appreciate it, I'll take this life back.
context: 小家伙，老夫之前饶你一命，既然不领情，这条命老夫就收走了。

original: You haven't beaten me yet, I won't allow you to offend the real person of the headmaster!
context: 你还没打倒我，不容你冒犯掌教真人！

original:
{PlayerName}, step back.
The grudges of more than ten years must be resolved by the old Taoist himself.
context:
{PlayerName}，退下吧。
这十多年的恩怨纠葛，须得老道亲自解决。

original: You were once the person I trusted the most...
context: 当年你是老夫最信任之人……

original: And it was I who personally locked you in the Ice Prison.
context: 也是老道亲手把你关进冰牢。

original: If it weren't for me helping you break through the mysterious gate years ago, I'm afraid the position of Taoist Sect leader wouldn't have fallen to you...
context: 当年若非老夫助你冲破玄关，这道玄宗掌教之位怕是轮不到你……

original: The unique skills of my Taoist Sect are indeed the perfect counter to yours.
context: 我道玄宗独到功法却是克制你的不二法门。

original: I should also thank you for not severing my Meridian limbs back then...
context: 老夫还要感谢你当年没有断了老夫经脉手足……

original: After all, you are a rare genius, a freak of nature. If you were to be wasted, wouldn't it be a waste of heaven's gifts?
context: 毕竟你是百世难寻的奇才、怪才，若是就此废去，岂不是暴殄天物。

original: Hmph, what a grateful Taoist Sect leader, what an Evil slayer Zhong Yangzi you are.
context: 哼，好个知恩图报的道玄宗掌教，好个嫉恶如仇的重阳子。

original: The debt I owe you, let's settle it in this battle!
context: 老道欠你的，此战一并了结！

original: I will never make the foolish mistake of raising a tiger to cause trouble again, so...
context: 老夫再也不会做养虎为患的傻事了，所以……

original: {yell}Taoist Sect, you are hereby expelled!!!
context: {yell}道玄宗从此除名吧！！！

original: I didn't expect that your skills have improved a lot over the past decade, it seems I'm having some trouble dealing with you.
context: 想不到你这十多年期间，功力精进不少，好像老夫对上你也有些棘手了。

original: Leave, old man owes you nothing.
context: 你走吧，老夫不欠你了。

original:
Humph, hypocritical, old man doesn't need your favor.
The three religions are still irreconcilable with the old man, don't expect me to stop!
context:
哼，假仁假义，老夫可不领你的情。
三教依然与老夫不共戴天，休想老夫就此收手！

original: Alas, the higher the Tao, the higher the devil, this matter is not easy to end.
context: 唉，道高一尺魔高一丈，此事不易善罢甘休了。

original:
With the emergence of the devil, the martial arts world is likely to stir up a bloody storm again.
{PlayerName}, the safety of the martial arts world is left to your generation to guard.
context:
魔头出世，江湖恐怕要再度掀起腥风血雨。
{PlayerName}，江湖的安危就交给你们这辈人来守护了。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: I didn't expect you to hide your skills before, now it's a bit tricky for the old man to deal with you.
context: 看不出来你这小家伙之前原来藏拙，如今老夫对上你也有些棘手了。

original: Lao Motou, surrender!
context: 老魔头，束手就擒吧！

original: Old man is curious where this little guy gets his confidence from?
context: 老夫很好奇你这小家伙哪里来的自信？

original: The reason I came here is to inform all of you old friends that I have returned to the martial arts world! Those who were involved in that incident back then, none of you can escape, I will settle the scores with you one by one.
context: 老夫此番前来就是跟各位故交知会一声，老夫重出江湖了！参与当年那件事的人，一个都跑不了，老夫会一笔债一笔债跟你们清算。

original: Zhong Yangzi, such a good seedling has joined your Taoist Sect, the future is bleak, what a pity...
context: 重阳子，这样的好苗子却入了你们道玄宗，此后前途惨淡，可惜了……

original:
With the emergence of the devil, I'm afraid there will be another bloody storm in the martial arts world.
{PlayerName}, today I will pass on the unique skills of our sect to you. The safety of the martial arts world will be left to your generation to guard.
context:
魔头出世，江湖恐怕要再度掀起腥风血雨。
{PlayerName}，老道今日传你本门绝学，江湖安危今后就交给你们这辈人来守护了。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Recently, the old Taoist felt a hint of fate, the Taoist Sect may face a catastrophe.
context: 近日老道偶感天机，道玄宗恐要遭逢一场劫难了。

original:
Master, something terrible has happened!
I'm incompetent, Lao Motou has broken free and escaped.
context:
掌教大事不好了！
弟子无能，老魔头挣脱束缚逃跑了。

original: Alas, sending you to guard this demon is to do your best and leave the rest to fate, since this is the will of heaven, it is beyond human control.
context: 唉，派你看守这魔头本就是尽人事听天命，既然天意如此，已非人力能够左右。

original: Headmaster, Lao Motou, who was locked in the ice cellar, went mad and almost broke free. I had no choice but to kill him accidentally. Please punish me.
context: 启禀掌教，关在冰窖中的老魔头发狂失态，几乎要挣脱束缚，弟子迫不得已失手将其打死了，请掌教责罚。

original: You took advantage of his restricted movement and killed him by dishonorable means, didn't you?
context: 你是趁他行动受限，用不光彩的手段把他活活耗死的吧？

original: If it were me, I'm afraid there would be no better way under the circumstances.
context: 换做老道，若在当时情形恐怕也没有更好的法子了。

original: Alas, I didn't expect that Chu Kuangsheng, a generation of heroes, would end up like this...
context: 唉，想不到一代枭雄楚狂生竟然会落得如此下场……

original: Although this was a forced situation, it inevitably clouded your Dao heart. I will punish you to meditate in the Cave of Infinity for ten days. Do you accept?
context: 虽然此事形势所迫不得已为之，未免你道心蒙尘，老道罚你去无极洞静心十日，你可接受？

original: I willingly accept the punishment.
context: 弟子甘心领罚。

original: Good, law enforcement disciples, please escort {PlayerName} to the Cave of Infinity for a ten-day retreat!
context: 好，执法弟子请送{PlayerName}到无极洞闭关十日！

original:
{PlayerName}, you shall reflect here in peace.
I will take you to run away <color=#c44b0e>ten days later</color>.
context:
{PlayerName}，你就在这里静心思过。
<color=#c44b0e>十天后</color>我会带你离开。

original:
Abbot, something terrible has happened!
I failed, and Lao Motou broke free and escaped.
context:
住持大事不好了！
弟子无能，老魔头挣脱束缚逃跑了。

original: This demon will surely cause great trouble once he escapes, and there will be no peace in the world.
context: 这魔头脱困势必又要酿出天大的祸事，从此世间无宁日了。

original:
Hui Yuan, you bald donkey, you must know why that disaster happened back then, right?
If I cause trouble today, you should know who to thank!
context:
慧元秃驴，当年那场祸事因何而起你不会不清楚吧？
今时今日老夫若再造祸事，你也应该清楚是拜谁所赐！

original: Amitabha, Chu Kuangsheng, long time no see.
context: 阿弥陀佛，楚狂生，楚施主，许久不见。

original: Old bald donkey, I've been thinking about this reunion day and night for the past ten years.
context: 老秃驴，老夫被困这十多年可是日日夜夜都想着重逢这一天呐。

original: I'm sorry for your concern, I feel guilty.
context: 劳烦施主惦念，老衲心中有愧。

original: Back then, your Buddha Golden Body was not yet complete, and you couldn't withstand a few punches from me. I wonder how much progress you've made compared to before?
context: 当年你菩提金身未成，挨不了老夫几拳，不知今日跟之前相比有多少长进？

original: (This Lao Motou is up to no good, should I step forward to stop him?)
context: （这老魔头来者不善，我是否要站出来拦阻他？）

original: Step forward!<color=#c44b0e>Main character solo</color>
context: 挺身而出！<color=#c44b0e>主角单挑</color>

original: Remain silent.
context: 默不作声。

original: This is a pure land of Buddhism, how dare you, a demon, run wild here!
context: 佛门清净地，岂容你这魔头猖狂！

original: Kid, I spared your life before, since you don't appreciate it, I'll take this life back.
context: 小家伙，老夫之前饶你一命，既然不领情，这条命老夫就收走了。

original: Hmph, just as I thought.
context: 哼，不，不过如此。

original: Amitabha, {PlayerName}, stop, only I can neutralize the cause and effect of this matter.
context: 阿弥陀佛，{PlayerName}，停手吧，此事因果需得老衲方能化解。

original: You were once the person I admired the most...
context: 你曾是老衲当年最钦佩之人……

original: I will kill your master, who is full of thieves and prostitutes, right in front of you!
context: 老夫当面宰了你那位一肚子男盗女娼的师父！

original: When you were young and falsely accused, it was I who vouched for you...
context: 你年轻时遭人诬陷，是老衲为你担保……

original: Everyone knew that I was framed back then, but no one stood up for me!
context: 当年那件事，所有人心知肚明老夫被人陷害，却没人仗义执言！

original: There were people who suggested to get rid of you once and for all, it was I who saved your life...
context: 曾有人提议将你就此除去，一了百了，是老衲保下了你这条命……

original: If I hadn't hidden the martial arts techniques of your three sects in advance, and you didn't know where to turn to, I'm afraid I would have been dead long ago.
context: 若非老夫事先藏匿了你们三教镇派功法，你们又不知下落需要着落在老夫身上，恐怕老夫就算十条命也早已了账。

original: The past grudges are too complicated to untangle, why don't you fight me and end this feud?
context: 往日恩怨已经纠缠不清，施主不妨与老衲一战泯恩仇。

original: I will never make the foolish mistake of raising a tiger to cause trouble again, so...
context: 老夫再也不会做养虎为患的傻事了，所以……

original: {yell} You are hereby expelled from the Shifa Temple!!!
context: {yell}释法寺从此除名吧！！！

original: I didn't expect that your skills have improved a lot over the past decade, it seems I'm having some trouble dealing with you.
context: 想不到你这十多年期间，功力精进不少，好像老夫对上你也有些棘手了。

original: Stay, I am willing to use ten years of merit to neutralize your hostility.
context: 施主，留下吧，老衲愿用十年功德化解你的戾气。

original: Hmph, even if you were Buddha reincarnated, you couldn't neutralize the hatred I've accumulated over the years!
context: 哼，叫老夫忘记这些年积攒的仇怨，纵然你是佛陀降世舌灿莲花，也化解不了分毫！

original:
With the emergence of the devil, the martial arts world is likely to stir up a bloody storm again.
{PlayerName}, the safety of the martial arts world is left to your generation to guard.
context:
魔头出世，江湖恐怕要再度掀起腥风血雨。
{PlayerName}，江湖的安危就交给你们这辈人来守护了。

original: I will follow the abbot's decree.
context: 谨遵住持法旨。

original: I didn't expect you to hide your skills before, now it's a bit tricky for the old man to deal with you.
context: 看不出来你这小家伙之前原来藏拙，如今老夫对上你也有些棘手了。

original: Lao Motou, surrender!
context: 老魔头，束手就擒吧！

original: Old man is curious where this little guy gets his confidence from?
context: 老夫很好奇你这小家伙哪里来的自信？

original: The reason I came here is to inform all of you old friends that I have returned to the martial arts world! Those who were involved in that incident back then, none of you can escape, I will settle the scores with you one by one.
context: 老夫此番前来就是跟各位故交知会一声，老夫重出江湖了！参与当年那件事的人，一个都跑不了，老夫会一笔债一笔债跟你们清算。

original: Hui Yuan, such a promising talent has joined your Shifa Temple, what a pity for his bleak future...
context: 慧元，这样的好苗子却入了你们释法寺，此后前途惨淡，可惜了……

original:
With the emergence of the devil, the martial arts world is likely to be plunged into chaos again.
{PlayerName}, this time you stepped forward and repelled the strong enemy. I am very pleased. I will pass on the unique skills of our temple to help you improve your Martial Arts!
context:
魔头出世，江湖恐怕要再度掀起腥风血雨。
{PlayerName}，此次你挺身而出且力退强敌，老衲万分欣慰，特传你本寺镇派绝学，助你武学更上一层楼！

original: Thank you, Abbot.
context: 多谢主持。

original: Today, my Buddha beads shattered for no reason, I'm afraid it's not a good omen.
context: 今日老衲随身佛珠无故碎裂，恐非吉兆。

original: Reporting to the Abbot, Lao Motou in the ice cellar went mad and almost broke free. I had no choice but to kill him by accident. Please punish me, Abbot.
context: 回禀住持，关在冰窖中的老魔头发狂失态，几乎要挣脱束缚，弟子迫不得已失手将其打死了，请住持责罚。

original: Amitabha, you did what you had to do in a difficult situation, it must have been hard for you.
context: 阿弥陀佛，事急从权，难为你了。

original: I have broken my vows and should be punished.
context: 弟子破戒了，理应受到责罚。

original: This big demon Chu Kuangsheng, although a generation of heroes, but his sins are monstrous. Killing him is to save him; killing one to save thousands, this is a great merit, you don't need to blame yourself.
context: 这大魔头本名楚狂生，虽是一代枭雄，但是罪孽滔天，你杀他便是超度他；杀一独夫而救千人万人，这是大功德，你不必自责。

original: Killing to protect life, I understand.
context: 杀生为护生，弟子受教了。

original: I have fulfilled my duty and completed the task of guarding Lao Motou, I am here to report.
context: 弟子不负所托，看守老魔头任务完成，特来回禀。

original: Another year of peace in the martial arts world, it's a blessing in disguise.
context: 又换来了一年的江湖安宁，实在是不幸中的万幸。

original: Master, is this Lao Motou really so ferocious?
context: 掌教真人，这老魔头当真如此凶残吗？

original: If this Lao Motou breaks free, the first one he will come to take revenge on is our Taoist Sect, which will then cause turmoil in the martial arts world and countless deaths.
context: 这老魔头只要挣脱束缚，想必第一个来报复的就是咱们道玄宗，接下来便会引发江湖动荡，生灵涂炭。

original: This matter is over, you have made great contributions. With outstanding juniors like you in the Taoist Sect, I can rest easy.
context: 此事已了，你居功甚伟，道玄宗有你这样的杰出后辈，老道从此可以心安了。

original: I have fulfilled my duty and completed the task of guarding Lao Motou, I am here to report.
context: 弟子不负所托，看守老魔头任务完成，特来回禀。

original: Good, good.
context: 善哉善哉。

original: Master, this Lao Motou is now trapped in the Ice Prison and can't move a step. Is he really an evil demon who is beyond redemption?
context: 住持，这老魔头如今被困在冰牢寸步难移，处境十分凄凉，他当真是十恶不赦的凶恶魔头吗？

original: If this Lao Motou breaks free, the first one he will come to take revenge on is our Shifa Temple, which will then cause turmoil in the martial arts world and countless deaths.
context: 这老魔头只要挣脱束缚，想必第一个来报复的就是咱们释法寺，接下来便会引发江湖动荡，生灵涂炭。

original: You alone have not only brought a year of peace to the martial arts world, but also indirectly saved the lives of countless martial artists and innocent people. Your merit is immeasurable.
context: 你凭借一己之力不仅仅换来一年的江湖安宁，更间接挽救了无数江湖人士和无辜百姓的性命，实在是功德无量。

original: Amitabha.
context: 阿弥陀佛。

original: Ahead is Lin'an City, I am now carrying the marshal's military order, should I attack Lin'an City?
context: 前方便是霖安城，现在我身负元帅军令，是否要攻打霖安城呢？

original: Attack Lin'an City!
context: 攻打霖安城！

original: Think thrice before you act.
context: 三思而后行。

original: Battle of Lin'an
context: 霖安之战

original: Lead the Iron Army of Yan Yun to attack Lin'an City!
context: 率领燕云铁军攻打霖安城！

original: Return to the Southern Camp of Yan Country to report.
context: 返回燕国征南大营复命。

original: {PlayerSurName} Brother, I've been waiting for you here for a long time.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄，我在此已等候多时了。

original: {PlayerSurName} Brother, you have returned victorious and are exhilarated, what are your plans for the future?
context: {PlayerSurName}兄如今得胜归来，正在志得意满，将来可有什么打算？

original: I haven't thought that much, I will follow the marshal's arrangements.
context: 还没想那么多，一切听凭大元帅安排。

original: Now that the world is settled, you have conquered Chu Xiang and Lin'an all by yourself, your merit is high and shocking!
context: 如今天下大定，你一己之力攻克楚襄、霖安，已是功高震主！

original: If I'm not mistaken, with Wanyan Wuzhu's nature, he will soon turn against you.
context: 如我所料不错，以完颜乌珠的秉性，很快就要对你兔死狗烹了。

original: The marshal won't be so ungrateful, stop trying to scare me with your words!
context: 大元帅不会如此不讲情面，你少在这里危言耸听！

original:
Those who are not of our kind will surely have different hearts, believe it or not.
Whether this trip to report to the Marshal is a trap or a celebration, you'd better pray for your own luck.
context:
非我族类其心必异，信不信由你。
此番向大元帅复命，到底是鸿门宴还是庆功宴，你自求多福吧。

original: I have fulfilled my mission, Lin'an City has been taken!
context: 属下不辱使命，霖安城已被攻克了！

original: {PlayerName}, you have worked hard, please get up.
context: {PlayerName}劳苦功高，快快请起。

original:
I, the Marshal, have been waiting for you for a long time to welcome you and wash away the dust of your journey.
{PlayerName}, you have had a hard journey, first drink this cup, I, the Marshal, will toast to you.
context:
本元帅正要为你接风洗尘，已等你多时了。
{PlayerName}一路辛苦，且先满饮此杯，本元帅先干为敬。

original: Drink the wine.
context: 饮下酒水。

original: Refuse to drink.
context: 拒绝饮酒。

original: Detect poison in the wine!
context: 察觉酒水有毒！

original: As expected, when the cunning rabbit dies, the hunting dog is cooked. It seems that I, {PlayerName}, am just a pawn to the Marshal.
context: 果然是狡兔死，走狗烹，看来我{PlayerName}对元帅而言已经是枚弃子了。

original: Do you underestimate me, the Marshal?
context: 你就如此看轻本元帅吗？

original: Such a strong cup of poison, Marshal, are you afraid that I won't die thoroughly?
context: 好浓烈的一杯毒酒，元帅这是怕我死的不够彻底啊。

original: {PlayerName}, although I, the Marshal, appreciate your talent, your merit is too great, I have to be cautious.
context: {PlayerName}，本元帅虽然欣赏你的才华，但是你功劳太大，本元帅也不得不有所防范。

original: Wan Yan, you are indeed insightful, the Marshal is indeed narrow-minded and cannot tolerate outsiders.
context: 完颜兄，你果然料事如神，大元帅果然心胸狭隘容不下外人。

original: Wanyan Liang, are you betraying me, the Marshal?
context: 完颜亮，你要背叛本元帅？

original: You have occupied the position of Marshal for long enough, it's time to give way to the virtuous.
context: 你这大元帅的位置霸占得够久了，是该让贤了。

original: Let's see if you have the ability to take the position!
context: 看你有没有本事坐得上了！

original:
Thank you, {PlayerSurName}, for your help!
Now that Wanyan Wuzhu is dead, I need to return to Palace Camp as soon as possible to clean up the mess, we will meet again in the future!
context:
多谢{PlayerSurName}兄相助一臂之力！
如今完颜乌珠已死，我要尽快返回行辕大营收拾残局，咱们后会有期！

original: The famous Yan Yun Iron Army, who would have thought that the trouble would start within, there is no good future for staying here, I might as well continue to wander the Jianghu.
context: 名震天下的燕云铁军想不到祸起萧墙，继续呆在这里也没什么好前程了，我还是继续游历江湖吧。

original: If you want to kill me, let's see if you, Wan Yan Marshal, have the ability!
context: 想要杀我，就看你完颜大元帅有没有这个本事了！

original: It's too dangerous to negotiate with a tiger, power struggles are not for me, I'd better continue to wander the Jianghu.
context: 与虎谋皮真是太危险了，争权夺势不适合我，还是继续游历江湖吧。

original: There's poison in this wine!
context: 这酒里有毒！

original: {PlayerName}, I, the Marshal, will not feel at ease with an uncontrollable person by my side, so you must die!
context: {PlayerName}，本元帅不会放心一个无法掌控的人跟在身边，所以你必须要死！

original: If there is a next life...
context: 若有来世……

original: Good courage! Aren't you afraid that I, the Marshal, will kill the dog after the rabbit is dead?
context: 好胆识！你就不怕本元帅狡兔死走狗烹吗？

original: I serve the Marshal, even if this life is given to the Marshal, the servant cannot be invincible.
context: 属下为元帅效命，便是这条命交给元帅，君要臣死臣不得不死。

original: Don't worry, I, the Marshal, will not do anything to harm myself!
context: 你放心好了，本元帅不会做出自断臂膀之事！

original: I, the Marshal, have reported your merits to the Emperor of Yan, and the Emperor has specially decreed to reward you!
context: 本元帅已向燕国陛下奏明你的功绩，陛下特意下旨要对你封赏！

original: Accept the reward. (Achieve the <color=#c44b0e>Foreign Duke</color> ending).
context: 接受封赏。（达成<color=#c44b0e>异姓封王</color>结局）。

original: Refuse the reward and continue to wander the Jianghu.
context: 拒绝封赏，继续游历江湖。

original: Such a great reward is only for you, don't be confused for a moment.
context: 如此天大赏赐非你莫属，你可不要一时糊涂。

original: I have already decided, please persuade the Emperor to withdraw his decree.
context: 属下心意已决，请元帅奉劝陛下收回旨意。

original: Alright, since you are not interested, I, the Marshal, will not force you, but it's a pity for your extraordinary merits.
context: 好吧，既然你无心于此，本元帅也不强人所难，只是可惜了你这身盖世功劳。

original: It's already a great honor for me to be recognized by the Marshal. Power and position are external things to me. I still want to continue to wander the Jianghu and broaden my horizons in my lifetime.
context: 能得元帅肯定已是属下莫大荣幸，权势地位对我来说是身外之物，我还是想在有生之年继续游历江湖，增长见识。

original: Alright, I, the Marshal, will respect your wishes.
context: 好，本元帅如你所愿。

original: Thank you, Marshal, for your understanding.
context: 多谢元帅成全。

original: Marshal Wan Yan, once this cup of wine is drunk, I'm afraid even those with great abilities won't be able to stand up again, right?
context: 完颜元帅，这杯酒喝下，怕是有通天本事也再站不起来了吧？

original: Do you doubt my sincerity?
context: 你竟然怀疑本元帅的诚意？

original: One must always be wary of others, I have heard a bit about the Marshal's character.
context: 防人之心不可无，元帅为人我也略有耳闻。

original: Marshal, you have been in this position for long enough, it's time to give way to the virtuous.
context: 大元帅，你这位置已经坐得够久了，是该让贤了。

original:
Alright, it seems you've already conspired.
Today, let this marshal see what qualifications you have to dare to sit in this marshal's position!
context:
好啊，看来你们已经是串通好了。
今天就让本元帅看看你们有什么资格敢坐这元帅之位！

original:
What if I suspect you?
Strike first and gain the upper hand, I won't sit and wait for death!
context:
怀疑你又怎么样？
先下手为强，我可不会坐以待毙！

original:
Your Highness Duke Kang, now that our Great Yan Nation is marching south, Undefeated!
Today, with the lesson of Chuxiang City, do you, the small Lin'an City, also want to block the way?
context:
康王殿下，如今我大燕国挥师南下，所向披靡！
今有楚襄城前车之鉴，你这小小霖安城也想螳臂当车吗？

original:
{PlayerName}, this king has heard of your fame and knows your methods!
But no matter how great your skills are, don't think about making this king a slave of a defeated country!
context:
{PlayerName}，本王听说过你的英名，也知道你的手段！
但是任你有通天的手段，也休想让本王做丧权辱国的亡国奴！

original:
You were a good person, but you chose to be a thief.
{PlayerName}, you have disappointed this king.
context:
卿本佳人，奈何从贼。
{PlayerName}，你让本王错看你了。

original:
Brother Wang, don't oppose {PlayerGivenName}, surrender the city.
I will beg {PlayerGivenName} not to kill you, and from then on, you can live a life of pleasure as a prince, okay?
context:
王兄，你不要跟{PlayerGivenName}作对，弃城投降吧。
我会求{PlayerGivenName}不要杀你，从此做个享乐王爷好不好？

original: {yell} Shut up!
context: {yell}住口！

original: I don't have a shameless sister like you, you are not worthy to call me Brother Wang.
context: 本王没有你这个寡廉鲜耻的妹妹，你不配叫我王兄。

original: {PlayerName}, Brother Wang is the closest person to me, closer than you, so...
context: {PlayerName}，王兄是我最亲近的人，比你还要亲，所以……

original: Black screen transition, the princess refreshes next to Duke Kang
context: 黑幕过渡，郡主刷新在康王旁边

original: ...I can only choose to Run away from you.
context: ……我只能选择离开你。

original: Even if Brother Wang and I can't stop you, it's okay to die together, it's pretty good.
context: 即便我和王兄挡不住你，大不了跟王兄死在一起，也挺好。

original: Machinery is too smart, it has cost your life.
context: 机关算尽太聪明，反误了卿卿性命。

original: {PlayerName}, we meet again.
context: {PlayerName}，咱们又见面了。

original:
Your refusal to cooperate with Marshal Wan Yan was expected.
I didn't expect you to help Duke Kang defend this precarious Lin'an City...
context:
你拒绝跟完颜元帅合作，早在元帅意料之中。
想不到你竟然帮康王守这危如累卵的霖安城……

original: Your Highness Duke Kang has been very kind to this sect leader, and you want this sect leader to help you attack Lin'an City, it's really a dream.
context: 康王殿下对本门主恩重如山，想让本门主帮你们攻打霖安城，真是痴人说梦。

original: Master Tie, what do you mean by this?
context: 铁门主，你这是什么意思？

original: Now that this sect leader is standing in front of your Opposition, can't you see what it means?
context: 如今本门主站在你的对立面，什么意思你还看不出来吗？

original: Betrayal, the master of the Nine Factions Sect is really shameless.
context: 背信弃义，堂堂九流门门主真够无耻的。

original: Your Highness Duke Kang has been very kind to this sect leader, and you want this sect leader to help you attack Lin'an City, it's really a dream.
context: 康王殿下对本门主恩重如山，想让本门主帮你们攻打霖安城，真是痴人说梦。

original: Thirty years in the east of the river, thirty years in the west of the river, I didn't expect you {PlayerName} to be able to lead troops now.
context: 三十年河东三十年河西，想不到你{PlayerName}如今也能带兵出征了。

original: However, this sect leader wants to try if this little skill can stop your shrimp soldiers and crab generals.
context: 不过，本门主这点微末道行很想试试能不能挡下你们这群虾兵蟹将。

original: Who are you guys?
context: 你们是什么人？

original: You're all going to die, there's no need to know so much.
context: 都是要死的人了，没必要知道那么多。

original: {PlayerName}, do you have any last words to say?
context: {PlayerName}，你还有什么遗言要交代的吗？

original: The whole army--
context: 全军——

original: {yell}<size=200%>Charge!!!
context: {yell}<size=200%>出击！！！

original: Your Highness Duke Kang...
context: 康王殿下……

original: Is this fate...
context: 难道这就是天命吗……

original:
With the annihilation of forces such as Duke Kang's manor and the Nine Factions Sect, Lin'an City completely fell.
In order to facilitate the implementation of the Han policy, Yan State pacified the people after occupying Lin'an City,
and did not carry out large-scale massacres, which was a blessing in disguise.
context:
随着康王府、九流门等势力全军覆灭，霖安城彻底沦陷。
燕国为便于推行以汉制汉的政策，攻占霖安城后对百姓多加安抚，
并未进行大肆屠杀，算是不幸中的万幸。

original: Lin'an City has been occupied, you can go back and report.
context: 霖安城已经占领，可以回去复命了。

original: Are you trying to stop me? Can you stop me with your abilities!
context: 你们这是要阻拦我吗？凭你们能拦得住我吗！

original: This Taoist will personally send you on your way later!
context: 本道爷稍后亲自送你一程！

original: Since you're a tiger's accomplice, it's not a pity to die.
context: 既然为虎作伥，死了也不可惜。

original: The old monk will help you to be reborn in bliss, and cultivate good karma in the next life!
context: 老衲助你往生极乐，来世再修善缘吧！

original: Killing to protect the way, no need to say more!
context: 杀生卫道，不容分说!

original: Known for a fight, specially here to send you off!
context: 相识一场，特来为你送行！

original: Want to attack Lin'an City, pass my level first!
context: 想攻打霖安城，先过我这关！

original: Alas, it's incurable, really incurable.
context: 唉，不可救药，实在不可救药。

original: Buddha said, who will go to hell if you don't?
context: 佛说，你不入地狱谁入地狱。

original: Since you've chosen this path, Cai has nothing more to say.
context: 既然你选择这条路，蔡某也无话可说。

original: On the road to the underworld, Cai doesn't mind sending you off.
context: 黄泉路上，蔡某不介意送你一程。

original: You, leading the Yan army to attack Lin'an City, are my mortal enemy, Ye Yun!
context: 你率领燕军攻打霖安城，就是我叶云不共戴天的仇人！

original: You scoundrel, today you will witness the power of my dual hammers!
context: 狗贼，今天让你见识小爷双锤的厉害！

original: Surrendering to the Yan dogs makes you the enemy of Hongyu!
context: 投降燕狗，便是红玉的死敌！

original: Hongyu, a mere woman, will stand against you today for the sake of the people of Lin'an.
context: 红玉一介女流，今天为了霖安百姓也要挡你一挡。

original: {PlayerName}, today either you die, or I perish!
context: {PlayerName}，今日不是你死，就是我亡！

original: I hate the Yan dogs the most, let me kill you today for satisfaction!
context: 洒家最恨燕狗，今天就让洒家杀个痛快！

original: The poor way invites {PlayerName} to depart!
context: 贫道有请{PlayerName}上路！

original: Today, the poor way will send you, the villain, on your way!
context: 今日贫道送你这恶贼上路！

original: I was blind, if I had split you with a knife back then, it would have been over!
context: 老子简直瞎了眼，当初若是一刀劈了你，一了百了！

original: Although I'm not very capable, I'm willing to risk my life against you Yan dogs!
context: 老子虽然本事不济，也甘愿跟你这群燕狗拼了这条命！

original: {PlayerName}, I won't show mercy to you!
context: {PlayerName}，我不会对你手下留情！

original: I, the young lady, will definitely stab seven or eight transparent holes in you.
context: 本姑娘一定要在你身上捅出七八个透明窟窿。

original: {PlayerName}, I worshipped you in vain, I didn't expect you to be so ambitious, today I will eliminate the harm for the people!
context: {PlayerName}，枉我对你那么崇拜，没想到你竟是狼子野心，今天我要为民除害！

original: Drive out the barbarians and restore our rivers and mountains!
context: 驱除胡虏光复河山！

original: Known for a while, I came to send you off today.
context: 相识一场，今天特来送送你。

original: How does it feel to be someone else's lapdog?
context: 做别人鹰犬的滋味好受吗？

original: {PlayerName}, I swear to take your head today!
context: {PlayerName}，我今天誓要取你项上首级！

original: I always believe that evil cannot overcome good!
context: 我始终相信自古邪不胜正！

original: If I had known you were such a disaster, I should have eliminated you in the Lost Forest!
context: 早知你是这种祸害，当初在迷踪林就该除了你！

original: What's the harm in killing again in my remaining years!
context: 残生之年再杀一场又有何妨！

original: Since I joined the Yan army, I knew this day would come...

context: 他日大权在握，何妨来一场马踏江湖，到时候看谁还敢不服！

original: Hahahaha...

original:
Despite the heavy price paid by the heroes of the world, they still failed to prevent Lin'an City from falling completely.
Fortunately, in order to implement the Han policy, the Yan country did not carry out a massacre after capturing Lin'an City, which is a silver lining in the misfortune.
context:
江湖众好汉虽然付出惨痛代价，依然没有阻止霖安城彻底沦陷。
燕国为便于推行以汉制汉的政策，攻占霖安城后对百姓多加安抚，
并未进行大肆屠杀，算是不幸中的万幸。

original: Lin'an City has been occupied, you can go back and report.
context: 霖安城已经占领，可以回去复命了。

original: You old, weak, sick and disabled want to block my tiger and wolf army?
context: 你们这些老弱病残也要挡我虎狼之师吗？

The rise and fall of the world is the responsibility of every man!
Although I'm weak, I will do my best to protect Lin'an City!
context:
天下兴亡匹夫有责！
本官虽手无缚鸡之力，也要为保住霖安城拼尽最后一丝力量！

original: You better get out of the way, I don't want to make things difficult for you!
context: 你们赶紧闪开，我不想为难你们！

original: If you want to enter Lin'an City, step over my dead body!
context: 想进霖安城，就从本官尸体上踏过去！

context: 冥顽不灵，休怪我对你们开刀了！

context: {yell}<size=200%>出击！！！
