context: 硬闯行宫！

original: Meet the emperor.
context: 参见圣上。

original: Turn around and leave.
context: 转身离去。

original:
Assassin! Assassin!
Guards, arrest the assassin quickly!
context:
有刺客！有刺客！
来人，将刺客速速拿下！

original: Marshal {PlayerSurName}, leave this to us, you just go into the palace!
context: {PlayerSurName}大帅，这里交给我们，你尽管进宫去吧！

original: I'm counting on you, brothers!
context: 拜托各位兄弟了！

original: The soldiers under your command rush towards the guards who intend to stop you. You walk into the Palace hall as if no one is there.
context: 你麾下的众位将士冲向意图拦截你的侍卫，你如入无人之境，直达行宫大殿！

original: {PlayerName}, it seems that you really have the intention of rebellion. I will report to the emperor and punish you for the crime of exterminating nine clans!
context: {PlayerName}，看来你果然有谋逆的心思，咱家这就禀报圣上，治你诛九族的大罪！

original: Northern Expedition to the Central Plains
context: 北伐中原

original: Return to the Ye Family Battalion camp to discuss the Northern Expedition with Ye Pengju.
context: 返回叶家军大营与叶鹏举商讨北伐事宜。

original: Go to the Supreme Court in Wuyue Region Region.
context: 前往吴越地区的大理寺。

original: (Received a pigeon message)
context: （接到飞鸽传书）

original:
Marshal Ye wants me to hurry back to the Ye Family Battalion camp to discuss the northern expedition.
Has this day finally come...
context:
叶元帅要我尽快赶回叶家军大营，商量北伐事宜。
这一天终于等到了吗……

original: Recently, I obtained a Yan Army military map, which shows the locations of three Yan troops stationed in Zhongzhou.
context: 本帅近日得到一份燕军布防图，上面记载着在中州驻守的三支燕国军队所处位置。

original: These three troops should be the backup left by Wanyan Wuzhu. As long as these three troops are not eliminated, Zhongzhou will always be under the control of Yan.
context: 这三支军队应该是完颜乌珠留下的后手，只要这三支军队不被消灭，中州始终还在燕国的掌控范围之内。

original: {PlayerName}, listen to my command! I want you to immediately send troops to eliminate these three Yan troops and completely drive out the Yan Yun Iron Army.
context: {PlayerName}听令！本帅要你即刻发兵前往消灭这三支燕国军队，把燕云铁军势力彻底驱逐出去。

original: Yes, sir!
context: 遵命！

original: Without the imperial edict, no troops shall be mobilized without authorization. Those who violate the order will be dealt with by military law!
context: 没有陛下的圣旨，任何军队不得擅自调动，违令则以军法论处！

original: It's you again? Why can't you get along with our Ye Family Battalion!
context: 又是你？怎么总跟我们叶家军过不去！

original: Impudent! I am in charge of the Privy Council, who are you to speak to me like this!
context: 放肆！本官执掌枢密院，你是什么身份，敢与本官这样说话！

original: Ye Yun, don't be rude!
context: 叶云，不得无礼！

original: Hmph!
context: 哼！

original: Now that I have learned about Yan's deployment in Zhongzhou, as long as we eliminate them in one fell swoop, Zhongzhou will no longer have any enemies. The speed of the troops is crucial, please ask the Privy Council to quickly play to the emperor, and order us to send troops to the northern expedition as soon as possible.
context: 如今本帅已探知燕国在中州部署，只要一举歼灭，中州再无敌患之虞。兵贵神速，请枢密使大人尽快奏请陛下，早日下旨命臣等出兵北伐。

original: Marshal Ye, someone has impeached you for holding troops and intending to rebel. The emperor ordered me to personally investigate this case.
context: 叶元帅，有人弹劾你拥兵自重、意图谋反，圣上命本官亲自调查此案。

original: Nonsense!
context: 一派胡言！

original:
Marshal Ye, the innocent will clear themselves.
Please stay with me in the <color=#c44b0e>Supreme Court</color> for some time, and you will naturally be proven innocent.
context:
叶元帅，清者自清。
请你跟本官到<color=#c44b0e>大理寺</color>呆上一些时日，届时自然会还你清白。

original: Lord Qin, my father is loyal and can be proven by the sun and the moon. You have been an official with him, do you believe these absurd words?
context: 秦大人，我父帅忠心耿耿可昭日月，您与他同朝为官，您相信这些无稽之言吗？

original: You can't judge a book by its cover, I can't make a rash judgment.
context: 知人知面不知心，本官可不好妄下定言。

original: I am willing to go to the Supreme Court with my father, please allow it, Lord Qin.
context: 我愿与父帅一同前往大理寺，请秦大人准许。

original: Yun, don't be foolish!
context: 云儿不要胡闹！

original: Father, no matter what I want to do, you always teach me, please allow me to be willful this time and accompany you.
context: 父帅，往常无论孩儿想做什么事情，您都要管教我，请今天允许孩儿放肆一回，陪您一同前往。

original: Alas, it's hard for you.
context: 唉，难为你了。

original:
What a deep father-son affection, in that case, I am naturally happy to help.
Both of you, please be on your way.
context:
好一个父子情深呐，既然如此，本官自然乐于成人之美。
两位，请上路吧。

original: Lord Qin, do you believe these absurd words?
context: 秦大人，您相信这些无稽之言吗？

original: You can't judge a book by its cover, I can't make a rash judgment.
context: 知人知面不知心，本官可不好妄下定言。

original: Marshal Ye, please be on your way.
context: 叶元帅，请上路吧。

original: If you want to take my father away, defeat me first!
context: 想带走爹爹，打败本姑娘再说！

original: Nonsense, step back immediately!
context: 胡闹，还不速速退下！

original: Daddy, I want to go with you too!
context: 爹爹，我也要跟您一起去！

original: Bottle, if you are locked up in the Supreme Court with me, who will clear my name?
context: 瓶儿，你跟我一起关进大理寺，谁来替我洗刷冤屈呢？

original: Don't worry, daddy, I will definitely save you.
context: 爹爹放心，我一定会救您出来。

original: Marshal Ye, I will find a way to prove your innocence!
context: 叶元帅，我定会想办法证你清白！

original: {PlayerName}, there are priorities in everything, is my innocence worth your time to prove?
context: {PlayerName}，事有轻重缓急，本帅清白值得你耗费时间证明吗？

original: I originally wanted to personally guide you in this spear technique, but it seems that I no longer have the opportunity. You can understand this Manual by yourself. If you can pass it on, it would be my good fortune.
context: 本帅原本想亲自指点你这门枪法，如今看来已经没这个机会了，这本秘籍你自己领悟吧，若能传承下去也算是本帅的造化了。

original: What is written on this?
context: 这上面写的是什么？

original: The final stroke of the Peng, Prismatic River!
context: 鹏举绝笔，满江红！

original: Furious and indignant, leaning on the railing, the rain stops. Looking up, howling at the sky, with a passionate heart.
context: 怒发冲冠，凭栏处、潇潇雨歇。抬望眼，仰天长啸，壮怀激烈。

original: Thirty years of fame, dust and dirt, eight thousand miles of clouds and moon. Don't wait in vain, the youth's head is white, and it's sad!
context: 三十功名尘与土，八千里路云和月。莫等闲，白了少年头，空悲切！

original: The shame of Jingkang, not yet snowed. When will the hatred of the ministers be extinguished! Drive a long car and break through the Helan Mountain.
context: 靖康耻，犹未雪。臣子恨，何时灭！驾长车，踏破贺兰山缺。

original: Eat the meat of the barbarians with a strong will, laugh and drink the blood of the Huns. Wait to clean up the old mountains and rivers, and face the sky.
context: 壮志饥餐胡虏肉，笑谈渴饮匈奴血。待从头、收拾旧山河，朝天阙。

original: {PlayerName}, without being summoned into the palace, are you going to assassinate me?
context: {PlayerName}，无召入宫，你要行刺朕吗？

original: I want to vindicate Marshal Ye!
context: 我要为叶元帅平反！

original: Do you not accept the verdict of the Supreme Court?
context: 你对大理寺的裁决不认可吗？

original: An absurd frame-up, a few testimonies full of loopholes, how can anyone be convinced!
context: 一个荒谬绝伦的诬陷，几个漏洞百出的证词，如何叫人信服！

original: Qin Huizhi, you know martial arts?
context: 秦会之，你竟然会武功？

original: Heh heh, he's more than just knowing martial arts, you guys might even be old acquaintances.
context: 嘿嘿，他岂止会武功，你们可能还是老熟人呢。

original: {PlayerName}, can you handle my real strength?
context: {PlayerName}，本官的真正实力你能否接的下呢？

original: Arrest the traitor {PlayerName}!
context: 将乱臣贼子{PlayerName}拿下！

original: Your Majesty, I just want justice, don't force me to commit regicide!
context: 陛下，我只要一个公道，不要逼我弑君！

original: What is the justice you want?
context: 你要的公道是什么？

original: Your Majesty's golden words, to vindicate Marshal Ye, and to recover the Ye Family Battalion.
context: 陛下金口玉言，为叶元帅昭雪，恢复叶家军编制。

original: {PlayerName}, how about I appoint you as the deputy of the Privy Council? This is a high-ranking official with great power, why are you so attached to the Ye Family Battalion?
context: {PlayerName}，朕封你枢密院副使如何？这可是权倾朝野的大官，何必对叶家军恋恋不舍？

original: I just want Your Majesty to vindicate Marshal Ye and the Ye Family Battalion!
context: 我只要陛下为叶元帅、叶家军平反昭雪！

original: Alright, I was misled by treacherous words and wrongfully killed a loyal minister. From today, I will restore the honor of the Ye family, reactivate the Ye Family Battalion, and announce it to the world!
context: 好吧，朕误听奸佞之言，错杀忠臣，即日起恢复叶家荣誉，重新启用叶家军，昭告天下！

original: Misled by treacherous words, shouldn't this traitor be punished?
context: 误听奸佞之言，这奸佞不该问罪吗？

original: Qin Huizhi, since you are loyal to me, I need to borrow something from you for my current plan.
context: 秦会之，你既然忠心为朕，如今之计朕需要向你借去一物。

original: May I ask what Your Majesty wants to borrow?
context: 请问陛下要借臣何物？

original: I want to borrow your head to appease the people.
context: 借你项上人头，以安民心。

original: Your Majesty, I have been serving you since I was in the hidden residence, can you really bear to execute me?
context: 陛下，微臣在潜邸时就跟在您身边做事，您真忍心处死微臣吗？

original: If I could bear to let go of Ye Pengju back then, why can't I let go of you now?
context: 朕当初能舍得叶鹏举，如今为何舍不得你？

original: I understand.
context: 微臣知道了。

original: {PlayerName}, fight with me, if you win, I am willing to accept punishment!
context: {PlayerName}，跟我一战，你若胜我，我甘愿伏诛！

original: I'll let you die in peace!
context: 就让你死得瞑目！

original: {yell} Ye Pengju, a life for a life, I owe you this life!
context: {yell}叶鹏举，一命换一命，这条命我赔给你了！

original: Drag Qin Huizhi's body out and behead it for public display!
context: 把秦会之尸身拉出去枭首示众！

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Well done, Nine Factions Sect, you dare to rebel!
context: 好个九流门，你们胆敢造反吗！

original: Your Majesty, we Nine Factions Sect are not your disposable chamber pot, from now on Nine Factions Sect will no longer obey your orders, we will cut ties from now on.
context: 昏君，我们九流门可不是你随手可用的夜壶，从此九流门不再尊你号令，从今往后一刀两断。

original: The Qin family plotted against the loyal and good, execute them all; the Nine Factions Sect are all rebels, exterminate their nine clans!!!
context: 秦氏一族谋害忠良，满门抄斩；九流门上下俱为叛逆，株连九族！！！

original: {PlayerName}, are you satisfied now?
context: {PlayerName}，你现在可还满意了？

original: My wish has been fulfilled.
context: 我心愿已了。

original: Get as far away from me as possible, I don't want to see you again!
context: 给朕滚得越远越好，朕不想再看到你！

original: Yes, Your Majesty!
context: 遵旨！

original: In order to protect his own safety, the emperor had to sacrifice a pawn.
context: 陛下为保自身安危，只能选择弃车保帅。

original: While you are speculating, you should be prepared to be abandoned at any time.
context: 你在投机的同时，要做好随时沦为弃子的觉悟。

original: The merits and demerits of a thousand autumns will be judged by future generations, and you can only atone for your past wrong choices.
context: 千秋功过自有后人评说，而你只能为曾经的错误选择赎罪了。

original: Reward according to merit
context: 论功行赏

original: Go to the palace to meet the emperor.
context: 前往行宫，面见圣上。

original: (Received a pigeon message)
context: （接到飞鸽传书）

original: The emperor invited me to the palace to reward me for my merits...
context: 圣上邀我前往行宫论功行赏……

original: {PlayerName} pays respects to Your Majesty.
context: {PlayerName}拜见陛下。

original: All my beloved officials, please rise.
context: 众位爱卿平身。

original: Thank Your Majesty.
context: 谢陛下。

original: Now that the world is initially settled, all of you are meritorious officials, why should I be stingy with rewards.
context: 如今天下初定，诸位爱卿皆是有功之臣，朕何须吝惜赏赐。

original: Tong, my beloved official, has collected evidence of crimes, arrested rebels, and made great contributions. He is appointed as the deputy privy councilor.
context: 佟爱卿收罗罪证、缉拿叛党、劳苦功高，授枢密副使。

original: Thank you, Your Majesty!
context: 谢陛下！

original: Qin, my beloved official, has planned and acted appropriately, promoted to the Duke of the State, and promoted to the Junior Guardian!
context: 秦爱卿运筹谋划、举措得当，进封国公，升少保！

original: Thank you, Your Majesty!
context: 谢陛下！

original: {PlayerSurName}, my beloved official, judged the situation and killed his relatives for justice, which greatly comforted my heart. He is appointed as the Grand Commandant, a first-rank official!
context: {PlayerSurName}爱卿审时度势大义灭亲，深慰朕心，授太尉，官居一品！

original: Thank you, Your Majesty!
context: 谢陛下！

original: Congratulations to all the officials on their promotions and wealth.
context: 众位大人升官发财，可喜可贺呀。

original: Fu Yaozi, I heard that you don't care about worldly affairs. What brings you to my palace today?
context: 扶摇子，朕听闻你老人家不问世事，今天来朕行宫有何贵干？

original: I had a brief encounter with Ye Pengju back in the day. Now that he has died under unclear circumstances, I have come to seek the truth.
context: 老夫与叶鹏举当年有一面之缘，如今他死的不明不白，老夫来问个究竟。

original: Ye Pengju amassed troops and intended to rebel. This was confirmed by his generals.
context: 叶鹏举拥兵自重，意图谋反，经其手下将领指证，确有此事。

original: Don't try to fool me with such childish tricks.
context: 这种骗小孩子的把戏不要在老夫面前卖弄。

original: Please answer me clearly, Mr. Qin, is it true that Ye Pengju was planning a rebellion?
context: 请秦大人明明白白回答老夫，叶鹏举谋反是否属实？

original: Well, although the evidence is insufficient, there might be some truth to it.
context: 这个，这个，证据虽然不足，但是事实可能是有的吧。

original: You sentenced Marshal Ye, a loyal and patriotic man, to death based on mere speculation?
context: 你们就凭这“莫须有”的猜测对忠君报国的叶元帅定了死罪？

original: Fu Yaozi, this is the Palace hall, not your Linlang Temple. Don't forget your manners in front of the emperor!
context: 扶摇子，这里是行宫大殿，不是你的琳琅馆，在圣上面前不要失了尊卑礼数！

original: Manners? Back in the day, I was on equal terms with the founding emperor. You are not qualified to lecture me on manners.
context: 礼数？当年老夫跟你们开国的太宗皇帝是平辈论交，凭你也配在老夫面前谈礼数？

original: I didn't expect you to be the old ancestor that the late emperor often mentioned, who secretly protected the luck of our royal family!
context: 想不到您就是先皇常提到的暗中保我皇室气运的老祖宗！

original: I pay my respects to the old ancestor.
context: 晚辈拜见老祖宗。

original: Your act of killing a meritorious official is against the will of heaven. I see your reign is coming to an end.
context: 擅杀功臣有违天和，老夫看你这座位快要坐到头了。

original: I beg for guidance from the old ancestor.
context: 恳请老祖宗指点。

original: Give me an explanation for Ye Pengju's case!
context: 叶鹏举之事，给老夫一个交代！

original: I was misled by treacherous officials and wrongly killed a loyal official. Starting from today, I will restore the honor of the Ye family, reactivate the Ye Family Battalion, and announce it to the world!
context: 朕误听奸佞之言，错杀忠臣，即日起恢复叶家荣誉，重新启用叶家军，昭告天下！

original: Misled by treacherous words, shouldn't this traitor be punished?
context: 误听奸佞之言，这奸佞不该问罪吗？

original: {PlayerName}, since you are loyal to me, I need to borrow something from you now.
context: {PlayerName}，你既然忠心为朕，如今之计朕需要向你借去一物。

original: May I ask what Your Majesty wants to borrow?
context: 请问陛下要借臣何物？

original: I want to borrow your head to appease the people.
context: 借你项上人头，以安民心。

original: Your Majesty, I am loyal to you. Can you really bear to execute me?
context: 陛下，微臣对您一片赤胆忠心，您真忍心处死微臣吗？

original: I am helpless in the face of the current situation.
context: 形势所迫，朕也是无能为力啊。

original: I understand.
context: 微臣知道了。

original: Fu Yaozi, fight me. If you win, I am willing to accept my punishment!
context: 扶摇子，跟我一战，你若胜我，我甘愿伏诛！

original: As you wish!
context: 如你所愿！

original: Thank Your Majesty.
context: 谢陛下。

original: Now that the world is initially settled, all of you are meritorious officials, why should I be stingy with rewards.
context: 如今天下初定，诸位爱卿皆是有功之臣，朕何须吝惜赏赐。

original: By the grace of heaven, the emperor decrees: Tong Ai, for collecting evidence of crimes, arresting rebels, and making great contributions, is appointed as the deputy of the Secretariat.
context: 奉天承运，皇帝诏曰：佟爱卿收罗罪证、缉拿叛党、劳苦功高，授枢密副使。

original: Thank you, Your Majesty!
context: 谢陛下！

original: By the grace of heaven, the emperor decrees: Qin Ai, for his strategic planning and appropriate measures, is promoted to the Duke of the country and ascends to the position of Shao Bao!
context: 奉天承运，皇帝诏曰：秦爱卿运筹谋划、举措得当，进封国公，升少保！

original: Thank you, Your Majesty!
context: 谢陛下！

original: By the grace of heaven, the emperor decrees: {PlayerSurName}...
context: 奉天承运，皇帝诏曰：{PlayerSurName}爱卿……

original: Read it out loud, I want everyone in the court to hear it.
context: 大声念，我要让满朝文武全都听到。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Hmph, that's all.
context: 哼，不过如此。

original:
When a country is about to prosper, there will be auspicious signs; when a country is about to perish, there will be evil omens.
{PlayerName}, you should take care of yourself.
context:
国之将兴，必有祯祥；国之将亡，必有妖孽。
{PlayerName}，你好自为之吧。

original: Everyone, leave. I want to be alone for a while.
context: 都退下吧，朕想自己一个人呆一会。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: Under your leadership, the Ye Family Battalion has grown stronger and stronger, becoming the strongest army in the world.
context: 叶家军在你的带领下日益壮大，成为当世最强的一支军队。

original: You command the army to fight in all directions. Wherever you appear, the enemy flees.
context: 你统帅大军征战四方，只要有你出现的地方，敌人无不望风而逃。

original: Although you are not satisfied with the court's practices, as a subject,
context: 你虽然不满朝廷的种种做派，但是身为臣子，

original: As a general, only Loyalty matters.
context: 身为将帅，唯有尽忠报国，如此而已。

original: Should I return to the Ye Family Battalion, carry forward Marshal Ye's spirit of loyalty, and fulfill his unfulfilled wish?
context: 我是否要重回叶家军，发扬叶元帅尽忠报国的精神，完成他未完成的心愿呢？

original: Return to Ye Family Battalion.
context: 重返叶家军。

original: There are still things to be done.
context: 还有事情尚未完成。

original: All generals, listen to my command!
context: 众将听令！

original: The story of the Ye Family Battalion has come to an end here. If you continue to travel in the martial arts world, you will leave the Ye Family Battalion and restore the protagonist's image.
context: 叶家军的故事到此已经告一段落，如果继续游历江湖将会退出叶家军并还原主角形象。

original: Old man, what's bothering you that you're sighing here?
context: 老人家因为何事，在此长吁短叹？

original: I'm nearly sixty, and my lifelong wish is to study in this Confucius Temple. Unfortunately, I've been turned away more than a dozen times.
context: 老夫年近六旬，毕生心愿就是能进这儒圣馆求学，可惜十数次登门都被拦下了。

original: This Confucius Temple is not a wall of steel, is it that hard to get in?
context: 这儒圣馆又不是铜墙铁壁，有那么难进吗？

original: You'll know when you try.
context: 你去试试就知道了。

original: Now you know how tough it is, right? This Confucius Temple has strict rules, and only graduates or famous scholars are allowed in.
context:
这下知道厉害了吧？
这儒圣馆规矩森严，非举人身份或者名人雅士不得入内。

original: How can I get a graduate degree?
context: 要如何才能弄到举人身份呢？

original: It's not easy to become a scholar. First, you need to pass the test of the old scholar in the Dragon Library in Chuxiang City, then go to the Chuxiang City Government Office to take the preliminary examination and become a "scholar".
context: 想要考取举人谈何容易，先要到楚襄城通过隆中书院老学究的测试，然后到楚襄城衙门参加院试，考取“秀才”。

original: With the Scholar title, you can then go to the Daliang City Imperial School to pass the test of the schoolmaster, and then to the Daliang Government Office to take the provincial examination. Only those with excellent results can become a "graduate"!
context: 有了秀才身份，再去大梁城太学馆通过馆主考验，再到大梁衙门参加乡试，成绩优异才能获得“举人”身份！

original: May I ask what your current status is, old man?
context: 请问老人家如今是什么身份？

original: Don't underestimate me just because I'm a scholar. When it comes to learning, I'm no less than those pedants who open schools to teach.
context: 别看老夫只是童生，论起做学问丝毫不比那些开馆授学的学究水平差。

original: Nearly sixty years old and still haven't passed the imperial examination... If Confucius Temple really lets you in, its reputation would be ruined.
context: 年近六旬，秀才也没考上……儒圣馆若真让您进了，这招牌也就算是毁了。

original:
What a sin, what a sin......
The reckless man acts without considering the consequences, Confucius Temple will not let you off easily.
context:
造孽啊，造孽啊……
莽夫行事不计后果，儒圣馆岂会跟你善罢甘休。

original: {PlayerSurName}Young friend {Fame} is well-known far and wide, who doesn't know about you now? {PlayerSurName}If you can make a name for yourself in {Confucius Temple} in the future, please put in a good word for this old man, I would be eternally grateful.
context: {PlayerSurName}小友名声在外，如今谁人不知谁人不晓。{PlayerSurName}小友将来若能在儒圣馆混出名堂，还请帮老夫美言几句，老夫感激不尽。

original:
Could it be that you are the reincarnation of the God of Literature?
If not, how could you have easily achieved the title of scholar at such a young age!
context:
你莫不是文曲星转世临凡？
若非如此，怎能年纪轻轻便轻松考取举人功名！

original: The waves behind drive on those before, new people replace the old in the world of affairs.
context: 长江后浪推前浪，浮事新人换旧人。

original: This Confucius Temple, which once witnessed the rise and fall of the literary world, no longer exists. What's the point of my living...
context: 这关系文坛兴衰的儒圣馆已经不复存在，老夫活着还有什么意义……

original: I've passed the imperial examination, I've passed the imperial examination!
context: 老夫中举了，老夫中举了！

original: I am a successful candidate in the imperial examination, who dares to stop me!
context: 老夫是举人了，谁还敢拦老夫！

original: Hahaha, I've passed the imperial examination, I've passed the imperial examination!
context: 哈哈哈，老夫中举了，老夫中举了！

original: Hit! Hit!
context: 中了！中了！

original: Confucius Temple, I have arrived today!
context: 儒圣馆，老夫今日来了！

original: I have endured for decades, and finally got what I wished for.
context: 老夫苦熬了几十年，终于如愿了。

original: What a Confucius Temple, monopolizing the literary world...
context: 好个儒圣馆，好个独占文坛鳌头……

original: Decades of cold and heat, all for today...
context: 数十载寒暑，只为今朝……

original: {yell} Damn the Confucius Temple!
context: {yell}去他的狗屁儒圣馆！

original: Old man, watch your mouth!
context: 老家伙，嘴里放干净些！

original: Seek medical help
context: 求医救人

original: Treatment
context: 救治

original: Find someone who understands Medical to treat the elderly in Daliang City with leg and foot problems.
context: 找懂医术的人救治大梁城腿脚不便的老者。

original: Give the medicine to the old man with mobility difficulties.
context: 把药交给腿脚不便的老者。

original: Young man, I'm having trouble moving, could you help me with something?
context: 少年人，老朽行动不便，可否帮老朽做件事？

original: What do you need help with, sir?
context: 老人家有何事需要帮助？

original:
I've been suffering from a leg disease for many years, and it's unbearable when it's damp and cold. 
Could you please find a highly skilled doctor in Medical for me?
context:
老朽身患腿疾多年，每到阴湿严寒之际便疼痛难忍。
请你帮老朽找来医术高明的大夫，给老朽诊治诊治。

original: Haven't you sought treatment from the doctors in the Clinic House in this city?
context: 老人家没去找这城里回春堂的大夫诊治吗？

original: These doctors always say they have a parental heart for their patients, but do you think they would save a poor person without a penny? I've spent all my savings on treating my leg disease over the years, and I can't afford to pay a penny more.
context: 这些大夫口口声声医者父母心，你看他们会去救身无分文的穷苦人吗？老朽这些年为了看腿疾，积蓄全都花光了，再也掏不起一文钱了。

original: So, even if I find a doctor for you, you definitely can't afford the consultation fee, right?
context: 这么说，即便我帮你找来大夫，您也肯定是支付不起诊费的吧？

original: Yes, that's right...
context: 是，是的……

original: You're in luck, I happen to be proficient in Medical, I'll examine you first.
context: 算您运气好，我恰巧精通医术，就先给您诊治一番吧。

original: The combination of wind, cold, and dampness leads to arthralgia syndrome. If the wind is dominant, it's moving arthralgia; if the cold is dominant, it's painful arthralgia; if the dampness is dominant, it's fixed arthralgia.
context: 风寒湿三气杂至，合而为痹也。其风气胜者为行痹，寒气胜者为痛痹，湿气胜者为著痹也。

original: Sir, you have a combination of wind, dampness, and cold. To be honest, it's a miracle that you've held on until now.
context: 老人家您这是风、湿、寒三者齐备，说实话能撑到现在已经算是奇迹了。

original: Your disease has reached an incurable stage, even if I do my best, I can only help you to unblock your blood vessels and temporarily relieve the pain.
context: 您这病已经深入膏肓无法根治，即便我竭尽全力，只能帮您疏通血脉，暂缓疼痛。

original: I didn't expect you to be so young and yet you described my condition accurately. Even if you can alleviate a bit of my pain, I would be very grateful.
context: 看不出你年纪轻轻竟把这病症说的丝毫不差，即便是减轻分毫痛楚也让老朽感激不尽了。

original: (Healing the old man's disease is quite laborious and time-consuming, do you want to help?)
context: （治疗老者病症颇为费力耗时，是否要出手救治？）

original: Treat the old man! (Consume 2 shichen, Stamina 100)
context: 救治老者！（消耗2个时辰、体力100）

original: Wait a moment.
context: 稍等片刻。

original: Young man, you should finish what you've started, I'll be waiting for you here.
context: 少年人，做事要有始有终，老朽可在这一直等着你。

original: Can you treat me now?
context: 现在可以为老朽医治了吗？

original: Sir, how do you feel now?
context: 老人家，您试试感觉如何？

original: It's indeed much more comfortable, it feels like my body is much lighter, and it's not so painful anymore.
context: 果然舒坦多了，好像身子骨都轻松许多，果然不那么疼了。

original: The little miracle doctor really has a magic touch in Regenerate, but about the consultation fee...
context: 小神医当真是妙手回春，只是这诊费……

original: It's a small effort, I never expected your consultation fee anyway.
context: 举手之劳，本来就没指望收您诊费。

original: I have nothing to repay you with, this little trinket is of no use to me, I'll give it to you.
context: 老朽无以为报，这件小玩意留在老朽身上也没什么用处，就赠送给你吧。

original: And this jade bamboo, I'll give it to you as well, this thing should be useful to you.
context: 还有这件玉竹也一并送你了，这件东西想必对你会有用处。

original: "Benevolence" inscripted jade bamboo! How did you get it?
context: 仁字玉竹！怎么会在你身上?

original: Cannot say, cannot say.
context: 不可说，不可说

original: The combination of wind, cold, and dampness leads to arthralgia syndrome. If the wind is dominant, it's moving arthralgia; if the cold is dominant, it's painful arthralgia; if the dampness is dominant, it's fixed arthralgia.
context: 风寒湿三气杂至，合而为痹也。其风气胜者为行痹，寒气胜者为痛痹，湿气胜者为著痹也。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, this old man has wind, dampness, and cold all at once, his disease is incurable, even if I try to save him, at most I can only dredge his blood vessels and temporarily relieve his pain.
context: {PlayerGivenName}，这位老人家风、湿、寒三者齐备，已经病入膏肓无法根治了，即便让我出手救治，最多也只能疏通血脉，暂缓疼痛。

original: Please Qu Wangyou to save him. (Consume 1 shichen)
context: 请曲忘忧出手救治。（消耗1个时辰）

original: Wait a moment.
context: 稍等片刻。

original: Old man, bear with the pain, I will heal you, it can alleviate the pain.
context: 老人家，您忍着点疼，我这就为你治疗，可以减缓病痛。

original: What can a little girl like you do, how dare you boast.
context: 你一个小姑娘能有多大本事，怎么也敢夸口。

original: Old man, rest assured, Miss Wangyou's medical skills are not comparable to those of ordinary doctors.
context: 老人家尽管放心，忘忧姑娘医术可不是世俗那些庸医能够相提并论的。

original: Alright, let's treat a dead horse as if it were alive.
context: 好，死马就当活马医吧。

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Sir, how do you feel now?
context: 老人家，您试试感觉如何？

original: It's indeed much more comfortable, it feels like my body is much lighter, and it's not so painful anymore.
context: 果然舒坦多了，好像身子骨都轻松许多，果然不那么疼了。

original: The little girl is really a reincarnation of Hua Tuo, a miraculous hand regenerates, but this consultation fee...
context: 小姑娘真是华佗再世、妙手回春，只是这诊费……

original: It's a small effort, I never expected your consultation fee anyway.
context: 举手之劳，本来就没指望收您诊费。

original: I have nothing to repay you with, this little trinket is of no use to me, I'll give it to you.
context: 老朽无以为报，这件小玩意留在老朽身上也没什么用处，就赠送给你吧。

original: Alas, this is not easy to handle, let me think about it.
context: 唉，这事情不太好办啊，我想想办法吧。

original: I'll wait here for your good news.
context: 老朽就在这等你的好消息。

original: There is an old man in the city who is suffering from a leg disease and can't move around. Could you please make a house call to help him out?
context: 请问这城里有位老者身患腿疾行动不便，请您出诊帮忙查看一番如何？

original: You're talking about the old man in the wheelchair, right? No need to bother with a visit, I know his condition and how to treat it.
context: 你说的是那坐轮车的白发老头吧？不用费力气出诊，我知道他的病症，也知道该如何医治。

original: If that's the case, please tell me how to treat him, so that the old man doesn't have to suffer every day.
context: 既然如此就请告知医治的法子，好叫那老者不必天天受痛苦折磨。

original: He has damp cold in his legs, it's impossible to cure, he can only rely on medicine to relieve the pain, and it takes at least ten days to see some effect.
context: 他那是腿部湿寒入体，想要根治简直是不可能，只能靠吃药缓解病痛，而且要连服十数天才能略见成效。

original: I heard that the old man doesn't have much money, this medicine costs at least twenty guan, are you going to pay for him?
context: 听说那老头可没什么钱，这药钱至少也要二十贯，莫非你们要为他垫付？

original: Pay twenty guan for the medicine (need 20000 wen)
context: 交付二十贯药费（需20000文）

original: Wait a moment.
context: 稍等片刻。

original: If you don't have money, don't pretend to be a hero, be careful not to lose your capital.
context: 没钱就别充英雄好汉，当心血本无归。

original: Have you got the money? That old man is lucky to have met you, a fool.
context: 凑到钱了？那老头遇到你这傻子真算他好命。

original: That old man is lucky to have met you, a fool.
context: 那老头遇到你这傻子真算他好命。

original: Old man, I've got the medicine for your disease.
context: 老人家，治疗病症的药我帮您取来了。

original: Now I don't have to suffer anymore, but this medicine must not be cheap.
context: 这下老朽终于不必再受罪了，只是这药钱想必不便宜吧。

original: Consider this medicine a gift to you, I hope it works.
context: 这药就当送您好了，希望能够有效。

original: I have nothing to repay you with, this little trinket is of no use to me, I'll give it to you.
context: 老朽无以为报，这件小玩意留在老朽身上也没什么用处，就赠送给你吧。

original: The combination of wind, cold, and dampness leads to arthralgia syndrome. If the wind is dominant, it's moving arthralgia; if the cold is dominant, it's painful arthralgia; if the dampness is dominant, it's fixed arthralgia.
context: 风寒湿三气杂至，合而为痹也。其风气胜者为行痹，寒气胜者为痛痹，湿气胜者为著痹也。

original: This old brother has all three conditions of wind, dampness, and cold, and his disease has reached an incurable stage. My medical skills are limited, I can only temporarily alleviate his pain and cannot cure him.
context: 这位老兄弟风、湿、寒三者齐备，已经病入膏肓无法根治了，老夫医术有限，只能暂缓其病痛无法根治。

original: Please ask the old man to save him. (Consume 1 shichen)
context: 请白头翁出手救治。（消耗1个时辰）

original: Wait a moment.
context: 稍等片刻。

original: Old brother, bear with the pain, I will heal you right now, it can alleviate the pain.
context: 老兄弟，忍着点疼，老哥这就为你治疗，可以减缓病痛。

original: Well, you can just treat a dead horse as a live horse doctor.
context: 嗯嗯，您就死马当活马医吧。

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Old brother, how do you feel?
context: 老兄弟，你试试感觉如何？

original: It's indeed much more comfortable, it feels like my body is much lighter, and it's not so painful anymore.
context: 果然舒坦多了，好像身子骨都轻松许多，果然不那么疼了。

original: Old brother, you are really skilled, but this medical fee...
context: 老哥果然本事不俗，不过这诊费……

original: Saving lives and healing the wounded is the duty of a doctor. Since we met, it's fate, I won't charge for this consultation.
context: 救死扶伤是医者本分，既然遇到便是缘份，这诊费分文不取。

original: It would be great if there were more doctors like you who are compassionate.
context: 要是多些你这样心怀慈悲的医者可就好咯。

original: I guessed you would come back, you came for this piece of jade bamboo, right?
context: 老朽猜到你会回来，你是为这段玉竹而来的吧？

original: Indeed it's with the old man, I wonder if you could give it to me, it's very important to me.
context: 果然是在老人家身上，不知是否可以割爱给我，这对我很重要。

original: Half of my life was saved by you, this little thing is nothing, why not give it to you, take it!
context: 老朽半条命都是你救的，这件小小的身外物何足挂齿，送给你又何妨，拿去！

original: Thank you, old man.
context: 多谢老人家。

original: Good deeds will be rewarded, good deeds will be rewarded~
context: 善有善报，善有善报~

original: Eliminate violence and help the weak
context: 除暴安良

original: Punish
context: 惩治

original: Go to the market to find the two young men who attacked the boxer.
context: 前往市集寻找两个偷袭拳师的年轻人。

original: The problem has been solved, reply to the boxer.
context: 事情已解决，回复拳师吧。

original: What happened to you, you seem to be seriously injured?
context: 你这是怎么了，好像伤得不轻？

original: Oh, don't mention it, I'm the head of a school, and I was just attacked by two young men.
context: 哎呀，别提了，我好歹也是一派之主，刚刚竟然被两个年轻人偷袭了。

original: These two young men came to admire my name, insisted on asking me for advice, we agreed to be friends through martial arts, and stop when we touch, I saw that they were young, and didn't want to hurt these youngsters, so I planned to play with them with one hand.
context: 这两个年轻人慕名而来，非要让我指点几招，本来说好以武会友、点到为止，我看他们年少，不忍心伤了这些小辈，于是打算单手跟他们随便比划比划。

original: I didn't expect these young people to have no respect for their elders, resorting to sneak attacks in a two-on-one fight. I can tell they are trained fighters, not weak at all, just not well-known yet. They plan to make a name for themselves by defeating me.
context: 没想到这些个年轻人一点也不尊敬前辈，二打一还要搞偷袭。我看得出，他们都是练家子，实力一点也不弱，只是还没什么名气，打算借打赢我的战绩出风头。

original: What can I do for you?
context: 我能帮你做些什么吗？

original: Before they start spreading rumors and slandering me, find them and make these young people realize their mistakes. People in the martial arts world should value peace and not resort to such tricks. Attacking two-on-one and using sneak attacks is simply against the martial arts code!
context: 趁他们还没四处造谣污蔑我之前，务必找到他们，让这些年轻人认识到错误，江湖人要以和为贵，不要搞这些小聪明，二打一搞偷袭，简直不讲武德！

original: Daliang City is so big, where should I look for them? Any clues?
context: 大梁城这么大，我要去哪找他们，有没有线索？

original: They seemed to be heading towards the Market. You must stop them as soon as possible. It's not just about preserving my personal dignity, but also about purifying the martial arts world. We can't let young people develop a mentality of getting something for nothing.
context: 他们像是往市集的方向去了，一定要尽快制止他们，不单单是维护我个人的颜面，也是为了净化江湖风气，不能给年轻人树立不劳而获的价值观。

original: Young man, the future of the martial arts world depends on you!
context: 小兄弟，江湖的未来全靠你了！

original: Young man, just teach those two disrespectful young men a lesson, don't be too harsh. We martial artists must win people over with virtue.
context: 小兄弟，那两个不讲武德的年轻人让他们长点教训就行，不要下手太重，咱们练武的，一定要以德服人。

original: The two young men who attacked you have received their deserved punishment. They won't do anything against the martial arts code again.
context: 偷袭你的两个年轻人已经受到应有的惩罚，以后不会再做出不讲武德的事情了。

original: I've finally saved face.
context: 面子总算保住了。

original: With them as an example, the martial arts world will surely improve. Nowadays, not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry can open a martial arts school and take on disciples.
context: 有他们做了榜样，江湖风气一定会有所好转，如今这世道可不是什么阿猫阿狗都能有资格开馆授徒的。

original: Young man, I see you are tall and slender, with long limbs and extraordinary bones. Are you interested in joining my Lightning Thunderbolt Sect? I guarantee you will learn our unique martial arts. Would you consider it?
context: 小兄弟，我看你身材高挑、四肢纤长、骨骼精奇，有没有兴趣加入我的闪电霹雳门，绝世神功包教包会，你考虑下？

original: No need to consider, I'm not interested.
context: 不用考虑了，没兴趣。

original: Ah, it's a pity to lose such a talent, truly a regret in life...
context: 唉，痛失英才，真是人生憾事……

original: <size=150%>Four ounces...
context: <size=150%>四两……

original: <size=200%>...can move a thousand pounds!!!
This Manual is the treasure of my sect. Since we've met, it's fate. I'll give it to you, young man.
context: 这本秘籍是我派镇派之宝，相逢便是有缘，就赠予小兄弟了。

original: I'll also give you this jade bamboo. I'm sure it will be of some use.
context: 还有这件玉竹也一并送你们了，这件东西想必会有点用处。

original: "Righteous" inscripted jade bamboo!
context: 义字玉竹！

original: Young man, take care of yourself in the future.
context: 小兄弟，今后好自为之吧。

original: Are we really going to wait here until dawn? Why don't we find a place to take a nap and come back when it's light?
context: 咱们真要在这里挨到天亮吗？要不先找个地方打个盹，天亮再过来。

original: Real estate is precious in big cities. If you don't grab a good spot early, this place will be taken by others tomorrow morning!
context: 大城市寸土寸金，你不趁早抢个好位置，明早这地方就被别人占了！

original: You said that as long as we come to the city and defeat one or two powerful people, we can open a martial arts school and make money, then we can eat and drink well. We even beat the master of the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect, but we haven't seen any benefits yet.
context: 当初你说只要来城里打赢一两个厉害人物，咱们就可以开武馆赚钱，以后就吃香的喝辣的。咱们可是把闪电霹雳门门主都给打惨了，现在也没见有啥好处。

original: That's why we need to strike while the iron is hot and promote ourselves in crowded places. Otherwise, who would know about our skills? Only when we become famous will people come to us willingly and pay to learn from us.
context: 所以才要趁热打铁找人多的地方宣传宣传，要不然谁知道咱哥俩的本事？只有出了名，人家才会慕名而来，心甘情愿给你掏钱拜师。

original: You say what to do, I'll follow your lead!
context: 你说咋办就咋办吧，我全听你的！

original: (It seems they are the ones who gain fame by sneak attacking others and disregarding the martial arts code.)
context: （看来他们就是靠偷袭别人，不讲武德，让自己出风头的家伙了。）

original: Step in and stop the two (trigger fight).
context: 上去制止两人（触发战斗）。

original: Let them go.
context: 放他们一马。

original: Are you two the scum of the martial arts world who gain fame by sneak attacking others?
context: 你们两个就是靠偷袭别人给自己涨名气的江湖败类吗？

original: Fists and feet have no eyes, victory or defeat depends on one's own ability, there's no such thing as sneak attacks.
context: 拳脚无眼，胜负各凭本事，哪有什么偷袭不偷袭。

original: We brothers just borrowed his fame for a bit, he won't lose a piece of meat, maybe he can even gain some fame along with us.
context: 咱兄弟借他的名气用一用，他又不会少块肉，说不定也能跟着涨些名气呢。

original: The values of young people nowadays are really worrying. It seems necessary to teach them a lesson personally.
context: 现在的年轻人三观真是堪忧，真是有必要亲自给他们上一课了。

original: You're not here to snatch this feng shui treasure land too, are you? My brothers and I have claimed this place, you should look elsewhere.
context: 你该不会也是来抢这风水宝地的吧，这地俺们兄弟占了，你另寻别处吧。

original: I'm tired of talking to you guys, let's just use fists to educate you.
context: 懒得再跟你们废话，还是用拳头教育你们吧。

original: Spare us, good man. We didn't know the rules. We'll clear out for you, this place is yours now.
context: 好汉饶命，咱兄弟不懂规矩，马上给您腾地，这块地方归您了。

original: Who wants this crappy place? I'm here to reason with you on behalf of the fist masters you ambushed.
context: 谁稀罕这破地方，我是代表被你们偷袭的拳师来给你们讲道理的。

original: Young man, harmony is precious in the martial world. Don't be aggressive and reckless. Uphold martial ethics, don't ambush, don't gang up, and don't use others' fame to boost your own...
context: 年轻人，江湖要以和为贵，不是好勇斗狠，要讲武德，不要搞偷袭，不要搞二打一，更不要借别人的名声给自己作势……

original: You guys need to reflect on this. Stay grounded, don't be impatient for quick success, and don't make such cunning moves in the future!
context: 你们要好好反思，要脚踏实地，不要急功近利，以后不要再犯这样的小聪明！

original: What you said makes sense, we will definitely remember it!
context: 您说的好有道理，我们一定牢记！

original: Today, let's talk about how we cracked the secret technique of the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect, and how we knocked down a martial arts grandmaster twice in a few moves.
context: 今天咱们就讲一讲，咱兄弟是如何破解了闪电霹雳门镇派绝学，又是如何几招之内把一名武学宗师接连揍倒两次的故事。

original: Good!|And then?|Impressive!|Hahahaha!
context: 好！|然后呢？|厉害！|哈哈哈哈！

original: (The face of the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect's leader is really lost today, should I stop these two guys?)
context: （这闪电霹雳门门主的面子今天可算是栽到家了，我是否要制止这两个家伙呢？）

original: Step in and stop the two (trigger fight).
context: 上去制止两人（触发战斗）。

original: Let them go.
context: 放他们一马。

original: Are you two the scum of the martial arts world who gain fame by sneak attacking others?
context: 你们两个就是靠偷袭别人给自己涨名气的江湖败类吗？

original: Fists and feet have no eyes, victory or defeat depends on one's own ability, there's no such thing as sneak attacks.
context: 拳脚无眼，胜负各凭本事，哪有什么偷袭不偷袭。

original: We brothers just borrowed his fame for a bit, he won't lose a piece of meat, maybe he can even gain some fame along with us.
context: 咱兄弟借他的名气用一用，他又不会少块肉，说不定也能跟着涨些名气呢。

original: Beat him up!|What are you dawdling for?|Haha!
context: 揍他！|磨蹭什么呢？|哈哈！

original: The values of young people nowadays are really worrying. It seems necessary to teach them a lesson personally.
context: 现在的年轻人三观真是堪忧，真是有必要亲自给他们上一课了。

original: You're not here to snatch this feng shui treasure land too, are you? My brothers and I have claimed this place, you should look elsewhere.
context: 你该不会也是来抢这风水宝地的吧，这地俺们兄弟占了，你另寻别处吧。

original: I'm tired of talking to you guys, let's just use fists to educate you.
context: 懒得再跟你们废话，还是用拳头教育你们吧。

original: Hey, I was enjoying the story, what are you messing around for, looking for death!
context: 喂，老子正听的带劲，你小子捣什么乱，找死！

original: Haha!|Well done!|Always bragging!|So miserable, but very funny!
context: 哈哈！|打的好！|成天吹牛！|好惨，不过很好笑！

original: Can't afford to provoke, can't afford to provoke.
context: 惹不起，惹不起

original: Spare us, good man. We didn't know the rules. We'll clear out for you, this place is yours now.
context: 好汉饶命，咱兄弟不懂规矩，马上给您腾地，这块地方归您了。

original: Who wants this crappy place? I'm here to reason with you on behalf of the fist masters you ambushed.
context: 谁稀罕这破地方，我是代表被你们偷袭的拳师来给你们讲道理的。

original: Young man, harmony is precious in the martial world. Don't be aggressive and reckless. Uphold martial ethics, don't ambush, don't gang up, and don't use others' fame to boost your own...
context: 年轻人，江湖要以和为贵，不是好勇斗狠，要讲武德，不要搞偷袭，不要搞二打一，更不要借别人的名声给自己作势……

original: You guys need to reflect on this. Stay grounded, don't be impatient for quick success, and don't make such cunning moves in the future!
context: 你们要好好反思，要脚踏实地，不要急功近利，以后不要再犯这样的小聪明！

original: What you said makes sense, we will definitely remember it!
context: 您说的好有道理，我们一定牢记！

original: Scene transition, the two disappear.
context: 黑幕过渡，两人消失

original: They're gone!|Boring!|That's it?|Huh?
context: 走了！|没劲！|就这？|啊？

original: Young man, have you changed your mind and want to join the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect?
context: 小兄弟莫非回心转意，要来加入闪电霹雳门吗？

original: I'm looking for another piece of bamboo with inscriptions. If you have any clues, I hope you can enlighten me.
context: 我现在再找一段刻字的青竹，如果有其线索，还望不吝赐教。

original: Since you came all the way to find me, I can't let you leave empty-handed. Here's a little something for you.
context:
你既然专程来找我，总不能叫你空手而回。
不就是一个小玩意吗，你拿去就是。

original: Thank you for your generosity.
context: 多谢割爱。

original: Take care of yourself, young man~
context: 小兄弟，今后好自为之~

original: Shoe Loss
context: 丢鞋

original: Kid, I lost one of my straw sandals. Go find it for me.
context: 小子，老人家的草鞋走丢了一只，你去给老人家捡回来。

original: Why do you ask me to pick it up among so many people?
context: 那么多人，为什么偏叫我去捡？

original: Only you are willing to talk to me, can't you see everyone else is avoiding me?
context: 只有你肯跟我老人家说话，没看见其他人都远远躲开了吗。

original: It seems that the shoe was lost near this <color=#c44b0e>bridge</color>, you'll have to find it yourself.
context: 好像这鞋是丢在这<color=#c44b0e>桥</color>的附近了，具体在哪就要靠你自己去找了。

original: Where are my straw shoes?
context: 老人家的草鞋呢？

original: Hmm, hmm, this is the smell, it seems you have found my straw sandal.
context: 嗯，嗯，就是这个味道，看来你已经把老人家的草鞋找来 了。

original: Since the shoes have been found, I'll take my leave.
context: 既然鞋已经找回，那么告辞了。

original: I just lost another straw sandal, go find it again.
context: 刚才老人家又丢了一只草鞋，你再去捡来吧。

original: I just picked up one, how did you lose another one?
context: 刚捡回一只，怎么又丢一只？

original: People have two feet, what's so strange about losing two sandals? Hurry up and go! The <color=#c44b0e>Baoguo Temple</color> is crowded, they shouldn't step on my sandal.
context:
人有两只脚，丢两只草鞋又有什么稀奇，快去快去！
<color=#c44b0e>保国寺</color>那里人忒多，应该不会把老人家的鞋踩坏吧。

original: Finally, my precious straw sandal is back, it's really killing me.
context: 老人家的宝贝草鞋终于找回来了，真是想煞人也。

original: You can get intimate with your straw shoes after I leave, can I go now?
context: 您等我走了再跟您的草鞋亲热吧，现在我应该可以走了吧？

original: What a pity, what a pity, my straw sandals are so unfortunate, they can never be reunited. One comes back, the other is lost again. I have to trouble you to find it again.
context: 可惜，可惜，老人家这双草鞋真是命苦，始终不能团圆，这只回来，另一只又丢了，只能继续麻烦你把它找回了。

original: You're deliberately messing with me, who has the time to find your tattered shoes!
context: 你这是存心整人吧，谁有闲工夫找你的破草鞋！

original: Oh dear, ever since the old man wandered in front of <color=#c44b0e>Duke Qi's Manor</color>, his feet have been cold. I don't know when he lost it.
context: 哎呀，老人家好像去<color=#c44b0e>齐王府</color>门前闲逛后，脚底就一直凉飕飕的，也不知啥时候丢的。

original: They say practice makes perfect, your eye for details can't escape the old man's straw shoes.
context: 都说熟能生巧，老人家的草鞋简直是逃不出你的火眼金睛。

original: Please spare me, if I do this boring thing again, I will collapse.
context: 您饶了我吧，再做这种无聊的事情，我会崩溃的。

original: Oh dear, another shoe is missing, what should I do?
context: 哎呀，又有一只鞋不见了，这可怎么办呢？

original: The mountain is nine ren high, but the work is one basket short. If it weren't for being chased by a mad dog at the door of the <color=#c44b0e>inn</color>, this shoe wouldn't have been lost.
context:
为山九仞，功亏一篑呐。
要不是在<color=#c44b0e>客栈</color>门口被疯狗追赶，这只鞋也不至于跑丢。

original: Hey, where are you going?
context: 喂，你要去哪？

original: I've delivered your straw shoes, find someone else if you lose them again.
context: 草鞋给您送到了，您再丢鞋就去找别人吧。

original: Even though you are unwilling, you still picked up shoes for the old man four times, how can the old man continue to trouble you with such sincerity.
context: 纵然你心有不甘，仍是为老人家拾鞋四次，如此诚意老人家还怎么忍心继续再为难你呢。

original: This little thing is a thank you gift for helping the old man pick up shoes.
context: 这件小东西就当作你帮老人拾鞋的谢礼吧。

original: And this jade bamboo, I'll give it to you too, this thing should be a bit useful.
context: 还有这件玉竹也一并送你了，这件东西想必会有点用处。

original: So it's the "Propriety" inscripted jade bamboo, it's actually on you?
context: 原来是礼字玉竹，竟然在您身上？

original: In ancient times, Zhang Liang gave shoes, now the young man picks up straw shoes, wonderful, wonderful.
context: 古有张良进履，今有小子拾草鞋，妙啊妙啊。

original: The old man doesn't have any straw shoes for you to pick up now, your dragon-slaying technique is useless here.
context: 老人家现在可没有草鞋再让你去捡了，你这屠龙技是无用武之地了。

original: Can the old man request to know the news of the inscripted jade bamboo?
context: 请教老人家可否知道刻字玉竹的消息？

original: The old man has been waiting for you to come and get it, if you come a little later, the old man will throw it out like a lost straw shoe, and you will have to turn over Daliang City to find it.
context: 老人家早等着你来取呢，要是来得再晚些，老人家就跟丢草鞋一样随意丢出去，让你翻遍大梁城才能找到。

original: The old man can finally go home and rest.
context: 老人家总算可以回家歇息咯。

original: (Pointed to a piece of paper in front of him)
context: （指了指面前一张写字的纸张）

original: "Solve five riddles, enjoy free food"
context: “解答五篇字谜，免费品美食”

original: Are you ready to solve the riddles now?
context: 现在准备解答字谜吗？

original: Start answering.
context: 开始解答。

original: Not free for now.
context: 暂时没空。

original: (Waved his hand, let him come another day)
context: （挥挥手，让改日再来）

original: (Shook his head, indicating that he couldn't guess the riddle today)
context: （摇头，示意今天不能再猜谜了）

original: (Nodded slightly, handed over a delicate snack)
context: （微微点头，递过一份精致点心）

original: (Handed you something else)
context: （又递给你一件东西）

original: This is...
context: 这是……

original: May I ask if the old woman knows the whereabouts of the jade bamboo?
context: 请问婆婆可否知道玉竹的下落？

original: (Looked at you with a meaningful look, then handed out an object)
context: （别有深意的看了你一眼，然后递出一物）

original: This is...
context: 这是……

original: Brother, I have an urgent matter to run away, can you help me look after the business?
context: 兄弟，我有急事离开一下，能否帮忙照看下生意？

original: Agree to help.
context: 同意帮忙。

original: Not convenient for now.
context: 暂时不方便。

original: No problem helping, but how should I look after the business?
context: 帮忙没问题，不过该如何照看生意？

original: It's simple, you just need to remember the prices of these fruits, and when customers come to buy, sell them at the prices I told you.
context: 很简单，你只需要记下这些水果的价格，有客人来买，按照我告诉你的价格卖给他们就好了。

original: If you get the price wrong and sell at a loss, you have to pay me; if you sell high, beware of customers making trouble and smashing the stall!
context: 若弄错了价格，卖亏了你要贴钱给我；若卖高了，当心客人闹事砸摊子！

original: Don't worry, just tell me the prices of these fruits.
context: 你放心好了，快把这些水果的价格告诉我吧。

original: You must remember!
context: 你可要记好了！

original: Apples are 9 wen per catty...
context: 苹果每斤9文钱……

original: Lychees are 24 wen per catty...
context: 荔枝每斤24文钱……

original: Sweet melons are 50 wen per catty...
context: 甜瓜每斤50文钱……

original: Did you remember all that?
context: 都记清楚了吗？

original: I remembered!
context: 记清楚了！

original: I didn't remember.
context: 没记住。

original: I'll leave this stall to you, I'll be back in a while.
context: 这个摊子就交给你了，一会我就回来。

original: Don't worry, I definitely won't smash your sign.
context: 放心好了，绝对砸不了你的招牌。

original: Give me <color=#c44b0e>five catties of apples</color>, calculate how much it costs.
context: 给我称<color=#c44b0e>五斤的苹果</color>，算一下要多少钱。

original: 45 wen.
context: 45文钱。

original: 54 wen (small price increase).
context: 54文钱（小幅涨价）。

original: 72 wen (large price increase).
context: 72文钱（大幅涨价）。

original: The money is well received, if it's delicious, come back to buy next time.
context: 钱收好咯，要是好吃，下次还来买。

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Shopkeeper, how do you sell these lychees?
context: 店家，你这个荔枝怎么卖的？

original: 24 copper coins per catty
context: 24文钱1斤

original: 30 copper coins per catty (slight price increase)
context: 30文钱1斤（小幅涨价）

original: 40 copper coins per catty (significant price increase)
context: 40文钱1斤(大幅涨价）

original: It's so cheap, give me ten catties.
context: 这么便宜，给我来十斤好了。

original: Well, the expensive ones must be tastier than the cheap ones. Let's start with ten catties.
context: 嗯，贵有贵的道理，一定比便宜的更好吃，先来十斤好了。

original:
The lychees this year are much more expensive than before, almost unaffordable.
Let's start with a little, give me ten catties, just to taste it.
context:
今年的荔枝比往年贵出不少，快要吃不起了。
先少来点，给我称十斤，尝尝鲜也就知足了。

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Brother, how much is this melon per catty?
context: 兄弟，这甜瓜多少钱一斤呐？

original: 50 copper coins per catty
context: 50文钱1斤

original: 100 copper coins per catty (significant price increase)
context: 100文钱1斤（大幅涨价）

original: 200 copper coins per catty (huge price increase)
context: 200文钱1斤（巨幅涨价）

original: Others sell for 50 copper coins per catty, you also sell for 50 copper coins per catty, what's different about your melon?
context: 别人卖50文1斤，你也卖50文1斤，你这瓜有啥跟别人与众不同的地方吗？

original: There's no difference, I'm just a stall keeper. The price is set by the stall owner, not a penny more or less.
context: 没啥不一样的，我就是看摊的，摊主说多少钱就是多少钱，一文不多一文不少。

original: Anyway, buying from anyone is the same, I'll buy twenty catties from you!
context: 反正买谁不是买，就在你这买二十斤！

original: Brother, can this melon cure all diseases when eaten?
context: 兄弟，你这瓜吃了能包治百病吗？

original: No.
context: 不能。

original: Can it prolong life?
context: 能延年益寿不？

original: I haven't tried.
context: 没试过。

original: So what's the use of eating this melon?
context: 那这瓜吃了有啥用？

original: Quench thirst, fill stomach.
context: 解渴，管饱。

original: I'll try your 100 copper coins per catty melon to see what's different from others. Give me twenty catties, I'll improve my meal today and have a full melon feast.
context: 我就尝尝你这100文1斤的瓜到底跟别家的有何不同，给我来二十斤的，今天改善伙食，做全套的甜瓜宴。

original: Is the skin of your melon made of gold, or are the melon seeds made of gold?
context: 你这瓜皮是金子做的，还是瓜粒子是金子做的？

original: Look around, where can you find melons now? Nowadays everything is expensive due to the chaos. If you think it's expensive, I think it's expensive too.
context: 你瞧瞧这现在哪有瓜啊？如今兵荒马乱，啥东西不贵？你嫌贵我还嫌贵呢。

original: Alright, pick one for me.
context: 好吧，给我挑一个。

original: Okay~
context: 好嘞~

original: Picking and choosing...
context: 挑挑拣拣……

original: How about this one, it's big and fat?
context: 这个怎么样，又肥又大？

original: Is this melon ripe?
context: 这瓜保熟吗？

original: As a fruit seller, how can I sell you unripe melons?
context: 开水果摊的，能卖给你生瓜蛋子？

original: Are you sure this melon is ripe?
context: 我就问你这瓜保熟吗？

original: Are you deliberately picking a fight? Take it or leave it!
context: 你是故意找茬吧？爱要不要！

original: What if it's not ripe?
context: 它要是不熟怎么办？

original: Well, if it's not ripe, I'll eat it myself, are you satisfied now?
context: 哎，要是不熟，我自己吃了它，满意了吧。

original: That's it, let's settle the bill.
context: 就它了，算钱吧。

original: Twenty catties, a total of 4000 copper coins, thank you for your patronage.
context: 二十斤，总共4000文，多谢惠顾。

original: 4000 copper coins for a melon, are you robbing me!
context: 4000文的瓜，你抢钱呐！

original: (This guy is obviously picking a fight, what should I do?)
context: （这家伙摆明故意找茬，我该怎么办？）

original: Don't think about running away without buying a melon!
context: 不买瓜别想离开！

original: No more melons for sale, drive away the passerby.
context: 瓜不卖了，赶走路人。

original: Wow, there's never been a tough nut to crack on this street, but today I've seen it all.
context: 呦呵，这条街上从来没出现硬茬子，今天倒让我开了眼了。

original: Brothers, smash his stall for me!
context: 兄弟们，把他的摊子给我砸了！

original: Forcing a sale, huh!
context: 强买强卖是吧！

original: You dare to smash my stall!
context: 你敢砸我摊子！

original: Brother, I was wrong, can't I buy this melon?
context: 大哥我错了，这瓜我买还不行吗。

original: You've smashed my stall, it's not something that can be settled with 4000 copper coins.
context: 这摊子都被你砸了，可不是4000文能说得过去的事了。

original: I'll compensate, I'll compensate all, I'll never dare to buy melons here again. I've only heard that buying Western Region cakes can bankrupt a family, I didn't expect that buying melons would end up the same way.
context: 我赔，我全赔，以后再也不敢再来买瓜了。之前只听说买西域糕点会倾家荡产，没想到如今买瓜也会同样下场。

original: Boo hoo hoo hoo hoo
context: 呜呜呜呜呜

original: You want to drive me away, huh...
context: 你赶我走是吧……

original: You dare to smash my stall!
context: 你敢砸我摊子！

original: Someone's beating people, someone's beating people
context: 打人啦，打人啦

original: Boo hoo hoo hoo hoo
context: 呜呜呜呜呜

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: {yell} My melon stall, who smashed my melon stall!
context: {yell}我的瓜摊，谁把我瓜摊砸了！

original:
Just now a troublemaker came, but I've already driven him away.
I'll compensate you for the loss of the stall, after all, I didn't take good care of it.
context:
刚才来个找茬闹事的，不过已经让我打跑了。
这摊子损失多少我赔你好了，毕竟是我没看护好摊子。

original:
The stall lost 8000 copper coins, sold five catties of apples, ten catties of lychees...
A total of 8285 copper coins.
context:
摊子损失8000文，卖出五斤苹果、十斤荔枝……
总共8285文。

original: Thank you for your hard work, it seems everything is still normal.
context: 辛苦你了，看来一切还都算正常。

original: You're finally back, let's hand over quickly, I still have to continue my journey in the martial arts world.
context: 你总算回来了，咱们赶紧交接一下，我还要继续闯荡江湖呢。

original:
Well, sold five catties of apples, ten catties of lychees, twenty catties of melons...
A total of 1285 copper coins.
context:
嗯，卖出五斤苹果、十斤荔枝、二十斤甜瓜……
共计1285文。

original: (It seems like I've made quite a bit of money, I really have a knack for business.)
context: （好像还赚了不少钱，我可真是做生意的天赋。）

original: I can't let you help for nothing, I have an Appliance here that doesn't look like much, but you've traveled more than me, it will be more valuable in your hands.
context: 不能让你白帮忙，我这有件看不出啥品相的器具，你四处游历肯定比我有见识，这东西在你手里更能发挥价值。

original: I'll gladly accept it.
context: 我就却之不恭啦。

original: Alright, here's the money for the goods, we're even now.
context: 好，这是卖货的钱，咱俩两清了。

original: I can't let you help for nothing, I have an Appliance here that doesn't look like much, but you've traveled more than me, it will be more valuable in your hands.
context: 不能让你白帮忙，我这有件看不出啥品相的器具，你四处游历肯定比我有见识，这东西在你手里更能发挥价值。

original: I'll gladly accept it.
context: 我就却之不恭啦。

original: I suppose you're looking for this item, I'll give it to you as well.
context: 想必你是在找这件东西吧，也一并送你了。

original: You're here for the jade bamboo, aren't you? Dream on, with your opportunistic business tactics, you don't deserve this jade bamboo, don't even think about entering the Confucius Temple.
context: 你是来找玉竹的吧？别做梦了，凭你做生意时的投机取巧，你就不配得到这玉竹，儒圣馆你就别想进了。

original: I've guessed your intention, take this jade bamboo.
context: 你的来意我已经猜到了，这玉竹拿去吧。

original: Thank you.
context: 多谢。

original: I didn't expect this person to have a "Benevolence" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
context: 想不到此人身上竟然有仁字玉竹，用这种手段取得玉竹，不知道会不会有什么不良后果。

original: I didn't expect this person to have a "Righteous" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
context: 想不到此人身上竟然有义字玉竹，用这种手段取得玉竹，不知道会不会有什么不良后果。

original: I didn't expect this person to have a "Propriety" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
context: 想不到此人身上竟然有礼字玉竹，用这种手段取得玉竹，不知道会不会有什么不良后果。

original: I didn't expect this person to have a "Wisdom" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
context: 想不到此人身上竟然有智字玉竹，用这种手段取得玉竹，不知道会不会有什么不良后果。

original: I didn't expect this person to have a "Trustworthy" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
context: 想不到此人身上竟然有信字玉竹，用这种手段取得玉竹，不知道会不会有什么不良后果。

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original: Our Tomb Raider Sect may not be a famous sect, but it's not something you can destroy as you wish!
context: 我们这摸金门虽不是什么名门大派，却也不是你想灭就能灭的！

original: Exterminate the Tomb Raider Sect.<color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
context: 剿灭摸金门。<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: I'm not interested in joking with you, be careful not to let you live to Run away!
context: 没兴趣跟你开这种玩笑，再要胡说当心不让你活着离开！

original: You're provoking, don't be too arrogant!
context: 你这是在挑衅，做人不要太狂妄！

original: You're seeking your own death, don't blame others!
context: 你自己找死，怪不得旁人！

original: I declare, the Tomb Raider Sect is hereby removed from the martial arts world!
context: 我宣布，摸金门自此从江湖上除名！

original: I didn't expect the small Tomb Raider Sect to have such strength, I almost lost my life there.
context: 想不到小小的摸金门竟然有这份实力，差点就把命丢在那里了。

original: I've treated you with such respect, but you're not thinking of repaying me, instead you're thinking of changing your allegiance. Have you thought about the consequences?
context: 老夫对你如此器重，你非但不思回报，反而想着改换门庭，如此不忠不义，你可想过后果？

original: I'll consider it a moment of confusion on your part, go out and cool off, I won't hold it against you.
context: 老夫当你一时糊涂，出去冷静冷静，老夫既往不咎。

original: Already decided!
context: 心意已决！

original: I'll take my leave.
context: 学生告退。

original: Good, good, good!
context: 好，好，好！

original: If I can cultivate you, I can also destroy you. Good materials and beautiful jade that can't be used by me, it's not a pity to destroy them.
context:
老夫既然能够栽培你，也能毁掉你。
良材美玉不能为我所用，毁之也不可惜。

original: So the master of the Confucius Temple who always talks about morality and righteousness is finally not going to pretend to be Honorable anymore?
context: 满口仁义道德的儒圣馆馆主终于不打算再装君子了吗？

original: There's no one around here, why should I pretend, do I still need to put on a show for you, a dying man?
context: 这四下无人，老夫何须再装，难道还要费尽心思装给你这个将死之人看吗？

original: With your strength, you still want to destroy me now, it's really a pipe dream.
context: 凭你的实力还想毁去现在的我，实在有些痴人说梦。

original: Do you think it's over?
context: 你以为这就结束了吗？

original: Kid, you should feel lucky, today I'll let you see my true strength before you die.
context: 小子，你应该感到庆幸，今天叫你临死前见识老夫真正的实力。

original: Your, your face...
context: 你，你的脸……

original: Go to hell!
context: 给老夫去死吧！

original: The prophecy can't be wrong, I'm the chosen one, how can this be...
context: 谶语是不会有错的，老夫是天命所归，怎会如此……

original: This Confucius Temple outfit is really uncomfortable, it's better to go back to my original look.
context: 儒圣馆这身装扮真叫人不舒服，还是回到原来的样子自在些。

original: It wasn't easy for you to join the Confucius Temple, there are countless people in the world who take pride in joining the Confucius Temple, how can you not cherish it?
context: 你加入儒圣馆殊为不易，这世上不知有多少人以加入儒圣馆为荣，而你怎能如此不知珍惜？

original: If you choose to leave now, not only will you lose the chance to return to Confucius Temple, but you will also have to return the sect token <color=#c44b0e>Gentleman gem</color>, renounce the sect talent <color=#c44b0e>Disciples of Confucius</color>, and all your hard-earned Sect contribution will be wiped out. Please think carefully before making a decision.
context: 此番你若退出，不但再无重返儒圣馆的可能，还要交回本门信物<color=#c44b0e>君子玉</color>，废除本门天赋<color=#c44b0e>儒者之风</color>，辛苦积攒的门派贡献也会一并抹去，你不妨仔细思量再做决断。

original: Already decided! <color=#097a76>(Return the Gentleman gem)</color>
context: 心意已决！<color=#097a76>（归还君子玉）</color>

original: Already decided, but the Gentleman gem is not with me.
context: 心意已决，但是君子玉已不在身上。

original: Break through the Four Sages Formation!
context: 闯四贤风流阵！

original: Think about it again
context: 再考虑下

original: Alas, if you insist on this, although I have a love for talent, I can't force you. From now on, you are no longer a disciple of Confucius Temple, and you can't show off in Confucius Temple attire.
context: 唉，你既然执意如此，老夫虽有爱才之心，也不便强人所难。你今后已不再是儒圣馆弟子，不得再以儒圣馆装扮示人。

original: {PlayerName} bids farewell to the master.
context: {PlayerName}拜别馆主。

original: Go, the mountains are high and the rivers are long, we will meet again.
context: 去吧，山高水远，后会有期。

original: As a disciple of Confucius Temple, you actually lost the token!
context: 身为儒圣馆弟子，竟把信物遗失！

original: Alas, forget it, since you insist on running away from Confucius Temple, and now you have lost the Gentleman gem, you can only break through the "Four Sages Formation" alone to let you go.
context: 唉，罢了，既然你执意要离开儒圣馆，如今又遗失了君子玉，唯有只身闯过“四贤风流阵”才能任你离去。

original: Are you ready to break through the formation?
context: 你准备好要闯阵了吗？

original: Ready!
context: 准备好了！

original: Wait a moment.
context: 稍等片刻。

original: You failed to break through the formation, you can't leave Confucius Temple yet.
context: 未能破阵成功，你还不能退出儒圣馆。

original: Phew, finally broke through the formation, can I run away now?
context: 吁，终于破阵成功，现在我可以离开了吧。

original: Well, I always keep my word, since you have broken through the formation, although I have a love for talent, I can't force you. From now on, you are no longer a disciple of Confucius Temple, and you can't show off in Confucius Temple attire.
context: 嗯，老夫一言九鼎，既然你已破阵，老夫虽有爱才之心，也不便强人所难。你今后已不再是儒圣馆弟子，不得再以儒圣馆装扮示人。

original: {PlayerName} bids farewell to the master.
context: {PlayerName}拜别馆主。

original: Go, the mountains are high and the rivers are long, we will meet again.
context: 去吧，山高水远，后会有期。

original: Exterminate
context: 剿灭

original: Ignorant boy, do you know what place this Confucius Temple is, dare to speak wildly?
context: 无知小子，你可知这儒圣馆是什么地方，竟敢口出狂言？

original: Destroy Confucius Temple! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the battle directly)</color>
context: 剿灭儒圣馆！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: I advise you to be cautious in your words and deeds, so as not to cause trouble.
context: 老夫奉劝你要谨言慎行，以免徒惹是非。

original: People think that Confucius Temple is just a gathering place for literati...
context: 世人都以为儒圣馆聚集的不过是舞文弄墨的文士清流……

original: People think that Confucius Temple is one of the three religions, but it's not worthy of the name...
context: 世人都以为儒圣馆跻身三教，名不副实……

original: Here and now, I will show you what is the number one Confucian sect in the world.
context: 今时今地，老夫便叫你见识何为天下第一儒门。

original: What is the number one Confucian sect in the world!
context: 何为儒门天下第一！

original: {PlayerName}, you are against Confucius Temple today, this is the beginning of our break!
context: {PlayerName}，你今日与儒圣馆为敌，便是你我决裂的开始！

original: {PlayerGivenName} boy, although you do things to my taste, but your actions today, I really can't agree.
context: {PlayerGivenName}小子，你虽然做事很对我的口味，但是你今天这番举动，实在叫我没法认同。

original: {PlayerName}, I don't care what you do, but I won't agree if you want to smash the sign of Confucius Temple.
context: {PlayerName}，你做别的事我不管，但是想砸了儒圣馆的招牌，我可不答应。

original: Sure enough, you can't judge a book by its cover, I didn't expect your scheming to be deeper than mine!
context: 果然人不可貌相，想不到你的心机比我还深！

original:
Confucius Temple is one of the three religions, and it is not to be offended easily.
I need to escape from here as soon as possible to avoid being entangled by the shrimp soldiers and crab generals.
context:
儒圣馆不亏三教之一，果然不是可以轻易冒犯的。
需得尽快逃离此地，免得被虾兵蟹将缠住手脚。

original: Is this the number one Confucian sect in the world you're talking about?
context: 这就是你说的天下第一儒门？

original: Is this what you call the number one Confucian sect in the world?
context: 这就是你所谓的儒门天下第一？

original: Do you think it's over?
context: 你以为这就结束了吗？

original: Kid, you should feel lucky, today I'll let you see my true strength before you die.
context: 小子，你应该感到庆幸，今天叫你临死前见识老夫真正的实力。

original: You, are you possessed?
context: 你，你入魔了？

original: Go to hell!
context: 给老夫去死吧！

original: The prophecy can't be wrong, I'm the chosen one, how can this be...
context: 谶语是不会有错的，老夫是天命所归，怎会如此……

original:
This place was once a land of etiquette and morality,
A place where saints and sages taught,
A profound and broad path of Confucianism.
At this moment, the joy in your heart is indescribable,
The holy land of morality that has been passed down for hundreds of years is now at your feet!
The sound of recitation is no longer heard, only a lament is heard everywhere.
The spirit of Confucianism will be passed on in other ways, but it has no more relations with the Confucius Temple,
From now on, the Confucius Temple only exists in people's memories...
context:
此处曾是礼仪德化之地，
是圣贤教化之所，
是博大精深的儒家正道。
此刻你心中的快意难以言表，
传承数百载的道德圣地如今倒在你的脚下！
诵读之声不在，遍地只闻一片哀歌。
儒家精神会以其他方式传承下去，但是与儒圣馆再无关系，
从此，儒圣馆只存在于众人回忆之中……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Confucius Temple, Annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>儒圣馆，覆灭！</color></size>

original: Stop, outsiders are not allowed to enter here.
context: 闲人止步，此处外人不得擅入。

original: Three Sects Demon Suppression
context: 三教镇魔

original: Demon Suppression
context: 镇魔

original: Go to Taoist Sect and Shifa Temple, find Zhong Yangzi and Hui Yuan, invite the successors of the two sects to gather at Confucius Temple.
context: 前往道玄宗、释法寺，分别找重阳子和慧元，邀请两家派传人来儒圣馆相聚。

original: Shifa Temple and Taoist Sect have agreed to the invitation, now return to Confucius Temple and report to Cai Yuanchang.
context: 释法寺、道玄宗都同意赴约，现在返回儒圣馆回禀蔡元常。

original: More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.
context: 十数年前，江湖上出现一位神秘人物，不知师承何处，只知身兼数门顶级武学，一身本领臻至化境。

original: This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
context: 此人不但只身挑起江湖上无数争端，甚至凭一喜之好，数次以强大武力干预燕赵两国战场局势，无论江湖还是庙堂，都已沦为他的掌中玩物。

original: The heads of the three sects joined forces, set up several times, after many twists and turns, paid a heavy price to capture him seriously injured.
context: 三教掌门联手，数次布局集，几经波折，付出惨痛代价这才把他重伤生擒。

original: Not only is this person outstanding in martial arts, but he also hides the internal strength Archives of the three sects. He is the only one in the world who knows their whereabouts. In order not to cut off the unique skills of the three sects, he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, and his life cannot be taken.
context: 此人不但武功卓绝，还藏匿了三教各自镇派内功典籍，当世只有他一人知道下落，为了三教绝学不致断绝，因此只能将其关押拷问，不能取其性命。

original: Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.
context: 寻常牢房已无法困住这位大魔头，因此三教再次联合，设计出一处困魔局，这才把魔头镇压下去。

original: There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
context: 每年有几天特定时日，是困魔局最为薄弱之时，为防止魔头脱困，三教传人经过相互比试之后，由战力最强之人在那几天负责坐镇局中看管魔头。

original: Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.
context: 看管魔头听起来是件苦差事，为什么还要比试之后，选出最厉害的人才有看管魔头的资格。

original: During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
context: 看管魔头这几日，若有机缘获得魔头指点一二，甚至从魔头口中探出镇派秘籍的只言片语，不但有益于门派，对自身修行更是大有裨益。

original: Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?
context: 三教派人一起去看管魔头不是更保险，大家也不用争来争去，若是打探出什么消息，大家一同收益不是更好？

original: Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
context: 先不说三教表面同气连枝，私下其实相互较劲；单是那魔头的古怪脾气和暴虐性子，岂容一堆人堂而皇之的看守他？说不定发起狠来，把这几人全都打杀了。

original: Risks and opportunities coexist...
context: 风险与机遇并存……

original: {PlayerName}, as the representative of Confucius Temple, you are to invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition to determine who will guard this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your own fortune.
context: {PlayerName}，本馆主要你代表儒圣馆，出面邀约另外两教传人进行比试，定出今年看守之人，能否抓住这次机缘，就看你个人造化了。

original: Yes, I will not disgrace the name of Confucius Temple!
context: 遵命，学生一定不会辱没儒圣馆的威名！

original: Please inform Master Cai that Shifa Temple will send a successor to attend the meeting on time.
context: 请施主告知蔡馆主，释法寺会派遣传人准时赴约。

original: That was easy? A bit unexpected. Aren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Confucius Temple?
context:
这么容易？有点出乎预料。
您不出个难题检验下我是否有资格代表儒圣馆吗？

original: Master Cai would not joke about such a serious matter as demon suppression. If he sent you, he must have his reasons. I don't need to worry about it.
context: 镇魔大事老衲相信蔡馆主不会儿戏，派你前来定然有他的道理，老衲不必为此忧虑。

original: Please inform Master Cai that Taoist Sect will send a successor to attend the meeting on time.
context: 请少侠告知蔡馆主，道玄宗会派遣传人准时赴约。

original: That was easy? A bit unexpected. Aren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Confucius Temple?
context:
这么容易？有点出乎预料。
您不出个难题检验下我是否有资格代表儒圣馆吗？

original: Master Cai would not joke about such a serious matter as demon suppression. If he sent you, he must have his reasons. I don't need to worry about it.
context: 镇魔大事老道相信蔡馆主不会儿戏，派你前来定然有他的道理，老道不必为此忧虑。

original: {PlayerSurName} senior brother, the little monk is here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄，小僧代表释法寺前来赴约。

original: You are really slow, poor monk has been waiting for you for half a day.
context: 施主脚程真慢，贫僧可是等你半天了。

original: You are polite, poor monk Lai Toudian, here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
context: 施主有礼了，贫僧癞头癫，代表释法寺前来赴约。

original: {PlayerSurName} senior brother, I'm here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
context: {PlayerSurName}师兄，小道代表道玄宗前来赴约。

original: You're slower than a turtle, if I had known, I would have taken a nap first.
context: 你可真是比乌龟爬还要慢，早知如此，本道爷先去睡上一觉了。

original: I'm La Tazhang, here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
context: 本道爷邋遢张，代表道玄宗前来赴约。

original: Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin. {PlayerName}, you are new here and may not understand the rules, let me explain them to you.
context:
如今三教传人已经到齐，比试即将开始。
{PlayerName}入门尚浅，不了解规则，本馆主先为你讲解一番。

original: {PlayerName}, you represent Confucius Temple and are the host of this competition. You need to go through three rounds of competition. In the first round, you and the successor of Taoist Sect will compete against Shifa Temple; in the second round, you and Shifa Temple will compete against Taoist Sect; in the third round, you will face the combined forces of the other two sects alone.
context: {PlayerName}你代表儒圣馆出战，是本次的东道主，需要经历三场比试，第一场你与道玄宗传人对抗释法寺；第二次你与释法寺对抗道玄宗；第三场独自应对两家联手。

original: If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon this year. If you lose any round, Confucius Temple will have nothing to do with this matter. Do you understand?
context: 三场全部胜出，今年就由你担负看守魔头的重任；中途只要输掉一场，此事便与我儒圣馆无缘，你可听明白了？

original: I understand.
context: 听明白了。

original: I don't understand.
context: 没听明白。

original: In that case, let's start now!
context: 既然如此，现在便开始吧！

original: I am here to learn from the two of you.
context: 贫僧来领教两位师弟高招。

original: I am here to learn from the two of you.
context: 小道来领教两位高招。

original: {PlayerSurName}, be careful.
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟当心了。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟请赐教！

original: The disciples of Confucius Temple are indeed well-deserved. This year, we will have to trouble {PlayerGivenName} to guard the demon.
context: 儒圣馆弟子果然名不虚传，今年就劳烦{PlayerGivenName}师弟看守魔头了。

original: I am here to learn from the two of you.
context: 贫僧来领教两位师弟高招。

original: Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
context: 打完没有，趁早打完，本道爷还要去逍遥快活呢。

original: Stop dawdling, let's get started.
context: 真是磨叽，快点开始吧。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
context: {PlayerGivenName}师弟请赐教！

original: Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
context: 谁爱去谁去，本道爷也不想再去陪那个魔头了。

original: Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
context: 你们来尝尝贫僧的十全大补丸滋味如何。

original: Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
context: 打完没有，趁早打完，本道爷还要去逍遥快活呢。

original: Stop dawdling, let's get started.
context: 真是磨叽，快点开始吧。

original: I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
context: 贫僧皮痒了，快给贫僧挠挠。

original: Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
context: 谁爱去谁去，本道爷也不想再去陪那个魔头了。

original: I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
context: 贫僧早就看腻了那魔头，这次换人正好，贫僧正好闲下来找乐子去咯。

original: Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
context: 你们来尝尝贫僧的十全大补丸滋味如何。

original: I am here to learn from the two of you.
context: 小道来领教两位高招。

original: {PlayerSurName}, be careful.
context: {PlayerSurName}师弟当心了。

original: I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
context: 贫僧皮痒了，快给贫僧挠挠。

original: I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
context: 贫僧早就看腻了那魔头，这次换人正好，贫僧正好闲下来找乐子去咯。

original: You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
context: 你伤势不轻，昏迷了几个时辰渐渐醒了过来。

original: Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
context: 唉，你已尽力了，此乃天意不必耿耿于怀。

original: {PlayerName}, you have indeed lived up to my expectations. Now, you will have to shoulder the responsibility of guarding that demon!
context: {PlayerName}，你果然没有辜负本馆主对你的期望，如今你便要肩负起看守那魔头的重任了！

original: The demon is now imprisoned under the stone tower in the Ice Prison of Lin'an CityYunlin Temple. I will tell you how to enter the Ice Prison...
context: 那魔头现在关押在<color=#c44b0e>霖安城云林寺里石塔下的冰牢中</color>，本馆主这就告诉你进入冰牢的法门……

original: You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
context: 你获知了进入冰牢的办法。

original: Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
context: 开启冰牢后，一旦进入冰牢，入口会自动关闭；<color=#c44b0e>直到五天之后才会重新开启</color>，若没有十足把握，千万不要仓促进入。

original: Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
context: 千万不要让那魔头逃脱，否则后果难以预料，切记切记。

original: I will remember your teachings, Master.
context: 学生一定牢记馆主教诲。

original: Only <#61C3C8>{PlayerName}</color> can participate in the battle
context: 仅限<#61C3C8>{PlayerName}</color>参战

key: BattleFieldWin_School-2030-10道玄宗传人vs释法寺传人

context: 击败<#61C3C8>全部敌人</color>
