original: Master, something terrible has happened! I failed, Lao Motou has broken free and escaped.
context:
馆主大事不好了！
学生无能，老魔头挣脱束缚逃跑了。

original: Confucius Temple is in great danger!
context: 儒圣馆要大难临头了！

original: Cai Yuanchang, you old fool, you should know that once I escape, I will come to settle the score with you first!
context: 蔡元常，你这个老匹夫，你应该知道老夫逃出生天一定会先来找你算账的吧！

original: Old friend, long time no see.
context: 老友，许久不见了。

original: Fake Honorable, who the hell is your old friend!
context: 伪君子，谁他娘是你老友！

original: Chu Kuangsheng, what brings you to Confucius Temple today?
context: 楚狂生，你今日造访儒圣馆有何指教？

original: Destroy Confucius Temple, topple the statue of Confucius, and by the way, skin you, the fake Honorable!
context: 拆了儒圣馆，推倒夫子像，顺便扒了你这伪君子的皮！

original: (This Lao Motou is up to no good, should I step forward to stop him?)
context: （这老魔头来者不善，我是否要站出来拦阻他？）

original: Step forward!<color=#c44b0e>Main character solo</color>
context: 挺身而出！<color=#c44b0e>主角单挑</color>

original: Remain silent.
context: 默不作声。

original: Confucius Temple is a place of saintly teachings, how dare you, a demon, speak such nonsense!
context: 儒圣馆乃圣人教化之地，岂容你这魔头口出狂言！

original: Kid, I spared your life before, since you don't appreciate it, I'll take this life back.
context: 小家伙，老夫之前饶你一命，既然不领情，这条命老夫就收走了。

original: Hmph, just as I thought.
context: 哼，不，不过如此。

original: Fake Honorable, are you going to stand by and watch your disciples die for you?
context: 伪君子，你要眼看着你的门人为你送死而无动于衷吗？

original: Lao Motou takes a step towards Cai Yuanchang with each word he speaks.
context: 老魔头一步步走向蔡元常，走一步说一句

original: When you were in trouble, it was I who saved your life and taught you martial arts!
context: 当年你落难时，是老夫救你性命，传你武功！

original: Take one step at a time.
context: 走一步说一句

original: When you and I became sworn brothers, you said that if I became the number one martial artist in the world, you would become the literary leader, and we would be equally famous in both literature and martial arts!
context: 当年你与老夫结义时，说老夫若以武力成为天下第一，你就要做文坛魁首，与老夫文武齐名！

original: Take one step at a time.
context: 走一步说一句

original: The Cold iron chain locked on my Lute bone was designed and supervised by you without sleep!
context: 锁在老夫琵琶骨的寒铁锁链是你不眠不休亲自设计、亲自督造！

original: Humph, defending the way and eliminating demons is the duty of the Confucius Temple, no personal feelings allowed!
context: 哼，卫道除魔是儒圣馆的本分，不容私情！

original: I will never make the foolish mistake of raising a tiger to cause trouble again, so...
context: 老夫再也不会做养虎为患的傻事了，所以……

original: {yell} You are hereby expelled from the Confucius Temple!!!
context: {yell}儒圣馆从此除名吧！！！

original: I didn't expect the head of the Confucius Temple to enhance his own power by resorting to side doors and left paths. You will soon suffer a backlash.
context: 想不到堂堂儒圣馆馆主竟然借助旁门左道提升自身功力，你很快就要遭受反噬了吧。

original: Nonsense!
context: 一派胡言！

original: Humph, fake Honorable!
context: 哼，伪君子！

original: Today I spare your life, let you suffer a backlash in the future and make you Desperated, that's the biggest punishment for you!
context: 今日留你一条命，日后遭受反噬让你痛不欲生，才是对你最大的惩罚！

original:
With this demon escaping, the martial arts world will surely be in turmoil.
You must hurry to improve your skills to cope with future uncertainties.
context:
这位魔头脱困，江湖势必掀起腥风血雨。
你们务必抓紧时间提升功力，用以应对将来不测之险。

original: Yes.
context: 是。

original: I didn't expect you to hide your skills before, now it's a bit tricky for the old man to deal with you.
context: 看不出来你这小家伙之前原来藏拙，如今老夫对上你也有些棘手了。

original: Lao Motou, surrender!
context: 老魔头，束手就擒吧！

original: Old man is curious where this little guy gets his confidence from?
context: 老夫很好奇你这小家伙哪里来的自信？

original: The reason I came here is to inform all of you old friends that I have returned to the martial arts world! Those who were involved in that incident back then, none of you can escape, I will settle the scores with you one by one.
context: 老夫此番前来就是跟各位故交知会一声，老夫重出江湖了！参与当年那件事的人，一个都跑不了，老夫会一笔债一笔债跟你们清算。

original: Kid, the head of the Confucius Temple behind you is very ambitious, be careful not to be used as a pawn without knowing it.
context: 小家伙，你身后这位蔡馆主野心大得很，小心被人当枪使尚不自知。

original:
With this demon escaping, the martial arts world will surely be in turmoil.
You have made a contribution to repelling the demon this time, I will teach you the unique skills of our sect to cope with future uncertainties.
context:
这位魔头脱困，江湖势必掀起腥风血雨。
此次你击退魔头有功，本馆主传授你本门镇派绝学，用以应对将来不测之险。

original: Yes.
context: 是。

original: I don't know why, but I've been restless all day. Is something going to happen?
context: 不知为何，本馆主今日总是心神不宁，莫非有事发生？

original: Reporting to the head, Lao Motou who was locked in the ice cellar went mad and almost broke free. The disciple had to kill him in a hurry, please punish me.
context: 禀报馆主，关在冰窖中的老魔头发狂失态，几乎要挣脱束缚，弟子迫不得已失手将其打死了，请馆主责罚。

original: Huh, is he really dead?
context: 呼，果真是死了吗？

original: Absolutely.
context: 千真万确。

original: The mighty Chu Kuangsheng died in the hands of a disciple of Confucius Temple, what a great irony.
context: 堂堂一代霸主楚狂生竟然死在儒圣馆弟子手中，真是天大的讽刺。

original: Such a demon is a hidden danger in the world. It is the duty of the disciples of Confucius Temple to eliminate demons and defend the way. There is no mistake.
context: 这样的魔头留在世间本就是隐患，卫道除魔本就是儒圣馆弟子的本分，何错之有。

original: The student has fulfilled his duty and completed the task of guarding Lao Motou, and has come to report.
context: 学生不负所托，看守老魔头任务完成，特来回禀。

original: How is Lao Motou?
context: 那老魔头情况如何？

original: Lao Motou is now trapped in the Ice Prison and can't move a step. His situation is very miserable. Is he really a wicked demon?
context: 老魔头如今被困在冰牢寸步难移，处境十分凄凉，他当真是十恶不赦的凶恶魔头吗？

original: Huh, are you sympathizing with that demon?
context: 咄，你是在同情那魔头吗？

original:
The Devil always confuses people's hearts, and many righteous people have suffered from it.
{PlayerName}, you must not make a mistake. If I find out that you are colluding with The Devil, I will personally take action to clean up the door!
context:
邪魔外道一贯会蛊惑人心，多少正派人士深受其害。
{PlayerName}，你可不要自误，若叫本馆主发现你和邪魔外道之人有所勾结，本馆主亲自出手清理门户！

original: The student understands that he will never join forces with those The Devil.
context: 学生明白，学生一定不与那些邪魔外道为伍。

original: {PlayerName}, as a scholar of the Confucius Temple, you failed to maintain your integrity. According to the rules of our sect, you must be punished!
context: {PlayerName}，你身为儒圣馆儒生，未能洁身自好，按照本门门规需当对你施以责罚！

original: May I ask what mistake I made and how you are going to punish me?
context: 请问我犯了什么过错，你要如何责罚我？

original: Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
context: 你德行不佳、品行有亏……

original: Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
context: 你行为不检，多行不仁之事……

original: You have murderous eyes and no heart of Benevolence...
context: 你满眼杀气，毫无仁德之心……

original: Coward, Selfish...
context: 贪生怕死，见利忘义……

original: Ungrateful, selfish...
context: 忘恩负义，自私自利……

original: Betrayal, no old feelings...
context: 背信弃义，不念旧情……

original: Improper behavior, words and deeds lost...
context: 举止失当，言行有失……

original: Arrogant, unscrupulous...
context: 目中无人，不择手段……

original: Dissolute, disgracing literature...
context: 放浪形骸，有辱斯文……

original: Hypocritical, saying one thing and doing another...
context: 口是心非，阳奉阴违……

original: Fickle, untrustworthy...
context: 出尔反尔，言而无信……

original: Breaking promises, talking nonsense...
context: 毁约失信，信口雌黄……

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined to the Disciples' Living Quarter for <color=#c44b0e>five</color> days!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在弟子房禁足悔过<color=#c44b0e>五</color>天！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined to the Disciples' Living Quarter for <color=#c44b0e>ten</color> days!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在弟子房禁足悔过<color=#c44b0e>十</color>天！

original: According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined to the Disciples' Living Quarter for <color=#c44b0e>fifteen</color> days!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在弟子房禁足悔过<color=#c44b0e>十五</color>天！

original: According to the rules of this sect, you are sentenced to confinement in the Disciples' Living Quarter for <color=#c44b0e>twenty</color> days!
context: 依照本门律例，罚你在弟子房禁足悔过<color=#c44b0e>二十</color>天！

original: Accept the punishment.
context: 接受惩罚。

original: Refuse to accept the punishment! <color=#097a76>(Start a fight directly)</color>
context: 拒不认罚！<color=#097a76>（直接开战）</color>

original: Let's go, I'll take you where you need to go.
context: 走吧，带你去该去的地方。

original: It seems that you have no remorse. Such a person staying in the Confucius Temple will sooner or later be a trouble! Everyone, drive him out of the Confucius Temple!
context: 看来你是毫无悔过之心，这样的人留在儒圣馆迟早也是祸患！众人将他赶出儒圣馆！

original: {PlayerName}, you defy the master, disrespect your superiors, I want to see how you can stand in the martial arts world in the future! From now on, the Confucius Temple is at odds with you!
context: {PlayerName}，你违逆师门，以下犯上，我倒要看你以后在江湖如何立足！从今往后，儒圣馆与你势不两立！

original: I came out to wander in the martial arts world for freedom. There are too many rules in the Confucius Temple, this is not allowed, that is not allowed, I am not happy to stay.
context: 我出来闯荡江湖本就图个自由自在，儒圣馆规矩太多，这不让做那不让做，我还正不乐意待呢。

original: Confucius Temple disciple {PlayerName}, defying the master, disrespecting superiors, is expelled from the Confucius Temple from today, and his words and deeds have nothing to do with the Confucius Temple from today.
context: 儒圣馆弟子{PlayerName}，违逆师门、以下犯上，即日起开革出儒圣馆，今日后，此人言行与儒圣馆无关。

original: Humph, if I'm not welcome here, there will be places that will welcome me!
context: 哼，此处不留爷，自有留爷处！

original: Confucius Temple disciple {PlayerName}, shameless, immoral, disgracing the Confucian culture!
context: 儒圣馆弟子{PlayerName}，鲜廉寡耻、丧德败行，有辱儒家斯文！

original: The sect decides to expel {PlayerName} from the Confucius Temple from today, and from now on, his every move has nothing to do with the Confucius Temple.
context: 本门决定即日起把{PlayerName}开革出儒圣馆，从今往后此人一举一动与儒圣馆再无丝毫瓜葛。

original: Humph, if I'm not welcome here, there will be places that will welcome me!
context: 哼，此处不留爷，自有留爷处！

original: What should I do now?
context: 现在要做些什么？

original: Reflect on your own faults. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 反省自身的过失。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: Read self-cultivation books.
context: 阅读修身养性类书籍。

original: Read books about tricks and skills.
context: 阅读奇技淫巧类书籍。

original: Do nothing.
context: 不做任何事情。

original: Two shichen later...
context: 两个时辰后……

original: Reflect on yourself according to the Honorable standard, correct if there is, and strive if there is not.
context: 以君子的标准反省自己，有则改之，无则加勉。

original: "The Supreme Response", progress {TagNum:太上感应篇进度}%. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 《太上感应篇》，进度{TagNum:太上感应篇进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: "The Thirty-Three Swordsmen", progress {TagNum:三十三剑客图进度}%. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 《三十三剑客图》，进度{TagNum:三十三剑客图进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: "The Book of Rites", progress {TagNum:礼书通故进度}%. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 《礼书通故》，进度{TagNum:礼书通故进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: "The Prophecy", progress {TagNum:推背图进度}%. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 《推背图》，进度{TagNum:推背图进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: "The New Songs from the Jade Terrace", progress {TagNum:玉台新咏进度}%. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 《玉台新咏》，进度{TagNum:玉台新咏进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: Do something else.
context: 做些其他事情。

original: Finally finished reading "The Supreme Response", it really benefited a lot!
context: 终于把《太上感应篇》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Let's pause here for now, I need a break...
context: 暂时先看到这里，容我歇一下……

original: Finally finished reading "The Thirty-Three Swordsmen", it really benefited a lot!
context: 终于把《三十三剑客图》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "The Book of Rites", it really benefited a lot!
context: 终于把《礼书通故》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "The New Songs from the Jade Terrace", it really benefited a lot!
context: 终于把《玉台新咏》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "The Prophecy", it really benefited a lot!
context: 终于把《推背图》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: "The Secret of Eloquence", progress {TagNum:巧舌秘典进度}%. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
context: 《巧舌秘典》，进度{TagNum:巧舌秘典进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

context: 《商道通鉴》，进度{TagNum:商道通鉴进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

context: 《风水秘术》，进度{TagNum:风水秘术进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

context: 《地理图志》，进度{TagNum:地理图志进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

context: 《百兽通志》，进度{TagNum:百兽通志进度}%。<color=#097a76>（消耗2时辰、25体力）</color>

original: Do something else.
context: 做些其他事情。

original: Finally finished reading "The Secret Canon of Artful Speech", truly beneficial!
context: 终于把《巧舌秘典》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "Compendium of Commerce", truly beneficial!
context: 终于把《商道通鉴》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "Feng Shui Secrets", truly beneficial!
context: 终于把《风水秘术》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "Geographical Records", truly beneficial!
context: 终于把《地理图志》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: Finally finished reading "Compendium of Beasts", truly beneficial!
context: 终于把《百兽通志》读完了，果然获益匪浅！

original: {PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>five</color> days, you are not allowed to leave without permission!
context: {PlayerName}，你在此处禁足<color=#c44b0e>五</color>天，禁足未解除之前不得擅自外出！

original: {PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>ten</color> days, you are not allowed to leave without permission!
context: {PlayerName}，你在此处禁足<color=#c44b0e>十</color>天，禁足未解除之前不得擅自外出！

original: {PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>fifteen</color> days, you are not allowed to leave without permission!
context: {PlayerName}，你在此处禁足<color=#c44b0e>十五</color>天，禁足未解除之前不得擅自外出！

original: {PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>twenty</color> days, you are not allowed to go out without permission!
context: {PlayerName}，你在此处禁足<color=#c44b0e>二十</color>天，禁足未解除之前不得擅自外出！

original: {PlayerName}, your grounding has been lifted, you can now come and go freely.
context: {PlayerName}，你的禁足已经解除，现在可以自由出入了。

original: Your confinement has not been lifted, you are not allowed to step outside, go back immediately!
context: 你的禁足尚未解除，不得外出半步，速速回去！

original: Walk from the door to the appropriate position in the house, looking at the protagonist.
context: 从屋门口走到屋内合适位置，看向主角

original: When I was grounded back in the day, no one was kind enough to bring me food. It's not too late to eat your meal while it's hot and then reflect on your actions.
context:
当年本公子禁足时，可没有人好心送吃食。
先趁热把饭食吃了再反思自省不迟。

original: How could you be so careless to let that old man Siye catch you red-handed? I'll plead for you, so he can lock you up for fewer days. Being locked up in this place is enough to drive anyone mad.
context:
怎么如此不小心让司业那个老头子抓住你的马脚？
本公子为你去求求情，让他少关你几天，关在这种地方，简直要把人逼疯了。

original: Ever since you were grounded, no one has been able to match wits with me in poetry, so I had to drown my sorrows in wine. Today, I brought a pot of crude wine to share with Brother {PlayerSurName}.
context: 自从你禁足之后，没人跟本公子吟诗作对，只好借酒浇愁。今日特备浊酒一壶，与{PlayerSurName}兄分享。

original: Recently, I got a piece of Nameless calligraphy, and I brought it here specifically for Brother {PlayerSurName}'s sharp eye.
context: 近日本公子得到一副不知名字帖，特意拿来请{PlayerSurName}兄掌眼。

original: You must be itching to practice your martial arts while being grounded here. How about I spar with you?
context: 你禁足在此，平时一定手痒的很，本公子陪你过招如何？

original: That's exactly what I had in mind! (Protagonist duels)
context: 正有此意！（主角单挑）

original: Not interested.
context: 没有兴趣。

original: Alas, it seems I've come at a bad time. I'll come to see you another day.
context: 唉，看来本公子来的不是时候，改日再来看你吧。

original: During these few days of grounding, your martial arts skills have not only not fallen behind, but have actually improved. Could it be that reading really benefits martial arts cultivation? It seems I need to read a few more books myself.
context: 禁足这几日，你武功非但没有落下，反而更有提升，莫非读书真能裨益武功修为？看来本公子也要再多读几本书才行。

original: It seems that your martial arts skills have greatly declined due to the confinement these past few days, which is really worrying.
context: 看来禁足这几日使你武功大不如前，着实令人担忧啊。

original: After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
context: 说完话转身走出去。

original: Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
context: 从屋门口走到指定位置，看向主角

original: Where have all the moral teachings I taught you in the past gone? Go read some books again and find the path of benevolence and forgiveness that you have lost.
context: 往日教你的道德文章都学到哪里去了？再去读读书，找回你丢掉的仁恕之道。

original:
Honorable is as good as gold, how can you ignore your faith and become a person who goes back on his word?
All my teachings to you in the past have been in vain, you should reflect on yourself here!
context:
君子一诺千金，你怎能枉顾信义，去做那出尔反尔之人？
老夫平日对你一番教化全白费了，你就在这里好好反省吧！

original:
Honorable is associated with righteousness, while the villain is associated with profit.
Read "Spring and Autumn" carefully and think about whether you want to be honorable or a villain!
context:
君子喻于义，小人喻于利。
用心读读《春秋》，想清楚你到底是要做君子还是小人！

original:
Don't look at what you shouldn't, don't listen to what you shouldn't, don't say what you shouldn't, don't do what you shouldn't!
Think carefully about how you should behave in the world!
context:
非礼勿视，非礼勿听，非礼勿言，非礼勿动！
你给老夫好好想一想到底该如何为人处世！

original:
Knowing what you know, and knowing what you don't know, is knowledge.
The confinement period is a good time to read more books, reading is beneficial and increases wisdom.
context:
知之为知之，不知为不知，是知也。
禁足这段日子正好多读几本书，开卷有益，增长智慧。

original: I originally wanted to give you some guidance, but now I see that your reflection is not bad, knowing your mistakes and being able to improve is the greatest, you continue to reflect.
context: 我本来还想来指点你一二，如今看你反省的还不错，知错能够改善莫大焉，你继续反省吧。

original: After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
context: 说完话转身走出去。

original: Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
context: 从屋门口走到指定位置，看向主角

original: Young people can't help but do some deviant things, seeing that you are not depressed, I am relieved.
context: 少年人免不得做出些离经叛道的事情，看你没有意志消沉我也就放心了。

original: I thought this insignificant punishment would have no effect on you, but seeing you looking so gloomy now, I am really disappointed.
context: 本以为这点微不足道的惩罚对你不会有任何影响，看你现在这副郁郁寡欢的样子，真叫人失望。

original: I heard that you have several pieces of calligraphy that have not been appraised yet, bring them out quickly and let me help you appraise them.
context: 听说你身上有几幅尚未鉴定的字帖，快些拿出来让我帮你掌掌眼。

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the Ding grade.
context: 交出丁品不知名字帖。

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the C grade.
context: 交出丙品不知名字帖。

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the B grade.
context: 交出乙品不知名字帖。

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the A grade.
context: 交出甲品不知名字帖。

original: Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
context: 抱歉，不便示人。

original:
This is just a common piece of calligraphy, which can be seen everywhere on the street.
I thought I could see something rare, it seems I thought too much.
context:
这只是一副普通字帖，地摊上随处可见。
还以为能见识到稀罕物，看来是我想多了。

original: This piece of calligraphy is full of strokes, the text is ups and downs, although there are flaws, it is also a good thing.
context: 这份字帖通篇笔画丰满，行文跌宕起伏，虽有瑕疵，却也是不俗之物了。

original: This piece of calligraphy is round and strong, elegant and full of the charm of the Wei and Jin Dynasties. However, honorable does not take what others like, although this is a good thing, it has nothing to do with me.
context: 这份字帖用笔圆润遒劲，神彩飘逸，尽得魏晋风流遗韵。不过君子不夺人所好，此物虽是佳品，却与我无缘。

original: {yell} is actually a Draft of a Requiem to My Nephew!!!
context: {yell}竟是祭侄文稿！！！

original: The whole piece is full of emotion, the calligraphy is majestic, the brushwork is bold, and it is completed in one go. This kind of top-grade is rare in my life, I must borrow it for a few days to copy!
context: 通篇用笔之间情如潮涌，书法气势磅礴，纵笔豪放，一气呵成。此等上品生平罕见，务必要借我临摹几天！

original: How come it's another Draft of a Requiem to My Nephew? Could it be that the previous one was fake?
context: 怎么又是一副祭侄文稿？莫非之前那副是假的？

original: No, no, my eyesight has always been good, this one should be the fake.
context: 不，不，我的眼光一向不差，应该这副才是赝品。

original: If I misjudge something, it would be embarrassing.
context: 要是打眼鉴错了东西，可就丢人了

original: Alas, it's really disappointing to come with joy and return with disappointment.
context: 唉，真是乘兴而来败兴而归呀。

original: After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
context: 说完话转身走出去。

original: Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
context: 从屋门口走到指定位置，看向主角

original:
Seeing your exhilarated look, it gives me a lot of inspiration.
I want to strike while the iron is hot and create a "Victory Return Picture".
context:
看你这副志得意满的神情，使我颇有启发。
我要乘热打铁赶紧去创作一副《得胜归来图》。

original: Still no inspiration, don't waste time here.
context: 还是没有灵感，不在这耽误功夫了。

original:
Your gloomy state is simply great, it suddenly enlightened me.
This "Autumn Wind Desolate Picture" has been conceived, I have to hurry up and paint it while the mood is still there.
context:
你这种郁郁寡欢的状态简直太棒了，竟然使我茅塞顿开。
这副《秋风萧瑟图》已经构思完毕，我得趁着意境尚未消散，赶紧把它画出来。

original: Demoralized, dumbfounded...
context: 黯然销魂、呆若木鸡……

original: Amazing, amazing! If this painting is created, it will definitely be a masterpiece that will be passed down through the ages!
context: 绝了，绝了！我这副画作若是创作出来，必是千古流传的旷世之作！

original: What are you planning to paint this time?
context: 你这次打算画什么？

original: There's a great name that fits the scene, how about calling this painting "Hanging on the Southeast Branch"?
context: 有个绝佳的名字十分应景，这副画作就叫《自挂东南枝》如何？

original: Unprecedented and unsurpassed.
context: 前无古人后无来者

original: Once this work comes out, all other paintings will be discarded!
context: 此作一出，余画尽废！

original: I heard you have some unappraised Paintings on you. Let me see if there's anything I like.
context: 听说你身上有几幅尚未鉴定的画卷，快些让我看看有没有中意的。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the lowest grade.
context: 交出丁品不知名画卷。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the third grade.
context: 交出丙品不知名画卷。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the second grade.
context: 交出乙品不知名画卷。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the highest grade.
context: 交出甲品不知名画卷。

original: Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
context: 抱歉，不便示人。

original: This is just a mediocre painting that can be seen everywhere, it doesn't catch my eye.
context: 这只是一副随处可见的拙劣画作，还无法入我的眼。

original: The painter of this work obviously has some skills. Although it's not worth mentioning in front of me, such paintings are not common.
context: 这作画之人显然已有些功底，在我面前虽不值一提，但是这样的画作并不多见。

original: This painting is a rare masterpiece. Even in this Confucius Temple, there are only a few that can be compared with it. Treasure it well, and give it to someone who knows its value in the future, so as not to waste such a treasure.
context: 这副画作是难得的佳作，即便在这儒圣馆内能够与之相提并论的也是屈指可数。好好珍藏吧，将来送给识货之人，才不至于暴殄天物。

original: {yell} is actually Along the River During the Qingming Festival!!!
context: {yell}竟是清明上河图！！！

original:
The so-called Honorable is innocent, but the one who possesses the jade is guilty.
Aren't you afraid of being coveted by villains with such a treasure on you? It's safest to leave it with me!
context:
所谓君子无罪，怀璧其罪。
你身怀重宝不怕歹人觊觎吗？还是放在我这里最保险！

original: I never thought I would see other versions of Along the River During the Qingming Festival in my lifetime. What more could I ask for with such a chance!
context: 想不到有生之年竟能见到其他版本的清明上河图，如此机缘夫复何求！

original: This version of Along the River During the Qingming Festival is more charming than the last one, with every detail of the market life vividly depicted! Let me keep it for you, so you won't lose such a masterpiece while running around.
context: 这一版清明上河图比上一版更具神韵，市井百态分毫毕现！还是我来替你保管，免得你四处奔走遗失了此等神作。

original:
It must be because I came in a hurry today and didn't show enough sincerity.
I'll come to you for the painting again after I have fasted, bathed and changed my clothes next time.
context:
一定是我今天来得匆忙，诚意不足。
下次等我斋戒沐浴更衣之后再来找你求画。

original: After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
context: 说完话转身走出去。

original: Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
context: 从屋门口走到指定位置，看向主角

original: Stop doing boring things and come play a game of chess with me!
context: 别做无聊事了，来陪我对弈一局！

original: Agree to play chess.
context: 同意对弈。

original: Not interested.
context: 没有兴趣。

original: You have no say in this!
context: 那可由不得你！

original: You hold the black pieces, I hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
context: 你持黑子，我持白子，黑先白后。

original: I admit defeat. It seems I still need to polish my chess skills.
context: 输得心服口服，看来我还得继续磨砺棋艺才行。

original: In the end, my chess skills are superior. It seems you still need to polish your chess skills.
context: 到底还是我棋高一筹，看来你还得继续磨砺棋艺才行。

original: I hold the black pieces, you hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
context: 我持黑子，你持白子，黑先白后。

original: I'll let you go today, I'll come to find you another day.
context: 今日放过你了，改日再来找你。

original: What a disappointment!
context: 真是扫兴！

original: After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
context: 说完话转身走出去。

original: Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
context: 从屋门口走到指定位置，看向主角

original: After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
context: 说完话转身走出去。

original: {PlayerName}, are you going to waste all your time here?
context: {PlayerName}，你的时间难道都要浪费在这里吗？

original: I have pleaded with Mr. Siye and spared you from punishment. This is the only time, don't take it for granted!
context: 我已经向司业先生求情，免去了你的刑罚，仅此一次，下不为例!

original: If you only do those low-level things, you are not worthy to be my brother!
context: 如果你只会做那些不入流的事情，就不配做我的兄弟！

original: You are diligent and studious, never ceasing to read.
context: 你勤奋好学，不辍读书。

original: You have a deep insight and understanding of Confucian classics.
context: 对儒家经典有着深刻的洞察和领悟。

original: You are knowledgeable and outstanding in Coin.
context: 你学识渊博、文章卓越。

original: Your every word and action reflects the demeanor and style of Confucianism.
context: 你的言行举止无一不彰显儒家的气度和风范。

original: You not only understand the benevolence and righteousness of Confucianism, but also incorporate it into your life.
context: 你不仅理解了儒家的仁义道德，更将其融入自己的生活中。

original: You lead by example, interpreting the greatness of Confucian thought with your actions.
context: 以身作则，用自己的行为诠释着儒家思想的伟大。

original: The subtle influence of Confucianism naturally forms a strong aura in you.
context: 潜移默化的儒学熏陶，在你身上自然凝聚出一股浩然之气。

original:
The accumulation of years has gradually made you understand the essence of Confucian thought,
you not only understand the benevolence and morality of Confucianism, but also integrate it into your life.
You lead by example and interpret the greatness of Confucian thought with your own behavior.
The subtle influence of Confucian education naturally condenses a sense of integrity in you.
Given time, you will become a new generation of Confucian sage,
Do you want to give up your original dream of wandering the rivers and lakes now?
context:
岁月的积淀让你渐渐洞悉了儒家思想的精髓，
你不仅理解了儒家的仁义道德，更将其融入自己的生活中。
以身作则，用自己的行为诠释着儒家思想的伟大。
潜移默化的儒学熏陶，在你身上自然凝聚一股浩然之气。
假以时日，必将成为新一代儒圣，
如今你是否要放弃原本闯荡江湖的梦想呢？

original: Devote my life to inheriting Confucianism! (<color=#c44b0e>Confucian Sage Ending</color>)
context: 穷毕生精力传承儒学!（<color=#c44b0e>儒门圣贤结局</color>）

original: Continue the dream of wandering the world.
context: 继续闯荡江湖的梦想。

original: Morning class
context: 早课

original: The morning class has already started, go find a seat and sit down to read the books of the sages, don't waste this great time.
context: 早课已经开始，去找个座位赶紧坐下读圣贤书，莫要辜负这大好时光。

original: At the beginning of man, the nature is good|If the child does not learn, the loom is broken|Heaven and earth Mysterious Yellow, universe Primal Land|Leap year makes a year, the musical scale adjusts the sun|Zhao, Qian, Sun, Li, Zhou, Wu, Zheng, Wang|Feng, Chen, Chu, Wei, Jiang, Shen, Han, Yang|Honorable people are guided by justice, while the ignoble are guided by profit|It's not scarcity we should fear, but inequality; not poverty, but unrest|An army's commander can be captured, but a man's will cannot be taken|You throw a peach to me, I give you a plum in return|A lady of elegance and grace, a gentleman's courtship|Hold your hand, and grow old with you|Do not do to others what you do not want done to yourself|Honorable people are open and candid, while the ignoble are always in fear
context: 人之初，性本善|子不学，断机杼|天地玄黄，宇宙洪荒|闰余成岁，律吕调阳|赵钱孙李，周吴郑王|冯陈褚卫，蒋沈韩杨|君子喻于义，小人喻于利|不患寡而患不均，不患贫而患不安|三军可夺帅也，匹夫不可夺志也|投我以桃，报之以李|窈窕淑女，君子好逑|执子之手，与子偕老|己所不欲，勿施于人|君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Play chess
context: 对弈

original: Are you trying to probe my thoughts through chess? I won't give you the chance.
context:
你是想通过对弈来窥探我的心思吗？
我是不会给你机会的。

original: (This guy is really serious)
context: (这家伙的心思还真重啊）

original: Kid, come and play a game of chess with me!
context: 小子，来跟我对弈一局！

original: Agree to play chess. (Takes 2 shichen, Stamina 25)
context: 同意对弈。（耗时2时辰、体力25）

original: Come back later.
context: 稍后再来。

original: You hold the black pieces, I hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
context: 你持黑子，我持白子，黑先白后。

original: One wrong move in chess can lose the whole game.
context: 棋差一招，满盘皆输。

original: Young people are impetuous, the outcome is already decided.
context: 年轻人心浮气躁，胜负早成定局。

original: I hold the black pieces, you hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
context: 我持黑子，你持白子，黑先白后。

original: You have already paid respects to the statue of the master today, no need to do it again.
context: 今日已拜过夫子像，不必再拜。

original: Student {PlayerName} pays homage to the great master
context: 学生{PlayerName}拜祭至圣先师

original: You also cleaned up the fallen leaves and weeds around the statue of the master
context: 你顺便清理了夫子像周围的落叶和杂草

original: Calligraphy
context: 字帖

original: I collect unappraised calligraphy of grade C or above here. If you have extra stock, you can leave it to me. It's better than wasting it on you.
context: 我这里四处收罗丙品以上的未鉴定字帖，你若有多余存货，可交我保管，总好过在你身上暴殄天物。

original: I smell an extraordinary ink fragrance from you. The ink treasure on you must be extraordinary. Bring it to me quickly!
context: 我嗅到非同一般的墨香气息从你身上散出，你身上的墨宝一定不是凡品，快拿来给我！

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the C grade.
context: 交出丙品不知名字帖。

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the B grade.
context: 交出乙品不知名字帖。

original: Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the A grade.
context: 交出甲品不知名字帖。

original: Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
context: 抱歉，不便示人。

original: Well, this piece of calligraphy is not of high grade, but it is barely qualified to fill the Literature Room.
context: 嗯，这副字帖虽然品级不高，用于填充文渊斋也勉强够资格了。

original: This grade of calligraphy is rare even in the Literature Room. This time it's a real treasure.
context: 此等品级的字帖，即便是在文渊斋里也不多见，这次算是捡到宝了。

original: This, this...
context: 这，这……

original: {PlayerName}, you have made a great contribution to the Confucius Temple this time. You are willing to give out such treasures, which shows your selflessness!
context: {PlayerName}，你这次可算是为儒圣馆立了大功，这样的宝贝都舍得交出来，足见你无私为公！

original: Hmph, one man's trash is another man's treasure. It's like a piece of waste paper on you.
context: 哼，敝帚自珍，在你身上如同废纸一张。

original: Painting
context: 画卷

original: If you don't have unappraised paintings of grade C or above, don't bother me. If there's something I like, I won't let you down with the Sect contribution.
context:
若是没有丙品以上的未鉴定画卷，就别来打扰我。
若是有我看上眼的东西，门派贡献自然亏待不了你的。

original: Looking at your confident face, I'm sure you've brought something good. Let's see it.
context: 看你这副自信满满的样子，想必是带了好东西来，赶紧让拿出来给我吧。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the third grade.
context: 交出丙品不知名画卷。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the second grade.
context: 交出乙品不知名画卷。

original: Hand over the Nameless painting of the highest grade.
context: 交出甲品不知名画卷。

original: Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
context: 抱歉，不便示人。

original: This painting is barely acceptable, I'll reluctantly accept it.
context: 这副画勉强还能看上一两眼，我就勉为其难收下了。

original: This painting is a rare treasure. I must carefully store it in the Ink House for future reference.
context: 这幅画算是不可多得的珍品，我一定要仔细收进翰墨坊，以后得空可随时观摩。

original: I never thought I would see such a miraculous painting in my lifetime...
context: 想不到有生之年还能见识到如此神乎其技的画作……

original: If a man hears the Way in the morning, he can die in the evening without regret. This life is worth it!
context: 朝闻道，夕死可矣，这辈子值了！

original: Are you playing tricks on me? If you don't want to bring out the treasure, don't bother me!
context: 你小子耍人呢？不想拿出宝贝就别来烦我！

original: Spar
context: 过招

original: Kid, I've been itching to fight lately. Spar with me.
context: 小子，最近有些手痒，陪我过过招。

original: That's exactly what I had in mind! (Protagonist duels)
context: 正有此意！（主角单挑）

original: Refuse to spar.
context: 拒绝过招。

original: You'd better think it over. I'm in a good mood today. Don't regret missing the opportunity.
context: 你可要想好了，难得我今天有兴致，错过机会可不要后悔。

original: What kind of garbage kung fu have you learned? You're no match for me.
context: 你学得都是些什么垃圾功夫，真是不堪一击。

original: You've actually learned Hua Chi's unique martial art, Quiet Valley Drawing!
context: 你竟然学了画痴的独门武功幽谷图！

original: You defeated me with Hua Chi's martial arts. How can I hold my head up in front of that kid in the future!
context: 你用画痴的武功打败了我，这叫我以后在那小子面前怎么抬得起头！

original: You have to learn one of my martial arts, or don't come to me in the future!
context: 你也要学我一门功夫才行，否则以后别来找我！

original: Have you learned the martial arts I taught you? If you don't learn my martial arts, don't come to me again.
context: 传你的武功学了没？不学成我的武功，别再来找我。

original: You're not planning to perfunctory me, are you? This Cao Quan Steele's kung fu is my painstaking creation. You have to practice it to justify me.
context:
你该不是打算存心敷衍我吧？
这门曹全碑的功夫可是我心血所创，你不练出点火候怎么对得起我。

original: That's more like it. When you make something of yourself in the future, I'll be proud!
context: 这还差不多，等你以后有出息了，我面子上也有光彩！

original: You have added many valuable paintings to my Ink House over this period of time. As a token of my gratitude, I will give you a martial arts manual that I created myself.
context: 这段时日你帮我翰墨坊添置了不少名贵画卷，我这有一门自创武功，就作为谢礼送你吧。

original: Don't let Shu Kuang know that I gave you this manual, or I won't be able to live in peace.
context: 我送你秘籍的事情千万别让书狂那家伙知道，否则我又要不得安省了。

original: Stop, what are you going to do?
context: 站住，你要去做什么？

original: Is this a forbidden area of the sect?
context: 这是门派禁地吗？

original: No!
context: 不是！

original: Do I need a specific identity or condition?
context: 需要特定身份或者条件吗？

original: No need!
context: 不需要！

original: In that case, why do you care what I do?
context: 既然如此，你管我去做什么。

original: What do you mean by that?
context: 你这是什么意思？

original: (It seems that I have to fight with Ling Hongxuan to get in here!)
context: （看来要进这里只能先跟凌鸿轩打一架了！）

original: Teach Ling Hongxuan a lesson (solo fight by the protagonist)
context: 教训凌鸿轩（主角单挑）

original: Excuse me, Run away.
context: 告辞离开。

original: Player runs away, Ling Hongxuan recovers and stands in place, can be triggered again
context: 玩家离开，凌鸿轩恢复原位站立姿势，可再次触发

original: Get lost!
context: 滚！

original: You can go in, but don't stay too long!
context: 你进去吧，不要在里面太久！

original: My sister needs to rest more, don't always disturb her.
context: 我妹妹要多休息，你不要总打扰她。

original:
...My hearing is not good, I can't hear what you're saying.
Would you dare to say it louder?
context:
……我耳朵不太好，听不清你说什么。
你敢大点声再说一次吗？

original: Exterminate Jiujiang Fotress! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 剿灭九江水寨！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: Young people these days are really bold, no one has ever dared to joke with me like this!
context: 现在年轻人胆子真是大了，还从来没有人敢跟我开这种玩笑！

original: This is the last joke you'll ever make in your life.
context: 这是你此生开过的最后一句玩笑。

original: Alright, it seems I don't have to worry about what to feed the crocodiles today!
context: 行，看来今天不用愁拿什么喂鳄鱼了！

original:
{PlayerName}, how dare you turn against your own brother!
From today on, we are irreconcilable!
context:
{PlayerName}，你竟然与兄长为敌！
今日起，我们势不两立！

original: Man proposes, God disposes. I can't let you ruin my plan.
context: 人算不如天算，我不能让你破坏了我的计划。

original: A bunch of rabble, do you really think you are a prestigious sect in the martial arts world?
context: 一群乌合之众，还真以为自己是威震江湖的名门大派吗。

original: People from the Central Plains, do you know what you're talking about?
context: 中原人，你可知道在说什么吗？

original: Exterminate the Jiuli Tribe! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 剿灭九黎部落！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: No one dares to talk nonsense in front of me, and you are no exception.
context: 没有人胆敢在我面前信口胡说，你也不能例外。

original: In my Jiuli Tribe, how can we tolerate you people from the Central Plains running wild!
context: 在我九黎部落，岂会容你们这些中原人撒野！

original:
I am the saintess of the Jiuli Tribe, it's my duty to protect this place.
Young man, you can't stay here anymore, you must leave!
context:
我是九黎部落的圣女，有责任保护这里。
小哥哥，你不能呆在这里了，你快走！

original: It was the accumulation of countless ancestors and the hard work of countless tribesmen that built the Jiuli Tribe, which dominates the southwest and covets the Central Plains.
context: 曾经无数先辈的沉淀，曾经无数族人的心血，才建成了盘踞西南，妄图垂涎中原的九黎部落。

original:
The growth of the Jiuli Tribe is due to the arrogance of the tribal chief, and today's situation is due to the arrogance of the tribal chief.
He provoked an opponent he shouldn't have provoked, and one wrong step led to a deep abyss!
context:
九黎部落的壮大是由于族长的狂妄，今日的局面更是因为族长的自大。
他招惹了不该招惹的对手，一步走错，便是万丈深渊！

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Jiuli Tribe, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>九黎部落，覆灭！</color></size>

original: Miao Muli, you finally have your day! Let's settle our new and old grudges today!
context:
苗木黎，你终于也有今天！
咱们今天新仇旧怨可以一并清算了！

original: (What a vast body of water, I wonder where it leads.)
context: （好大的一片水域，不知前方通往哪里。）

original: Are you going to cross the river, young man? This body of water stretches for eight hundred miles, you need to go to <color=#c44b0e>Wuyue ferry</color> and find a boatman to cross the river.
context: 小哥是要渡河吗？这片水域纵横八百里，小哥若要渡河需得前往<color=#c44b0e>吴越渡口</color>找艄公乘船才行。

original: Let me remind you, there is a force called <color=#c44b0e>Jiujiang Fotress</color> within this body of water, they are all murderous pirates, don't get involved with them.
context: 提醒小哥一句，有个叫<color=#c44b0e>九江水寨</color>的势力就在这片水域之内，那都是些杀人掠货的水贼，可莫要与他们沾惹瓜葛。

original:
The waves are rolling ahead, the vast body of water is endless.
You can only <color=#c44b0e>go to the Ferry</color> to cross the river.
context:
前方波涛滚滚，大片水域无边无尽。
只能<color=#c44b0e>前往渡口</color>，乘船过河了。

original: This is not a place for you Central Plains people, get out!
context: 这里不是你们中原人能来的地方，滚出去！

original: (What should I do if I want to get in?)
context: （我要想进去该怎么办呢？）

original: Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
context: 硬闯！<color=#c44b0e>（立即开战）</color>

original: Let Miao Caidie handle it. <color=#097a76>(Miao Caidie accompanies)</color>
context: 交由苗彩蝶出面。<color=#097a76>（苗彩蝶随行）</color>

original: Tell them that you once helped the Jiuli Tribe.
context: 告知曾经帮过九黎部落。

original: Turn around and run away.
context: 转身离开。

original: Dare to run wild here, you don't know what's good for you!
context: 敢来这里撒野，不知死活的东西！

original: You're so rude, let me teach you how to behave today!
context: 说话这么不客气，今天让我教教你们怎么做人！

original: {PlayerName} is a friend of the Jiuli Tribe, don't make things difficult for him.
context: {PlayerName}小哥哥是九黎部落的朋友，你们不要为难他。

original: Welcome, Saintess!
context: 恭迎圣女！

original: Honored guest, please come in.
context: 贵客请进。

original: So you're the man from the Central Plains who helped our tribe fight against the women of Melody House a few days ago!
context: 原来你就是前些日子帮我们族人对付妙音坊那帮女人的中原人！

original:
In that case, you are our guest.
Guest from the Central Plains, please come in.
context:
既然如此，你就是我们的客人。
中原的客人，请进吧。

original: Not all people from the Central Plains are bad.
context: 中原人也不都是坏人呐

original: Are you talking to me? Do you have the guts to repeat what you just said?
context: 你这是在对我讲话吗？有没有胆子把刚才的话再说一遍？

original: Exterminate Melody House! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
context: 剿灭妙音坊！<color=#c44b0e>（直接开战）</color>

original: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
context: 信口胡说，不必当真。

original: You have to pay a price for talking nonsense. Since it's your first offense, I'll let you off this time.
context: 胡乱说话可是要付出代价的，念你首犯，姑且饶过你。

original: Since you like to talk nonsense so much, why don't you just rip out your tongue.
context: 既然你这么喜欢乱说话，那么就把舌头拔下来吧。

original:
Do you think that just because Melody House is full of women, we will let you bully us?
Today, you will understand the sorrow of being a stinky man!
context:
你以为妙音坊上下都是女子，便会任由欺侮吗？
今天便让你领会到身为臭男人的悲哀！

original:
Once you are a part of Melody House, you belong to Melody House for life.
I won't allow anyone to destroy anything here!
context:
一天是妙音坊的人，一辈子都属于妙音坊。
我不允许任何人破坏这里的一切！

original:
Big brother, how could you do this!
I've heard of the wickedness of human hearts, but it shouldn't happen to you.
context:
大哥哥，你怎么可以这样！
我听说过人心险恶，但是不该发生在你的身上啊。

original: How many beautiful women, how many overwhelming beauties, can't escape the fate's trickery now.
context: 多少貌美如花，多少倾国倾城，如今都逃不过命运的捉弄。

original: Under your ruthless hand, Melody House is like an evening primrose, blooming and then fading, and no one remembers its once vibrant colors.
context: 在你的无情辣手之下，妙音坊如同昙花，盛开即败，此后再无人记得这里曾经的姹紫嫣红。

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Melody House, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>妙音坊，覆灭！</color></size>

original: The monk has ordered, men are not allowed to set foot in Melody House!
context: 坊主有令，男子不得踏足妙音坊！

original: (What should I do if I want to get in?)
context: （我要想进去该怎么办呢？）

original: Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
context: 硬闯！<color=#c44b0e>（立即开战）</color>

original: Let Gu Qingcheng handle it.<color=#097a76>(Gu Qingcheng accompanies)</color>
context: 交由顾倾城出面。<color=#097a76>（顾倾城随行）</color>

original: Let Yu Weier handle it.<color=#097a76>(Yu Weier accompanies)</color>
context: 交由鱼薇儿出面。<color=#097a76>（鱼薇儿随行）</color>

original: Let Fu Yaoqin handle it.<color=#097a76>(Fu Yaoqin accompanies)</color>
context: 交由付瑶琴出面。<color=#097a76>（付瑶琴随行）</color>

original: Inform them that you once helped Melody House.
context: 告知曾经帮过妙音坊。

original: Turn around and run away.
context: 转身离开。

original: Deliver a letter for the chief of the Jiuli Tribe.
context: 替九黎部落之主送信。

original: Sisters, don't let these stinky men tarnish our Melody House!
context: 姐妹们，不要让臭男人污秽了咱们妙音坊！

original: I hate your high and mighty attitudes, don't blame me for being a Female hater.
context: 最讨厌你们这些女人高高在上的嘴脸，就别怪我辣手摧花了。

original: {PlayerSurName} is my friend and a friend of Melody House, don't stop him.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠是我朋友，也是妙音坊的朋友，你们不要拦阻他。

original:
The master has ordered, no men are allowed in Melody House!
Miss Qingcheng, please don't make it difficult for us.
context:
坊主有令，男子不得踏足妙音坊！
倾城姑娘，请不要为难我们。

original: Alas, {PlayerSurName}, I tried my best.
context: 唉，{PlayerSurName}公子，奴家尽力了。

original: From now on, no one is to stop {PlayerName} from entering or leaving Melody House.
context: 今后{PlayerName}若是出入妙音坊，任何人不得阻拦。

original: Yes, Master!
context: 是，坊主！

original: Big brother is my friend, please don't make it hard for him, sisters.
context: 大哥哥是我朋友，请各位姐姐不要为难他。

original:
The master has ordered, no men are allowed in Melody House!
Wei'er, even if the master loves you the most, he won't make an exception for you.
context:
坊主有令，男子不得踏足妙音坊！
薇儿，即便坊主最疼爱你，也不会为你破例的。

original: Don't worry Wei'er, I'll think of another way.
context: 薇儿不要紧，我再想其他办法。

original: Well, I've heard about this from the sisters, and the master said he would make an exception for you. Since that's the case, we won't stop you. But you must behave yourself in Melody House to avoid trouble!
context: 嗯，此事倒是听姐妹们说起过，坊主也说会为你破例一次。既然如此，我们就不便拦阻了，不过你进入妙音坊可要规矩些，免得自找麻烦！

original: Don't you know that the Jiuli Tribe is our sworn enemy at Melody House? By delivering their letter, are you declaring war on us?
context: 你不知道九黎部落是我们妙音坊的死对头吗，你提他们送信，是要与我们妙音坊为敌吗？

original: I'm just the messenger, I don't want to get involved in your sect affairs.
context: 我只是送信的，不想掺和你们门派之间的事情。

original: Maybe you're a spy sent by the Jiuli Tribe, trying to probe Melody House under the guise of delivering a letter. Sisters, kick him out.
context: 说不定你是九黎部落派来的奸细，以送信为名刺探妙音坊虚实，姐妹们，赶他出去。

original: Get out of here, don't dirty the place of Melody House!
context: 快点滚出去，不要脏了妙音坊的地方！

original: Don't make an enemy for Melody House. I'm just here to deliver a letter, don't force me to join forces with the Jiuli Tribe against you.
context: 不要给你们妙音坊平添一个敌人，我只是来送信的，别逼我跟九黎部落联手对付你们。

original: Hmph!
context: 哼！

original: You audacious rebel, when will you surrender!
context: 大胆逆贼，还不束手就擒更待何时！

original: It seems that the guard of West Border Patrol has called for reinforcements, they are more confident now.
context: 看来镇西关的守将找来了援军，底气也足了。

original:
The rebel {PlayerName} killed the guards and left the pass without permission, committing an unforgivable crime!
The order from the peak is to kill him on the spot; if the thief escapes, you will be punished as accomplices!
context:
叛逆{PlayerName}日前杀戮守军、擅自出关，已犯下不赦之罪！
上峰有令，将其就地格杀；若贼人逃离，尔等按同罪论处！

original: I wonder if breaking this barrier in the southwest will cause other troubles in the future.
context: 这西南的屏障被我打破，不知以后会不会引发其他麻烦。

original: You Melody House are really nosy, what do these people's lives and deaths have to do with you!
context: 你们妙音坊真是多管闲事，这些人的死活跟你们有什么关系！

original: Just because they are people from the Central Plains, you capture young men for hard labor and young women to feed the Gu worms, what are you trying to do now!
context: 就因为他们是中原人，所以你们抓年轻男子去做苦役，年轻女子去喂食蛊虫，现在又想干什么！

original: The Jiuli Tribe should not interfere with Melody House, or you will know the consequences!
context: 九黎部落做事，妙音坊最好不要插手，否则你们知道后果！

original: Which of your actions is not aimed at Melody House, when have you ever had good intentions! Whatever the Jiuli Tribe wants to do, we at Melody House will not let you have your way!
context: 你们现在做的事件哪一件不是处处针对妙音坊，你们何尝安过好心！凡是九黎部落想要做成的，我们妙音坊偏不让你们如意！

original: Hmph, very well! In that case, we'll capture you all and feed you to the Gu worms!
context: 哼，好得很！既然如此，就把你们都抓回去喂养蛊虫！

original: The Jiuli Tribe, Melody House, which side should I help?
context: 九黎部落，妙音坊，我该相助哪一方呢？

original: Help the Jiuli Tribe. (Specific battle)
context: 相助九黎部落。（特定战斗）

original: Help Melody House. (Specific battle)
context: 相助妙音坊。（特定战斗）

original: Just watch the changes.
context: 静观其变。

original: Unexpectedly, Melody House would also hire men as helpers, it seems that you guys can't hold on any longer!
context: 想不到妙音坊也会请男人做帮手，看来你们坊主终究是熬不住了！

original: Impudent, watch your mouth, who hired men as helpers!
context: 放肆，你嘴下放干净些，谁请男子做帮手了！

original: If the pretty boy outside isn't your helper, then is he a man you stole from somewhere?
context: 外面那小白脸若不是你们坊主的姘头，难道是你在哪家偷的汉子？

original: Kid, who are you?
context: 小子，你是谁？

original: I'm just passing by to watch the fun, I definitely won't disturb you, please continue.
context: 我就是路过看热闹的，我绝对不会打扰你们，你们请继续。

original: Central Plains people say one thing and mean another, you must be planning to take advantage of our mutual defeat and reap the benefits!
context: 中原人口是心非，你定是想趁我们两败俱伤，自己坐收渔利！

original: The master said that Central Plains men are all sweet talkers, not a single good one!
context: 坊主说中原男子花言巧语，没一个好东西！

original: Listen to my explanation!
context: 你们听我解释啊！

original: Go to hell!
context: 你去死！

original: Sisters, let's do it!
context: 众姐妹，动手！

original: The entire Jiuli tribe is irreconcilable with you!
context: 九黎全族与你不共戴天！

original: Master, take care...
context: 坊主保重……

original: What are you sneaking around for, pretty boy from the Central Plains?
context: 外面的中原小白脸你鬼鬼祟祟的要做什么？

original: Of course, I'm here to help you Jiuli.
context: 当然是来帮你们九黎的。

original:
The master said that there's not a single good man in the Central Plains, it's really true.
Sisters, let this guy experience the power of Melody House!
context:
坊主说中原男子没一个好东西，果然不假。
姐妹们，让这个家伙领教下咱们妙音坊的厉害！

original: Take action!
context: 动手！

original: Master, take care...
context: 坊主保重……

original: There's a saying in the Central Plains, those who understand the times are great men, you Central Plains people are doing well!
context: 中原有句话，识时务者为俊杰，中原人你做得很好！

original: It's just a helping hand, no need to mention it.
context: 举手之劳不足挂齿。

original: To show our sincerity, this Manual is for you, there may be room for cooperation with the Jiuli tribe in the future.
context: 为表我们的诚意，这本秘籍送给你，将来九黎部落或许与你会有合作的空间。

original: What are you sneaking around for, pretty boy from the Central Plains?
context: 外面的中原小白脸你鬼鬼祟祟的要做什么？

original: Of course, I'm here to help Melody House!
context: 当然是来帮妙音坊的！

original: This is not your Central Plains, you still want to be Dependant here, it's like a fool's dream!
context: 这里不是你们中原，还想在这里狐假虎威，真是痴人说梦！

original: Sisters, let these Jiuli tribe guys experience the power of Melody House!
context: 姐妹们，让这些九黎部落的家伙领教下咱们妙音坊的厉害！

original: The entire Jiuli tribe is irreconcilable with you!
context: 九黎全族与你不共戴天！

original: What's your motive for helping us?
context: 相助我们是有什么企图？

original: Just drawing a sword to help when seeing injustice.
context: 路见不平拔刀相助而已。

original: Hmph, the master said that there's not a single good man in the Central Plains, but you helped us out today, regardless of whether you have any other intentions, we can't attack you now.
context: 哼，坊主说中原男子没一个好东西，不过你今天帮忙解围，不管是否存了有其他什么心思，我们现在都不能再对你出手。

original: Are you ladies from Melody House? May I ask where Melody House is, I would like to pay a visit as a newcomer.
context: 几位姑娘是妙音坊的人？请问妙音坊在何处，初到贵宝地，我礼当前去拜会。

original: Our leader hates men, especially men from the Central Plains. I can tell you the location of Melody House, as long as you're not afraid of death, you can try to go there.
context:
我们坊主最恨男人，尤其是中原的男子。
我告诉你妙音坊位置也无坊，只要你不怕死，大可前往一试。

original: Melody House never owes anyone, you helped us today, this Manual is for you, Melody House is clear with you.
context: 妙音坊从不欠人恩情，今天你出手相助，这本秘籍给你，妙音坊跟你两清了。

original:
You being here, how can I feel at ease.
Besides, it's not proper for others to see, you better step aside first.
context:
你在这里，让奴家怎么好意思啊。
况且让旁人看到成何体统，你还是先回避下吧。

original: Alright~
context: 好咧~

original: {yell} You scoundrel, prepare to die!
context: {yell}登徒子，受死！

original: This Melody House is full of women, what are you, a man, doing joining Melody House?
context: 这妙音坊上上下下都是女子，你一个大男人加入妙音坊做什么？

original: A few years ago, Melody House would hire some men as laborers, but ever since a guy named Li disguised himself as a laborer and caused a ruckus in Melody House, no men have been allowed in.
context: 前些年妙音坊还会招些男性做杂役苦工，自从有个姓李的小子假扮杂役大闹妙音坊之后，此地就再也不许男子进入了。

original: (This old woman is still holding a grudge, I must not let her recognize me...)
context: （这婆娘还在记仇，可千万不能让她把我认出来……）

original: Don't think I don't know what kind of ghost idea you're playing!
context: 别以为你打的什么鬼主意我会不知道！

original: Melody House absolutely does not allow men to join, don't mention this again, or don't blame me for being ruthless!
context: 妙音坊断然不许男子加入，此事休要再提，否则莫怪我翻脸无情！

original:
It seems you have an invincible thief's heart.
Well, today is a good day to get rid of you!
context:
看来你是贼心不死。
也好，今日正好除去你这隐患！

original: You are a Central Plains person, even if I trust you, the tribe will not accept you.
context: 你是中原人，即便我信任你，族人们也不会接纳你。

original: The rules of the Jiuli tribe for thousands of years do not allow Central Plains people to join the tribe, in order to maintain the purity of blood and faith!
context: 九黎部落千百年的规矩不许中原人加入部落，就是为了保持血统和信仰的纯正！

original: (Will Caidie be punished for breaking the rules of the tribe in the future)
context: （彩蝶违背了部落里的规矩，以后会不会遭到惩罚呀）

original: There is no room for compromise on joining the Jiuli tribe, you better give up this idea.
context: 加入九黎部落这件事没有任何妥协的余地，你还是死了这条心吧。

original:
The Jiuli Tribe will never allow outsiders to join, especially you, a Central Plains person.
Don't think that because you've helped the tribe a little, you can take a mile!
context:
九黎部落不可能让外人加入，尤其你还是中原人。
不要以为你对部落有点帮助，就得寸进尺了！

original: Yes... (Miao Muli just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, it turns out that the team has no extra space.)
context: 是……（苗木黎只是麻木的应承，并无实际反应，原来是队伍没有多余空位所致。）

original: Yes, master...
context: 是，主人……

original: The team has no extra space, unable to invite him to join the team.
context: 队伍没有多余空位，无法邀请他加入队伍。

original: Central Plains person, what are you trying to do!
context: 中原人，你想要做什么！

original: (How should I invite Miao Muli to join my team?)
context: （该用什么方式邀请苗木黎加入我的队伍呢？）

original: Make him take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color>
context: 让他服下<color=#c44b0e>失心腐志丹</color>

original: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color>
context: 使用<color=#c44b0e>盟主金令</color>

original: Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.
context: 放弃邀请，告辞离开。

original: Foolish Central Plains person, our Jiuli Tribe is best at using poison, and we have long been immune to all kinds of poisons. Your Heart Broken pill is ineffective against me, in your Central Plains language, it's "showing off your skills before an expert"!
context: 愚蠢的中原人，我们九黎部落最擅长用毒，早已免疫各种毒性。你这失心腐志丹对我无效，用你们中原的话就是“班门弄斧”！

original:
Jianghu Master token is here!
Will Miao Muli of the Jiuli Tribe not obediently follow my orders?
context:
武林盟主金令在此！
九黎部落苗木黎还不乖乖听从我的调遣吗？

original: Hahaha, I didn't expect you to be so stupid!
context: 哈哈哈哈，看不出你还真是蠢得出奇！

original: You Central Plains people treat the Jianghu Master token as a treasure, but in my eyes, it's just a piece of scrap metal. Your Central Plains' alliance leader can't control our Jiuli Tribe!
context: 你们中原人当盟主金令是宝贝，在我眼中就是一块废铁，你们中原的盟主管不到我们九黎部落！

original: Yes... (Fu Yaoqin just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, it turns out that the team has no extra space.)
context: 是……（付瑶琴只是麻木的应承，并无实际反应，原来是队伍没有多余空位所致。）

original: Yes, master...
context: 是，主人……

original: There is no extra space in the team, unable to invite her to join the team.
context: 队伍没有多余空位，无法邀请她加入队伍。

original: No one has ever dared to joke with me, the owner of Melody House, about serving you {PlayerName}!
context: 让我堂堂妙音坊坊主听你{PlayerName}的差遣，从来没有人敢跟我开这样的玩笑！

original: (How should I invite Fu Yaoqin to join my team?)
context: （该用什么方式邀请付瑶琴加入我的队伍呢？）

original: Make her take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color>
context: 让她服下<color=#c44b0e>失心腐志丹</color>

original: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color>
context: 使用<color=#c44b0e>盟主金令</color>

original: Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.
context: 放弃邀请，告辞离开。

original: What are you trying to do!
context: 你想要做什么！

original: Nothing, please take the medicine, owner.
context: 没什么，请坊主用药。

original: You forced Fu Yaoqin to take the Heart Broken pill, and after a while, Fu Yaoqin's eyes were blurred and her mind was confused.
context: 你强迫付瑶琴服下了失心腐志丹，片刻之后，付瑶琴眼神迷离，神智彷徨。

original: Owner of Melody House, now I am your master, and you must follow my wishes in the future.
context: 妙音坊坊主，如今我就是你的主人，今后需得听从我的意愿行事。

original: Yes... master.
context: 是……，主人。

original: {PlayerName}, how dare you do this to me!
context: {PlayerName}，你竟然敢如此对我！

original: How does the Heart Broken pill taste?
context: 失心腐志丹的滋味如何呀？

original: Shameless! Today I will die with you!
context: 无耻！今天我要跟你同归于尽！

original: Since I can't beat you, I won't let you go even if I become a ghost!
context: 既然打不过你，做鬼也不会放过你！

original: Fu Yaoqin, with severe injuries, used all her remaining strength to smash her own skull. The unparalleled beauty is gone forever.
context: 付瑶琴重伤之余，拼尽剩余力气一掌击碎自己天灵盖，绝代芳华的妙人儿，从此香消玉殒。

original:
Jianghu Master token is here!
Will the owner of Melody House not bow down and obey?
context:
武林盟主金令在此！
妙音坊坊主还不俯首听命？

original: Hmph, a mere Jianghu Master token, I don't even care!
context: 哼，区区一枚盟主金令，本坊主还不放在眼里！

original: You dare not recognize this Jianghu Master token, beware of being jointly attacked by all the major sects.
context: 你竟敢不认这盟主金令，当心遭受各大门派联合征讨。

original: Hahaha, let them come then, I want to see how many sects are willing to travel thousands of miles to Melody House to seek justice.
context: 哈哈哈，那便让他们过来呀，我倒要看看有多少门派愿意千里迢迢翻山越岭来妙音坊兴师问罪。

original: (I miscalculated, the Jianghu Master token is useless.)
context: （失算了，盟主金令竟然不管用。）

original:
You dare to think of making me obey you, it seems you have no good intentions.
Men like you are a menace if they stay one more day!
context:
你竟敢妄想让我听命于你，可见没安什么好心。
像你这样的男人，多留一天都会成为祸害！

original: I'm in a bad mood, don't bother me!
context: 我心情不好，少来烦我！

original: I haven't been out for a long time, it's time to meet old friends.
context: 很久没到外面走动，也该去会会老朋友了。

original: Am I, the owner of Melody House, not worthy of a place in your team?
context: 我堂堂妙音坊坊主，难道不配占你队伍的一席之地吗？

original: Blunt the sharp, untie the knot, harmonize the light, mix with the dust...|Holding it until it's full, it's better to stop...|To the extreme of emptiness, keep quiet...|All things work together, I watch again...|Sharpen it, and it won't last long...|The heavy is the root of the light, the still is the master of the restless...|Know the male, but keep to the female, and be the stream of the world...|All things depend on it for life, and it never turns them away...|The softest thing in the world overcomes the hardest thing in the world...|Great straightness seems twisted, great skill seems clumsy...|Seeing the small is called clarity, keeping to the gentle is called strength...
context: 挫其锐，解其纷，和其光，同其尘……|持而盈之，不如其已……|致虚极，守静笃……|万物并作，吾以观复……|揣而锐之，不可长保……|重为轻根，静为躁君……|知其雄，守其雌，为天下溪……|万物恃之而生而不辞……|天下之至柔，驰骋天下之至坚……|大直若屈，大巧若拙……|见小曰明，守柔曰强……

original: Take good care of your health and come back in a day.
context: 你好好调理身体，一天之后再来。

original: Hahaha, you two are doing this under the public eye!
context: 哈哈哈，你们这对狗男女幕天席地之下竟然在做这种事情！

original: The aura is confused, this is a sign of obsession!
context: 气息紊乱，这是走火入魔的征兆！

original: Fu Yaoqin, you're having a hard time right now, aren't you? This pretty boy is useless, let me help you.
context: 付瑶琴，你现在很辛苦对不对，这小白脸不中用，我来帮帮你吧。

original: Rest assured and recuperate, I will deal with him!
context: 你安心调息，我来对付他！

original: Trying to take advantage of me?
context: 想要趁人之危吗？

original: I've been waiting for so many years, finally waited for this day, but you took all the advantages!
context: 我苦等了这么多年，好不容易等到这一天，想不到竟然被你占尽了便宜！

original: I will first sacrifice your blood to the God of Jiuli, then chop your body into pieces to feed the Gu worms!
context: 我要先把你血祭给九黎之神，然后再把肉身剁碎做成饵料喂食蛊虫！

original: You better survive and run away first!
context: 你先能活着离开再说吧！

original:
If others do not provoke me, I will not provoke them. If they do, I will annihilate them completely!
From today on, there is no need for the Jiuli tribe to exist.
context:
人不犯我我不犯人，人若犯我灭其满门！
从今天起，九黎部落没有存在的必要了。

context: 妙音坊今天要是不答应我的要求，恐怕明天日出之前，妙音坊不会剩下一个活口。

context: 哼，九黎部落在你苗木黎的领导下就只会使用这些下三滥的手段！想要以此逼迫我付瑶琴就范，你实在是小瞧了妙音坊的实力。

original: I'll say my conditions one last time. If you still don't agree, don't blame me for being a female hater.
context: 我最后再说一遍我的条件，你若还不答应，就休怪我辣手摧花了。

第一，交出妙音坊所有音律典藏，销毁所有副本；

第三 ……

original: Disciples of Melody House, listen to my command. Even if we have to fight to the death today, we can't let them succeed!

original: People from the Central Plains are indeed cunning. There's a saying, "When the snipe and the clam fight, the fisherman benefits." It seems you want to be the benefiting fisherman!
context: 中原人果然狡猾，有句话叫“鹬蚌相争渔翁得利”，看来你是想做得利的渔翁了！

original: Hmph, you're full of big talk!

context: 相比处置九黎部落这帮人，我更想看到你这无知小子究竟会是如何死法。

original: The Jiuli tribe has been entrenched in the southwest for many years, but it's just so-so. I really don't know why the incompetent court can't completely wipe it out.
context: 九黎部落盘踞西南多年，也不过如此，真不知道朝廷那些废物为什么迟迟不能彻底将其剿灭。
