original: Who is this Chu Kuangsheng? Does the monk know him?
context: 这个楚狂生是谁？坊主跟他认识？

original: It's more than just knowing...
context: 岂止是认识……

original: {PlayerName}, I need you to do something for me, and I won't let you down when it's done.
context: {PlayerName}，我要你为我去办一件事，事成之后我不会亏待你。

original: What is it?
context: 什么事情？

original: Help me find out the whereabouts of Chu Kuangsheng, there may be clues in the Three Teachings, I hope you can join the Three Teachings and help me find out.
context: 帮我打探楚狂生这个人的下落，可能三教之中会有线索，我希望你能加入三教，帮我打探消息。

original: I've come all this way over mountains and rivers, and you want me to go back?
context: 我一路翻山越岭好不容易才来到这，你让我再回去？

original: Yes, you are the most suitable candidate.
context: 是，只有你才是最合适的人选。

original: Alright, for your sake, I'll make a move.
context: 好吧，看在你的面子上，我就为你走一遭。

original: Only the high-ranking members of the Three Sects should know about this person now, so you need to gain their trust to get access to key clues.
context: 关于这个人的消息如今应该只有三教的高层才知道，所以你需要得到他们的信任，才有可能接触到关键线索。

original: Only the high-ranking members of the Three Sects should know about this person now, so you need to gain their trust to get access to key clues.
context: 关于这个人的消息如今应该只有三教的高层才知道，所以你需要得到他们的信任，才有可能接触到关键线索。

original: The Chu Kuangsheng you mentioned is now called Lao Motou by the high-ranking members of the Three Sects, a big villain. He has been kept in the Ice Prison under the Yunlin Temple in Lin'an City.
context: 你说的楚狂生现在是被三教高层称为老魔头的大反派，他一直被关在霖安城云林寺的地下冰牢中。

original: How is he now?
context: 他现在怎么样了？

original: He, he's already dead...
context: 他，他已经死了……

original: {yell} Impossible! Absolutely impossible!!!
context: {yell}不可能！绝对不可能！！！

original: He has unparalleled martial arts skills, invincible in the world, how could he die!
context: 他神功盖世，天下无敌，怎么会死！

original: If he really was invincible, how could he be locked up in the Ice Prison by the Three Sects?
context: 他如果真是天下无敌怎么会被三教关在冰牢里？

original: {yell} I want revenge, I want revenge!!!!!
context: {yell}我要复仇，我要复仇！！！！

original: {PlayerName}, I need your help to break through the barriers, I want to break through the mystery and enhance my power, I want those old guys from the Three Sects to pay the price!!!
context: {PlayerName}，我要你助我打通关隘，我要冲破玄关提升功力，我要让三教那帮老家伙付出代价！！！

original: How can I help you?
context: 我要怎么助你？

original: I'll take you to a place.
context: 我带你去一个地方。

original: We will immerse ourselves in this Fountain of Youth together. Under the enhancement of my unique internal strength, it will promote the harmony of Yin and Yang, help me improve my cultivation, and it will also be greatly beneficial to you.
context: 你我共同浸入这不老泉中，在我独门内功加持之下，促成阴阳调和，助我提升修为，这对你也大有裨益。

original: However, it only works wonders when you are Wholesome. Otherwise, the effect will be halved at best, and at worst, it will be harmful and useless.
context: 不过，只有在你体力充沛时才有奇效，否则轻者效用减半，重者有害无益。

original: What are you daydreaming about! Get in the water now!
context: 你在胡思乱想什么！还不赶快下水！

original: Get in the water!
context: 下水！

original: Don't get in the water!
context: 不下水！

original: In broad daylight, what a disgrace!
context: 光天化日，成何体统！

original: Pretentious pseudo-Honorable, don't regret it!
context: 道貌岸然的伪君子，你不要后悔！

original: Valley God Invincible. This is called the Mysterious Female.
context: 谷神不死。是谓玄牝。

original: The gate of the Mysterious Female, is the root of heaven and earth...
context: 玄牝之门，是谓天地根……

original: Whether your current state can help me break through, it's really up to fate.
context: 你这样的状态能否助我突破，实在是听天由命。

original: This method of improving your skills can only be used five times, after five times it will have no effect, don't waste each opportunity. <color=#c44b0e>I'll wait for you here every day at Zi Shi.</color>
context: 这种提升功力的方式只能使用五次，五次过后不再有任何效果，不要浪费每次的机会。<color=#c44b0e>每日子时我在此处等你。</color>

original: It's not perfect, nothing to write home about.
context: 美中不足，乏善可陈。

original: This method of improving your skills can only be used five times, after five times it will have no effect, don't waste each opportunity. <color=#c44b0e>I'll wait for you here every day at Zi Shi.</color>
context: 这种提升功力的方式只能使用五次，五次过后不再有任何效果，不要浪费每次的机会。<color=#c44b0e>每日子时我在此处等你。</color>

original: Your condition is good, you have not let me down.
context: 你的状态不错，没有辜负我对你的期望。

original: This method of improving your skills can only be used five times, after five times it will have no effect, don't waste each opportunity. <color=#c44b0e>I'll wait for you here every day at Zi Shi.</color>
context: 这种提升功力的方式只能使用五次，五次过后不再有任何效果，不要浪费每次的机会。<color=#c44b0e>每日子时我在此处等你。</color>

original: He has already escaped, now his whereabouts are unknown.
context: 他已经脱困了，现在不知所踪。

original: Since he has escaped, why hasn't he come to find me?
context: 既然他脱困了为什么不来找我？

original: It seems he still looks down on me, thinking I'm not good enough for him!
context: 看来他还是看不起我，认为我配不上他！

original: {yell} Why, why!!!!!
context: {yell}为什么，为什么！！！！

original: {PlayerName}, I want you to help me break through the barrier, I want to break through the mysterious barrier to enhance my power, I want that old guy to never look down on me again!
context: {PlayerName}，我要你助我打通关隘，我要冲破玄关提升功力，我要让那个老家伙再也不敢小瞧我！

original: How can I help you?
context: 我要怎么助你？

original: I'll take you to a place.
context: 我带你去一个地方。

original: Of course I've heard of him, why are you asking about him now?
context: 自然听说过，你怎么想起要打听这个人了？

original: I already have a sect, how can I join another one? This is a big taboo in the martial arts world.
context: 我已经有门派了怎么能再拜入其他门派，这可是师门大忌啊。

original: Just keep this in mind for me, and let me know as soon as you get any news.
context: 这件事帮我记在心上就行，若得知消息尽快告诉我。

original: Jiuli
context: 九黎

original: Miao Muli, that pervert, is obsessed with using virgin blood to raise gu, many girls from Melody House have disappeared for no reason, I'm sure they fell into his hands. Now he's even targeting Weier, it's outrageous!
context: 苗木黎那个变态痴迷于用处子之血养蛊，妙音坊此前不少女子无故失踪，想必是遭到他的毒手。现在竟然把龌龊心思打到薇儿身上，简直岂有此理！

original:
As long as the Jiuli Tribe exists, Melody House will never coexist with them!
{PlayerName}, I want you to wipe out the Jiuli Tribe completely, to avenge Yu Weier and Melody House!
context:
九黎部落存在一天，我妙音坊就与他们不共戴天！
{PlayerName}，我要你全力剿灭九黎部落，为鱼薇儿、为我妙音坊出这口恶气！

original: Why do you think I alone can exterminate the Jiuli tribe that has been entrenched in the southwest for generations?
context: 你凭什么会认为我一个人就能把祖祖辈辈盘踞西南的九黎部落剿灭了？

original: Because of this Manual!
context: 凭这本秘籍！

original: Everyone in Melody House, except me, can be at your disposal.
context: 妙音坊除我之外，都可听你调遣。

original:
The Jiuli Tribe is skilled in toxicology, this accessory can protect you if you carry it with you.
If you still can't get rid of the Jiuli Tribe like this, I think you're no different from trash.
context:
九黎部落擅使毒术，这件饰品随身携带可保你无虞。
若是这样你还除不掉九黎部落，依我看跟废物也没什么分别了。

original: I want you to wipe out the Jiuli Tribe completely, to avenge Yu Weier and Melody House! Miao Muli is invincible, I can't rest easy until the Jiuli Tribe is destroyed!
context: 我要你全力剿灭九黎部落，为鱼薇儿、为我妙音坊出这口恶气！苗木黎不死，九黎部落不灭，我心难安！

original: Not only did you help Wei'er vent her anger, but you also removed a major threat for me, I will definitely not treat you badly!
context: 你不但帮薇儿出了这口恶气，也为我解除了心腹大患，我必然不会亏待你！

original: Demonstrate to the Three Sects!
context: 示威三教！

original: Three Sects
context: 三教

original: Subdue Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple
context: 降伏释法寺、道玄宗、儒圣馆

original: Exterminate Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple
context: 剿灭释法寺、道玄宗、儒圣馆

original: Now is the time to make the Three Sects pay for what they have done!
context: 现在是时候该让三教为做过的事情付出代价了！

original: You're not going to make me mess with the Three Sects again, are you?
context: 你该不会又是让我去招惹三教吧？

original: You can exterminate the Jiuli tribe, are you afraid of a few old guys in the Three Sects?
context: 你能剿灭九黎部落，难道还怕了三教中那几个老家伙？

original: Which head of the Three Sects is not a top-notch master, they are not comparable to that waste Miao Muli, aren't you sending me to death?
context: 三教掌门哪个不是超一流的绝顶高手，哪是苗木黎那个废物能相提并论的，你这不是叫我去送死吗？

original: Take the Melody House's internal power method and learn it, those old guys are nothing.
context: 妙音坊的镇派内功心法，你拿去修炼，那几个老家伙不在话下。

original: You're really generous in order to send me to death.
context: 你为了让我去送死还真是大方啊。

original: I'm not asking you to exterminate them, just to <color=#c44b0e>subdue</color> them, to make these high and mighty sects submit to you, a young man, just like back then...
context: 我不是让你去剿灭他们，只是让你<color=#c44b0e>降伏</color>他们，让这些高高在上的门派，臣服在你这个年轻小子面前，就像当年那样……

original: Back then? What happened back then?
context: 当年？当年哪样？

original: This has nothing to do with you, get to work!
context: 此事与你无关，快去做事！

original: I'm not asking you to exterminate them, just to <color=#c44b0e>subdue</color> them, to make these high and mighty sects submit to you, a young man, just like back then...
context: 我不是让你去剿灭他们，只是让你<color=#c44b0e>降伏</color>他们，让这些高高在上的门派，臣服在你这个年轻小子面前，就像当年那样……

original: Back then? What happened back then?
context: 当年？当年哪样？

original: This has nothing to do with you!
context: 此事与你无关！

original: Even if I don't fight to the death with this big sect, my strength is completely useless.
context: 即便不跟这个大门派打生打死，我这点实力也完全无济于事啊。

original: What if we join forces?
context: 如果你我联手呢？

original: Of course, we'll kill gods if gods block our way, and kill Buddhas if Buddhas block our way!
context: 自然是神挡杀神，佛挡杀佛！

original: What are you waiting for, let's go!
context: 还愣着干什么，上路了！

original: They killed Chu Kuangsheng, they must pay for this!
context: 他们害死了楚狂生，就该为此付出代价！

original: What do you want me to do?
context: 你想让我怎么做？

original: Naturally, it's an eye for an eye. I want you to wipe out these three sects!
context: 自然是血债血偿，我要你把这三教杀得鸡犬不留！

original: (If she knew it was my doing, would she turn against me on the spot...)
context: （如果让她知道是我做的手脚，会不会马上翻脸干掉我……）

original: You seem to look unwell?
context: 你脸色似乎很难看？

original: No, nothing.
context: 没，没什么。

original: What are you waiting for, get to work!
context: 还愣着做什么，快去做事！

original: They killed Chu Kuangsheng, they must pay for this!
context: 他们害死了楚狂生，就该为此付出代价！

original: What do you want me to do?
context: 你想让我怎么做？

original: Naturally, it's an eye for an eye. I want you to wipe out these three sects!
context: 自然是血债血偿，我要你把这三教杀得鸡犬不留！

original: (If she knew it was my doing, would she turn against me on the spot...)
context: （如果让她知道是我做的手脚，会不会马上翻脸干掉我……）

original: You seem to look unwell?
context: 你脸色似乎很难看？

original: With my current strength, trying to annihilate the three sects is no different from seeking death.
context: 凭我这点实力想要剿灭三教，简直跟送死没什么区别。

original: What if we join forces?
context: 如果你我联手呢？

original: Of course, we'll kill gods if gods block our way, and kill Buddhas if Buddhas block our way!
context: 自然是神挡杀神，佛挡杀佛！

original: What are you waiting for, let's go!
context: 还愣着作什么，上路了！

original: Hmph, the so-called prestigious sects, aren't they now obediently submitting under others' feet. Just like when you didn't accept Chu Kuangsheng back then, didn't you end up submitting obediently in the end.
context: 哼，不可一世的名门大派，现在还不是乖乖臣服在别人脚下。就像当年你们不服气楚狂生一样，最后不还是乖乖臣服。

original: Perhaps you didn't accept it in your hearts, so you used despicable means to imprison him. Now that he has broken free from the prison, you traitors, wait for him to come and settle the score with you!
context: 也许你们内心并不服气，所以这才用卑鄙手段囚禁了他。现在他已挣脱牢笼，你们这些背叛他的人，一个个就等着他来找你们算账吧！

original: Hmph, the so-called prestigious sects, aren't they now obediently submitting under others' feet. Just like when they didn't accept Chu Kuangsheng back then, didn't they end up submitting obediently in the end.
context: 哼，不可一世的名门大派，现在还不是乖乖臣服在别人脚下。就像当年他们不服气楚狂生一样，最后不还是乖乖臣服。

original: Perhaps these sect leaders didn't accept it in their hearts, so they used despicable means to imprison Chu Kuangsheng.
context: 也许这些门派掌门内心并不服气，所以这才用卑鄙手段囚禁了楚狂生。

original: Now that Chu Kuangsheng has broken free from the prison, those who betrayed him, wait for him to come and settle the score with you!
context: 现在楚狂生已挣脱牢笼，那些背叛他的人，一个个就等着被找上门算账吧！

original: Zhong Yangzi, Hui Yuan, Cai Yuanchang...
context: 重阳子、慧元、蔡元常……

original: I will use the destruction of your three sects to commemorate the person you once admired the most...
context: 我要用你们三教的覆灭祭奠你们曾经最钦佩之人……

original: To commemorate Chu Kuangsheng, who once dominated the martial arts world and stood above the three sects!
context: 祭奠曾经意气风发力压三教，独立江湖鳌头的楚狂生！

original: Zhong Yangzi, Hui Yuan, Cai Yuanchang...
context: 重阳子、慧元、蔡元常……

original: I will use the destruction of your three sects to commemorate the person you once admired the most...
context: 我要用你们三教的覆灭祭奠你们曾经最钦佩之人……

original: To commemorate Chu Kuangsheng, who once dominated the martial arts world and stood above the three sects!
context: 祭奠曾经意气风发力压三教，独立江湖鳌头的楚狂生！

original: You have become the new master of Nine Factions Sect, under your leadership,
context: 你成为了新的九流门之主，在你的带领下，

original: No one knows where the Nine Factions Sect will go,
context: 无人预知九流门将何去何从，

original: Will it repeat the same mistakes, or never forget the initial intention?
context: 是重蹈覆辙，还是不忘初心？

original: Everything is still an unknown...
context: 一切都还是未知之数……

original:
Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.
{PlayerName}, long time no see.
context:
欢迎各位大驾光临我九流门。
{PlayerName}，许久不见了。

original: Qin Huizhi! Aren't you dead?
context: 秦会之！你不是死了吗？

original: When the hare dies, the hound is cooked. I understand the new emperor better than anyone, so I prepared in advance.
context: 狡兔死，走狗烹。我比任何人都了解新皇上，所以才会未雨绸缪。

original: I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
context: 想不到你竟然是九流门真正的幕后主使。

original: I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
context: 想不到你竟然是九流门真正的幕后主使。

original: Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.
context: 欢迎各位大驾光临我九流门。

original: I, Qin Huizhi, have been waiting for a long time.
context: 敝人秦会之恭候多时了。

original:
Qin Huizhi, the Nine Factions Sect is about to be destroyed in your hands!
I can't let the Nine Factions Sect, which I worked hard to create, become a place to hide dirt and accept filth, let alone a tool for your power struggle!
context:
秦会之，九流门都快要毁在你的手里了！
老夫不能让辛苦创建的九流门成为藏污纳垢之地，更不想它成为你争权夺势的工具！

original: What do you want to do?
context: 你想怎么样呢？

original: I'm going to clean house!
context: 老夫要清理门户！

original: Junior brother, you really can't let go!
context: 师弟，你果然还是放不下！

original: Senior brother, step aside, I'm going to clean house today!
context: 师兄你让开，我今天要清理门户！

original: Don't forget, he's my disciple, if you want to deal with him, shouldn't you ask me, his master, first?
context: 你别忘了，他是我的徒弟，你要处置他是不是得先问过我这个当师父的？

original: You want to stop me? You've always protected him, and you're still protecting him now!
context: 你要拦我？当年你就袒护他，事到如今你还要袒护他！

original: I'm counting on him to take care of me in my old age, if you cripple him, who will I find?
context: 我还指望他给我养老送终，你废了他我找谁去。

original: Good, good, good!
context: 好，好，好！

original: Today, let's have another fight between us brothers, to see who is better!
context: 今日咱们师兄弟再战一场，到底是谁技高一筹！

original: I didn't expect it, junior brother, you've been reborn from the ashes.
context: 看不出来，师弟浴火重生了。

original: What a pity, I lost most of my cultivation, otherwise I would be even stronger!
context: 可惜，修为损失大半，要不然我还会更强！

original: {yell} Despicable!!!
context: {yell}卑鄙！！！

original: {yell} Who else in the world can stop me, who else!!!
context: {yell}普天之下还有谁能拦我，还有谁！！！

original: Disciple, run!!!
context: 徒儿，快逃！！！

original: No one is escaping today.
context: 今天一个也跑不了。

original: Qin, Hui, Zhi! I want you dead!!!!!
context: 秦，会，之！我要你死！！！！

original: From Qin Huizhi down, all of Nine Factions Sect died, a layer of filth has finally been thoroughly cleansed...
context: 九流门自秦会之以下，全部身死道消，一片污浊终于被彻底清洗……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nine Factions Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>九流门，覆灭！</color></size>

original: Disciple, the burden of Nine Factions Sect is now on you.
context: 徒儿啊，这九流门的担子今后可就交给你了。

original: Master, isn't Nine Factions Sect already completely wiped out by me?
context: 师父，这九流门不是已经算是被我彻底灭门了吗？

original: Your master is right, the old Nine Factions Sect is already rotten, has long abandoned its original mission and initial heart, all the blame is on me for not using people properly.
context: 你师父是对的，旧的九流门已经腐朽不堪，早已丢弃了当初的使命和初心，一切始作俑者都是老夫当年用人不当。

original: The new Nine Factions Sect will be established from today, always remember the original heart.
context: 这新的九流门就从今天起重新建立，不忘初心方得始终。

original: "To have a million houses for the world's cold scholars to enjoy" is your master's dream, and it was also my dream. Now it's passed on to you, I hope it will be your dream too.
context: “安得广厦千万间，大庇天下寒士俱欢颜”是你师父的梦想，也是当初老夫的梦想，如今传承到你这一代，希望也会是你的梦想。

original: I, I can't do it. You, my master and uncle, should be the head of this new Nine Factions Sect.
context: 我，我不成的。这新的九流门门主还是师父、师伯你们来当吧。

original: We two old guys have lost all our power and are now useless. If you don't lead this new Nine Factions Sect, it will soon become a sharp tool in the hands of the schemers if given to others.
context: 我们两个老家伙功力全失，已经是个废人了。你若不统领这新的九流门，交给外人怕是过不了多久又成为阴谋家手中的利器。

original: Alright, I will take on this responsibility and strive to carry forward the dreams of my master and uncle.
context: 好吧，徒弟就接下这个担子，努力把师父、师伯的梦想发扬光大。

original: Congratulations to {PlayerName} for becoming the new head of Nine Factions Sect!
context: 恭贺{PlayerName}荣任九流门新门主！

original: Junior brother, your strength is still so weak in my eyes.
context: 师弟，你的实力在我眼里还是如此不堪一击。

original: Qin Huizhi, what are you doing!
context: 秦会之，你做什么！

original: {yell} Beast, dare to devour my cultivation!
context: {yell}畜生，竟敢吞噬老夫的修为！

original: {yell} Hahaha, such abundant cultivation!
context: {yell}哈哈哈哈，好充沛的修为啊！

original: {yell} Despicable!!!
context: {yell}卑鄙！！！

original: {yell} Who else in the world can stop me, who else!!!
context: {yell}普天之下还有谁能拦我，还有谁！！！

original: Disciple, run!!!
context: 徒儿，快逃！！！

original: No one is escaping today.
context: 今天一个也跑不了。

original: Qin, Hui, Zhi! I want you dead!!!!!
context: 秦，会，之！我要你死！！！！

original: Chu Kuangsheng, do you still recognize me?
context: 楚狂生，你还认得我吗？

original: Yaoqin girl, you, why are you here?
context: 瑶琴妹子，你，你怎么来了？

original: Great opportunity!
context: 好机会！

original: Master, are you okay, let me heal you.
context: 师父，你不要紧吧，徒儿给你疗伤。

original: Hmph, I don't care about this little injury.
context: 哼，老夫还不在乎这点小伤。

original: How can I stand by and do nothing as a disciple? I'll deal with them!
context: 徒儿怎能袖手旁观，我来对付他们！

original: Qin Huizhi, what have you done!
context: 秦会之，你做了什么！

original: {yell} Beast, dare to devour my cultivation!
context: {yell}畜生，竟敢吞噬老夫的修为！

original: Qin Huizhi, I'll tear you to pieces!!!
context: 秦会之，我要把你碎尸万段！！！

original: Uh...
Uh... Uh...
It seems like the signs of Obsession!
context: 好像是走火入魔的征兆！

original: If I don't help him calm the true qi that is about to burst out of his body, he might die from reversed blood flow; but he has lost his mind and will not show mercy to me.
context: 如果不帮他平息即将爆体而出的真气，恐怕会逆血倒流而死；不过他神志已失，对我不会手下留情。

original: Help him calm his true qi.
context: 助他平息真气。

original: Stand by and watch.
context: 袖手旁观。

original: One day later...
context: 一天之后……

original: Senior Chu's Obsession caused an explosion, the stone door of the ice cellar was blasted open, I need to run away from here quickly.
context: 楚前辈走火入魔爆体，冰窖石门都被震开了，我得赶紧离开这里。

original: The old senior's Obsession caused an explosion, the stone door of the ice cellar was blasted open, I need to run away from here quickly.
context: 老前辈走火入魔爆体，冰窖石门都被震开了，我得赶紧离开这里。

original: <size=200%>Break it for me!!!</size>
context: <size=200%>给我破！！！</size>

original: <size=200%>Roar!!!!!!</size>
What a terrifying power, the chains were actually broken!!!
context: 好可怕的力量，锁链竟然都被挣断了！！！

original: Phew, success or failure depends on this, saving people is the most important!
context: 呼，成败在此一举，救人要紧！

original: The demon's breath gradually calmed down, he must have regained his sanity.
context: 这魔头的气息逐渐平稳下来，想必是恢复了神智。

original: Hahahaha!
context: 哈哈哈哈！

original: I finally escaped! I finally escaped!!!
context: 老夫终于脱困了！老夫终于脱困了！！！

original: Kid, I was Obsessed just now, but you didn't stand by and let me die. I don't want to owe you this huge favor, so I'll give you a unique heart method of mine, then we'll be even.
context: 小家伙，刚才老夫走火入魔，你没有袖手旁观任由老夫丧命，老夫可不想欠你这个天大的人情，送你一本老夫独门心法，咱们可就互不相欠了。

original: Is senior alright now?
context: 前辈是否无恙了？

original: Your master has been holding on alone outside for so long, hurry up and go out to check, don't let him get killed.
context: 你师父孤身一人在外面撑了那么久，赶紧出去看看，可千万别让人打死了。

original: Number One in the World
context: 天下第一

original: Level up to at least 15 in <color=#c44b0e>Lost Forest</color>.
context: 在<color=#c44b0e>迷踪林</color>将自身等级至少升到15级。

original: Complete the various tests of the master and then go to Chuxiang City.
context: 完成师父的各项考验然后前往楚襄城。

original:
Reach 50 in any martial arts attribute (such as Fist) by learning from martial arts manuals.
(You can spar with the master in the city's martial arts hall to increase experience.)
context:
自身任一项武功属性（如拳掌）通过修炼外功秘籍达到50。
（可到城内武馆跟馆主切磋，提升经验。）

original: Inquire about opportunities to make a name for yourself at the Chuxiang City inn.
context: 在楚襄城客栈打听可以出人头地的事情。

original: Participate in the Chuxiang Hero Conference
context: 参加楚襄英雄会

original:
Reach level 5 Famous in Fame.
(You can gain Fame by competing with people in the martial arts world or completing town bounties)
context:
名声达到5级闻名遐迩。
（与江湖人比武或完成城镇悬赏可获取名声）

original: Learn any martial arts attribute to 100.
context: 自身任一项武功属性修炼到100。

original: Go to Daliang City to participate in the Wind and Cloud Contest and win the "Heavenly Champion".
context: 前往大梁城参加风云擂，获得“天阶魁首”。

original: Reach level 8 Revered in Fame, making the world pay attention to your every move.
context: 名声达到8级举世闻名，让世人关注到你的一举一动。

original: Obtain the qualification to participate in the Peak Debate.
context: 获得参加顶峰论道的资格。

original: Win the title of the world's number one in the Peak Debate.
context: 在顶峰论道中获得天下第一的头衔。

original: Unify the martial arts world.
context: 一统江湖

original: Level up to at least 15 in <color=#c44b0e>Lost Forest</color>.
context: 在<color=#c44b0e>迷踪林</color>将自身等级至少升到15级。

original: Invite at least 3 companions to join the team.
context: 至少邀请3名伙伴加入队伍。

original: Complete the various tests of the master and then go to Chuxiang City.
context: 完成师父的各项考验然后前往楚襄城。

original:
The minimum level of all team Characters reaches level 30, with at least 3 teammates.
(You can go to the martial arts gym in the city to spar with the gym owner and gain Experience.)
context:
全队角色最低等级达到30级，至少3名队友。
（可到城内武馆跟馆主切磋，提升经验。）

original: One of your martial arts attributes (such as Fist, Sword, etc.) reaches 50 through learning from an external skill Manual.
context: 自身任一项武功属性（如拳掌、御剑等）通过修炼外功秘籍达到50。

original:
Reach level 4 Rising Star in Fame.
(Completing town bounties can earn Fame)
context:
名声达到4级后起之秀。
（完成城镇悬赏可获取名声）

original: One of your martial arts attributes reaches 100 through learning from an external skill Manual.
context: 自身任一项武功属性通过修炼外功秘籍达到100。

original: Eliminate or subdue the Crime Investigation Bureau.
context: 剿灭或降伏神捕门。

context: 剿灭九江水寨

original: Eliminate Taoist Sect

original: Destroy Shifa Temple
context: 剿灭释法寺

original: Destroy Confucius Temple
context: 剿灭儒圣馆

original: Reach level 7 Prominence in Fame.
context: 名声达到7级声名赫赫。

original: Prepare to welcome the most glorious moment of your life on the Ritual Platform!
context: 准备在封禅台上迎接人生中最辉煌的时刻！

original: Subdue the Jiujiang Fotress.
context: 降伏九江水寨

original: Subdue the Langya Sword Pavilion.
context: 降伏琅琊剑阁

original: Subdue the Taoist Sect.

original: Subdue the Shifa Temple.
context: 降伏释法寺

original: Subdue the Confucius Temple.
context: 降伏儒圣馆

original: Reach level 7 Prominence in Fame.
context: 名声达到7级声名赫赫。

original: Prepare to welcome the most glorious moment of your life on the Ritual Platform!
context: 准备在封禅台上迎接人生中最辉煌的时刻！

original: Eliminate Crime Investigation Bureau
context: 剿灭神捕门

original: The minimum level of all team Characters reaches level 60, with at least 5 teammates.
context: 全队角色最低等级达到60级，至少5名队友。

original: Since the royal road can't be taken anymore, it can only be turned into a tyrant's road, and the six major factions can only be eliminated one by one.
context: 王道路线既然走不下去了，只能转为霸道，六大派如今只能一一剿灭了。

original: Defend the country.
context: 保家卫国

original: Level up to at least 15 in <color=#c44b0e>Lost Forest</color>.
context: 在<color=#c44b0e>迷踪林</color>将自身等级至少升到15级。

original: Complete the various tests of the master and then go to Chuxiang City.
context: 完成师父的各项考验然后前往楚襄城。

original:
Reach 50 in any martial arts attribute (such as Fist) by learning from martial arts manuals.
(You can spar with the master in the city's martial arts hall to increase experience.)
context:
自身任一项武功属性（如拳掌）通过修炼外功秘籍达到50。
（可到城内武馆跟馆主切磋，提升经验。）

original: You can join the army at Ye Family Battalion in Xiangfan Region at any time.
context: 可随时前往襄樊地区的叶家军参军。

original: Accumulate military merits to become a "Guerrilla General".
context: 积累战功成为“游击将军”

original: Follow the orders of Marshal Ye.
context: 听从叶元帅调遣。

original: Rescue Marshal Ye.
context: 营救叶元帅

original: Rescue Marshal Ye.
context: 营救叶元帅

original: Go to the palace to vindicate Marshal Ye.
context: 前往行宫为叶元帅平反。

original: Return to Ye Family Battalion and inherit Marshal Ye's will.
context: 重返叶家军，继承叶元帅的遗志。

original: Anyway, I can't wash away the stains of this life, so it's better not to have this ambition to defend the country.
context: 反正已经这样了，我这一世的污点算是洗不清了，这保家卫国的志向不要也罢。

original: Marshal Ye has fallen, my future is also broken, how can I talk about defending the country in the future.
context: 叶元帅倒台了，我的前程从此也就断了，今后如何再谈保家卫国。

original:
Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.
{PlayerName}, long time no see.
context:
欢迎各位大驾光临我九流门。
{PlayerName}，许久不见了。

original: Qin Huizhi! Aren't you dead?
context: 秦会之！你不是死了吗？

original: When the hare dies, the hound is cooked. I understand the new emperor better than anyone, so I prepared in advance.
context: 狡兔死，走狗烹。我比任何人都了解新皇上，所以才会未雨绸缪。

original: I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
context: 想不到你竟然是九流门真正的幕后主使。

original: I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
context: 想不到你竟然是九流门真正的幕后主使。

original: Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.
context: 欢迎各位大驾光临我九流门。

original: I, Qin Huizhi, have been waiting for a long time.
context: 敝人秦会之恭候多时了。

original: I didn't expect you to be the disciple of Uncle Master Yan Gexing, no wonder you often do things that make people laugh.
context: 想不到你竟然是师叔燕歌行的弟子，难怪经常做出一些让人贻笑大方的事情。

original: Why didn't my Uncle Master come with you? Is it because of a recurrence of an old injury, or he didn't want to show up, or...
context: 我那位师叔为何没跟你一起来？是旧伤复发还是不屑露面，亦或是……

original:
Qin Huizhi, your reign as the leader of the Nine Factions Sect ends today.
My purpose here is to eradicate the Nine Factions Sect, this scourge of the martial arts world, let's see how long you can be arrogant.
context:
秦会之，你的九流门门主今天算是做到头了。
我来此的目的就是要铲除九流门这江湖毒瘤，看你还能嚣张到几时。

original: Let me see how a mantis can block a chariot, how a dragonfly can shake a big tree!
context: 那就让我开开眼界，螳臂如何当车，蚍蜉如何撼大树！

original: From Qin Huizhi down, all of Nine Factions Sect died, a layer of filth has finally been thoroughly cleansed...
context: 九流门自秦会之以下，全部身死道消，一片污浊终于被彻底清洗……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nine Factions Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>九流门，覆灭！</color></size>

original: "How I wish I could have a mansion with thousands of rooms, to shelter all the poor scholars in the world"...
context: “安得广厦千万间，大庇天下寒士俱欢颜”……

original: What a great and far-reaching vision, but it has been tarnished by people like Qin Huizhi, who have made the Nine Factions Sect filthy and have long abandoned their original mission and initial heart.
context: 这是多么伟大的宏远，却被秦会之这种人把九流门搞得污秽不堪，早已背弃了当初的使命和初心。

original: Destroy before establishing! From today, the old Nine Factions Sect no longer exists, and the new Nine Factions Sect is born!
context: 先破后立！今天起，旧的九流门不复存在，新的九流门至此而生！

original: I, {PlayerName}, will be the master of this new Nine Factions Sect, and I will continue this unfinished great blueprint!
context: 我{PlayerName}，就做这新的九流门之主，由我来续上这未完成的伟大宏图！

original: Continue to travel in the martial arts world!
context: 继续游历江湖！

original: End of the martial arts career.
context: 结束江湖生涯。

original: Qin Huizhi, the Nine Factions Sect is causing chaos in the world, today I am here to eradicate you completely!
context: 秦会之，九流门祸乱天下，今天我是来将你们彻底铲除的！

original: Let me see how a mantis can block a chariot, how a dragonfly can shake a big tree!
context: 那就让我开开眼界，螳臂如何当车，蚍蜉如何撼大树！

original: {yell} How could I possibly lose, how could I lose!
context: {yell}我怎么可能会输，怎么会输！

original: The mountain is high, but the work is incomplete...
context: 为山九仞，功亏一篑……

original: The heavens want to destroy me, it's not my fault...
context: 天要亡我，非战之罪……

original: From Qin Huizhi down, all of Nine Factions Sect died, a layer of filth has finally been thoroughly cleansed...
context: 九流门自秦会之以下，全部身死道消，一片污浊终于被彻底清洗……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nine Factions Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>九流门，覆灭！</color></size>

original: I heard that the leader is recruiting soldiers and buying horses, I want to know more about it.
context: 听闻寨主正在招兵买马，我想来了解一下情况。

original: The Jiujiang Fotress was originally a gathering of desperate people. Some people lost their homes and lives due to heavy taxes, some people lost their wives and children due to war, in short, they were all innocent and pitiful people.
context: 九江水寨最初是一群走投无路之人聚集于此，有人因为苛捐杂税家破人亡，有人因战火妻离子散，总之都是一些无辜可怜之人。

original: The stockpile of food in the mountain stronghold is not much. With more people joining, livelihood becomes a problem. We can't farm on the water, and the government doesn't allow us to go into the city to exchange for food, so we have to find another way.
context: 山寨粮食储备不多，投奔的人多了，生计便成了问题，我们在水面上无法耕种，官府也不许我们进城换粮食，所以只能另寻活路。

original: Fortunately, there are many ships passing by on the Jiujiang River, most of which are merchant ships or public ships carrying supplies. Those goods were originally exploited from the people, and we take them for our own use, which can be considered as making the best use of everything.
context: 所幸九江之上过往船只众多，其中大多是商船或运送物资的公船。那些财物原本就是从百姓身上剥削而来，我们取之为己用，也算是物尽其用。

original: Apart from the necessary expenses, the remaining goods are equally distributed to the brothers in the camp. No one in the Jiujiang Fotress can hide private goods, not even me.
context: 除去必要的开支，余下的财物，都会平等分给寨内各位弟兄。九江水寨之中无人可以藏私，即便是我也不例外。

original: Since I took charge of the Jiujiang Fotress, no one in the martial arts world dares to offend. There are only a handful of people who can withstand my <color=#c44b0e>Devouring Blade</color>. Not to mention that I also have a unique skill of <color=#c44b0e>Dust Clearing</color>, even if it is a thousand troops and horses, it is a one-way trip!
context: 自从我坐镇九江水寨以来，江湖上无人胆敢冒犯。能挡下我<color=#c44b0e>吞鲸刀法</color>的人，不过一手之数。更何况我还有一门<color=#c44b0e>浊浪排空</color>的绝招，就算是千军万马，也是有来无回！

original: Now, wherever there are rivers and lakes, it is our Jiujiang Fotress that has the final say, even if the king of heaven comes, he has to go around!
context: 如今，凡是有江河湖海的地方，都是我们九江水寨说了算，就算天王老子来了也得绕着走！

original: This is all I can tell you, did you hear it clearly?
context: 本寨主能告诉你的就是这些，你都听清楚了吗？

original: I heard it clearly.
context: 听清楚了。

original: Please say it again, leader.
context: 麻烦寨主再说一遍。

original: If you want to join the water camp, you have to pass the test, no one can be an exception.
context: 想要加入水寨，需得通过考验，无一人可以例外。

original: Are you ready to take the test?
context: 你做好接受考验的准备了吗？

original: Take the test!
context: 接受考验！

original: Ask for details about the test.
context: 询问考验详情。

original: Think about it again.
context: 再想想。

original: The test is simple. Today a rich merchant will pass by our camp by water. If you can bring back the goods on his ship, the test is considered passed.
context: 这考验倒也简单。今天有个富商会走水路经过本寨附近，你能去将他船上的财物带回来，就算考验通过。

original: Isn't this asking me to be a robber who robs wealth?
context: 这不是让我去做劫财的强盗吗？

original: If you don't do this, someone else will. That's the way the world is. If you meet someone with a kind heart, you might spare these people's lives. If you meet some people, hehe...
context: 这种事情你不去做，也会有别人去做，这个世道就是这样。遇到心善的可能还会留这些人一条命，若是碰到有些人，嘿嘿……

original: Are you ready to take the test?
context: 你做好接受考验的准备了吗？

original: Good! I, the leader of this stronghold, will be waiting for your good news!
context: 好！本寨主在此等着你的好消息！

original:
{PlayerName} brother, the merchant's ship is just ahead.
I can only take you this far, good luck.
context:
{PlayerName}兄弟，前面就是那富商的船了。
我只能送你到这了，祝你好运。

original: You're unlucky to pass by here today, hand over the goods if you know what's good for you!
context: 今天路过这里算你们倒霉，识相点就把货物交出来吧！

original:
Water, water bandits!
Where are the bodyguards! Where are the bodyguards!?
context:
水、水贼啊！
保镖呢！保镖在哪里！？

original: Don't be afraid, boss. They're just water bandits. Leave it to us!
context: 老板别怕，区区水贼而已，交给我们吧！

original:
Alright, I'll leave it to you!
I paid a lot for you, don't disappoint me!
context:
好，就交给你们了！
你们可是我花了大价钱雇的，可别让我失望啊！

original: Hey, boss, watch this!
context: 嘿，老板你瞧好吧！

original: Good man, good man, I have an old mother at home and a newborn baby, let's talk it out. As long as you don't kill me, you can take whatever you like from this ship!
context: 好汉好汉，我上有八十老母，下有未满月的婴儿，咱们有话好商量，只要不杀我，这船上的东西您看好了什么随便拿！

original: As long as you hand over all the valuable things on the ship, I won't make things difficult for you.
context: 只要你乖乖把船上值钱的东西都交出来，我不会为难你。

original: Alright, alright, everything is here. Take it all, just take it all!
context: 好好好，都在这里，好汉你都拿走，都拿走就是了！

original: You plunder all the valuable things on the ship and return with a full load.
context: 你将船上值钱的东西洗劫一空，满载而归。

original: Transition to the next scene, clear the people on the ship, return to the gathering hall
context: 黑幕过渡，清除船上人员，回到聚义堂

original: Leader, all the goods from the ship are here, please have a look.
context: 寨主，船上财物尽数于此，请寨主过目。

original: I knew I wasn't wrong about you, you're born for this job!
context: 本寨主果然没看错，你天生就是吃这碗饭的好料！

original: Thank you for your praise, leader!
context: 承蒙寨主抬举！

original: {PlayerName}, since you've already run away, stick to your original decision!
context: {PlayerName}，既然已经离开了，就坚持当初的决定吧！

original: {PlayerName}, you can come and go freely in Jiujiang Fotress, but if you want to leave, you need to leave the stronghold token <color=#c44b0e>Jiujiang fish pole</color> behind. I won't stop you.
context: {PlayerName}，九江水寨来去自如，但你若要走，需要把山寨信物<color=#c44b0e>九江鱼篓</color>留下，本寨主不会加以阻拦。

original: However, if you want to run away, all your previous efforts in the stronghold will be in vain, and the water stronghold will no longer welcome you. Your stronghold talent <color=#097a76>Upstream walk</color> and contributions will also be erased. Have you thought it through?
context: 只不过你若要离开，你之前在寨里的努力全部作废，今后水寨也不再欢迎你，寨里天赋<color=#097a76>逆流而上</color>和贡献也一并抹去。你可想好了？

original: I've made up my mind! <color=#c44b0e>(Return the Jiujiang fish pole)</color>
context: 我去意已决！<color=#c44b0e>（归还九江鱼篓）</color>

original: I've made up my mind! (Don't return the Jiujiang fish pole)
context: 我去意已决！（不归还九江鱼篓）

original: I was just kidding.
context: 我说着玩的。

original:
Alright, from today on, you're no longer a brother of the water stronghold.
If you become an enemy of the water stronghold, don't blame me for not remembering old times!
context:
好，从今日起你便不是水寨的弟兄了。
若你和水寨为敌，到时候休怪本寨主不念旧情！

original: Since you're so determined, get out of Jiujiang Fotress, I don't want to see you again!
context: 既然你执意如此，你就给我滚出九江水寨，我不想再见到你！

original:
{PlayerSurName} brother, are you also leaving me?
Sigh, fine, if you want to leave, then leave.
context:
{PlayerSurName}兄弟，连你也要离本寨主而去吗？
唉，罢了，你想走就走吧。

original: I've made up my mind. <color=#0574a8>(Leave Jiujiang Fotress)</color>
context: 去意已决。<color=#0574a8>（退出九江水寨）</color>

original: Let me think about it.
context: 再考虑考虑。

original: Leader, take care.
context: 寨主，保重。

original: Establishing the Water Stronghold
context: 水寨立足

original: Intercepting Supplies
context: 截粮

original: Intercept the ships carrying supplies on the river.
context: 前往江面截下运送粮草的船只。

original: Go back and report to the leader.
context: 回去向寨主复命。

original: You're too weak now, going out on a mission might mess things up and lose face for the water stronghold. I'll only trust you with tasks when you reach at least <color=#c44b0e>level 20</color>.
context: 你如今实力太弱，出门办事可能会把事情搞砸丢了水寨脸面，起码实力达到<color=#c44b0e>20级</color>我才放心交给你差事。

original: {PlayerName}, you've been with the water stronghold for a while now, there's a business opportunity that I want to entrust to you, don't disappoint me.
context: {PlayerName}，你加入水寨的时间也不短了，有个生意正好交给你去做，你可不要让本寨主失望。

original: Just give the order, leader.
context: 寨主尽管吩咐。

original: I recently got news that a batch of grain and grass is being transported by water to the Chu-Xiang region. How can we let it pass without taking a share!
context: 近日本寨主得到消息，有一批粮草要走水路运往楚襄地区，岂有雁过不拔毛的道理！

original: Understood, I will go and collect the goods for the leader right away!
context: 属下明白，这就去替寨主收货去！

original: General, there are often water bandits around here, I'm afraid...
context: 将军，这里常有水贼出没，我怕……

original: We are soldiers, they are thieves, there's no such thing as soldiers being afraid of thieves.
context: 咱们是兵，他们是贼，哪有听过兵怕贼的道理。

original: I can only say that you guys are too inexperienced.
context: 只能说你们太没见过世面了。

original: How dare you thieves, even the official's ship you dare to plunder!
context: 大胆贼人，连官家的船也敢劫掠！

original:
Who told you to be so rich?
It would be wise to give up resistance, it would save me some trouble.
context:
谁叫你们油水多呢。
识相点放弃抵抗吧，这样我也省事。

original: The military merit that comes to the door must not let this kid run away.
context: 送上门的军功可不能让这小子跑了。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: You few want to catch me for military merit, are you blind?
context: 凭你们几个还想捉我换军功，瞎了你们的狗眼。

original: This task is too easy, go back and report to the leader.
context: 这差事太轻松了，回去向寨主复命吧。

original: Well done, you didn't let this camp leader down!
context: 干得好，果然没让本寨主失望！

original: Now, I can officially teach you our Water Camp's exclusive talent <color=#097a76>Upstream walk</color>.
context: 咱们水寨的专属天赋<color=#097a76>逆流而上</color>可以正式传授给你了。

original: From today on, you are a brother of our Water Camp, sharing both blessings and hardships!
context: 从今天起你就是咱们水寨的兄弟了，有福同享，有难同当！

original: Thank you for your appreciation, Camp Leader.
context: 多谢寨主赏识。

original: The business of Jiujiang Fotress
context: 九江水寨的生意

original: Business
context: 生意

original: Go to Lin'an City, convince the owner of Wine God Tower to hire the cargo ship of Jiujiang Fotress, and pay a deposit.
context: 前往霖安城，说服太白楼掌柜雇佣九江水寨的货船，并交付定金。

original: Return to Jiujiang Fotress and report to Ding Fengbo.
context: 返回九江水寨，向定风波报讯。

original:
Young man, don't aim too high. There will be plenty of tasks for you in the future.
The most urgent task is to build good relations with the brothers in the water camp, after all, you are also a part of the water camp.
context:
年轻人不要好高骛远，以后有的是任务交待你去做。
当务之急你要先跟水寨里的兄弟搞好关系，毕竟你也是水寨里的一份子啊。

original: \n|(It seems that I need to make my relations with the water camp reach <color=#097a76>Friendly (Relations 20)</color> first, so that the camp leader can trust me with new tasks.)
context: （看样子我需要先使水寨跟我的关系达到<color=#097a76>友善（关系20）</color>，寨主才肯放心交给我新任务。）

original: The Wine God Tower in Lin'an City is ignorant, daring to hire other families' cargo ships to transport goods for them. Do they look down on our Jiujiang Fotress?
context: 霖安城里的太白楼不知好歹，竟然敢雇其他家的货船为他们运货，莫非是瞧不起我们九江水寨吗！

original: {PlayerName}, you go and warn the shopkeeper of the Wine God Tower. If they don't use the ships of Jiujiang Fotress for transportation, I guarantee their goods will never reach their destination.
context: {PlayerName}，你去警告下太白楼的掌柜，若是不用九江水寨的船运货，本寨主保准他们的货物一辈子到不了目的地。

original: These merchants are all cunning. To prevent them from reneging after agreeing, collect <color=#097a76>10 taels of Gold bullion</color> from them as a deposit!
context: 这帮商人各个奸猾，为了防止他们应承后又变卦，收他们<color=#097a76>10两金元宝</color>作为定金！

original: Yes, sir!
context: 遵命！

original: Shopkeeper, I have a business proposal to discuss with you.
context: 掌柜的，有笔生意要跟你谈谈。

original: That's great, I wonder if you have a new wine recipe or a way to get more wine?
context: 那感情好，不知小哥是有新酒的配方还是进酒的门路呀？

original: Neither, I represent the Jiujiang Fotress. Please hire our Jiujiang Fotress's ships for your business in the future. This way, both you and our water camp will benefit, it's a win-win situation.
context: 两者都不是，我代表九江水寨而来，请你以后做生意都雇佣我们九江水寨的货船，这样你和我们水寨都得利，两全其美。

original: Our water camp's reputation and strength will definitely reassure you. Before that, you need to pay 10 taels of Gold bullion as a deposit, and then we can consider this deal done.
context: 我们水寨的信誉和实力绝对让你放心，在此之前需要先交10两金元宝作为定金，咱们这笔生意就算是达成了。

original: But I've already made arrangements with other ship owners. If I break my word, the business of this Wine God Tower will be impossible to do in the future.
context: 但是我已经跟别家船号约好了，若是言而无信，以后这太白楼的生意可就没法做了。

original: (What can I do to change the shopkeeper's mind?)
context: （用什么办法让掌柜改变心意呢？）

original: Convince with force! (Specific battle)
context: 武力说服！（特定战斗）

original: Persuade to convince. (Persuade reaches level 3 Advance)
context: 口才说服。（口才达到3级融会贯通）

original: Rely on relations with the shopkeeper. (Relations with the shopkeeper reach 60)
context: 凭借跟掌柜的关系。（与掌柜关系达到60）

original: Come back later.
context: 稍后再来。

original:
Alas, I am a person who values relationships.
For your sake, brother, I will cooperate with your Jiujiang Fotress this time.
context:
唉，谁叫我这个人看重情分呢。
看在兄弟你的面子上，我这次就跟你们九江水寨合作吧。

original: Thank you for your consideration, shopkeeper. I wish the Wine God Tower a prosperous business and abundant wealth in the future.
context: 承蒙掌柜照顾，祝太白楼今后生意兴隆财源广进。

original:
The world is bustling, all for profit; the world is bustling, all for profit. 
Cooperating with Wine God Tower is a win-win situation for Jiujiang Fotress, which will only make Wine God Tower more profitable than ever...
context:
天下熙熙，皆为利来；天下攘攘，皆为利往。 
九江水寨与太白楼合作是双赢共利的事情，只会让太白楼比以往更加名利双收……

original: Half a shichen later...
context: 半个时辰后……

original:
Well, you do have a point.
I'll take your word for it this time and cooperate with Jiujiang Fotress.
context:
好吧，你说的也有几分道理。
我就姑且信你所说，这次就先跟你们九江水寨合作吧。

original: Thank you for your consideration, shopkeeper. I wish the Wine God Tower a prosperous business and abundant wealth in the future.
context: 承蒙掌柜照顾，祝太白楼今后生意兴隆财源广进。

original: Don't you dare to refuse the toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit, there's nothing Jiujiang Fotress can't do!
context: 你可不要敬酒不吃吃罚酒，我们九江水寨要做的事情还没有办不成的！

original: Are you trying to cause trouble in Lin'an City?
context: 在这霖安城里你还想闹事不成！

original: I'd like to see what the consequences would be.
context: 我倒想试试会有什么后果。

original: I heard someone is causing trouble at Wine God Tower? Who's so bold!
context: 听说有人在太白楼闹事？谁这么大胆呐！

original: Officer, this guy claims to be from Jiujiang Fotress, he came to Wine God Tower to extort money and threatened to commit violence if he failed, he was taught a lesson by the staff in the tower.
context: 差爷，这小子说是九江水寨的人，来太白楼讹钱不成便要行凶，被楼里的伙计教训了一顿。

original: Jiujiang Fotress... How could there be such a weakling in Jiujiang Fotress, he must be an imposter, lock him up in Prison to prevent him from causing trouble.
context: 九江水寨……九江水寨里怎么会有这样不济事的软脚虾，一定是冒充的，把他关进牢房，省的出来为非作歹。

original: I heard someone is causing trouble at Wine God Tower? Who's so bold!
context: 听说有人在太白楼闹事？谁这么大胆呐！

original: Officer, this guy claims to be from Jiujiang Fotress, he came to Wine God Tower to extort money and threatened to commit violence if he failed, he crippled all the staff in my tower.
context: 差爷，这小子说是九江水寨的人，来太白楼讹钱不成便要行凶，把我楼里的伙计都打残了。

original: Are you from Jiujiang Fotress?
context: 你是九江水寨的人？

original: Yes, our leader sent me to do business with Wine God Tower.
context: 不错，我们寨主命我来跟太白楼谈笔生意。

original: Well, since it's a business matter, the government should not interfere, you should negotiate and solve it by yourselves.
context: 嗯，既然是生意往来，官府不便插手，你们自己协商解决吧。

original: Officer, don't ignore me.
context: 差爷你们别不管我啊

original: Can we continue to discuss the business now?
context: 现在咱们可以继续谈那笔生意了吗？

original: Collusion between officials and bandits, collusion between officials and bandits...
context: 官匪勾结，官匪勾结……

original: You guys from Jiujiang Fotress have eyes and ears everywhere, I admit defeat, I'll cooperate with Jiujiang Fotress this time.
context: 你们九江水寨手眼通天，我认栽，这次就跟你们九江水寨合作吧。

original: Thank you for your consideration, shopkeeper. I wish the Wine God Tower a prosperous business and abundant wealth in the future.
context: 承蒙掌柜照顾，祝太白楼今后生意兴隆财源广进。

original: Kid, hand over all the valuable things on you!
context: 小子，把你身上值钱的东西都交出来！

original: I have quite a few valuable things on me, if you have the ability, come and get them.
context: 我身上值钱东西不少，有本事就过来拿吧。

original:
I didn't expect you to have good things on you!
These Gold bullion will be your tribute, we are not interested in anything else.
context:
看不出来，你身上还真是有好东西！
这些金元宝就当你的孝敬了，别的我们不感兴趣。

original: You guys from Horse King Cave took the merchant's deposit, how am I going to explain to the leader when I go back.
context: 你们马王洞把商户的订金拿走了，我回去怎么向寨主交代啊。

original: That's your problem, it has nothing to do with us, get lost.
context: 那是你的事情，跟我们没关系，赶紧滚蛋吧。

original: (It seems I have to find a way to rob Horse King Cave and get the deposit back.)
context: （看来的想办法去马王洞抢回定金了）

original: A bunch of useless people, trying to rob like others? Humph!
context: 一群废物，也想学别人打劫？哼！

original: I have successfully persuaded the owner of Wine God Tower to cooperate with us, here is the deposit he handed over.
context: 属下不辱使命，已说服太白楼掌柜跟咱们合作，这是他交上的定金。

original: You did a clean and beautiful job, the leader will reward you heavily!
context: 这件事做的干净漂亮，本寨主重重有赏！

original: Thank you, leader!
context: 多谢寨主！

original: As long as you don't lose face for our water camp, you don't have to worry about causing trouble in Wine God Tower, the government won't interfere with our affairs.
context: 只要你不丢了咱们水寨的脸面，就不用怕在太白楼闹出乱子，官府那边不会管咱们事的。

original: Shopkeeper, I have a business proposal to discuss with you.
context: 掌柜的，有笔生意要跟你谈谈。

original: That's great, I wonder if you have a new wine recipe or a way to get more wine?
context: 那感情好，不知小哥是有新酒的配方还是进酒的门路呀？

original: Neither, I represent the Jiujiang Fotress. Please hire our Jiujiang Fotress's ships for your business in the future. This way, both you and our water camp will benefit, it's a win-win situation.
context: 两者都不是，我代表九江水寨而来，请你以后做生意都雇佣我们九江水寨的货船，这样你和我们水寨都得利，两全其美。

original: Our water camp's reputation and strength will definitely reassure you. Before that, you need to pay 10 taels of Gold bullion as a deposit, and then we can consider this deal done.
context: 我们水寨的信誉和实力绝对让你放心，在此之前需要先交10两金元宝作为定金，咱们这笔生意就算是达成了。

original: I'll bring it to you right away!
context: 小的这就给您拿去！

original: You look more pleasing to the eye than the previous owner, I don't need to say much.
context: 你这人比上一任掌柜看着顺眼，不用我多费口舌。

original: Yes, sir! Yes, sir!
context: 您说的是！您说的是！

original: Duke Kang's envoy
context: 康王使者

original: Special envoy
context: 特使

original: Go to the river to chase the special envoy.
context: 前往江面追赶特使。

original: Return to Jiujiang Fotress to report.
context: 返回九江水寨复命。

original: If you're not strong enough, don't rush to stand out, or you'll lose your life.
context: 你实力不济，就不要着急出人头地了，免得小命不保。

original: (I'll come back to the leader for a task when I reach level 40.)
context: （等我把等级升到40级再来找寨主领任务吧。）

original:
Well, with your strength, you can help the leader do some things.
There will be a distinguished guest visiting later, you stay here first.
context:
嗯，以你的实力可以帮本寨主做些事情了。
一会有贵客造访，你先留在这里吧。

original: Subordinate obeys.
context: 属下遵命。

original: Ding Fengbo pays respect to the special envoy.
context: 定风波拜见特使。

original: Hmm?
context: 嗯？

original: {PlayerName}, pay your respects to the special envoy quickly!
context: {PlayerName}，快拜见特使！

original: Jiujiang Fotress's unknown soldier {PlayerName}, pays respect to the special envoy.
context: 九江水寨无名小卒{PlayerName}，拜见特使。

original: Ding Fengbo, this little brother of yours is a bit ignorant.
context: 定风波，你这个小兄弟有点不太懂事啊。

original: I will definitely discipline him strictly, please don't worry about it, special envoy.
context: 属下一定严加管教，请特使不必放在心上。

original: (Murmuring) Using power to bully others
context: （小声嘀咕）狗仗人势

original: Hmm?
context: 嗯？

original: There are quite a few flies and mosquitoes in your Jiujiang Fotress, buzzing around and annoying me.
context: 你这九江水寨里的苍蝇蚊子可不少啊，吱吱嗡嗡惹杂家心烦。

original: Camp Leader Ding, you have repeatedly delayed the tasks assigned by His Highness Duke Kang. His Highness asked me to inquire if you have any complaints against him?
context: 定寨主，康王殿下交代的差事你这里三番五次的延误，殿下要咱家问问你，是不是对殿下有什么怨言？

original: His Highness Duke Kang saved my life, I dare not have any complaints.
context: 康王殿下对我有活命之恩，不敢有任何怨言。

original: It's just that the tasks His Highness assigns each time are not easy tasks, they take quite a bit of effort, so I had to delay them for a while.
context: 只是殿下每次交待之事都不是轻易之事，颇费一番手脚，所以不得已延误了一些时候。

original: If it were easy tasks, would we need to bother your Jiujiang Fotress?
context: 若是容易办到之事还用得着劳烦你们九江水寨吗？

original: Ding Fengbo, remember this, you are nothing more than a dog of His Highness Duke Kang. Only by obeying the master's orders can you have meat to eat. Moreover, His Highness has more than one dog, don't overestimate your importance!
context: 定风波，你给咱家记住，你不过是康王殿下的一条狗，只有服从主人的命令才有肉吃，况且殿下不止你一条狗，不要不识抬举！

original: I will keep this in mind and ensure that I won't cause any trouble for His Highness in the future.
context: 属下牢记在心，今后保证不会再让殿下烦心了。

original: Envoy, there is a banquet prepared in the kitchen to welcome you, please honor us with your presence.
context: 特使大人，后厨那边准备了一桌酒席，为您接风洗尘，请您务必赏光。

original: I'm not eating. What good food can you have here? You even smell like fish, and it can't be washed off.
context: 不吃了，你们这里能有什么好吃的？还弄得一身鱼腥味，洗都洗不掉。

original: I don't want to stay in this broken place for a moment, I will report back to His Highness now.
context: 你这破地方，咱家一刻也不想呆，这就回禀殿下了。

original: Then... I bid you farewell, Envoy.
context: 那……恭送特使大人。

original: Big brother, this Duke Kang's manor is increasingly looking down on us. Now even a eunuch dares to boss around in front of you.
context: 大哥，这康王府越来越不把咱们当人看，现在连个太监都敢在你面前指手画脚。

original: We work hard for His Highness, but the credit goes to others. If we make the slightest mistake, we will be blackmailed for bribes.
context: 咱们尽心尽力为殿下做事，结果功劳却是旁人的，这其中若是犯下一星半点错误，又会被人借机要挟，索要贿赂。

original: Big brother, it's a chaotic world now. Our water camp is well-equipped and solid as gold soup. Why should we continue to work under Duke Kang's control? It's better to break up with Duke Kang sooner and no longer be controlled by him.
context: 大哥，如今正值乱世，咱们水寨兵精粮足、固若金汤，何苦再看康王脸色做事，不如早些与康王撕破脸皮，今后不再受其节制。

original: Camp leader, I have a word of advice: a small tolerance can prevent a big plan from being ruined.
context: 寨主，吾有一言相劝：小不忍则乱大谋。

original: {PlayerName}！
context: {PlayerName}！

original: I'm here!
context: 属下在！

original: The envoy left in a hurry just now and forgot to take the silver ticket that I had prepared. Please catch up with the envoy and deliver the silver ticket.
context: 刚才特使走得匆忙，忘记带走本寨主特意准备的银票，请你务必赶上特使，把银票奉上。

original: (Taking the silver ticket)
context: （接过银票）

original: I will definitely handle this matter properly.
context: 属下一定将此事办妥。

original: The silver ticket that the camp leader gave me just now seems a bit strange...
context: 刚才寨主递给我的银票似乎有点奇怪……

original: (Taking out the silver ticket)
context: （掏出刚才的银票）

original: This is not a silver ticket, it's just a piece of waste paper. What does the camp leader mean by this?
context:
哪里是什么银票，就是一张废纸。
寨主这是什么意思呢？

original:
Two generals (40 level elites with Passive) +5 (35 level Song soldiers) behind the envoy
Facing the protagonist
context:
特使身后2名将军（40级精英 有武道）+5名（35级宋兵）
面对主角

original: If I remember correctly, you are the little guy next to Ding Fengbo. What are you doing here? Did Ding Fengbo mess up and want me to clean up after him?
context:
咱家若是记得不错，你是定风波身边那个小家伙。
你来这里做什么，定风波自己捅了娄子要咱家给他善后吗？

original: (The camp leader gave me a piece of waste paper, claiming that I was to deliver a silver ticket. What should I do?)
context: （寨主给了一张废纸，却声称让我来送银票，我该怎么办呢？）

original: Offer 10 strings of silver coins, gracious envoy. (10000Coin)
context: 奉上10贯银钱，讨好特使。（10000文）

original: Hand over the blank waste paper. (Start the fight directly)
context: 交出空白废纸。（直接开战）

original: Well, Camp Leader Ding still knows some manners, I'll accept this token of appreciation.
context: 嗯，定寨主还算是懂点事，这心意咱家收下了。

original: Little guy, I see you are not ordinary, let's form a good relationship today, it may come in handy in the future.
context: 小家伙，咱家看你绝非池中之物，今日与你结个善缘，他日或许能派上用处。

original: Thank you, Envoy.
context: 多谢特使大人。

original: What do you mean by that?
context: 你这是什么意思？

original: What do you think it means?
context: 你觉得是什么意思呢？

original: You came all the way here to give me paper money for the dead...
context: 你专程跑来，给咱家送上祭奠时用的纸钱……

original: So that's what the camp leader meant...
context: 寨主原来是这个意思……

original: Yes, this money is for your journey to the afterlife.
context: 不错，这是钱就是送你上路的买路钱。

original: You little monkey, you're courting death!
context: 猴崽子，不知死活！

original: The camp leader offered a generous amount of gold, the envoy's guards were tempted and killed the envoy, then they quarreled over the spoils...
context: 寨主奉上不菲金银，特使随行护卫见财起意，打杀特使，然后分赃不均引发内讧……

original: With such arrangements, no one would notice that it's Vulnerable.
context: 这样一番布置下来，任谁也不会看出破绽了。

original: Reporting to the leader, the silver has been delivered, and the special envoy is very satisfied.
context: 回禀寨主，银钱已送到，特使十分满意。

original:
{PlayerName} You've worked hard.
You handled this matter appropriately, truly a rare talent in Jiujiang Fotress.
context:
{PlayerName}你辛苦了。
此番处事得当，实在是九江水寨不可多得的人才。

original: I will teach you my unique skill as a reward.
context: 本寨主这便独门绝招传授给你，以兹鼓励。

original: Thank you, leader.
context: 多谢寨主。

original: The special envoy should still be Above river, not far away, you must personally deliver the silver ticket to him.
context: 特使应该还在江上，还未走远，务必要把银票亲自交给特使。

original: Hongmen Banquet
context: 鸿门宴

original: Attend the banquet
context: 赴宴

original: Go to Lin'an CityDuke Kang's manor to meet Duke Kang.
context: 前往霖安城康王府拜见康王。

original: Return to Jiujiang Fotress to report.
context: 返回九江水寨复命。

original: I'm not very confident about entrusting this task to you, let's think it over.
context: 这件事交你去做，本寨主不太放心，还是从长计议吧。

original: (It seems that the leader still has doubts about my strength, I'll come back when my Level reaches 50.)
context: （看来寨主对我的实力还有所顾虑，等我把等级升到50级再来找寨主吧）

original: Duke Kang invites me to a banquet in Lin'an City, there's no good wine or banquet, I wonder what he's up to.
context: 康王邀请本寨主前去霖安城赴宴，这酒无好酒，宴无好宴，不知这位殿下在打什么主意。

original:
Ignore whatever damn banquet it is, we just don't care.
This is a real Hongmen Banquet, just waiting for the big brother to walk in.
context:
管它什么狗屁宴席，咱们一概不理就是了。
这是名副其实的鸿门宴，就等大哥送上门呢。

original: If the leader goes to the banquet, it shows that he has a clear conscience. If Duke Kang is against the leader, he will lose the people's heart. Who will work for him in the future!
context: 寨主若前往赴宴，方显心中无愧，康王若对寨主不利则会失去人心，今后谁还肯为他卖命！

original: {PlayerSurName} Brother, I want you to represent me at the banquet. Firstly, we Jiujiang Fotress have done the courtesy, secondly, Duke Kang will not embarrass you for fear of hurting the mouse, you can take the opportunity to probe the reality.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，本寨主的意思，由你代表本寨主前往赴宴，一来咱们九江水寨尽了礼数，二来康王投鼠忌器不会为难你，你可借机探听虚实。

original: Yes, sir!
context: 遵命！

original: I thought the leader of Jiujiang Fotress would not dare to come in person, but I didn't expect you to be sent. This really poses a big problem for me.
context: 本王料想九江水寨寨主不敢亲至，没曾想竟然把你派来了，这还真是给本王出个大难题。

original: {PlayerName}, Ding Fengbo has repeatedly defied my will. He thinks he has enough troops and food to compete with me, so he wants to break away from my control.
context: {PlayerName}，定风波几次三番违逆本王的意志，他是估量自己如今兵精粮足以与本王分庭抗礼，因此想要脱离本王的掌控。

original:
You are the one I value, I will not embarrass you today.
However, I advise you to leave Jiujiang Fotress as soon as possible to avoid being implicated in the future.
context:
你是本王看重之人，今日本王断然不会为难你。
不过，本王奉劝你尽早脱离九江水寨，免得将来殃及池鱼。

original: Since you are not the one I want to deal with, this Hongmen Banquet has nothing to do with you. You tell Ding Fengbo to take care of himself.
context: 既然你不是本王要对付的人，这鸿门宴就与你无关了，你回复定风波，叫他好自为之吧。

original: I sincerely invited, but the leader of Jiujiang Fotress refused to come, what a big scene.
context: 本王诚心相邀，九江水寨寨主不肯赏光，这真是好大的排场。

original: The leader is not feeling well, I am here to represent the leader at the banquet, please forgive me, Duke Kang.
context: 寨主身体不适，我来代表寨主赴宴，请康王殿下多多海涵。

original: {PlayerName}, you are not qualified in front of me.
context: {PlayerName}，你在本王面前还不够格。

original: It's too early for Duke Kang to say that.
context: 康王殿下言之过早。

original: Humph, so confident, then I'll give you an appetizer first, see if you can eat it!
context: 哼，如此自信，那就先赐你一道开胃菜，看你吃不吃得下！

original: Guards!
context: 来人！

original: This man is just a lowly servant in the mansion, let him play with you.
context: 这人不过是府上一名不入流的家丁小厮，让他陪你玩玩吧。

original: Since you lost the martial arts competition, you know the rules of Duke Kang's manor.
context: 既然比武输了，康王府的规矩你是知道的。

original: Yes!
context: 是！

original: {PlayerName}, you have aroused my curiosity, I want to know how capable you are.
context: {PlayerName}，你引起了本王好奇，本王想知道你有多大本事。

original: Please continue the banquet, your highness.
context: 请殿下继续赐宴。

original: (Clapping hands)
context: （拍了拍手）

original: Please teach me.
context: 请赐教。

original: Considering your past merits, I'll punish you to be a small soldier on the frontier.
context: 念你曾经功劳，罚你去边关当一名小卒吧。

original: Thank you for your magnanimity, your majesty.
context: 多谢陛下宽洪海量。

original: It seems that if this Hongmen Banquet doesn't serve some hard dishes, I'm afraid it will be laughed at by you Jiujiang Fotress.
context: 看来这鸿门宴若不上些硬菜，怕是要被你们九江水寨耻笑了。

original: Trained army uses soldiers for a while
context: 养兵千日用兵一时

original: Sir, you can make a move now
context: 先生可以出手了

original: I pay my respects to your highness.
context: 小人拜见殿下。

original: You've been lurking in my mansion for many years, today it's time for you to show me something.
context: 你在本府蛰伏多年，今天也该让本王开开眼界了。

original: Thanks to your highness's kindness for many years, today is the day to repay you.
context: 承蒙殿下恩惠多年，今日正可报恩。

original: {PlayerName}, this dish was originally prepared for Ding Fengbo. Now that he is not fortunate enough to enjoy it, you can enjoy it on his behalf.
context: {PlayerName}，这道菜品原本是为定风波预备的，如今他无福消受，你就替他享用吧。

original: Sir, you are old, it's better to return to your hometown and enjoy your old age.
context: 先生年事已高，还是回乡养老吧。

original: I feel ashamed in front of your highness!
context: 小人愧对殿下！

original: Why are you doing this?
context: 你这又是何必呢？

original: I have betrayed your highness's trust, only death can repay your kindness.
context: 小人辜负殿下信赖，唯有一死，才能偿还殿下知遇之恩。

original: {PlayerName}, I take back my previous contempt for you, I can have a frank discussion with you.
context: {PlayerName}，本王收回之前对你的轻视，本王可以开诚布公跟你谈上一谈。

original: Ding Fengbo has repeatedly defied my will, he probably thinks that his troops and supplies are sufficient to compete with me, so he wants to break away from my control.
context: 定风波几次三番违逆本王的意志，他是估量自己如今兵精粮足以与本王分庭抗礼，因此想要脱离本王的掌控。

original: I value your abilities, I will not make things difficult for you today. However, I advise you to leave Jiujiang Fotress as soon as possible to avoid getting involved in the future.
context:
本王看重你的本事，今日本王不再为难于你。
不过，本王奉劝你尽早脱离九江水寨，免得将来殃及池鱼。

original: Today's feast is over, you go back and tell Ding Fengbo to take care of himself.
context: 今天这鸿门宴已经结束了，你回复定风波，叫他好自为之。

original: Subordinate has successfully completed the task and is here to report.
context: 属下幸不辱命，特来复命。

original: You tell Ding Fengbo about your experience at Duke Kang's manor without missing a word...
context: 你把在康王府的遭遇一字不差告知定风波……

original: Take care of yourself... take care of yourself
context: 好自为之……好自为之

original: Duke Kang told me to take care of myself, it seems he is planning to take action against the water camp.
context: 康王叫我好自为之，看来他是准备要对水寨动手了。

original: Since we have fallen out with Duke Kang's manor, we may face retaliation from Duke Kang's manor at any time. The top priority is to enhance our strength to deal with future uncertainties.
context: 既然和康王府撕破脸皮，接下来随时会面临康王府的打击报复，当务之急提升实力才能应对将来不测之险。

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, you are the most trusted person in the camp and have made great contributions. Today, I will pass on this peerless knife technique to you, hoping that you can save the water camp from crisis in the future with this technique.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，你是本寨主最为信赖之人，屡次立下功劳，今日把这本绝世刀法传授给你，希望将来你能凭此刀法挽救水寨于危机之中。

original: Subordinate only looks up to the camp leader!
context: 属下唯寨主马首是瞻！

original: There is no good wine, no good feast, you have to be careful.
context: 酒无好酒，宴无好宴，你可要当心啊。

original: Crisis of the Water Camp
context: 水寨的危机

original: Go to Jiujiang Fotress to report.
context: 前往九江水寨报讯。

original: By the order of Duke Kang, seal off Wuyue ferry, no boats are allowed to go down the water!
context: 奉康王令，封锁吴越渡口，寸板不得下水！

original: (Duke Kang is really taking action against Jiujiang Fotress, the camp leader is still unaware, should I break through the blockade and rush to report?)
context: （康王果然对九江水寨动手了，寨主还不知情，我是否要突破封锁赶去报讯呢？）

original: Force through! (Start the battle directly)
context: 硬闯！（直接开战）

original: Think long-term.
context: 从长计议。

original: I'm just passing by...
context: 我只是路过……

original: Then run away quickly!
context: 那就速速离开！

original: Humph, you overestimate yourself!
context: 哼，鼠辈不自量力！

original: Where is the ferryman of this ferry?
context: 原来这渡口的艄公呢？

original: He, he was taken by us.
context: 被，被我们押起来了。

original: Let him go!
context: 把他放了！

original: Defying Duke Kang's order, you can't escape death.
context: 违逆康王的命令，死罪难逃啊。

original: Release the ferryman, and I will spare your life. You can still leave Duke Kang's manor and live in hiding; otherwise, when this matter gets out, do you think Duke Kang will spare you?
context: 把艄公释放，我就饶你一条活路。你现在脱离康王府隐姓埋名还来得及；否则这里事情传出去，你觉得康王能饶得了你吗？

original: Okay, okay, I'll go and release him now.
context: 好，好，我这就去放人。

original: Thank you for your rescue.
context: 多谢少侠相救之恩。

original: It's my duty, no need for formalities.
context: 份内之事，不必多礼。

original: Young hero, can I, can I leave now?
context: 少侠，我，我现在可以走了吧？

original: Go, the further the better.
context: 走吧，越远越好。

original: {yell} Zhuge Shenji, I have treated you well, why do you want to poison me!
context: {yell}诸葛神机，本寨主待你不薄，为何要下毒害我！

original: A wise man submits to circumstances, the conditions offered by Duke Kang left me no reason to refuse.
context: 识时务者为俊杰，康王殿下开出的条件让我没有拒绝的理由。

original: Big brother was blind to save you, a thankless wretch!
context: 大哥瞎了眼，当年竟然救下你这只白眼狼！

original: Ding Fengbo, give up resistance. Duke Kang's army is coming, Jiujiang Fotress has no other way but to surrender completely.
context: 定风波，放弃抵抗吧，康王殿下大军将至，九江水寨只有彻底归顺投降，别无二路。

original: Big brother, don't believe his nonsense!
context: 大哥，不能信他的鬼话！

original: Do you want me to surrender and let you slaughter me?
context: 让本寨主束手就擒，然后任由宰割吗？

original: Your life in exchange for the lives of thousands of people in Jiujiang Fotress, this is a very worthwhile deal.
context: 以你一人之命，换九江水寨数千人活命，这笔买卖十分划算。

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, a good bird chooses a tree to nest in, what is your choice now?
context: {PlayerSurName}兄，良禽择木而栖，如今你作何选择？

original: Coexist or perish with Jiujiang Fotress!
context: 与九江水寨共存亡！

original: Leave Jiujiang Fotress.
context: 脱离九江水寨。

original: No matter how well the leader treats me, he is not my parents. At this moment, survival is the most important.
context: 寨主待我再好，也不是我亲娘老子，此时此刻还是活命要紧。

original: Fine, I was blind. I, Ding Fengbo, am a so-called hero, but I have raised two ungrateful wolves!
context: 好，算我瞎了眼，我定风波枉称一世英雄，竟然养了两只白眼狼！

original: {PlayerSurName}, you betrayed your big brother, you betrayed Jiujiang Fotress, you will not die a good death!
context: 姓{PlayerSurName}的，你背叛大哥，背叛九江水寨，你不得好死！

original: Just the two of you, trying to force the leader of this camp to submit, it's simply wishful thinking.
context: 就凭你们两个，也想逼迫本寨主就范，简直异想天开。

original: It seems you have underestimated Prince Duke Kang.
context: 看来你是低估了康王殿下。

original: Prince Duke Kang {yell} has ordered, the bandit leader Ding Fengbo should be killed on the spot, and the rest will be forgiven.
context: {yell}康王殿下有令，匪首定风波当场格杀，余者既往不咎。

original: Kill Ding Fengbo!|Kill, kill!|Leader, we can only live if you die.
context: 杀死定风波！|杀，杀！|寨主，你死了我们才能活

original:
Originally a dominant force on the water with strong soldiers and abundant provisions, it turned into a nightmare due to internal strife in the Righteous Hall.
A generation of heroes, despite their unwillingness, could not reverse this carefully set up situation.
When a person dies, it's like a lamp going out, and the grand plan of domination comes to a halt...
context:
本是兵精粮足、固若金汤的水上霸主，
怎料祸起萧墙，聚义厅内绝义断情，化作修罗场。
一代枭雄，纵有不甘，也无力扭转这被人精心设置的局面。
人死，如灯灭，霸业宏图就此止步……

original: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Jiujiang Fotress, annihilated!</color></size>
context: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>九江水寨，覆灭！</color></size>

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, you made the right choice, fortunately we did not have to meet with swords.
context: {PlayerSurName}兄，你做出了正确的选择，万幸你我不用刀兵相见。

original: This manual was used by Ding Fengbo to win people's hearts. Today I present it to {PlayerSurName} brother as a gift, which is also the intention of Prince Duke Kang.
context: 这本秘籍是定风波用来收买人心的，今天我借花献佛赠予{PlayerSurName}兄，这也是康王殿下的意思。

original: Prince Duke Kang has entrusted me with the management of Jiujiang Fotress, and from now on, {PlayerSurName} brother will be a distinguished guest of Jiujiang Fotress.
context: 康王殿下已把这九江水寨交由我来打理，今后{PlayerSurName}兄便是九江水寨的贵客。

original: After this battle, Jiujiang Fotress has suffered heavy losses. How many people can stay? What's the point of you sitting in this position?
context: 经此一战，九江水寨伤筋动骨，还有多少人能够留下，你坐这个位置还有什么意思？

original: Although Jiujiang Fotress has been hurt, under my management, it will not take long to become even more powerful than when it was under Ding Fengbo.
context: 九江水寨虽伤了元气，但是在我的手段下，用不了多久只会比在定风波手上更加威武雄壮。

original: Maybe you will be the next Ding Fengbo, the lesson is right in front of you.
context: 说不定你就是下一个定风波，前车之鉴就在眼前。

original: Duke Kang's extermination plan is really ruthless, a simple internal strife easily wiped out the dominant Jiujiang Fotress on the water, it seems I need to be careful of this guy.
context: 康王的绝户计真够狠毒，一场内讧就把水上称霸的九江水寨轻易铲除，看来我得小心提防这个家伙。

original: I'm willing to do anything, but I don't want to be a traitor, so...
context: 我这个人什么都愿意做，就是不想做二五仔，所以……

original: Opposing Prince Duke Kang, you are seeking your own death!
context: 跟康王殿下作对，你们是自寻死路！

original: {PlayerSurName}, you are really loyal!
context: 姓{PlayerSurName}的，够意思！

original: Zhuge Shenji, the bird that sticks its head out gets shot. Now you are alone, aren't you afraid that the leader of this camp will use you to make an example?
context: 诸葛神机，枪打出头鸟，你现在孤身一人，不怕被本寨主用来祭旗吗？

original: It seems you have underestimated Prince Duke Kang.
context: 看来你是低估了康王殿下。

original: Prince Duke Kang {yell} has ordered, the bandit leader Ding Fengbo should be killed on the spot, and the rest will be forgiven.
context: {yell}康王殿下有令，匪首定风波当场格杀，余者既往不咎。

original: Kill Ding Fengbo!|Kill, kill!|Leader, we can only live if you die.
context: 杀死定风波！|杀，杀！|寨主，你死了我们才能活

original: Hmph, a bunch of rabble.
context: 哼，一群乌合之众。

original: I didn't expect Duke Kang had already infiltrated Jiujiang Fotress. If it weren't for {PlayerSurName} brother's timely return, I'm afraid I would have been collecting my body.
context: 想不到康王早已渗透了九江水寨，若非{PlayerSurName}兄弟及时赶回，怕是要给我收尸了。

original: I've always felt that Zhuge Shenji was sneaky and not a good thing, but the big brother thought that talented people always have some quirks...
context: 我早就觉得那诸葛神机一天到晚鬼鬼祟祟，不是个好东西，可是大哥认为有本事的人总会有些怪癖……

original: I really misjudged this time, I have been cultivating him with all my heart, this time it can be considered as removing a cancer for Jiujiang Fotress.
context: 这次真是我看走眼了，枉为我一直尽心竭力对他栽培，这次也算是为了九江水寨拔出毒瘤了。

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, this time you saved the water camp from danger, I really don't have anything worthy to reward you for your contribution...
context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，这次你挽救水寨于危难之中，本寨主实在是没什么能拿出手的东西奖励你此次的功劳……

original: What do you think of my sister, Haitang?
context: 要不你觉得舍妹海棠如何？

original: {yell}, what nonsense are you talking about? Are you trying to use your sister as a gift?
context: {yell}大哥，你在说什么胡话！拿你妹子送人情吗？

original: I almost forgot, this Manual is the internal martial arts method that I relied on to establish myself in the martial arts world. I will give it to you today.
context: 差点忘记，这本秘籍是我当年赖以在江湖立足的内功心法，今日就把它赠送给你。

original: Used in conjunction with the Devouring Blade I taught you before, it will have unexpected effects!
context: 与之前传授你的吞鲸刀法搭配使用，会有意想不到的奇效！

original: Brother, hold on, don't run away, Haitang...
context: 大哥你撑住，你不要离开海棠啊——

original: Miss Haitang, the dead cannot be resurrected, please mourn.
context: 海棠姑娘，人死不能复生，请节哀。

original: {PlayerName}, my brother won't die, right?
context: {PlayerName}，我大哥不会死的你说对不对！

original: I hope so too, but unfortunately, this is not something that can be reversed by human power.
context: 我也希望如此，可惜这并非人力所能扭转。

original: Jiujiang Fotress is now severely injured. Miss Haitang needs to cheer up and clean up the mess as soon as possible, otherwise the camp leader's life's hard work will be wasted.
context: 九江水寨如今元气大伤，海棠姑娘要尽快振作起来收拾残局，否则寨主的一生心血就要付之东流了。

original: This, this situation, I'm afraid I can't handle it.
context: 这，这样的局面，我怕是应付不来。

original: I'm here, I'll help you, I won't let Jiujiang Fotress fall.
context: 还有我，有我帮你，不会让九江水寨就此一蹶不振的。

original: You must remember your promise to me today.
context: 一言为定，你不要忘记对我今天的承诺。

original: Meet Ding Haitang, the camp leader.
context: 拜见定海棠，定寨主。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, I will always remember that you are the benefactor of Jiujiang Fotress and my benefactor, Ding Haitang.
context: {PlayerGivenName}，我永远记住，你是九江水寨的恩人，也是我定海棠的恩人。

original: Duke Kang's extermination plan is really ruthless, a simple internal strife easily wiped out the dominant Jiujiang Fotress on the water, it seems I need to be careful of this guy.
context: 康王的绝户计真够狠毒，一场内讧就把水上称霸的九江水寨轻易铲除，看来我得小心提防这个家伙。

original: Now that Jiujiang Fotress is in name only, it doesn't make sense for me to stay any longer. I'll leave the camp.
context: 现在九江水寨已经名存实亡，我再呆下去也没什么意思了，就此脱离水寨吧。

original: {yell}, I've treated you well, why did you poison me!
context: {yell}本寨主平日待你们不薄，为何要下毒害我！

original: A wise man submits to circumstances, the conditions offered by Duke Kang left me no reason to refuse.
context: 识时务者为俊杰，康王殿下开出的条件让我没有拒绝的理由。

original: I didn't expect there to be a white-eyed wolf like you in the camp!
context: 想不到水寨里还有你这只白眼狼！

original: Ding Fengbo, give up resistance. Duke Kang's army is coming, Jiujiang Fotress has no other way but to surrender completely.
context: 定风波，放弃抵抗吧，康王殿下大军将至，九江水寨只有彻底归顺投降，别无二路。

original: Big brother, don't believe his nonsense!
context: 大哥，不能信他的鬼话！

original: Do you want me to surrender and let you slaughter me?
context: 让本寨主束手就擒，然后任由宰割吗？

original: Your life in exchange for the lives of thousands of people in Jiujiang Fotress, this is a very worthwhile deal.
context: 以你一人之命，换九江水寨数千人活命，这笔买卖十分划算。

original: Brother, good birds choose trees to nest. Following Lord Duke Kang, wealth and glory are just around the corner. Why be a thief in the camp?
context: 这位兄弟，良禽择木而栖，跟随康王殿下富贵荣华指日可待，何苦在水寨中当贼呢。

original: I'm willing to do anything, but I don't want to be a traitor, so...
context: 我这个人什么都愿意做，就是不想做二五仔，所以……

original: Opposing Prince Duke Kang, you are seeking your own death!
context: 跟康王殿下作对，你们是自寻死路！

original: {PlayerSurName}, you are really loyal!
context: 姓{PlayerSurName}的，够意思！

original: The bird that sticks out gets shot. You're alone now, aren't you afraid of being used by the camp leader to make an example?
context: 枪打出头鸟，你现在孤身一人，不怕被本寨主用来祭旗吗？

original: It seems you have underestimated Prince Duke Kang.
context: 看来你是低估了康王殿下。

original: Prince Duke Kang {yell} has ordered, the bandit leader Ding Fengbo should be killed on the spot, and the rest will be forgiven.
context: {yell}康王殿下有令，匪首定风波当场格杀，余者既往不咎。

original: Kill Ding Fengbo!|Kill, kill!|Leader, we can only live if you die.
context: 杀死定风波！|杀，杀！|寨主，你死了我们才能活

original: Hmph, a bunch of rabble.
context: 哼，一群乌合之众。

original: I didn't expect Duke Kang had already infiltrated Jiujiang Fotress. If it weren't for {PlayerSurName} brother's timely return, I'm afraid I would have been collecting my body.
context: 想不到康王早已渗透了九江水寨，若非{PlayerSurName}兄弟及时赶回，怕是要给我收尸了。

original: I've been advising my brother not to accept everyone. There are all kinds of people here, and there might be spies from other forces.
context: 我早就劝大哥不要什么人都收留，这里面鱼龙混杂，说不定就有别方势力安插的眼线。

original: Alas, it seems that I was a bit too hasty.
context: 唉，如今看来，确实有些操之过急了。

original: {PlayerSurName} brother, this time you saved the water camp from danger, I really don't have anything worthy to reward you for your contribution...
context: {PlayerSurName}兄弟，这次你挽救水寨于危难之中，本寨主实在是没什么能拿出手的东西奖励你此次的功劳……

original: What do you think of my sister, Haitang?
context: 要不你觉得舍妹海棠如何？

original: {yell}, what nonsense are you talking about? Are you trying to use your sister as a gift?
context: {yell}大哥，你在说什么胡话！拿你妹子送人情吗？

original: I almost forgot, this Manual is the internal martial arts method that I relied on to establish myself in the martial arts world. I will give it to you today.
context: 差点忘记，这本秘籍是我当年赖以在江湖立足的内功心法，今日就把它赠送给你。

original: Used in conjunction with the Devouring Blade I taught you before, it will have unexpected effects!
context: 与之前传授你的吞鲸刀法搭配使用，会有意想不到的奇效！

original: Brother, hold on, don't run away, Haitang...
context: 大哥你撑住，你不要离开海棠啊——

original: Miss Haitang, the dead cannot be resurrected, please mourn.
context: 海棠姑娘，人死不能复生，请节哀。

original: {PlayerName}, my brother won't die, right?
context: {PlayerName}，我大哥不会死的你说对不对！

original: I hope so too, but unfortunately, this is not something that can be reversed by human power.
context: 我也希望如此，可惜这并非人力所能扭转。

original: Jiujiang Fotress is now severely injured. Miss Haitang needs to cheer up and clean up the mess as soon as possible, otherwise the camp leader's life's hard work will be wasted.
context: 九江水寨如今元气大伤，海棠姑娘要尽快振作起来收拾残局，否则寨主的一生心血就要付之东流了。

original: This, this situation, I'm afraid I can't handle it.
context: 这，这样的局面，我怕是应付不来。

original: I'm here, I'll help you, I won't let Jiujiang Fotress fall.
context: 还有我，有我帮你，不会让九江水寨就此一蹶不振的。

original: You must remember your promise to me today.
context: 一言为定，你不要忘记对我今天的承诺。

original: Meet Ding Haitang, the camp leader.
context: 拜见定海棠，定寨主。

original: {PlayerGivenName}, I will always remember that you are the benefactor of Jiujiang Fotress and my benefactor, Ding Haitang.
context: {PlayerGivenName}，我永远记住，你是九江水寨的恩人，也是我定海棠的恩人。

original: Duke Kang's extermination plan is really ruthless, a simple internal strife easily wiped out the dominant Jiujiang Fotress on the water, it seems I need to be careful of this guy.
context: 康王的绝户计真够狠毒，一场内讧就把水上称霸的九江水寨轻易铲除，看来我得小心提防这个家伙。

original: Now that Jiujiang Fotress is in name only, it doesn't make sense for me to stay any longer. I'll leave the camp.
context: 现在九江水寨已经名存实亡，我再呆下去也没什么意思了，就此脱离水寨吧。

original: Please wait!
context: 阁下请留步！

original: I have been practicing martial arts since I was a child, and now I have achieved a little. I want to compete with you!
context: 在下自幼习武，如今略有小成，想跟阁下比武较量一番！

original: I'm not interested in competing with you. No matter who gets hurt, it's not good.
context: 我可没兴趣跟你比武，无论谁被伤到，都没有好处。

original: It seems that you still don't know about the <color=#c44b0e>competition</color>.
context: 看来阁下对<color=#c44b0e>比武</color>一事还有所不知。

original: <color=#c44b0e>Defeating the opponent for the first time, you will gain corresponding Fame and a lot of EXP based on the opponent's identity</color>. This is a shortcut to stand out in the martial arts world.
context: <color=#c44b0e>首次击败对方，会根据对方身份获得相应名声，以及大量实战经验</color>。在江湖上想要出人头地，这可算是一条捷径。

original: Correspondingly, the higher the Fame, the more trouble will come. For example, more powerful characters will come to compete. If you can't satisfy them, they will follow you like annoying flies.
context: 相应的，名声越高，麻烦也就会随之而来。比如会有更加厉害的人物慕名前来比武，如果不能满足他们，就跟甩不掉的苍蝇一样尾随纠缠。

original:
It seems that you won't give up unless I accept your challenge today.
In that case...
context:
看来今天不接受你的比武请求，你是不肯善罢甘休了。
既然如此……

original: Accept the challenge!
context: 答应比武！

original: Refuse the challenge.
context: 拒绝比武。

original: Hmph, <color=#c44b0e>tomorrow</color> I will come to find you again, don't think I will be easily dismissed.
context: 哼，<color=#c44b0e>明天</color>我再来找你，别以为我会这么容易被打发走。

original: How about your consideration today? If you still refuse to compete, I will harass you every day!
context: 今天考虑的如何了，你若仍然拒绝比武，我会每天都来骚扰你！

original: Today's battle will be the battle that will make me famous in this life!
context: 今日一战将会是我此生成名之战！

original: Are you satisfied now? You won't bother me anymore, will you?
context: 这下你满意了，不会再纠缠我了吧。

original: I won't waste my time on a weakling like you. My goal is to challenge all the famous masters in the world. You are just a stepping stone for me.
context: 我才不会在你这个弱鸡身上浪费时间，我的目标是挑战天下所有成名高手，你只不过是我的踏脚石而已。

original: Damn it...
context: 可恶……

original: Are you satisfied now? You won't bother me anymore, will you?
context: 这下你满意了，不会再纠缠我了吧。

original: My goal is to challenge all the famous masters in the world, but I didn't expect that I can't even defeat a weakling like you...
context: 我的目标是挑战天下所有成名高手，想不到竟然连弱鸡一般的你都无法战胜……

original: When you deny yourself, can you not belittle others?
context: 你否定自己的时候，能不能不要贬低别人。

original: Do I have to keep lowering my standards for the challenges I take on? Damn it...
context: 难道我要挑战的目标还要继续刷新下限吗，可恶啊……

original: Mr. Shi, how dare you sell me defective goods! Believe it or not, I'll smash your Glittering Artifact Auction!
context: 姓石的，你竟敢卖给老子残品，信不信砸了你这珠光宝气楼！

original: I guarantee with my reputation that there is not a single defective item in the Glittering Artifact Auction. Please don't make false accusations.
context: 鄙人以信誉保证，珠光宝气楼没有一件残品，请各位客人切莫乱说话。

original: Then you should check on the spot whether this is a defective product!
context: 那么你就当场验一验这是不是残品！

original: (Takes the handed over item)
context: （接过递来的东西）

original: This thing of yours is shattered, it's absolutely defective. But how can you prove that it was bought from our store?
context: 您这东西碎成这样，简直残得不能再残；但是如何证明是从本楼买走的呢？

original: I bought it from you, and you want to deny it!
context: 老子就是从你这买走的，你还想抵赖！

original: Alright, then tell me, how much did you pay for it initially?
context: 好，那您就说说看，当初是花了多少钱买走的？

original: This, this... Anyway, it was very expensive. Why are you asking so many questions?
context: 这个，这个……总之很贵就是了，你哪来这么多废话。
