original: Even if I were to compensate you, I would need to know the original price.
context: 就算赔偿各位，也得知道原先的价码呀。

original: That's true... It seems like it was 1 guan? 5 guan, oh no, it seems like it was 10 guan...
context: 这倒是……好像是1贯？5贯，哦不，好像是10贯……

original: If you're trying to extort money, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Do you not know what my Glittering Artifact Auction does?
context: 各位讹钱怕是来错了地方，鄙人这珠光宝气楼你们不知道是做什么的吗？

original: I don't care what you do, today you either pay money, or mortgage your <color=#c44b0e>extra courtyard</color> to me, otherwise we will stay here and not leave!
context: 老子管你是做什么的，今天要么赔钱，要么把你手里<color=#c44b0e>多余的庭院</color>抵给老子，否则我们就赖在这里不走了！

original: It seems like I've encountered a situation of extortion...
context: 看来是遇到讹钱闹事的情况了……

original: Help the shopkeeper out. (Specific battle)
context: 帮掌柜解围。（特定战斗）

original: Don't meddle in other's business.
context: 闲事莫管。

original: It seems you prefer punishment over a friendly toast. Let's show him what we're capable of, brothers!
context: 看来你是敬酒不吃吃罚酒，兄弟们给他点厉害看看！

original: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
context: 无知者无畏啊

original: Is this the legendary Decisive Throw, the ultimate skill of throwing money at people!
context: 这就是传说中的乾坤一掷，用钱砸人的绝技吗！

original: Which distinguished guest has arrived at the door?
context: 门口不知是哪位贵客驾到？

original: I am {PlayerName}, invited by the owner of the Glittering Artifact Auction.
context: 在下{PlayerName}，应珠光宝气楼楼主邀请前来。

original: So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, I am the owner, Shi Wansan.
context: 原来是{PlayerSurName}少侠，鄙人正是楼主石万三。

original: You guys really prefer punishment over a friendly toast.
context: 你们几个还真是敬酒不吃吃罚酒啊。

original: Who do you think you are, trying to meddle in our affairs?
context: 你算什么东西，想多管闲事吗？

original: I am an invited guest. You guys ruined my mood. This is not meddling, right?
context: 我可是受邀前来的客人，你们几个败坏我的兴致，这不算管闲事吧。

original: Today, you'll learn the consequences of meddling!
context: 今天让你知道管闲事的下场！

original: Please spare us, we won't dare to do it again.
context: 好汉高抬贵手吧，我们再也不敢了。

original: Get lost, don't embarrass yourself here.
context: 快滚吧，别在这丢人现眼了。

original: I wonder which distinguished guest has arrived, I failed to welcome you from afar, please forgive me?
context: 不知是哪位贵客驾到，鄙人有失远迎还望恕罪？

original: I am {PlayerName}, invited by the owner of the Glittering Artifact Auction.
context: 在下{PlayerName}，应珠光宝气楼楼主邀请前来。

original: So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, I am the owner, Shi Wansan.
context: 原来是{PlayerSurName}少侠，鄙人正是楼主石万三。

original: Thank you, Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, for your righteous action. I had an important event to hold here today. If those guys had ruined it, the reputation of my Glittering Artifact Auction would have been tarnished.
context: 多谢{PlayerSurName}少侠仗义出手解围，今天本来有场重要的活动要在此处举办，若是被那些家伙砸了场子，我这珠光宝气楼的脸面可就丢光了。

original: It's a small effort, you don't have to be so polite.
context: 举手之劳，楼主不必客气。

original: The matter of the young hero is a trivial matter, but for me, reputation is a big deal. I have a vacant courtyard outside Daliang City. If the young hero doesn't mind, please accept it as a token of my gratitude.
context: 于少侠是微不足道的小事，对鄙人而言名誉可是天大的事情。鄙人在大梁城外有一处闲置的庭院，少侠若不嫌弃还请收下，聊表鄙人谢意。

original: A courtyard? That's too generous, I can't accept it.
context: 庭，庭院？太贵重了，受之有愧啊。

original: Actually, this courtyard is not mine, but I'm looking for a worthy person on behalf of my deceased friend.
context: 其实这座庭院并非鄙人所有，而是鄙人代逝去的老友寻找值得托付之人。

original: My friend specifically instructed that only a person of good character and martial arts skills is qualified to be the new owner of this courtyard. So it's your destiny, and it also fulfills my friend's wish.
context: 老友特别交待，只有人品、武功不俗之人，才有资格成为这院子的新主人，所以说这是你的缘分，也全了我那老友的心愿。

original: In that case, thank you, Mr. Shi, and your friend.
context: 既然如此，那就谢过楼主，还有楼主的朋友了。

original: You have not received an invitation from the host, it's not appropriate to stay here for long, please leave quickly!
context: 阁下并未接到楼主邀请，此处不便久留，请速速离去！

original: Have you thought it over? If you can't make up your mind, we will continue to drag on, anyway, I have plenty of time!
context: 考虑清楚了没有，你若还拿不定主意，我们就继续耗下去，反正老子有的是时间！

original: These people are really patient, they are still sticking around...
context: 这群人真有耐性，竟然还赖着不走……

original: You dare to compete with me, you'll all end up dead!
context: 你们敢跟我抢，下场都得死！

original: Happiness shared is happiness doubled.
context: 独乐乐不如众乐乐

original: The secret of Wuxian Mountain has been leaked.
context: 巫咸山的秘密竟然泄露了

original: None of you are willing to back down, let's see who's the real deal.
context: 都不肯退让，手下见真章吧。

original: Kill, kill, let them all die.
context: 杀吧，杀吧，都死绝了才好

original: There seems to be a fierce competition for some treasure ahead...
context: 前方剑拔弩张，好像是在争抢什么宝贝……

original: Strike first and gain the upper hand! (Fight immediately)
context: 先下手为强！（立即战斗）

original: Approach and ask for the reason.
context: 上前询问缘由。

original: Fall back, return the way you came.
context: 退避三舍，原路返回。

original: What are you guys fighting over? We meet by fate, how about sharing a piece with me!
context: 你们在争抢什么好东西？相逢便是有缘，分我一份如何！

original: A greenhorn like you also wants a piece of the action, what a daydream!
context: 乳臭未干的小家伙也想要分一杯羹，真是痴心妄想！

original:
This kid is not small talk, he must be powerful.
Let's join forces to get rid of him first, so he won't take advantage of us!
context:
这小子口气不小，想必实力不俗。
大家先联手把他除去，免得被他渔翁得利！

original: The treasure is not on these people, I should have left one alive.
context: 宝贝没在这些人身上，早知道就该留下一个活口。

original: Gentlemen, what are you fighting over here?
context: 各位好汉，你们因为何事在此大动干戈？

original: This is none of your business, get lost!
context: 这没你的事，赶紧滚！

original: I beg to differ, the treasure has not been found yet, one more person means one more chance.
context: 此言差矣，现在宝贝尚未寻到，多一个人便多一份把握。

original: Do you think you can search the entire Wuxian Mountain by yourself?
context: 凭你一人之力难道还能翻遍这巫咸山不成？

original: I might as well tell you, there is a rumor in the martial arts world that there is a fairyland in Wuxian Mountain. Someone once cultivated a unique skill in the fairyland and dominated the world at a young age.
context: 不妨告诉你，江湖传言这巫咸山中有一处仙境，之前曾有人在仙境中修成绝世神通，弱冠之年便纵横天下、罕逢敌手。

original: Wuxian Mountain is covered by clouds all year round, blocking the view, and the mountain road is very steep and dangerous. Only these few days of the year will the clouds dissipate. We all came here to find that fairyland and practice that legendary skill.
context: 这巫咸山常年云气笼罩遮挡视野，山路又十分陡峭凶险，一年当中唯有这几日才会云气消散。我们不约而至，为的就是寻到那处仙境，也练一练那传说中的神通。

original: Did you leak the information about Wuxian Mountain?
context: 这巫咸山的事情该不会就是你小子泄露的吧？

original: It's better to help the world than to be selfish, I won't keep the good stuff to myself, the more people share, the better.
context: 独善其身不如兼济天下，我可不会中饱私囊，有好东西当然越多人分享越好。

original: I think you just want to stir up trouble and take advantage of the situation.
context: 我看你是唯恐天下不乱，自己才好渔翁得利吧。

original: We haven't found the fairyland yet, but we're killing each other. This is how someone with ulterior motives can take advantage.
context: 仙境还没找到，咱们却自相残杀，这样才会被有心人渔翁得利。

original: Enough talk, let's work together to find the fairyland first!
context: 都别废话了，大家先联手找到仙境要紧！

original: Let's make it clear, whoever dares to monopolize the treasure will be the enemy of everyone, beware of going to bed with a head and waking up without one!
context: 事先说好，谁若是敢独吞宝贝，便是与众人为敌，当心有头睡觉，没头起床！

original: In that case, let's each look for the fairyland now, and the first one to find it will signal with fireworks!
context: 既然如此，咱们现在各自寻找仙境，先寻到之人以烟火为号！

original: Agree!
context: 同意！

original: That was close, I almost fell off the cliff, it's safer to stay away from this dangerous place.
context: 好险，差点失足跌下山崖，还是离这危险地方远一些比较安全。

original: I'm curious about what's down there, the storybooks always say that there are fairy caves or reclusive masters under the cliffs...
context: 真是好奇这下面会是什么景象，话本中都说悬崖下都藏着神仙洞府或者有绝世高人隐居……

original: Climb down the cliff (Strength20, Stamina100)
context: 从崖壁攀爬下去（臂力20，体力100）

original: Jump down the cliff (Dexterity20, Stamina100)
context: 踩踏崖壁跳下去（敏捷20，体力100）

original: Use a rope to go down (Rope20, Stamina100)
context: 借助绳索下去（麻绳20条，体力100）

original: Safety first, stay away from danger
context: 安全第一，远离危险

original: Do you want to go down and explore again?
context: 是否再次下去探查一番？

original: This is...
context: 这里是……

original: Could this be the fairyland those people were talking about?
context: 难道这里就是那伙人所说的仙境？

original: Should I signal those people to come over now, so they won't say I'm not trustworthy...
context: 现在是否发送信号叫那哪些人过来，免得被人说不守信用……

original: Send a signal
context: 发送信号

original: Don't send a signal
context: 不发送信号

original: It will take those people a long time to get here, I'll take a look around first.
context: 那些人赶到这里还要很长时间，我先在这里四处逛逛吧。

original: Good boy, you really are trustworthy!
context: 好小子，果然守信用！

original: I didn't expect those people to find this place so quickly.
context: 没想到那些人这么快就找过来了。

original: Kid, you really want to keep it all to yourself, you didn't even signal us!
context: 小子，你果然想独吞，竟敢不发信号告知我们！

original: I didn't expect those people to find this place so quickly.
context: 没想到那些人这么快就找过来了。

original: I thought it was a fairyland like a paradise, but it's just so-so here.
context: 还以为当真是洞天福地一般的仙境，这里也不过如此。

original: Kid, have you found anything good here?
context: 小子，你在这里发现什么好东西了吗？

original: No special findings were discovered.
context: 并没有发现有什么特别的东西。

original: It's rare to come down here, everyone should check carefully, don't miss any good things.
context: 难得下来一趟，各位都四处仔细检查一下，千万别遗漏什么好东西。

original: What a gain, there's actually a big peach here!
context: 真是赚到了，这里竟然有一枚大蟠桃！

original: I actually found a peach here too.
context: 我这里竟然也找到一枚蟠桃。

original: Unexpectedly, there are witch saltwater fish here!
context: 想不到这里竟然有巫咸银鱼！

original: It's a pity that I didn't bring fishing gear, otherwise I would have to fish a few and taste them.
context: 可惜没带来钓具，否则非钓上几条，品尝一番。

original: There's something strange here!
context: 这里有古怪！

original: Ya--Ha!!!
The grave doesn't look like a grave, the tomb doesn't look like a tomb, what a broken thing!
context: 坟不像坟，冢不像冢，什么破玩意！

original: Nothing at all!
context: 什么也没有！

original: I don't know which bastard is playing a prank.
context: 不知哪个混蛋搞得恶作剧。

original: It seems that this is not the fairyland we are looking for, what a waste of effort!
context: 看来这里不是咱们要找的仙境，白浪费不少功夫！

original: This kid is simply misleading us, let's go and look elsewhere.
context: 这小子简直是在误导咱们，还是赶紧去别处看看吧。

original: Phew, these few gentlemen finally left.
context: 呼，这几位大爷终于走了。

original: It seems that this is not the fairyland we are looking for, what a waste of effort!
context: 看来这里不是咱们要找的仙境，白浪费不少功夫！

original: I suspect that this kid came first and hid all the good things.
context: 我怀疑是这小子先来一步，把好东西都藏起来了。

original: Kid, hand over everything you found!
context: 小子，把你找到的东西都交出来吧！

original: You guys can't find anything on your own, so you want to rob me?
context: 你们自己没本事找到东西，就想打劫我吗？

original: Stop talking nonsense with him, clean him up first, then search his body!
context: 别跟他废话了，先收拾了他，再搜他的身！

original: Although I haven't found any good things yet, I still have to thank you guys, you have brought me a lot of good things for no reason.
context: 虽然我还没找到什么好东西，不过我还得谢谢你们，非亲非故反而给我送来不少好东西。

original: No, no special findings were discovered.
context: 没，没有发现有什么特别的东西。

original: Your expression is a bit strange!
context: 你的神情有些古怪！

original: Everyone should check carefully, don't miss any good things.
context: 各位都四处仔细检查一下，千万别遗漏什么好东西。

original: No abnormalities were found here.
context: 这里没发现什么异常。

original: I didn't find anything special here either.
context: 我这里也没发现什么特别的东西。

original: A few common small miscellaneous fish, nothing rare.
context: 几条寻常可见的小杂鱼，没什么稀罕的。

original: Here...
context: 这里……

original: It seems that someone is not telling the truth.
context: 看来有人没说实话啊。

original: Kid, I knew you were hiding something, hand over the things you dug up!
context: 小子，就知道你心中有鬼，把挖到的东西交出来吧！

original: Are you still planning to rob?
context: 难道还打算硬抢吗？

original: Since this kid doesn't play by the rules, let's clean him up and then search his body!
context: 既然这小子不守规矩，那就收拾了他，再搜他的身！

original:
Things that fall into my hands can't be taken back even by the king!
But I still have to thank you guys, you have brought me a lot of good things for no reason.
context:
落在我手里的东西就算是天王老子来了也讨不回去！
不过我还得谢谢你们，非亲非故反而给我送来不少好东西。

original: How can there be a small mound here, it doesn't look like a grave.
context: 这里怎么会有个小土包，看起来也不像是坟冢。

original: There seems to be a stone slab here, with some faint inscriptions on it, but the inscriptions are blurred and can't be recognized, could it be someone's visit?
context: 这里好像有个石板，上面隐约有些字迹，但是字迹模糊已经辨识不清了，难道是某某到此一游？

original: It's a pity that I don't have an Iron shovel, otherwise I could dig it up and see what's inside.
context: 可惜身上没有铁铲，否则可以挖开看看里面到底有什么东西。

original: There might be something buried under this mound, should we dig it up and see?
context: 这土包下面说不定埋着什么东西，是否挖开看看？

original: Dig up the mound (consume Iron shovel, Stamina30)
context: 挖开土包（消耗铁铲，体力30）

original: Don't touch other people's things casually
context: 不要随便动别人东西

original: There are really good things hidden in here!
context: 这里面果然藏着好东西！

original: Sitting on this rock seems to be able to recover a little Stamina...
context: 在这石头上打坐似乎可以恢复少许体力……

original: Meditate for one shichen
context: 打坐一个时辰

original: Meditate for three shichen
context: 打坐三个时辰

original: It's not time to meditate yet
context: 还不是打坐的时候

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Three shichen later...
context: 三个时辰后……

original: The vines here are very strong, you can climb out from here...
context: 这里的藤曼很结实，可以从此处爬出去……

original: Climb up along the vines (Stamina100)
context: 顺着藤曼爬上去（体力100）

original: Don't want to run away for now
context: 暂时不想离开

original: Three shichen later...
context: 三个时辰后……

original: Demonstrate to the Three Sects!
context: 示威三教！

original: Three Sects
context: 三教

original: Surrender Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple.
context: 降伏释法寺、道玄宗、儒圣馆。

original: Destroy Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple.
context: 剿灭释法寺、道玄宗、儒圣馆。

original: {PlayerName}, now you help me do one last thing!
context: {PlayerName}，你现在再帮我做最后一件事！

original: You're not going to let me provoke the three religions, are you?
context: 你该不会是让我去招惹三教吧？

original: You can exterminate the Jiuli tribe, are you afraid of a few old guys in the Three Sects?
context: 你能剿灭九黎部落，难道还怕了三教中那几个老家伙？

original: Which head of the Three Sects is not a top-notch master, they are not comparable to that waste Miao Muli, aren't you sending me to death?
context: 三教掌门哪个不是超一流的绝顶高手，哪是苗木黎那个废物能相提并论的，你这不是叫我去送死吗？

original: Take the Melody House's internal power method and learn it, those old guys are nothing.
context: 妙音坊的镇派内功心法，你拿去修炼，那几个老家伙不在话下。

original: You're really generous in order to send me to death.
context: 你为了让我去送死还真是大方啊。

original: If it weren't for your refusal to help me improve my cultivation, why would I need you, an outsider, to do this.
context: 若不是你不肯助我提升修为，此事何须劳驾你这个外人出手。

original: I'm not asking you to exterminate them, just to <color=#c44b0e>subdue</color> them, to make these high and mighty sects submit to you, a young man, just like back then...
context: 我不是让你去剿灭他们，只是让你<color=#c44b0e>降伏</color>他们，让这些高高在上的门派，臣服在你这个年轻小子面前，就像当年那样……

original: Back then? What happened back then?
context: 当年？当年哪样？

original: This has nothing to do with you!
context: 此事与你无关！

original: They killed Chu Kuangsheng, they must pay for this!
context: 他们害死了楚狂生，就该为此付出代价！

original: What do you want me to do?
context: 你想让我怎么做？

original: Naturally, it's an eye for an eye. I want you to wipe out these three sects!
context: 自然是血债血偿，我要你把这三教杀得鸡犬不留！

original: (If she knew it was my doing, would she turn against me on the spot...)
context: （如果让她知道是我做的手脚，会不会马上翻脸干掉我……）

original: You seem to look unwell?
context: 你脸色似乎很难看？

original: No, nothing.
context: 没，没什么。

original: What are you waiting for, get to work!
context: 还愣着做什么，快去做事！

original: Hmph, the so-called prestigious sects, aren't they now obediently submitting under others' feet. Just like when they didn't accept Chu Kuangsheng back then, didn't they end up submitting obediently in the end.
context: 哼，不可一世的名门大派，现在还不是乖乖臣服在别人脚下。就像当年他们不服气楚狂生一样，最后不还是乖乖臣服。

original: Perhaps these sect leaders didn't accept it in their hearts, so they used despicable means to imprison Chu Kuangsheng.
context: 也许这些门派掌门内心并不服气，所以这才用卑鄙手段囚禁了楚狂生。

original: Now that Chu Kuangsheng has broken free from the prison, those who betrayed him, wait for him to come and settle the score with you!
context: 现在楚狂生已挣脱牢笼，那些背叛他的人，一个个就等着被找上门算账吧！

original: Zhong Yangzi, Hui Yuan, Cai Yuanchang...
context: 重阳子、慧元、蔡元常……

original: I will use the destruction of your three sects to commemorate the person you once admired the most...
context: 我要用你们三教的覆灭祭奠你们曾经最钦佩之人……

original: To commemorate Chu Kuangsheng, who once dominated the martial arts world and stood above the three sects!
context: 祭奠曾经意气风发力压三教，独立江湖鳌头的楚狂生！

original: Little Taoist from the Taoist Sect, please step aside for a word.
context: 道玄宗的小道爷，请借一步说话。

original: What can I do for you two?
context: 两位有何指教？

original: You Taoist Sect don't take our two factions seriously, not only often publicly defaming us, but also often seriously injuring our disciples under the name of sparring, today we must seek justice from you.
context: 你们道玄宗不把我们两派放在眼里，不但经常当众诋毁，还经常以切磋的名义重伤两派弟子，今天我们可要在你身上讨回个说法。

original: There may be some misunderstanding in this, the other party is aggressive, how should I respond?
context: 这其中说不定有什么误会，对方气势汹汹，我该如何应对？

original: Persuade the other party! (PersuadeSkill level 3)
context: 说服对方！（口才能力3级）

original: Rise up and resist. (Specific battle)
context: 奋起反抗。（特定战斗）

original: Quickly escape. (Dexterity reaches 10)
context: 快速逃离。（敏捷达到10）

original: Both of you, calm down, let me explain...
context: 二位息怒，且听我一言……

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Taoist Sect would never do such a despicable thing, I will find out the truth as soon as possible and give everyone an explanation.
context: 道玄宗绝对不会做出如此卑劣之事，我一定会尽快查明真相，给大家一个交待。

original: If it weren't for hearsay, we wouldn't want to believe it's true. But what you said makes sense, we won't make things difficult for you for now, we hope you can find out the truth soon and prove Taoist Sect's innocence.
context: 若非人云亦云，我们也不愿相信这是真的。不过你说的也有几分道理，我们就先不难为你了，希望你早日查清真相，使道玄宗自证清白。

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: Cowardly kid, you're really guilty, you're a disgrace to your Taoist Sect!
context: 没胆的小子，果然是心虚了，真给你们道玄宗丢脸！

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: Hmph, Taoist Sect disciples are nothing more than this, all are paper tigers.
context: 哼，道玄宗的弟子不过如此，净是些纸上谈兵的绣花枕头。

original: If you're not as skilled as others, you can only suffer in silence when you encounter such unreasonable things...
context: 技不如人，遇到这种不讲理的事情只能自己吃哑巴亏……

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. I can't take this beating for nothing.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现，这顿打总不能白挨。

original: Hmph, Taoist Sect's martial arts are extraordinary, we can't deal with you today, we'll see!
context: 哼，道玄宗武功了得，今天治不了你，咱们走着瞧！

original: Seeing their anger, this matter doesn't seem to be false, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. Our Taoist Sect can't be blamed for no reason.
context: 看他们火气这么大，这事不像是假的，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现，我们道玄宗总不能莫名其妙替人背锅。

original: Are you a disciple of Shifa Temple? I have something to ask you!
context: 你是释法寺的弟子吗？道爷有事找你！

original: What can I do for you two?
context: 两位施主有何指教？

original: You Shifa Temple don't take our two factions seriously, not only often publicly defaming us, but also often seriously injuring our disciples under the name of sparring, today we must seek justice from you.
context: 你们释法寺不把我们两派放在眼里，不但经常当众诋毁，还经常以切磋的名义重伤两派弟子，今天我们可要在你身上讨回个说法。

original: Both of you, calm down, let me explain...
context: 二位息怒，且听我一言……

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Shifa Temple would never do such a despicable thing, I will find out the truth as soon as possible and give everyone an explanation.
context: 释法寺绝对不会做出如此卑劣之事，我一定会尽快查明真相，给大家一个交待。

original: If it weren't for hearsay, we wouldn't want to believe it's true. But what you said makes sense, we won't make things difficult for you for now, we hope you can find out the truth soon and prove Shifa Temple's innocence.
context: 若非人云亦云，我们也不愿相信这是真的。不过你说的也有几分道理，我们就先不难为你了，希望你早日查清真相，使释法寺自证清白。

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: Cowardly kid, you're really guilty, you're a disgrace to your Shifa Temple!
context: 没胆的小子，果然是心虚了，真给你们释法寺丢脸！

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: Hmph, Shifa Temple disciples are nothing more than this, all are paper tigers.
context: 哼，释法寺的弟子不过如此，净是些纸上谈兵的绣花枕头。

original: If you're not as skilled as others, you can only suffer in silence when you encounter such unreasonable things...
context: 技不如人，遇到这种不讲理的事情只能自己吃哑巴亏……

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. I can't take this beating for nothing.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现，这顿打总不能白挨。

original: Hmph, Shifa Temple's martial arts are extraordinary, we can't deal with you today, we'll see!
context: 哼，释法寺武功了得，今天治不了你，咱们走着瞧！

original: Seeing their anger, this matter doesn't seem to be false, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. Our Shifa Temple can't be blamed for no reason.
context: 看他们火气这么大，这事不像是假的，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现，我们释法寺总不能莫名其妙替人背锅。

original: Are you from Confucius Temple? I have something to ask you.
context: 施主可是儒圣馆门下吗，小生有些事情要向施主请教。

original: What can I do for you two?
context: 两位有何指教？

original: You Confucius Temple don't take our two factions seriously, not only often publicly defaming us, but also often seriously injuring our disciples under the name of sparring, today I must seek justice for my fellow disciples.
context: 你们儒圣馆不把我们两派放在眼里，不但经常当众诋毁，还经常以切磋的名义重伤两派弟子，今天小僧要为同门讨个公道。

original: Both of you, calm down, let me explain...
context: 二位息怒，且听我一言……

original: A moment later...
context: 片刻之后……

original: Confucius Temple would never do such a despicable thing, I will find out the truth as soon as possible and give everyone an explanation.
context: 儒圣馆绝对不会做出如此卑劣之事，我一定会尽快查明真相，给大家一个交待。

original: If it weren't for the hearsay, we wouldn't want to believe it's true. But you do make some sense, so we won't make things difficult for you for now. We hope you can find out the truth soon and prove the innocence of Confucius Temple.
context: 若非人云亦云，我们也不愿相信这是真的。不过你说的也有几分道理，我们就先不难为你了，希望你早日查清真相，使儒圣馆自证清白。

original: Scene transition, the two disappear.
context: 黑幕过渡，两人消失

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: The fact that you fled in guilt suggests that you've admitted your guilt.
context: 施主心虚逃走，看来此事是不打自招了。

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: Amitabha, what goes around comes around. If Confucius Temple continues to be unrestrained, don't blame this little monk for using his vajra eyes to subdue demons!
context: 阿弥陀佛，一报还一报。今后儒圣馆若还是不知收敛，可别怪小僧金刚怒目降妖除魔了！

original: If you're not as skilled as others, you can only suffer in silence when you encounter such unreasonable things...
context: 技不如人，遇到这种不讲理的事情只能自己吃哑巴亏……

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. I can't take this beating for nothing.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现，这顿打总不能白挨。

original: Confucius Temple's martial arts are impressive, but there may be stronger people in the future. If you don't restrain yourself, you will suffer the consequences sooner or later!
context: 儒圣馆武功了得，将来未必不会遇到能胜过你的强人；若不知收敛，早晚会遭业报！

original: Seeing their anger, this doesn't seem to be a lie. I'll go to a bustling place to see if I can find out some news. Maybe there will be clues. We, Confucius Temple, can't be scapegoats for no reason.
context: 看他们火气这么大，这事不像是假的，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现，我们儒圣馆总不能莫名其妙替人背锅。

original: Stinky Taoist priest, what's so great about your Taoist Sect? You dare to look down on Confucius Temple!
context: 臭道士，你们道玄宗有什么了不起，胆敢看不起儒圣馆！

original: You are restless and irritable, aren't you losing face for Confucius Temple?
context: 施主心浮气躁，岂不是丢了儒圣馆的颜面。

original: The bald monks of Shifa Temple should stop pretending to be good people here, you have caused us a lot of trouble!
context: 释法寺的死秃驴少在这惺惺作态做好人，你们可没少给我们使绊子！

original: It turns out that disciples from three sects had a dispute. It seems that they have grudges against each other, and it's hard to tell who's right and who's wrong...
context: 原来是三个门派弟子发生争执，好像他们互有恩怨，一时难以分辨谁是谁非……

original: Step forward to mediate between the three parties! (Specific battle)
context: 上前劝解三方！（特定战斗）

original: Just watch the changes.
context: 静观其变。

original: {yell} Please stop!
context: {yell}各位请住手！

original: Who are you to interfere?
context: 你是什么人，要多管闲事！

original: I am {PlayerName}, I saw the three of you fighting as soon as you disagreed. What's the matter?
context: 在下{PlayerName}，见三位一言不合便大打出手，不知所谓何事？

original: It's all because these stinky Taoist priests from Taoist Sect always slander our Confucius Temple.
context: 还不是道玄宗这些臭道士经常诋毁我们儒圣馆。

original: Nonsense, I only heard that the bald monks of Shifa Temple incite the pilgrims on the mountain to worship Buddha at Shifa Temple, saying that the gods of Taoist Sect are ineffective.
context: 胡说，我只听说释法寺的秃驴煽动山上的香客去释法寺拜佛，说道玄宗的神明不灵验。

original: Amitabha, as a monk, I am not involved in worldly affairs, but I am accused by you scholars of Confucius Temple of being thieves and prostitutes. Sin, sin.
context: 阿弥陀佛，出家人不染红尘，却被儒圣馆各位儒生说成男盗女娼之辈，罪过罪过。

original: Did you see these things with your own eyes, or did you hear them from others?
context: 这些事情是你们亲眼所见，还是听别人说的？

original: It's all over Chuxiang City, how could it be false?
context: 在这楚襄城里都传遍了，这还能有假？

original: I haven't witnessed it myself.
context: 确实未曾亲眼目睹。

original: The little monk also heard it from others.
context: 小僧也是听他人提起。

original: Since it's just hearsay, there might be some misunderstandings. If you trust me, I am willing to investigate this matter and clear the names of your sects.
context: 既然只是道听途说，恐怕里面有些误会。各位如果信得过在下，在下愿意调查此事还各位门派一个清白。

original: Good, good, thank you, young hero.
context: 善哉，善哉，既然如此就多谢少侠了。

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: A moment later, all three of them were heavily injured and could no longer fight...
context: 片刻之后，三人都是身负重伤，不能再战……

original: I am {PlayerName}, I saw the three of you fighting as soon as you disagreed. What's the matter?
context: 在下{PlayerName}，见三位一言不合便大打出手，不知所谓何事？

original: These stinky Taoist priests from Taoist Sect always slander our Confucius Temple.
context: 道玄宗这些臭道士经常诋毁我们儒圣馆。

original: Nonsense, I only heard that the bald monks of Shifa Temple incite the pilgrims on the mountain to worship Buddha at Shifa Temple, saying that the gods of Taoist Sect are ineffective.
context: 胡说，我只听说释法寺的秃驴煽动山上的香客去释法寺拜佛，说道玄宗的神明不灵验。

original: Amitabha, as a monk, I am not involved in worldly affairs, but I am accused by you scholars of Confucius Temple of being thieves and prostitutes. Sin, sin.
context: 阿弥陀佛，出家人不染红尘，却被儒圣馆各位儒生说成男盗女娼之辈，罪过罪过。

original: Did you see these things with your own eyes, or did you hear them from others?
context: 这些事情是你们亲眼所见，还是听别人说的？

original: It's all over Chuxiang City, how could it be false?
context: 在这楚襄城里都传遍了，这还能有假？

original: I haven't witnessed it myself.
context: 确实未曾亲眼目睹。

original: The little monk also heard it from others.
context: 小僧也是听他人提起。

original: Since it's just hearsay, there might be some misunderstandings. If you trust me, I am willing to investigate this matter and clear the names of your sects.
context: 既然只是道听途说，恐怕里面有些误会。各位如果信得过在下，在下愿意调查此事还各位门派一个清白。

original: Good, good, thank you, young hero.
context: 善哉，善哉，既然如此就多谢少侠了。

original: This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
context: 这件事情看来不像是空穴来风，应该会有不少人知道，我去热闹的地方试试能否到打听到一些消息，说不定会有线索发现。

original: Investigate the truth
context: 探查真相

original: Go to the Market, Sorrowless Tavern, and Hotel Prosperous to see if you can find out some news.
context: 前往市集、忘忧楼、福临客栈，看看能否打听到一些消息。

original: It seems that no one is talking about the martial arts sects. Is it not the right time?
context: 好像没听到有人谈论江湖门派的事情，莫非来的不是时候？

original: Have you heard? The people of Confucius Temple colluded with bandits and were caught red-handed by the people of Taoist Sect.
context: 你听说了吗，儒圣馆的人与匪人勾结，被道玄宗门人抓个正着。

original: These two sects have always been at odds, won't this lead to a big fight?
context: 这两个门派一向不对路，这不得大打出手吗？

original: Isn't it? Taoist Sect couldn't stand against the joint forces of the other side and finally fled in disgrace, completely losing face for Taoist Sect.
context: 可不是吗，道玄宗抵不过对方联手，最后落荒而逃，简直丢尽了道玄宗的颜面。

original: It seems that there are people talking about the grudges of these martial arts sects. I'll go elsewhere to find out more.
context: 看来真有人在聊这些武林门派的恩怨，我再去别处打听下吧。

original: There are also people talking about the conflicts between the disciples of the three religions here, but why does the speaker seem familiar?
context: 这里也有在聊三教弟子之间矛盾的，不过怎么感觉说话这人有些眼熟呢。

original: The entanglements of these major sects are really unfathomable...
context: 这些大门派的恩怨纠葛还真是深不可测啊……

original: No wonder I feel this person is familiar. The news of the discord between these sects was spread by him alone. It looks very strange!
context: 难怪我感觉这人有些眼熟，这些门派不合的消息原来都是他一个人散播出来的，看起来很有古怪！

original: While he's not far away, I'll follow him to see what's going on!
context: 趁他没走远，我跟上去瞧个究竟！

original: There are monks in Shifa Temple who do not abide by the rules and precepts, even eating meat and drinking alcohol. It is said that some have been seen visiting the Maiden House.
context: 释法寺有僧人不守清规戒律，竟然吃肉喝酒，据说还有人看见逛过群芳馆。

original: How can there be such unruly monks? Doesn't Shifa Temple care?
context: 怎么会有如此乱来的僧人，莫非释法寺不管吗？

original: The so-called law does not blame the public. If discovered, they would claim to be secular disciples, not bound by the precepts.
context: 所谓法不责众，若被人发现了就推说那是俗家弟子，不受戒律约束罢了。

original: A scholar from Confucius Temple once wrote a Coin chapter condemning these degenerates of the Buddhist sect, but was accused by those monks of being Pretentious and pseudo-Honorable.
context: 儒圣馆曾有书生写文章痛斥这种释门败类，反被那些僧人说成道貌岸然、伪君子。

original: Have you heard? A disciple of the Taoist Sect spent the night at a widow's house, and the widow's lover turned out to be a secular disciple of Shifa Temple...
context: 听说了没，道玄宗弟子夜宿寡妇家，那寡妇的姘头却是释法寺的俗家弟子……

original: This is going to be interesting.
context: 这下可要有热闹看了。

original: Who can disagree? This is a deep-seated grudge. That night, two disciples from prestigious sects fought over a widow.
context: 谁说不是呢，这可谓不共戴天之仇，当晚两个名门子弟为个寡妇就大打出手。

original: I suppose the secular disciple of Shifa Temple couldn't stand against the Taoist of the Taoist Sect.
context: 想必释法寺的俗家弟子敌不过道玄宗的道爷吧。

original: You're wrong. Who doesn't know that Shifa Temple is the dominant force in the martial arts world? Even their secular disciples can beat the true disciples of the Taoist Sect.
context: 此言差矣，谁不知道释法寺才是江湖持牛耳者，就算是俗家弟子也是吊打道玄宗真传弟子。

original: This guy came to this place, should I continue to follow him?
context: 这家伙来到这种地方，我是否要继续跟踪下去呢？

original: Keep following!
context: 继续跟踪！

original: Talk about it later.
context: 稍后再说。

original: I have spread the news as you instructed.
context: 我已经按照您的吩咐，把消息都散播出去了。

original: You did well. I don't believe that with all this explosive news, the three sects won't be in chaos.
context: 你做的很好，我就不信这么多猛料下去，他们三教还不会乱成一锅粥。

original: These news are half true and half false, do you think they will believe it?
context: 这些消息半真半假，您说他们会相信吗？

original: These righteous sects value their reputation the most. When they hear someone speaking ill of them, they will definitely defend themselves in every possible way, without calmly distinguishing the truth.
context: 这些名门正派最爱惜声誉，听到有人说他们坏话一定会百般维护，哪会冷静下来辨别真伪。

original: Moreover, the bystanders only care about the excitement, who cares about the truth? They will be more willing to add fuel to the fire.
context: 更何况旁观的路人只在乎热闹大不大，谁会关心真相，他们会更加乐于推波助澜。

original: Wait until the three sects start infighting, hehe...
context: 等三教起了内讧，嘿嘿……

original: Kid, you've eavesdropped long enough. You're really not afraid of death!
context: 小子，你也偷听够久了，真是不怕死啊！

original: Damn, I've been discovered!
context: 糟了，竟然被发现了！

original: Isn't this the Taoist who gave me the Cold medicinal pill!
context: 这家伙不就是给我祛湿丸的那位道爷吗！

original: So it was you who stirred up trouble, aiming to cause internal strife among the three sects, and then conveniently reap the benefits!
context: 原来是你在搬弄是非，目的就是要三教内乱，然后方便你们坐收渔翁之利吗！

original: Since you know so much, I can't let you go!
context: 既然你知道了这么多事情，那么就不该留你了！

original: Kid, I am Sun Daoren from the Nine Factions Sect, remember that! Those who offend the Nine Factions Sect never live long, you better watch out.
context:
小子，本道爷是九流门的损道人，你可记好了！
得罪九流门的人，从来没有活得长久的，你好自为之吧。

original: Your exposure of the Nine Factions Sect's plot to incite the three sects has earned you high praise from the leaders of the three sects.
context: 九流门企图挑拨三教的阴谋被你揭露，三教首脑对你赞誉有加

original: The Disaster of Daliang
context: 大梁人祸

original: Clue
context: 线索

original: Find the patrolling constable to understand the situation.
context: 找巡街捕快了解情况。

original: I heard that many shopkeepers in the city have disappeared, and their whereabouts are still unknown.
context: 听说城内诸多商铺掌柜不知去向，至今生死未卜。

original: Prince Duke Qi is pressuring the prefect. If the case is not solved within the deadline, the prefect will be demoted and all the officers will be dismissed for investigation.
context: 齐王殿下对知府大人施压，限期若不能破案，知府大人降级问罪，所有差役革职查办。

original: Such a thing happened in the first district of virtue. If these shopkeepers can't be found, the closure of the shops is secondary. Who would dare to do business in Daliang in the future.
context: 堂堂首善之区竟然发生这种事情，若是这些掌柜不能找回，商铺关门倒闭到还在其次，今后谁还敢在大梁做生意呢。

original: I can go to the patrolling officers to understand the situation, maybe I can find some valuable clues.
context: 我可以去找巡街的差役了解下情况，说不定能找到一些有价值的线索。

original: I heard that the whereabouts of the shopkeepers in the city are unknown, and I want to help the government solve this problem.
context: 在下听闻城内诸位掌柜下落不明，想要协助官府解决这个麻烦。

original: We can't solve it, what can you do to solve this case?
context: 我们都解决不了，凭你又有什么本事能破了此案？

original: People in the rivers and lakes are sometimes more flexible than the government. Anyway, I want to understand some clues first. If I can help the government solve the case, it would be best. If I can't solve the case, the situation won't be worse than it is now.
context: 江湖人做事有时要比官府更加方便灵活一些，总之我想先了解些线索，若能帮官府破案自然最好，若是在下破不了案，情况也不至于比现在更糟糕吧。

original: Alright, what information do you want to know?
context: 好吧，你想要了解什么消息？

original: (What should I ask?)
context: (要问一些什么问题呢？)

original: Which shopkeepers have disappeared?
context: 都有哪些掌柜失踪？

original: Do these shopkeepers have any enemies?
context: 这些掌柜是否有仇家？

original: Have these shops received any strange guests?
context: 这些商铺是否接待过奇怪的客人？

original: How does the government view this case?
context: 官府如何看待这次案件？

original: Have there been any horse carriages leaving the city recently?
context: 近期是否有马车出城？

original: I have no further inquiries.
context: 没有想了解的。

original: What else would you like to know?
context: 你还想要了解什么消息？

original: The shopkeepers of Golden Fortune Shop, Literature Bookstore, Fragrance Square, Cloud Fabric Shop, and the doctor of Clinic House.
context: 多宝斋掌柜、汇文书局掌柜、留香坊掌柜、云罗坊掌柜，还有回春堂的郎中。

original: With so many people involved, this case seems quite tricky. No wonder Prince Duke Qi is furious and demands a solution within a deadline.
context: 这么多人，看来这案子还真是挺棘手，难怪齐王殿下震怒，要求限期破案。

original: Cases like this have happened before and were eventually left unresolved; but this time it has caused such a stir that it has damaged Duke Qi's reputation and popularity, hence the demand for a thorough investigation.
context: 以前这类案子多了，最后都是不了了之；但是这次闹得太大，以致于齐王声名受损，民望大跌，所以要求严查彻办。

original: What else would you like to know?
context: 你还想要了解什么消息？

original: They occasionally have some quarrels with customers, but nothing that could be considered as having enemies.
context: 偶尔跟客人发生些口角而已，算不上仇家。

original: However, the character of these shopkeepers is a bit hard to describe.
context: 不过这几家掌柜的人品嘛，实在有些一言难尽。

original: What else would you like to know?
context: 你还想要了解什么消息？

original: From what I understand, apart from a few customers asking about some strange and curious items, there are people who have seen these shops thriving and have discussed business cooperation.
context: 据了解，除了遇到个别客人询问一些稀奇古怪玩意的消息外，就是有人见这几家生意兴隆，有谈生意合作的。

original: These shops indeed do very well. It is said that the money they make in a day is more than what an ordinary person can earn in a lifetime.
context: 这几家商铺生意确实比较火爆，听说他们每日赚的那些钱普通人一辈子都未必赚得到。

original: What else would you like to know?
context: 你还想要了解什么消息？

original: We believe this is a typical case of kidnapping and extortion, but so far no one has demanded a ransom.
context: 我们觉得这是一起再寻常不过的绑架勒索案件，只不过至今为止也不见有人索要赎金。

original: What else would you like to know?
context: 你还想要了解什么消息？

original: In recent days, horse carriages, cargo trucks, and even cargo ships leaving the city have been strictly inspected. It is basically impossible for these shopkeepers to be smuggled out of the city.
context: 这几日出城马车、货车，甚至货船都严加盘查，基本不可能有把这些掌柜偷运出城的情况。

original: As long as these shopkeepers are still alive, we can assert that they are still in Daliang City. However, the city is a complex web of power, and it is not easy for the government to conduct searches.
context: 只要这些掌柜都还活着，我们就敢断定他们还在这大梁城中。只不过城中势力盘根错节，官府也不好轻易搜查。

original: What if they left the city through a secret tunnel?
context: 如果他们通过密道出城呢？

original: If that's the case, we can only leave it to fate.
context: 真要如此，只能听天由命了。

original: Assuming that the missing shopkeepers did not run away from Daliang City but were hidden, it should not be difficult to find them after careful investigation.
context: 假设那些失踪的掌柜并未离开大梁城，而是被人藏匿起来，那么仔细排查之后，应该并不难找。

original: I didn't get any useful clues, did I miss any key information?
context: 没有得到什么有用的线索，莫非漏掉了什么关键信息？

original: Search for suspicious locations
context: 寻找嫌疑地

original: Look for places in Daliang City that are remote, large, and difficult to access.
context: 在大梁城中寻找地处偏僻、占地较大且不易进入的地方。

original: The number of people involved in making so many shopkeepers disappear in a short period of time must be quite large; hiding these shopkeepers also requires a certain amount of space, so this place must not be too small.
context: 短期内能让这么多掌柜失踪，参与人一定不少；藏匿这些掌柜也需要一定的空间，因此这个地方一定不会太小。

original: If there are often strangers coming and going nearby, or if the environment is likely to attract attention, then it would be easy for things to be exposed, so this place should be relatively remote.
context: 若是附近常有陌生人来往，或者所处环境容易引起关注，那么事情很容易败露，因此这个地方应该比较偏僻。

original: To reduce the risk of being discovered, this place should be difficult for ordinary people to enter or appear to be completely inaccessible on the surface.
context: 这个地方为了降低被发现的风险，寻常人应该难以进入或者表面上看起来根本无法进入。

original: Look for such places in the city, and you might find something.
context: 在城里找找是否存在这样的地方，或许会有所发现。

original: The gate is tightly closed, and the courtyard wall is damaged, it seems that it has been uninhabited for a long time.
context: 大门紧闭，院墙也有破损，似乎已经早已没人居住了。

original: A remote courtyard with a tightly closed gate, this is a good place to hide people. But how should I go in and investigate?
context: 地处偏僻、大门紧闭的庭院，这里倒是藏人的好地方。只是我该怎么进去一探究竟呢？

original: Use Qinggong to jump over the courtyard wall. (Qinggong 100)
context: 施展轻功翻进院墙。（轻功100）

original: Use skills to unlock the door. (Machinery reaches level 3 Advance)
context: 借助能力开锁。（机关达到3级融会贯通）

original: Force the door open!
context: 暴力破门！

original: Come back later.
context: 稍后再来。

original: This low wall can't stop me!
context: 这么矮的墙头难不倒我！

original: Unlocking this lock is no problem at all
context: 解开这锁没有任何难度

original: Who are you and what are you doing here!
context: 你是什么人，来这里做什么！

original:
It seems I was right, the shopkeepers in the city are all locked up here by you.
Today I'm going to rescue them, and if possible, bring you to justice!
context:
看来我料想的不错，城中的掌柜被你都关在这里了。
今天我要救走他们，有可能的话也要把你们绳之于法！

original: Kid, don't let your self-proclaimed righteousness cloud your judgment. There's not a single innocent merchant here. If you save them, who knows how many common people will suffer in the future.
context: 小子，别被你那自命不凡的正义冲昏了头，这里面的奸商没有一个是无辜的，你救了他们将来还不知会有多少百姓遭罪。

original: This Golden Fortune Shop owner not only colludes with the Tomb Raider Sect to resell burial objects, but also forges antiques and sells them at high prices. Most of the fake antiques in Daliang City come from him!
context: 这个多宝斋掌柜，不但勾结摸金门倒卖陪葬物，而且伪造古董，以高价卖出，大梁城中大半假古董就出自此人之手！

original: Mercy, I won't dare to do it again.
context: 好汉饶命，以后再也不敢了

original: The Literature Bookstore owner has taken many bribes, tampering with children's primers, distorting classic Coin chapters into unrecognizable and meaningless texts. Can you expect the children who read these books to become pillars of society in the future?
context: 汇文书局掌柜不知拿了人家多少好处，篡改孩童的启蒙读本，把一些经典文章改的面目全非、辞不达意，你能指望读这些书的孩童将来能够成为栋梁之材吗？

original: I'm not the only one who took the benefits, don't let me take the blame alone.
context: 好处也不止我一人拿了，不能让我顶缸啊

original: The Fragrance Square owner has been living a luxurious life for the past few years, completely losing the honesty and integrity of a merchant. He dares to sell shoddy goods at high prices to customers, and those who come to argue are met with sharp and sarcastic ridicule.
context: 留香坊掌柜这几年锦衣玉食、养尊处优，全然丢了商家的诚信本分。粗制滥造的玩意也敢高价卖给客人，有人上门理论反倒遭受一通尖酸刻薄的嘲讽。

original: I have betrayed everyone's trust in me.
context: 我辜负了大家对我的信任

original: The goods sold by Cloud Fabric Shop are indeed not problematic, and the reputation is not bad...
context: 云罗坊出售的货物确实没什么问题，口碑也还算不差……

original: Thank you for your praise.
context: 多谢好汉抬举

original: However, every year the government orders merchants to set up porridge stalls to help the poor and collect clothes for the disaster-stricken to keep warm. What have you done? You should know how many people have frozen and starved to death because of you.
context: 然而每年官府责令商家开设粥场救济穷人，募集衣物给灾民御寒，你又是怎么做的呢？因你之故，冻饿而死的人究竟有多少，你应该心中有数。

original: As for you, the doctor of Clinic House, you might be thinking, what kind of handle could I have on a living Bodhisattva like you who has a miraculous hand to Regenerate and has saved countless lives.
context: 至于你嘛，回春堂的郎中，你可能在想，像你这样妙手回春、救人无数的活菩萨，会有什么把柄在我手上呢。

original: You have three principles for treating diseases: no money, no treatment; severe illness, no treatment; cheap medicine, no treatment. How many people's treatment have you delayed with these three principles? Don't you think you are extremely guilty with these three principles!
context: 你治病的原则有三不救：没钱不救、病重不救、药贱不救，凭此三不救你耽误了多少人的诊治？凭此三不救，你难道不认为自己罪大恶极吗！

original: Inseparable has a life, what does it have to do with me!
context: 生死有命，关我何事！

original: This guy is hopeless...
context: 简直无可救药的家伙……

original: Knowing what they have done, do you still plan to save these people?
context: 知道了他们所作所为，你现在还打算救这些人吗？

original: What are you planning to do with these people you've captured? Demand a ransom?
context: 你抓来这些人打算作什么？索要赎金吗？

original: If they can sincerely repent, I will let them transfer their shops. The money they earned in the first half of their lives is enough for them to retire in their hometown; if they refuse to repent, then I don't mind Acting for the heavens and let them atone with their lives.
context: 若能诚心悔过，我会让他们把店铺转让出来，前半辈子赚的钱也够他们回乡养老了；若是不肯悔过，那么我不介意替天行道，让他们以死谢罪。

original: Our Nine Factions Sect always acts with a clear conscience, we will not wrong the good people, nor will we indulge the evil ones.
context: 我们九流门做事一向师出有名，既不会冤枉好人，也不会枉纵恶人。

original: Acting for the heavens in name, but in fact for your own selfish desires, your Nine Factions Sect really knows how to whitewash your actions.
context: 以替天行道为名，实则是为一己之私，你们九流门可真会粉饰自己的行为。

original: Since the matter has been exposed, I have no choice but to leave no survivors. Kid, you're unlucky!
context: 既然事情暴露，只能逼我不留活口了。小子，算你倒霉！

original: Evil of Nine Factions Sect, surrender now!
context: 九流门的恶贼，束手就擒吧！

original:
Hmph, a greenhorn who still smells of mother's milk, you want to catch me!
Let me tell you, I am E Qigai of the Nine Factions Sect. Today you ruined my good deeds, I will make you pay ten times in the future!
context:
哼，乳臭未干的毛小子，也想抓住我！
告诉你，本大爷是九流门的恶乞丐，今日你坏我好事，到时候让你十倍偿还！

original:
After expressing their gratitude to you, the shopkeepers of Survival instinct hurriedly fled back to their own shops, fearing to be caught again.
This time you helped the Daliang government solve a big problem and received a large amount of generous reward. Of course, this money all comes from the shopkeepers who were rescued.
context:
死里逃生的众位掌柜向你表达谢意后，匆忙逃回自己的店铺，唯恐再被人抓去。
此次你帮大梁官府解决了大麻烦，得到一大笔丰厚赏金，当然，这些钱都来自那些被解救的掌柜身上。

original: None of the captured shopkeepers survived. Although you thwarted the plot of the Nine Factions Sect, you did not successfully solve the problem of the Daliang government, so you will not receive any reward.
context: 被抓来的掌柜无一生还，你虽然破坏了九流门的阴谋，但是并未顺利解决大梁官府的麻烦，所以也不会得到任何赏金。

original: {PlayerName}, entering the palace without a decree is a serious crime, aren't you afraid of death?
context: {PlayerName}，无诏入宫可是重罪，你不怕死吗？

original: Of course I'm afraid of death, but I'm more afraid of living like a walking corpse.
context: 当然怕死，不过更怕浑浑噩噩像行尸走肉一样活着。

original: How am I not the same? A man in this world, if he cannot feast on the Five Tripods in life, he should be cooked in the Five Tripods in death!
context: 朕又何尝不是如此，大丈夫在世，生不能五鼎食，死亦当五鼎烹！

original: Speaking of which, your contribution to my smooth ascension to the throne is undeniable. If it weren't for you persuading Yan to withdraw its troops and stop invading the south, even if I ascended the throne, I wouldn't be able to sit securely on this land.
context: 说起来，朕能够顺利登基也有你的功劳。若非你使燕国撤兵停止南侵，朕即便登上皇位，这江山也坐不安稳。

original: Did you come here to ask for rewards for your contributions?
context: 你此番前来莫非是向朕讨要功劳赏赐的吗？

original: I came to...
context: 我是来……

original: Advise you to abdicate for now.
context: 劝陛下暂且放弃皇位。

original: Acting for the heavens, to remove you, the incompetent ruler!
context: 替天行道，除去你这昏君！

original: Hahahaha
context: 哈哈哈哈

original: I didn't expect such madness to come from the mouth of the famous {PlayerName}.
context: 想不到这样的疯话竟然会从大名鼎鼎的{PlayerName}口中说出。

original: How many years have I waited, how much effort have I spent to sit on this throne, and you want me to give it up with a few words?
context: 为了坐上龙椅，朕苦等多少岁月，耗尽多少心血，凭你三言两语让朕放弃？

original: After all, your throne is not legitimate, the Imperial Seal is missing, you have no edict of succession, you have no evidence to convince the people!
context: 毕竟你这皇位并非正统，传国玉玺下落不明，你又无传位诏书，无凭无据无法服众！

original:
I am a royal relative, holding half of the world's troops and horses! 
I am the one chosen by destiny, I am the current emperor, who dares to disobey!
context:
朕是皇室宗亲，手握天下半数兵马！
朕就是天命所归，朕就是当今天子，谁敢不服！

original: If you insist on this, it will only lead to the lords of various places following suit and declaring themselves kings. When the world is in chaos, the common people will suffer!
context: 你执意如此只会导致各地诸侯效仿，纷纷自立，到时候天下大乱，遭殃的还是百姓！

original: The troops and horses in my hands are not vegetarians.
context: 朕手中兵马可不是吃素的。

original: It seems you are not willing to give up the throne...
context: 看来你是不肯放弃皇位了……

original: When I've had enough of being emperor, I'll naturally pass on the throne. But this is my family affair, it has nothing to do with you.
context: 等到朕过足了皇帝瘾自然会传位下去，不过这是朕的家务事，跟你可没什么关系。

original: Alas, I knew it wouldn't be so easy...
context: 唉，早知道事情不会这么轻松……

original: Since words are useless, I have to take action to remove you, the root of the problem.
context: 既然多说无益，那么只能动手铲除你这祸根了。

original: Do you think my palace is made of paper? Do you think I, the emperor, am at your mercy?
context: 你当朕的行宫是纸糊的吗？你当朕这皇帝是任人宰割吗？

original: Brother Emperor, {PlayerGivenName} has his difficulties, don't blame him. For the sake of the world, can you temporarily give up the throne...
context: 皇兄，{PlayerGivenName}也是有苦衷的，你不要怪他。为了天下，你能不能暂时放弃皇位……

original: {yell} How dare you!
context: {yell}放肆！

original: Even if you are my imperial sister, what qualifications do you have to make me give up the throne!
context: 即便你是朕的皇妹，又有何资格让朕放弃皇位！

original: Not only can you not persuade {PlayerName} to be loyal to me, but you also help the tyrant. Today, you will die together!
context: 你非但不能劝服{PlayerName}效忠于朕，反而助纣为虐，今天你们要死就死在一起吧！

original: {PlayerName}, you are against my brother emperor, I can't let you hurt him...
context: {PlayerName}，你与皇兄为敌，我不能让你伤害皇兄……

original: ...I can't be with you anymore.
context: ……我不能跟你在一起了。

original: Rebel {PlayerName}, plotting rebellion, committing treason, execute on the spot!
context: 逆贼{PlayerName}，图谋不轨，犯上作乱，就地格杀！

original: I've been waiting for this moment, let's go all out!
context: 就等这一刻了，放手一搏吧！

original: The dream of being an emperor for a thousand autumns ends here, like a daylily, a moment of glory, it falls as soon as it blooms.
context: 千秋皇帝梦就此终结，如同昙花，刹那芳华，初开便败。

original: Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you are indeed invincible, my guards seem to be no match for you.
context: {PlayerSurName}少侠果然是万夫不挡之勇，朕的护卫在你面前似乎全都不堪一击。

original:
In extraordinary times, extraordinary measures must be taken.
If not, I would find it hard to face you.
context:
行非常事，只能用非常手段。
若非如此，我可是难以面见陛下。

original: Since I ascended the throne, many martial artists have pledged allegiance to me, and I naturally won't treat them badly. Did you come here to pledge allegiance to me?
context: 自朕登基以来，有不少武林人士效忠于朕，朕自然不会亏待了他们。你此番前来，也是向朕投诚的吗？

original: I came to...
context: 我是来……

original: Advise you to abdicate for now.
context: 劝陛下暂且放弃皇位。

original: Acting for the heavens, to remove you, the incompetent ruler!
context: 替天行道，除去你这昏君！

original: How I wish I could be a leisurely and peaceful prince instead of sitting in this position.
context: 朕何尝愿意坐这个位置，朕难道不愿意做一个闲散清静的王爷吗？

original: The previous emperor died, the country had no heir, Duke Kang established a false dynasty in Wu and Yue, confusing the people, and the country gradually showed signs of division.
context: 先皇殡天，国无储君，康王在吴越之地建立伪朝，蛊惑人心，江山渐有分裂之势。

original: The main ministers of the dynasty, in order to correct the view and establish the legitimacy of the court, forced me to sit on this throne by following the ancestral system of appointing the eldest and the virtuous.
context: 本朝肱骨重臣为正视听，树立朝廷正统，沿袭立长立贤的祖制，以死相逼朕来坐这个龙椅。

original: I feel like I'm sitting on pins and needles now...
context: 朕如今可是如坐针毡呐……

original: Since being an emperor is uncomfortable, why not take the brave step of stepping down and giving up the throne?
context: 既然皇帝做得不自在，何不就此急流勇退，放下皇位呢？

original: A country cannot be without a monarch for a day. If I do not occupy this position to declare the orthodoxy, I don't know how many people in the world will stand on their own and how many will claim to be kings.
context: 国不可一日无君，朕若不居此位宣示正统，天下不知会有几人自立，几人称王。

original: If it weren't for you and Duke Kang successively standing on their own and starting this catastrophe, who would dare to be the emperor!
context: 若非你和康王先后自立，开此祸端，谁敢冒头做皇帝！

original: You speak as if you were forced, but in fact, you are still coveting the throne and unwilling to give up the imperial power at hand.
context: 说得像是被迫无奈，其实还是你自己贪恋皇位，不肯放弃到手的皇权。

original: I cannot fail the expectations of the ministers, nor can I leave the people of the world without support.
context: 朕不能辜负群臣厚望，不能让天下百姓无所依仗。

original: In that case, I have nothing more to say.
context: 既然如此，我也没什么可说得了。

original: I love and cherish talents, but you are stubborn and cannot understand my difficulties, sigh...
context: 朕爱才惜才，但是你冥顽不灵，无法体谅朕的苦衷，唉……

original: Rebel {PlayerName}, disturbing the holy driver, your sin should be punished!
context: 逆贼{PlayerName}，惊扰圣驾，其罪当诛！

original: All strategies are exhausted, and in the end, you can't escape the fate of the heavens. The imperial hegemony is all dust.
context: 计谋算尽，终究逃不过天意弄人，皇朝霸业尽归尘土。

original: {yell} Bold and reckless, you speak rebellious and absurd words, your crime deserves death!
context: {yell}大胆狂徒，口出悖逆妄言罪该万死！

original: Since His Majesty ascended the throne, he has widely repaired Benevolence to benefit the people, and you dare to slander His Majesty!
context: 圣上即位以来，广修仁德造福黎民，你竟然胆敢污蔑圣上！

original: My merits and demerits will be commented on by future generations, and I will not make people guilty of words.
context: 朕之功过自有后人评说，朕岂会使人因言获罪。

original: Your Majesty is generous and does not care, you should not thank the emperor for his grace!
context: 陛下宽宏海量，不予计较，你还不叩谢皇恩！

original:
Emperor Longxing, put away your hypocrisy.
If I am Invincible, you can't sleep at night; if you are Invincible, my heart is uneasy!
context:
隆兴皇帝陛下，收起你的伪善吧。
我若不死，你夜不能寐；你若不死，我心难安！

original: Alas, the stubborn ones are incorrigible...
context: 唉，顽劣之徒不堪教化……

original: Rebel {PlayerName}, disturbing the holy driver, your sin should be punished!
context: 逆贼{PlayerName}，惊扰圣驾，其罪当诛！

original: {PlayerSurName} Brother, you have killed the double dragons by yourself, which can be said to be unprecedented.
context: {PlayerSurName}贤弟凭借一己之力连屠双龙，可谓前无古人后无来者。

original: I don't know whether this is a blessing or a curse for the people of the world.
context: 不知这样对天下苍生而言是福还是祸。

original: There will be no disputes in the world soon, and the people will enjoy peace and happiness, which is naturally a great blessing.
context: 天下不久后将再无争端，百姓乐享清福，自然是天大的福分。

original: How do you know that there will be no more disputes in the world?
context: 你又怎么知道天下不会再有争端？

original: Because I will end this chaotic world and completely unify the north and south!
context: 因为本王会终结这乱世，使南北之地彻底一统！

original: You, you want to be the emperor yourself!
context: 你，你自己想当皇帝！

original: I am just taking back what belongs to me, why are you so surprised.
context: 本王只是取回本属于自己的东西而已，你何必如此大惊小怪。

original: If it weren't for the rebel to usurp the throne, this emperor's position would have been mine, and now it's just returning to its original owner!
context: 若非逆臣篡位，这皇帝之位本就是本王的，如今只是物归原主！

original: You are so cunning, you have been using me, letting me clear the obstacles for you and pave the way for your emperor!
context: 你好阴险，一直都是在利用我，让我帮你清扫障碍，为你称帝铺路！

original: You should feel honored to help me achieve the imperial career. I can grant you the honor of founding the country, and even grant you the position of being above all others!
context: 助本王成就帝业，你应该感到荣幸。本王可以许你开国功臣的荣耀，更可以赐你一人之下万万人之上的地位！

original: The hare is dead and the dog is cooked, do you think I will believe you?
context: 狡兔死走狗烹，你觉得我还会相信你吗？

original: If you can't be used by me, then you are my enemy. Are you ready to be my enemy?
context: 既不能为我所用，那便是本王的敌人，你做好与本王为敌的觉悟了吗？

original: I am no longer the little Character who first entered the rivers and lakes and was inexperienced. I {PlayerName} have come to this day, experienced countless blood and rain, countless Inseparable hesitations, do you think you can scare me with your turtle-like prince!
context: 我早已不是初入江湖涉世未深的小角色，我{PlayerName}走到今时今日，经历无数次血雨腥风，无数次生死徘徊，凭你这个缩头乌龟一样的王爷还想吓得了我吗！

original: Huh, a bit of backbone!
context: 哼，有点骨气！

original: Is this your bottom line as the master of Fengwen Terrace?
context: 这就是你风闻台主人的底蕴？

original: The good show is just beginning...
context: 好戏才刚刚开始……

original: King Chai has given a lot of benefits to the tribe, it seems that the Jiuli tribe is expected to prosper in my hands!
context: 柴王许给部落不少好处，看来九黎部落有望在我手里兴盛了！

original: A good bird chooses a tree to nest, and Confucius Temple will only follow King Chai's orders in the future!
context: 良禽择木而栖，儒圣馆今后唯柴王之命是从！

original: His Royal Highness King Chai is wise and martial, which is not something you can contend with.
context: 柴王殿下英明神武，哪是你这毛头小子所能抗衡的。

original: Killing a strong man is more attractive to me than having thousands of beauties!
context: 杀一个强者要比坐拥千百个美女更加吸引我！

original: If it weren't for His Royal Highness King Chai's help, Ding Fengbo would have become a lonely ghost long ago. I came here today to repay my gratitude!
context: 当年若非柴王殿下援手，定风波早成孤魂野鬼，今日特为报恩而来！

original: Today I will learn about your martial arts again, please don't hesitate to teach!
context: 今日再来领教阁下武功，请不吝赐教！

original: Whoever gives more benefits, the old monster naturally helps whoever, this is called helping the reason, not helping the relatives.
context: 谁给的好处多，老怪自然就帮谁，这就叫帮理不帮亲。

original: Benevolence and morality are not meant to restrain people like us.
context: 仁义道德可不是约束我们这种人的。

original: You have strayed from the right path, how can this old Taoist sit idly by!
context: 你已误入歧途，老道焉能坐视不理！

original: Amitabha, lay down your butcher's knife and become a Buddha on the spot.
context: 阿弥陀佛，放下屠刀立地成佛。

original: If it weren't for His Royal Highness King Chai's help, Ding Fengbo would have become a lonely ghost long ago. I came here today to repay my gratitude!
context: 当年若非柴王殿下援手，定风波早成孤魂野鬼，今日特为报恩而来！

original: My precious sword will be sharpened with your evil blood today!
context: 老夫宝剑今日就你这恶贼鲜血开锋！

original: Those who are rich but unkind, today I will kill the unkind!
context: 为富不仁，今日不仁者要斩杀不仁之徒！

original: Whoever gives more benefits, the old monster naturally helps whoever, this is called helping the reason, not helping the relatives.
context: 谁给的好处多，老怪自然就帮谁，这就叫帮理不帮亲。

original: Villain, when will you surrender if not now!
context: 恶贼，还不束手就擒更待何时！

original: I didn't expect the master of Fengwen Terrace to have such a method, commanding so many experts to deal with me.
context: 想不到风闻台主人竟然有如此手段，驱使这么多高手联手对付我。

original: There are always grudges in the world, even without grudges there are disputes, let alone others fanning the flames, so it's not difficult to prepare this deadly trap for you.
context: 人在江湖总有恩怨，就算没有恩怨也有是非，更何况还有旁人推波助澜，所以为你备下这必杀之局并非难事。

original: So many voices can melt gold, and constant criticism can wear away bones...
context: 众口铄金，积毁销骨么……

original: It's good that you know, with so many top experts seeing you off, you can have no regrets in this life.
context: 知道就好，有这么多绝顶高手为你送行，此生你可以无憾了。

original: You seem to have misunderstood something...
context: 你似乎弄错了一件事……

original: They are not here to see me off, but to accompany you in death.
context: 他们不是为我送行，而是为你陪葬。

original: Before me... all are mere ants.
context: 在我面前……皆为蝼蚁。

original: At last, it's all over.
context: 这一切，终于结束了

original: In order to restore the old dynasty, Chai Wang, who plotted his whole life and calculated everything, ended up on the throne. But in the end, it was nothing more than a tragic ending of chasing illusions and grasping at the moon in the water.
context: 柴王为了复辟旧朝，自己坐上皇帝宝座，不惜谋划一生、机关算尽，到头来不过是镜里观花、水中捞月的凄惨结局。

original: With the death of Duke Kang and Duke Qi, there are no more bloodlines in the Zhao royal family eligible to inherit the throne. This throne has been vacant for a long time, and it is bound to cause a lot of chaos.
context: 康王、齐王身死道消，赵国皇室再无血脉有资格继承皇位，这帝位空悬许久，势必要生出很多乱子了。

original: You are now world-renowned, possessing unparalleled martial arts, holding the Imperial Seal, and having elite soldiers as your support. You are truly the one destined by heaven!
context: 你如今天下闻名、身负绝世武功，手持传国玉玺，又有精兵强将作为依仗，你才是真正天命所归之人！

original: The heavy responsibility of unifying the world is yours alone, and the supreme position of the emperor is also yours!
context: 这天下一统的重任你责无旁贷，这九五之尊的位置也非你莫属！

original: The supreme emperor...
context: 九五之尊……

original:
Would rather be a chicken head than a phoenix tail!
Let me be the one to pacify the world and end this chaotic situation!
context:
王侯将相宁有种乎！
那就由我来平定天下，终结这混乱的局面吧！

original: Now that I am world-renowned, possessing unparalleled martial arts, holding the Imperial Seal, and having elite soldiers as my support, it seems that I am truly the one destined by heaven!
context: 我如今天下闻名、身负绝世武功，手持传国玉玺，又有精兵强将作为依仗，看来我才是真正天命所归之人！

original: I will shoulder the responsibility of unifying the world, and the throne will undoubtedly belong to me!
context: 这天下一统的重任我将责无旁贷，这九五之尊的位置也必将非我莫属！

original: I will be the one to bring peace to the world and end this chaos!
context: 就由我来平定天下，终结这混乱的局面吧！

original: Many years later...
context: 许多年以后……

original: Wanyan Wuzhu, on behalf of the Yan Kingdom, presents a national letter to the Emperor, expressing the Yan Kingdom's willingness to bow down to your country, and the descendants will always abide by their loyalty, never to betray.
context: 完颜乌珠代表燕国国主向皇帝陛下递交国书，燕国愿向贵国俯首称臣，世世子孙谨守臣节，永不背叛。

original: Yagyū Musashi, the lord of Dragonfly City, is awed by the Emperor's might and leads his people to surrender, at the Emperor's disposal.
context: 蚍蜉城城主柳生武藏，慑服皇帝陛下天威，率众投降，任凭陛下发落。

original: Miao Muli, the tribal chief of the Jiuli Tribe, leads the various tribes of Jiuli to swear allegiance to the Emperor, never to betray!
context: 九黎部落族长苗木黎，率九黎各部誓死效忠陛下，永不背叛！

original: Taoist Sect, Zhong Yangzi...
context: 道玄宗，重阳子……

original: Shifa Temple, Hui Yuan...
context: 释法寺，慧元……

original: Confucius Temple, Cai Yuanchang...
context: 儒圣馆，蔡元常……

original: Greetings to the Emperor
context: 拜见皇帝陛下

original: Wishing the Emperor a stable and everlasting reign.
context: 恭祝陛下江山永固，万年长青。

original: Great Emperor, the countries of the Western Regions have entrusted me to express their high respect to you. We are willing to be your subordinate countries, paying tribute and pledging allegiance year after year, forever being your most loyal subjects.
context:
伟大的皇帝陛下，西域各国委托我向您致以崇高的敬意。
我等愿为下邦属国，年年进贡、岁岁称臣，永远做陛下最忠诚的臣子。

original: Now that the world is unified and peaceful, all of you have made great contributions and deserve rewards!
context: 如今天下一统、四海清平，诸位劳苦功高，俱有封赏！

original: Long live the Emperor
context: 吾皇万岁

original: Long live
context: 万岁

original: Long live forever!
context: 万万岁！

original: You have witnessed life and death, and experienced deception,
context: 你目睹过生离死别，也经历过尔虞我诈，

original: Do you still remember your original intention when you first stepped into the martial world?
context: 如今的你，是否还记得踏足江湖的初衷？

original: To be good or evil, follow your heart; to become a Buddha or a demon, it's all in a thought.
context: 为善为恶，遵从本心；成佛成魔，一念之间。

original: Along the way, you have made countless choices,
context: 一路走来，你曾经做过无数次选择，

original: Some were impulsive, some were knowingly wrong but still done, and there were also helplessness and regrets.
context: 有意气用事，有明知不可为而为之，更有无奈和遗憾，

original: Each choice you make paves a new path for you.
context: 每次选择的结果为你铺成了新的道路。

original: Thousands of people have walked through thousands of different worlds,
context: 千百人走过千百样的江湖，

original: Your journey has come to an end,
context: 你这一段的江湖之旅已经画上句号，

original: Opening a new chapter will bring a different life.
context: 开启新的篇章将会迎来不一样的人生。

original: You look down at the courtiers in the hall, they are submissive and humble.
context: 你居高临下俯视殿内群臣，眼前这些人恭顺且卑微。

original: From this moment on, you can easily decide the fate of these high-ranking officials,
context: 从此刻起，你可以轻易决断这些封疆大吏的生死祸福，

original: The essence of imperial power is the power of life and death,
context: 皇权的本质就是生杀予夺的权力，

original: Countless heroes have fallen for it over the centuries
context: 千百年来无数英雄豪杰为之倾倒沉沦

original: Who could have imagined that the unknown shrimp of the past,
context: 有谁能够料想到，当年那个无名小虾米，

original: Has now become a dragon flying in the sky, the Peak of Jianghu!
context: 如今已经化龙飞天，成为天下第一人！

original: The world of swords and shadows has left you far behind,
context: 刀光剑影的江湖已离你远去，

original: What awaits you will be a more bloody and brutal struggle in the court.
context: 迎接你的将是更加血腥残酷的庙堂之争。

original: Experience +666

Neck durability -1...|Uric acid +1...|Do you want to race in the fourth ring TT...|Wind and freedom (only wind)...|I want to play Give Him Love 6...|The old thief's golden tree is not yet on sale...|The glory of the glass slag is no more...|Jack... I will cherish your motorcycle...|Military cap... my military cap
context: 颈椎耐久-1……|尿酸+1……|四环TT飙车吗……|风与自由（只有风）……|我要玩给他爱6……|老贼的黄金树还不发售……|玻璃渣不复往日荣光……|杰克……我会珍惜你的摩托车的……|军帽……我的军帽

original: You're really bored, here's something for you...
context: 你还真是无聊，这个给你……

original: Neck durability -1...|Uric acid +1...|Do you want to race in the fourth ring TT...|Wind and freedom (only wind)...|I want to play Give Him Love 6...|The old thief's golden tree is not yet on sale...|The glory of the glass slag is no more...|Jack... I will cherish your motorcycle...|Military cap... my military cap|Stop clicking... I really don't have anything else to give you...
context: 颈椎耐久-1……|尿酸+1……|四环TT飙车吗……|风与自由（只有风）……|我要玩给他爱6……|老贼的黄金树还不发售……|玻璃渣不复往日荣光……|杰克……我会珍惜你的摩托车的……|军帽……我的军帽|别点了……真没有东西给你了……

original: I've only been here a few months, and I haven't had time to prepare a suitable gift. How about I give you a BUG I inherited from the previous programmer as a souvenir?
context: 我才刚来几个月，还没来得及准备合适的礼物，要不我把从前前任程序员那里继承来的BUG送你留个纪念吧。

original: The new BUG hasn't reproduced yet, the one I gave you is a limited edition, extremely rare.
context: 新的BUG还没繁殖出来，给你那只是限量版，存世数量已经极其稀少了。

original: It's so cool|My limbs have never felt so relaxed...|It feels like flying|All worries are gone with the wind
context: 好凉爽啊|四肢百骸从未如此舒畅……|简直飞一样的感觉|所有烦心事随风逝去

original: There is a precedent of ancient people sleeping on a cold jade bed to practice Yin cold internal strength, I wonder if the cold air from this object will also be beneficial to the practice of internal strength!
context: 古人有睡寒玉床修练阴寒内功的先例，不知道借助这物件冒出的寒气，是否对修练内功也会大有裨益！

original: A day and a night later...
context: 一天一夜后……

original: Ah--
{yell} Achoo!!!
context: {yell}阿嚏！！！

original: Ah--
{yell} Achoo!!!
context: {yell}阿嚏！！！

original: Better stay away from it.
context: 还是离它远点吧。

original: I heard that there was once a strange woman with the surname Shi, who studied horse riding with the coachman of Chuxiang City for 8 years, but still got the commands for the horse to run and stop wrong.
context: 听说曾经有一位姓石的奇女子，跟楚襄城车夫学习骑马的本事，结果学了8年，仍然会把让马儿奔跑和停步的口号喊错。

original: It would be dangerous to ride a horse.
context: 这要是骑马出行岂不是很危险。

original: Later, the coachman refunded her 66 coins of tuition and told her not to mention her experience of learning to ride with him to others.
context: 后来车夫退了她66文钱学费，嘱咐她千万不要向别人提起跟他学车的经历。

original: How do you know about such a hidden thing?
context: 这种隐蔽的事情你又是怎么知道的？

original: I said I heard about it, how would I know how this thing got out in the first place.
context: 我都说是听说的了，我怎么会知道这事情最初怎么传出来的。

original: It's you guys who spread rumors and confuse people!
context: 就是你们这些无聊的家伙四处散播谣言，混淆视听！

original: You really don't know the rules, who digs deep into gossip, just listen for fun.
context: 你这人真不懂规矩，听八卦消息哪有刨根究底的，听个热闹得了。

original: How did I run into a fool today
context: 今天怎么碰到一个憨货

original: I wonder if what he said about the strange woman is true...
context: 他所说奇女子的事迹到底是不是真的呢……

original: Excuse me, I heard that a strange woman studied horse riding with you for 8 years and still didn't learn it. Is this true?
context: 冒昧打听一下，听说有位奇女子跟你学了8年骑马，最后还没学成，这事情是真的吗？

original: Shh, keep it down, don't spread this rumor anymore, I don't know where you guys get your gossip from.
context: 嘘，小点声，这事可不要再以讹传讹了，真不知道你们都从哪听到的小道消息。

original: It seems this thing is indeed false.
context: 看来这事果然是假的。

original: The thing is true, and the person does exist...
context: 事情是真的，也确有其人……

original: You admitted it yourself, so it's not a rumor.
context: 你都亲口承认了，就不算以讹传讹。

original: 8 years ago she couldn't even tame a normal dwarf horse, but later she got advice from a master, and had an epiphany, not to mention riding a horse, riding a pig, a wolf, a bear is all easy for her.
context: 8年前她连匹普通的小矮马都驯服不了，但是后来得到高人指点，再加上自己茅塞顿开，别说骑马了，骑猪、骑狼、骑熊全不在话下。

original: Who dares to laugh at her now? She's like a legend in our eyes.
context: 现在谁还敢笑话她，在我们眼里简直就是神话一般的存在。

original: Later, she gave me something out of gratitude for my past guidance. But I couldn't see its use, so I might as well give it to you.
context: 后来她看在我曾经帮她启蒙的份上，送我了一件东西，但是我也看不出有什么用，索性就送给你吧。

original: The Goose's Request
context: 大鹅的要求

original: Catch 5 Bass for the village goose.
context: 钓来5条鲈鱼给村内大鹅。

original: This goose seems a bit different from the others.
context: 这只大鹅好像有点与众不同阿。

original: How so?
context: 怎样？

original: I can actually understand what the goose is saying!!!
context: 我竟然能听懂大鹅说的话！！！

original: Come and get beaten!
context: 过来挨打！

original: What's going on? I was ambushed by a goose.
context: 什么情况，遭到一只大鹅的偷袭。

original: Quack, quack~ You lost, now we can communicate on equal terms.
context: 呱，呱~手下败将，咱们以后就可以平等交流了。

original: Human, I admit you are strong. From now on, we can communicate as equals, quack~
context: 人类，我承认你实力很强，以后可以跟本鹅平等交流了，呱~

original: I, the goose, want to eat fish. Human, get 5 Bass for me to taste.
context: 本鹅要吃鱼，人类弄5条鲈鱼给本鹅尝尝。

original: What kind of equal communication is this? I'm being treated like a runner.
context: 这算什么平等交流，完全拿我当跑腿的了。

original: Meow~ How dare you brush me off!
context: 喵的~竟敢敷衍本鹅！

original: I, the goose, am very satisfied. I want to reward you. Accept my gift, human, quack~
context: 本鹅很满意，本鹅要赏赐给你，接受馈赠吧人类，呱~

original: This is the third page of the diary I found. It seems I've found all the pages. Let's see what it is when I put them together...
context: 这是找到的第三份手札残页，似乎残页已经找全，我来看看把它们拼凑到一起，会是个什么东西……

original: Half a shichen later...
context: 半个时辰后……

original: It turns out to be an unnamed diary, recording the insights of a predecessor in the martial arts world who has traveled all over the world...
context: 原来是一本无名手札，记录了一位江湖前辈遍览天下武学遗录的心得见闻……

original: Keep Smiling
context: 笑口常开

original: Go to Wild Wolf Valley to retrieve the sheep skull mask.
context: 前往野狼谷找回羊头骨面具。

original: Return to the city and give the sheep skull mask to Ni Feng Xiao.
context: 回城把羊头骨面具交给逆风笑。

original: Ah, what should I do
context: 唉，这可怎么办

original: Ah, I knew I shouldn't have gone to that place
context: 唉，早知道就不去那种地方了

original: Young man, you seem troubled. Do you need my help with anything?
context: 小哥，看你愁眉不展，似乎遇到什么难事，有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

original: I heard from others that the scenery of Wild Wolf Valley is beautiful, so I went into the valley to enjoy the scenery, but there was no scenery at all, only Scorpions and big gray wolves!
context: 我听旁人说野狼谷风景秀丽，于是进山谷赏风景，结果哪有什么风景，全是蝎子和大灰狼！

original: While being chased by the wolves, I not only knocked out my front teeth, but also lost my beloved treasure in Wild Wolf Valley. I don't want to go to that dangerous place a second time, but I can't bear to leave my things in the valley.
context: 我在被群狼追赶的时候，不但磕掉了门牙，还把心爱的宝贝遗失在野狼谷，那种危险地方简直不想去第二次了，可是我又舍不得遗失在谷里的东西。

original: What treasure did you lose? I'll go to Wild Wolf Valley and retrieve it for you.
context: 你丢了什么宝贝，我去野狼谷帮你找回吧。

original: A sheep skull mask. Such a unique item can be easily identified anywhere.
context: 一个羊头骨面具，这么个性的东西无论出现在哪都很好分辨的。

original: Your taste is really unique...
context: 你的爱好还真是别致……

original: This must be the item Ni Feng Xiao lost here. The design is indeed unique.
context: 这应该就是逆风笑遗失在这里的东西了，造型还真是别致。

original: Brother, my happiness in the second half of my life depends on you.
context: 兄弟，我后半生的幸福可拜托在你的身上了。

original: (Put on the sheep skull mask you found)
context: （戴上你找回的羊头骨面具）

original: Finally, it's a day full of energy again~
context: 终于又是元气满满的一天啦~

original: You are my benefactor. I'll give you another treasure I've collected as a memento.
context: 你可是我的大恩人，我就把珍藏的另一件宝贝送你留作纪念吧。

original: Let's continue the adventure~
context: 继续冒险去咯~

original: I laugh with pride
context: 我得意的笑

original: Laughing proudly again
context: 又得意的笑

original: Laughing at the world without aging
context: 笑看红尘人不老

original: The three emperors and five sovereigns of morality, the fame of Xiahou and Shangzhou
context: 道德三皇五帝，功名夏侯商周

original: Heroes and five hegemonies make a fuss in Spring and Autumn, the rise and fall are in a moment
context: 英雄五霸闹春秋，顷刻兴亡过手

original: A few lines of history, countless barren hills in Beimang
context: 青史几行名姓，北邙无数荒丘

original: The fields of the predecessors are harvested by the successors, what's the point of dragon and tiger fights!
context: 前人田地后人收，说甚龙争虎斗！

original: Let me recite a few opening poems to gather some popularity. It's getting late, let's start the book~
context: 给大家念几句定场诗，为的是聚聚人气，现在时候不早了，咱们正式开书~

original: I call myself a book box, not for fake fame. Today let's do something special. Whatever book you friends want to hear, I'll tell that book!
context: 敝人自称书匣子，绝非浪得虚名。咱们今天来点特别的，在场各位朋友想听什么书，我就给各位讲什么书！

original: This is fresh
context: 这个新鲜阿

original: This is a unique skill
context: 介是绝活呀

original: So many rules for storytelling, what a hassle
context: 听书还这么多名堂，真麻烦

original: No matter what book, just start
context: 讲什么书都好，快点吧

original: Oh, I've met a fellow practitioner.
context: 呦呵，碰上同行了。

original: Since I'm passing by, why not join in the fun and see how he tells the story.
context: 既然路过，不如去凑个热闹，看他讲得如何。

original: I want to hear...
context: 我想听……

original: The grudges and affections of three men
context: 三个男人的恩怨情仇

original: Travel Diary of a Beast Taming Master
context: 驯兽师的旅行日记

original: The story of Yang's prosperity and Yin's decline
context: 阳盛阴衰的故事

original: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the Yellow Turban Rebellion...
context: 东汉末年，黄巾起义……

original: In the thirteenth year of the Tang Dynasty's Zhenguan era, Xuanzang set off for the west under a royal decree...
context: 大唐贞观十三年，唐玄奘奉旨西行……

original: Big brother, it's time to take your medicine...
context: 大郎，该吃药了……

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Hey, what the hell are you talking about? It's not exciting at all!
context: 喂，你讲的都是些什么狗屁，一点都不带劲！

original: Everyone has different tastes. Let me finish the story that others have requested first, then I can tell the one you like.
context: 千人千面，众口难调，先让我把别人点的这段书讲完，再讲你爱听的不迟。

original: Who wants to listen to your boring stories? I want you to tell "The Memoirs of a Rich Second Generation" right now!
context: 谁爱听你将这些磨磨唧唧的东西，我要你现在就讲《富二代的回忆录》！

original: Let me ask the young man just now. If he agrees, I'll tell you the story.
context: 你容我先问问刚才那位小哥，如果他同意了我再给你讲。

original: Young man, this big brother insists on listening to some exciting and explosive stories. What do you think?
context: 小哥，这位大兄弟非要听点刺激劲爆的故事，你的意思呢？

original: Exciting and explosive stories...
context: 刺激劲爆的故事……

original: I'm free anyway
context: 闲着也是闲着

original: Why not listen
context: 不妨听听

original: Alright, today I'll tell everyone about the memoirs of the rich second generation...
context: 得嘞，咱今天就给大家讲讲这富二代的回忆录……

original: Speaking of the four major families in Jinling Province, they rise and fall together...
context: 话说，这金陵省四大家族，一荣俱荣一损俱损……

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Thank you, brother. Fortunately, you didn't make a fuss with that idler, otherwise today's scene would be messed up.
context: 多谢了兄弟，幸亏你没有跟那闲汉一般见识，要不然今天的场面非搞砸不可。

original: It's just a small favor, no need to mention it.
context: 举手之劳，何足挂齿。

original: I will stay in the city for twelve shichen. If you want to listen to the story, you can come to me at any time.
context: 我在城里会逗留十二时辰，想要过来听书，可随时来找我。

original: This monkey is not for sale! Petting the monkey costs five guan!
context: 介猴不卖！撸猴五贯！

original: Pet the monkey! (5000 Coin)
It's too expensive.
context: 太贵了。

original: Squeak~
context: 吱吱吱~

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: I didn't expect you to like petting monkeys too. I'll give you this little toy as a souvenir. It's rare to meet someone with the same interest.
context: 看不出你也喜欢撸猴，这个小玩意送你留个纪念吧，难得遇到志趣相投的。

original: Would you like to listen to a book to improve your Mood?
context: 打算听我给您说段书改善下心情吗？

original: Listen to the book. (100 Coin, one shichen)
context: 听书。（100文，一个时辰）

original: Not interested.
context: 没兴趣。

original: You listened to the book with great interest for a shichen...
context: 你津津有味得听了一个时辰的书……

original: City Gate Guard
context: 城门守卫

original: Enter Lin'an City to find another Lin'an City Guard.
context: 进霖安城寻找另外一名霖安城·守卫。

original: Young man, you look familiar. Can you do me a small favor?
context: 小兄弟，看你有些面善，帮我一个小忙如何？

original: Let's hear it. I'm not sure if I can help.
context: 不妨说说看，我也不确定能不能帮得了你。

original: Today, it's my brother and I who are on duty. The brother next to me has been diligent for more than ten years and has never missed a shift. I don't know why he hasn't shown up today.
context: 原本今天是我们两兄弟负责站岗，旁边这位兄弟兢兢业业，十几年从无缺勤断岗，今日不知为何仍然不见人影。

original: Can you help me find him in the city? If he doesn't come back, I won't be able to hold on by myself.
context: 你帮我去城里找找这家伙，他再不回来，我一个人可要扛不住了。

original: Do you have any clues? Otherwise, I have no idea where to start.
context: 有没有线索提供，否则一点头绪都没有，可不知道找到什么时候了。

original: He usually arrives before me. Today, all that's left at his post is this half of a chicken egg.
context: 往日他都比我先到，今天他站岗的地方只有这半枚鸡蛋。

original: (Takes the half chicken egg)
context: （接过半枚鸡蛋）

original: Is this chicken egg dirty? It stinks!
context: 这鸡蛋是沾了什么不干净的东西了吗？这么臭！

original: No, it smells pretty good to me.
context: 没有阿，我闻得还挺香的。

original: If your brother ate this stinky chicken egg, vomiting and diarrhea would be the least of his problems. If he doesn't get medical attention soon, he might be in danger...
context: 这么臭的鸡蛋若是真被你那位兄弟吃了，上吐下泻恐怕都是轻的，若不尽快就医恐怕有性命之忧……

original: Don't scare me. I couldn't help but lick it just now.
context: 你可别吓我，刚才我还忍不住舔了一口。

original: You really disgust me.
context: 你可真是恶心到我了。
