original: So you're here. Your brother, who was guarding the city gate with you, was worried about you and asked me to find you.
context: 你果然在这里，跟你一起守城门的兄弟担心你的情况，让我来找你。

original: I can't believe my reputation is ruined by a stinky chicken egg. Why was I so curious to taste it...
context: 想不到我一世英名竟然毁在半枚发臭的鸡蛋上，为什么当时我就忍不住想尝一口的好奇心呢……

original: You and your brother are a perfect match. If he had met me later, I guess you two would have been a pair in this room.
context: 你跟你那位兄弟还真是绝配，他若是晚些遇到我，估计你俩在这屋能凑一对了。

original: You don't seem to have recovered yet. Didn't the doctor treat you?
context: 看你样子好像还没缓解，这郎中没给你诊治吗？

original: I was in a hurry when I came and didn't bring much money. I couldn't afford the consultation fee, so the doctor told me to cool off.
context: 来的时候匆忙，身边没带多少钱，凑不够诊金，所以郎中让我先一边凉快去。

original: They say doctors have a parental heart, but now these clinic owners are all about the money.
context: 都说医者父母心，现在这些开医馆的都掉进钱眼里了。

original: I wonder if my current skills can help him...
context: 以我如今的能力不知能否帮助到他……

original: Treat him myself. (Medical>49)
context: 自己亲手诊治。（医术>49）

original: Administer the <color=#c44b0e>Antidote powder</color> to him. (1 Antidote powder required)
context: 给他服下<color=#c44b0e>解毒散</color>。（解毒散1份)

original: Ask a teammate for medical assistance. (Any teammate with Medical >49)
context: 请队友帮忙诊治。（队友任一人医术>49）

original: Temporarily helpless.
context: 暂时无能为力。

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Phew, barely saved a life...
context: 呼，总算捡回半条命……

original: Thank you for your life-saving grace, young hero. I will give you this amulet as a token of my gratitude.
context: 多谢少侠救命之恩，我这这枚护身符就送给少侠，聊表谢意。

original: By the way, a few years ago, my brother and I met a martial artist who called himself Brother Yu. He saw that we were good at wielding axes, so he gave us a small axe.
context: 对了，几年前我们兄弟二人遇到了一位武艺高超自称宇哥的江湖人，他见我兄弟二人斧头耍的还不错，便赠送了我们一柄小斧头。

original: We studied it for a while but didn't find anything special, so we'll give it to you, hero!
context: 我俩研究了一阵子也没发现什么名堂，那也一并送给大侠你吧！

original: Exactly!
context: 就是就是！

original: It seems this is the courtyard that the host has given me.
context: 看来这里就是楼主赠送给我的庭院了。

original: You must be the new owner of this courtyard, let me bow to you.
context: 您就是这庭院以后的新主人吧，奴婢给您行礼了。

original: Who are you...?
context: 你是……？

original: I am here to assist the master in managing the courtyard, you can leave trivial matters to me.
context: 奴婢是协助主人打理庭院的，一些琐碎事情交给奴婢处理即可。

original: Is it necessary to arrange someone to manage just a courtyard?
context: 一个庭院而已，还用得着安排专人打理？

original: The master may not know, this courtyard has been abandoned for a long time, many places need to be renovated before they can be used...
context: 主人有所不知，这庭院荒废许久，很多地方需要重新修缮才能使用……

original: Would you like to listen to this maid's introduction patiently?
context: 是否耐心听这丫鬟介绍？

original: Listen patiently to the introduction
context: 耐心听完介绍

original: Not interested
context: 没兴趣

original: I've been talking for so long, I suppose the master can't wait to see his own courtyard.
context: 奴婢絮絮叨叨说了这么久，想必主人已经迫不及待想要见识到属于自己的庭院了。

original: It seems the master can't wait to see his own courtyard.
context: 看来主人已经迫不及待想要见识到属于自己的庭院了。

original: Master, this is the Enlightenment Stele Forest! Please take a look at the tutorial first.
context: 主人这里就是悟道碑林了！请您先看看教程。

original: Master, please note that each Enlightenment Stele can only imprint one martial art.
context: 主人一定要注意，每个悟道碑只能拓印1次武功哦。

original: If the master forgets how to operate, it's okay, in the upper right corner of the partner editing interface, you can review the home tutorial at any time.
context: 如果主人忘记如何操作了，也没关系，在伙伴编辑界面的右上角“？”图标内，可以反复查看家园的相关教程哦。

original: Master, this is the Treasure Pavilion! Please take a look at the tutorial first.
context: 主人这里就是珍宝阁了！请您先看看教程。

original: Master, please note that each item on the display stand can only be taken once.
context: 主人一定要注意，每个陈列台的道具只能拿取1次哦。

original: If the master forgets how to operate, it's okay, in the upper right corner of the partner editing interface, you can review the home tutorial at any time.
context: 如果主人忘记如何操作了，也没关系，在伙伴编辑界面的右上角“？”图标内，可以反复查看家园的相关教程哦。

original: Master, this is the back mountain!
context: 主人主人这里就是后山啦！

original: Back mountain? What's it for?
context: 后山？有什么用？

original: It has rich resources, the necessary materials for <color=#c44b0e>home upgrade</color>, <color=#c44b0e>wood, stone</color>, are all produced from the back mountain.
context: 这里有有着丰富的资源，<color=#c44b0e>家园升级</color>的必要材料<color=#c44b0e>木料、石料</color>都产自后山哦。

original: If the master wants to upgrade the home, he has to work hard in the back mountain.
context: 如果主人想要升级家园就得在后山努力了哦。

original: By the way, if the master opens the home progress sharing function, the <color=#c44b0e>home progress, building material stock</color> of all your save files will be shared.
context: 对啦，如果主人开启了家园进度共享功能，主人的各个存档间的<color=#c44b0e>家园进度、建筑材料存量</color>均会共享哦。

original: I found some building materials here, I'll give them to the master!
context: 我在这里发现了一些建筑材料，这就送给主人吧！

original: Did you notice the hint on the left?
context: 注意到左侧的提示了吗？

original: What hint?
context: 什么提示？

original: If the master missed it, it's okay, you can see where the building materials I just gave you went when you open the log.
context: 如果主人忽略了也没关系，一会打开日志就可以看到刚刚送给主人的建筑材料的去向啦。

original: It's normal that the master can't see the building materials in the backpack, they will be stored in a special space in the home.
context: 主人无法在背包查看到建筑材料是正常的，建筑材料会收纳到家园的专属空间。

original: The master can preview the stock of materials in the home upgrade interface!
context: 主人只要在家园的升级界面即可预览材料的存量啦！

original: You are really considerate.
context: 你还真是贴心。

original: It's my duty to help the master understand the home quickly!
context: 让主人快速了解家园是我责任！

original: Resting here seems to recover some Stamina...
context: 在这里休息似乎可以恢复少许体力……

original: Rest for one shichen
context: 休息一个时辰

original: Rest for three shichen
context: 休息三个时辰

original: Rest for six shichen
context: 休息六个时辰

original: It's not time to rest yet
context: 还不是休息的时候

original: One shichen later...
context: 一个时辰后……

original: Three shichen later...
context: 三个时辰后……

original: Six shichen later...
context: 六个时辰后……

original: Master, after you Open your home, subsequent Mining and Woodcutting at any location will have a chance to drop extra Stone Material and Wood Material.
context: 主人您开启了家园后，后续在任何地点采矿和伐木都会有概率额外掉落石料和木料。

original: The higher the Level of the gathering point, the higher the probability.
context: 采集点的等级越高概率越高哦。

original: Sounds good!
context: 听起来不错！

original: Master, Behind the Mountain is so big, it's too tiring for you to gather resources alone.
context: 主人后山这么大，您一个人采集资源实在是太累了。

original: So what's your solution?
context: 那你有什么办法？

original: Let the partners and pets that Master trusts help gather Material Behind the Mountain!
context: 把主人信的过得伙伴和宠物放到后山帮助主人搜集材料吧！

original: Oh? Is that so?
context: 哦？还有这种事情？

original: Master, placing partners and pets with high <color=#c44b0e>Strength</color> Behind the Mountain can automatically collect home Material!
context: 主人将<color=#c44b0e>臂力</color>高的伙伴和宠物放到后山就可以自动搜集家园材料啦！

original: <color=#c44b0e>Strength</color>, huh... Okay, thank you for the reminder.
context: <color=#c44b0e>臂力</color>么……好的，谢谢你的提醒。

original: In the future, Master just needs to wander around the world, and occasionally come back to upgrade the home!
context: 以后主人只管闯荡江湖，偶尔回来升级一下家园就好喽！
